c vane pañcatvam agamat sukṛtena ca tena vai
e ajāyata mahārājarājavaṃśe mahādyutiḥ
a tathaiva sa ṛṣis tāta kāladharmam avāpya ha
c purohitakule vipra ājāto bharatarṣabha
a evaṃ tau tatra saṃbhūtāv ubhau śūdramunī tadā
c krameṇa vardhitau cāpi vidyāsu kuśalāv ubhau
a atharvavede vede ca babhūvarṣiḥ suniścitaḥ
c kalpaprayoge cotpanne jyotiṣe ca paraṃ gataḥ
e sakhye cāpi parā prītis tayoś cāpi vyavardhata
a pitary uparate cāpi kṛtaśaucaḥ sa bhārata
c abhiṣiktaḥ prakṛtibhī rājaputraḥ sa pārthivaḥ
e abhiṣiktena sa ṛṣir abhiṣiktaḥ purohitaḥ
a sa taṃ purodhāya sukham avasad bharatarṣabha
c rājyaṃ śaśāsa dharmeṇa prajāś ca paripālayan
a puṇyāhavācane nityaṃ dharmakāryeṣu cāsakṛt
c utsmayan prāhasac cāpi dṛṣṭvā rājā purohitam
e evaṃ sa bahuśo rājan purodhasam upāhasat
a lakṣayitvā purodhās tu bahuśastaṃ narādhipam
c utsmayantaṃ ca satataṃ dṛṣṭvāsau manyumān abhūt
a atha śūnye purodhās tu saha rājñā samāgataḥ
c kathābhir anukūlābhī rājānam abhirāmayat
a tato 'bravīn narendraṃ sa purodhā bharatarṣabha
c varam icchāmy ahaṃ tv ekaṃ tvayā dattaṃ mahādyute
 rājovāca
a varāṇāṃ te śataṃ dadyāṃ kim utaikaṃ dvijottama
c snehāc ca bahumānāc ca nāsty adeyaṃ hi me tava
 purohita uvāca
a ekaṃ vai varam icchāmi yadi tuṣṭo 'si pārthiva
c yad dadāsi mahārāja satyaṃ tad vada mānṛtam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a bāḍham ity eva taṃ rājā pratyuvāca yudhiṣṭhira
c yadi jñāsyāmi vakṣyāmi ajānan na tu saṃvade
 purohita uvāca
a puṇyāhavācane nityaṃ dharmakṛtyeṣu cāsakṛt
c śāntihomeṣu ca sadā kiṃ tvaṃ hasasi vīkṣya mām
a savrīḍaṃ vai bhavati hi mano me hasatā tvayā
c kāmayā śāpito rājan nānyathā vaktum arhasi
a bhāvyaṃ hi kāraṇenātra na te hāsyam akāraṇam
c kautūhalaṃ me subhṛśaṃ tattvena kathayasva me
 rājovāca
a evam ukte tvayā vipra yad avācyaṃ bhaved api
c avaśyam eva vaktavyaṃ śṛṇuṣvaikamanā dvija
a pūrvadehe yathā vṛttaṃ tan nibodha dvijottama
c jātiṃ smarāmy ahaṃ brahmann avadhānena me śṛṇu
a śūdro 'ham abhavaṃ pūrvaṃ tāpaso bhṛśasaṃyutaḥ
c ṛṣir ugratapās tvaṃ ca tadābhūr dvijasattama
a prīyatā hi tadā brahman mamānugrahabuddhinā
c pitṛkārye tvayā pūrvam upadeśaḥ kṛto 'nagha
e bṛsyāṃ darbheṣu havye ca kavye ca munisattama
a etena karmadoṣeṇa purodhās tvam ajāyathāḥ
c ahaṃ rājā ca viprendra paśya kālasya paryayam
e matkṛte hy upadeśena tvayā prāptam idaṃ phalam
a etasmāt kāraṇād brahman prahase tvāṃ dvijottama
c na tvāṃ paribhavan brahman prahasāmi gurur bhavān
a viparyayeṇa me manyus tena saṃtapyate manaḥ
c jātiṃ smarāmy ahaṃ tubhyam atas tvāṃ prahasāmi vai
a evaṃ tavograṃ hi tapa upadeśena nāśitam
c purohitatvam utsṛjya yatasva tvaṃ punarbhave
a itas tvam adhamām anyāṃ mā yoniṃ prāpsyase dvija
c gṛhyatāṃ draviṇaṃ vipra pūtātmā bhava sattama
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tato visṛṣṭo rājñā tu vipro dānāny anekaśaḥ
c brāhmaṇebhyo dadau vittaṃ bhūmiṃ grāmāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
a kṛcchrāṇi cīrtvā ca tato yathoktāni dvijottamaḥ
c tīrthāni cābhigatvā vai dānāni vividhāni ca
a dattvā gāś caiva viprāṇāṃ pūtātmā so 'bhavad dvijaḥ
c tam eva cāśramaṃ gatvā cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ
a tataḥ siddhiṃ parāṃ prāpto brāhmaṇo rājasattama
c saṃmataś cābhavat teṣām āśrame ''śramavāsinām
a evaṃ prāpto mahat kṛcchram ṛṣiḥ sa nṛpasattama
c brāhmaṇena na vaktavyaṃ tasmād varṇāvare jane
a varjayed upadeśaṃ ca sadaiva brāhmaṇo nṛpa
c upadeśaṃ hi kurvāṇo dvijaḥ kṛcchram avāpnuyāt
a eṣitavyaṃ sadā vācā nṛpeṇa dvijasattamāt
c na pravaktavyam iha hi kiṃ cid varṇāvare jane
a brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyās trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ
c eteṣu kathayan rājan brāhmaṇo na praduṣyati
a tasmāt sadbhir na vaktavyaṃ kasya cit kiṃ cid agrataḥ
c sūkṣmā gatir hi dharmasya durjñeyā hy akṛtātmabhiḥ
a tasmān maunāni munayo dīkṣāṃ kurvanti cādṛtāḥ
c duruktasya bhayād rājan nānubhāṣanti kiṃ cana
a dhārmikā guṇasaṃpannāḥ satyārjavaparāyaṇāḥ
c duruktavācābhihatāḥ prāpnuvantīha duṣkṛtam
a upadeśo na kartavyaḥ kadā cid api kasya cit
c upadeśād dhi tat pāpaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ samavāpnuyāt
a vimṛśya tasmāt prājñena vaktavyaṃ dharmam icchatā
c satyānṛtena hi kṛta upadeśo hinasti vai
a vaktavyam iha pṛṣṭena viniścitya viparyayam
c sa copadeśaḥ kartavyo yena dharmam avāpnuyāt
a etat te sarvam ākhyātam upadeśe kṛte sati
c mahān kleśo hi bhavati tasmān nopadiśet kva cit
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kīdṛśe puruṣe tāta strīṣu vā bharatarṣabha
c śrīḥ padmā vasate nityaṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atra te vartayiṣyāmi yathādṛṣṭaṃ yathāśrutam
c rukmiṇī devakīputrasaṃnidhau paryapṛcchata
a nārāyaṇasyāṅkagatāṃ jvalantīṃ
dṛṣṭvā śriyaṃ padmasamānavaktrām
c kautūhalād vismitacārunetrā
papraccha mātā makaradhvajasya
a kānīha bhūtāny upasevase tvaṃ
saṃtiṣṭhatī kāni na sevase tvam
c tāni trilokeśvarabhūtakānte
tattvena me brūhi maharṣikanye
a evaṃ tadā śrīr abhibhāṣyamāṇā
devyā samakṣaṃ garuḍadhvajasya
c uvāca vākyaṃ madhurābhidhānaṃ
manoharaṃ candramukhī prasannā
a vasāmi satye subhage pragalbhe
dakṣe nare karmaṇi vartamāne
b akrodhane devapare kṛtajñe
b jitendriye nityam udīrṇasattve
c nākarmaśīle puruṣe vasāmi
na nāstike sāṃkarike kṛtaghne
e na bhinnavṛtte na nṛśaṃsavṛtte
na cāpi caure na guruṣv asūye
a ye cālpatejobalasattvasārā
hṛṣyanti kupyanti ca yatra tatra
c na devi tiṣṭhāmi tathāvidheṣu
nareṣu saṃsuptamanoratheṣu
a yaś cātmani prārthayate na kiṃ cid
yaś ca svabhāvopahatāntarātmā
c teṣv alpasaṃtoṣarateṣu nityaṃ
nareṣu nāhaṃ nivasāmi devi
a vasāmi dharmaśīleṣu dharmajñeṣu mahātmasu
c vṛddhaseviṣu dānteṣu sattvajñeṣu mahātmasu
d avandhyakāleṣu sadā snānaśaucarateṣu ca
d brahmacaryatapojñānagodvijātipriyeṣu ca
a strīṣu kṣāntāsu dāntāsu devadvijaparāsu ca
c vasāmi satyaśīlāsu svabhāvaniratāsu ca
d viśuddhagṛhabhāṇḍāsu godhānyābhiratāsu ca
d svadharmaśīleṣu ca dharmavitsu
d vṛddhopasevānirate ca dānte
d kṛtātmani kṣāntipare samarthe
d kṣāntāsu dāntāsu tathābalāsu
d satyasvabhāvārjavasaṃyutāsu
d vasāmi devadvijapūjitāsu
a prakīrṇabhāṇḍām anavekṣyakāriṇīṃ
sadā ca bhartuḥ pratikūlavādinīm
c parasya veśmābhiratām alajjām
evaṃvidhāṃ strīṃ parivarjayāmi
a lolām acokṣām avalehinīṃ ca
vyapetadhairyāṃ kalahapriyāṃ ca
c nidrābhibhūtāṃ satataṃ śayānām
evaṃvidhāṃ strīṃ parivarjayāmi
a satyāsu nityaṃ priyadarśanāsu
saubhāgyayuktāsu guṇānvitāsu
c vasāmi nārīṣu pativratāsu
kalyāṇaśīlāsu vibhūṣitāsu
a yāneṣu kanyāsu vibhūṣaṇeṣu
yajñeṣu megheṣu ca vṛṣṭimatsu
c vasāmi phullāsu ca padminīṣu
nakṣatravīthīṣu ca śāradīṣu
a śaileṣu goṣṭheṣu tathā vaneṣu
saraḥsu phullotpalapaṅkajeṣu
c nadīṣu haṃsasvananāditāsu
krauñcāvaghuṣṭasvaraśobhitāsu
a vistīrṇakūlahradaśobhitāsu
tapasvisiddhadvijasevitāsu
c vasāmi nityaṃ subahūdakāsu
siṃhair gajaiś cākulitodakāsu
e matte gaje govṛṣabhe narendre
siṃhāsane satpuruṣe ca nityam
a yasmin gṛhe hūyate havyavāho
gobrāhmaṇaś cārcyate devatāś ca
b yasmiñ jano havyabhujaṃ juhoti
b gobrāhmaṇaṃ cārcati devatāś ca
b yasmin yajñe hūyati havyavāhe
b gobrāhmaṇābhyarcitadevatāsu
c kāle ca puṣpair balayaḥ kriyante
tasmin gṛhe nityam upaimi vāsam
a svādhyāyanityeṣu dvijeṣu nityaṃ
kṣatre ca dharmābhirate sadaiva
c vaiśye ca kṛṣyābhirate vasāmi
śūdre ca śuśrūṣaṇanityayukte
a nārāyaṇe tv ekamanā vasāmi
sarveṇa bhāvena śarīrabhūtā
c tasmin hi dharmaḥ sumahān niviṣṭo
brahmaṇyatā cātra tathā priyatvam
a nāhaṃ śarīreṇa vasāmi devi
naivaṃ mayā śakyam ihābhidhātum
c yasmiṃs tu bhāvena vasāmi puṃsi
sa vardhate dharmayaśorthakāmaiḥ
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d prāyaścittaṃ kṛtaghnānāṃ pratibrūhi pitāmaha
d mātṝḥ pitṝn gurūṃś caiva ye 'vamanyanti mohitāḥ
d ye cāpy anye pare tāta kṛtaghnā nirapatrapāḥ
d bhīṣmaḥ
d teṣāṃ gatiṃ mahābāho śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
d kṛtaghnānāṃ gatis tāta narake śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
d mātāpitṛgurūṇāṃ ca ye na tiṣṭhanta śāsane
d kṛmikīṭapipīleṣu jāyante sthāvareṣu ca
d durlabho hi punas teṣāṃ mānuṣye punarudbhavaḥ
d atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
d vatsanābho mahāprājño maharṣiḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
d valmīkabhūto brahmarṣis tapyate sumahat tapaḥ
d tasmiṃś ca tapyati tapo vāsavo bharatarṣabha
d vavarṣa sumahad varṣaṃ savidyut stanayitnumān
d tatra saptāhavarṣaṃ tu mumuce pākaśāsanaḥ
d nimīlitākṣas tad varṣaṃ pratyagṛhṇata vai dvijaḥ
d tasmin patati varṣe tu śītavātasamanvite
d viśīrṇadhvastaśikharo valmīko 'śanitāḍitaḥ
d tāḍyamāne tatas tasmin vatsanābhe mahātmani
d kāruṇyāt tasya dharmas tu ānṛśaṃsyam athākarot
d cintayānasya brahmarṣiṃ tapantam atidhārmikam
d anurūpā matiḥ kṣipram upajātā svabhāvajā
d svaṃ rūpaṃ māhiṣaṃ kṛtvā sumahāntaṃ manoharam
d trāṇārthaṃ vatsanābhasya catuṣpād upari sthitaḥ
d yadā tv apagataṃ varṣaṃ vṛṣṭivātasamanvitam
d tato mahiṣarūpeṇa dharmo dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
d śanair valmīkam utsṛjya prādravad bharatarṣabha
d sthite 'smin vṛṣṭisaṃpāte vīkṣate sma mahātapāḥ
d diśaś ca vipulās tatra girīṇāṃ śikharāṇi ca
d dṛṣṭvā ca pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ salilena pariplutām
d jalāśayān sa tān dṛṣṭvā vipraḥ pramudito 'bhavat
d acintayad vismitaś ca varṣāt kenāsmi rakṣitaḥ
d so 'paśyat tatra mahiṣam avasthitam adūrataḥ
d tiryagyonāv api kathaṃ dṛśyate dharmavatsalaḥ
d ato nu bhadramahiṣaḥ śilāpaṭṭam avasthitaḥ
d pīvaraś caiva balyaś ca bahumāṃso bhaved ayam
d tasya buddhir iyaṃ jātā dharmasaṃsaktajā muneḥ
d kṛtaghnā narakaṃ yānti ye ca viśvastaghātinaḥ
d niṣkṛtiṃ neha paśyāmi kṛtaghnānāṃ kathaṃ cana
d ṛte prāṇaparityāgād dharmajñānāṃ vaco yathā
d akṛtvā bharaṇaṃ pitror adattvā gurudakṣiṇām
d kṛtaghnatāṃ ca saṃprāpya maraṇāntā ca niṣkṛtiḥ
d ākāṅkṣāyām upekṣāyāṃ copapātakam uttamam
d tasmāt prāṇān parityakṣye prāyaścittārtham ity uta
d sa meruśikharaṃ gatvā niḥsaṅgenāntarātmanā
d prāyaścittaṃ kartukāmaḥ śarīraṃ tyaktum udyataḥ
d dharmaḥ
d nigṛhītaś ca dharmātmā haste dharmeṇa dharmavit
d vatsanābha mahāprājña bahuvarṣaśatāyuṣa
d parituṣṭo 'smi tyāgena niḥsaṅgena tathātmanaḥ
d evaṃ dharmabhṛtaḥ sarve vimṛśanti kṛtākṛtam
d na kaś cid vatsanābhasya yasya nopahataṃ manaḥ
d yaś cānavadyaś carati śakto dharmaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
d nivartasva mahāprājña pūtātmā hy asi śāśvataḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a strīpuṃsayoḥ saṃprayoge sparśaḥ kasyādhiko bhavet
c etan me saṃśayaṃ rājan yathāvad vaktum arhasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c bhaṅgāśvanena śakrasya yathā vairam abhūt purā
a purā bhaṅgāśvano nāma rājarṣir atidhārmikaḥ
c aputraḥ sa naravyāghra putrārthaṃ yajñam āharat
a agniṣṭuṃ nāma rājarṣir indradviṣṭaṃ mahābalaḥ
c prāyaścitteṣu martyānāṃ putrakāmasya ceṣyate
a indro jñātvā tu taṃ yajñaṃ mahābhāgaḥ sureśvaraḥ
c antaraṃ tasya rājarṣer anvicchan niyatātmanaḥ
d na caivāsyāntaraṃ rājan sa dadarśa mahātmanaḥ
a kasya cit tv atha kālasya mṛgayām aṭato nṛpa
c idam antaram ity eva śakro nṛpam amohayat
a ekāśvena ca rājarṣir bhrānta indreṇa mohitaḥ
c na diśo 'vindata nṛpaḥ kṣutpipāsārditas tadā
a itaś cetaś ca vai dhāvañ śramatṛṣṇārdito nṛpaḥ
c saro 'paśyat suruciraṃ pūrṇaṃ paramavāriṇā
e so 'vagāhya saras tāta pāyayām āsa vājinam
a atha pītodakaṃ so 'śvaṃ vṛkṣe baddhvā nṛpottamaḥ
c avagāhya tataḥ snāto rājā strītvam avāpa ha
a ātmānaṃ strīkṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā vrīḍito nṛpasattamaḥ
c cintānugatasarvātmā vyākulendriyacetanaḥ
a ārohiṣye kathaṃ tv aśvaṃ kathaṃ yāsyāmi vai puram
c agniṣṭuṃ nāma iṣṭaṃ me putrāṇāṃ śatam aurasam
a jātaṃ mahābalānāṃ vai tān pravakṣyāmi kiṃ tv aham
c dāreṣu cāsmadīyeṣu paurajānapadeṣu ca
a mṛdutvaṃ ca tanutvaṃ ca viklavatvaṃ tathaiva ca
b hāvabhāvādilāvaṇyastrīguṇād vā kutūhalam
c strīguṇā ṛṣibhiḥ proktā dharmatattvārthadarśibhiḥ
e vyāyāmaḥ karkaśatvaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca puruṣe guṇāḥ
a pauruṣaṃ vipranaṣṭaṃ me strītvaṃ kenāpi me 'bhavat
c strībhāvāt katham aśvaṃ tu punar āroḍhum utsahe
a mahatā tv atha khedena āruhyāśvaṃ narādhipaḥ
c punar āyāt puraṃ tāta strībhūto nṛpasattama
a putrā dārāś ca bhṛtyāś ca paurajānapadāś ca te
c kiṃ nv idaṃ tv iti vijñāya vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥ
a athovāca sa rājarṣiḥ strībhūto vadatāṃ varaḥ
c mṛgayām asmi niryāto balaiḥ parivṛto dṛḍham
e udbhrāntaḥ prāviśaṃ ghorām aṭavīṃ daivamohitaḥ
a aṭavyāṃ ca sughorāyāṃ tṛṣṇārto naṣṭacetanaḥ
c saraḥ suruciraprakhyam apaśyaṃ pakṣibhir vṛtam
a tatrāvagāḍhaḥ strībhūto vyaktaṃ daivān na saṃśayaḥ
c atṛpta iva putrāṇāṃ dārāṇāṃ ca dhanasya ca
d nāmagotrāṇi cābhāṣya dārāṇāṃ mantriṇāṃ tathā
a uvāca putrāṃś ca tataḥ strībhūtaḥ pārthivottamaḥ
c saṃprītyā bhujyatāṃ rājyaṃ vanaṃ yāsyāmi putrakāḥ
e abhiṣicya sa putrāṇāṃ śataṃ rājā vanaṃ gataḥ
f evam uktvā putraśataṃ vanam eva jagāma ha
f sa putrāṇāṃ śataṃ rājā abhiṣicya vanaṃ gataḥ
a tām āśrame striyaṃ tāta tāpaso 'bhyavapadyata
c tāpasenāsya putrāṇām āśrame 'py abhavac chatam
a atha sā tān sutān gṛhya pūrvaputrān abhāṣata
c puruṣatve sutā yūyaṃ strītve ceme śataṃ sutāḥ
a ekatra bhujyatāṃ rājyaṃ bhrātṛbhāvena putrakāḥ
c sahitā bhrātaras te 'tha rājyaṃ bubhujire tadā
a tān dṛṣṭvā bhrātṛbhāvena bhuñjānān rājyam uttamam
c cintayām āsa devendro manyunābhipariplutaḥ
e upakāro 'sya rājarṣeḥ kṛto nāpakṛtaṃ mayā
a tato brāhmaṇarūpeṇa devarājaḥ śatakratuḥ
c bhedayām āsa tān gatvā nagaraṃ vai nṛpātmajān
a bhrātṝṇāṃ nāsti saubhrātraṃ ye 'py ekasya pituḥ sutāḥ
c rājyahetor vivaditāḥ kaśyapasya surāsurāḥ
a yūyaṃ bhaṅgāśvanāpatyās tāpasasyetare sutāḥ
c kaśyapasya surāś caiva asurāś ca sutās tathā
e yuṣmākaṃ paitṛkaṃ rājyaṃ bhujyate tāpasātmajaiḥ
a indreṇa bheditās te tu yuddhe 'nyonyam apātayan
c tac chrutvā tāpasī cāpi saṃtaptā praruroda ha
a brāhmaṇacchadmanābhyetya tām indro 'thānvapṛcchata
c kena duḥkhena saṃtaptā rodiṣi tvaṃ varānane
a brāhmaṇaṃ tu tato dṛṣṭvā sā strī karuṇam abravīt
c putrāṇāṃ dve śate brahman kālena vinipātite
a ahaṃ rājābhavaṃ vipra tatra putraśataṃ mayā
c samutpannaṃ surūpāṇāṃ vikrāntānāṃ dvijottama
a kadā cin mṛgayāṃ yāta udbhrānto gahane vane
c avagāḍhaś ca sarasi strībhūto brāhmaṇottama
e putrān rājye pratiṣṭhāpya vanam asmi tato gataḥ
a striyāś ca me putraśataṃ tāpasena mahātmanā
c āśrame janitaṃ brahman nītās te nagaraṃ mayā
a teṣāṃ ca vairam utpannaṃ kālayogena vai dvija
c etac chocāmi viprendra daivenābhipariplutā
a indras tāṃ duḥkhitāṃ dṛṣṭvā abravīt paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
c purā suduḥsahaṃ bhadre mama duḥkhaṃ tvayā kṛtam
a indradviṣṭena yajatā mām anādṛtya durmate
c indro 'ham asmi durbuddhe vairaṃ te yātitaṃ mayā
a indraṃ tu dṛṣṭvā rājarṣiḥ pādayoḥ śirasā gataḥ
c prasīda tridaśaśreṣṭha putrakāmena sa kratuḥ
e iṣṭas tridaśaśārdūla tatra me kṣantum arhasi
f indraḥ surapatiś caiva vajrahasto mahābalaḥ
f airāvatagajārūḍhaḥ sahasrākṣa namo 'stu te
a praṇipātena tasyendraḥ parituṣṭo varaṃ dadau
c putrā vai katame rājañ jīvantu tava śaṃsa me
e strībhūtasya hi ye jātāḥ puruṣasyātha ye 'bhavan
a tāpasī tu tataḥ śakram uvāca prayatāñjaliḥ
c strībhūtasya hi ye jātās te me jīvantu vāsava
a indras tu vismito hṛṣṭaḥ striyaṃ papraccha tāṃ punaḥ
c puruṣotpāditā ye te kathaṃ dveṣyāḥ sutās tava
a strībhūtasya hi ye jātāḥ snehas tebhyo 'dhikaḥ katham
c kāraṇaṃ śrotum icchāmi tan me vaktum ihārhasi
 stry uvāca
a striyās tv abhyadhikaḥ sneho na tathā puruṣasya vai
c tasmāt te śakra jīvantu ye jātāḥ strīkṛtasya vai
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evam ukte tatas tv indraḥ prīto vākyam uvāca ha
c sarva eveha jīvantu putrās te satyavādini
a varaṃ ca vṛṇu rājendra yaṃ tvam icchasi suvrata
c puruṣatvam atha strītvaṃ matto yad abhikāṅkṣasi
 stry uvāca
a strītvam eva vṛṇe śakra prasanne tvayi vāsava
a evam uktas tu devendras tāṃ striyaṃ pratyuvāca ha
c puruṣatvaṃ kathaṃ tyaktvā strītvaṃ rocayase vibho
a evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca strībhūto rājasattamaḥ
c striyāḥ puruṣasaṃyoge prītir abhyadhikā sadā
e etasmāt kāraṇāc chakra strītvam eva vṛṇomy aham
a rame caivādhikaṃ strītve satyaṃ vai devasattama
c strībhāvena hi tuṣṭo 'smi gamyatāṃ tridaśādhipa
a evam astv iti coktvā tām āpṛcchya tridivaṃ gataḥ
c evaṃ striyā mahārāja adhikā prītir ucyate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kiṃ kartavyaṃ manuṣyeṇa lokayātrāhitārthinā
c kathaṃ vai lokayātrāṃ tu kiṃśīlaś ca samācaret
 bhīṣma uvāca
 deve nārāyaṇe bhaktiḥ śaṃkare sādhupūjayā
 dhyānenātha japaiḥ kāryā svadharmaiḥ śucitejasā
a kāyena trividhaṃ karma vācā cāpi caturvidham
c manasā trividhaṃ caiva daśa karmapathāṃs tyajet
a prāṇātipātaṃ stainyaṃ ca paradāram athāpi ca
c trīṇi pāpāni kāyena sarvataḥ parivarjayet
a asatpralāpaṃ pāruṣyaṃ paiśunyam anṛtaṃ tathā
c catvāri vācā rājendra na jalpen nānucintayet
a anabhidhyā parasveṣu sarvasattveṣu sauhṛdam
c karmaṇāṃ phalam astīti trividhaṃ manasā caret
a tasmād vākkāyamanasā nācared aśubhaṃ naraḥ
c śubhāśubhāny ācaran hi tasya tasyāśnute phalam
d śubhāny evācaraṃl loke bhakto nārāyaṇasya hi
d tasyaiva tu padaṃ sūkṣmaṃ prasādād aśnuyāt param
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d cittaṃ me dūyate tāta loke param avindataḥ
d aśāśvatam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṃgamam
d ṛte nārāyaṇaṃ puṇyaṃ pratibhāti pitāmaha
d nārāyaṇo hi viśvātmā puruṣaḥ puṣkarekṣaṇaḥ
d bhīṣmaḥ
d tasyāsya devakīsūnoḥ śrutaṃ kṛtsnaṃ tvayānagha
d yudhiṣṭhira mahāprājña mayā dṛṣṭaṃ ca saṃgare
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d tvatta eva tu rājendra rājadharmāś ca puṣkalāḥ
d śrutaṃ purāṇam akhilaṃ nāradena niveditam
d guhyaṃ nārāyaṇākhyānaṃ trividhakleśanāśanam
d ekāntadharmaniyamāḥ samāsavyāsakalpitāḥ
d kathitā vai mahābhāga tvayā vai madanugrahāt
d lokarakṣaṇakartṛtvaṃ tasyaiva harimedhasaḥ
d ātitheyavidhiś caiva tapāṃsi niyamāś ca ye
d vedavādaprasiddhāś ca vājapeyādayo makhāḥ
d yajñā draviṇaniṣpādyā agnihotrānupālitāḥ
d japayajñāś ca vividhā brāhmaṇānāṃ tapasvinām
d ekādaśavidhāḥ proktā haviryajñā dvijātinām
d teṣāṃ phalaviśeṣāś ca uñchadharmās tathaiva ca
d ahany ahani ye proktā mahāyajñā dvijātinām
d vedaśravaṇadharmāś ca brahmayajñaphalaṃ tathā
d vedavratavidhānaṃ ca niyamāś caiva vaidikāḥ
d svāhā svadhā praṇīte ca iṣṭāpūrtaphalaṃ tathā
d uttarottarasevāyām āśramāṇāṃ ca yat phalam
d pratyekaśaś ca niṣṭhāyām āśramāṇāṃ mahāmate
d māsapakṣopavāsānāṃ samyag uktaṃ phalaṃ ca yat
d anāśitānāṃ ye lokā ye ca pañcatapā narāḥ
d vīrādhvānaṃ prapannānāṃ yā gatiś cāgnihotriṇām
d grīṣme pañcatapānāṃ ca śiśire jalacāriṇām
d varṣe sthaṇḍilaśāyīnāṃ phalaṃ yat parikīrtitam
d loke cakracarāṇāṃ ca dvijānāṃ yat phalaṃ smṛtam
d annādīnāṃ ca dānānāṃ yat phalaṃ parikīrtitam
d sarvatīrthābhiṣiktānāṃ narāṇāṃ ca phalodayaḥ
d rājñāṃ dharmāś ca ye loke samyak pālayatāṃ prajāḥ
d ye ca satyavratā loke ye ca tīrthe kṛtaśramāḥ
d mātāpitṛparā ye ca guruvṛttīś ca saṃśritāḥ
d gobrāhmaṇaparitrāṇe rāṣṭrātikramaṇe tathā
d tyajanty abhimukhāḥ prāṇān nirbhayāḥ sattvam āśritāḥ
d sahasradakṣiṇānāṃ ca yā gatir dadatāṃ vara
d ve ca saṃdhyām upāsante samyag uktā mahāvratāḥ
d tathā yogavidhānaṃ ca yad grantheṣv abhiśabditam
d vedādyāḥ śrutayaś cāpi śrutā me kurusattama
d siddhāntanirṇayāś cāpi dvaipāyanamukhodgatāḥ
d śrutāḥ pañca mahāyāgā yeṣu sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
d tatprabhedeṣu ye dharmās te 'pi vai kṛtsnaśaḥ śrutāḥ
d na ca dūṣayituṃ śakyāḥ sadbhir uktā hi te tathā
d eteṣāṃ kila dharmāṇām uttamo vaiṣṇavo vidhiḥ
d rakṣate bhagavān viṣṇur bhaktam ātmaśarīravat
d karmaṇo hi kṛtasyeha kāmitasya dvijottamaiḥ
d phalaṃ hy avaśyaṃ bhoktavyam ṛṣir dvaipāyano 'bravīt
d bhogānte cāpi patanaṃ gatiḥ pūrvaṃ prabhāṣitā
d na me prītikarās tv ete viṣodarkā hi me matāḥ
d vadhāt kaṣṭataraṃ manye garbhavāsaṃ mahādyute
d diṣṭānte yāni duḥkhāni puruṣo vindate vibho
d tataḥ kaṣṭatarāṇīha garbhavāse hi vindati
d tataś cābhyadhikāṃ tīvrāṃ vedanāṃ labhate naraḥ
d garbhāpakramaṇe tāta karmaṇām upasarpaṇe
d tasmān me niścayo jāto dharmeṣv eteṣu bhārata
d tad icchāmi kuruśreṣṭha tvatprasādān mahāmate
d taṃ dharmaṃ ceha vettuṃ vai yo jarājanmamṛtyuhā
d yenoṣṇadā vaitaraṇī asipatravanaṃ ca tat
d kuṇḍāni cāgnitaptāni kṣuradhārāpathas tathā
d śālmalīṃ ca mahāghorām āyasīṃ ghorakaṇṭakām
d mātāpitṛkṛte cāpi suhṛnmitrārthakāraṇāt
d ātmahetoś ca pāpāni kṛtānīha naraiś ca yaiḥ
d teṣāṃ phalodayaṃ kaṣṭam ṛṣir dvaipāyano 'bravīt
d kumbhīpākapradīptānāṃ śūlārtānāṃ ca krandatām
d raurave kṣipyamāṇānāṃ prahārair mathitātmanām
d stanatām apakṛttānāṃ pibatām ātmaśoṇitam
d teṣām eva pravadatāṃ kāruṇyaṃ nāsti yantrataḥ
d tṛṣṇāśuṣkoṣṭhakaṇṭhānāṃ vihvalānām acetasām
d sarvaduḥkhābhitaptānāṃ rujārtānāṃ ca krośatām
d vedanārtā hi krandanti pūrayanto diśo daśa
d ekaḥ karoti pāpāni sahabhojyāni bāndhavaiḥ
d teṣām ekaḥ phalaṃ bhuṅkte kaṣṭe vaivasvatakṣaye
d yena naitāṃ gatiṃ gacchen na viṇmūtrāsthipicchile
d viṣṭhāmūtrakṛmīmadhye bahujantuniṣevite
d ko garbhavāsāt parato narako 'nyo vidhīyate
d yatra vāsakṛto yogaḥ kukṣau vāso vidhīyate
d jāto vistīrṇaduḥkhaḥ syād bhavate vigatajvaraḥ
d na caiṣa labhyate kāmo jātamātraṃ hi mānavam
d āviśantīha duḥkhāni manovākkāyikāni tu
d tair asvatantro bhavati pīḍyamāno bhayānakaiḥ
d tair garbhavāsaṃ gacchati avaśo jāyate tathā
d avaśaś cehate jantur vrajaty avaśa eva hi
d jarasā rūpavidhvaṃsaṃ prāpnoty avaśa eva tu
d śarīrabhedam āpnoti jīryaty avaśa eva tu
d evaṃ hy aniyato mṛtyur bhavaty eva sadā nṛṣu
d garbheṣu mriyate kaś cij jāyamānas tathāparaḥ
d jātā mriyante bahavo yauvanasthās tathāpare
d madhyabhāve tu naśyanti sthaviro mṛta eva tu
d ko janmano nodvijate svayaṃbhūr api yo bhavet
d kutas tv asmadvidhas tāta maraṇasya vaśānugaḥ
d nityāviṣṭo bhayenāhaṃ manasā kurusattama
d muhūrtam apy ahaṃ śarma na vindāmi mahāmate
d kālātmani tirobhūto nityaṃ tadguṇavarjitaḥ
d annair bahuvidhaiḥ puṣṭaṃ vastrair nānāvidhair vṛtam
d candanāgarudigdhāṅgaṃ maṇimuktāvibhūṣitam
d yānair bahuvidhair yātam ekāntenaiva lālitam
d yauvanoddhatarūpābhir madavihvalagāmibhiḥ
d iṣṭābhir abhirāmābhir varastrībhir ayantritam
d ramitaṃ suciraṃ kālaṃ śarīram amitaprabham
d avitṛptā gamiṣyanti hitvā prāṇāṃs tathāpare
d svarge 'py aniyatā bhūtis tathaivākāśasaṃśraye
d devāpy adhiṣṭhānavaśās tasmād devaṃ na kāmaye
d kāmānāṃ nāsty adhiṣṭhānam akāmas tu nivartate
d lokasaṃgrahadharmās tu sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ
d ḍolāsadharmān dharmajña ṛṣir dvaipāyano 'bravīt
d kasmāt ko viṣamaṃ duḥkham āroheta vicakṣaṇaḥ
d vidyamāne same mārge ḍolādharmavivarjite
d ko hy ātmānaṃ priyaṃ loke ḍolāsādharmyatāṃ nayet
d carācaraiḥ sarvabhūtair gantavyam aviśaṅkayā
d asmāl lokāt paraṃ lokam apātheyam adaiśikam
d ghoraṃ tamaḥ praveṣṭavyam atrātāram abāndhavam
d ye tu taṃ kila dharmajñā dharmaṃ nārāyaṇeritam
d ananyamanaso dāntāḥ smaranti niyatavratāḥ
d tatas te na ca paśyanti prāpnuvanti paraṃ padam
d rakṣate bhagavān viṣṇur bhaktān ātmaśarīravat
d kulālacakrapratime bhrāmyamāṇeṣu jantuṣu
d mātāpitṛsahasrāṇi saṃprāptāni mayā guro
d snehāpannena pītās tu mātṝṇāṃ vividhāḥ stanāḥ
d putradārasahasrāṇi iṣṭāniṣṭaśatāni ca
d prāptāny adhiṣṭhānavaśād atītāni tathaiva ca
d na kva cic ca sukhaṃ prāptaṃ na kva cic chāśvatī gatiḥ
d sthānair mahadbhir vibhraṃśo duḥkhalabdhaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ
d dhananāśaś ca saṃprāpto labdhvā duḥkhena tad dhanam
d adhvagānām iva pathi cchāyām āśritya saṃgamaḥ
d evaṃ karmavaśo loko jñātīnāṃ hitasaṃgamaḥ
d viśramya ca punar yāti karmabhir darśitāṃ gatim
d etad īdṛśakaṃ dṛṣṭvā jñātvā caiva samāgamam
d ko na bibhyet kuruśreṣṭha viṣṭhānnasyeva bhojanāt
d buddhiś ca me samutpannā vaiṣṇave dharmavistare
d tad eṣa śirasā pādau gato 'smi bhagavaṃs tava
d śaraṇaṃ ca prapanno 'smi gantavye śaraṇe dhruve
d janmamṛtyujarākhinnas tribhir duḥkhair nipīḍitaḥ
d icchāmi bhavatā trātum ebhyas tvatto mahāmune
d tasyādyayugadharmasya śravaṇāt kurupuṃgava
d etad ādyayugodbhūtaṃ tretāyāṃ tat tirohitam
d bhīṣmaḥ
d sa eva dharmam akhilam ṛṣir dvaipāyano 'bravīt
d sadṛśaṃ rājaśārdūla vṛttasya ca kulasya ca
d ko rājyaṃ vipulaṃ gṛhya sphītākārapuraṃ mahat
d nirjitārātisāmantaṃ devarājyopamaṃ sukham
d rājye rājyaguṇā ye ca tān vyudasya narādhipa
d doṣaṃ paśyasi rājendra dehe 'smin pāñcabhautike
d atikrāntās tvayā rājan vṛttena prapitāmahāḥ
d dharmo vigrahavān dhīro viduraś ca mahāyaśāḥ
d saṃjayaś ca mahātejā ye cānye divyadarśanāḥ
d pravṛttajñānasaṃpannās tattvajñānavido nṛpa
d te 'tikrāntā mahārāja brahmādyāḥ sasurāsurāḥ
d anityaṃ duḥkhasaṃtaptaṃ jagad etan na saṃśayaḥ
d evam etān mahābāho brahmādyān sasurāsurān
d anityān satataṃ paśya manuṣyādiṣu kā kathā
d nityāṃ tu prakṛtīm āhur yāsau prasavadharmiṇī
d arūpiṇīm anirdeśyām akṛtāṃ puruṣātigām
d tām atyantasukhāṃ saukhyāṃ nirvāṇam iti saṃjñitām
d āhur brahmarṣayo hy ādyāṃ bhuvi caiva maharṣayaḥ
d tayā puruṣarūpiṇyā dharmaprakṛtiko 'nagha
d sa yāty eva hi nirvāṇaṃ yat tat prakṛtisaṃjñitam
d sa eṣa prākṛto dharmo bhrājaty ādiyuge nṛpa
d vikāradharmāḥ śeṣeṣu yugeṣu bharatarṣabha
d bhrājante 'bhyadhikaṃ vīra saṃsārapathagocarāḥ
d prakṛtīnāṃ ca sarvāsām akṛtā prakṛtiḥ smṛtā
d evaṃ prakṛtidharmā hi varāṃ prakṛtim āśritāḥ
d paśyanti paramāṃ loke dṛṣṭādṛṣṭānudarśinīm
d sattvādiyugaparyante tretāyugasamudbhave
d kāmaṃ kāmayamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu tirohitaḥ
d kupatheṣu tu dharmeṣu prādurbhūteṣu kaurava
d jāto mandapracāro hi dharmaḥ kaliyuge nṛpa
d nityas tu puruṣo jñeyo viśvarūpo nirañjanaḥ
d brahmādyā api devāś ca yaṃ sadā paryupāsate
d taṃ ca nārāyaṇaṃ viddhi paraṃ brahmeti śāśvatam
d tatkarma kuru kāyena dhyāyasva manasā ca tam
d kīrtayasva ca tannāma vācā sarvatra bhūpate
d tatpadaṃ prāpnuhi prāpyaṃ śāśvataṃ cāpunarbhavam
d ity etad viṣṇum āśritya saṃsāragrahamokṣaṇam
d kathitaṃ te mahābāho kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d kliśyamāneṣu bhūteṣu jātīmaraṇasāgare
d bhīṣmaḥ
d yat prāpya kleśaṃ nāpnoti tan me brūhi pitāmaha
d atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
d sanatkumārasya sataḥ saṃvādaṃ nāradasya ca
d sanatkumāro bhagavān brahmaputro mahāyaśāḥ
d pūrvajātās trayas tasya kathyante brahmavādinaḥ
d sanakaḥ sanandanaś caiva tṛtīyaś ca sanātanaḥ
d jātamātrāś ca te sarve pratibuddhā iti śrutiḥ
d caturthaś caiva teṣāṃ sa bhagavān yogavittamaḥ
d sanatkumāra iti vai kathayanti maharṣayaḥ
d hairaṇyagarbhaḥ sa munir vasiṣṭhaḥ pañcamaḥ smṛtaḥ
d ṣaṣṭhaḥ sthāṇuḥ sa bhagavān ameyātmā triśūladhṛt
d tato 'pare samutpannāḥ pāvakā dāruṇe kratau
d manasā svayaṃbhuvo hīme marīcipramukhās tathā
d bhṛgur marīcer anujo bhṛgor apy aṅgirās tathā
d anujo 'ṅgiraso 'thātriḥ pulastyo 'tres tathānujaḥ
d pulastyasyānujo vidvān pulaho nu mahādyutiḥ
d paṭhyante brahmajā hy ete vidvadbhir amitaujasaḥ
d sarvam etan mahārāja kurvann ādigurur mahān
d prabhur vibhur anantaśrīr brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
d mūrtimanto 'mṛtībhūtās tejasātitaponvitāḥ
d sanakaprabhṛtayas tatra ye ca prāptāḥ paraṃ padam
d kṛtsnaṃ kṣayam anuprāpya vimuktā mūrtibandhanāt
d sanatkumāras tu vibhur yogam āsthāya yogavit
d trīṃl lokān acarac chaśvad aiśvaryeṇa pareṇa hi
d rudraś cāpy aṣṭaguṇitaṃ yogaṃ prāpto mahāyaśāḥ
d sūkṣmam aṣṭaguṇaṃ rājann itare nṛpasattama
d marīcipramukhās tāta sarve sṛṣṭyartham eva te
d niyuktā rājaśārdūla teṣāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ śṛṇuṣva me
d sapta brahmāṇa ity ete purāṇe niścayaṃ gatāḥ
d sarve vedeṣu caivoktāḥ khileṣu ca na saṃśayaḥ
d itihāsapurāṇe ca śrutir eṣā sanātanī
d brāhmaṇā varadān etān prāhur vedāntapāragāḥ
d eteṣāṃ pitaras tāta putrā ity anucakṣate
d gaṇāḥ sapta mahārāja mūrtayo 'mūrtayas tathā
d pitṝṇāṃ caiva rājendra putrā devā iti śrutiḥ
d devair vyāptā ime lokā ity evam anuśuśruma
d kṛṣṇadvaipāyanāc caiva devasthānāt tathaiva ca
d devalāc ca naraśreṣṭha kāśyapāc ca mayā śrutam
d gautamād api kauṇḍinyād bhāradvājāt tathaiva ca
d mārkaṇḍeyāt tathaivaitad ṛṣer devamatāt tathā
d pitrā ca mama rājendra śrāddhakāle prabhāṣitam
d paraṃ rahasyaṃ vedāntaṃ priyaṃ hi paramātmanaḥ
d ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi yan māṃ pṛcchasi bhārata
d tad ihaikamanobuddhiḥ śṛṇuṣvāvahito nṛpa
d svāyaṃbhuvasya saṃvādaṃ nāradasya ca dhīmataḥ
d sanatkumāro bhagavān divyaṃ jajvāla tejasā
d aṅguṣṭhamātro bhūtvā vai vicacāra mahādyutiḥ
d sa kadā cin mahābhāgo merupṛṣṭhaṃ samāgamat
d nāradena naraśreṣṭha muninā brahmavādinā
d jijñāsamānāv anyonyaṃ sakāśe brahmaṇas tataḥ
d brahmabhāvagatau tāta paramārthārthacintakau
d matimān matimacchreṣṭhaṃ buddhimān buddhimattaram
d kṣetravit kṣetravicchreṣṭhaṃ jñānavij jñānavittamam
d sanatkumāraṃ tattvajñaṃ bhagavantam ariṃdama
d lokavil lokavicchreṣṭham ātmavic cātmavittamam
d sarvavedārthakuśalaṃ sarvaśāstraviśāradam
d sāṃkhyayogaṃ ca yo veda pāṇāv āmalakaṃ yathā
d nāradaḥ
d nārado 'tha naraśreṣṭha taṃ papraccha mahādyutiḥ
d trayoviṃśatitattvasya avyaktasya mahāmune
d prabhavaṃ cāpy ayaṃ caiva śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
d adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca adhidaivaṃ tathaiva ca
d kālasaṃkhyāṃ ca sargaṃ ca sraṣṭāraṃ puruṣaṃ prabhum
d yaṃ viśvam upajīvanti yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
d sanatkumāraḥ
d yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad bhavān vaktum arhati
d yaṃ viśvam upajīvanti yam āhuḥ puruṣaṃ param
d taṃ vai śṛṇu mahābuddhe nārāyaṇam anāmayam
d eṣa nārāyaṇo nāma yaṃ viśvam upajīvati
d eṣa sraṣṭā vidhātā ca hartā pālayitā prabhuḥ
d prāpyainaṃ na nivartante yatayo 'dhyātmacintakāḥ
d etāvad eva vaktavyaṃ mayā nārada pṛcchate
d paraṃ na vedmi tat sargaṃ yāvāṃś cāyaṃ yathāpyayam
d śrūyatām ānupūrvyeṇa nava sargāḥ prayatnataḥ
d yathākālaparīmāṇaṃ tattvānām ṛṣisattama
d adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca adhidaivaṃ tathaiva ca
d kālasaṃkhyāṃ ca sargaṃ ca sarvam eva mahāmune
d tamasaḥ kurvataḥ sargaṃ tāmaso hy abhidhīyate
d brahmavidbhir dvijair nityaṃ nityam adhyātmacintakaiḥ
d paryāyanāmāny etasya kathayanti manīṣiṇaḥ
d tāni te saṃpravakṣyāmi tad ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
d mahārṇavo 'rṇavaś caiva salilaṃ ca guṇās tathā
d vedās tapaś ca yajñāś ca dharmāś ca bhagavān vibhuḥ
d prāṇaḥ saṃvartako 'gniś ca vyoma kālas tathaiva ca
d nāmāny etāni brahmarṣe śarīrasyeśvarasya vai
d kīrtitāni dvijaśreṣṭha mayā śāstrānumānataḥ
d caturyugasahasrāṇi caturyugam ariṃdama
d prāhuḥ kalpasahasraṃ vai brāhmaṇās tattvadarśinaḥ
d daśa kalpasahasrāṇi avyayasya mahāniśā
d tathaiva divasaṃ prāhur yogāḥ sāṃkhyāś ca tattvataḥ
d niśāsupto 'tha bhagavān kṣapānte pratyabudhyata
d paścād buddhvā sasarjāpas tāsu vīryam avāsṛjat
d tad aṇḍam abhavad dhaimaṃ sahasrāṃśusamaprabham
d ahaṃkṛtvā tatas tasmin sasarja prabhur īśvaraḥ
d hiraṇyagarbhaṃ viśvātmā brahmāṇaṃ jalavan munim
d bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyasya kartāram anaghaṃ vibhum
d mūrtimantaṃ mahātmānaṃ viśvaśaṃbhuṃ svayaṃbhuvam
d aṇimā laghimā prāptir īśāno jyotiṣāṃ varam
d cakre tirodhāṃ bhagavān etat kṛtvā mahāyaśāḥ
d etasyāpi niśām āhur vedavedāṅgapāragāḥ
d pañca kalpasahasrāṇi ahar etāvad eva ca
d sa sargaṃ kurute brahmā tāmasasyānupūrvaśaḥ
d sṛjate ha tv ahaṃkāraṃ parameṣṭhinam avyayam
d ahaṃkāreṇa vai lokā vyāptāḥ sāhaṃkṛtena vai
d yenāviṣṭāni bhūtāni majjanty avyaktasāgare
d devarṣidānavanarā yakṣagandharvakiṃnarāḥ
d unmajjanti nimajjanti ūrdhvādhas tiryag eva ca
d etasyāpi niśām āhus tṛtīyām atha kurvataḥ
d trīṇi kalpasahasrāṇi ahar etāvad eva tu
d ahaṃkāras tu sṛjati mahābhūtāni pañca vai
d pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
d eteṣāṃ guṇatattvāni pañca prāhur dvijātayaḥ
d śabde sparśe ca rūpe ca rase gandhe tathaiva ca
d guṇeṣv eteṣv abhiratāḥ paṅkalagnā iva dvipāḥ
d nottiṣṭhanty avaśībhūtāḥ saktā avyaktasāgare
d eteṣām iha vai sargaṃ caturtham iha kurvataḥ
d caturyugasahasre vai ahorātrās tathaiva ca
d ananta iti vikhyātaḥ pañcamaḥ sarga ucyate
d indriyāṇi daśaikaṃ ca yathāśrutinidarśanāt
d manaḥ sarvam idaṃ tāta viśvaṃ sarvam idaṃ jagat
d na tathānyāni bhūtāni balavanti yathā manaḥ
d etasyāpi ha vai sargaṃ ṣaṣṭham āhur dvijātayaḥ
d ahaḥ kalpasahasraṃ vai rātrir etāvatī tathā
d ūrdhvasrotas tu vai sargaṃ saptamaṃ brahmaṇo viduḥ
d aṣṭamaṃ cāpy adhaḥsrotas tiryak tu navamaḥ smṛtaḥ
d etāni nava sargāṇi tattvāni ca mahāmune
d caturviṃśati tattvāni tattvasaṃkhyāni te 'nagha
d sarvasya prabhavaḥ pūrvam ukto nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
d avyayaḥ prabhavaś caiva avyaktasya mahāmune
d pravakṣyāmy aparaṃ tattvaṃ yasya yasyeśvaraś ca yaḥ
d adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca adhidaivaṃ tathaiva ca
d yathāśrutaṃ yathādṛṣṭaṃ tattvato vai nibodha me
d sanatkumāraḥ
d adhaḥsrotasi sarge ca tiryaksrotasi caiva hi
d etābhyām īśvaraṃ vidyād ūrdhvasrotas tathaiva ca
d karmendriyāṇāṃ pañcānām īśvaro buddhigocaraḥ
d buddhīndriyāṇām atha tu īśvaro mana ucyate
d manasaḥ pañca bhūtāni saguṇāny āhur īśvaram
d bhūtānām īśvaraṃ vidyād brahmāṇaṃ parameṣṭhinam
d bhavān hi kuśalaś caiva dharmeṣv eṣu pareṣu vai
d kālāgnir ahnaḥ kalpānte jagad dahati cāṃśubhiḥ
d tataḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
d mahābhūtāni dagdhāni svayoniṃ gamitāni vai
d kūrmapṛṣṭhanibhā bhūmir nirdagdhakuśakaṇṭakā
d nirvṛkṣā nistṛṇā caiva dagdhā kālāgninā tadā
d jagat pralīnaṃ jagati jagac cāpsu pralīyate
d naṣṭagandhā tadā sūkṣmā jalam evābhavat tadā
d tato mayūkhajālena sūryas tv āpīyate jalam
d rasātmā līyate cārke tadā brāhmaṇasattama
d antarikṣagatān bhūtān pradahaty analas tadā
d agnibhūtaṃ tadā vyoma bhavatīty abhicakṣate
d taṃ tathā visphurantaṃ hi vāyur jarayate mahān
d mahatā balavegena ādatte taṃ hi bhānumān
d vāyor api guṇaṃ sparśam ākāśaṃ grasate yadā
d praśāmyati tato vāyuḥ khaṃ tu tiṣṭhati nānadat
d tasya taṃ ninadaṃ śabdam ādatte vai manas tadā
d sa śabdaguṇahīnātmā tiṣṭhate mūrtimāṃs tu vai
d bhuṅkte ca sa tadā vyoma manas tāta digātmakam
d vyomātmani vinaṣṭe tu saṃkalpātmā vivardhate
d saṃkalpātmānam ādatte cittaṃ vai svena tejasā
d cittaṃ grasaty ahaṃkāras tadā vai munisattama
d vinaṣṭe ca tadā citte ahaṃkāro 'bhavan mahān
d ahaṃkāraṃ tadādatte mahān brahmā prajāpatiḥ
d abhimāne vinaṣṭe tu mahān brahmā virājate
d taṃ tadā triṣu lokeṣu mūrtiṣv evāgramūrtijam
d yena viśvam idaṃ kṛtsnaṃ nirmitaṃ vai guṇārthinā
d mūrtiṃ jaleśvaram api vyavasāyaguṇātmakam
d grasiṣṇur bhagavān brahmā vyaktāvyaktam asaṃśayaḥ
d eṣo 'vyayasya pralayo mayā te parikīrtitaḥ
d adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca adhidaivaṃ ca śrūyatām
d raso 'dhibhūtaṃ varuṇo 'dhidaivataṃ syāt  
pṛthivī pañcamaṃ
d pāñcabhautikam etac catuṣṭayam anuvarṇitam 
d bhūtaṃ ghrāṇam adhyātmaṃ gandho 'dhibhūtaṃ vāyur adhidaivataṃ syāt 
d adhibhūtaṃ sūryo 'dhidaivataṃ syāt  
āpaś caturthaṃ bhūtaṃ jihvādhyātmaṃ
d ākāśaṃ prathamaṃ bhūtaṃ śrotram adhyātmaṃ śabdo 'dhibhūtaṃ diśo 'dhidaivatam 
d vāyur dvitīyaṃ bhūtaṃ tvag adhyātmaṃ sparśo 'dhibhūtaṃ vidyud
d adhidaivataṃ syāt  
jyotis tṛtīyaṃ bhūtaṃ cakṣur adhyātmaṃ rūpam
d candramā adhidaivataṃ syāt  
ahaṃkāro 'dhyātmam abhimāno
d 'dhibhūtaṃ viriñco 'dhidaivataṃ syāt  
buddhir adhyātmaṃ vyavasāyo
d agnir adhidaivataṃ syāt  
mano 'dhyātmaṃ mantavyam adhibhūtaṃ
d 'dhibhūtaṃ brahmādhidaivataṃ syāt 
d ata ūrdhvam indriyam anuvarṇayiṣyāmaḥ  
pādāv adhyātmaṃ
d 'dhibhūtaṃ prajāpatir adhidaivataṃ syāt  
vāg adhyātmaṃ vaktavyam adhibhūtam
d kartavyam adhibhūtam indro 'dhidaivataṃ syāt  
pāyur adhyātmaṃ visargo
d gantavyam adhibhūtaṃ viṣṇur adhidaivataṃ syāt  
hastāv adhyātmaṃ
d 'dhibhūtaṃ mitro 'dhidaivataṃ syāt  
upastho 'dhyātmam ānando
d stanitagarjitonmiśraṃ tadvat tatraiva praṇāśāt 
evam avyakto
d guṇān sṛjati saṃharate ca 
d cordhvam uttiṣṭhate saṃharate ca  
yathā cāntarikṣād abhrakośam uttiṣṭhati
d guṇān sṛjati saṃharate ca  
yathārṇavād ūrmimālānicayaś
d krīḍārtham  
yathādityo 'ṃśujālaṃ kṣipati saṃharate ca evam avyakto
d evam avyakto bhagavān sakṛt kṛtsnān kurute saṃharate ca  kasmāt 
d ca  bhagavato 'vyaktasya kriyāvato 'kriyāvataś ca prakṛtiḥ 
d śuciḥ tenādhiṣṭhitā prakṛtiś cetayati nityaṃ sahadharmā
d yathā kūrmo 'ṅgāni kāmāt prasārayate punaś ca praveśayati evam avyakto
d lokān prakāśayate praveśayate ca  
evaṃ cetanaś ca bhagavān pañcaviṃśakaḥ
d kriyāvān ajarāmaraḥ kṣetrajño nārāyaṇaḥ puruṣaḥ 
d bhīṣmaḥ
d ity etan nāradāyoktaṃ kumāreṇa ca dhīmatā
d etac chrutvā dvijo rājan sarvayajñaphalaṃ labhet
dA yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
dA ātmany agnīn samādhāya ya ete kurunandana
dA dvijātayo vratopetā japayajñaparāyaṇāḥ
dA yajanty ārambhayajñaiś ca mānasaṃ yajñam āsthitāḥ
dA agnibhyaś ca paraṃ nāsti yeṣām eṣā vyavasthitiḥ
dA teṣāṃ gatir mahāprājña kīdṛśī kiṃparāś ca te
dA bhīṣmaḥ
dA etad icchāmi tattvena tvattaḥ śrotuṃ pitāmaha
dA atra te vartayiṣyāmi itihāsaṃ purātanam
dA vaikuṇṭhasya ca saṃvādaṃ suparṇasya ca bhārata
dA amṛtasya samutpattau devānām asuraiḥ saha
dA ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣasahasrāṇi devāsuram avartata
dA tatra devās tu daiteyair vadhyante bhṛśadāruṇaiḥ
dA trātāraṃ nādhigacchanti vadhyamānā mahāsuraiḥ
dA ārtās te devadeveśaṃ prapannāḥ śaraṇaiṣiṇaḥ
dA pitāmahaṃ mahāprājñaṃ vadhyamānāḥ suretaraiḥ
dA tā dṛṣṭvā devatā brahmā saṃbhrāntendriyamānasaḥ
dA vaikuṇṭhaṃ śaraṇaṃ devaṃ pratipede ca taiḥ saha
dA tataḥ sa devaiḥ sahitaḥ padmayonir nareśvara
dA tuṣṭāva prāñjalir bhūtvā nārāyaṇam anāmayam
dA tvadrūpacintanān nāmnāṃ smaraṇād arcanād api
dA tapoyogādibhiś caiva śreyo yānti manīṣiṇaḥ
dA bhaktavatsala padmākṣa parameśvara pāpahan
dA paramātmāvikārād ya nārāyaṇa namo 'stu te
dA namas te sarvalokāde sarvātmāmitavikrama
dA sarvabhūtabhaviṣyeśa sarvabhūtamaheśvara
dA devānām api devas tvaṃ sarvavidyāparāyaṇaḥ
dA jagadbījasamāhāra jagataḥ paramo hy asi
dA trāyasva devatā vīra dānavādyaiḥ supīḍitāḥ
dA lokāṃś ca lokapālāṃś ca ṛṣīṃś ca jayatāṃ vara
dA vedāḥ sāṅgopaniṣadaḥ sarahasyāḥ sasaṃgrahāḥ
dA soṃkārāḥ savaṣaṭkārāḥ prāhus tvāṃ yajñam uttamam
dA pavitrāṇāṃ pavitraṃ ca maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam
dA tapasvināṃ tapaś caiva daivataṃ devatāsv api
dA evamādipuraskārair ṛksāmayajuṣāṃ gaṇaiḥ
dA vaikuṇṭhaṃ tuṣṭuvur devāḥ sarve brahmarṣibhiḥ saha
dA tato 'ntarikṣe vāg āsīn meghagambhīranisvanā
dA jeṣyadhvaṃ dānavān yūyaṃ mayaiva saha saṃgare
dA tato devagaṇānāṃ ca dānavānāṃ ca yudhyatām
dA prādurāsīn mahātejāḥ śārṅgacakragadādharaḥ
dA suparṇapṛṣṭham āsthāya tejasā pradahann iva
dA vyadhamad dānavān sarvān bāhudraviṇatejasā
dA taṃ samāsādya samare daityadānavapuṃgavāḥ
dA vyanaśyanta mahārāja pataṃgā iva pāvakam
dA sa vijityāsurān sarvān dānavāṃś ca mahāmatiḥ
dA paśyatām eva devānāṃ tatraivāntaradhīyata
dA taṃ dṛṣṭvāntarhitaṃ devaṃ viṣṇuṃ devāmitadyutim
dA vismayotphullanayanā brahmāṇam idam abruvan
dA bhagavan sarvalokeśa sarvalokapitāmaha
dA idam atyadbhutaṃ vṛttaṃ tan naḥ śaṃsitum arhasi
dA devāsure 'smin saṃgrāme trātā yena vayaṃ prabho
dA etad vijñātum icchāmaḥ kuto 'sau kaś ca tattvataḥ
dA ko 'yam asmān paritrāya tūṣṇīm eva yathāgatam
dA pratiprayāto divyātmā taṃ naḥ śaṃsitum arhasi
dA evam uktaḥ suraiḥ sarvair vacanaṃ vacanārthavit
dA brahmā
dA uvāca padmanābhasya pūrvarūpaṃ prati prabho
dA na hy enaṃ veda tattvena bhuvanaṃ bhuvaneśvaram
dA saṃkhyātuṃ naiva cātmānaṃ nirguṇaṃ guṇināṃ varam
dA atra vo vartayiṣyāmi itihāsaṃ purātanam
dA suparṇasya ca saṃvādam ṛṣīṇāṃ cāpi devatāḥ
dA purā brahmarṣayaś caiva siddhāś ca bhuvaneśvaram
dA āśritya himavatpṛṣṭhe cakrire vividhāḥ kathāḥ
dA teṣāṃ kathayatāṃ tatra kathānte patatāṃ varaḥ
dA prādurāsīn mahātejā vāhaś cakragadābhṛtaḥ
dA sa tān ṛṣīn samāsādya vinayāvanatānanaḥ
dA avatīrya mahāvīryas tān ṛṣīn abhijagmivān
dA abhyarcitaḥ sa ṛṣibhiḥ svāgatena mahābalaḥ
dA upāviśata tejasvī bhūmau vegavatāṃ varaḥ
dA tam āsīnaṃ mahātmānaṃ vainateyaṃ mahādyutim
dA ṛṣayaḥ paripapracchur mahātmānas tapasvinaḥ
dA kautūhalaṃ vainateya paraṃ no hṛdi vartate
dA tasya nānyo 'sti vakteha tvām ṛte pannagāśana
dA tad ākhyātum ihecchāmo bhavatā praśnam uttamam
dA evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca prāñjalir vinatāsutaḥ
dA dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yan māṃ brahmarṣisattamāḥ
dA praṣṭavyaṃ praṣṭum icchanti prītimanto 'nasūyakāḥ
dA kiṃ mayā brūta vaktavyaṃ kāryaṃ ca vadatāṃ varāḥ
dA yūyaṃ hi māṃ yathāyuktaṃ sarvaṃ vai praṣṭum arhatha
dA namaskṛtvā hy anantāya tatas te ṛṣisattamāḥ
dA praṣṭuṃ pracakramus tatra vainateyaṃ mahābalam
dA devadevaṃ mahātmānaṃ nārāyaṇam anāmayam
dA bhavān upāste varadaṃ kuto 'sau kaś ca tattvataḥ
dA prakṛtir vikṛtir vāsya kīdṛśī kva nu saṃsthitiḥ
dA etad bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmo devo 'yaṃ kva kṛtālayaḥ
dA eṣa bhaktapriyo devaḥ priyabhaktas tathaiva ca
dA tvaṃ priyaś cāsya bhaktaś ca nānyaḥ kāśyapa vidyate
dA muṣṇann iva manaścakṣūṃṣy avibhāvyatanur vibhuḥ
dA anādimadhyanidhano na vidmainaṃ kuto hy asau
dA vedeṣv api ca viśvātmā gīyate na ca vidmahe
dA tattvatas tattvabhūtātmā vibhur nityaḥ sanātanaḥ
dA pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
dA guṇāś caiṣāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ bhāvābhāvau tathaiva ca
dA tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajaś caiva bhāvāś caiva tadātmakāḥ
dA mano buddhiś ca tejaś ca buddhigamyāni tattvataḥ
dA jāyante tāta kasmād dhi tiṣṭhate teṣv asau vibhuḥ
dA saṃcintya bahudhā buddhyā nādhyavasyāmahe param
dA tasya devasya tattvena tan naḥ śaṃsa yathātatham
dA etam eva paraṃ praśnaṃ kautūhalasamanvitāḥ
dA suparṇaḥ
dA evaṃ bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmas tan naḥ śaṃsitum arhasi
dA sthūlato yas tu bhagavāṃs tenaiva svena hetunā
dA trailokyasya tu rakṣārthaṃ dṛśyate rūpam āsthitaḥ
dA mayā tu mahad āścaryaṃ purā dṛṣṭaṃ sanātane
dA deve śrīvṛkṣanilaye tac chṛṇudhvam aśeṣataḥ
dA na sma śakyo mayā vettuṃ na bhavadbhiḥ kathaṃ cana
dA yathā māṃ prāha bhagavāṃs tathā tac chrūyatāṃ mama
dA mayāmṛtaṃ devatānāṃ miṣatām ṛṣisattamāḥ
dA hṛtaṃ vipāṭya tad yantraṃ vidrāvyāmṛtarakṣiṇaḥ
dA devatā vimukhīkṛtya sendrāḥ samaruto mṛdhe
dA unmathyāśu girīṃś caiva vikṣobhya ca mahodadhim
dA taṃ dṛṣṭvā mama vikrāntaṃ vāg uvācāśarīriṇī
dA prīto 'smi te vainateya karmaṇānena suvrata
dA avṛthā te 'stu madvākyaṃ brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
dA tām evaṃvādinīṃ vācam ahaṃ pratyuktavāṃs tadā
dA jñātum icchāmi kas tvaṃ hi tato me dāsyase varam
dA prakṛtir vikṛtir vā tvaṃ devo vā dānavo 'pi vā
dA tato jaladagambhīraṃ prahasya vadatāṃ varaḥ
dA uvāca varadaḥ prītaḥ kāle tvaṃ mābhivetsyasi
dA vāhanaṃ bhava me sādho varaṃ dadmi tavottamam
dA na te vīryeṇa sadṛśaḥ kaś cil loke bhaviṣyati
dA pataṃga patatāṃ śreṣṭha na devo nāpi dānavaḥ
dA matsakhitvam anuprāpto durdharṣaś ca bhaviṣyasi
dA tam abravaṃ devadevaṃ mām evaṃvādinaṃ param
dA prayataḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā praṇamya śirasā vibhum
dA evam etan mahābāho sarvam etad bhaviṣyati
dA vāhanaṃ te bhaviṣyāmi yathā vadati māṃ bhavān
dA mamāpi ca mahābuddhe niścayaṃ śrūyatām iti
dA dhvajas te 'haṃ bhaviṣyāmi rathasthasya na saṃśayaḥ
dA tathāstv iti sa mām uktvā bhūyaḥ prāha mahāmanāḥ
dA na te gativighāto 'dya bhaviṣyaty amṛtaṃ vinā
dA evaṃ kṛtvā tu samayaṃ devadevaḥ sanātanaḥ
dA mām uktvā sādhayasveti yathābhiprāyato gataḥ
dA tato 'haṃ kṛtasaṃvādo tena kenāpi sattamāḥ
dA kautūhalasamāviṣṭaḥ pitaraṃ kāśyapaṃ gataḥ
dA so 'haṃ pitaram āsādya praṇipatyābhivādya ca
dA sarvam etad yathātathyam uktavān pitur antike
dA śrutvā tu bhagavān mahyaṃ dhyānam evānvapadyata
dA sa muhūrtam iva dhyātvā mām āha vadatāṃ varaḥ
dA dhanyo 'sy anugṛhītaś ca yat tvaṃ tena mahātmanā
dA saṃvādaṃ kṛtavāṃs tāta guhyena paramātmanā
dA sthūladṛśyaḥ sa bhagavāṃs tena tenaiva hetunā
dA dṛśyate 'vyaktarūpasthaḥ pradhānaṃ prabhavāpyayaḥ
dA mayā hi sa mahātejā nānyayogasamādhinā
dA tapasogreṇa tejasvī toṣitas tapasāṃ nidhiḥ
dA tato me darśayām āsa toṣayann iva putraka
dA śvetapītāruṇanibhaḥ kadrūkapilapiṅgalaḥ
dA raktanīlāsitanibhaḥ sahasrodarapāṇimān
dA dvisāhasramahāvaktra ekākṣaḥ śatalocanaḥ
dA aniṣpandā nirāhārāḥ samānāḥ sūryatejasā
dA tam upāsanti paramaṃ guhyam akṣaram avyayam
dA samāsādya tu taṃ viśvam ahaṃ mūrdhnā praṇamya ca
dA ṛgyajuḥsāmabhiḥ stutvā śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
dA mahāmeghaughadhīreṇa svareṇa jayatāṃ varaḥ
dA ābhāṣya putra putreti idam āha dhṛtaṃ vacaḥ
dA tvayābhyudayakāmena tapaś cīrṇaṃ mahāmune
dA amuktas tvaṃ na māṃ saṅgair avimukto 'dya paśyasi
dA yadā saṅgair vimuktaś ca gatamoho gataspṛhaḥ
dA bhaviṣyasi tadā brahman mām anudhyāsyase dvija
dA ekāntikīṃ matiṃ kṛtvā madbhakto matparāyaṇaḥ
dA jñāsyase māṃ tato brahman vītamohaś ca tattvataḥ
dA tena tvaṃ kṛtasaṃvādaḥ svataḥ sarvahitaiṣiṇā
dA viśvarūpeṇa devena puruṣeṇa mahātmanā
dA tam evārādhaya kṣipraṃ tam ārādhya na sīdasi
dA so 'ham evaṃ bhagavatā pitrā brahmarṣisattamāḥ
dA suparṇaḥ
dA anugīto yathānyāyaṃ svam eva bhavanaṃ gataḥ
dA so 'ham āmantrya pitaraṃ tadbhāvagatamānasaḥ
dA svam evālayam āsādya tam evārtham acintayam
dA tadbhāvagatabhāvātmā tadbhūtagatamānasaḥ
dA govindaṃ cintayann āse śāśvataṃ param avyayam
dA dhṛtaṃ babhūva hṛdayaṃ nārāyaṇadidṛkṣayā
dA so 'haṃ vegaṃ samāsthāya manomārutavegavān
dA ramyāṃ viśālāṃ badarīṃ gato nārāyaṇāśramam
dA tatas tatra hariṃ dṛṣṭvā jagataḥ prabhavaṃ vibhum
dA govindaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ praṇataḥ śirasā harim
dA ṛgyajuḥsāmabhiś cainaṃ tuṣṭāva parayā mudā
dA athāpaśyaṃ suvipulam aśvatthaṃ devasaṃśrayam
dA caturdviguṇapīnāṃsaḥ śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ
dA prādurbabhūva puruṣaḥ pītavāsāḥ sanātanaḥ
dA madhyāhnārkapratīkāśas tejasā bhāsayan diśaḥ
dA saṃstutaḥ saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā vrajeti śreyase rataḥ
dA prāgudīcīṃ diśaṃ devaḥ pratasthe puruṣottamaḥ
dA diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva bhāsayan svena tejasā
dA tam ahaṃ puruṣaṃ divyaṃ vrajantam amitaujasam
dA anuvavrāja vegena śanair gacchantam avyayam
dA yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭim aṣṭau tathā śatam
dA tathā śatasahasraṃ ca śataṃ dviguṇam eva ca
dA sa gatvā dīrgham adhvānam apaśyam aham adbhutam
dA mahāntaṃ pāvakaṃ dīptam arciṣmantam anindhanam
dA śatayojanavistīrṇaṃ tasmād dviguṇam āyatam
dA viveśa sa mahāyogī pāvakaṃ pāvakadyutiḥ
dA tatra śaṃbhus tapas tepe mahādevaḥ sahomayā
dA sa tena saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā pāvakaṃ samatikramat
dA śramābhibhūtena mayā kathaṃ cid anugamyate
dA gatvā sa dīrgham adhvānaṃ bhāskareṇāvabhāsitam
dA abhāskaram amaryādaṃ viveśa sumahattamaḥ
dA atha dṛṣṭiḥ pratihatā mama tatra babhūva ha
dA yathāsvabhāvaṃ bhūtātmā viveśa sa mahādyutiḥ
dA tato 'ham abhavaṃ mūḍho jaḍāndhabadhiropamaḥ
dA diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva na vijajñe tamovṛtaḥ
dA avijānann ahaṃ kiṃ cit tasmiṃs tamasi saṃvṛte
dA susaṃbhrāntena manasā vyathāṃ paramikāṃ gataḥ
dA so 'haṃ prapannaḥ śaraṇaṃ devadevaṃ sanātanam
dA prāñjalir manasā bhūtvā vākyam etat tadoktavān
dA bhagavan bhūtabhavyeśa bhavadbhūtakṛd avyaya
dA śaraṇaṃ saṃprapannaṃ māṃ trātum arhasy ariṃdama
dA ahaṃ tu tattvajijñāsuḥ ko 'si kasyāsi kutra vā
dA saṃprāptaḥ padavīṃ deva sa māṃ saṃtrātum arhasi
dA āvirbhūtaḥ purāṇātmā mām ehīti sanātanaḥ
dA tato 'parāntato devo viśvasya gatir ātmavān
dA mohayām āsa māṃ tatra durvibhāvyavapur vibhuḥ
dA svabhāvam ātmanas tatra darśayan svayam ātmanā
dA śramaṃ me janayām āsa bhayaṃ cābhayadaḥ prabhuḥ
dA khinna ity eva māṃ matvā bhagavān avyayo 'cyutaḥ
dA śabdenāśvāsayām āsa jagāhe ca tamo mahat
dA ahaṃ tu khedānugataḥ śramāc calapadaś caran
dA manasā devadeveśaṃ dhyātuṃ samupacakrame
dA tathā gataṃ tu māṃ jñātvā bhagavān amitadyutiḥ
dA tamaḥ praṇāśayām āsa mamānugrahakāṅkṣayā
dA tataḥ pranaṣṭe tamasi tam ahaṃ dīptatejasam
dA apaśyaṃ tejasā vyāptaṃ madhyāhna iva bhāskaram
dA svayaṃprabhāṃś ca puruṣān striyaś ca paramādbhutāḥ
dA apaśyam aham avyagraṃ tasmin deśe sahasraśaḥ
dA na tatra dyotate sūryo nakṣatrāṇi tathaiva ca
dA na tatra candramā bhāti na vāyur vāti pāṃsulaḥ
dA tatra tūryāṇy anekāni gītāni madhurāṇi ca
dA adṛśyāni manojñāni śrūyante sarvatodiśam
dA sravanti vaiḍūryalatāḥ padmotpalajhaṣākulāḥ
dA muktāsikatavaprāś ca sarito nirmalodakāḥ
dA agatis tatra devānām asurāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
dA gandharvanāgayakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ tathaiva ca
dA svayaṃprabhās tatra narā dṛśyante 'dbhutadarśanāḥ
dA yeṣāṃ na devatās tulyāḥ prabhābhir bhāvitātmanām
dA sa ca tān apy atikramya daivatair api pūjitaḥ
dA viveśa jvalanaṃ dīptam anindhanam anaupamam
dA jvālābhir māṃ praviṣṭaṃ ca jvalantaṃ sarvatodiśam
dA daityadānavarakṣobhir daivataiś cāpi duḥsaham
dA jvālāmālinam āsādya tam agnim aham avyayam
dA aviṣahyatamaṃ matvā manasedam acintayam
dA mayā hi samareṣv agnir anekeṣu mahādyutiḥ
dA praviṣṭaś cāpaviddhaś ca na ca māṃ dagdhavān kva cit
dA ayaṃ ca duḥsahaḥ śaśvat tejasātihutāśanaḥ
dA atyādityaprakāśārcir analo dīpyate mahān
dA sa tathā dahyamāno 'pi tejasā dīptavarcasā
dA prapannaḥ śaraṇaṃ devaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam
dA bhaktaś cānugataś ceti trātum arhasi māṃ vibho
dA yathā māṃ na dahed agniḥ sadyo deva tathā kuru
dA evaṃ vilapamānasya jñātvā me vacanaṃ prabhuḥ
dA mā bhair iti vacaḥ prāha meghagambhīranisvanaḥ
dA sa mām āśvāsya vacanaṃ prāhedaṃ bhagavān vibhuḥ
dA mama tvaṃ viditaḥ saumya yathāvat tattvadarśane
dA jñāpitaś cāpi yat pitrā tac cāpi viditaṃ mahat
dA vainateya mamāpy evam ahaṃ vedyaḥ kathaṃ cana
dA mahad etat svarūpaṃ me na te vedyaṃ kathaṃ cana
dA māṃ hi vindanti vidvāṃso ye jñāne pariniṣṭhitāḥ
dA nirmamā nirahaṃkārā nirāśīrbandhanāyutāḥ
dA bhavāṃs tu satataṃ bhakto manmanāḥ pakṣisattama
dA suparṇaḥ
dA sthūlaṃ māṃ vetsyate tasmāj jagataḥ kāraṇe sthitam
dA evaṃ dattābhayas tena tato 'ham ṛṣisattamāḥ
dA naṣṭakhedaśramabhayaḥ kṣaṇena hy abhavaṃ tadā
dA sa śanair yāti bhagavān gatyā laghuparākramaḥ
dA ahaṃ tu sumahāvegam āsthāyānuvrajāmi tam
dA sa gatvā dīrgham adhvānam ākāśam amitadyutiḥ
dA manasāpy agamaṃ devam āsasādātmatattvavit
dA atha devaḥ samāsādya manasaḥ sadṛśaṃ javam
dA mohayitvā ca māṃ tatra kṣaṇenāntaradhīyata
dA tatrāmbudharadhīreṇa bhośabdenānunādinā
dA ayaṃ bho 'ham iti prāha vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ
dA śabdānusārī tu tatas taṃ deśam aham āvrajam
dA tatrāpaśyaṃ tataś cāhaṃ śrīmaddhaṃsayutaṃ saraḥ
dA sa tat saraḥ samāsādya bhagavān ātmavittamaḥ
dA bhośabdapratisṛṣṭena svareṇāprativādinā
dA viveśa devaḥ svāṃ yoniṃ mām idaṃ cābhyabhāṣata
dA viśasva salilaṃ saumya sukham atra vasāmahe
dA tataś ca prāviśaṃ tatra saha tena mahātmanā
dA dṛṣṭavān adbhutataraṃ tasmin sarasi bhāsvatām
dA agnīnām apraṇītānām iddhānām indhanair vinā
dA dīptānām ājyasiktānāṃ sthāneṣv arciṣmatāṃ sadā
dA dīptis teṣām anājyānāṃ prāptājyānām ivābhavat
dA aniddhānām iva satām iddhānām iva bhāsvatām
dA athāhaṃ varadaṃ devaṃ nāpaśyaṃ tatra saṃgatam
dA tataḥ saṃmoham āpanno viṣādam agamaṃ param
dA apaśyaṃ cāgnihotrāṇi śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
dA vidhinā saṃpraṇītāni dhiṣṇyeṣv ājyavatāṃ tadā
dA asaṃmṛṣṭatalāś caiva vedīḥ kusumasaṃstṛtāḥ
dA kuśapadmotpalāsaṅgān kalaśāṃś ca hiraṇmayān
dA agnihotrāṇi citrāṇi śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
dA agnihotropayogyāni yāni dravyāṇi kāni cit
dA tāni cātra samṛddhāni dṛṣṭavān asmy anekaśaḥ
dA manohṛdyatamaś cātra surabhiḥ puṇyalakṣaṇaḥ
dA ājyagandho manogrāhī ghrāṇacakṣuḥsukhāvahaḥ
dA teṣāṃ tatrāgnihotrāṇām īḍitānāṃ sahasraśaḥ
dA samīpe tv adbhutatamam apaśyam aham avyayam
dA candrāṃśukāśaśubhrāṇāṃ tuṣārodbhedavarcasām
dA vimalādityabhāsānāṃ sthaṇḍilāni sahasraśaḥ
dA dṛṣṭāny agnisamīpeṣu dyutimanti mahānti ca
dA eṣu cāgnisamīpeṣu śuśrāva supadākṣarāḥ
dA prabhāvāntaritānāṃ tu praspaṣṭākṣarabhāṣiṇām
dA ṛgyajuḥsāmagānāṃ ca madhurāḥ susvarā giraḥ
dA susaṃmṛṣṭatalais tais tu bṛhadbhir dīptatejasaiḥ
dA pāvakaiḥ pāvitātmāham abhavaṃ laghuvikramaḥ
dA tato 'haṃ teṣu dhiṣṇyeṣu jvalamāneṣu yajvanām
dA taṃ deśaṃ praṇamitvātha anveṣṭum upacakrame
dA tāny anekasahasrāṇi parīyaṃs tu mahājavāt
dA apaśyamānas taṃ devaṃ tato 'haṃ vyathito 'bhavam
dA tatas teṣv agnihotreṣu jvalatsu vimalārciṣu
dA bhānumatsu na paśyāmi devadevaṃ sanātanam
dA tato 'haṃ tāni dīptāni parīya vyathitendriyaḥ
dA nāntaṃ teṣāṃ prapaśyāmi khedaś ca sahasābhavat
dA vihṛtya sarvato dṛṣṭiṃ bhayamohasamanvitaḥ
dA śramaṃ paramam āpannaś cintayāmi vicetanaḥ
dA tasmin nu khalu vartāmi loke kiṃ caitad īdṛśam
dA ṛgyajuḥsāmanirghoṣaḥ śrūyate na ca dṛśyate
dA na ca paśyāmi taṃ devaṃ yenāham iha coditaḥ
dA evaṃ cintāsamāpannaḥ pradhyātum upacakrame
dA tataś cintayato mahyaṃ mohenāviṣṭacetasaḥ
dA mahāñ śabdaḥ prādurāsīt subhṛśaṃ me vyathākaraḥ
dA athāhaṃ sahasā tatra śṛṇomi vipuladhvanim
dA apaśyaṃ ca suparṇānāṃ sahasrāṇy ayutāni ca
dA abhyadravanta mām eva vipuladyutiraṃhasaḥ
dA teṣām ahaṃ prabhāvena sarvathaivāvaro 'bhavam
dA so 'haṃ samantataḥ sarvaiḥ suparṇair atitejasaiḥ
dA dṛṣṭvātmānaṃ parigataṃ saṃbhramaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ
dA vinayāvanato bhūtvā namaścakre mahātmane
dA anādinidhanāyaibhir nāmabhiḥ paramātmane
dA nārāyaṇāya śuddhāya śāśvatāya dhruvāya ca
dA bhūtabhavyabhaveśāya śivāya śivamūrtaye
dA śivayoneḥ śivādyāya śivapūjyatamāya ca
dA ghorarūpāya mahate yugāntakaraṇāya ca
dA viśvāya viśvadevāya viśveśāya mahātmane
dA sahasrodarapādāya sahasranayanāya ca
dA sahasrabāhave caiva sahasravadanāya ca
dA śuciśravāya mahate ṛtusaṃvatsarāya ca
dA ṛgyajuḥsāmavaktrāya atharvaśirase namaḥ
dA hṛṣīkeśāya kṛṣṇāya druhiṇorukramāya ca
dA brahmodrekāya tārkṣyāya varāhāyaikaśṛṅgiṇe
dA śipiviṣṭāya satyāya haraye 'tha śikhaṇḍine
dA hutāyordhvāya vakrāya raudrānīkāya sādhave
dA sindhave sindhuvarṣaghne devānāṃ sindhave namaḥ
dA garutmate trinetrāya sudhāmāya vṛṣāvṛṣe
dA samrāḍugre saṃkṛtaye viraje saṃbhave bhave
dA vṛṣāya vṛṣarūpāya vibhave bhūrbhuvāya ca
dA dīptasṛṣṭāya yajñāya sthirāya sthavirāya ca
dA acyutāya tuṣārāya vīrāya ca samāya ca
dA jiṣṇave puruhūtāya vasiṣṭhāya varāya ca
dA satyeśāya sureśāya haraye 'tha śikhaṇḍine
dA barhiṣāya vareṇyāya vasave viśvavedhase
dA kirīṭine sukeśāya vāsudevāya śuṣmiṇe
dA bṛhadukthe suṣeṇāya yugme duṃdubhaye tathā
dA bhave sakhāya vibhave bharadvājābhayāya ca
dA bhāskarāya ca candrāya padmanābhāya bhūriṇe
dA punarvasubhṛtatvāya jīvaprabhaviṣāya ca
dA vaṣaṭkārāya svāhāya svadhāya nidhanāya ca
dA ṛce ca yajuṣe sāmne trailokyapataye namaḥ
dA śrīpadmāyājasadṛśe dharaṇe dhāraṇe pare
dA saumyāya saumyarūpāya saumye sumanase namaḥ
dA viśvāya ca suviśvāya viśvarūpadharāya ca
dA keśavāya sukeśāya raśmikeśāya bhūriṇe
dA hiraṇyagarbhāya namaḥ saumyāya vṛṣarūpiṇe
dA nārāyaṇāgravapuṣe puruhūtāya vajriṇe
dA dharmiṇe vṛṣasenāya dharmasenāya rodhase
dA munaye jvaramuktāya jvarādhipataye namaḥ
dA anetrāya trinetrāya piṅgalāya vidharmiṇe
dA tapobrahmanidhānāya yugaparyāyiṇe namaḥ
dA śaraṇāya śaraṇyāya śakteṣṭaśaraṇāya ca
dA namaḥ sarvabhaveśāya bhūtabhavyabhavāya ca
dA pāhi māṃ devadeveśa ko 'py ajo 'si sanātanaḥ
dA evaṃ gato 'smi śaraṇaṃ śaraṇyaṃ brahmayoninam
dA stavyaṃ stavaṃ stutavatas tat tamo me praṇaśyatu
dA bhayaṃ ca me vyapagataṃ pakṣiṇo 'ntarhitābhavan
dA śṛṇomi ca giraṃ divyām antardhānagatāṃ śivām
dA mā bhair garutman dānto 'si punaḥ sendrā divaukasaḥ
dA svaṃ caiva bhavanaṃ gatvā drakṣyase putrabāndhavān
dA tatas tasmin kṣaṇenaiva sahasaiva mahādyutiḥ
dA pratyadṛśyata tejasvī purastāt sa mamāntike
dA samāgamya tatas tena śivena paramātmanā
dA apaśyaṃ cāham āyāntaṃ naranārāyaṇāśrame
dA caturdviguṇavinyāsaṃ taṃ ca devaṃ sanātanam
dA yajatas tān ṛṣīn devān vadato dhyāyato munīn
dA yuktān siddhān naiṣṭhikāṃś ca japato yajato gṛhe
dA puṣpapūraparikṣiptaṃ dhūpitaṃ dīpitaṃ hutam
dA vanditaṃ siktasaṃmṛṣṭaṃ naranārāyaṇāśramam
dA tad adbhutam ahaṃ dṛṣṭvā vismito 'smi tadānaghāḥ
dA jagāma śirasā devaṃ prayatenāntarātmanā
dA tad atyadbhutasaṃkāśaṃ kim etad iti cintayan
dA nādhyagacchaṃ parāṃ divyāṃ tasya sarvabhavātmanaḥ
dA praṇipatya sudurdharṣaṃ punaḥ punar udīkṣya ca
dA śirasy añjalim ādhāya vismayotphullalocanaḥ
dA avocaṃ tam adīnārthaṃ śreṣṭhānāṃ śreṣṭham uttamam
dA namas te bhagavan deva bhūtabhavyabhavatprabho
dA yad etad adbhutaṃ deva mayā dṛṣṭaṃ tvadāśrayam
dA anādimadhyaparyantaṃ kiṃ tac chaṃsitum arhasi
dA yadi jānāsi māṃ bhaktaṃ yadi vānugraho mayi
dA śaṃsa sarvam aśeṣeṇa śrotavyaṃ yadi cen mayā
dA svabhāvas tava durjñeyaḥ prādurbhāvo bhavasya ca
dA bhavadbhūtabhaviṣyeśa sarvathā gahanaṃ bhavān
dA brūhi sarvam aśeṣeṇa tad āścaryaṃ mahāmune
dA kiṃ tad atyadbhutaṃ vṛttaṃ teṣv agniṣu samantataḥ
dA kāni tāny agnihotrāṇi keṣāṃ śabdaḥ śruto mayā
dA śṛṇvatāṃ brahma satatam adṛśyānāṃ mahātmanām
dA etan me bhagavan kṛṣṇa brūhi sarvam aśeṣataḥ
dA gṛṇanty agnisamīpeṣu ke ca te brahmarāśayaḥ
dA bhagavān
dA māṃ na devā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
dA vidus tattvena tattvasthaṃ sūkṣmātmānam avasthitam
dA caturdhāhaṃ vibhaktātmā lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā
dA bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyādir anādir viśvakṛttamaḥ
dA pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
dA mano buddhiś ca cetaś ca tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajas tathā
dA prakṛtir vikṛtiś ceti vidyāvidye śubhāśubhe
dA matta etāni jāyante nāham ebhyaḥ kathaṃ cana
dA sa kiṃ cic chreyasā yuktaḥ śreṣṭhabhāvaṃ vyavasyati
dA dharmayuktaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca so 'ham asmi nirāmayaḥ
dA yat svabhāvātmatattvajñaiḥ kāraṇair upalakṣyate
dA anādimadhyanidhanaḥ so 'ntarātmāsmi śāśvataḥ
dA yat tu me paramaṃ guhyaṃ rūpaṃ sūkṣmārthadarśibhiḥ
dA gṛhyate sūkṣmabhāvajñaiḥ so 'vibhāvyo 'smi śāśvataḥ
dA yat tu me paramaṃ guhyaṃ yena vyāptam idaṃ jagat
dA so 'haṃgataḥ sarvasattvaḥ sarvasya prabhavo 'vyayaḥ
dA matto jātāni bhūtāni mayā dhāryanty aharniśam
dA mayy eva vilayaṃ yānti pralaye pannagāśana
dA yo māṃ yathā vedayati tasya tasyāsmi kāśyapa
dA manobuddhigataḥ śreyo vidadhāmi vihaṃgama
dA māṃ tu jñātuṃ kṛtā buddhir bhavatā pakṣisattama
dA śṛṇu yo 'haṃ yataś cāhaṃ yadarthaś cāham udyataḥ
dA ye ke cin niyatātmānas tretāgniparamārcitāḥ
dA agnikāryaparā nityaṃ japahomaparāyaṇāḥ
dA ātmany agnīn samādhāya niyatā niyatendriyāḥ
dA ananyamanasas te māṃ sarve vai samupāsate
dA yajanto japayajñair māṃ mānasaiś ca susaṃyatāḥ
dA agnīn abhyudyayuḥ śaśvad agniṣv evābhisaṃsthitāḥ
dA ananyakāryāḥ śucayo nityam agniparāyaṇāḥ
dA ya evaṃbuddhayo dhīrās te māṃ gacchanti tādṛśāḥ
dA akāmahatasaṃkalpā jñāne nityaṃ samāhitāḥ
dA ātmany agnīn samādhāya nirāhārā nirāśiṣaḥ
dA viṣayeṣu nirārambhā vimuktā jñānacakṣuṣaḥ
dA ananyamanaso dhīrāḥ svabhāvaniyamānvitāḥ
dA yat tad viyati dṛṣṭaṃ tat saraḥ padmotpalāyutam
dA tatrāgnayaḥ saṃnihitā dīpyante sma nirindhanāḥ
dA jñānāmalāśayās tasmin ye ca candrāṃśunirmalāḥ
dA upāsīnā gṛṇanto 'gniṃ praspaṣṭākṣarabhāṣiṇaḥ
dA ākāṅkṣamāṇāḥ śucayas teṣv agniṣu vihaṃgama
dA ye mayā bhāvitātmāno mayy evābhiratāḥ sadā
dA upāsate ca mām eva jyotirbhūtā nirāmayāḥ
dA tair hi tatraiva vastavyaṃ nīrāgātmabhir acyutaiḥ
dA nirāhārā hy aniṣpandāś candrāṃśusadṛśaprabhāḥ
dA nirmalā nirahaṃkārā nirālambā nirāśiṣaḥ
dA madbhaktāḥ satataṃ te vai bhaktās tān api cāpy aham
dA caturdhāhaṃ vibhaktātmā carāmi jagato hitaḥ
dA lokānāṃ dhāraṇārthāya vidhānaṃ vidadhāmi ca
dA yathāvat tad aśeṣeṇa śrotum arhati me bhavān
dA ekā mūrtir nirguṇākhyā yogaṃ paramam āsthitā
dA dvitīyā sṛjate tāta bhūtagrāmaṃ carācaram
dA sṛṣṭaṃ saṃharate caikā jagat sthāvarajaṃgamam
dA jātātmaniṣṭhā kṣapayan mohayann iva māyayā
dA kṣipantī mohayantī ca ātmaniṣṭhā svamāyayā
dA caturthī me mahāmūrtir jagadvṛddhiṃ dadāti sā
dA rakṣate cāpi niyatā so 'ham asmi nabhaścara
dA mayā sarvam idaṃ vyāptaṃ mayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
dA ahaṃ sarvajagadbījaṃ sarvatragatir avyayaḥ
dA yāni tāny agnihotrāṇi ye ca candrāṃśurāśayaḥ
dA gṛṇanti vedaṃ satataṃ teṣv agniṣu vihaṃgama
dA krameṇa māṃ samāyānti sukhino jñānasaṃyutāḥ
dA teṣām ahaṃ tapo dīptaṃ tejaḥ samyak samāhitam
dA nityaṃ te mayi vartante teṣu cāham atandritaḥ
dA sarvato muktasaṅgena mayy ananyasamādhinā
dA śakyaḥ samāsādayitum ahaṃ vai jñānacakṣuṣā
dA māṃ sthūladarśanaṃ viddhi jagataḥ kāryakāraṇam
dA mattaś ca saṃprasūtān vai viddhi lokān sadaivatān
dA mayā cāpi caturdhātmā vibhaktaḥ prāṇiṣu sthitaḥ
dA ātmabhūto vāsudevo hy aniruddho matau sthitaḥ
dA saṃkarṣaṇo 'haṃkāre ca pradyumno manasi sthitaḥ
dA anyathā ca caturdhā yat samyak tvaṃ śrotum arhasi
dA hiraṇyagarbhaḥ padmākhyo yatra brahmā vyajāyata
dA brahmaṇaś cāpi saṃbhūtaḥ śiva ity avadhāryatām
dA śivāt skandaḥ saṃbabhūva etat sṛṣṭicatuṣṭayam
dA daityadānavadarpaghnam evaṃ māṃ viddhi nityaśaḥ
dA daityadānavarakṣobhir yadā dharmaḥ prapīḍyate
dA tadāhaṃ dharmavṛddhyarthaṃ mūrtimān bhavitāśuga
dA vedavrataparā ye tu dhīrā niścitabuddhayaḥ
dA yogino yogayuktāś ca te māṃ paśyanti nānyathā
dA pañcabhiḥ saṃprayukto 'haṃ viprayuktaś ca pañcabhiḥ
dA vartamānaś ca teṣv evaṃ nivṛttaś caiva teṣv aham
dA ye vidur jātasaṃkalpās te māṃ paśyanti tādṛśāḥ
dA khaṃ vāyur āpo jyotiś ca pṛthivī ceti pañcamam
dA tadātmako 'smi vijñeyo na cānyo 'smīti niścitam
dA vartamānam atītaṃ ca pañcavargeṣu niścalam
dA śabdasparśeṣu rūpeṣu rasagandheṣu cāpy aham
dA rajastamobhyām āviṣṭā yeṣāṃ buddhir aniścitā
dA te na paśyanti me tattvaṃ tapasā mahatā hy api
dA nopavāsair na niyamair na vratair vividhair api
dA draṣṭuṃ vā vedituṃ vāpi na śakyā paramā gatiḥ
dA mahāmohotthapaṅke tu nimagnānāṃ gatir hariḥ
dA ekāntino dhyānaparā yatibhāvād vrajanti mām
dA sattvayuktā matir yeṣāṃ kevalātmaviniścitā
dA te paśyanti svam ātmānaṃ paramātmānam avyayam
dA ahiṃsā sarvabhūteṣu teṣv avasthitam ārjavam
dA teṣv eva ca samādhāya samyag eti sa mām ajam
dA yad etat paramaṃ guhyam ākhyānaṃ paramādbhutam
dA yatnena tad aśeṣeṇa yathāvac chrotum arhasi
dA ye tv agnihotraniyatā japayajñaparāyaṇāḥ
dA te mām upāsate śaśvad yāṃs tāṃs tvaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi
dA śāstradṛṣṭavidhānajñā asaktāḥ kva cid anyathā
dA śakyo 'haṃ vedituṃ tais tu yan me paramam avyayam
dA ye tu sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca jñātvāpy adhṛtaniścayāḥ
dA na te gacchanty akuśalāḥ parāṃ gatim anuttamām
dA tasmāj jñānena śuddhena prasannātmātmavic chuciḥ
dA āsādayati tad brahma yatra gatvā na śocati
dA śuddhābhijanasaṃpannāḥ śraddhāyuktena cetasā
dA madbhaktyā ca dvijaśreṣṭhā gacchanti paramāṃ gatim
dA yad guhyaṃ paramaṃ buddher aliṅgagrahaṇaṃ ca yat
dA tat sūkṣmaṃ gṛhyate viprair yatibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ
dA na vāyuḥ pavate tatra na tasmiñ jyotiṣāṃ gatiḥ
dA na cāpaḥ pṛthivī naiva nākāśaṃ na manogatiḥ
dA tasmāc caitāni sarvāṇi prajāyante vihaṃgama
dA sarvebhyaś ca sa tebhyaś ca prabhavaty amalo vibhuḥ
dA sthūladarśanam etan me yad dṛṣṭaṃ bhavatānagha
dA etat sūkṣmasya ca dvāraṃ kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ tv aham
dA dṛṣṭo vai bhavatā tasmāt sarasy amitavikrama
dA brahmaṇo yad ahorātraṃ saṃkhyānajñair vibhāvyate
dA eṣa kālas tvayā tatra sarahasyam upāgataḥ
dA māṃ yajñam āhur yajñajñā vedaṃ vedavido janāḥ
dA munayaś cāpi mām eva japayajñaṃ pracakṣate
dA vaktā mantā rasayitā ghrātā draṣṭā pradarśakaḥ
dA boddhā bodhayitā cāhaṃ gantā śrotā cidātmakaḥ
dA mām iṣṭvā svargam āyānti tathā cāpnuvate mahat
dA jñātvā mām eva caidhante niḥsaṅgenāntarātmanā
dA ahaṃ tejo dvijātīnāṃ mama tejo dvijātayaḥ
dA mama yas tejasā dehaḥ so 'gnir ity eva gamyatām
dA prāṇapālaḥ śarīre 'haṃ yoginām aham īśvaraḥ
dA sāṃkhyānām idam evāgre mayi sarvam idaṃ jagat
dA dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca mokṣaṃ caivārjavaṃ japam
dA tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajaś caiva karmajaṃ ca bhavāpyayam
dA sa tadāhaṃ tathārūpas tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ sanātanaḥ
dA tatas tv ahaṃ parataraḥ śakyaḥ kālena veditum
dA mama yat paramaṃ guhyaṃ śāśvataṃ dhruvam avyayam
dA tad evaṃ paramo guhyo devo nārāyaṇo hariḥ
dA na tac chakyaṃ bhujaṃgāre vettum abhyudayānvitaiḥ
dA nirārambhanamaskārā nirāśīrbandhanās tathā
dA gacchanti taṃ mahātmānaḥ paraṃ brahma sanātanam
dA sthūlo 'ham evaṃ vihaga tvayā dṛṣṭas tathānagha
dA etac cāpi na vetty anyas tvām ṛte pannagāśana
dA mā matis tava gān nāśam eṣā gatir anuttamā
dA madbhakto bhava nityaṃ tvaṃ tato vetsyasi me padam
dA etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ rahasyaṃ divyamānuṣam
dA etac chreyaḥ paraṃ caitat panthānaṃ viddhi mokṣiṇām
dA evam uktvā sa bhagavāṃs tatraivāntaradhīyata
dA paśyato me mahāyogī jagāmātmagatir gatim
dA etad evaṃvidhaṃ tasya mahimānaṃ mahātmanaḥ
dA acyutasyāprameyasya dṛṣṭavān asmi yat purā
dA etad vaḥ sarvam ākhyātaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ
dA ṛṣayaḥ
dA mayānubhūtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā cādbhutakarmaṇaḥ
dA aho śrāvitam ākhyānaṃ bhavatātyadbhutaṃ mahat
dA puṇyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargyaṃ svastyayanaṃ mahat
dA etat pavitraṃ devānām etad guhyaṃ paraṃtapa
dA etaj jñānavatāṃ jñeyam eṣā gatir anuttamā
dA ya imāṃ śrāvayed vidvān kathāṃ parvasu parvasu
dA sa lokān prāpnuyāt puṇyān devarṣibhir abhiṣṭutān
dA śrāddhakāle ca viprāṇāṃ ya imāṃ śrāvayec chuciḥ
dA na tatra rakṣasāṃ bhāgo nāsurāṇāṃ ca vidyate
dA anasūyur jitakrodhaḥ sarvasattvahite rataḥ
dA yaḥ paṭhet satataṃ yuktaḥ sa vrajet tat salokatām
dA vedān pārayate vipro rājā vijayavān bhavet
dA bhīṣmaḥ
dA vaiśyas tu dhanadhānyāḍhyaḥ śūdraḥ sukham avāpnuyāt
dA tatas te munayaḥ sarve saṃpūjya vinatāsutam
dA svān eva cāśramāñ jagmur babhūvuḥ śāntitatparāḥ
dA sthūladarśibhir ākṛṣṭo durjñeyo hy akṛtātmabhiḥ
dA eṣā śrutir mahārāja dharmyā dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
dA surāṇāṃ brahmaṇā proktā vismitānāṃ paraṃtapa
dA mayāpy eṣā kathā tāta kathitā mātur antike
dA vasubhiḥ sattvasaṃpannais tavāpy eṣā mayocyate
dA tad agnihotraparamā japayajñaparāyaṇāḥ
dA nirāśīrbandhanāḥ santaḥ prayānty akṣarasāmyatām
dA ārambhayajñān utsṛjya japahomaparāyaṇāḥ
dA dhyāyanto manasā viṣṇuṃ gacchanti paramāṃ gatim
dA tad eva paramo mokṣo mokṣadvāraṃ ca bhārata
dA yathā viniścitātmāno gacchanti paramāṃ gatim
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
 tvayāpageya nāmāni śrutānīha jagatpateḥ
a pitāmaheśāya vibho nāmāny ācakṣva śaṃbhave
c babhrave viśvamāyāya mahābhāgyaṃ ca tattvataḥ
d bhīṣma uvāca
d surāsuragurau deve śaṃkare 'vyaktayonaye
d aśakto 'haṃ guṇān vaktuṃ mahādevasya dhīmataḥ
d yo hi sarvagato devo na ca sarvatra dṛśyate
d brahmaviṣṇusureśānāṃ sraṣṭā yaḥ prabhur eva ca
d brahmādayaḥ piśācāntā yaṃ hi devā upāsate
d prakṛtīnāṃ paratvena puruṣasya ca yaḥ paraḥ
d cintyate yo yogavidbhir ṛṣibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ
d akṣaraṃ paramaṃ prāhur asac ca sadasac ca yaḥ
d prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva kṣobhayitvā svatejasā
d brahmāṇam asṛjat tasmād devadevaḥ prajāpatiḥ
d ko hi śakto guṇān vaktuṃ devadevasya dhīmataḥ
d garbhajanmajarāyukto martyo mṛtyusamanvitaḥ
d ko hi śakto bhavaṃ jñātuṃ madvidhaḥ parameśvaram
d ṛte nārāyaṇāt putra śaṅkhacakragadādharāt
d eṣa vidvān yaduśreṣṭho viṣṇuḥ paramadurjayaḥ
d divyacakṣur mahātejā vīkṣyate yogacakṣuṣā
d rudrabhaktyā tu kṛṣṇena jagad vyāptaṃ mahātmanā
d taṃ prasādya tadā devaṃ badaryāṃ kila bhārata
d arthāt priyataratvaṃ ca sarvalokeṣu vai tadā
d prāptavān eva rājendra suvarṇākṣān maheśvarāt
d pūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu taptavān eṣa mādhavaḥ
d prasādya varadaṃ devaṃ carācaraguruṃ śivam
d yuge yuge tu kṛṣṇena toṣito vai maheśvaraḥ
d bhaktyā paramayā rājan prītaś caiva mahātmanaḥ
d aiśvaryaṃ yādṛśaṃ tasya jagadyoner mahātmanaḥ
d tad ayaṃ dṛṣṭavān sākṣāt putrārthe harir acyutaḥ
d yasmāt parataraṃ caiva nānyaṃ paśyāmi bhārata
d vyākhyātuṃ devadevasya śakto nāmāny aśeṣataḥ
d eṣa śakto mahābāhur vaktuṃ bhagavato guṇān
d vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
d vibhūtiṃ caiva kārtsnyena satyāṃ māheśvarīṃ nṛpa
d evam uktvā tadā bhīṣmo vāsudevaṃ mahāyaśāḥ
d bhavamāhātmyasaṃyuktam idam āha pitāmahaḥ
d dhyānenātha japaiḥ kāryā svadharmam ucitā sadā
d deve nārāyaṇe bhaktaḥ śaṃkaraṃ sādhu pūjaya
d vāsudevaṃ mahātmānam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
 bhīṣma uvāca
a surāsuraguro deva viṣṇo tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
c śivāya viśvarūpāya yan māṃ pṛcchad yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a nāmnāṃ sahasraṃ devasya taṇḍinā brahmayoninā
c niveditaṃ brahmaloke brahmaṇo yat purābhavat
a dvaipāyanaprabhṛtayas tathaiveme tapodhanāḥ
c ṛṣayaḥ suvratā dāntāḥ śṛṇvantu gadatas tava
a dhruvāya nandine hotre goptre viśvasṛje 'gnaye
c mahābhāgyaṃ vibho brūhi muṇḍine 'tha kapardine
 vāsudeva uvāca
a na gatiḥ karmaṇāṃ śakyā vettum īśasya tattvataḥ
a hiraṇyagarbhapramukhā devāḥ sendrā maharṣayaḥ
c na vidur yasya nidhanam ādiṃ vā sūkṣmadarśinaḥ
e sa kathaṃ naramātreṇa śakyo jñātuṃ satāṃ gatiḥ
a tasyāham asuraghnasya kāṃś cid bhagavato guṇān
c bhavatāṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi vrateśāya yathātatham
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evam uktvā tu bhagavān guṇāṃs tasya mahātmanaḥ
c upaspṛśya śucir bhūtvā kathayām āsa dhīmataḥ
 vāsudeva uvāca
a śuśrūṣadhvaṃ brāhmaṇendrās tvaṃ ca tāta yudhiṣṭhira
c tvaṃ cāpageya nāmāni niśāmaya jagatpateḥ
a yad avāptaṃ ca me pūrvaṃ sāmbahetoḥ suduṣkaram
c yathā ca bhagavān dṛṣṭo mayā pūrvaṃ samādhinā
a śambare nihate pūrvaṃ raukmiṇeyena dhīmatā
c atīte dvādaśe varṣe jāmbavaty abravīd dhi mām
a pradyumnacārudeṣṇādīn rukmiṇyā vīkṣya putrakān
c putrārthinī mām upetya vākyam āha yudhiṣṭhira
a śūraṃ balavatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ kāntarūpam akalmaṣam
c ātmatulyaṃ mama sutaṃ prayacchācyuta māciram
a na hi te 'prāpyam astīha triṣu lokeṣu kiṃ cana
c lokān sṛjes tvam aparān icchan yadukulodvaha
a tvayā dvādaśa varṣāṇi vāyubhūtena śuṣyatā
c ārādhya paśubhartāraṃ rukmiṇyā janitāḥ sutāḥ
a cārudeṣṇaḥ sucāruś ca cāruveṣo yaśodharaḥ
c cāruśravāś cāruyaśāḥ pradyumnaḥ śaṃbhur eva ca
a yathā te janitāḥ putrā rukmiṇyāś cāruvikramāḥ
c tathā mamāpi tanayaṃ prayaccha balaśālinam
a ity evaṃ codito devyā tām avocaṃ sumadhyamām
c anujānīhi māṃ rājñi kariṣye vacanaṃ tava
e sā ca mām abravīd gaccha vijayāya śivāya ca
a brahmā śivaḥ kāśyapaś ca nadyo devā manonugāḥ
c kṣetrauṣadhyo yajñavāhāc chandāṃsy ṛṣigaṇā dharā
a samudrā dakṣiṇā stobhā ṛkṣāṇi pitaro grahāḥ
c devapatnyo devakanyā devamātara eva ca
a manvantarāṇi gāvaś ca candramāḥ savitā hariḥ
c sāvitrī brahmavidyā ca ṛtavo vatsarāḥ kṣapāḥ
a kṣaṇā lavā muhūrtāś ca nimeṣā yugaparyayāḥ
c rakṣantu sarvatra gataṃ tvāṃ yādava sukhāvaham
e ariṣṭaṃ gaccha panthānam apramatto bhavānagha
a evaṃ kṛtasvastyayanas tayāhaṃ
tām abhyanujñāya kapīndraputrīm
c pituḥ samīpe narasattamasya
mātuś ca rājñaś ca tathāhukasya
a tam artham āvedya yad abravīn māṃ
vidyādharendrasya sutā bhṛśārtā
c tān abhyanujñāya tadātiduḥkhād
gadaṃ tathaivātibalaṃ ca rāmam
d athocatuḥ prītiyutau tadānīṃ
d tapaḥsamṛddhir bhavato 'stv avighnam
a prāpyānujñāṃ gurujanād ahaṃ tārkṣyam acintayam
c so 'vahad dhimavantaṃ māṃ prāpya cainaṃ vyasarjayam
d prāpyānujñāṃ gurumukhād ājamīḍha
d tārkṣyaṃ tadā manasā cintayitvā
d kṛtvā praṇāmaṃ śirasā bhavāya
d tato 'bhyagāṃ prāg udīcīṃ suramyām
d tato mayā hy anusṛṣṭaḥ khagendro
d vitatya pakṣau divam utpapāta
d tasmin gate vainateye 'ntarikṣaṃ
d girau tadā sarvakāmopapanne
d puṣpaiḥ phalaiḥ susamiddhair yathāvat
d sthitaḥ prahṛṣṭo bhavabhāvabhāvitaḥ
d tataḥ kṛtasvastyayanas tayāhaṃ
d nivedya mātuś ca pituḥ samīpe
d tathābhyanujñāya gurūṃś ca sarvān
d mahābalaṃ tārkṣyam acintayaṃ vai
d so 'haṃ himavataḥ pārśvaṃ prāpya tārkṣyaṃ vyasarjayam
a tatrāham adbhutān bhāvān apaśyaṃ girisattame
c kṣetraṃ ca tapasāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ paśyāmy āśramam uttamam
a divyaṃ vaiyāghrapadyasya upamanyor mahātmanaḥ
c pūjitaṃ devagandharvair brāhmyā lakṣmyā samanvitam
a dhavakakubhakadambanārikelaiḥ
kurabakaketakajambupāṭalābhiḥ
c vaṭavaruṇakavatsanābhabilvaiḥ
saralakapitthapriyālasālatālaiḥ
a badarīkundapunnāgair aśokāmrātimuktakaiḥ
c bhallātakair madhūkaiś ca campakaiḥ panasais tathā
a vanyair bahuvidhair vṛkṣaiḥ phalapuṣpapradair yutam
c puṣpagulmalatākīrṇaṃ kadalīṣaṇḍaśobhitam
a nānāśakunisaṃbhojyaiḥ phalair vṛkṣair alaṃkṛtam
c yathāsthānavinikṣiptair bhūṣitaṃ vanarājibhiḥ
d nityapuṣpaphalopetair vṛkṣair aviralair vṛtam
d supuṣpaiś ca latāgulmair nirbhayaiś ca mṛgair yutam
d viśālaiś cāgniśaraṇair yathāsthānāhitāgnibhiḥ
a ruruvāraṇaśārdūlasiṃhadvīpisamākulam
c kuraṅgabarhiṇākīrṇaṃ mārjārabhujagāvṛtam
e pūgaiś ca mṛgajātīnāṃ mahiṣarkṣaniṣevitam
f sakṛtprabhinnaiś ca gajair vibhūṣitaṃ
f prahṛṣṭanānāvidhapakṣisevitam
f supuṣpitair ambudharaprakāśair
f mahīruhāṇāṃ ca vanair vicitraiḥ
a nānāpuṣparajomiśro gajadānādhivāsitaḥ
c divyastrīgītabahulo māruto 'tra sukho vavau
a dhārāninādair vihagapraṇādaiḥ
śubhais tathā bṛṃhitaiḥ kuñjarāṇām
c gītais tathā kiṃnarāṇām udāraiḥ
śubhaiḥ svanaiḥ sāmagānāṃ ca vīra
a acintyaṃ manasāpy anyaiḥ sarobhiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
c viśālaiś cāgniśaraṇair bhūṣitaṃ kuśasaṃvṛtam
a vibhūṣitaṃ puṇyapavitratoyayā
sadā ca juṣṭaṃ nṛpa jahnukanyayā
c mahātmabhir dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhair
maharṣibhir bhūṣitam agnikalpaiḥ
a vāyvāhārair ambupair japyanityaiḥ
saṃprakṣālair yatibhir dhyānanityaiḥ
c dhūmāśanair ūṣmapaiḥ kṣīrapaiś ca
vibhūṣitaṃ brāhmaṇendraiḥ samantāt
d nānāvṛndair vedaṣaḍaṅgapāragair
d dharmābhirāmair munibhiḥ samāhitaiḥ
a gocāriṇo 'thāśmakuṭṭā dantolūkhalinas tathā
c marīcipāḥ phenapāś ca tathaiva mṛgacāriṇaḥ
d aśvatthaphalabhakṣāś ca tathā hy udakaśāyinaḥ
d cīracarmāmbaradharās tathā valkaladhāriṇaḥ
a suduḥkhān niyamāṃs tāṃs tān vahataḥ sutaponvitān
c paśyann utphullanayanaḥ praveṣṭum upacakrame
a supūjitaṃ devagaṇair mahātmabhiḥ
śivādibhir bhārata puṇyakarmabhiḥ
c rarāja tac cāśramamaṇḍalaṃ sadā
divīva rājan ravimaṇḍalaṃ yathā
a krīḍanti sarpair nakulā mṛgair vyāghrāś ca mitravat
c prabhāvād dīptatapasaḥ saṃnikarṣaguṇānvitāḥ
a tatrāśramapade śreṣṭhe sarvabhūtamanorame
c sevite dvijaśārdūlair vedavedāṅgapāragaiḥ
a nānāniyamavikhyātair ṛṣibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
c praviśann eva cāpaśyaṃ jaṭācīradharaṃ prabhum
a tejasā tapasā caiva dīpyamānaṃ yathānalam
c śiṣyamadhyagataṃ śāntaṃ yuvānaṃ brāhmaṇarṣabham
e śirasā vandamānaṃ mām upamanyur abhāṣata
a svāgataṃ puṇḍarīkākṣa saphalāni tapāṃsi naḥ
c yat pūjyaḥ pūjayasi no draṣṭavyo draṣṭum icchasi
d manuṣyatānuvṛttyā tvāṃ jñātvā tiṣṭhāma sarvagam
a tam ahaṃ prāñjalir bhūtvā mṛgapakṣiṣv athāgniṣu
c dharme ca śiṣyavarge ca samapṛccham anāmayam
a tato māṃ bhagavān āha sāmnā paramavalgunā
c lapsyase tanayaṃ kṛṣṇa ātmatulyam asaṃśayam
a tapaḥ sumahad āsthāya toṣayeśānam īśvaram
c iha devaḥ sapatnīkaḥ samākrīḍaty adhokṣaja
a ihaiva devatāśreṣṭhaṃ devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ purā
c tapasā brahmacaryeṇa satyena ca damena ca
e toṣayitvā śubhān kāmān prāpnuvaṃs te janārdana
a tejasāṃ tapasāṃ caiva nidhiḥ sa bhagavān iha
c śubhāśubhānvitān bhāvān visṛjan saṃkṣipann api
e āste devyā sahācintyo yaṃ prārthayasi śatruhan
a hiraṇyakaśipur yo 'bhūd dānavo merukampanaḥ
c tena sarvāmaraiśvaryaṃ śarvāt prāptaṃ samārbudam
a tasyaiva putrapravaro mandaro nāma viśrutaḥ
c mahādevavarāc chakraṃ varṣārbudam ayodhayat
a viṣṇoś cakraṃ ca tad ghoraṃ vajram ākhaṇḍalasya ca
c śīrṇaṃ purābhavat tāta grahasyāṅgeṣu keśava
d yat tad bhagavatā pūrvaṃ dattaṃ cakraṃ tavānagha
d jalāntaracaraṃ hatvā daityaṃ ca balagarvitam
d utpāditaṃ vṛṣāṅkena dīptajvalanasaṃnibham
d dattaṃ bhagavatā tubhyaṃ durdarśaṃ tejasādbhutam
d na śakyaṃ draṣṭum anyena varjayitvā pinākinam
d sudarśanaṃ bhavety evaṃ bhavenoktaṃ tadā tu tat
d sudarśanaṃ tadā tasya loke nāma pratiṣṭhitam
d taj jīrṇam abhavat tāta grahasyāṅgeṣu keśava
d grahasyātibalasyāṅge varadattasya dhīmataḥ
d na śastrāṇi vahanty aṅge cakravajraśatāny api
d sadṛśaṃ bhavatety uktaṃ darśanena tathāstu tat
a ardyamānāś ca vibudhā graheṇa subalīyasā
c śivadattavarāñ jaghnur asurendrān surā bhṛśam
a tuṣṭo vidyutprabhasyāpi trilokeśvaratām adāt
c śataṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ sarvalokeśvaro 'bhavat
e mamaivānucaro nityaṃ bhavitāsīti cābravīt
a tathā putrasahasrāṇām ayutaṃ ca dadau prabhuḥ
c kuśadvīpaṃ ca sa dadau rājyena bhagavān ajaḥ
a tathā śatamukho nāma dhātrā sṛṣṭo mahāsuraḥ
c yena varṣaśataṃ sāgram ātmamāṃsair huto 'nalaḥ
e taṃ prāha bhagavāṃs tuṣṭaḥ kiṃ karomīti śaṃkaraḥ
a taṃ vai śatamukhaḥ prāha yogo bhavatu me 'dbhutaḥ
c balaṃ ca daivataśreṣṭha śāśvataṃ saṃprayaccha me
d tatheti bhagavān āha tasya tad vacanaṃ vibhuḥ
a svāyaṃbhuvaḥ kratuś cāpi putrārtham abhavat purā
c āviśya yogenātmānaṃ trīṇi varṣaśatāny api
a tasya devo 'dadat putrān sahasraṃ kratusaṃmitān
c yogeśvaraṃ devagītaṃ vettha kṛṣṇa na saṃśayaḥ
d yājñavalkya iti khyāta ṛṣiḥ paramadhārmikaḥ
d ārādhya sa mahādevaṃ prāptavāñ jñānam uttamam
d vedavyāsaś ca yogātmā parāśarasuto muniḥ
d so 'pi śaṃkaram ārādhya prāptavān atulaṃ yaśaḥ
a vālakhilyā maghavatā avajñātāḥ purā kila
c taiḥ kruddhair bhagavān rudras tapasā toṣito hy abhūt
a tāṃś cāpi daivataśreṣṭhaḥ prāha prīto jagatpatiḥ
c suparṇaṃ somahartāraṃ tapasotpādayiṣyatha
d atrer bhāryā sutaṃ dattaṃ somaṃ durvāsasaṃ prabhoḥ
a mahādevasya roṣāc ca āpo naṣṭāḥ purābhavan
c tāś ca saptakapālena devair anyāḥ pravartitāḥ
d tataḥ pānīyam abhavat prasanne tryambake bhuvi
a atrer bhāryāpi bhartāraṃ saṃtyajya brahmavādinī
c nāhaṃ tasya muner bhūyo vaśagā syāṃ kathaṃ cana
e ity uktvā sā mahādevam agacchac charaṇaṃ kila
a nirāhārā bhayād atres trīṇi varṣaśatāny api
c aśeta musaleṣv eva prasādārthaṃ bhavasya sā
a tām abravīd dhasan devo bhavitā vai sutas tava
b vinā bhartrā carudreṇa bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
b vikarṇaś ca mahādevaṃ tathā bhaktasukhāvaham
b prasādya bhagavān siddhiṃ prāptavān madhusūdana
c vaṃśe tavaiva nāmnā tu khyātiṃ yāsyati cepsitām
a śākalyaḥ saṃśitātmā vai nava varṣaśatāny api
c ārādhayām āsa bhavaṃ manoyajñena keśava
a taṃ cāha bhagavāṃs tuṣṭo granthakāro bhaviṣyasi
c vatsākṣayā ca te kīrtis trailokye vai bhaviṣyati
e akṣayaṃ ca kulaṃ te 'stu maharṣibhir alaṃkṛtam
f bhaviṣyati dvijaśreṣṭha sūtrakartā sutas tava
a sāvarṇiś cāpi vikhyāta ṛṣir āsīt kṛte yuge
c iha tena tapas taptaṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣaśatāny atha
a tam āha bhagavān rudraḥ sākṣāt tuṣṭo 'smi te 'nagha
c granthakṛl lokavikhyāto bhavitāsy ajarāmaraḥ
d śakreṇa tu purā devo vārāṇasyāṃ janārdana
d ārādhito 'bhūd bhaktena digvāsā bhasmaguṇṭhanaḥ
d ārādhya sa mahādevaṃ devarājyam avāptavān
d nāradena tu bhaktyāsau bhava ārādhitaḥ purā
d tasya prīto mahādevo jagau devagurur guruḥ
d tejasā tapasā kīrtyā tvatsamo na bhaviṣyati
d gītenaiva ca divyena nityaṃ mām anuyāsyasi
d śākalyo granthakartā ca sāvarṇiś ca tathābhavat
d bāṇaḥ skandasamatvaṃ ca kāmo darpavimokṣaṇam
d lavaṇo 'vadhyatām anyair daśāsyaś ca punar balam
d antako 'ntam anuprāptas tasmāt ko 'nyo 'paraḥ prabhuḥ
a mayāpi ca yathā dṛṣṭo devadevaḥ purā vibhuḥ
c sākṣāt paśupatis tāta tac cāpi śṛṇu mādhava
a yadarthaṃ ca mahādevaḥ prayatena mayā purā
c ārādhito mahātejās tac cāpi śṛṇu vistaram
c mahādevo mayā prabhuḥ
c yatnena mahatā cāpi
a yad avāptaṃ ca me pūrvaṃ devadevān maheśvarāt
c tat sarvam akhilenādya kathayiṣyāmi te 'nagha
a purā kṛtayuge tāta ṛṣir āsīn mahāyaśāḥ
c vyāghrapāda iti khyāto vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ
e tasyāham abhavaṃ putro dhaumyaś cāpi mamānujaḥ
a kasya cit tv atha kālasya dhaumyena saha mādhava
c āgaccham āśramaṃ krīḍan munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām
a tatrāpi ca mayā dṛṣṭā duhyamānā payasvinī
c lakṣitaṃ ca mayā kṣīraṃ svāduto hy amṛtopamam
d tadāprabhṛti caivāham arudaṃ madhusūdana
d dīyatāṃ dīyatāṃ kṣīraṃ mama mātar itīritam
a tataḥ piṣṭaṃ samāloḍya toyena saha mādhava
c āvayoḥ kṣīram ity eva pānārtham upanīyate
a atha gavyaṃ payas tāta kadā cit prāśitaṃ mayā
b pitrāhaṃ yajñakāle hi nīto jñātikulaṃ mahat
b tatra sā kṣarate devī divyā gauḥ suranandinī
b tasyāhaṃ tat payaḥ pītvā rasena hy amṛtopamam
b jñātvā kṣīraguṇāṃś caiva upalabhya hi saṃbhavam
c tataḥ piṣṭarasaṃ tāta na me prītim udāvahat
a tato 'ham abruvaṃ bālyāj jananīm ātmanas tadā
c kṣīrodanasamāyuktaṃ bhojanaṃ ca prayaccha me
d nedaṃ kṣīraudanaṃ mātar yat tvaṃ me dattavaty asi
d abhāvāc caiva dugdhasya duḥkhitā jananī tadā
a tato mām abravīn mātā duḥkhaśokasamanvitā
c putrasnehāt pariṣvajya mūrdhni cāghrāya mādhava
a kutaḥ kṣīrodanaṃ vatsa munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām
c vane nivasatāṃ nityaṃ kandamūlaphalāśinām
d āsthitānāṃ nadīṃ divyāṃ vālakhilyair niṣevitām
d kutaḥ kṣīraṃ vanasthānāṃ munīnāṃ girivāsinām
d pāvanānāṃ vanāśānāṃ vanāśramanivāsinām
d grāmyāhāranivṛttānām āraṇyaphalabhojinām
d nāsti putra payo 'raṇye surabhīgotravarjite
d nadīgahvaraśaileṣu tīrtheṣu vividheṣu ca
d tapasā japyanityānāṃ śivo naḥ paramā gatiḥ
a aprasādya virūpākṣaṃ varadaṃ sthāṇum avyayam
c kutaḥ kṣīrodanaṃ vatsa sukhāni vasanāni ca
d sarvakāraṇabhūto 'yaṃ dhātā rudras trilocanaḥ
d aṣṭabāhur jaṭī nāgabhūṣaṇaś candraśekharaḥ
d nāgopavītī sagaṇo nīlakaṇṭha umāpatiḥ
d sudaṃṣṭraḥ susmito nāgakuṇḍalo bhasmabhāsitaḥ
d sarvakāmaprado bhaktyā pūjitaḥ puṣpamūlakaiḥ
a taṃ prapadya sadā vatsa sarvabhāvena śaṃkaram
b bhaktyā pratyakṣatāṃ nītaḥ sarvakāmaprado haraḥ
c tatprasādāc ca kāmebhyaḥ phalaṃ prāpsyasi putraka
d jananyās tad vacaḥ śrutvā tadāprabhṛti śatruhan
d prāñjaliḥ praṇato bhūtvā idam ambām acodayam
d ko 'yam amba mahādevaḥ sa kathaṃ ca prasīdati
d kutra vā vasate devo draṣṭavyo vā kathaṃ ca saḥ
d tuṣyate vā kathaṃ śarvo rūpaṃ vā tasya kīdṛśam
d kathaṃ jñeyaḥ prasanno vā darśayej jananī mama
d evam uktā tadā kṛṣṇa mātā me sutavatsalā
d mūrdhany āghrāya govinda sabāṣpākulalocanā
d pramārjantī ca gātrāṇi mama vai madhusūdana
d ambā
d dhairyam ālambya jananī idam āha surottama
d durvijñeyo mahādevo durārādhyo durantakaḥ
d durādhṛṣyaś ca durgrāhyo durdṛśyo hy akṛtātmabhiḥ
d yasya rūpāṇy anekāni pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ
d sthānāni ca vicitrāṇi prasādāś cāpy anekaśaḥ
d ko hi tattvena tad veda īśasya caritaṃ śubham
d kṛtavān yāni rūpāṇi devadevaḥ purā kila
d krīḍate ca yathā śarvaḥ prasīdati yathā ca vai
d hṛdisthaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ viśvarūpo maheśvaraḥ
d bhaktānām anukampārthaṃ darśanaṃ ca yathāśrutam
d munīnāṃ bruvatāṃ divyām īśānacaritāṃ kathām
d kṛtavān yāni rūpāṇi kathitāni divaukasaiḥ
d anugrahārthaṃ viprāṇāṃ śṛṇu vatsa samāsataḥ
d tāni te kīrtayiṣyāmi yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
d brahmaviṣṇusurendrāṇāṃ rudrādityāśvinām api
d viśveṣām api devānāṃ vapur dhārayate bhavaḥ
d narāṇāṃ devanārīṇāṃ tathā pretapiśācayoḥ
d kirātaśabarāṇāṃ ca jalajānām anekaśaḥ
d karoti bhagavān rūpam āṭavyaśabarāṇy api
d kūrmo matsyas tathā śaṅkhaḥ pravālāṅkurabhūṣaṇaḥ
d yakṣarākṣasasarpāṇāṃ daityadānavayor api
d vapur dhārayate devo bhūyaś ca bilavāsinām
d vyāghrasiṃhamṛgāṇāṃ ca tarakṣvṛkṣapatatriṇām
d ulūkaśvaśṛgālānāṃ rūpāṇi kurute 'pi ca
d haṃsakākamayūrāṇāṃ kṛkalāsakasārasām
d rūpāṇi ca balākānāṃ gṛdhracakrāṅgayor api
d karoti vā sa rūpāṇi dhārayaty api parvatam
d gorūpī ca mahādevo hastyaśvoṣṭrakharākṛtiḥ
d chāgaśārdūlarūpaś ca anekamṛgarūpadhṛk
d aṇḍajānāṃ ca divyānāṃ vapur dhārayate bhavaḥ
d daṇḍī chatrī ca kuṇḍī ca dvijānāṃ dhāraṇas tathā
d ṣaṇmukho vai bahumukhas trinetro bahuśīrṣakaḥ
d anekakaṭipādaś ca anekodaravaktradhṛk
d anekapāṇipārśvaś ca anekagaṇasaṃvṛtaḥ
d ṛṣigandharvarūpaś ca siddhacāraṇarūpadhṛk
d bhasmapāṇḍuragātraś ca candrārdhakṛtabhūṣaṇaḥ
d anekarāvasaṃghuṣṭaś cānekastutisaṃstutaḥ
d sarvabhūtāntakaḥ sarvaḥ sarvalokapratiṣṭhitaḥ
d sarvalokāntarātmā ca sarvagaḥ sarvavādy api
d sarvatra bhagavāñ jñeyo hṛdisthaḥ sarvadehinām
d yo hi yaṃ kāmayet kāmaṃ yasminn arthe 'rcyate punaḥ
d tat sarvaṃ vetti deveśas taṃ prapadya yadīcchasi
d nandate kupyate cāpi tathā huṃkārayaty api
d cakrī śūlī gadāpāṇir musalī khaḍgapaṭṭiśī
d bhūdharo nāgamauñjī ca nāgakuṇḍalakuṇḍalī
d nāgayajñopavītī ca nāgacarmottaracchadaḥ
d hasate gāyate caiva nṛtyate sumanoharam
d vādayaty api vādyāni vicitrāṇi gaṇair vṛtaḥ
d valgate jṛmbhate caiva rudate rodayaty api
d unmattamattarūpaṃ ca bhāṣate cāpi susvaraḥ
d atīva hasate raudras trāsayan nayanair janam
d jāgarti caiva svapiti jṛmbhate ca yathāsukham
d japate japyate caiva tapate tapyate punaḥ
d dadāti pratigṛhṇāti yuñjate dhyāyate 'pi ca
d vedīmadhye tathā yūpe goṣṭhamadhye hutāśane
d dṛśyate dṛśyate cāpi bālo vṛddho yuvā tathā
d krīḍate ṛṣikanyābhir ṛṣipatnībhir eva ca
d ūrdhvakeśo mahāśepho nagno vikṛtalocanaḥ
d gauraḥ śyāmas tathā kṛṣṇaḥ pāṇḍuro dhūmalohitaḥ
d vikṛtākṣo viśālākṣo digvāsāḥ sarvavāsakaḥ
d arūpasyādyarūpasya atirūpādyarūpiṇaḥ
d anādyantam ajasyāntaṃ vetsyate ko 'sya tattvataḥ
d hṛdi prāṇo mano jīvo yogātmā yogasaṃjñitaḥ
d dhyānaṃ tat paramātmā ca bhāvagrāhyo maheśvaraḥ
d vādako gāyanaś caiva sahasraśatalocanaḥ
d ekavaktro dvivaktraś ca trivaktro 'nekavaktrakaḥ
d tadbhaktas tadgato nityaṃ tanniṣṭhas tatparāyaṇaḥ
d bhaja putra mahādevaṃ tataḥ prāpsyasi cepsitam
a jananyās tad vacaḥ śrutvā tadāprabhṛti śatruhan
c mama bhaktir mahādeve naiṣṭhikī samapadyata
a tato 'haṃ tapa āsthāya toṣayām āsa śaṃkaram
c divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu pādāṅguṣṭhāgraviṣṭhitaḥ
a ekaṃ varṣaśataṃ caiva phalāhāras tadābhavam
c dvitīyaṃ śīrṇaparṇāśī tṛtīyaṃ cāmbubhojanaḥ
e śatāni sapta caivāhaṃ vāyubhakṣas tadābhavam
f evaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu divyam ārādhito mayā
a tataḥ prīto mahādevaḥ sarvalokeśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
b ekabhakta iti jñātvā jijñāsāṃ kurute tadā
