c śakrarūpaṃ sa kṛtvā tu sarvair devagaṇair vṛtaḥ
e sahasrākṣas tadā bhūtvā vajrapāṇir mahāyaśāḥ
a sudhāvadātaṃ raktākṣaṃ stabdhakarṇaṃ madotkaṭam
c āveṣṭitakaraṃ raudraṃ caturdaṃṣṭraṃ mahāgajam
a samāsthitaś ca bhagavān dīpyamānaḥ svatejasā
c ājagāma kirīṭī tu hārakeyūrabhūṣitaḥ
a pāṇḍureṇātapatreṇa dhriyamāṇena mūrdhani
c sevyamāno 'psarobhiś ca divyagandharvanāditaḥ
a tato mām āha devendraḥ prītas te 'haṃ dvijottama
c varaṃ vṛṇīṣva mattas tvaṃ yat te manasi vartate
a śakrasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā nāhaṃ prītamanābhavam
c abruvaṃ ca tadā kṛṣṇa devarājam idaṃ vacaḥ
d ahaṃ tam abruvaṃ tāta devendraṃ madhusūdana
a nāhaṃ tvatto varaṃ kāṅkṣe nānyasmād api daivatāt
c mahādevād ṛte saumya satyam etad bravīmi te
d satyaṃ satyaṃ hi naḥ śakra vākyam etat suniścitam
d na yan maheśvaraṃ muktvā kathānyā mama rocate
d satyaṃ kauśika saṃsārān mā mamāstu vinirvṛtiḥ
d adya maheśvarabaddhā kathā mamānyā priyā śrotum
a paśupativacanād bhavāmi sadyaḥ
kṛmir atha vā tarur apy anekaśākhaḥ
c apaśupativaraprasādajā me
tribhuvanarājyavibhūtir apy aniṣṭā
d janma śvapākamadhye 'pi me 'stu haracaraṇavandanaratasya
d mā vānīśvarabhakto bhavāmi bhavane 'pi śakrasya
d vāyvambubhujo 'pi sato narasya duḥkhakṣayaḥ kutas tasya
d bhavati hi surāsuragurau yasya na viśveśvare bhaktiḥ
d alam anyābhis teṣāṃ kathābhir atyarthadharmayuktābhiḥ
d yeṣāṃ na kṣaṇam api rucito haracaraṇasmaraṇavicchedaḥ
d haracaraṇaniratamatinā bhavitavyam anārjavaṃ yugaṃ prāpya
d saṃsārabhayaṃ na bhavati harabhaktirasāyanaṃ pītvā
d divasaṃ divasārdhaṃ vā muhūrtaṃ vā kṣaṇaṃ lavam
d na hy alabdhaprasādasya bhaktir bhavati śaṃkare
a api kīṭaḥ pataṃgo vā bhaveyaṃ śaṃkarājñayā
c na tu śakra tvayā dattaṃ trailokyam api kāmaye
d śvāpi maheśvaravacanād bhavāmi sa hi naḥ paraḥ kāmaḥ
d tridaśagaṇarājyam api khalu necchāmy amaheśvarājñaptam
d na nākapṛṣṭhaṃ na ca devarājyaṃ
d na brahmalokaṃ na ca niṣkalatvam
d na sarvakāmān akhilān vṛṇomi
d harasya dāsatvam ahaṃ vṛṇomi
a yāvac chaśāṅkaśakalāmalabaddhamaulir
na prīyate paśupatir bhagavān mameśaḥ
c tāvaj jarāmaraṇajanmaśatābhighātair
duḥkhāni dehavihitāni samudvahāmi
a divasakaraśaśāṅkavahnidīptaṃ
tribhuvanasāram apāram ādyam ekam
c ajaram amaram aprasādya rudraṃ
jagati pumān iha ko labheta śāntim
d yadi nāma janma bhūyo bhavati madīyaiḥ punar doṣaiḥ
d tasmiṃs tasmiñ janmani bhave bhaven me 'kṣayā bhaktiḥ
d dhik teṣāṃ dhik teṣāṃ punar api dhig astu dhik teṣām
d yeṣāṃ na vasati hṛdaye kupathagativimokṣako rudraḥ
 śakra uvāca
a kaḥ punas tava hetur vai īśe kāraṇakāraṇe
c yena devād ṛte 'nyasmāt prasādaṃ nābhikāṅkṣasi
d upamanyuḥ
d sad asad vyaktam avyaktaṃ yam āhur brahmavādinaḥ
d nityam ekam anekaṃ ca varaṃ tasmād vṛṇomy aham
d anādimadhyaparyantaṃ jñānaiśvaryam acintitam
d ātmānaṃ paramaṃ yasmād varaṃ tasmād vṛṇīmahe
d aiśvaryaṃ sakalaṃ yasmād anutpāditam avyayam
d abījād bījasaṃbhūtaṃ varaṃ tasmād vṛṇīmahe
d tamasaḥ paramaṃ jyotis tapas tadvṛttināṃ param
d yaṃ jñātvā nānuśocanti varaṃ tasmād vṛṇīmahe
d bhūtabhāvanabhāvajñaṃ sarvabhūtābhibhāvanam
d sarvagaṃ sarvadaṃ devaṃ pūjayāmi puraṃdara
d hetuvādair vinirmuktaṃ sāṃkhyayogārthadaṃ param
d yam upāsanti tattvajñā varaṃ tasmād vṛṇīmahe
d maghavan maghavātmānaṃ yaṃ vadanti sureśvaram
d sarvabhūtaguruṃ devaṃ varaṃ tasmād vṛṇīmahe
d yaḥ pūrvam asṛjad devaṃ brahmāṇaṃ lokabhāvanam
d aṇḍam ākāśam āpūrya varaṃ tasmād vṛṇīmahe
d agnir āpo 'nilaḥ pṛthvī khaṃ buddhiś ca mano mahān
d sraṣṭā caiṣāṃ bhaved yo 'nyo brūhi kaḥ parameśvarāt
d mano matir ahaṃkāras tanmātrāṇīndriyāṇi ca
d brūhi caiṣāṃ bhavec chakra ko 'nyo 'sti paramaḥ śivāt
d sraṣṭāraṃ bhuvanasyeha vadantīha pitāmaham
d ārādhya sa tu deveśam aśnute mahatīṃ śriyam
d bhagavaty uttamaiśvaryaṃ brahmaviṣṇupurogamam
d vidyate vai mahādevād brūhi kaḥ parameśvarāt
d daityadānavamukhyānām ādhipatyārimardanāt
d ko 'nyaḥ śaknoti deveśād ṛte saṃpādituṃ sutān
d dikkālasūryatejāṃsi grahavāyvindutārakāḥ
d viddhi tv ete mahādevād brūhi kaḥ parameśvarāt
d athotpattivināśe vā yajñasya tripurasya vā
d daityadānavamukhyānām ādhipatyārimardanaḥ
d kiṃ cātra bahubhiḥ sūktair hetuvādaiḥ puraṃdara
d sahasranayanaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvām eva surasattama
d pūjitaṃ siddhagandharvair devaiś ca ṛṣibhis tathā
d devadevaprasādena tat sarvaṃ kuśikottama
d avyaktamuktakeśāya sarvagasyedam ātmakam
d cetanācetanādyeṣu śakra viddhi maheśvarāt
d bhuvādyeṣu mahānteṣu lokālokāntareṣu ca
d dvīpasthāneṣu meroś ca vibhaveṣv antareṣu ca
d bhagavan maghavan devaṃ vadante tattvadarśinaḥ
d yadi devāḥ surāḥ śakra paśyanty anyāṃ bhavākṛtim
d kiṃ na gacchanti śaraṇaṃ marditāś cāsuraiḥ surāḥ
d abhighāteṣu devānāṃ sayakṣoragarakṣasām
d parasparavināśeṣu svasthānaiśvaryado bhavaḥ
d andhakasyātha śumbhasya duṃdubher mahiṣasya ca
d yakṣendrabalarakṣaḥsu nivātakavaceṣu ca
d varadānāvaghātāya brūhi ko 'nyo maheśvarāt
d surāsuraguror vaktre kasya retaḥ purā hutam
d kasya vānyasya retas tad yena haimo giriḥ kṛtaḥ
d digvāsāḥ kīrtyate ko 'nyo loke kaś cordhvaretasaḥ
d kasya cārdhe sthitā kāntā anaṅgaḥ kena nirjitaḥ
d brūhīndra paramaṃ sthānaṃ kasya devaiḥ praśasyate
d śmaśāne kasya krīḍārthaṃ nṛtye vā ko 'bhibhāṣyate
d kasyaiśvaryaṃ samānaṃ vā bhūtaiḥ ko vāpi krīḍate
d kasya tulyabalā devagaṇā aiśvaryadarpitāḥ
d ghuṣyate hy acalaṃ sthānaṃ kasya trailokyapūjitam
d varṣate tapate ko 'nyo jvalate tejasā ca kaḥ
d kasmād oṣadhisaṃpattiḥ ko vā dhārayate vasu
d prakāmaṃ krīḍate ko vā trailokye sacarācare
d jñānasiddhikriyāyogaiḥ sevyamānaś ca yogibhiḥ
d ṛṣigandharvasiddhaiś ca vihitaṃ kāraṇaṃ param
d karmayajñakriyāyogaiḥ sevyamānaḥ surāsuraiḥ
d nityaṃ karmaphalair hīnaṃ tam ahaṃ kāraṇaṃ vade
d sthūlaṃ sūkṣmam anaupamyam agrāhyaṃ guṇagocaram
d guṇahīnaṃ guṇādhyakṣaṃ paraṃ māheśvaraṃ padam
d viśveśaṃ kāraṇaguruṃ lokālokāntakāraṇam
d bhūtābhūtabhaviṣyac ca janakaṃ sarvakāraṇam
d akṣarākṣaram avyaktaṃ vidyāvidye kṛtākṛte
d dharmādharmau yataḥ śakra tam ahaṃ kāraṇaṃ vade
d pratyakṣam iha devendra paśya liṅgaṃ bhagāṅkitam
d devadevena rudreṇa sṛṣṭisaṃhārahetunā
d mātrā pūrvaṃ mamākhyātaṃ kāraṇaṃ lokakāraṇam
d nāsti ceśāt paraṃ śakra taṃ prapadya yadīcchasi
d pratyakṣaṃ nanu te sureśa viditaṃ saṃyogaliṅgodbhavaṃ
d trailokyaṃ savikāranirguṇagaṇaṃ brahmādiretodbhavam
d yad brahmendramahendraviṣṇusahitā devāś ca daityāsurā
d nānyaṃ kāmasahasrakalpitadhiyaḥ śaṃsanti īśāt param
d taṃ devaṃ sacarācarasya jagato vyākhyātavedyottamaṃ
d kāmārthī varayāmi saṃyatamanā mokṣāya śarvaṃ śivam
 upamanyur uvāca
a hetubhir vā kim anyais te īśaḥ kāraṇakāraṇam
c na śuśruma yad anyasya liṅgam abhyarcyate suraiḥ
a kasyānyasya suraiḥ sarvair liṅgaṃ muktvā maheśvaram
c arcyate 'rcitapūrvaṃ vā brūhi yady asti te śrutiḥ
a yasya brahmā ca viṣṇuś ca tvaṃ cāpi saha daivataiḥ
c arcayadhvaṃ sadā liṅgaṃ tasmāc chreṣṭhatamo hi saḥ
d na padmāṅkā na cakrāṅkā na vajrāṅkā yataḥ prajāḥ
d liṅgāṅkā ca bhagāṅkā ca tasmān māheśvarī prajā
d devyāḥ kāraṇarūpabhāvajanitāḥ sarvā bhagāṅkāḥ striyo
d liṅgenāpi harasya sarvapuruṣāḥ pratyakṣacihnīkṛtāḥ
d yo 'nyat kāraṇam īśvarāt pravadate devyā ca yan nāṅkitaṃ
d trailokye sacarācare sa tu pumān bāhyo bhaved durmatiḥ
d puṃliṅgaṃ sarvam īśānaṃ strīliṅgaṃ viddhi cāpy umām
d dvābhyāṃ tanubhyāṃ vyāptaṃ hi carācaram idaṃ jagat
a tasmād varam ahaṃ kāṅkṣe nidhanaṃ vāpi kauśika
c gaccha vā tiṣṭha vā śakra yatheṣṭaṃ balasūdana
a kāmam eṣa varo me 'stu śāpo vāpi maheśvarāt
c na cānyāṃ devatāṃ kāṅkṣe sarvakāmaphalāny api
a evam uktvā tu devendraṃ duḥkhād ākulitendriyaḥ
c na prasīdati me rudraḥ kim etad iti cintayan
e athāpaśyaṃ kṣaṇenaiva tam evairāvataṃ punaḥ
a haṃsakundendusadṛśaṃ mṛṇālakumudaprabham
c vṛṣarūpadharaṃ sākṣāt kṣīrodam iva sāgaram
a kṛṣṇapucchaṃ mahākāyaṃ madhupiṅgalalocanam
b vajrasāramayaiḥ śṛṅgair niṣṭaptakanakaprabhaiḥ
b tīkṣṇair amṛduraktāgrair utkirantam ivāvanim
c jāmbūnadena dāmnā ca sarvataḥ samalaṃkṛtam
a raktākṣaṃ sumahānāsaṃ sukarṇaṃ sukaṭītaṭam
c supārśvaṃ vipulaskandhaṃ surūpaṃ cārudarśanam
a kakudaṃ tasya cābhāti skandham āpūrya viṣṭhitam
c tuṣāragirikūṭābhaṃ sitābhraśikharopamam
a tam āsthitaś ca bhagavān devadevaḥ sahomayā
c aśobhata mahādevaḥ paurṇamāsyām ivoḍurāṭ
d kirīṭaṃ ca jaṭābhāraḥ sarpādyābharaṇāni ca
d vajrādiśūlamātaṅgagambhīrasmitam āgatam
a tasya tejobhavo vahniḥ sameghaḥ stanayitnumān
c sahasram iva sūryāṇāṃ sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati
a īśvaraḥ sumahātejāḥ saṃvartaka ivānalaḥ
c yugānte sarvabhūtāni didhakṣur iva codyataḥ
a tejasā tu tadā vyāpte durnirīkṣye samantataḥ
c punar udvignahṛdayaḥ kim etad iti cintayam
a muhūrtam iva tat tejo vyāpya sarvā diśo daśa
c praśāntaṃ ca kṣaṇenaiva devadevasya māyayā
a athāpaśyaṃ sthitaṃ sthāṇuṃ bhagavantaṃ maheśvaram
c saurabheyagataṃ saumyaṃ vidhūmam iva pāvakam
d praśāntamanasaṃ devaṃ trinetram aparājitam
e sahitaṃ cārusarvāṅgyā pārvatyā parameśvaram
a nīlakaṇṭhaṃ mahātmānam asaktaṃ tejasāṃ nidhim
c aṣṭādaśabhujaṃ sthāṇuṃ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitam
a śuklāmbaradharaṃ devaṃ śuklamālyānulepanam
c śukladhvajam anādhṛṣyaṃ śuklayajñopavītinam
a gāyadbhir nṛtyamānaiś ca utpatadbhir itas tataḥ
c vṛtaṃ pāriṣadair divyair ātmatulyaparākramaiḥ
a bālendumukuṭaṃ pāṇḍuṃ śaraccandram ivoditam
c tribhir netraiḥ kṛtoddyotaṃ tribhiḥ sūryair ivoditaiḥ
d sarvavidyādhipaṃ devaṃ śaraccandrasamaprabham
d nayanāhlādasaumyo 'ham apaśyaṃ parameśvaram
a aśobhata ca devasya mālā gātre sitaprabhe

d namo jagannivāsāya pratipattisukhāya ca

d namaḥ sarvārtināśāya namaḥ śokaharāya ca
d namo meghaninādāya bahumāyādharāya ca

d namaḥ surāsureśāya viśveśāya namo namaḥ

d īśānāya bhagaghnāya namo 'stv andhakaghātine
d namo viśvāya māyāya cintyācintyāya vai namaḥ
a tvaṃ brahmā sarvadevānāṃ rudrāṇāṃ nīlalohitaḥ
c ātmā ca sarvabhūtānāṃ sāṃkhye puruṣa ucyase
a ṛṣabhas tvaṃ pavitrāṇāṃ yogināṃ niṣkalaḥ śivaḥ
c āśramāṇāṃ gṛhasthas tvam īśvarāṇāṃ maheśvaraḥ
e kuberaḥ sarvayakṣāṇāṃ kratūnāṃ viṣṇur ucyase
a parvatānāṃ mahāmerur nakṣatrāṇāṃ ca candramāḥ
c vasiṣṭhas tvam ṛṣīṇāṃ ca grahāṇāṃ sūrya ucyase
a āraṇyānāṃ paśūnāṃ ca siṃhas tvaṃ parameśvaraḥ
c grāmyāṇāṃ govṛṣaś cāsi bhagavāṃl lokapūjitaḥ
a ādityānāṃ bhavān viṣṇur vasūnāṃ caiva pāvakaḥ
c pakṣiṇāṃ vainateyaś ca ananto bhujageṣu ca
a sāmavedaś ca vedānāṃ yajuṣāṃ śatarudriyam
c sanatkumāro yogīnāṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ kapilo hy asi
a śakro 'si marutāṃ deva pitṝṇāṃ dharmarāḍ asi
c brahmalokaś ca lokānāṃ gatīnāṃ mokṣa ucyase
a kṣīrodaḥ sāgarāṇāṃ ca śailānāṃ himavān giriḥ
c varṇānāṃ brāhmaṇaś cāsi viprāṇāṃ dīkṣito dvijaḥ

a yac cānyad api lokeṣu sattvaṃ tejodhikaṃ smṛtam
c tat sarvaṃ bhagavān eva iti me niścitā matiḥ
a namas te bhagavan deva namas te bhaktavatsala
c yogeśvara namas te 'stu namas te viśvasaṃbhava
a prasīda mama bhaktasya dīnasya kṛpaṇasya ca
c anaiśvaryeṇa yuktasya gatir bhava sanātana
a yaṃ cāparādhaṃ kṛtavān ajñānāt parameśvara

a mohitaś cāsmi deveśa tubhyaṃ rūpaviparyayāt
c tena nārghyaṃ mayā dattaṃ pādyaṃ cāpi sureśvara
a evaṃ stutvāham īśānaṃ pādyam arghyaṃ ca bhaktitaḥ
c kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā sarvaṃ tasmai nyavedayam
a tataḥ śītāmbusaṃyuktā divyagandhasamanvitā

a dundubhiś ca tato divyas tāḍito devakiṃkaraiḥ
c vavau ca mārutaḥ puṇyaḥ śucigandhaḥ sukhāvahaḥ
a tataḥ prīto mahādevaḥ sapatnīko vṛṣadhvajaḥ
c abravīt tridaśāṃs tatra harṣayann iva māṃ tadā
a paśyadhvaṃ tridaśāḥ sarve upamanyor mahātmanaḥ
c mayi bhaktiṃ parāṃ divyām ekabhāvād avasthitām
a evam uktās tataḥ kṛṣṇa surās te śūlapāṇinā
c ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve namaskṛtvā vṛṣadhvajam
a bhagavan devadeveśa lokanātha jagatpate
c labhatāṃ sarvakāmebhyaḥ phalaṃ tvatto dvijottamaḥ
a evam uktas tataḥ śarvaḥ surair brahmādibhis tathā
c āha māṃ bhagavān īśaḥ prahasann iva śaṃkaraḥ
a vatsopamanyo prīto 'smi paśya māṃ munipuṃgava
c dṛḍhabhakto 'si viprarṣe mayā jijñāsito hy asi
a anayā caiva bhaktyā te atyarthaṃ prītimān aham
c tasmāt sarvān dadāmy adya kāmāṃs tava yathepśitān
a evam uktasya caivātha mahādevena me vibho
c harṣād aśrūṇy avartanta lomaharṣaś ca jāyate
a abruvaṃ ca tadā devaṃ harṣagadgadayā girā
c jānubhyām avaniṃ gatvā praṇamya ca punaḥ punaḥ
a adya jāto hy ahaṃ deva adya me saphalaṃ tapaḥ
c yan me sākṣān mahādevaḥ prasannas tiṣṭhate 'grataḥ
d   saphalaṃ janma cādya me
d surāsuragurur devo yat tiṣṭhati mamāgrataḥ
a yaṃ na paśyanti cārādhya devā hy amitavikramam
c tam ahaṃ dṛṣṭavān devaṃ ko 'nyo dhanyataro mayā
a evaṃ dhyāyanti vidvāṃsaḥ paraṃ tattvaṃ sanātanam
c ṣaḍviṃśakam iti khyātaṃ yat parātparam akṣaram
a sa eṣa bhagavān devaḥ sarvatattvādir avyayaḥ
c sarvatattvavidhānajñaḥ pradhānapuruṣeśvaraḥ
a yo 'sṛjad dakṣiṇād aṅgād brahmāṇaṃ lokasaṃbhavam
c vāmapārśvāt tathā viṣṇuṃ lokarakṣārtham īśvaraḥ
e yugānte caiva saṃprāpte rudram aṅgāt sṛjat prabhuḥ
a sa rudraḥ saṃharan kṛtsnaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
c kālo bhūtvā mahātejāḥ saṃvartaka ivānalaḥ
d yugānte sarvabhūtāni grasann iva vyavasthitaḥ
a eṣa devo mahādevo jagat sṛṣṭvā carācaram
c kalpānte caiva sarveṣāṃ smṛtim ākṣipya tiṣṭhati
a sarvagaḥ sarvabhūtātmā sarvabhūtabhavodbhavaḥ
c āste sarvagato nityam adṛśyaḥ sarvadaivataiḥ
d abravaṃ tam ahaṃ bhūyaḥ praṇamya śirasā bhavam
a yadi deyo varo mahyaṃ yadi tuṣṭaś ca me prabhuḥ
b tatas tv aham anujñāta uktavān asmi śaṃkaram
b taṃ tvāṃ praṇamya śirasā prasādya prārthaye prabho
c bhaktir bhavatu me nityaṃ śāśvatī tvayi śaṃkara
a atītānāgataṃ caiva vartamānaṃ ca yad vibho
c jānīyām iti me buddhis tvatprasādāt surottama
a kṣīrodanaṃ ca bhuñjīyām akṣayaṃ saha bāndhavaiḥ
c āśrame ca sadā mahyaṃ sāṃnidhyaṃ param astu te
a evam uktaḥ sa māṃ prāha bhagavāṃl lokapūjitaḥ
c maheśvaro mahātejāś carācaraguruḥ prabhuḥ
a ajaraś cāmaraś caiva bhava duḥkhavivarjitaḥ
b yaśasvī tejasā yukto divyajñānasamanvitaḥ
b ṛṣīṇām abhigamyaś ca matprasādād bhaviṣyasi

b tatra tatraiva sāṃnidhyaṃ kariṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
c kṣīrodanaṃ ca bhuṅkṣva tvam amṛtena samanvitam
a bandhubhiḥ sahitaḥ kalpaṃ tato mām upayāsyasi
b akṣayā bāndhavāś caiva kulaṃ gotraṃ ca te sadā
b bhaviṣyati dvijaśreṣṭha mayi bhaktiś ca śāśvatī
c sāṃnidhyam āśrame nityaṃ kariṣyāmi dvijottama
a tiṣṭha vatsa yathākāmaṃ notkaṇṭhāṃ kartum arhasi
c smṛtaḥ smṛtaś ca te vipra sadā dāsyāmi darśanam
d smṛtas tvayā punar vipra kariṣyāmi ca darśanam
a evam uktvā sa bhagavān sūryakoṭisamaprabhaḥ
c mameśāno varaṃ dattvā tatraivāntaradhīyata
a evaṃ dṛṣṭo mayā kṛṣṇa devadevaḥ samādhinā
c tad avāptaṃ ca me sarvaṃ yad uktaṃ tena dhīmatā
a pratyakṣaṃ caiva te kṛṣṇa paśya siddhān vyavasthitān
c ṛṣīn vidyādharān yakṣān gandharvāpsarasas tathā
a paśya vṛkṣān manoramyān sadā puṣpaphalānvitān
b paśya vṛkṣalatāgulmān sarvapuṣpaphalapradān
c sarvartukusumair yuktān snigdhapatrān suśākhinaḥ
e sarvam etan mahābāho divyabhāvasamanvitam
f evam etan mahādevāl labdhavān asmi keśava
f prasādād devadevasya īśvarasya mahātmanaḥ
 vāsudeva uvāca
 etac chrutvā vacas tasya pratyakṣam iva darśanam
 vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā abruvaṃ taṃ mahāmunim
 dhanyas tvam asi viprendra kas tvad anyo 'sti puṇyakṛt
 yasya devātidevas te sāṃnidhyaṃ kurute ''śrame
 api tāvan mamāpy evaṃ dadyāt sa bhagavāñ śivaḥ
 darśanaṃ muniśārdūla prasādaṃ cāpi śaṃkaraḥ
 upamanyur uvāca
 drakṣyase puṇḍarīkākṣa mahādevaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
 acireṇaiva kālena yathā dṛṣṭo mayānagha
 cakṣuṣā caiva divyena paśyāmy amitavikrama
 ṣaṣṭhe māsi mahādevaṃ drakṣyase puruṣottama
 ṣoḍaśāṣṭau varāṃś cāpi prāpsyasi tvaṃ maheśvarāt
 sapatnīkād yaduśreṣṭha satyam etad bravīmi te
 atītānāgataṃ caiva vartamānaṃ ca nityaśaḥ
 viditaṃ me mahābāho prasādāt tasya dhīmataḥ
a etān sahasraśaś cānyān samanudhyātavān haraḥ
c kasmāt prasādaṃ bhagavān na kuryāt tava mādhava
a tvādṛśena hi devānāṃ ślāghanīyaḥ samāgamaḥ
c brahmaṇyenānṛśaṃsena śraddadhānena cāpy uta
e japyaṃ ca te pradāsyāmi yena drakṣyasi śaṃkaram
 kṛṣṇa uvāca
a abruvaṃ tam ahaṃ brahmaṃs tvatprasādān mahāmune
c drakṣye ditijasaṃghānāṃ mardanaṃ tridaśeśvaram
d evaṃ kathayatas tasya mahādevāśritāṃ kathām
d dināny aṣṭau tato jagmur muhūrtam iva bhārata
a dine 'ṣṭame ca vipreṇa dīkṣito 'haṃ yathāvidhi
c daṇḍī muṇḍī kuśī cīrī ghṛtākto mekhalī tathā
a māsam ekaṃ phalāhāro dvitīyaṃ salilāśanaḥ
c tṛtīyaṃ ca caturthaṃ ca pañcamaṃ cānilāśanaḥ
a ekapādena tiṣṭhaṃś ca ūrdhvabāhur atandritaḥ
c tejaḥ sūryasahasrasya apaśyaṃ divi bhārata
a tasya madhyagataṃ cāpi tejasaḥ pāṇḍunandana
c indrāyudhapinaddhāṅgaṃ vidyunmālāgavākṣakam
e nīlaśailacayaprakhyaṃ balākābhūṣitaṃ ghanam
a tam āsthitaś ca bhagavān devyā saha mahādyutiḥ
c tapasā tejasā kāntyā dīptayā saha bhāryayā
a rarāja bhagavāṃs tatra devyā saha maheśvaraḥ
c somena sahitaḥ sūryo yathā meghasthitas tathā
a saṃhṛṣṭaromā kaunteya vismayotphullalocanaḥ
c apaśyaṃ devasaṃghānāṃ gatim ārtiharaṃ haram
a kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ śūlapāṇiṃ
vyāghrājinaṃ jaṭilaṃ daṇḍapāṇim
c pinākinaṃ vajriṇaṃ tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraṃ
śubhāṅgadaṃ vyālayajñopavītam
a divyāṃ mālām urasānekavarṇāṃ
samudvahantaṃ gulphadeśāvalambām
c candraṃ yathā pariviṣṭaṃ sasaṃdhyaṃ
varṣātyaye tadvad apaśyam enam
d maheśvaraṃ nandivināyakādyaiḥ
a pramathānāṃ gaṇaiś caiva samantāt parivāritam
c śaradīva suduṣprekṣyaṃ pariviṣṭaṃ divākaram
a ekādaśa tathā cainaṃ rudrāṇāṃ vṛṣavāhanam
b ekādaśā gatāś caiva rudrāś cainaṃ sukhāvaham
c astuvan niyatātmānaḥ karmabhiḥ śubhakarmiṇam
a ādityā vasavaḥ sādhyā viśvedevās tathāśvinau
c viśvābhiḥ stutibhir devaṃ viśvadevaṃ samastuvan
a śatakratuś ca bhagavān viṣṇuś cāditinandanau
c brahmā rathantaraṃ sāma īrayanti bhavāntike
a yogīśvarāḥ subahavo yogadaṃ pitaraṃ gurum
c brahmarṣayaś ca sasutās tathā devarṣayaś ca vai
a pṛthivī cāntarikṣaṃ ca nakṣatrāṇi grahās tathā
c māsārdhamāsā ṛtavo rātryaḥ saṃvatsarāḥ kṣaṇāḥ
a muhūrtāś ca nimeṣāś ca tathaiva yugaparyayāḥ
c divyā rājan namasyanti vidyāḥ sarvā diśas tathā
a sanatkumāro vedāś ca itihāsās tathaiva ca
c marīcir aṅgirā atriḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
a manavaḥ saptasomaś ca atharvā sabṛhaspatiḥ
c bhṛgur dakṣaḥ kaśyapaś ca vasiṣṭhaḥ kāśya eva ca
a chandāṃsi dīkṣā yajñāś ca dakṣiṇāḥ pāvako haviḥ
c yajñopagāni dravyāṇi mūrtimanti yudhiṣṭhira
a prajānāṃ patayaḥ sarve saritaḥ pannagā nagāḥ
c devānāṃ mātaraḥ sarvā devapatnyaḥ sakanyakāḥ
a sahasrāṇi munīnāṃ ca ayutāny arbudāni ca
c namasyanti prabhuṃ śāntaṃ parvatāḥ sāgarā diśaḥ
d vṛkṣauṣadhyaś ca rājendra dhātavo vividhās tathā
a gandharvāpsarasaś caiva gītavāditrakovidāḥ
c divyatānena gāyantaḥ stuvanti bhavam adbhutam
e vidyādharā dānavāś ca guhyakā rākṣasās tathā
a sarvāṇi caiva bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
c namasyanti mahārāja vāṅmanaḥkarmabhir vibhum
e purastād viṣṭhitaḥ śarvo mamāsīt tridaśeśvaraḥ
a purastād viṣṭhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mameśānaṃ ca bhārata
c saprajāpatiśakrāntaṃ jagan mām abhyudaikṣata
a īkṣituṃ ca mahādevaṃ na me śaktir abhūt tadā
c tato mām abravīd devaḥ paśya kṛṣṇa vadasva ca
d tvayā hy ārādhitaś cāhaṃ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
d tvatsamo nāsti me kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu vai priyaḥ
a śirasā vandite deve devī prītā umābhavat
c tato 'ham astuvaṃ sthāṇuṃ stutaṃ brahmādibhiḥ suraiḥ
d tato 'stuvaṃ devadevaṃ devīṃ ca śubhalakṣaṇām
d yogeśvarāḥ subahavo maheśaṃ bahudhāstuvan
d mahābhūtāni cchandāṃsi prajānāṃ patayo makhāḥ
d saritaḥ sāgarā nāgā gandharvāpsarasas tathā
d vidyādharāś ca gītena vādyanṛttādinārcayan
d tejasvināṃ madhyagataṃ tejorāśiṃ jagatpatim
d īkṣituṃ ca mahādevaṃ na me śaktir abhūt tadā
d tato devena paśyeti vadasvety abhibhāṣitam
d dṛṣṭvā devaṃ tathā devīm astuvaṃ saṃstutaṃ suraiḥ
a namo 'stu te śāśvata sarvayone
brahmādhipaṃ tvām ṛṣayo vadanti
c tapaś ca sattvaṃ ca rajas tamaś ca
tvām eva satyaṃ ca vadanti santaḥ
a tvaṃ vai brahmā ca rudraś ca varuṇo 'gnir manur bhavaḥ
c dhātā tvaṣṭā vidhātā ca tvaṃ prabhuḥ sarvatomukhaḥ
a tvatto jātāni bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
c tvam ādiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ saṃhāraś ca tvam eva hi
d tvayā sṛṣṭam idaṃ kṛtsnaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram
a ye cendriyārthāś ca manaś ca kṛtsnaṃ
ye vāyavaḥ sapta tathaiva cāgniḥ
c ye vā divisthā devatāś cāpi puṃsāṃ
tasmāt paraṃ tvām ṛṣayo vadanti
a vedā yajñāś ca somaś ca dakṣiṇā pāvako haviḥ
c yajñopagaṃ ca yat kiṃ cid bhagavāṃs tad asaṃśayam
a iṣṭaṃ dattam adhītaṃ ca vratāni niyamāś ca ye
c hrīḥ kīrtiḥ śrīr dyutis tuṣṭiḥ siddhiś caiva tvadarpaṇā
a kāmaḥ krodho bhayaṃ lobho madaḥ stambho 'tha matsaraḥ
c ādhayo vyādhayaś caiva bhagavaṃs tanayās tava
a kṛtir vikāraḥ pralayaḥ pradhānaṃ prabhavo 'vyayaḥ
c manasaḥ paramā yoniḥ svabhāvaś cāpi śāśvataḥ
e avyaktaḥ pāvana vibho sahasrāṃśo hiraṇmayaḥ
a ādir guṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhavān vai jīvanāśrayaḥ
c mahān ātmā matir brahmā viśvaḥ śaṃbhuḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ
a buddhiḥ prajñopalabdhiś ca saṃvit khyātir dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ
c paryāyavācakaiḥ śabdair mahān ātmā vibhāvyase
a tvāṃ buddhvā brāhmaṇo vidvān na pramohaṃ nigacchati
b tattvavid brāhmaṇo vidvān aprameyagatis tathā
c hṛdayaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ kṣetrajñas tvam ṛṣiṣṭutaḥ
a sarvataḥpāṇipādas tvaṃ sarvatokṣiśiromukhaḥ
c sarvataḥśrutimāṃl loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhasi
a phalaṃ tvam asi tigmāṃśo nimeṣādiṣu karmasu
c tvaṃ vai prabhārciḥ puruṣaḥ sarvasya hṛdi saṃsthitaḥ
e aṇimā laghimā prāptir īśāno jyotir avyayaḥ
a tvayi buddhir matir lokāḥ prapannāḥ saṃśritāś ca ye
c dhyānino nityayogāś ca satyasaṃdhā jitendriyāḥ
a yas tvāṃ dhruvaṃ vedayate guhāśayaṃ
prabhuṃ purāṇaṃ puruṣaṃ viśvarūpam
c hiraṇmayaṃ buddhimatāṃ parāṃ gatiṃ
sa buddhimān buddhim atītya tiṣṭhati
a viditvā sapta sūkṣmāṇi ṣaḍaṅgaṃ tvāṃ ca mūrtitaḥ
c pradhānavidhiyogasthas tvām eva viśate budhaḥ
a evam ukte mayā pārtha bhave cārtivināśane
c carācaraṃ jagat sarvaṃ siṃhanādam athākarot
a saviprasaṃghāś ca surāsurāś ca
nāgāḥ piśācāḥ pitaro vayāṃsi
c rakṣogaṇā bhūtagaṇāś ca sarve
maharṣayaś caiva tathā praṇemuḥ
a mama mūrdhni ca divyānāṃ kusumānāṃ sugandhinām
c rāśayo nipatanti sma vāyuś ca susukho vavau
a nirīkṣya bhagavān devīm umāṃ māṃ ca jagaddhitaḥ
c śatakratuṃ cābhivīkṣya svayaṃ mām āha śaṃkaraḥ
a vidmaḥ kṛṣṇa parāṃ bhaktim asmāsu tava śatruhan
c kriyatām ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ prītir hi paramā tvayi
a vṛṇīṣvāṣṭau varān kṛṣṇa dātāsmi tava sattama
c brūhi yādavaśārdūla yān icchasi sudurlabhān
 kṛṣṇa uvāca
a mūrdhnā nipatya niyatas tejaḥsaṃnicaye tataḥ
b mūrdhnā praṇamya tu bhavaṃ devam īśānam avyayam
c paramaṃ harṣam āgamya bhagavantam athābruvam
a dharme dṛḍhatvaṃ yudhi śatrughātaṃ
yaśas tathāgryaṃ paramaṃ balaṃ ca
c yogapriyatvaṃ tava saṃnikarṣaṃ
vṛṇe sutānāṃ ca śataṃ śatāni
a evam astv iti tad vākyaṃ mayoktaḥ prāha śaṃkaraḥ
a tato māṃ jagato mātā dharaṇī sarvapāvanī
c uvācomā praṇihitā śarvāṇī tapasāṃ nidhiḥ
a datto bhagavatā putraḥ sāmbo nāma tavānagha
c matto 'py aṣṭau varān iṣṭān gṛhāṇa tvaṃ dadāmi te
e praṇamya śirasā sā ca mayoktā pāṇḍunandana
a dvijeṣv akopaṃ pitṛtaḥ prasādaṃ
śataṃ sutānām upabhogaṃ paraṃ ca
c kule prītiṃ mātṛtaś ca prasādaṃ
śamaprāptiṃ pravṛṇe cāpi dākṣyam
 devy uvāca
a evaṃ bhaviṣyaty amaraprabhāva
nāhaṃ mṛṣā jātu vade kadā cit
c bhāryāsahasrāṇi ca ṣoḍaśaiva
tāsu priyatvaṃ ca tathākṣayatvam
a prītiṃ cāgryāṃ bāndhavānāṃ sakāśād
dadāmi te vapuṣaḥ kāmyatāṃ ca
c bhokṣyante vai saptatir vai śatāni
gṛhe tubhyam atithīnāṃ ca nityam
d bhavantu nityam atithīnāṃ bahūni
d gṛhe ca tubhyaṃ prītimatāṃ śatāni
 vāsudeva uvāca
a evaṃ dattvā varān devo mama devī ca bhārata
c antarhitaḥ kṣaṇe tasmin sagaṇo bhīmapūrvaja
a etad atyadbhutaṃ sarvaṃ brāhmaṇāyātitejase
c upamanyave mayā kṛtsnam ākhyātaṃ kauravottama
a namaskṛtvā tu sa prāha devadevāya suvrata
c nāsti śarvasamo dāne nāsti śarvasamo raṇe
e nāsti śarvasamo devo nāsti śarvasamā gatiḥ
a ṛṣir āsīt kṛte tāta taṇḍir ity eva viśrutaḥ
c daśa varṣasahasrāṇi tena devaḥ samādhinā
e ārādhito 'bhūd bhaktena tasyodarkaṃ niśāmaya
a sa dṛṣṭavān mahādevam astauṣīc ca stavair vibhum
b iti taṇḍis tapoyogāt paramātmānam avyayam
b cintayitvā mahātmānam idam āha suvismitaḥ
b yaṃ paṭhanti sadā sāṃkhyāś cintayanti ca yoginaḥ
b paraṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣam adhiṣṭhātāram īśvaram
b utpattau ca vināśe ca kāraṇaṃ yaṃ vidur budhāḥ
b devāsuramunīnāṃ ca paraṃ yasmān na vidyate
b ajaṃ tam aham īśānam anādinidhanaṃ prabhum
b atyantasukhinaṃ devam anaghaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje
b evaṃ bruvann eva tadā dadarśa tapasāṃ nidhim
b tam avyayam anaupamyam acintyaṃ śāśvataṃ dhruvam
b niṣkalaṃ sakalaṃ brahma nirguṇaṃ guṇagocaram
b yogināṃ paramānandam akṣaraṃ mokṣasaṃjñitam
b manorindrāgnimarutāṃ viśvasya brahmaṇo gatim
b agrāhyam acalaṃ śuddhaṃ buddhigrāhyaṃ manomayam
b durvijñeyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ duṣprāpam akṛtātmabhiḥ
b yoniṃ viśvasya jagatas tamasaḥ parataḥ param
b paraṃ purāṇaṃ puruṣaṃ parebhyaḥ parataḥ param
b yaḥ prāṇavantam ātmānaṃ jyotir jīvasthitaṃ manaḥ
b taṃ devaṃ darśanākāṅkṣī bahūn varṣagaṇān ṛṣiḥ
b tapasy ugre sthito bhūtvā dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭāva ceśvaram
c pavitrāṇāṃ pavitras tvaṃ gatir gatimatāṃ vara
e atyugraṃ tejasāṃ tejas tapasāṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ
a viśvāvasuhiraṇyākṣapuruhūtanamaskṛta
c bhūrikalyāṇada vibho purusatya namo 'stu te
a jātīmaraṇabhīrūṇāṃ yatīnāṃ yatatāṃ vibho
c nirvāṇada sahasrāṃśo namas te 'stu sukhāśraya
a brahmā śatakratur viṣṇur viśvedevā maharṣayaḥ
c na vidus tvāṃ tu tattvena kuto vetsyāmahe vayam
a tvattaḥ pravartate kālas tvayi kālaś ca līyate
c kālākhyaḥ puruṣākhyaś ca brahmākhyaś ca tvam eva hi
a tanavas te smṛtās tisraḥ purāṇajñaiḥ surarṣibhiḥ
c adhipauruṣam adhyātmam adhibhūtādhidaivatam
e adhilokyādhivijñānam adhiyajñas tvam eva hi
a tvāṃ viditvātmadehasthaṃ durvidaṃ daivatair api
c vidvāṃso yānti nirmuktāḥ paraṃ bhāvam anāmayam
a anicchatas tava vibho janmamṛtyur anekataḥ
c dvāraṃ tvaṃ svargamokṣāṇām ākṣeptā tvaṃ dadāsi ca
a tvam eva mokṣaḥ svargaś ca kāmaḥ krodhas tvam eva hi
c sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva adhaś cordhvaṃ tvam eva hi
a brahmā viṣṇuś ca rudraś ca skandendrau savitā yamaḥ
c varuṇendū manur dhātā vidhātā tvaṃ dhaneśvaraḥ
a bhūr vāyur jyotir āpaś ca vāg buddhis tvaṃ matir manaḥ
c karma satyānṛte cobhe tvam evāsti ca nāsti ca
a indriyāṇīndriyārthāś ca tatparaṃ prakṛter dhruvam
c viśvāviśvaparo bhāvaś cintyācintyas tvam eva hi
a yac caitat paramaṃ brahma yac ca tat paramaṃ padam
c yā gatiḥ sāṃkhyayogānāṃ sa bhavān nātra saṃśayaḥ
a nūnam adya kṛtārthāḥ sma nūnaṃ prāptāḥ satāṃ gatim
c yāṃ gatiṃ prāpnuvantīha jñānanirmalabuddhayaḥ
a aho mūḍhāḥ sma suciram imaṃ kālam acetasaḥ
c yan na vidmaḥ paraṃ devaṃ śāśvataṃ yaṃ vidur budhāḥ
a so 'yam āsāditaḥ sākṣād bahubhir janmabhir mayā
c bhaktānugrahakṛd devo yaṃ jñātvāmṛtam aśnute
a devāsuramanuṣyāṇāṃ yac ca guhyaṃ sanātanam
c guhāyāṃ nihitaṃ brahma durvijñeyaṃ surair api
a sa eṣa bhagavān devaḥ sarvakṛt sarvatomukhaḥ
c sarvātmā sarvadarśī ca sarvagaḥ sarvaveditā
a prāṇakṛt prāṇabhṛt prāṇī prāṇadaḥ prāṇināṃ gatiḥ
c dehakṛd dehabhṛd dehī dehabhug dehināṃ gatiḥ
a adhyātmagatiniṣṭhānāṃ dhyāninām ātmavedinām
c apunarmārakāmānāṃ yā gatiḥ so 'yam īśvaraḥ
a ayaṃ ca sarvabhūtānāṃ śubhāśubhagatipradaḥ
c ayaṃ ca janmamaraṇe vidadhyāt sarvajantuṣu
a ayaṃ ca siddhikāmānām ṛṣīṇāṃ siddhidaḥ prabhuḥ
c ayaṃ ca mokṣakāmānāṃ dvijānāṃ mokṣadaḥ prabhuḥ
a bhūr ādyān sarvabhuvanān utpādya sadivaukasaḥ
c vibharti devas tanubhir aṣṭābhiś ca dadāti ca
a ataḥ pravartate sarvam asmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
c asmiṃś ca pralayaṃ yāti ayam ekaḥ sanātanaḥ
a ayaṃ sa satyakāmānāṃ satyalokaḥ paraḥ satām
c apavargaś ca muktānāṃ kaivalyaṃ cātmavādinām
a ayaṃ brahmādibhiḥ siddhair guhāyāṃ gopitaḥ prabhuḥ
c devāsuramanuṣyāṇāṃ na prakāśo bhaved iti
a taṃ tvāṃ devāsuranarās tattvena na vidur bhavam
c mohitāḥ khalv anenaiva hṛcchayena praveśitāḥ
a ye cainaṃ saṃprapadyante bhaktiyogena bhārata
c teṣām evātmanātmānaṃ darśayaty eṣa hṛcchayaḥ
a yaṃ jñātvā na punarjanma maraṇaṃ cāpi vidyate
c yaṃ viditvā paraṃ vedyaṃ veditavyaṃ na vidyate
a yaṃ labdhvā paramaṃ lābhaṃ manyate nādhikaṃ punaḥ
c prāṇasūkṣmāṃ parāṃ prāptim āgacchaty akṣayāvahām
a yaṃ sāṃkhyā guṇatattvajñāḥ sāṃkhyaśāstraviśāradāḥ
c sūkṣmajñānaratāḥ pūrvaṃ jñātvā mucyanti bandhanaiḥ
a yaṃ ca vedavido vedyaṃ vedānteṣu pratiṣṭhitam
c prāṇāyāmaparā nityaṃ yaṃ viśanti japanti ca
d oṃkāraratham āruhya te viśanti maheśvaram
a ayaṃ sa devayānānām ādityo dvāram ucyate
c ayaṃ ca pitṛyānānāṃ candramā dvāram ucyate
a eṣa kālagatiś citrā saṃvatsarayugādiṣu
c bhāvābhāvau tadātve ca ayane dakṣiṇottare
a evaṃ prajāpatiḥ pūrvam ārādhya bahubhiḥ stavaiḥ
c varayām āsa putratve nīlalohitasaṃjñitam
a ṛgbhir yam anuśaṃsanti tantre karmaṇi bahvṛcaḥ
c yajurbhir yaṃ tridhā vedyaṃ juhvaty adhvaryavo 'dhvare
a sāmabhir yaṃ ca gāyanti sāmagāḥ śuddhabuddhayaḥ
b ṛtaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ brahma stuvanty ātharvaṇā dvijāḥ
c yajñasya paramā yoniḥ patiś cāyaṃ paraḥ smṛtaḥ
a rātryahaḥśrotranayanaḥ pakṣamāsaśirobhujaḥ
c ṛtuvīryas tapodhairyo hy abdaguhyorupādavān
a mṛtyur yamo hutāśaś ca kālaḥ saṃhāravegavān
c kālasya paramā yoniḥ kālaś cāyaṃ sanātanaḥ
a candrādityau sanakṣatrau sagrahau saha vāyunā
c dhruvaḥ saptarṣayaś caiva bhuvanāḥ sapta eva ca
a pradhānaṃ mahad avyaktaṃ viśeṣāntaṃ savaikṛtam
c brahmādi stambaparyantaṃ bhūtādi sad asac ca yat
a aṣṭau prakṛtayaś caiva prakṛtibhyaś ca yat param
c asya devasya yad bhāgaṃ kṛtsnaṃ saṃparivartate
a etat paramam ānandaṃ yat tac chāśvatam eva ca
c eṣā gatir viraktānām eṣa bhāvaḥ paraḥ satām
a etat padam anudvignam etad brahma sanātanam
c śāstravedāṅgaviduṣām etad dhyānaṃ paraṃ padam
a iyaṃ sā paramā kāṣṭhā iyaṃ sā paramā kalā
c iyaṃ sā paramā siddhir iyaṃ sā paramā gatiḥ
a iyaṃ sā paramā śāntir iyaṃ sā nirvṛtiḥ parā
c yaṃ prāpya kṛtakṛtyāḥ sma ity amanyanta vedhasaḥ
a iyaṃ tuṣṭir iyaṃ siddhir iyaṃ śrutir iyaṃ smṛtiḥ
c adhyātmagatiniṣṭhānāṃ viduṣāṃ prāptir avyayā
a yajatāṃ yajñakāmānāṃ yajñair vipuladakṣiṇaiḥ
c yā gatir daivatair divyā sā gatis tvaṃ sanātana
a japyahomavrataiḥ kṛcchrair niyamair dehapātanaiḥ
c tapyatāṃ yā gatir deva vairāje sā gatir bhavān
a karmanyāsakṛtānāṃ ca viraktānāṃ tatas tataḥ
c yā gatir brahmabhavane sā gatis tvaṃ sanātana
a apunarmārakāmānāṃ vairāgye vartatāṃ pare
c vikṛtīnāṃ layānāṃ ca sā gatis tvaṃ sanātana
a jñānavijñānaniṣṭhānāṃ nirupākhyā nirañjanā
c kaivalyā yā gatir deva paramā sā gatir bhavān
a vedaśāstrapurāṇoktāḥ pañcaitā gatayaḥ smṛtāḥ
c tvatprasādād dhi labhyante na labhyante 'nyathā vibho
a iti taṇḍis tapoyogāt tuṣṭāveśānam avyayam
c jagau ca paramaṃ brahma yat purā lokakṛj jagau
d upamanyur uvāca
d evaṃ stuto mahādevas taṇḍinā brahmavādinā
d uvāca bhagavān deva umayā sahitaḥ prabhuḥ
a brahmā śatakratur viṣṇur viśvedevā maharṣayaḥ
c na vidus tvām iti tatas tuṣṭaḥ provāca taṃ śivaḥ
a akṣayaś cāvyayaś caiva bhavitā duḥkhavarjitaḥ
c yaśasvī tejasā yukto divyajñānasamanvitaḥ
a ṛṣīṇām abhigamyaś ca sūtrakartā sutas tava
c matprasādād dvijaśreṣṭha bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
a kaṃ vā kāmaṃ dadāmy adya brūhi yad vatsa kāṅkṣase
c prāñjaliḥ sa uvācedaṃ tvayi bhaktir dṛḍhāstu me
a evaṃ dattvā varaṃ devo vandyamānaḥ surarṣibhiḥ
c stūyamānaś ca vibudhais tatraivāntaradhīyata
a antarhite bhagavati sānuge yādaveśvara
c ṛṣir āśramam āgamya mamaitat proktavān iha
a yāni ca prathitāny ādau taṇḍir ākhyātavān mama
c nāmāni mānavaśreṣṭha tāni tvaṃ śṛṇu siddhaye
a daśa nāmasahasrāṇi vedeṣv āha pitāmahaḥ
c śarvasya śāstreṣu tathā daśa nāmaśatāni vai
a guhyānīmāni nāmāni taṇḍir bhagavato 'cyuta
c devaprasādād deveśa purā prāha mahātmane
 vāsudeva uvāca
a tataḥ sa prayato bhūtvā mama tāta yudhiṣṭhira
c prāñjaliḥ prāha viprarṣir nāmasaṃhāram āditaḥ
 upamanyur uvāca
a brahmaproktair ṛṣiproktair vedavedāṅgasaṃbhavaiḥ
c sarvalokeṣu vikhyātaiḥ sthāṇuṃ stoṣyāmi nāmabhiḥ
a mahadbhir vihitaiḥ satyaiḥ siddhaiḥ sarvārthasādhakaiḥ
c ṛṣiṇā taṇḍinā bhaktyā kṛtair devakṛtātmanā
a yathoktair lokavikhyātair munibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ
c pravaraṃ prathamaṃ svargyaṃ sarvabhūtahitaṃ śubham
e śrutaiḥ sarvatra jagati brahmalokāvatāritaiḥ
a yat tad rahasyaṃ paramaṃ brahmaproktaṃ sanātanam
c vakṣye yadukulaśreṣṭha śṛṇuṣvāvahito mama
a paratvena bhavaṃ devaṃ bhaktas tvaṃ parameśvaram
c tena te śrāvayiṣyāmi yat tad brahma sanātanam
a na śakyaṃ vistarāt kṛtsnaṃ vaktuṃ śarvasya kena cit
c yuktenāpi vibhūtīnām api varṣaśatair api
a yasyādir madhyam antaś ca surair api na gamyate
c kas tasya śaknuyād vaktuṃ guṇān kārtsnyena mādhava
a kiṃ tu devasya mahataḥ saṃkṣiptārthapadākṣaram
c śaktitaś caritaṃ vakṣye prasādāt tasya caiva hi
a aprāpyeha tato 'nujñāṃ na śakyaḥ stotum īśvaraḥ
c yadā tenābhyanujñātaḥ stuvaty eva sadā bhavam
a anādinidhanasyāhaṃ sarvayoner mahātmanaḥ
c nāmnāṃ kaṃ cit samuddeśaṃ vakṣye hy avyaktayoninaḥ
a varadasya vareṇyasya viśvarūpasya dhīmataḥ
c śṛṇu nāmasamuddeśaṃ yad uktaṃ padmayoninā
a daśa nāmasahasrāṇi yāny āha prapitāmahaḥ
c tāni nirmathya manasā dadhno ghṛtam ivoddhṛtam
a gireḥ sāraṃ yathā hema puṣpāt sāraṃ yathā madhu
c ghṛtāt sāraṃ yathā maṇḍas tathaitat sāram uddhṛtam
a sarvapāpmāpaham idaṃ caturvedasamanvitam
c prayatnenādhigantavyaṃ dhāryaṃ ca prayatātmanā
e śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ caiva rakṣoghnaṃ pāvanaṃ mahat
a idaṃ bhaktāya dātavyaṃ śraddadhānāstikāya ca
c nāśraddadhānarūpāya nāstikāyājitātmane
a yaś cābhyasūyate devaṃ bhūtātmānaṃ pinākinam
c sa kṛṣṇa narakaṃ yāti saha pūrvaiḥ sahānugaiḥ
a idaṃ dhyānam idaṃ yogam idaṃ dhyeyam anuttamam
c idaṃ japyam idaṃ jñānaṃ rahasyam idam uttamam
e idaṃ jñātvāntakāle 'pi gacched dhi paramāṃ gatim
a pavitraṃ maṅgalaṃ puṇyaṃ kalyāṇam idam uttamam
c nigadiṣye mahābāho stavānām uttamaṃ stavam
a idaṃ brahmā purā kṛtvā sarvalokapitāmahaḥ
c sarvastavānāṃ divyānāṃ rājatve samakalpayat
a tadāprabhṛti caivāyam īśvarasya mahātmanaḥ
c stavarājeti vikhyāto jagaty amarapūjitaḥ
e brahmalokād ayaṃ caiva stavarājo 'vatāritaḥ
a yasmāt taṇḍiḥ purā prāha tena taṇḍikṛto 'bhavat
c svargāc caivātra bhūlokaṃ taṇḍinā hy avatāritaḥ
a sarvamaṅgalamaṅgalyaṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam
c nigadiṣye mahābāho stavānām uttamaṃ stavam
a brahmaṇām api yad brahma parāṇām api yat param
c tejasām api yat tejas tapasām api yat tapaḥ
a śāntīnām api yā śāntir dyutīnām api yā dyutiḥ
c dāntānām api yo dānto dhīmatām api yā ca dhīḥ
a devānām api yo devo munīnām api yo muniḥ
c yajñānām api yo yajñaḥ śivānām api yaḥ śivaḥ
a rudrāṇām api yo rudraḥ prabhuḥ prabhavatām api
c yoginām api yo yogī kāraṇānāṃ ca kāraṇam
a yato lokāḥ saṃbhavanti na bhavanti yataḥ punaḥ
c sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya harasyāmitatejasaḥ
a aṣṭottarasahasraṃ tu nāmnāṃ śarvasya me śṛṇu
c yac chrutvā manujaśreṣṭha sarvān kāmān avāpsyasi
a sthiraḥ sthāṇuḥ prabhur bhānuḥ pravaro varado varaḥ
c sarvātmā sarvavikhyātaḥ sarvaḥ sarvakaro bhavaḥ
a jaṭī carmī śikhaṇḍī ca sarvāṅgaḥ sarvabhāvanaḥ
c hariś ca hariṇākṣaś ca sarvabhūtaharaḥ prabhuḥ
d mahāroṣo mahārūpo makhas tribhuvaneśvaraḥ
d satyaḥ satyāśrayaḥ siddhaś caṇḍāṃśuḥ sarpakuṇḍalaḥ
d vṛṣaś ca vṛṣarūpaś ca vṛṣastho vṛṣabhākṣagaḥ
d bhīmaś ca śitikaṇṭhaś ca śivaḥ śvetaḥ śivottamaḥ
d niṣaṅgī śitikeśaś ca ditipo nīlalohitaḥ
d śarabhaḥ śaṅkukarṇaś ca vilāso viśvakartṛkaḥ
d paraḥ pāśupato bhadro nīlagrīvo vibhīṣaṇaḥ
d gaṅgādharaḥ pṛthuś caiva janeśvarakuleśvaraḥ
d uttamastrīsahāyaś ca madhuvindo mahāgrahaḥ
d divyaḥ sūkṣmaḥ parāgaś ca vīrabhadro vibhinnagaḥ
d śivaḥ śaṃbhur bhuvo bhartā śrīkaṇṭhas tridaśārcitaḥ
d kravyādaḥ kīrtimān krīḍī kālāgniḥ kāryakāraṇaḥ
d aṇḍaś ca bahiraṇḍaś ca virāḍbhūto viśeṣakṛt
d hiraṇyagarbhahetuś ca bahirbhūtaḥ prayojakaḥ
d jāgratsvapnasuṣuptiś ca turīyaś ca vidhūtanaḥ
d manobuddhir ahaṃkāro vyaktāntaḥkaraṇātmakaḥ
d viśado vikramaś caiva viśvo viśvasya saṃgrahaḥ
d arūpaś caṇḍarūpaś ca vajrahastaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
d jātavedāś ca jāgartir viśvāvāso vināyakaḥ
d ājānur vainateyaś ca viśvakarmā vicakṣaṇaḥ
d hiraṇyākṣaḥ sukeśaś ca ṛkṣaḥ kakṣataras tamaḥ
d vṛṣo vṛṣāḍhyo vṛṣado vṛṣaparvā prajāharaḥ
a pravṛttiś ca nivṛttiś ca niyataḥ śāśvato dhruvaḥ
c śmaśānacārī bhagavān khacaro gocaro 'rdanaḥ
a abhivādyo mahākarmā tapasvī bhūtabhāvanaḥ
c unmattaveśapracchannaḥ sarvalokaprajāpatiḥ
a mahārūpo mahākāyaḥ sarvarūpo mahāyaśāḥ
c mahātmā sarvabhūtaś ca virūpo vāmano manuḥ
a lokapālo 'ntarhitātmā prasādo hayagardabhiḥ
c pavitraś ca mahāṃś caiva niyamo niyamāśrayaḥ
a sarvakarmā svayaṃbhūś ca ādir ādikaro nidhiḥ
c sahasrākṣo virūpākṣaḥ somo nakṣatrasādhakaḥ
a candrasūryagatiḥ ketur graho grahapatir varaḥ
c adrir adryālayaḥ kartā mṛgabāṇārpaṇo 'naghaḥ
a mahātapā ghoratapā adīno dīnasādhakaḥ
c saṃvatsarakaro mantraḥ pramāṇaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ
a yogī yojyo mahābījo mahāretā mahātapāḥ
c suvarṇaretāḥ sarvajñaḥ subījo vṛṣavāhanaḥ
a daśabāhus tv animiṣo nīlakaṇṭha umāpatiḥ
c viśvarūpaḥ svayaṃśreṣṭho balavīro balo gaṇaḥ
a gaṇakartā gaṇapatir digvāsāḥ kāmya eva ca
c pavitraṃ paramaṃ mantraḥ sarvabhāvakaro haraḥ
a kamaṇḍaludharo dhanvī bāṇahastaḥ kapālavān
c aśanī śataghnī khaḍgī paṭṭiśī cāyudhī mahān
a sruvahastaḥ surūpaś ca tejas tejaskaro nidhiḥ
c uṣṇīṣī ca suvaktraś ca udagro vinatas tathā
a dīrghaś ca harikeśaś ca sutīrthaḥ kṛṣṇa eva ca
c sṛgālarūpaḥ sarvārtho muṇḍaḥ kuṇḍī kamaṇḍaluḥ
a ajaś ca mṛgarūpaś ca gandhadhārī kapardy api
c ūrdhvaretā ūrdhvaliṅga ūrdhvaśāyī nabhastalaḥ
a trijaṭaś cīravāsāś ca rudraḥ senāpatir vibhuḥ
c ahaścaro 'tha naktaṃ ca tigmamanyuḥ suvarcasaḥ
a gajahā daityahā loko lokadhātā guṇākaraḥ
c siṃhaśārdūlarūpaś ca ārdracarmāmbarāvṛtaḥ
a kālayogī mahānādaḥ sarvavāsaś catuṣpathaḥ
c niśācaraḥ pretacārī bhūtacārī maheśvaraḥ
a bahubhūto bahudhanaḥ sarvādhāro 'mito gatiḥ
c nṛtyapriyo nityanarto nartakaḥ sarvalāsakaḥ
d sakārmuko mahābāhur mahāghoro mahātapāḥ
a ghoro mahātapāḥ pāśo nityo giricaro nabhaḥ
c sahasrahasto vijayo vyavasāyo hy aninditaḥ
a amarṣaṇo marṣaṇātmā yajñahā kāmanāśanaḥ
c dakṣayajñāpahārī ca susaho madhyamas tathā
a tejopahārī balahā mudito 'rtho jito varaḥ
b gambhīraghoṣo yogātmā yajñahā kāmanāśanaḥ
c gambhīraghoṣo gambhīro gambhīrabalavāhanaḥ
a nyagrodharūpo nyagrodho vṛkṣakarṇasthitir vibhuḥ
b sutīkṣṇadaśanaś caiva mahākāyo mahānanaḥ
b viṣvakseno harir yajñaḥ saṃyugāpīḍavāhanaḥ
c tīkṣṇatāpaś ca haryaśvaḥ sahāyaḥ karmakālavit
a viṣṇuprasādito yajñaḥ samudro vaḍavāmukhaḥ
c hutāśanasahāyaś ca praśāntātmā hutāśanaḥ
a ugratejā mahātejā jayo vijayakālavit
c jyotiṣām ayanaṃ siddhiḥ saṃdhir vigraha eva ca
a śikhī daṇḍī jaṭī jvālī mūrtijo mūrdhago balī
c vaiṇavī paṇavī tālī kālaḥ kālakaṭaṃkaṭaḥ
a nakṣatravigrahavidhir guṇavṛddhir layo 'gamaḥ
c prajāpatir diśābāhur vibhāgaḥ sarvatomukhaḥ
a vimocanaḥ suragaṇo hiraṇyakavacodbhavaḥ
c meḍhrajo balacārī ca mahācārī stutas tathā
d vīṇī ca paṇavī tālī nālī kaṭikaṭus tathā
a sarvatūryaninādī ca sarvavādyaparigrahaḥ
c vyālarūpo bilāvāsī hemamālī taraṃgavit
a tridaśas trikāladhṛk karmasarvabandhavimocanaḥ
c bandhanas tv asurendrāṇāṃ yudhi śatruvināśanaḥ
a sāṃkhyaprasādo durvāsāḥ sarvasādhuniṣevitaḥ
c praskandano vibhāgaś ca atulyo yajñabhāgavit
d praskando 'py avibhāvaś ca tulyo yajñavibhāgavit
a sarvāvāsaḥ sarvacārī durvāsā vāsavo 'maraḥ
c hemo hemakaro yajñaḥ sarvadhārī dharottamaḥ
a lohitākṣo mahākṣaś ca vijayākṣo viśāradaḥ
c saṃgraho nigrahaḥ kartā sarpacīranivāsanaḥ
a mukhyo 'mukhyaś ca dehaś ca deharddhiḥ sarvakāmadaḥ
c sarvakālaprasādaś ca subalo balarūpadhṛk
d sarvakāmavaraś caiva sarvadā sarvatomukhaḥ
a ākāśanidhirūpaś ca nipātī uragaḥ khagaḥ
b bhikṣuś ca bhikṣurūpaś ca raudrarūpo 'ṅgirāḥ khagaḥ
c raudrarūpo 'ṃśur ādityo vasuraśmiḥ suvarcasī
a vasuvego mahāvego manovego niśācaraḥ
b vasuraśmiḥ suvarcasvī vasuvego mahābalaḥ
b manovego niśācāraḥ sarvalokasukhapradaḥ
c sarvāvāsī śriyāvāsī upadeśakaro haraḥ
a munir ātmapatir loke saṃbhojyaś ca sahasradaḥ
c pakṣī ca pakṣirūpī ca atidīpto viśāṃ patiḥ
a unmādo madanākāro arthārthakararomaśaḥ
c vāmadevaś ca vāmaś ca prāgdakṣiṇyaś ca vāmanaḥ
d samīro damanākāro hy artho hy arthakaro vaśaḥ
d vāsudevaś ca devaś ca vāmadevaś ca vāmanaḥ
a siddhayogāpahārī ca siddhaḥ sarvārthasādhakaḥ
c bhikṣuś ca bhikṣurūpaś ca viṣāṇī mṛdur avyayaḥ
a mahāseno viśākhaś ca ṣaṣṭibhāgo gavāṃ patiḥ
c vajrahastaś ca viṣkambhī camūstambhana eva ca
a ṛtur ṛtukaraḥ kālo madhur madhukaro 'calaḥ
c vānaspatyo vājaseno nityam āśramapūjitaḥ
a brahmacārī lokacārī sarvacārī sucāravit
c īśāna īśvaraḥ kālo niśācārī pinākadhṛk
d nimittastho nimittaṃ ca nandir nandikaro hariḥ
a nandīśvaraś ca nandī ca nandano nandivardhanaḥ
c bhagasyākṣinihantā ca kālo brahmavidāṃ varaḥ
a caturmukho mahāliṅgaś cāruliṅgas tathaiva ca
c liṅgādhyakṣaḥ surādhyakṣo lokādhyakṣo yugāvahaḥ
a bījādhyakṣo bījakartā adhyātmānugato balaḥ
c itihāsakaraḥ kalpo gautamo 'tha jaleśvaraḥ
a dambho hy adambho vaidambho vaśyo vaśyakaraḥ kaviḥ
c lokakartā paśupatir mahākartā mahauṣadhiḥ
a akṣaraṃ paramaṃ brahma balavāñ śakra eva ca
b vajrahastaḥ pratiṣṭambhī camūruḥ stena eva ca
c nītir hy anītiḥ śuddhātmā śuddho mānyo manogatiḥ
d nityo hy anīśaḥ śuddhātmā śuddho māno gatir haviḥ
a bahuprasādaḥ svapano darpaṇo 'tha tv amitrajit
c vedakāraḥ sūtrakāro vidvān samaramardanaḥ
a mahāmeghanivāsī ca mahāghoro vaśīkaraḥ
c agnijvālo mahājvālo atidhūmro huto haviḥ
a vṛṣaṇaḥ śaṃkaro nityo varcasvī dhūmaketanaḥ
c nīlas tathāṅgalubdhaś ca śobhano niravagrahaḥ
a svastidaḥ svastibhāvaś ca bhāgī bhāgakaro laghuḥ
c utsaṅgaś ca mahāṅgaś ca mahāgarbhaḥ paro yuvā
a kṛṣṇavarṇaḥ suvarṇaś ca indriyaḥ sarvadehinām
c mahāpādo mahāhasto mahākāyo mahāyaśāḥ
a mahāmūrdhā mahāmātro mahānetro digālayaḥ
c mahādanto mahākarṇo mahāmeḍhro mahāhanuḥ
a mahānāso mahākambur mahāgrīvaḥ śmaśānadhṛk
c mahāvakṣā mahorasko antarātmā mṛgālayaḥ
d mahākaṭir mahāgrīvo mahābāhur mahākaraḥ
a lambano lambitoṣṭhaś ca mahāmāyaḥ payonidhiḥ
b lambamāno lambitoṣṭhaś caladgāmī yaśonidhiḥ
c mahādanto mahādaṃṣṭro mahājihvo mahāmukhaḥ
a mahānakho mahāromā mahākeśo mahājaṭaḥ
c asapatnaḥ prasādaś ca pratyayo girisādhanaḥ
a snehano 'snehanaś caiva ajitaś ca mahāmuniḥ
c vṛkṣākāro vṛkṣaketur analo vāyuvāhanaḥ
a maṇḍalī merudhāmā ca devadānavadarpahā
c atharvaśīrṣaḥ sāmāsya ṛksahasrāmitekṣaṇaḥ
a yajuḥpādabhujo guhyaḥ prakāśo jaṅgamas tathā
c amoghārthaḥ prasādaś ca abhigamyaḥ sudarśanaḥ
a upahārapriyaḥ śarvaḥ kanakaḥ kāñcanaḥ sthiraḥ
c nābhir nandikaro bhāvyaḥ puṣkarasthapatiḥ sthiraḥ
a dvādaśas trāsanaś cādyo yajño yajñasamāhitaḥ
c naktaṃ kaliś ca kālaś ca makaraḥ kālapūjitaḥ
a sagaṇo gaṇakāraś ca bhūtabhāvanasārathiḥ
c bhasmaśāyī bhasmagoptā bhasmabhūtas tarur gaṇaḥ
a agaṇaś caiva lopaś ca mahātmā sarvapūjitaḥ
c śaṅkus triśaṅkuḥ saṃpannaḥ śucir bhūtaniṣevitaḥ
a āśramasthaḥ kapotastho viśvakarmā patir varaḥ
c śākho viśākhas tāmroṣṭho hy ambujālaḥ suniścayaḥ
a kapilo 'kapilaḥ śūra āyuś caiva paro 'paraḥ
c gandharvo hy aditis tārkṣyaḥ suvijñeyaḥ susārathiḥ
a paraśvadhāyudho deva arthakārī subāndhavaḥ
c tumbavīṇī mahākopa ūrdhvaretā jaleśayaḥ
a ugro vaṃśakaro vaṃśo vaṃśanādo hy aninditaḥ
c sarvāṅgarūpo māyāvī suhṛdo hy anilo 'nalaḥ
a bandhano bandhakartā ca subandhanavimocanaḥ
c sa yajñāriḥ sa kāmārir mahādaṃṣṭro mahāyudhaḥ
c māyāvī sarvakāmakṛt
c mahādayāḷur mantavyo
a bāhus tv aninditaḥ śarvaḥ śaṃkaraḥ śaṃkaro 'dhanaḥ
c amareśo mahādevo viśvadevaḥ surārihā
a ahirbudhno nirṛtiś ca cekitāno haris tathā
c ajaikapāc ca kāpālī triśaṅkur ajitaḥ śivaḥ
a dhanvantarir dhūmaketuḥ skando vaiśravaṇas tathā
c dhātā śakraś ca viṣṇuś ca mitras tvaṣṭā dhruvo dharaḥ
a prabhāvaḥ sarvago vāyur aryamā savitā raviḥ
c udagraś ca vidhātā ca māndhātā bhūtabhāvanaḥ
a ratitīrthaś ca vāgmī ca sarvakāmaguṇāvahaḥ
c padmagarbho mahāgarbhaś candravaktro manoramaḥ
a balavāṃś copaśāntaś ca purāṇaḥ puṇyacañcurī
c kurukartā kālarūpī kurubhūto maheśvaraḥ
a sarvāśayo darbhaśāyī sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ patiḥ
c devadevamukho 'saktaḥ sad asat sarvaratnavit
a kailāsaśikharāvāsī himavadgirisaṃśrayaḥ
c kūlahārī kūlakartā bahuvidyo bahupradaḥ
a vaṇijo vardhano vṛkṣo nakulaś candanaś chadaḥ
c sāragrīvo mahājatrur alolaś ca mahauṣadhaḥ
d prāṇeśo bandhakī vṛkṣo nakulaś cādrikas tathā
d hrasvagrīvo mahājānur alolaś ca mahauṣadhiḥ
a siddhārthakārī siddhārthaś chandovyākaraṇottaraḥ
c siṃhanādaḥ siṃhadaṃṣṭraḥ siṃhagaḥ siṃhavāhanaḥ
a prabhāvātmā jagatkālas tālo lokahitas taruḥ
c sāraṅgo navacakrāṅgaḥ ketumālī sabhāvanaḥ
a bhūtālayo bhūtapatir ahorātram aninditaḥ
c vāhitā sarvabhūtānāṃ nilayaś ca vibhur bhavaḥ
d bhūtālayo bhūtapatir ahorātro malo 'malaḥ
d vasubhṛt sarvabhūtātmā niścalaḥ suvidur budhaḥ
d asuhṛt sarvabhūtānāṃ niścalaś calavid budhaḥ
a amoghaḥ saṃyato hy aśvo bhojanaḥ prāṇadhāraṇaḥ
c dhṛtimān matimān dakṣaḥ satkṛtaś ca yugādhipaḥ
a gopālir gopatir grāmo gocarmavasano haraḥ
c hiraṇyabāhuś ca tathā guhāpālaḥ praveśinām
a pratiṣṭhāyī mahāharṣo jitakāmo jitendriyaḥ
c gandhāraś ca surālaś ca tapaḥkarmaratir dhanuḥ
a mahāgīto mahānṛtto hy apsarogaṇasevitaḥ
c mahāketur dhanur dhātur naikasānucaraś calaḥ
a āvedanīya āveśaḥ sarvagandhasukhāvahaḥ
c toraṇas tāraṇo vāyuḥ paridhāvati caikataḥ
a saṃyogo vardhano vṛddho mahāvṛddho gaṇādhipaḥ
c nitya ātmasahāyaś ca devāsurapatiḥ patiḥ
a yuktaś ca yuktabāhuś ca dvividhaś ca suparvaṇaḥ
c āṣāḍhaś ca suṣāḍhaś ca dhruvo harihaṇo haraḥ
a vapur āvartamānebhyo vasuśreṣṭho mahāpathaḥ
c śirohārī vimarṣaś ca sarvalakṣaṇabhūṣitaḥ
a akṣaś ca rathayogī ca sarvayogī mahābalaḥ
c samāmnāyo 'samāmnāyas tīrthadevo mahārathaḥ
a nirjīvo jīvano mantraḥ śubhākṣo bahukarkaśaḥ
c ratnaprabhūto raktāṅgo mahārṇavanipānavit
a mūlo viśālo hy amṛto vyaktāvyaktas taponidhiḥ
c ārohaṇo nirohaś ca śailahārī mahātapāḥ
a senākalpo mahākalpo yugāyugakaro hariḥ
c yugarūpo mahārūpaḥ pavano gahano nagaḥ
a nyāyanirvāpaṇaḥ pādaḥ paṇḍito hy acalopamaḥ
c bahumālo mahāmālaḥ sumālo bahulocanaḥ
a vistāro lavaṇaḥ kūpaḥ kusumaḥ saphalodayaḥ
c vṛṣabho vṛṣabhāṅkāṅgo maṇibilvo jaṭādharaḥ
a indur visargaḥ sumukhaḥ suraḥ sarvāyudhaḥ sahaḥ
c nivedanaḥ sudhājātaḥ sugandhāro mahādhanuḥ
d śirodharo 'bhimarśanaḥ sarvalakṣaṇabhūṣitaḥ
d girāvāso visargaś ca sarvalakṣaṇalakṣavit
a gandhamālī ca bhagavān utthānaḥ sarvakarmaṇām
c manthāno bahulo bāhuḥ sakalaḥ sarvalocanaḥ
a tarastālī karastālī ūrdhvasaṃhanano vahaḥ
c chatraṃ succhatro vikhyātaḥ sarvalokāśrayo mahān
a muṇḍo virūpo vikṛto daṇḍimuṇḍo vikurvaṇaḥ
c haryakṣaḥ kakubho vajrī dīptajihvaḥ sahasrapāt
a sahasramūrdhā devendraḥ sarvadevamayo guruḥ
c sahasrabāhuḥ sarvāṅgaḥ śaraṇyaḥ sarvalokakṛt
a pavitraṃ trimadhur mantraḥ kaniṣṭhaḥ kṛṣṇapiṅgalaḥ
c brahmadaṇḍavinirmātā śataghnī śatapāśadhṛk
a padmagarbho mahāgarbho brahmagarbho jalodbhavaḥ
c gabhastir brahmakṛd brahmā brahmavid brāhmaṇo gatiḥ
a anantarūpo naikātmā tigmatejāḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ
c ūrdhvagātmā paśupatir vātaraṃhā manojavaḥ
a candanī padmamālāgryaḥ surabhyuttaraṇo naraḥ
c karṇikāramahāsragvī nīlamauliḥ pinākadhṛk
a umāpatir umākānto jāhnavīdhṛg umādhavaḥ
c varo varāho varado vareśaḥ sumahāsvanaḥ
a mahāprasādo damanaḥ śatruhā śvetapiṅgalaḥ
c prītātmā prayatātmā ca saṃyatātmā pradhānadhṛk
a sarvapārśvasutas tārkṣyo dharmasādhāraṇo varaḥ
c carācarātmā sūkṣmātmā suvṛṣo govṛṣeśvaraḥ
a sādhyarṣir vasur ādityo vivasvān savitā mṛḍaḥ
c vyāsaḥ sarvasya saṃkṣepo vistaraḥ paryayo nayaḥ
a ṛtuḥ saṃvatsaro māsaḥ pakṣaḥ saṃkhyāsamāpanaḥ
c kalā kāṣṭhā lavo mātrā muhūrto 'haḥ kṣapāḥ kṣaṇāḥ
a viśvakṣetraṃ prajābījaṃ liṅgam ādyas tv aninditaḥ
c sad asad vyaktam avyaktaṃ pitā mātā pitāmahaḥ
a svargadvāraṃ prajādvāraṃ mokṣadvāraṃ triviṣṭapam
c nirvāṇaṃ hlādanaṃ caiva brahmalokaḥ parā gatiḥ
a devāsuravinirmātā devāsuraparāyaṇaḥ
c devāsuragurur devo devāsuranamaskṛtaḥ
a devāsuramahāmātro devāsuragaṇāśrayaḥ
c devāsuragaṇādhyakṣo devāsuragaṇāgraṇīḥ
a devātidevo devarṣir devāsuravarapradaḥ
c devāsureśvaro devo devāsuramaheśvaraḥ
a sarvadevamayo 'cintyo devatātmātmasaṃbhavaḥ
c udbhidas trikramo vaidyo virajo virajombaraḥ
a īḍyo hastī suravyāghro devasiṃho nararṣabhaḥ
c vibudhāgravaraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvadevottamottamaḥ
a prayuktaḥ śobhano vajra īśānaḥ prabhur avyayaḥ
c guruḥ kānto nijaḥ sargaḥ pavitraḥ sarvavāhanaḥ
a śṛṅgī śṛṅgapriyo babhrū rājarājo nirāmayaḥ
c abhirāmaḥ suragaṇo virāmaḥ sarvasādhanaḥ
a lalāṭākṣo viśvadeho hariṇo brahmavarcasaḥ
c sthāvarāṇāṃ patiś caiva niyamendriyavardhanaḥ
a siddhārthaḥ sarvabhūtārtho 'cintyaḥ satyavrataḥ śuciḥ
c vratādhipaḥ paraṃ brahma muktānāṃ paramā gatiḥ
a vimukto muktatejāś ca śrīmāñ śrīvardhano jagat
c yathāpradhānaṃ bhagavān iti bhaktyā stuto mayā
a yaṃ na brahmādayo devā vidur yaṃ na maharṣayaḥ
b idam amṛtam anantam aprameyaṃ
b sakalajanārtiharaṃ samastavedyam
b japata bahubhir īritaṃ viśeṣyaṃ
b śivapadamantravighaṭṭanena tīvram
c taṃ stavyam arcyaṃ vandyaṃ ca kaḥ stoṣyati jagatpatim
d namaḥ śivāyeti sadā pradānaṃ bhagavān iti
d bhaktyā stuto mayā yat tad vidus tattvaṃ surarṣabhāḥ
a bhaktim eva puraskṛtya mayā yajñapatir vasuḥ
c tato 'bhyanujñāṃ prāpyaiva stuto matimatāṃ varaḥ
a śivam ebhiḥ stuvan devaṃ nāmabhiḥ puṣṭivardhanaiḥ
c nityayuktaḥ śucir bhūtvā prāpnoty ātmānam ātmanā
a etad dhi paramaṃ brahma svayaṃ gītaṃ svayaṃbhuvā
c ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca stuvanty etena tatparam
a stūyamāno mahādevaḥ prīyate cātmanāmabhiḥ
c bhaktānukampī bhagavān ātmasaṃsthān karoti tān
a tathaiva ca manuṣyeṣu ye manuṣyāḥ pradhānataḥ
c āstikāḥ śraddadhānāś ca bahubhir janmabhiḥ stavaiḥ
d bhaktyā hy ananyam īśānaṃ paraṃ devaṃ sanātanam
d karmaṇā manasā vācā bhāvenāmitatejasaḥ
d svapanto jāgramāṇāś ca vrajann upaviśaṃs tathā
d unmiṣan nimiṣaṃś caiva cintayantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
a jāgrataś ca svapantaś ca vrajantaḥ pathi saṃsthitāḥ
b śṛṇvantaḥ śrāvayantaś ca kathayantaś ca te bhavam
c stuvanti stūyamānāś ca tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca
e janmakoṭisahasreṣu nānāsaṃsārayoniṣu
a jantor viśuddhapāpasya bhave bhaktiḥ prajāyate
c utpannā ca bhave bhaktir ananyā sarvabhāvataḥ
a kāraṇaṃ bhāvitaṃ tasya sarvamuktasya sarvataḥ
c etad deveṣu duṣprāpaṃ manuṣyeṣu na labhyate
a nirvighnā niścalā rudre bhaktir avyabhicāriṇī
c tasyaiva ca prasādena bhaktir utpadyate nṛṇām
e yayā yānti parāṃ siddhiṃ tadbhāvagatacetasaḥ
a ye sarvabhāvopagatāḥ paratvenābhavan narāḥ
c prapannavatsalo devaḥ saṃsārāt tān samuddharet
a evam anye na kurvanti devāḥ saṃsāramocanam
c manuṣyāṇāṃ mahādevād anyatrāpi tapobalāt
a iti tenendrakalpena bhagavān sadasatpatiḥ
c kṛttivāsāḥ stutaḥ kṛṣṇa taṇḍinā śuddhabuddhinā
a stavam etaṃ bhagavato brahmā svayam adhārayat
b stavam etadgato brahmā svayam ārādhayan prajāḥ
b gīyate ca sa budhyeta brahmā śaṃkarasaṃnidhau
b idaṃ puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ ca sarvadā pāpanāśanam
b yogadaṃ mokṣadaṃ caiva svargadaṃ toṣadaṃ tathā
b evam etat paṭhante ya ekabhaktyā tu śaṃkare
b yā gatiḥ sāṃkhyayogānāṃ vrajanty etāṃ gatiṃ tadā
b stavam etaṃ prayatnena sadā rudrasya saṃnidhau
b abdam ekaṃ cared bhaktaḥ prāpnuyād īpsitaṃ phalam
b etad rahasyaṃ paramaṃ brahmaṇo hṛdi saṃsthitam
c brahmā provāca śakrāya śakraḥ provāca mṛtyave
a mṛtyuḥ provāca rudrāṇāṃ rudrebhyas taṇḍim āgamat
c mahatā tapasā prāptas taṇḍinā brahmasadmani
a taṇḍiḥ provāca śukrāya gautamāyāha bhārgavaḥ
c vaivasvatāya manave gautamaḥ prāha mādhava
a nārāyaṇāya sādhyāya manur iṣṭāya dhīmate
c yamāya prāha bhagavān sādhyo nārāyaṇo 'cyutaḥ
a nāciketāya bhagavān āha vaivasvato yamaḥ
c mārkaṇḍeyāya vārṣṇeya nāciketo 'bhyabhāṣata
a mārkaṇḍeyān mayā prāptaṃ niyamena janārdana
c tavāpy aham amitraghna stavaṃ dadmy adya viśrutam
e svargyam ārogyam āyuṣyaṃ dhanyaṃ balyaṃ tathaiva ca
a na tasya vighnaṃ kurvanti dānavā yakṣarākṣasāḥ
c piśācā yātudhānāś ca guhyakā bhujagā api
a yaḥ paṭheta śucir bhūtvā brahmacārī jitendriyaḥ
c abhagnayogo varṣaṃ tu so 'śvamedhaphalaṃ labhet
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a mahāyogī tataḥ prāha kṛṣṇadvaipāyano muniḥ
c paṭhasva putra bhadraṃ te prīyatāṃ te maheśvaraḥ
a purā putra mayā merau tapyatā paramaṃ tapaḥ
c putrahetor mahārāja stava eṣo 'nukīrtitaḥ
a labdhavān asmi tān kāmān ahaṃ vai pāṇḍunandana
c tathā tvam api śarvād dhi sarvān kāmān avāpsyasi
d kapilaś ca tataḥ prāha sāṃkhyarṣir devasaṃmataḥ
d mayā janmāny anekāni śaktyā cārādhito bhavaḥ
d prītaś ca bhagavāñ jñānaṃ dadau mama bhavāntakam
a catuḥśīrṣas tataḥ prāha śakrasya dayitaḥ sakhā
c ālambāyana ity eva viśrutaḥ karuṇātmakaḥ
a mayā gokarṇam āsādya tapas taptvā śataṃ samāḥ
c ayonijānāṃ dāntānāṃ dharmajñānāṃ suvarcasām
a ajarāṇām aduḥkhānāṃ śatavarṣasahasriṇām
c labdhaṃ putraśataṃ śarvāt purā pāṇḍunṛpātmaja
a vālmīkiś cāpi bhagavān yudhiṣṭhiram abhāṣata
c vivāde sāmni munibhir brahmaghno vai bhavān iti
e uktaḥ kṣaṇena cāviṣṭas tenādharmeṇa bhārata
a so 'ham īśānam anagham astauṣaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
c muktaś cāsmy avaśaḥ pāpāt tato duḥkhavināśanaḥ
e āha māṃ tripuraghno vai yaśas te 'gryaṃ bhaviṣyati
a jāmadagnyaś ca kaunteyam āha dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
c ṛṣimadhye sthitas tāta tapann iva vibhāvasuḥ
a pitṛvipravadhenāham ārto vai pāṇḍavāgraja
c śucir bhūtvā mahādevaṃ gatavāñ śaraṇaṃ nṛpa
a nāmabhiś cāstuvaṃ devaṃ tatas tuṣṭo 'bhavad bhavaḥ
c paraśuṃ ca dadau devo divyāny astrāṇi caiva me
a pāpaṃ na bhavitā te 'dya ajeyaś ca bhaviṣyasi
c na te prabhavitā mṛtyur yaśasvī ca bhaviṣyasi
a āha māṃ bhagavān evaṃ śikhaṇḍī śivavigrahaḥ
c yad avāptaṃ ca me sarvaṃ prasādāt tasya dhīmataḥ
d viśvāmitras tadovāca kṣatriyo 'haṃ purābhavam
d brāhmaṇo 'haṃ bhavānīti mayā cārādhito bhavaḥ
d tatprasādān mayā prāptaṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ mahat
a asito devalaś caiva prāha pāṇḍusutaṃ nṛpam
c śāpāc chakrasya kaunteya cito dharmo 'naśan mama
e tan me dharmaṃ yaśaś cāgryam āyuś caivādadad bhavaḥ
a ṛṣir gṛtsamado nāma śakrasya dayitaḥ sakhā
c prāhājamīḍhaṃ bhagavān bṛhaspatisamadyutiḥ
a vasiṣṭho nāma bhagavāṃś cākṣuṣasya manoḥ sutaḥ
c śatakrator acintyasya satre varṣasahasrike
e vartamāne 'bravīd vākyaṃ sāmni hy uccārite mayā
a rathantaraṃ dvijaśreṣṭha na samyag iti vartate
c samīkṣasva punar buddhyā harṣaṃ tyaktvā dvijottama
e ayajñavāhinaṃ pāpam akārṣīs tvaṃ sudurmate
a evam uktvā mahākrodhāt prāha ruṣṭaḥ punar vacaḥ
c prajñayā rahito duḥkhī nityaṃ bhīto vanecaraḥ
e daśa varṣasahasrāṇi daśāṣṭau ca śatāni ca
a naṣṭapānīyayavase mṛgair anyaiś ca varjite
c ayajñīyadrume deśe rurusiṃhaniṣevite
e bhavitā tvaṃ mṛgaḥ krūro mahāduḥkhasamanvitaḥ
a tasya vākyasya nidhane pārtha jāto hy ahaṃ mṛgaḥ
c tato māṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptaṃ prāha yogī maheśvaraḥ
a ajaraś cāmaraś caiva bhavitā duḥkhavarjitaḥ
c sāmyaṃ samas tu te saukhyaṃ yuvayor vardhatāṃ kratuḥ
a anugrahān evam eṣa karoti bhagavān vibhuḥ
c paraṃ dhātā vidhātā ca sukhaduḥkhe ca sarvadā
a acintya eṣa bhagavān karmaṇā manasā girā
c na me tāta yudhiśreṣṭha vidyayā paṇḍitaḥ samaḥ
d vāsudevas tadovāca punar matimatāṃ varaḥ
d suvarṇākṣo mahādevas tapasā toṣito mayā
d tato 'tha bhagavān āha prīto māṃ vai yudhiṣṭhira
d annāt priyataraḥ kṛṣṇa matprasādād bhaviṣyasi
d aparājitaś ca yuddheṣu tejaś caivānalopamam
d evaṃ sahasraśaś cātmā mahādevo varaṃ dadau
d maṇimanthe 'tha śaile vai purā saṃrādhito mayā
d varṣāyutasahasrāṇāṃ sahasraśatam eva ca
d tato māṃ bhagavān prīta idaṃ vacanam abravīt
d varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te yas te manasi vartate
d tataḥ praṇamya śirasā idaṃ vacanam abruvam
d yadi prīto mahādevo bhaktyā paramayā prabhuḥ
d nityakālaṃ taveśāna bhaktir bhavatu me sthirā
d evam astv iti bhagavāṃs tatroktvāntaradhīyata
d jaigīṣavyas tathā prāha jagaddhātā maheśvaraḥ
 jaigīṣavya uvāca
a mamāṣṭaguṇam aiśvaryaṃ dattaṃ bhagavatā purā
c yatnenālpena balinā vārāṇasyāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
d parāśaraś cāha muniḥ purā mama ca toṣitaḥ
 gārgya uvāca
a catuḥṣaṣṭyaṅgam adadāt kālajñānaṃ mamādbhutam
c sarasvatyās taṭe tuṣṭo manoyajñena pāṇḍava
a tulyaṃ mama sahasraṃ tu sutānāṃ brahmavādinām
c āyuś caiva saputrasya saṃvatsaraśatāyutam
 parāśara uvāca
a prasādyāhaṃ purā śarvaṃ manasācintayaṃ nṛpa
c mahātapā mahātejā mahāyogī mahāyaśāḥ
e vedavyāsaḥ śriyāvāso brahmaṇyaḥ karuṇātmakaḥ
a api nāmepsitaḥ putro mama syād vai maheśvarāt
b tad abhijñāya mām āha śaṃkaras tripurārdanaḥ
b pitṛkanyā vasoḥ putrī śāpād dāśagṛhoditā
b tasyāṃ viṣṇukṛtā nāma vidyayā śodhakaḥ satām
c iti matvā hṛdi mataṃ prāha māṃ surasattamaḥ
a mayi saṃbhavatas tasya phalāt kṛṣṇo bhaviṣyati
c sāvarṇasya manoḥ sarge saptarṣiś ca bhaviṣyati
a vedānāṃ ca sa vai vyastā kuruvaṃśakaras tathā
c itihāsasya kartā ca putras te jagato hitaḥ
a bhaviṣyati mahendrasya dayitaḥ sa mahāmuniḥ
c ajaraś cāmaraś caiva parāśara sutas tava
a evam uktvā sa bhagavāṃs tatraivāntaradhīyata
c yudhiṣṭhira mahāyogī vīryavān akṣayo 'vyayaḥ
d māṇḍavyaś cāha deveśa bhakto lokahite bhave
 māṇḍavya uvāca
a acauraś cauraśaṅkāyāṃ śūle bhinno hy ahaṃ yadā
c tatrasthena stuto devaḥ prāha māṃ vai maheśvaraḥ
a mokṣaṃ prāpsyasi śūlāc ca jīviṣyasi samārbudam
c rujā śūlakṛtā caiva na te vipra bhaviṣyati
e ādhibhir vyādhibhiś caiva varjitas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
f amarṣaṃ saphalaṃ kartuṃ śakto nirvighnadharmabhāk
a pādāc caturthāt saṃbhūta ātmā yasmān mune tava
c tvaṃ bhaviṣyasy anupamo janma vai saphalaṃ kuru
a tīrthābhiṣekaṃ saphalaṃ tvam avighnena cāpsyasi
c svargaṃ caivākṣayaṃ vipra vidadhāmi tavorjitam
a evam uktvā tu bhagavān vareṇyo vṛṣavāhanaḥ
c maheśvaro mahārāja kṛttivāsā mahādyutiḥ
e sagaṇo daivataśreṣṭhas tatraivāntaradhīyata
 gālava uvāca
a viśvāmitrābhyanujñāto hy ahaṃ pitaram āgataḥ
c abravīn māṃ tato mātā duḥkhitā rudatī bhṛśam
a kauśikenābhyanujñātaṃ putraṃ vedavibhūṣitam
c na tāta taruṇaṃ dāntaṃ pitā tvāṃ paśyate 'nagha
a śrutvā jananyā vacanaṃ nirāśo gurudarśane
c niyatātmā mahādevam apaśyaṃ so 'bravīc ca mām
a pitā mātā ca te tvaṃ ca putra mṛtyuvivarjitāḥ

 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca

d aśubhaiḥ pāpakarmāṇo ye narāḥ kaluṣīkṛtāḥ

a cintāgatā ye ca deveṣu mukhyā

c sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ yat parāṇāṃ paraṃ ca

 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca

a kiṃ draṣṭavyaṃ mayā tatra vaktum arhati me bhavān

 vadānya uvāca

c divyāṅgarāgaiḥ paiśācair vanyair nānāvidhais tathā

 bhīṣma uvāca
a tato 'gacchat sa bhagavān uttarām uttamāṃ diśam

b gaṅgādharaṃ gopatigaṃ gaṇāvṛtam akalmaṣam
c kailāsaṃ mandaraṃ haimaṃ sarvān anucacāra ha
