c sarvabhūtātmayonīṃś ca tān namasyāmy ahaṃ dvijān
a nityam etān namasyāmi kṛṣṇa lokakarān ṛṣīn
c lokajyeṣṭhāñ jñānaniṣṭhāṃs tamoghnāṃl lokabhāskarān
a tasmāt tvam api vārṣṇeya dvijān pūjaya nityadā
c pūjitāḥ pūjanārhā hi sukhaṃ dāsyanti te 'nagha
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d pitāmaha mahāprājña sarvaśāstraviśārada
d tvatto 'haṃ śrotum icchāmi dharmaṃ bharatasattama
d śaraṇāgataṃ ye rakṣanti bhūtagrāmaṃ caturvidham
d kiṃ tasya bharataśreṣṭha phalaṃ bhavati tattvataḥ
d bhīṣmaḥ
d idaṃ śṛṇu mahārāja dharmaputra mahāyaśaḥ
d itihāsaṃ purāvṛttaṃ śaraṇārthaṃ mahāphalam
d prapātyamānaḥ śyenena kapotaḥ priyadarśanaḥ
d vṛṣadarbhaṃ mahābhāgaṃ narendraṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
d sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā viśuddhātmā trāsād aṅkam upāgatam
d āśvāsyāśvasihīty āha na te 'sti bhayam aṇḍaja
d bhayaṃ te sumahat kasmāt kutra kiṃ vā kṛtaṃ tvayā
d yena tvam iha saṃprāpto visaṃjño bhrāntacetanaḥ
d navanīlotpalāpīḍa cāruvarṇa sudarśana
d dāḍimāśokapuṣpākṣa mā trasasvābhayaṃ tava
d matsakāśam anuprāptaṃ na tvāṃ kaś cit samutsahet
d manasā grahaṇaṃ kartuṃ rakṣādhyakṣapuraskṛtam
d kāśirājyaṃ tavādyedaṃ tvadarthaṃ jīvitaṃ tathā
d śyenaḥ
d tyajeyaṃ bhava viśrabdhaḥ kapota na bhayaṃ tava
d mamaitad vihitaṃ bhakṣyaṃ na rājaṃs trātum arhasi
d atikrāntaṃ ca prāptaṃ ca prayatnāc copapāditam
d māṃsaṃ ca rudhiraṃ cāsya majjā medaś ca me hitam
d paritoṣakaro hy eṣa mama māsyāgrato bhava
d tṛṣṇā me bādhate 'tyugrā kṣudhā nirdahatīva mām
d muñcainaṃ na hi śakṣyāmi rājan mandayituṃ kṣudhām
d mayā hy anusṛto hy eṣa matpakṣanakhavikṣataḥ
d kiṃ cid ucchvāsaniḥśvāsaṃ na rājan goptum arhasi
d yadi svaviṣaye rājan prabhus tvaṃ rakṣaṇe nṛṇām
d khecarasya tṛṣārtasya na tvaṃ prabhur atho mama
d yadi vairiṣu bhṛtyeṣu svajanavyavahārayoḥ
d viṣayeṣv indriyāṇāṃ ca ākāśe mā parākrama
d prabhutvaṃ hi parākramya samyak pakṣahareṣu te
d bhīṣmaḥ
d yadi tvam iha dharmārthī mām api draṣṭum arhasi
d śrutvā śyenasya tad vākyaṃ rājarṣir vismayaṃ gataḥ
d saṃbhāvya cainaṃ tad vākyaṃ tadarthī pratyabhāṣata
d govṛṣo vā varāho vā mṛgo vā mahiṣo 'pi vā
d tvadartham adya kriyatāṃ kṣudhāpraśamanāya te
d śaraṇāgataṃ na tyajeyam iti me vratam āhitam
d śyenaḥ
d na muñcati mamāṅgāni dvijo 'yaṃ paśya vai dvija
d na varāhaṃ na cokṣāṇaṃ na cānyān vividhān dvijān
d bhakṣayāmi mahārāja kim annādyena tena me
d yas tu me vihito bhakṣaḥ svayaṃ devaiḥ sanātanaḥ
d śyenāḥ kapotān khādanti sthitir eṣā sanātanī
d uśīnara kapote tu yadi snehas tavānagha
d rājā
d tatas tvaṃ me prayacchādya svamāṃsaṃ tulayā dhṛtam
d mahān anugraho me 'dya yas tvam evam ihāttha mām
d bāḍham evaṃ kariṣyāmīty uktvāsau rājasattamaḥ
d utkṛtyotkṛtya māṃsāni tulayā samatolayat
d antaḥpure tatas tasya striyo ratnavibhūṣitāḥ
d hāhābhūtā viniṣkrāntāḥ śrutvā paramaduḥkhitāḥ
d tāsāṃ ruditaśabdena mantribhṛtyajanasya ca
d babhūva sumahān nādo meghagambhīranisvanaḥ
d niruddhaṃ gaganaṃ sarvaṃ śubhraṃ meghaiḥ samantataḥ
d mahī pracalitā cāsīt tasya satyena karmaṇā
d sa rājā pārśvataś caiva bāhubhyām ūrutaś ca yat
d tāni māṃsāni saṃchidya tulāṃ pūrayate śanaiḥ
d tathāpi na samas tena kapotena babhūva ha
d asthibhūto yadā rājā nirmāṃso rudhirasravaḥ
d tulāṃ tataḥ samārūḍhaḥ svaṃ māṃsakṣayam utsṛjan
d tataḥ sendrās trayo lokās taṃ narendram upasthitāḥ
d bheryaś cākāśagais tatra vāditā devaduṃdubhiḥ
d amṛtenāvasiktaś ca vṛṣadarbho nareśvaraḥ
d divyaiś ca susukhair mālyair abhivṛṣṭaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
d devagandharvasaṃghātair apsarobhiś ca sarvataḥ
d nṛttaś caivopagītaś ca pitāmaha iva prabhuḥ
d hemaprāsādasaṃbādhaṃ maṇikāñcanatoraṇam
d sa vaidūryamaṇistambhaṃ vimānaṃ samadhiṣṭhitaḥ
d sa rājarṣir gataḥ svargaṃ karmaṇā tena śāśvatam
d śaraṇāgateṣu caivaṃ tvaṃ kuru sarvaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
d bhaktānām anuraktānām āśritānāṃ ca rakṣitā
d dayāvān sarvabhūteṣu paratra sukham edhate
d sādhuvṛtto hi yo rājā sadvṛttam anutiṣṭhati
d kiṃ na prāptaṃ bhavet tena svavyājeneha karmaṇā
d sa rājarṣir viśuddhātmā dhīraḥ satyaparākramaḥ
d kāśīnām īśvaraḥ khyātas triṣu lokeṣu karmaṇā
d yo 'py anyaḥ kārayed evaṃ śaraṇāgatarakṣaṇam
d so 'pi gaccheta tām eva gatiṃ bharatasattama
d idaṃ vṛttaṃ hi rājarṣer vṛṣadarbhasya kīrtayan
d pūtātmā vai bhavel loke śṛṇuyād yaś ca nityaśaḥ
a asmiṃl loke sadā hy ete paratra ca sukhapradāḥ
c ta ete mānyamānā vai pradāsyanti sukhaṃ tava
a ye sarvātithayo nityaṃ goṣu ca brāhmaṇeṣu ca
c nityaṃ satye ca niratā durgāṇy atitaranti te
a nityaṃ śamaparā ye ca tathā ye cānasūyakāḥ
c nityaṃ svādhyāyino ye ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
a sarvān devān namasyanti ye caikaṃ devam āśritāḥ
c śraddadhānāś ca dāntāś ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
a tathaiva viprapravarān namaskṛtya yatavratān
c bhavanti ye dānaratā durgāṇy atitaranti te
d tapasvinaś ca ye nityaṃ kaumārabrahmacāriṇaḥ
d tapasā bhāvitātmāno durgāṇy atitaranti te
d devatātithibhṛtyānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ cārcane ratāḥ
d śiṣṭānnabhojino ye ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
a agnīn ādhāya vidhivat prayatā dhārayanti ye
c prāptāḥ somāhutiṃ caiva durgāṇy atitaranti te
a mātāpitror guruṣu ca samyag vartanti ye sadā
c yathā tvaṃ vṛṣṇiśārdūlety uktvaivaṃ virarāma saḥ
a tasmāt tvam api kaunteya pitṛdevadvijātithīn
c samyak pūjaya yena tvaṃ gatim iṣṭām avāpsyasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kiṃ rājñaḥ sarvakṛtyānāṃ garīyaḥ syāt pitāmaha
c kiṃ kurvan karma nṛpatir ubhau lokau samaśnute
 bhīṣma uvāca
a etad rājñaḥ kṛtyatamam abhiṣiktasya bhārata
c brāhmaṇānām anuṣṭhānam atyantaṃ sukham icchatā
d brāhmaṇānāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ ca pūjā ca sukham icchataḥ
d kartavyaṃ pārthiveneha tad viddhi bharatarṣabha
e śrotriyān brāhmaṇān vṛddhān nityam evābhipūjayet
a paurajānapadāṃś cāpi brāhmaṇāṃś ca bahuśrutān
c sāntvena bhogadānena namaskārais tathārcayet
a etat kṛtyatamaṃ rājño nityam eveti lakṣayet
c yathātmānaṃ yathā putrāṃs tathaitān paripālayet
a ye cāpy eṣāṃ pūjyatamās tān dṛḍhaṃ pratipūjayet
c teṣu śānteṣu tad rāṣṭraṃ sarvam eva virājate
a te pūjyās te namaskāryās te rakṣyāḥ pitaro yathā
c teṣv eva yātrā lokasya bhūtānām iva vāsave
a abhicārair upāyaiś ca daheyur api tejasā
c niḥśeṣaṃ kupitāḥ kuryur ugrāḥ satyaparākramāḥ
a nāntam eṣāṃ prapaśyāmi na diśaś cāpy apāvṛtāḥ
c kupitāḥ samudīkṣante dāveṣv agniśikhā iva
a vidyan teṣāṃ sāhasikā guṇās teṣām atīva hi
c kūpā iva tṛṇacchannā viśuddhā dyaur ivāpare
a prasahyakāriṇaḥ ke cit kārpāsamṛdavo 'pare
b mānyās teṣāṃ sādhavo ye na nindyāś cāpy asādhavaḥ
c santi caiṣām atiśaṭhās tathānye 'titapasvinaḥ
a kṛṣigorakṣyam apy anye bhaikṣam anye 'py anuṣṭhitāḥ
c corāś cānye 'nṛtāś cānye tathānye naṭanartakāḥ
a sarvakarmasu dṛśyante praśānteṣv itareṣu ca
c vividhācārayuktāś ca brāhmaṇā bharatarṣabha
a nānākarmasu yuktānāṃ bahukarmopajīvinām
c dharmajñānāṃ satāṃ teṣāṃ nityam evānukīrtayet
a pitṝṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca manuṣyoragarakṣasām
c purohitā mahābhāgā brāhmaṇā vai narādhipa
a naite devair na pitṛbhir na gandharvair na rākṣasaiḥ
c nāsurair na piśācaiś ca śakyā jetuṃ dvijātayaḥ
a adaivaṃ daivataṃ kuryur daivataṃ cāpy adaivatam
c yam iccheyuḥ sa rājā syād yaṃ dviṣyuḥ sa parābhavet
a parivādaṃ ca ye kuryur brāhmaṇānām acetasaḥ
b satyaṃ bravīmi te rājan vinaśyeyur asaṃśayam
c nindāpraśaṃsākuśalāḥ kīrtyakīrtiparāvarāḥ
e parikupyanti te rājan satataṃ dviṣatāṃ dvijāḥ
a brāhmaṇā yaṃ praśaṃsanti puruṣaḥ sa pravardhate
c brāhmaṇair yaḥ parākruṣṭaḥ parābhūyāt kṣaṇād dhi saḥ
a śakā yavanakāmbojās tās tāḥ kṣatriyajātayaḥ
c vṛṣalatvaṃ parigatā brāhmaṇānām adarśanāt
a dramiḷāś ca kaliṅgāś ca pulindāś cāpy uśīnarāḥ
c kaulāḥ sarpā māhiṣakās tās tāḥ kṣatriyajātayaḥ
a vṛṣalatvaṃ parigatā brāhmaṇānām adarśanāt
c śreyān parājayas tebhyo na jayo jayatāṃ vara
a yas tu sarvam idaṃ hanyād brāhmaṇaṃ ca na tatsamam
c brahmavadhyā mahān doṣa ity āhuḥ paramarṣayaḥ
a parivādo dvijātīnāṃ na śrotavyaḥ kathaṃ cana
c āsītādhomukhas tūṣṇīṃ samutthāya vrajeta vā
a na sa jāto janiṣyo vā pṛthivyām iha kaś cana
c yo brāhmaṇavirodhena sukhaṃ jīvitum utsahet
a durgraho muṣṭinā vāyur duḥsparśaḥ pāṇinā śaśī
c durdharā pṛthivī mūrdhnā durjayā brāhmaṇā bhuvi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a brāhmaṇān eva satataṃ bhṛśaṃ saṃpratipūjayet
c ete hi somarājāna īśvarāḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
a ete bhogair alaṃkārair anyaiś caiva kim icchakaiḥ
c sadā pūjyā namaskāryā rakṣyāś ca pitṛvan nṛpaiḥ
e ato rāṣṭrasya śāntir hi bhūtānām iva vāsavāt
a jāyatāṃ brahmavarcasvī rāṣṭre vai brāhmaṇaḥ śuciḥ
c mahārathaś ca rājanya eṣṭavyaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ
d iti māṃ nāradaḥ prāha satataṃ sarvabhūtaye
a brāhmaṇaṃ jātisaṃpannaṃ dharmajñaṃ saṃśitavratam
c vāsayeta gṛhe rājan na tasmāt param asti vai
a brāhmaṇebhyo havir dattaṃ pratigṛhṇanti devatāḥ
c pitaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ naitebhyo vidyate param
a ādityaś candramā vāyur bhūmir āpo 'mbaraṃ diśaḥ
c sarve brāhmaṇam āviśya sadānnam upabhuñjate
a na tasyāśnanti pitaro yasya viprā na bhuñjate
c devāś cāpy asya nāśnanti pāpasya brāhmaṇadviṣaḥ
a brāhmaṇeṣu tu tuṣṭeṣu prīyante pitaraḥ sadā
c tathaiva devatā rājan nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
a tathaiva te 'pi prīyante yeṣāṃ bhavati tad dhaviḥ
c na ca pretya vinaśyanti gacchanti paramāṃ gatim
a yena yenaiva haviṣā brāhmaṇāṃs tarpayen naraḥ
c tena tenaiva prīyante pitaro devatās tathā
a brāhmaṇād eva tad bhūtaṃ prabhavanti yataḥ prajāḥ
c yataś cāyaṃ prabhavati pretya yatra ca gacchati
a vedaiṣa mārgaṃ svargasya tathaiva narakasya ca
c āgatānāgate cobhe brāhmaṇo dvipadāṃ varaḥ
e brāhmaṇo bharataśreṣṭha svadharmaṃ veda medhayā
a ye cainam anuvartante te na yānti parābhavam
c na te pretya vinaśyanti gacchanti na parābhavam
a ye brāhmaṇamukhāt prāptaṃ pratigṛhṇanti vai vacaḥ
c kṛtātmāno mahātmānas te na yānti parābhavam
a kṣatriyāṇāṃ pratapatāṃ tejasā ca balena ca
c brāhmaṇeṣv eva śāmyanti tejāṃsi ca balāni ca
a bhṛgavo 'jayaṃs tālajaṅghān nīpān aṅgiraso 'jayan
c bharadvājo vaitahavyān ailāṃś ca bharatarṣabha
a citrāyudhāṃś cāpy ajayann ete kṛṣṇājinadhvajāḥ
c prakṣipyātha ca kumbhān vai pāragāminam ārabhet
a yat kiṃ cit kathyate loke śrūyate paśyate 'pi vā
c sarvaṃ tad brāhmaṇeṣv eva gūḍho 'gnir iva dāruṣu
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c saṃvādaṃ vāsudevasya pṛthvyāś ca bharatarṣabha
 vāsudeva uvāca
a mātaraṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ pṛcche tvā saṃśayaṃ śubhe
c kena svit karmaṇā pāpaṃ vyapohati naro gṛhī
 pṛthivy uvāca
a brāhmaṇān eva seveta pavitraṃ hy etad uttamam
c brāhmaṇān sevamānasya rajaḥ sarvaṃ praṇaśyati
a ato bhūtir ataḥ kīrtir ato buddhiḥ prajāyate
c apareṣāṃ pareṣāṃ ca parebhyaś caiva ye pare
a brāhmaṇā yaṃ praśaṃsanti puruṣaḥ sa pravardhate
c atha yo brāhmaṇākruṣṭaḥ parābhavati so 'cirāt
a yathā mahārṇave kṣipta āmaloṣṭo vinaśyati
c tathā duścaritaṃ karma parābhāvāya kalpate
a paśya candre kṛtaṃ lakṣma samudre lavaṇodakam
c tathā bhagasahasreṇa mahendraṃ paricihnitam
a teṣām eva prabhāvena sahasranayano hy asau
c śatakratuḥ samabhavat paśya mādhava yādṛśam
a icchan bhūtiṃ ca kīrtiṃ ca lokāṃś ca madhusūdana
c brāhmaṇānumate tiṣṭhet puruṣaḥ śucir ātmavān
a ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā medinyā madhusūdanaḥ
c sādhu sādhv ity athety uktvā medinīṃ pratyapūjayat
a etāṃ śrutvopamāṃ pārtha prayato brāhmaṇarṣabhān
a prayato bharatarṣabha
a brāhmaṇāñ śrutasaṃpannān
c satataṃ pūjayethās tvaṃ tataḥ śreyo 'bhipatsyase
 bhīṣma uvāca
a janmanaiva mahābhāgo brāhmaṇo nāma jāyate
c namasyaḥ sarvabhūtānām atithiḥ prasṛtāgrabhuk
a sarvān naḥ suhṛdas tāta brāhmaṇāḥ sumanomukhāḥ
b sarvān ete haniṣyanti brāhmaṇā jātamanyavaḥ
c gīrbhir maṅgalayuktābhir anudhyāyanti pūjitāḥ
a sarvān no dviṣatas tāta brāhmaṇā jātamanyavaḥ
c gīrbhir dāruṇayuktābhir abhihanyur apūjitāḥ
a atra gāthā brahmagītāḥ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥ
c sṛṣṭvā dvijātīn dhātā hi yathāpūrvaṃ samādadhat
a na vo 'nyad iha kartavyaṃ kiṃ cid ūrdhvaṃ yathāvidhi
c guptā gopāyata brahma śreyo vas tena śobhanam
a svam eva kurvatāṃ karma śrīr vo brāhmī bhaviṣyati
c pramāṇaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ pragrahaṃ ca gamiṣyatha
a na śaudraṃ karma kartavyaṃ brāhmaṇena vipaścitā
c śaudraṃ hi kurvataḥ karma dharmaḥ samuparudhyate
a śrīś ca buddhiś ca tejaś ca vibhūtiś ca pratāpinī
c svādhyāyenaiva māhātmyaṃ vimalaṃ pratipatsyatha
a hutvā cāhavanīyasthaṃ mahābhāgye pratiṣṭhitāḥ
c agrabhojyāḥ prasūtīnāṃ śriyā brāhmyānukalpitāḥ
a śraddhayā parayā yuktā hy anabhidrohalabdhayā
c damasvādhyāyaniratāḥ sarvān kāmān avāpsyatha
a yac caiva mānuṣe loke yac ca deveṣu kiṃ cana
c sarvaṃ tat tapasā sādhyaṃ jñānena vinayena ca
d yuṣmatsaṃmānanāṃ prītiṃ pāvanaiḥ kṣatriyāśramam
d amutreha samāyānti vaiśyaśūdrādikās tathā
d arakṣitāś ca yuṣmābhir viruddhā yānti viplavam
d yuṣmattejodhṛtā lokās tad rakṣatha jagattrayam
a ity etā brahmagītās te samākhyātā mayānagha
c viprānukampārtham idaṃ tena proktaṃ hi dhīmatā
a bhūyas teṣāṃ balaṃ manye yathā rājñas tapasvinaḥ
c durāsadāś ca caṇḍāś ca rabhasāḥ kṣiprakāriṇaḥ
a santy eṣāṃ siṃhasattvāś ca vyāghrasattvās tathāpare
c varāhamṛgasattvāś ca gajasattvās tathāpare
a karpāsamṛdavaḥ ke cit tathānye makaraspṛśaḥ
c vibhāṣyaghātinaḥ ke cit tathā cakṣurhaṇo 'pare
a santi cāśīviṣanibhāḥ santi mandās tathāpare
c vividhānīha vṛttāni brāhmaṇānāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
a mekalā dramiḍāḥ kāśāḥ pauṇḍrāḥ kollagirās tathā
c śauṇḍikā daradā darvāś caurāḥ śabarabarbarāḥ
a kirātā yavanāś caiva tās tāḥ kṣatriyajātayaḥ
c vṛṣalatvam anuprāptā brāhmaṇānām adarśanāt
a brāhmaṇānāṃ paribhavād asurāḥ salileśayāḥ
c brāhmaṇānāṃ prasādāc ca devāḥ svarganivāsinaḥ
a aśakyaṃ spraṣṭum ākāśam acālyo himavān giriḥ
c avāryā setunā gaṅgā durjayā brāhmaṇā bhuvi
a na brāhmaṇavirodhena śakyā śāstuṃ vasuṃdharā
c brāhmaṇā hi mahātmāno devānām api devatāḥ
a tān pūjayasva satataṃ dānena paricaryayā
c yadīcchasi mahīṃ bhoktum imāṃ sāgaramekhalām
a pratigraheṇa tejo hi viprāṇāṃ śāmyate 'nagha
c pratigrahaṃ ye neccheyus te 'pi rakṣyās tvayānagha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c śakraśambarasaṃvādaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
a śakro hy ajñātarūpeṇa jaṭī bhūtvā rajoruṇaḥ
c virūpaṃ rūpam āsthāya praśnaṃ papraccha śambaram
a kena śambara vṛttena svajātyān adhitiṣṭhasi
c śreṣṭhaṃ tvāṃ kena manyante tan me prabrūhi pṛcchataḥ
 śambara uvāca
a nāsūyāmi sadā viprān brahmāṇaṃ ca pitāmaham
c śāstrāṇi vadato viprān saṃmanyāmi yathāsukham
a śrutvā ca nāvajānāmi nāparādhyāmi karhi cit
c abhyarcyān anupṛcchāmi pādau gṛhṇāmi dhīmatām
a te viśrabdhāḥ prabhāṣante saṃyacchanti ca māṃ sadā
c pramatteṣv apramatto 'smi sadā supteṣu jāgṛmi
a te mā śāstrapathe yuktaṃ brahmaṇyam anasūyakam
c samāsiñcanti śāstāraḥ kṣaudraṃ madhv iva makṣikāḥ
a yac ca bhāṣanti te tuṣṭās tat tad gṛhṇāmi medhayā
c samādhim ātmano nityam anulomam acintayan
a so 'haṃ vāgagrasṛṣṭānāṃ rasānām avalehakaḥ
c svajātyān adhitiṣṭhāmi nakṣatrāṇīva candramāḥ
a etat pṛthivyām amṛtam etac cakṣur anuttamam
c yad brāhmaṇamukhāc chāstram iha śrutvā pravartate
a etat kāraṇam ājñāya dṛṣṭvā devāsuraṃ purā
c yuddhaṃ pitā me hṛṣṭātmā vismitaḥ pratyapadyata
a dṛṣṭvā ca brāhmaṇānāṃ tu mahimānaṃ mahātmanām
c paryapṛcchat katham ime siddhā iti niśākaram
d sa pṛṣṭas tān uvācedaṃ siddhāṃs tatra niśākaraḥ
 soma uvāca
a brāhmaṇās tapasā sarve sidhyante vāgbalāḥ sadā
c bhujavīryā hi rājāno vāgastrāś ca dvijātayaḥ
a pravasan vāpy adhīyīta bahvīr durvasatīr vasan
c nirmanyur api nirmāno yatiḥ syāt samadarśanaḥ
a api cej jātisaṃpannaḥ sarvān vedān pitur gṛhe
c ślāghamāna ivādhīyed grāmya ity eva taṃ viduḥ
a bhūmir etau nigirati sarpo bilaśayān iva
c rājānaṃ cāpy ayoddhāraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ cāpravāsinam
a atimānaḥ śriyaṃ hanti puruṣasyālpamedhasaḥ
c garbheṇa duṣyate kanyā gṛhavāsena ca dvijaḥ
d vidyāvido lokavidas tapodamasamanvitāḥ
d nityaṃ pūjyāś ca vandyāś ca dvijā lokadvayecchubhiḥ
a ity etan me pitā śrutvā somād adbhutadarśanāt
c brāhmaṇān pūjayām āsa tathaivāhaṃ mahāvratān
 bhīṣma uvāca
a śrutvaitad vacanaṃ śakro dānavendramukhāc cyutam
c dvijān saṃpūjayām āsa mahendratvam avāpa ca
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a apūrvaṃ vā bhavet pātram atha vāpi ciroṣitam
c dūrād abhyāgataṃ vāpi kiṃ pātraṃ syāt pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a kriyā bhavati keṣāṃ cid upāṃśuvratam uttamam
c yo yo yāceta yat kiṃ cit sarvaṃ dadyāma ity uta
a apīḍayan bhṛtyavargam ity evam anuśuśruma
c pīḍayan bhṛtyavargaṃ hi ātmānam apakarṣati
a apūrvaṃ vāpi yat pātraṃ yac cāpi syāc ciroṣitam
c dūrād abhyāgataṃ cāpi tat pātraṃ ca vidur budhāḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a apīḍayā ca bhṛtyānāṃ dharmasyāhiṃsayā tathā
c pātraṃ vidyāma tattvena yasmai dattaṃ na saṃtapet
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ṛtvikpurohitācāryāḥ śiṣyāḥ saṃbandhibāndhavāḥ
c sarve pūjyāś ca mānyāś ca śrutavṛttopasaṃhitāḥ
a ato 'nyathā vartamānāḥ sarve nārhanti satkriyām
c tasmān nityaṃ parīkṣeta puruṣān praṇidhāya vai
a akrodhaḥ satyavacanam ahiṃsā dama ārjavam
c adroho nātimānaś ca hrīs titikṣā tapaḥ śamaḥ
a yasminn etāni dṛśyante na cākāryāṇi bhārata
c bhāvato viniviṣṭāni tat pātraṃ mānam arhati
a tathā ciroṣitaṃ cāpi saṃpratyāgatam eva ca
c apūrvaṃ caiva pūrvaṃ ca tat pātraṃ mānam arhati
a aprāmāṇyaṃ ca vedānāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ cātilaṅghanam
c sarvatra cānavasthānam etan nāśanam ātmanaḥ
a bhavet paṇḍitamānī yo brāhmaṇo vedanindakaḥ
c ānvīkṣikīṃ tarkavidyām anurakto nirarthikām
a hetuvādān bruvan satsu vijetāhetuvādikaḥ
b vidyātapobhyāṃ hīnena na tu grāhyaḥ pratigrahaḥ
b gṛhṇan pratigraham atho nayaty ātmānam eva ca
b pratigrahasamartho 'pi nādatte yaḥ pratigraham
b ye lokā dānaśīlānāṃ sa tān āpnoti puṣkalān
c ākroṣṭā cātivaktā ca brāhmaṇānāṃ sadaiva hi
a sarvābhiśaṅkī mūḍhaś ca bālaḥ kaṭukavāg api
c boddhavyas tādṛśas tāta naraśvānaṃ hi taṃ viduḥ
a yathā śvā bhaṣituṃ caiva hantuṃ caivāvasṛjyate
c evaṃ saṃbhāṣaṇārthāya sarvaśāstravadhāya ca
e alpaśrutāḥ kutarkāś ca dṛṣṭāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ kupaṇḍitāḥ
a śrutismṛtītihāsādipurāṇāraṇyavedinaḥ
c anurundhyād bahujñāṃś ca sārajñāṃś caiva paṇḍitān
a lokayātrā ca draṣṭavyā dharmaś cātmahitāni ca
c evaṃ naro vartamānaḥ śāśvatīr edhate samāḥ
a ṛṇam unmucya devānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca tathaiva ca
c pitṝṇām atha viprāṇām atithīnāṃ ca pañcamam
a paryāyeṇa viśuddhena sunirṇiktena karmaṇā
c evaṃ gṛhasthaḥ karmāṇi kurvan dharmān na hīyate
d pātrāṇām uttamaṃ pātraṃ tad āhur dharmacintakāḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a strīṇāṃ svabhāvam icchāmi śrotuṃ bharatasattama
c striyo hi mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ laghucittāḥ pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c nāradasya ca saṃvādaṃ puṃścalyā pañcacūḍayā
a lokān anucaran dhīmān devarṣir nāradaḥ purā
c dadarśāpsarasaṃ brāhmīṃ pañcacūḍām aninditām
a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā cārusarvāṅgīṃ papracchāpsarasaṃ muniḥ
c saṃśayo hṛdi me kaś cit tan me brūhi sumadhyame
a evam uktā tu sā vipraṃ pratyuvācātha nāradam
c viṣaye sati vakṣyāmi samarthāṃ manyase ca mām
 nārada uvāca
a na tvām aviṣaye bhadre niyokṣyāmi kathaṃ cana
c strīṇāṃ svabhāvam icchāmi tvattaḥ śrotuṃ varānane
 bhīṣma uvāca
a etac chrutvā vacas tasya devarṣer apsarottamā
c pratyuvāca na śakṣyāmi strī satī nindituṃ striyaḥ
a viditās te striyo yāś ca yādṛśāś ca svabhāvataḥ
c na mām arhasi devarṣe niyoktuṃ praśna īdṛśe
a tām uvāca sa devarṣiḥ satyaṃ vada sumadhyame
c mṛṣāvāde bhaved doṣaḥ satye doṣo na vidyate
a ity uktā sā kṛtamatir abhavac cāruhāsinī
c strīdoṣāñ śāśvatān satyān bhāṣituṃ saṃpracakrame
 pañcacūḍovāca
a kulīnā rūpavatyaś ca nāthavatyaś ca yoṣitaḥ
c maryādāsu na tiṣṭhanti sa doṣaḥ strīṣu nārada
a na strībhyaḥ kiṃ cid anyad vai pāpīyastaram asti vai
c striyo hi mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ tathā tvam api vettha ha
a samājñātān ṛddhimataḥ pratirūpān vaśe sthitān
c patīn antaram āsādya nālaṃ nāryaḥ pratīkṣitum
a asaddharmas tv ayaṃ strīṇām asmākaṃ bhavati prabho
c pāpīyaso narān yad vai lajjāṃ tyaktvā bhajāmahe
a striyaṃ hi yaḥ prārthayate saṃnikarṣaṃ ca gacchati
c īṣac ca kurute sevāṃ tam evecchanti yoṣitaḥ
a anarthitvān manuṣyāṇāṃ bhayāt parijanasya ca
c maryādāyām amaryādāḥ striyas tiṣṭhanti bhartṛṣu
a nāsāṃ kaś cid agamyo 'sti nāsāṃ vayasi saṃsthitiḥ
c virūpaṃ rūpavantaṃ vā pumān ity eva bhuñjate
a na bhayān nāpy anukrośān nārthahetoḥ kathaṃ cana
c na jñātikulasaṃbandhāt striyas tiṣṭhanti bhartṛṣu
a yauvane vartamānānāṃ mṛṣṭābharaṇavāsasām
c nārīṇāṃ svairavṛttānāṃ spṛhayanti kulastriyaḥ
a yāś ca śaśvad bahumatā rakṣyante dayitāḥ striyaḥ
c api tāḥ saṃprasajjante kubjāndhajaḍavāmanaiḥ
a paṅguṣv api ca devarṣe ye cānye kutsitā narāḥ
c strīṇām agamyo loke 'smin nāsti kaś cin mahāmune
a yadi puṃsāṃ gatir brahma kathaṃ cin nopapadyate
c apy anyonyaṃ pravartante na hi tiṣṭhanti bhartṛṣu
d duṣṭācārāḥ pāparatā asatyā māyayā vṛtāḥ
d adṛṣṭabuddhibahulāḥ prāyeṇety avagamyatām
a alābhāt puruṣāṇāṃ hi bhayāt parijanasya ca
c vadhabandhabhayāc cāpi svayaṃ guptā bhavanti tāḥ
a calasvabhāvā duḥsevyā durgrāhyā bhāvatas tathā
b suhṛdy avadyahṛdyās tā vairakopālayāḥ sma tāḥ
c prājñasya puruṣasyeha yathā vācas tathā striyaḥ
a nāgnis tṛpyati kāṣṭhānāṃ nāpagānāṃ mahodadhiḥ
c nāntakaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ na puṃsāṃ vāmalocanāḥ
a idam anyac ca devarṣe rahasyaṃ sarvayoṣitām
c dṛṣṭvaiva puruṣaṃ hṛdyaṃ yoniḥ praklidyate striyaḥ
d susnātaṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sucandanalavokṣitam
d yoniḥ svadyati nārīṇāṃ dṛteḥ pādād ivodakam
a kāmānām api dātāraṃ kartāraṃ mānasāntvayoḥ
c rakṣitāraṃ na mṛṣyanti bhartāraṃ paramaṃ striyaḥ
a na kāmabhogān bahulān nālaṃkārārthasaṃcayān
c tathaiva bahu manyante yathā ratyām anugraham
a antakaḥ śamano mṛtyuḥ pātālaṃ vaḍavāmukham
c kṣuradhārā viṣaṃ sarpo vahnir ity ekataḥ striyaḥ
a yataś ca bhūtāni mahānti pañca
yataś ca lokā vihitā vidhātrā
c yataḥ pumāṃsaḥ pramadāś ca nirmitās
tadaiva doṣāḥ pramadāsu nārada
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ime vai mānavā loke strīṣu sajjanty abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
c mohena param āviṣṭā daivādiṣṭena pārthiva
e striyaś ca puruṣeṣv eva pratyakṣaṃ lokasākṣikam
a atra me saṃśayas tīvro hṛdi saṃparivartate
c katham āsāṃ narāḥ saṅgaṃ kurvate kurunandana
e striyo vā teṣu rajyante virajyante 'tha vā punaḥ
a iti tāḥ puruṣavyāghra kathaṃ śakyāḥ sma rakṣitum
c pramadāḥ puruṣeṇeha tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
a etā hi mayamāyābhir vañcayantīha mānavān
c na cāsāṃ mucyate kaś cit puruṣo hastam āgataḥ
e gāvo navatṛṇānīva gṛhṇanty eva navān navān
a śambarasya ca yā māyā yā māyā namucer api
c baleḥ kumbhīnaseś caiva sarvās tā yoṣito viduḥ
a hasantaṃ prahasanty etā rudantaṃ prarudanti ca
c apriyaṃ priyavākyaiś ca gṛhṇate kālayogataḥ
d yadi jihvāsahasraṃ syāj jīvec ca śaradāṃ śatam
d ananyakarmā strīdoṣān anuktvā nidhanaṃ vrajet
a uśanā veda yac chāstraṃ yac ca veda bṛhaspatiḥ
c strībuddhyā na viśiṣyete tāḥ sma rakṣyāḥ kathaṃ naraiḥ
a anṛtaṃ satyam ity āhuḥ satyaṃ cāpi tathānṛtam
b doṣāspade 'śucau deśe hy āsāṃ raktās tv aho narāḥ
c iti yās tāḥ kathaṃ vīra saṃrakṣyāḥ puruṣair iha
a strīṇāṃ buddhyupaniṣkarṣād arthaśāstrāṇi śatruhan
c bṛhaspatiprabhṛtibhir manye sadbhiḥ kṛtāni vai
a saṃpūjyamānāḥ puruṣair vikurvanti mano nṛṣu
c apāstāś ca tathā rājan vikurvanti manaḥ striyaḥ
d imāḥ prajā mahābāho dhārmikya iti naḥ śrutam
d satkṛtāsatkṛtāś cāpi vikurvanti manaḥ sadā
a kas tāḥ śakto rakṣituṃ syād iti me saṃśayo mahān
c tan me brūhi mahābāho kurūṇāṃ vaṃśavardhana
a yadi śakyā kuruśreṣṭha rakṣā tāsāṃ kathaṃ cana
c kartuṃ vā kṛtapūrvā vā tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evam etan mahābāho nātra mithyāsti kiṃ cana
c yathā bravīṣi kauravya nārīṃ prati janādhipa
a atra te vartayiṣyāmi itihāsaṃ purātanam
c yathā rakṣā kṛtā pūrvaṃ vipulena mahātmanā
a pramadāś ca yathā sṛṣṭā brahmaṇā bharatarṣabha
c yadarthaṃ tac ca te tāta pravakṣye vasudhādhipa
a na hi strībhya paraṃ putra pāpīyaḥ kiṃ cid asti vai
c agnir hi pramadā dīpto māyāś ca mayajā vibho
e kṣuradhārā viṣaṃ sarpo mṛtyur ity ekataḥ striyaḥ
a imāḥ prajā mahābāho dhārmikā iti naḥ śrutam
c svayaṃ gacchanti devatvaṃ tato devān iyād bhayam
a athābhyagacchan devās te pitāmaham ariṃdama
c nivedya mānasaṃ cāpi tūṣṇīm āsann avāṅmukhāḥ
a teṣām antargataṃ jñātvā devānāṃ sa pitāmahaḥ
c mānavānāṃ pramohārthaṃ kṛtyā nāryo 'sṛjat prabhuḥ
a pūrvasarge tu kaunteya sādhvyo nārya ihābhavan
c asādhvyas tu samutpannā kṛtyā sargāt prajāpateḥ
a tābhyaḥ kāmān yathākāmaṃ prādād dhi sa pitāmahaḥ
c tāḥ kāmalubdhāḥ pramadāḥ prāmathnanta narāṃs tadā
a krodhaṃ kāmasya deveśaḥ sahāyaṃ cāsṛjat prabhuḥ
c asajjanta prajāḥ sarvāḥ kāmakrodhavaśaṃ gatāḥ
d dvijānāṃ ca gurūṇāṃ ca mahāgurunṛpādinām
d kṣaṇastrīsaṅgakāmotthā yātanāho nirantarā
d araktamanasāṃ nityaṃ brahmacaryamalātmanām
d tapodamārcanādhyānayuktānāṃ śuddhir uttamā
a na ca strīṇāṃ kriyā kā cid iti dharmo vyavasthitaḥ
c nirindriyā amantrāś ca striyo 'nṛtam iti śrutiḥ
a śayyāsanam alaṃkāram annapānam anāryatām
c durvāgbhāvaṃ ratiṃ caiva dadau strībhyaḥ prajāpatiḥ
a na tāsāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ kartuṃ śakyaṃ puṃsā kathaṃ cana
c api viśvakṛtā tāta kutas tu puruṣair iha
a vācā vā vadhabandhair vā kleśair vā vividhais tathā
c na śakyā rakṣituṃ nāryas tā hi nityam asaṃyatāḥ
a idaṃ tu puruṣavyāghra purastāc chrutavān aham
c yathā rakṣā kṛtā pūrvaṃ vipulena gurustriyaḥ
d tan nibodha mahārāja kathayāmi samāsataḥ
a ṛṣir āsīn mahābhāgo devaśarmeti viśrutaḥ
c tasya bhāryā rucir nāma rūpeṇāsadṛśī bhuvi
a tasya rūpeṇa saṃmattā devagandharvadānavāḥ
c viśeṣatas tu rājendra vṛtrahā pākaśāsanaḥ
a nārīṇāṃ caritajñaś ca devaśarmā mahāmuniḥ
c yathāśakti yathotsāhaṃ bhāryāṃ tām abhyarakṣata
a puraṃdaraṃ ca jānīte parastrīkāmacāriṇam
c tasmād yatnena bhāryāyā rakṣaṇaṃ sa cakāra ha
a sa kadā cid ṛṣis tāta yajñaṃ kartumanās tadā
c bhāryāsaṃrakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ kathaṃ syād ity acintayat
a rakṣāvidhānaṃ manasā sa vicintya mahātapāḥ
c āhūya dayitaṃ śiṣyaṃ vipulaṃ prāha bhārgavam
a yajñakāro gamiṣyāmi ruciṃ cemāṃ sureśvaraḥ
c putra prārthayate nityaṃ tāṃ rakṣasva yathābalam
a apramattena te bhāvyaṃ sadā prati puraṃdaram
c sa hi rūpāṇi kurute vividhāni bhṛgūdvaha
a ity ukto vipulas tena tapasvī niyatendriyaḥ
c sadaivogratapā rājann agnyarkasadṛśadyutiḥ
a dharmajñaḥ satyavādī ca tatheti pratyabhāṣata
c punaś cedaṃ mahārāja papraccha prathitaṃ gurum
a kāni rūpāṇi śakrasya bhavanty āgacchato mune
c vapus tejaś ca kīdṛg vai tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
a tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasmai vipulāya mahātmane
c ācacakṣe yathātattvaṃ māyāṃ śakrasya bhārata
a bahumāyaḥ sa viprarṣe balahā pākaśāsanaḥ
c tāṃs tān vikurute bhāvān bahūn atha muhur muhuḥ
a kirīṭī vajrabhṛd dhanvī mukuṭī baddhakuṇḍalaḥ
c bhavaty atha muhūrtena caṇḍālasamadarśanaḥ
a śikhī jaṭī cīravāsāḥ punar bhavati putraka
c bṛhaccharīraś ca punaḥ pīvaro 'tha punaḥ kṛśaḥ
a gauraṃ śyāmaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca varṇaṃ vikurute punaḥ
c virūpo rūpavāṃś caiva yuvā vṛddhas tathaiva ca
a prājño jaḍaś ca mūkaś ca hrasvo dīrghas tathaiva ca
c brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaś caiva vaiśyaḥ śūdras tathaiva ca
e pratilomānulomaś ca bhavaty atha śatakratuḥ
a śukavāyasarūpī ca haṃsakokilarūpavān
c siṃhavyāghragajānāṃ ca rūpaṃ dhārayate punaḥ
a daivaṃ daityam atho rājñāṃ vapur dhārayate 'pi ca
c sukṛśo vāyubhagnāṅgaḥ śakunir vikṛtas tathā
a catuṣpād bahurūpaś ca punar bhavati bāliśaḥ
c makṣikāmaśakādīnāṃ vapur dhārayate 'pi ca
a na śakyam asya grahaṇaṃ kartuṃ vipula kena cit
c api viśvakṛtā tāta yena sṛṣṭam idaṃ jagat
a punar antarhitaḥ śakro dṛśyate jñānacakṣuṣā
c vāyubhūtaś ca sa punar devarājo bhavaty uta
a evaṃ rūpāṇi satataṃ kurute pākaśāsanaḥ
c tasmād vipula yatnena rakṣemāṃ tanumadhyamām
d sā tvayā satataṃ rakṣyā ity uktvā prayayau muniḥ
a yathā ruciṃ nāvalihed devendro bhṛgusattama
c kratāv upahitaṃ nyastaṃ haviḥ śveva durātmavān
a evam ākhyāya sa munir yajñakāro 'gamat tadā
c devaśarmā mahābhāgas tato bharatasattama
a vipulas tu vacaḥ śrutvā guroś cintāparo 'bhavat
c rakṣāṃ ca paramāṃ cakre devarājān mahābalāt
a kiṃ nu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ gurudārābhirakṣaṇe
c māyāvī hi surendro 'sau durdharṣaś cāpi vīryavān
a nāpidhāyāśramaṃ śakyo rakṣituṃ pākaśāsanaḥ
c uṭajaṃ vā tathā hy asya nānāvidhasarūpatā
a vāyurūpeṇa vā śakro gurupatnīṃ pradharṣayet
c tasmād imāṃ saṃpraviśya ruciṃ sthāsye 'ham adya vai
a atha vā pauruṣeṇeyam aśakyā rakṣituṃ mayā

a so 'haṃ yogabalād enāṃ rakṣiṣye pākaśāsanāt
c gātrāṇi gātrair asyāhaṃ saṃpravekṣye 'bhirakṣitum
a yady ucchiṣṭām imāṃ patnīṃ ruciṃ paśyeta me guruḥ
c śapsyaty asaṃśayaṃ kopād divyajñāno mahātapāḥ
a na ceyaṃ rakṣituṃ śakyā yathānyā pramadā nṛbhiḥ
c māyāvī hi surendro 'sāv aho prāpto 'smi saṃśayam
a avaśyakaraṇīyaṃ hi guror iha hi śāsanam
c yadi tv etad ahaṃ kuryām āścaryaṃ syāt kṛtaṃ mayā

c nirmuktasya rajorūpān nāparādho bhaven mama
d mana eva manuṣyāṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ bandhamokṣayoḥ
d anyathāliṅgyate kāntā duhitāliṅgyate 'nyathā
d garbhasaṃstho yathā putro jāyamāno na lipyate
d evaṃ jñānī na laukyaiś ca karmabhir naiva duṣyate
a yathā hi śūnyāṃ pathikaḥ sabhām adhyāvaset pathi
c tathādyāvāsayiṣyāmi gurupatnyāḥ kalevaram
a asaktaḥ padmapatrastho jalabindur yathā calaḥ
c evam eva śarīre 'syā nivatsyāmi samāhitaḥ
a ity evaṃ dharmam ālokya vedavedāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
c tapaś ca vipulaṃ dṛṣṭvā guror ātmana eva ca
a iti niścitya manasā rakṣāṃ prati sa bhārgavaḥ
c ātiṣṭhat paramaṃ yatnaṃ yathā tac chṛṇu pārthiva

c upāsīnām anindyāṅgīṃ kathābhiḥ samalobhayat

d rakṣituṃ gurupatnīṃ sa bahurūpāc chatakratoḥ

c viveśa vipulaḥ kāyam ākāśaṃ pavano yathā
a lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣaṇenaiva vadanaṃ vadanena ca

a tato viṣṭabhya vipulo gurupatnyāḥ kalevaram
c uvāsa rakṣaṇe yukto na ca sā tam abudhyata
a yaṃ kālaṃ nāgato rājan gurus tasya mahātmanaḥ
c kratuṃ samāpya svagṛhaṃ taṃ kālaṃ so 'bhyarakṣata
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tataḥ kadā cid devendro divyarūpavapurdharaḥ
c idam antaram ity evaṃ tato 'bhyāgād athāśramam
a rūpam apratimaṃ kṛtvā lobhanīyaṃ janādhipa
c darśanīyatamo bhūtvā praviveśa tam āśramam
a sa dadarśa tam āsīnaṃ vipulasya kalevaram
c niśceṣṭaṃ stabdhanayanaṃ yathālekhyagataṃ tathā
a ruciṃ ca rucirāpāṅgīṃ pīnaśroṇipayodharām
c padmapatraviśālākṣīṃ saṃpūrṇendunibhānanām
a sā tam ālokya sahasā pratyutthātum iyeṣa ha
c rūpeṇa vismitā ko 'sīty atha vaktum ihecchatī
a utthātukāmāpi satī vyatiṣṭhad vipulena sā
c nigṛhītā manuṣyendra na śaśāka viceṣṭitum
a tām ābabhāṣe devendraḥ sāmnā paramavalgunā
c tvadartham āgataṃ viddhi devendraṃ māṃ śucismite
a kliśyamānam anaṅgena tvatsaṃkalpodbhavena vai
c tat paryāpnuhi māṃ subhru purā kālo 'tivartate
a tam evaṃvādinaṃ śakraṃ śuśrāva vipulo muniḥ
c gurupatnyāḥ śarīrastho dadarśa ca surādhipam
a na śaśāka ca sā rājan pratyutthātum aninditā
c vaktuṃ ca nāśakad rājan viṣṭabdhā vipulena sā
a ākāraṃ gurupatnyās tu vijñāya sa bhṛgūdvahaḥ
c nijagrāha mahātejā yogena balavat prabho
e babandha yogabandhaiś ca tasyāḥ sarvendriyāṇi saḥ
a tāṃ nirvikārāṃ dṛṣṭvā tu punar eva śacīpatiḥ
c uvāca vrīḍito rājaṃs tāṃ yogabalamohitām
a ehy ehīti tataḥ sā taṃ prativaktum iyeṣa ca
c sa tāṃ vācaṃ guroḥ patnyā vipulaḥ paryavartayat
a bhoḥ kim āgamane kṛtyam iti tasyāś ca niḥsṛtā
c vaktrāc chaśāṅkapratimād vāṇī saṃskārabhūṣitā
a vrīḍitā sā tu tad vākyam uktvā paravaśā tadā
c puraṃdaraś ca saṃtrasto babhūva vimanās tadā
a sa tad vaikṛtam ālakṣya devarājo viśāṃ pate
c avaikṣata sahasrākṣas tadā divyena cakṣuṣā
a dadarśa ca muniṃ tasyāḥ śarīrāntaragocaram
c pratibimbam ivādarśe gurupatnyāḥ śarīragam
a sa taṃ ghoreṇa tapasā yuktaṃ dṛṣṭvā puraṃdaraḥ
c prāvepata susaṃtrastaḥ śāpabhītas tadā vibho
a vimucya gurupatnīṃ tu vipulaḥ sumahātapāḥ
c svaṃ kalevaram āviśya śakraṃ bhītam athābravīt
a ajitendriya pāpātman kāmātmaka puraṃdara
c na ciraṃ pūjayiṣyanti devās tvāṃ mānuṣās tathā
a kiṃ nu tad vismṛtaṃ śakra na tan manasi te sthitam
c gautamenāsi yan mukto bhagāṅkaparicihnitaḥ
a jāne tvāṃ bāliśamatim akṛtātmānam asthiram
c mayeyaṃ rakṣyate mūḍha gaccha pāpa yathāgatam
a nāhaṃ tvām adya mūḍhātman daheyaṃ hi svatejasā
c kṛpāyamāṇas tu na te dagdhum icchāmi vāsava
a sa ca ghoratapā dhīmān gurur me pāpacetasam
c dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ nirdahed adya krodhadīptena cakṣuṣā
a naivaṃ tu śakra kartavyaṃ punar mānyāś ca te dvijāḥ
c mā gamaḥ sasutāmātyo 'tyayaṃ brahmabalārditaḥ
a amaro 'smīti yad buddhim etām āsthāya vartase
c māvamaṃsthā na tapasām asādhyaṃ nāma kiṃ cana
a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ śakro vipulasya mahātmanaḥ
c akiṃcid uktvā vrīḍitas tatraivāntaradhīyata
a muhūrtayāte śakre tu devaśarmā mahātapāḥ
c kṛtvā yajñaṃ yathākāmam ājagāma svam āśramam
a āgate 'tha gurau rājan vipulaḥ priyakarmakṛt
c rakṣitāṃ gurave bhāryāṃ nyavedayad aninditām
a abhivādya ca śāntātmā sa guruṃ guruvatsalaḥ
c vipulaḥ paryupātiṣṭhad yathāpūrvam aśaṅkitaḥ
a viśrāntāya tatas tasmai sahāsīnāya bhāryayā
c nivedayām āsa tadā vipulaḥ śakrakarma tat
a tac chrutvā sa munis tuṣṭo vipulasya pratāpavān
c babhūva śīlavṛttābhyāṃ tapasā niyamena ca
a vipulasya gurau vṛttiṃ bhaktim ātmani ca prabhuḥ
c dharme ca sthiratāṃ dṛṣṭvā sādhu sādhv ity uvāca ha
a pratinandya ca dharmātmā śiṣyaṃ dharmaparāyaṇam
c vareṇa cchandayām āsa sa tasmād guruvatsalaḥ
c devaśarmā mahāmatiḥ
c sthitiṃ ca dharme jagrāha
e anujñātaś ca guruṇā cacārānuttamaṃ tapaḥ
a tathaiva devaśarmāpi sabhāryaḥ sa mahātapāḥ
c nirbhayo balavṛtraghnāc cacāra vijane vane
 bhīṣma uvāca
a vipulas tv akarot tīvraṃ tapaḥ kṛtvā guror vacaḥ
c tapoyuktam athātmānam amanyata ca vīryavān
a sa tena karmaṇā spardhan pṛthivīṃ pṛthivīpate
c cacāra gatabhīḥ prīto labdhakīrtir varo nṛṣu
a ubhau lokau jitau cāpi tathaivāmanyata prabhuḥ
c karmaṇā tena kauravya tapasā vipulena ca
a atha kāle vyatikrānte kasmiṃś cit kurunandana
c rucyā bhaginyā dānaṃ vai babhūva dhanadhānyavat
a etasminn eva kāle tu divyā kā cid varāṅganā
c bibhratī paramaṃ rūpaṃ jagāmātha vihāyasā
a tasyāḥ śarīrāt puṣpāṇi patitāni mahītale
c tasyāśramasyāvidūre divyagandhāni bhārata
a tāny agṛhṇāt tato rājan rucir nalinalocanā
c tadā nimantrakas tasyā aṅgebhyaḥ kṣipram āgamat
a tasyā hi bhaginī tāta jyeṣṭhā nāmnā prabhāvatī
c bhāryā citrarathasyātha babhūvāṅgeśvarasya vai
a pinahya tāni puṣpāṇi keśeṣu varavarṇinī
c āmantritā tato 'gacchad rucir aṅgapater gṛhān
a puṣpāṇi tāni dṛṣṭvātha tadāṅgendravarāṅganā
c bhaginīṃ codayām āsa puṣpārthe cārulocanā
a sā bhartre sarvam ācaṣṭa ruciḥ surucirānanā
c bhaginyā bhāṣitaṃ sarvam ṛṣis tac cābhyanandata
a tato vipulam ānāyya devaśarmā mahātapāḥ
c puṣpārthe codayām āsa gaccha gaccheti bhārata
d gaccha gaccheti puṣpārtham āśramaṃ me 'tha bhārata
a vipulas tu guror vākyam avicārya mahātapāḥ
c sa tathety abravīd rājaṃs taṃ ca deśaṃ jagāma ha
a yasmin deśe tu tāny āsan patitāni nabhastalāt
c amlānāny api tatrāsan kusumāny aparāṇy api
a tataḥ sa tāni jagrāha divyāni rucirāṇi ca
c prāptāni svena tapasā divyagandhāni bhārata
a saṃprāpya tāni prītātmā guror vacanakārakaḥ
c tato jagāma tūrṇaṃ ca campāṃ campakamālinīm
a sa vane vijane tāta dadarśa mithunaṃ nṛṇām
c cakravat parivartantaṃ gṛhītvā pāṇinā karam
a tatraikas tūrṇam agamat tatpade parivartayan
c ekas tu na tathā rājaṃś cakratuḥ kalahaṃ tataḥ
a tvaṃ śīghraṃ gacchasīty eko 'bravīn neti tathāparaḥ
c neti neti ca tau tāta parasparam athocatuḥ
a tayor vispardhator evaṃ śapatho 'yam abhūt tadā
c manasoddiśya vipulaṃ tato vākyam athocatuḥ
a āvayor anṛtaṃ prāha yas tasyātha dvijasya vai
c vipulasya pare loke yā gatiḥ sā bhaved iti
a etac chrutvā tu vipulo viṣaṇṇavadano 'bhavat
c evaṃ tīvratapāś cāhaṃ kaṣṭaś cāyaṃ parigrahaḥ
a mithunasyāsya kiṃ me syāt kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yato gatiḥ
c aniṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ kīrtitānena me 'dya vai
a evaṃ saṃcintayann eva vipulo rājasattama
c avāṅmukho nyastaśirā dadhyau duṣkṛtam ātmanaḥ
a tataḥ ṣaḍ anyān puruṣān akṣaiḥ kāñcanarājataiḥ
c apaśyad dīvyamānān vai lobhaharṣānvitāṃs tathā
a kurvataḥ śapathaṃ taṃ vai yaḥ kṛto mithunena vai
c vipulaṃ vai samuddiśya te 'pi vākyam athābruvan
a yo lobham āsthāyāsmākaṃ viṣamaṃ kartum utsahet
c vipulasya pare loke yā gatis tām avāpnuyāt
a etac chrutvā tu vipulo nāpaśyad dharmasaṃkaram
c janmaprabhṛti kauravya kṛtapūrvam athātmanaḥ
a sa pradadhyau tadā rājann agnāv agnir ivāhitaḥ
c dahyamānena manasā śāpaṃ śrutvā tathāvidham
a tasya cintayatas tāta bahvyo dinaniśā yayuḥ
c idam āsīn manasi ca rucyā rakṣaṇakāritam
a lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣaṇenaiva vadanaṃ vadanena ca
c vidhāya na mayā coktaṃ satyam etad guros tadā
a etad ātmani kauravya duṣkṛtaṃ vipulas tadā
c amanyata mahābhāga tathā tac ca na saṃśayaḥ
a sa campāṃ nagarīm etya puṣpāṇi gurave dadau
c pūjayām āsa ca guruṃ vidhivat sa gurupriyaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tam āgatam abhiprekṣya śiṣyaṃ vākyam athābravīt
c devaśarmā mahātejā yat tac chṛṇu narādhipa
 devaśarmovāca
a kiṃ te vipula dṛṣṭaṃ vai tasminn adya mahāvane
c te tvā jānanti nipuṇa ātmā ca rucir eva ca
 vipula uvāca
a brahmarṣe mithunaṃ kiṃ tat ke ca te puruṣā vibho
c ye māṃ jānanti tattvena tāṃś ca me vaktum arhasi
 devaśarmovāca
a yad vai tan mithunaṃ brahmann ahorātraṃ hi viddhi tat
c cakravat parivarteta tat te jānāti duṣkṛtam
a ye ca te puruṣā vipra akṣair dīvyanti hṛṣṭavat
c ṛtūṃs tān abhijānīhi te te jānanti duṣkṛtam
a na māṃ kaś cid vijānīta iti kṛtvā na viśvaset
c naro rahasi pāpātmā pāpakaṃ karma vai dvija
a kurvāṇaṃ hi naraṃ karma pāpaṃ rahasi sarvadā
c paśyanti ṛtavaś cāpi tathā dinaniśe 'py uta
d tathaiva hi bhaveyus te lokāḥ pāpakṛto yathā
d kṛtvā nācakṣataḥ karma mama tac ca tvayā kṛtam
a te tvāṃ harṣasmitaṃ dṛṣṭvā guroḥ karmānivedakam
c smārayantas tathā prāhus te yathā śrutavān bhavān
a ahorātraṃ vijānāti ṛtavaś cāpi nityaśaḥ
c puruṣe pāpakaṃ karma śubhaṃ vā śubhakarmaṇaḥ
a tat tvayā mama yat karma vyabhicārād bhayātmakam
b tat tvayā vai tathā kāryam abhicārabhayātmakam
c nākhyātam iti jānantas te tvām āhus tathā dvija
a te caiva hi bhaveyus te lokāḥ pāpakṛto yathā
c kṛtvā nācakṣataḥ karma mama yac ca tvayā kṛtam
a tathā śakyā ca durvṛttā rakṣituṃ pramadā dvija
c na ca tvaṃ kṛtavān kiṃ cid āgaḥ prīto 'smi tena te
d manodoṣavihīnānāṃ na doṣaḥ syāt tathā tava
d anyathāliṅgyate kāntā snehena duhitānyathā
d yateś ca kāmukānāṃ ca yoṣidrūpe 'nyathā matiḥ
d aśikṣayaiva manasaḥ prāyo lokas tu vañcyate
d lolety udvijate loko vaktrāsava iti spṛhā
d abandhāyogyamanasām iti mantrātmadaivatam
d na rāgasnehalobhāndhaṃ karmiṇāṃ tan mahāphalam
d niṣkaṣāyo viśuddhas tvaṃ rucyāveśān na dūṣitaḥ
a yadi tv ahaṃ tvā durvṛttam adrākṣaṃ dvijasattama
c śapeyaṃ tvām ahaṃ krodhān na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
a sajjanti puruṣe nāryaḥ puṃsāṃ so 'rthaś ca puṣkalaḥ
c anyathā rakṣataḥ śāpo 'bhaviṣyat te gatiś ca sā
a rakṣitā sā tvayā putra mama cāpi niveditā
c ahaṃ te prītimāṃs tāta svasti svargaṃ gamiṣyasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktvā vipulaṃ prīto devaśarmā mahān ṛṣiḥ
c mumoda svargam āsthāya sahabhāryaḥ saśiṣyakaḥ
a idam ākhyātavāṃś cāpi mamākhyānaṃ mahāmuniḥ
c mārkaṇḍeyaḥ purā rājan gaṅgākūle kathāntare
a tasmād bravīmi pārtha tvā striyaḥ sarvāḥ sadaiva ca
c ubhayaṃ dṛśyate tāsu satataṃ sādhv asādhu ca
a striyaḥ sādhvyo mahābhāgāḥ saṃmatā lokamātaraḥ
c dhārayanti mahīṃ rājann imāṃ savanakānanām
a asādhvyaś cāpi durvṛttāḥ kulaghnyaḥ pāpaniścayāḥ
c vijñeyā lakṣaṇair duṣṭaiḥ svagātrasahajair nṛpa
a evam etāsu rakṣā vai śakyā kartuṃ mahātmabhiḥ
c anyathā rājaśārdūla na śakyā rakṣituṃ striyaḥ
a etā hi manujavyāghra tīkṣṇās tīkṣṇaparākramāḥ
c nāsām asti priyo nāma maithune saṃgame nṛbhiḥ
a etāḥ kṛtyāś ca kāryāś ca kṛtāś ca bharatarṣabha
c na caikasmin ramanty etāḥ puruṣe pāṇḍunandana
a nāsu sneho nṛbhiḥ kāryas tathaiverṣyā janeśvara
c khedam āsthāya bhuñjīta dharmam āsthāya caiva hi
d anṛtāv iha parvādidoṣavarjaṃ narādhipa
d anṛtān api parvādidoṣavarjī nirāmayaḥ
a vihanyetānyathā kurvan naraḥ kauravanandana
c sarvathā rājaśārdūla yuktiḥ sarvatra pūjyate
a tenaikena tu rakṣā vai vipulena kṛtā striyāḥ
c nānyaḥ śakto nṛloke 'smin rakṣituṃ nṛpa yoṣitaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yan mūlaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ prajanasya gṛhasya ca
c pitṛdevātithīnāṃ ca tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ayaṃ hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmaś cintyatamo mataḥ
c kīdṛśāya pradeyā syāt kanyeti vasudhādhipa
a śīlavṛtte samājñāya vidyāṃ yoniṃ ca karma ca
c adbhir eva pradātavyā kanyā guṇavate vare
e brāhmaṇānāṃ satām eṣa dharmo nityaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
a āvāhyam āvahed evaṃ yo dadyād anukūlataḥ
c śiṣṭānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca dharma eṣa sanātanaḥ
a ātmābhipretam utsṛjya kanyābhipreta eva yaḥ
c abhipretā ca yā yasya tasmai deyā yudhiṣṭhira
e gāndharvam iti taṃ dharmaṃ prāhur dharmavido janāḥ
a dhanena bahunā krītvā saṃpralobhya ca bāndhavān
c asurāṇāṃ nṛpaitaṃ vai dharmam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
a hatvā chittvā ca śīrṣāṇi rudatāṃ rudatīṃ gṛhāt
c prasahya haraṇaṃ tāta rākṣasaṃ dharmalakṣaṇam
d suptāṃ mattāṃ pramattāṃ vā raho yatropagacchati
d sa pāpiṣṭho vivāhānāṃ paiśācaḥ prathito 'dhamaḥ
a pañcānāṃ tu trayo dharmyā dvāv adharmyau yudhiṣṭhira
c paiśāca āsuraś caiva na kartavyau kathaṃ cana
a brāhmaḥ kṣātro 'tha gāndharva ete dharmyā nararṣabha
c pṛthag vā yadi vā miśrāḥ kartavyā nātra saṃśayaḥ
a tisro bhāryā brāhmaṇasya dve bhārye kṣatriyasya tu
c vaiśyaḥ svajātiṃ vindeta tāsv apatyaṃ samaṃ bhavet
a brāhmaṇī tu bhavej jyeṣṭhā kṣatriyā kṣatriyasya tu
c ratyartham api śūdrā syān nety āhur apare janāḥ
a apatyajanma śūdrāyāṃ na praśaṃsanti sādhavaḥ
c śūdrāyāṃ janayan vipraḥ prāyaścittī vidhīyate
d nātibālāṃ vahanty anye anityatvāt prajārthinaḥ
d vahanti karmiṇas tasyām antaḥśuddhivyapekṣayā
d aparānvayasaṃbhūtāṃ saṃsvapnādivivarjitām
d kāmo yasyāṃ niṣiddhaś ca ke cid icchanti cāpadi
a triṃśadvarṣo daśavarṣāṃ bhāryāṃ vindeta nagnikām
c ekaviṃśativarṣo vā saptavarṣām avāpnuyāt
a yasyās tu na bhaved bhrātā pitā vā bharatarṣabha
c nopayaccheta tāṃ jātu putrikādharmiṇī hi sā
a trīṇi varṣāṇy udīkṣeta kanyā ṛtumatī satī
c caturthe tv atha saṃprāpte svayaṃ bhartāram arjayet
a prajano hīyate tasyā ratiś ca bharatarṣabha
c ato 'nyathā vartamānā bhaved vācyā prajāpateḥ
a asapiṇḍā ca yā mātur asagotrā ca yā pituḥ
c ity etām anugaccheta taṃ dharmaṃ manur abravīt
d sā praśastā dvijātīnāṃ dārakarmaṇi maithune
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a śulkam anyena dattaṃ syād dadānīty āha cāparaḥ
c balād anyaḥ prabhāṣeta dhanam anyaḥ pradarśayet
a pāṇigrahītā tv anyaḥ syāt kasya kanyā pitāmaha
c tattvaṃ jijñāsamānānāṃ cakṣur bhavatu no bhavān
 bhīṣma uvāca
a yat kiṃ cit karma mānuṣyaṃ saṃsthānāya prakṛṣyate
c mantravan mantritaṃ tasya mṛṣāvādas tu pātakaḥ
a bhāryāpatyṛtvigācāryāḥ śiṣyopādhyāya eva ca
c mṛṣokte daṇḍam arhanti nety āhur apare janāḥ
a na hy akāmena saṃvādaṃ manur evaṃ praśaṃsati
c ayaśasyam adharmyaṃ ca yan mṛṣā dharmakopanam
a naikāntadoṣa ekasmiṃs tad dānaṃ nopalabhyate
c dharmato yāṃ prayacchanti yāṃ ca krīṇanti bhārata
a bandhubhiḥ samanujñāto mantrahomau prayojayet
c tathā sidhyanti te mantrā nādattāyāḥ kathaṃ cana
a yas tv atra mantrasamayo bhāryāpatyor mithaḥ kṛtaḥ
c tam evāhur garīyāṃsaṃ yaś cāsau jñātibhiḥ kṛtaḥ
a devadattāṃ patir bhāryāṃ vetti dharmasya śāsanāt
c sā daivīṃ mānuṣīṃ vācam anṛtāṃ paryudasyati
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kanyāyāṃ prāptaśulkāyāṃ jyāyāṃś ced āvrajed varaḥ
c dharmakāmārthasaṃpanno vācyam atrānṛtaṃ na vā
a tasminn ubhayato doṣe kurvañ chreyaḥ samācaret
c ayaṃ naḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmaś cintyatamo mataḥ
a tattvaṃ jijñāsamānānāṃ cakṣur bhavatu no bhavān
c tad etat sarvam ācakṣva na hi tṛpyāmi kathyatām
 bhīṣma uvāca
a na vai niṣṭhākaraṃ śulkaṃ jñātvāsīt tena nāhṛtam
c na hi śulkaparāḥ santaḥ kanyāṃ dadati karhi cit
a anyair guṇair upetaṃ tu śulkaṃ yācanti bāndhavāḥ
c alaṃkṛtvā vahasveti yo dadyād anukūlataḥ
a tac ca tāṃ ca dadāty eva na śulkaṃ vikrayo na saḥ
c pratigṛhya bhaved deyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
a dāsyāmi bhavate kanyām iti pūrvaṃ nabhāṣitam
c ye caivāhur ye ca nāhur ye cāvaśyaṃ vadanty uta
a tasmād ā grahaṇāt pāṇer yācayanti parasparam
c kanyāvaraḥ purā datto marudbhir iti naḥ śrutam
a nāniṣṭāya pradātavyā kanyā ity ṛṣicoditam
c tan mūlaṃ kāmamūlasya prajanasyeti me matiḥ
a samīkṣya ca bahūn doṣān saṃvāsād vidviṣāṇayoḥ
c yathā niṣṭhākaraṃ śulkaṃ na jātv āsīt tathā śṛṇu
a ahaṃ vicitravīryāya dve kanye samudāvaham
c jitvā ca māgadhān sarvān kāśīn atha ca kosalān
e gṛhītapāṇir ekāsīt prāptaśulkāparābhavat
a pāṇau gṛhītā tatraiva visṛjyā iti me pitā
c abravīd itarāṃ kanyām āvahat sa tu kauravaḥ
a apy anyām anupapraccha śaṅkamānaḥ pitur vacaḥ
c atīva hy asya dharmepsā pitur me 'bhyadhikābhavat
a tato 'ham abruvaṃ rājann ācārepsur idaṃ vacaḥ
c ācāraṃ tattvato vettum icchāmīti punaḥ punaḥ
a tato mayaivam ukte tu vākye dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
c pitā mama mahārāja bāhlīko vākyam abravīt
a yadi vaḥ śulkato niṣṭhā na pāṇigrahaṇaṃ tathā
c lājāntaram upāsīta prāptaśulkā patiṃ vṛtam
a na hi dharmavidaḥ prāhuḥ pramāṇaṃ vākyataḥ smṛtam
c yeṣāṃ vai śulkato niṣṭhā na pāṇigrahaṇāt tathā
a prasiddhaṃ bhāṣitaṃ dāne teṣāṃ pratyasanaṃ punaḥ
c ye manyante krayaṃ śulkaṃ na te dharmavido janāḥ
a na caitebhyaḥ pradātavyā na voḍhavyā tathāvidhā
c na hy eva bhāryā kretavyā na vikreyā kathaṃ cana
a ye ca krīṇanti dāsīvad ye ca vikrīṇate janāḥ
c bhavet teṣāṃ tathā niṣṭhā lubdhānāṃ pāpacetasām
a asmin dharme satyavantaṃ paryapṛcchanta vai janāḥ
c kanyāyāḥ prāptaśulkāyāḥ śulkadaḥ praśamaṃ gataḥ
a pāṇigrahītā cānyaḥ syād atra no dharmasaṃśayaḥ
c tan naś chindhi mahāprājña tvaṃ hi vai prājñasaṃmataḥ
e tattvaṃ jijñāsamānānāṃ cakṣur bhavatu no bhavān
a tān evaṃ bruvataḥ sarvān satyavān vākyam abravīt
c yatreṣṭaṃ tatra deyā syān nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
e kurvate jīvato 'py evaṃ mṛte naivāsti saṃśayaḥ
a devaraṃ praviśet kanyā tapyed vāpi mahat tapaḥ
c tam evānuvratā bhūtvā pāṇigrāhasya nāma sā
a likhanty eva tu keṣāṃ cid apareṣāṃ śanair api
c iti ye saṃvadanty atra ta etaṃ niścayaṃ viduḥ
a tat pāṇigrahaṇāt pūrvam uttaraṃ yatra vartate
c sarvamaṅgalamantraṃ vai mṛṣāvādas tu pātakaḥ
a pāṇigrahaṇamantrāṇāṃ niṣṭhā syāt saptame pade
c pāṇigrāhasya bhāryā syād yasya cādbhiḥ pradīyate
a anukūlām anuvaṃśāṃ bhrātrā dattām upāgnikām
c parikramya yathānyāyaṃ bhāryāṃ vinded dvijottamaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kanyāyāḥ prāptaśulkāyāḥ patiś cen nāsti kaś cana
c tatra kā pratipattiḥ syāt tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a yāputrakasyāpy arikthasya pratipat sā tadā bhavet
a atha cet sāharec chulkaṃ krītā śulkapradasya sā
c tasyārthe 'patyam īheta yena nyāyena śaknuyāt
a na tasyā mantravat kāryaṃ kaś cit kurvīta kiṃ cana
a svayaṃ vṛteti sāvitrī pitrā vai pratyapadyata
c tat tasyānye praśaṃsanti dharmajñā netare janāḥ
a etat tu nāpare cakrur na pare jātu sādhavaḥ
c sādhūnāṃ punar ācāro garīyo dharmalakṣaṇam
a asminn eva prakaraṇe sukratur vākyam abravīt
c naptā videharājasya janakasya mahātmanaḥ
a asadācarite mārge kathaṃ syād anukīrtanam
c anupraśnaḥ saṃśayo vā satām etad upālabhet
a asad eva hi dharmasya pramādo dharma āsuraḥ
c nānuśuśruma jātv etām imāṃ pūrveṣu janmasu
a bhāryāpatyor hi saṃbandhaḥ strīpuṃsos tulya eva saḥ
c ratiḥ sādhāraṇo dharma iti cāha sa pārthivaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a atha kena pramāṇena puṃsām ādīyate dhanam
c putravad dhi pitus tasya kanyā bhavitum arhati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a yathaivātmā tathā putraḥ putreṇa duhitā samā
c tasyām ātmani tiṣṭhantyāṃ katham anyo dhanaṃ haret
a mātuś ca yautakaṃ yat syāt kumārībhāga eva saḥ
c dauhitra eva vā riktham aputrasya pitur haret
a dadāti hi sa piṇḍaṃ vai pitur mātāmahasya ca
c putradauhitrayor neha viśeṣo dharmataḥ smṛtaḥ
a anyatra jātayā sā hi prajayā putra īhate
c duhitānyatra jātena putreṇāpi viśiṣyate
a dauhitrakeṇa dharmeṇa nātra paśyāmi kāraṇam
c vikrītāsu ca ye putrā bhavanti pitur eva te
a asūyavas tv adharmiṣṭhāḥ parasvādāyinaḥ śaṭhāḥ
c āsurād adhisaṃbhūtā dharmād viṣamavṛttayaḥ
a atra gāthā yamodgītāḥ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥ
c dharmajñā dharmaśāstreṣu nibaddhā dharmasetuṣu
a yo manuṣyaḥ svakaṃ putraṃ vikrīya dhanam icchati
c kanyāṃ vā jīvitārthāya yaḥ śulkena prayacchati
a saptāvare mahāghore niraye kālasāhvaye
c svedaṃ mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ ca tasmin preta upāśnute
a ārṣe gomithunaṃ śulkaṃ ke cid āhur mṛṣaiva tat
c alpaṃ vā bahu vā rājan vikrayas tāvad eva saḥ
a yady apy ācaritaḥ kaiś cin naiṣa dharmaḥ kathaṃ cana
c anyeṣām api dṛśyante lobhataḥ saṃpravṛttayaḥ
a vaśyāṃ kumārīṃ vihitāṃ ye ca tām upabhuñjate
c ete pāpasya kartāras tamasy andhe 'tha śerate
a anyo 'py atha na vikreyo manuṣyaḥ kiṃ punaḥ prajāḥ
c adharmamūlair hi dhanair na tair artho 'sti kaś cana
 bhīṣma uvāca
a prācetasasya vacanaṃ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥ
c yasyāḥ kiṃ cin nādadate jñātayo na sa vikrayaḥ
a arhaṇaṃ tat kumārīṇām ānṛśaṃsyatamaṃ ca tat
c sarvaṃ ca pratideyaṃ syāt kanyāyai tad aśeṣataḥ
a pitṛbhir bhrātṛbhiś caiva śvaśurair atha devaraiḥ
c pūjyā lālayitavyāś ca bahukalyāṇam īpsubhiḥ
a yadi vai strī na roceta pumāṃsaṃ na pramodayet
c amodanāt punaḥ puṃsaḥ prajanaṃ na pravardhate
a pūjyā lālayitavyāś ca striyo nityaṃ janādhipa
b striyo yatra ca pūjyante ramante tatra devatāḥ
c apūjitāś ca yatraitāḥ sarvās tatrāphalāḥ kriyāḥ
e tadaiva tat kulaṃ nāsti yadā śocanti jāmayaḥ
a jāmīśaptāni gehāni nikṛttānīva kṛtyayā
c naiva bhānti na vardhante śriyā hīnāni pārthiva
a striyaḥ puṃsāṃ paridade manur jigamiṣur divam
c abalāḥ svalpakaupīnāḥ suhṛdaḥ satyajiṣṇavaḥ
a īrṣyavo mānakāmāś ca caṇḍā asuhṛdo 'budhāḥ
c striyo mānanam arhanti tā mānayata mānavāḥ
a strīpratyayo hi vo dharmo ratibhogāś ca kevalāḥ
c paricaryānnasaṃskārās tadāyattā bhavantu vaḥ
a utpādanam apatyasya jātasya paripālanam
c prītyarthaṃ lokayātrā ca paśyata strīnibandhanam
a saṃmānyamānāś caitābhiḥ sarvakāryāṇy avāpsyatha
c videharājaduhitā cātra ślokam agāyata
a nāsti yajñaḥ striyaḥ kaś cin na śrāddhaṃ nopavāsakam
c dharmas tu bhartṛśuśrūṣā tayā svargaṃ jayaty uta
a pitā rakṣati kaumāre bhartā rakṣati yauvane
c putrās tu sthavirībhāve na strī svātantryam arhati
a śriya etāḥ striyo nāma satkāryā bhūtim icchatā
c lālitā nigṛhītā ca strī śrīr bhavati bhārata
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a sarvaśāstravidhānajña rājadharmārthavittama
c atīva saṃśayacchettā bhavān vai prathitaḥ kṣitau
a kaś cit tu saṃśayo me 'sti tan me brūhi pitāmaha
c asyām āpadi kaṣṭāyām anyaṃ pṛcchāma kaṃ vayam
a yathā nareṇa kartavyaṃ yaś ca dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
c etat sarvaṃ mahābāho bhavān vyākhyātum arhati
a catasro vihitā bhāryā brāhmaṇasya pitāmaha
c brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā ca ratim icchataḥ
a tatra jāteṣu putreṣu sarvāsāṃ kurusattama
c ānupūrvyeṇa kas teṣāṃ pitryaṃ dāyādyam arhati
a kena vā kiṃ tato hāryaṃ pitṛvittāt pitāmaha
c etad icchāmi kathitaṃ vibhāgas teṣu yaḥ smṛtaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyas trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ
c eteṣu vihito dharmo brāhmaṇasya yudhiṣṭhira
a vaiṣamyād atha vā lobhāt kāmād vāpi paraṃtapa
c brāhmaṇasya bhavec chūdrā na tu dṛṣṭāntataḥ smṛtā
a śūdrāṃ śayanam āropya brāhmaṇaḥ pīḍito bhavet
c prāyaścittīyate cāpi vidhidṛṣṭena hetunā
a tatra jāteṣv apatyeṣu dviguṇaṃ syād yudhiṣṭhira
c atas te niyamaṃ vitte saṃpravakṣyāmi bhārata
a lakṣaṇyo govṛṣo yānaṃ yat pradhānatamaṃ bhavet
c brāhmaṇyās tad dharet putra ekāṃśaṃ vai pitur dhanāt
a śeṣaṃ tu daśadhā kāryaṃ brāhmaṇasvaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c tatra tenaiva hartavyāś catvāro 'ṃśāḥ pitur dhanāt
a kṣatriyāyās tu yaḥ putro brāhmaṇaḥ so 'py asaṃśayaḥ
c sa tu mātṛviśeṣeṇa trīn aṃśān hartum arhati
a varṇe tṛtīye jātas tu vaiśyāyāṃ brāhmaṇād api
c dviraṃśas tena hartavyo brāhmaṇasvād yudhiṣṭhira
a śūdrāyāṃ brāhmaṇāj jāto nityādeyadhanaḥ smṛtaḥ
c alpaṃ vāpi pradātavyaṃ śūdrāputrāya bhārata
a daśadhā pravibhaktasya dhanasyaiṣa bhavet kramaḥ
c savarṇāsu tu jātānāṃ samān bhāgān prakalpayet
a abrāhmaṇaṃ tu manyante śūdrāputram anaipuṇāt
c triṣu varṇeṣu jāto hi brāhmaṇād brāhmaṇo bhavet
a smṛtā varṇāś ca catvāraḥ pañcamo nādhigamyate
c haret tu daśamaṃ bhāgaṃ śūdrāputraḥ pitur dhanāt
a tat tu dattaṃ haret pitrā nādattaṃ hartum arhati
c avaśyaṃ hi dhanaṃ deyaṃ śūdrāputrāya bhārata
a ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharma iti tasmai pradīyate
c yatra tatra samutpanno guṇāyaivopakalpate
a yadi vāpy ekaputraḥ syād aputro yadi vā bhavet
c nādhikaṃ daśamād dadyāc chūdrāputrāya bhārata
d smṛta ekaś caturbhāgaḥ kanyābhāgas tu dharmataḥ
d abhrātṛkā samagrārhā cārthasyety apare viduḥ
a traivārṣikād yadā bhaktād adhikaṃ syād dvijasya tu
c yajeta tena dravyeṇa na vṛthā sādhayed dhanam
a trisāhasraparo dāyaḥ striyo deyo dhanasya vai
c tac ca bhartrā dhanaṃ dattaṃ nādattaṃ bhoktum arhati
a strīṇāṃ tu patidāyādyam upabhogaphalaṃ smṛtam
c nāpahāraṃ striyaḥ kuryuḥ pativittāt kathaṃ cana
a striyās tu yad bhaved vittaṃ pitrā dattaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c brāhmaṇyās tad dharet kanyā yathā putras tathā hi sā
e sā hi putrasamā rājan vihitā kurunandana
a evam etat samuddiṣṭaṃ dharmeṣu bharatarṣabha
c etad dharmam anusmṛtya na vṛthā sādhayed dhanam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a śūdrāyāṃ brāhmaṇāj jāto yady adeyadhanaḥ smṛtaḥ
c kena prativiśeṣeṇa daśamo 'py asya dīyate
a brāhmaṇyāṃ brāhmaṇāj jāto brāhmaṇaḥ syān na saṃśayaḥ
c kṣatriyāyāṃ tathaiva syād vaiśyāyām api caiva hi
a kasmāt te viṣamaṃ bhāgaṃ bhajeran nṛpasattama
c yadā sarve trayo varṇās tvayoktā brāhmaṇā iti
 bhīṣma uvāca
a dārā ity ucyate loke nāmnaikena paraṃtapa
c proktena caikanāmnāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ sumahān bhavet
a tisraḥ kṛtvā puro bhāryāḥ paścād vindeta brāhmaṇīm
c sā jyeṣṭhā sā ca pūjyā syāt sā ca tābhyo garīyasī
a snānaṃ prasādhanaṃ bhartur dantadhāvanam añjanam
c havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca yac cānyad dharmayuktaṃ bhaved gṛhe
a na tasyāṃ jātu tiṣṭhantyām anyā tat kartum arhati
c brāhmaṇī tv eva tat kuryād brāhmaṇasya yudhiṣṭhira
a annaṃ pānaṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni ca
c brāhmaṇyai tāni deyāni bhartuḥ sā hi garīyasī
a manunābhihitaṃ śāstraṃ yac cāpi kurunandana
c tatrāpy eṣa mahārāja dṛṣṭo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
a atha ced anyathā kuryād yadi kāmād yudhiṣṭhira
c yathā brāhmaṇacaṇḍālaḥ pūrvadṛṣṭas tathaiva saḥ
a brāhmaṇyāḥ sadṛśaḥ putraḥ kṣatriyāyāś ca yo bhavet
c rājan viśeṣo nāsty atra varṇayor ubhayor api
a na tu jātyā samā loke brāhmaṇyāḥ kṣatriyā bhavet
c brāhmaṇyāḥ prathamaḥ putro bhūyān syād rājasattama
e bhūyo 'pi bhūyasā hāryaṃ pitṛvittād yudhiṣṭhira
a yathā na sadṛśī jātu brāhmaṇyāḥ kṣatriyā bhavet
c kṣatriyāyās tathā vaiśyā na jātu sadṛśī bhavet
a śrīś ca rājyaṃ ca kośaś ca kṣatriyāṇāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c vihitaṃ dṛśyate rājan sāgarāntā ca medinī
a kṣatriyo hi svadharmeṇa śriyaṃ prāpnoti bhūyasīm
c rājā daṇḍadharo rājan rakṣā nānyatra kṣatriyāt
a brāhmaṇā hi mahābhāgā devānām api devatāḥ
c teṣu rājā pravarteta pūjayā vidhipūrvakam
a praṇītam ṛṣibhir jñātvā dharmaṃ śāśvatam avyayam
c lupyamānāḥ svadharmeṇa kṣatriyo rakṣati prajāḥ
a dasyubhir hriyamāṇaṃ ca dhanaṃ dārāś ca sarvaśaḥ
c sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ trātā bhavati pārthivaḥ
a bhūyān syāt kṣatriyāputro vaiśyāputrān na saṃśayaḥ
c bhūyas tenāpi hartavyaṃ pitṛvittād yudhiṣṭhira
d vaiśyāputro 'pi bhūyāṃś ca śūdrāputrān na saṃśayaḥ
d bhayaṃ saṃjanayaty eva tasmād deyadhanas tv asau
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a uktaṃ te vidhivad rājan brāhmaṇasve pitāmaha
c itareṣāṃ tu varṇānāṃ kathaṃ viniyamo bhavet
 bhīṣma uvāca
a kṣatriyasyāpi bhārye dve vihite kurunandana
c tṛtīyā ca bhavec chūdrā na tu dṛṣṭāntataḥ smṛtā
a eṣa eva kramo hi syāt kṣatriyāṇāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c aṣṭadhā tu bhavet kāryaṃ kṣatriyasvaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
a kṣatriyāyā haret putraś caturo 'ṃśān pitur dhanāt
c yuddhāvahārikaṃ yac ca pituḥ syāt sa harec ca tat
a vaiśyāputras tu bhāgāṃs trīn śūdrāputras tathāṣṭamam
c so 'pi dattaṃ haret pitrā nādattaṃ hartum arhati
a ekaiva hi bhaved bhāryā vaiśyasya kurunandana
c dvitīyā vā bhavec chūdrā na tu dṛṣṭāntataḥ smṛtā
a vaiśyasya vartamānasya vaiśyāyāṃ bharatarṣabha
c śūdrāyāṃ caiva kaunteya tayor viniyamaḥ smṛtaḥ
a pañcadhā tu bhavet kāryaṃ vaiśyasvaṃ bharatarṣabha
c tayor apatye vakṣyāmi vibhāgaṃ ca janādhipa
a vaiśyāputreṇa hartavyāś catvāro 'ṃśāḥ pitur dhanāt
c pañcamas tu bhaved bhāgaḥ śūdrāputrāya bhārata
a so 'pi dattaṃ haret pitrā nādattaṃ hartum arhati
c tribhir varṇais tathā jātaḥ śūdro deyadhano bhavet
a śūdrasya syāt savarṇaiva bhāryā nānyā kathaṃ cana
c śūdrasya samabhāgaḥ syād yadi putraśataṃ bhavet
a jātānāṃ samavarṇāsu putrāṇām aviśeṣataḥ
c sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ samabhāgo dhane smṛtaḥ
a jyeṣṭhasya bhāgo jyeṣṭhaḥ syād ekāṃśo yaḥ pradhānataḥ
c eṣa dāyavidhiḥ pārtha pūrvam uktaḥ svayaṃbhuvā
a samavarṇāsu jātānāṃ viśeṣo 'sty aparo nṛpa
c vivāhavaiśeṣyakṛtaḥ pūrvaḥ pūrvo viśiṣyate
a harej jyeṣṭhaḥ pradhānāṃśam ekaṃ tulyāsuteṣv api
c madhyamo madhyamaṃ caiva kanīyāṃs tu kanīyasam
a evaṃ jātiṣu sarvāsu savarṇāḥ śreṣṭhatāṃ gatāḥ
c maharṣir api caitad vai mārīcaḥ kāśyapo 'bravīt
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a arthāśrayād vā kāmād vā varṇānāṃ vāpy aniścayāt
c ajñānād vāpi varṇānāṃ jāyate varṇasaṃkaraḥ
a teṣām etena vidhinā jātānāṃ varṇasaṃkare
c ko dharmaḥ kāni karmāṇi tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a cāturvarṇyasya karmāṇi cāturvarṇyaṃ ca kevalam
c asṛjat sa ha yajñārthe pūrvam eva prajāpatiḥ
a bhāryāś catasro viprasya dvayor ātmāsya jāyate
c ānupūrvyād dvayor hīnau mātṛjātyau prasūyataḥ
a paraṃ śavād brāhmaṇasyaiṣa putraḥ
śūdrāputraṃ pāraśavaṃ tam āhuḥ
c śuśrūṣakaḥ svasya kulasya sa syāt
svaṃ cāritraṃ nityam atho na jahyāt
a sarvān upāyān api saṃpradhārya
samuddharet svasya kulasya tantum
c jyeṣṭho yavīyān api yo dvijasya
śuśrūṣavān dānaparāyaṇaḥ syāt
a tisraḥ kṣatriyasaṃbandhād dvayor ātmāsya jāyate
c hīnavarṇas tṛtīyāyāṃ śūdra ugra iti smṛtaḥ
a dve cāpi bhārye vaiśyasya dvayor ātmāsya jāyate
c śūdrā śūdrasya cāpy ekā śūdram eva prajāyate
a ato viśiṣṭas tv adhamo gurudārapradharṣakaḥ
c bāhyaṃ varṇaṃ janayati cāturvarṇyavigarhitam
a ayājyaṃ kṣatriyo vrātyaṃ sūtaṃ stomakriyāparam
c vaiśyo vaidehakaṃ cāpi maudgalyam apavarjitam
a śūdraś caṇḍālam atyugraṃ vadhyaghnaṃ bāhyavāsinam
c brāhmaṇyāṃ saṃprajāyanta ity ete kulapāṃsanāḥ
e ete matimatāṃ śreṣṭha varṇasaṃkarajāḥ prabho
a bandī tu jāyate vaiśyān māgadho vākyajīvanaḥ
c śūdrān niṣādo matsyaghnaḥ kṣatriyāyāṃ vyatikramāt
a śūdrād āyogavaś cāpi vaiśyāyāṃ grāmadharmiṇaḥ
c brāhmaṇair apratigrāhyas takṣā sa vanajīvanaḥ
a ete 'pi sadṛśaṃ varṇaṃ janayanti svayoniṣu
c mātṛjātyāṃ prasūyante pravarā hīnayoniṣu
a yathā caturṣu varṇeṣu dvayor ātmāsya jāyate
c ānantaryāt tu jāyante tathā bāhyāḥ pradhānataḥ
a te cāpi sadṛśaṃ varṇaṃ janayanti svayoniṣu
c parasparasya vartanto janayanti vigarhitān
a yathā ca śūdro brāhmaṇyāṃ jantuṃ bāhyaṃ prasūyate
c evaṃ bāhyatarād bāhyaś cāturvarṇyāt prasūyate
a pratilomaṃ tu vartanto bāhyād bāhyataraṃ punaḥ
c hīnā hīnāt prasūyante varṇāḥ pañcadaśaiva te
a agamyāgamanāc caiva vartate varṇasaṃkaraḥ
c vrātyānām atra jāyante sairandhrā māgadheṣu ca
e prasādhanopacārajñam adāsaṃ dāsajīvanam
a ataś cāyogavaṃ sūte vāgurāvanajīvanam
c maireyakaṃ ca vaidehaḥ saṃprasūte 'tha mādhukam
a niṣādo mudgaraṃ sūte dāśaṃ nāvopajīvinam
c mṛtapaṃ cāpi caṇḍālaḥ śvapākam atikutsitam
a caturo māgadhī sūte krūrān māyopajīvinaḥ
c māṃsasvādukaraṃ sūdaṃ saugandham iti saṃjñitam
a vaidehakāc ca pāpiṣṭhaṃ krūraṃ bhāryopajīvinam
c niṣādān madranābhaṃ ca kharayānaprayāyinam
a caṇḍālāt pulkasaṃ cāpi kharāśvagajabhojinam
c mṛtacelapraticchannaṃ bhinnabhājanabhojinam
a āyogavīṣu jāyante hīnavarṇāsu te trayaḥ
c kṣudro vaidehakād andhro bahir grāmapratiśrayaḥ
a kārāvaro niṣādyāṃ tu carmakārāt prajāyate
c caṇḍālāt pāṇḍusaupākas tvaksāravyavahāravān
a āhiṇḍiko niṣādena vaidehyāṃ saṃprajāyate
c caṇḍālena tu saupāko maudgalyasamavṛttimān
a niṣādī cāpi caṇḍālāt putram antāvasāyinam
c śmaśānagocaraṃ sūte bāhyair api bahiṣkṛtam
a ity etāḥ saṃkare jātyaḥ pitṛmātṛvyatikramāt
c pracchannā vā prakāśā vā veditavyāḥ svakarmabhiḥ
a caturṇām eva varṇānāṃ dharmo nānyasya vidyate
c varṇānāṃ dharmahīneṣu saṃjñā nāstīha kasya cit
a yadṛcchayopasaṃpannair yajñasādhubahiṣkṛtaiḥ
c bāhyā bāhyais tu jāyante yathāvṛtti yathāśrayam
a catuṣpathaśmaśānāni śailāṃś cānyān vanaspatīn
b caityadrumasmaśāneṣu śaileṣūpavaneṣu ca
b kārṣṇāyasam alaṃkāraṃ parigṛhya ca nityaśaḥ
b vaseyur ete pitryais tu vartayantaḥ svakarmabhiḥ
c yuñjante cāpy alaṃkārāṃs tathopakaraṇāni ca
a gobrāhmaṇārthe sāhāyyaṃ kurvāṇā vai na saṃśayaḥ
c ānṛśaṃsyam anukrośaḥ satyavākyam atha kṣamā
a svaśarīraiḥ paritrāṇaṃ bāhyānāṃ siddhikārakam
c manujavyāghra bhavati tatra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
a yathopadeśaṃ parikīrtitāsu
naraḥ prajāyeta vicārya buddhimān
c vihīnayonir hi suto 'vasādayet
titīrṣamāṇaṃ salile yathopalam
a avidvāṃsam alaṃ loke vidvāṃsam api vā punaḥ
c nayante hy utpathaṃ nāryaḥ kāmakrodhavaśānugam
a svabhāvaś caiva nārīṇāṃ narāṇām iha dūṣaṇam
c ityarthaṃ na prasajjante pramadāsu vipaścitaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a varṇāpetam avijñātaṃ naraṃ kaluṣayonijam
c āryarūpam ivānāryaṃ kathaṃ vidyāmahe nṛpa
 bhīṣma uvāca
a yonisaṃkaluṣe jātaṃ nānācārasamāhitam
c karmabhiḥ sajjanācīrṇair vijñeyā yoniśuddhatā
a anāryatvam anācāraḥ krūratvaṃ niṣkriyātmatā
c puruṣaṃ vyañjayantīha loke kaluṣayonijam
a pitryaṃ vā bhajate śīlaṃ mātṛjaṃ vā tathobhayam
c na kathaṃ cana saṃkīrṇaḥ prakṛtiṃ svāṃ niyacchati
a yathaiva sadṛśo rūpe mātāpitror hi jāyate
c vyāghraś citrais tathā yoniṃ puruṣaḥ svāṃ niyacchati
a kulasrotasi saṃchanne yasya syād yonisaṃkaraḥ
c saṃśrayaty eva tacchīlaṃ naro 'lpam api vā bahu
a āryarūpasamācāraṃ carantaṃ kṛtake pathi
c svavarṇam anyavarṇaṃ vā svaśīlaṃ śāsti niścaye
a nānāvṛtteṣu bhūteṣu nānākarmarateṣu ca
c janmavṛttasamaṃ loke suśliṣṭaṃ na virajyate
a śarīram iha sattvena narasya parikṛṣyate
c jyeṣṭhamadhyāvaraṃ sattvaṃ tulyasattvaṃ pramodate
a jyāyāṃsam api śīlena vihīnaṃ naiva pūjayet
c api śūdraṃ tu sadvṛttaṃ dharmajñam abhipūjayet
d ātmānam ātmanākhyāti karmasvaiḥ karmabhir naraḥ
d svaśīlacāritrakṛtaiḥ karmair vāpi sic
śubhāśubhaiḥ
a ātmānam ākhyāti hi karmabhir naraḥ
svaśīlacāritrakṛtaiḥ śubhāśubhaiḥ
c pranaṣṭam apy ātmakulaṃ tathā naraḥ
punaḥ prakāśaṃ kurute svakarmabhiḥ
a yoniṣv etāsu sarvāsu saṃkīrṇāsv itarāsu ca
c yatrātmānaṃ na janayed budhas tāḥ parivarjayet
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a brūhi putrān kuruśreṣṭha varṇānāṃ tvaṃ pṛthak pṛthak
c kīdṛśyāṃ kīdṛśāś cāpi putrāḥ kasya ca ke ca te
a vipravādāḥ subahuśaḥ śrūyante putrakāritāḥ
c atra no muhyatāṃ rājan saṃśayaṃ chettum arhasi
d bhīṣmaḥ
d ātmā putras tu vijñeyaḥ prathamo bahudhā pare
d sve kṣetre saṃskṛte yas tu putram utpādayet svayam
d tam aurasaṃ vijānīyāt putraṃ prathamakalpitam
d agniṃ prajāpatiṃ ceṣṭvā varāya pratipāditā
d putrikā syād duhitari saṃkalpenāpi vā sutaḥ
d talpe jātaḥ pramītasya klībasya patitasya vā
d svadharmeṇa niyukto yaḥ sa putraḥ kṣetrajaḥ smṛtaḥ
d mātā pitā ca dadyātāṃ yam adbhiḥ putram āpadi
d sadṛśaṃ prītisaṃyuktau vijñeyo dāttakaḥ sutaḥ
d sadṛśaṃ tu prakuryād yaṃ guṇadoṣavicakṣaṇam
d putraṃ putraguṇair yuktaṃ vijñeyas tu sa kṛtrimaḥ
d utpadyate yas tu gūḍhaṃ na ca jñāyeta kasya cit
d sa bhaved gūḍhajo nāma tasya syād yasya talpajaḥ
d mātāpitṛbhyām utsṛṣṭaṃ tayor anyatareṇa vā
d yaḥ putraṃ pratigṛhṇīyād apaviddhaḥ sa ucyate
d pitṛveśmani kanyā tu yaṃ putraṃ janayed rahaḥ
d kānīnaṃ taṃ vaden nāmnā voḍhuḥ kanyāsamudbhavaḥ
d yā garbhiṇī saṃskriyate jñātājñātāpi vā satī
d voḍhuḥ sa garbho bhavati sahoḍha iti cocyate
d yā patyā vā parityaktā atha vā svecchayāpi vā
d utpādayed akṣatāyāṃ sa paunarbhava ucyate
d mātāpitṛvihīno vā sakto vā syād akāraṇāt
d ātmānaṃ sparśayed yas tu svayaṃdattaḥ sa ucyate
d krīṇīyād yas tv apatyārthaṃ mātāpitror yam antikāt
d sa sutas tasya sadṛśaḥ krīto nāma budhaiḥ smṛtaḥ
d dvādaśaite pare prāhur evaṃ dharmasya pāṭhakāḥ
d sā ced akṣatayoniḥ syād gatapratyāgatāpi vā
d paunarbhavena bhartrā sā punaḥ saṃskāram arhati
d yaṃ brāhmaṇas tu śūdrāyāṃ kāmād utpādayet sutam
d sa pārayann eva śavas tasmāt pāraśavaḥ smṛtaḥ
d dāsyāṃ vā dāsadāsyāṃ vā yaḥ śūdrasya suto bhavet
d so 'nujñāto hared aṃśam iti dharmo vyavasthitaḥ
d kṣetrajādīn sutān etān ekādaśa yathoditān
d putrapratinidhīn āhuḥ kriyālopān manīṣiṇaḥ
d bhrātṝṇām ekajātānām ekaś cet putravān bhavet
d sarvāṃs tāṃs tena putreṇa putriṇo manur abravīt
d sarvāsām ekapatnīnām ekā cet putriṇī bhavet
d sarvās tās tena putreṇa prāha putravatīr manuḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ātmā putras tu vijñeyas tasyānantarajaś ca yaḥ
c niyuktajaś ca vijñeyaḥ sutaḥ prasṛtajas tathā
a patitasya ca bhāryāyāṃ bhartrā susamavetayā
c tathā dattakṛtau putrāv adhyūḍhaś ca tathāparaḥ
a ṣaḍ apadhvaṃsajāś cāpi kānīnāpasadās tathā
c ity ete te samākhyātās tān vijānīhi bhārata
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ṣaḍ apadhvaṃsajāḥ ke syuḥ ke vāpy apasadās tathā
c etat sarvaṃ yathātattvaṃ vyākhyātuṃ me tvam arhasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a triṣu varṇeṣu ye putrā brāhmaṇasya yudhiṣṭhira
c varṇayoś ca dvayoḥ syātāṃ yau rājanyasya bhārata
a eko dvivarṇa evātha tathātraivopalakṣitaḥ
c ṣaḍ apadhvaṃsajās te hi tathaivāpasadāñ śṛṇu
a caṇḍālo vrātyavenau ca brāhmaṇyāṃ kṣatriyāsu ca
c vaiśyāyāṃ caiva śūdrasya lakṣyante 'pasadās trayaḥ
a māgadho vāmakaś caiva dvau vaiśyasyopalakṣitau
c brāhmaṇyāṃ kṣatriyāyāṃ ca kṣatriyasyaika eva tu
a brāhmaṇyāṃ lakṣyate sūta ity ete 'pasadāḥ smṛtāḥ
c putrareto na śakyaṃ hi mithyā kartuṃ narādhipa
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kṣetrajaṃ ke cid evāhuḥ sutaṃ ke cit tu śukrajam
c tulyāv etau sutau kasya tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a retajo vā bhavet putras tyakto vā kṣetrajo bhavet
c adhyūḍhaḥ samayaṃ bhittvety etad eva nibodha me
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a retojaṃ vidma vai putraṃ kṣetrajasyāgamaḥ katham
c adhyūḍhaṃ vidma vai putraṃ hitvā ca samayaṃ katham
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ātmajaṃ putram utpādya yas tyajet kāraṇāntare
c na tatra kāraṇaṃ retaḥ sa kṣetrasvāmino bhavet
a putrakāmo hi putrārthe yāṃ vṛṇīte viśāṃ pate
c tatra kṣetraṃ pramāṇaṃ syān na vai tatrātmajaḥ sutaḥ
a anyatra kṣetrajaḥ putro lakṣyate bharatarṣabha
c na hy ātmā śakyate hantuṃ dṛṣṭāntopagato hy asau
a kaś cic ca kṛtakaḥ putraḥ saṃgrahād eva lakṣyate
c na tatra retaḥ kṣetraṃ vā pramāṇaṃ syād yudhiṣṭhira
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kīdṛśaḥ kṛtakaḥ putraḥ saṃgrahād eva lakṣyate
c śukraṃ kṣetraṃ pramāṇaṃ vā yatra lakṣyeta bhārata
 bhīṣma uvāca
a mātāpitṛbhyāṃ saṃtyaktaṃ pathi yaṃ tu pralakṣayet
c na cāsya mātāpitarau jñāyete sa hi kṛtrimaḥ
a asvāmikasya svāmitvaṃ yasmin saṃpratilakṣayet
c savarṇas taṃ ca poṣeta savarṇas tasya jāyate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a katham asya prayoktavyaḥ saṃskāraḥ kasya vā katham
c deyā kanyā kathaṃ ceti tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ātmavat tasya kurvīta saṃskāraṃ svāmivat tathā

 bhīṣma uvāca

a tathā matsyaiḥ parivṛtaṃ cyavanaṃ bhṛgunandanam

c sarve prāñjalayo dāśāḥ śirobhiḥ prāpatan bhuvi
a parikhedaparitrāsāj jālasyākarṣaṇena ca

c babhūva kṛpayāviṣṭo niḥśvasaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
 niṣādā ūcuḥ
a ajñānād yat kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ prasādaṃ tatra naḥ kuru
c karavāma priyaṃ kiṃ te tan no brūhi mahāmune
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity ukto matsyamadhyasthaś cyavano vākyam abravīt

c saṃvāsān notsahe tyaktuṃ salilādhyuṣitān imān

c sarve viṣaṇṇavadanā nahuṣāya nyavedayan
 bhīṣma uvāca
a nahuṣas tu tataḥ śrutvā cyavanaṃ taṃ tathāgatam
c tvaritaḥ prayayau tatra sahāmātyapurohitaḥ
a śaucaṃ kṛtvā yathānyāyaṃ prāñjaliḥ prayato nṛpaḥ
c ātmānam ācacakṣe ca cyavanāya mahātmane
a arcayām āsa taṃ cāpi tasya rājñaḥ purohitaḥ
c satyavrataṃ mahābhāgaṃ devakalpaṃ viśāṃ pate

 nahuṣa uvāca
a sahasraṃ dīyatāṃ mūlyaṃ niṣādebhyaḥ purohita
c niṣkrayārthaṃ bhagavato yathāha bhṛgunandanaḥ

a sahasraṃ nāham arhāmi kiṃ vā tvaṃ manyase nṛpa

 nahuṣa uvāca

 cyavana uvāca

 bhīṣma uvāca
a maharṣer vacanaṃ śrutvā nahuṣo duḥkhakarśitaḥ

a tatra tv anyo vanacaraḥ kaś cin mūlaphalāśanaḥ

 nahuṣa uvāca

 bhīṣma uvāca
a nahuṣasya vacaḥ śrutvā gavijātaḥ pratāpavān
c uvāca harṣayan sarvān amātyān pārthivaṃ ca tam
d gavijātaḥ

d ārohaṇaṃ niṣādānāṃ matsyānāṃ caiva bhārata
a tatas tau gavijaś caiva cyavanaś ca bhṛgūdvahaḥ

 bhīṣma uvāca

 bhīṣma uvāca

c kim annajātam iṣṭaṃ te kim upasthāpayāmy aham
a tataḥ sa parayā prītyā pratyuvāca janādhipam

c yathopapannaṃ cāhāraṃ tasmai prādāj janādhipaḥ

c svaptum icchāmy ahaṃ nidrā bādhate mām iti prabho

a aviśaṅkaś ca kuśikas tathety āha sa dharmavit
c na prabodhayatāṃ taṃ ca tau tadā rajanīkṣaye

c babhūvatur mahārāja prayatāv atha daṃpatī
a tataḥ sa bhagavān vipraḥ samādiśya narādhipam
c suṣvāpaikena pārśvena divasān ekaviṃśatim
d dvāviṃśena samutthāya niścakrāma tapodhanaḥ
a sa tu rājā nirāhāraḥ sabhāryaḥ kurunandana
c paryupāsata taṃ hṛṣṭaś cyavanārādhane rataḥ
a bhārgavas tu samuttasthau svayam eva tapodhanaḥ
c akiṃcid uktvā tu gṛhān niścakrāma mahātapāḥ
a tam anvagacchatāṃ tau tu kṣudhitau śramakarśitau
c bhāryāpatī muniśreṣṭho na ca tāv avalokayat
a tayos tu prekṣator eva bhārgavāṇāṃ kulodvahaḥ
c antarhito 'bhūd rājendra tato rājāpatat kṣitau
a sa muhūrtaṃ samāśvasya saha devyā mahādyutiḥ
c punar anveṣaṇe yatnam akarot paramaṃ tadā
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a tasminn antarhite vipre rājā kim akarot tadā
c bhāryā cāsya mahābhāgā tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a adṛṣṭvā sa mahīpālas tam ṛṣiṃ saha bhāryayā
c pariśrānto nivavṛte vrīḍito naṣṭacetanaḥ
a sa praviśya purīṃ dīno nābhyabhāṣata kiṃ cana
c tad eva cintayām āsa cyavanasya viceṣṭitam
a atha śūnyena manasā praviveśa gṛhaṃ nṛpaḥ
c dadarśa śayane tasmiñ śayānaṃ bhṛgunandanam
a vismitau tau tu dṛṣṭvā taṃ tad āścaryaṃ vicintya ca
c darśanāt tasya ca muner viśrāntau saṃbabhūvatuḥ
a yathāsthānaṃ tu tau sthitvā bhūyas taṃ saṃvavāhatuḥ
c athāpareṇa pārśvena suṣvāpa sa mahāmuniḥ
a tenaiva ca sa kālena pratyabudhyata vīryavān
c na ca tau cakratuḥ kiṃ cid vikāraṃ bhayaśaṅkitau
a pratibuddhas tu sa munis tau provāca viśāṃ pate
c tailābhyaṅgo dīyatāṃ me snāsye 'ham iti bhārata
d athāha bhagavāṃs tau tu pratibuddho viśāṃ pate
d tailābhyaṅgaṃ prayacchetāṃ snātum icchāmi pārthiva
a tatheti tau pratiśrutya kṣudhitau śramakarśitau
c śatapākena tailena mahārheṇopatasthatuḥ
a tataḥ sukhāsīnam ṛṣiṃ vāgyatau saṃvavāhatuḥ
c na ca paryāptam ity āha bhārgavaḥ sumahātapāḥ
a yadā tau nirvikārau tu lakṣayām āsa bhārgavaḥ
c tata utthāya sahasā snānaśālāṃ viveśa ha
e kḷptam eva tu tatrāsīt snānīyaṃ pārthivocitam
a asatkṛtya tu tat sarvaṃ tatraivāntaradhīyata
c sa muniḥ punar evātha nṛpateḥ paśyatas tadā
e nāsūyāṃ cakratus tau ca daṃpatī bharatarṣabha
a atha snātaḥ sa bhagavān siṃhāsanagataḥ prabhuḥ
c darśayām āsa kuśikaṃ sabhāryaṃ bhṛgunandanaḥ
a saṃhṛṣṭavadano rājā sabhāryaḥ kuśiko munim
c siddham annam iti prahvo nirvikāro nyavedayat
a ānīyatām iti munis taṃ covāca narādhipam
c rājā ca samupājahre tadannaṃ saha bhāryayā
a māṃsaprakārān vividhāñ śākāni vividhāni ca
c vesavāravikārāṃś ca pānakāni laghūni ca
a rasālāpūpakāṃś citrān modakān atha ṣāḍavān
c rasān nānāprakārāṃś ca vanyaṃ ca munibhojanam
a phalāni ca vicitrāṇi tathā bhojyāni bhūriśaḥ
c badareṅgudakāśmaryabhallātakavaṭāni ca
a gṛhasthānāṃ ca yad bhojyaṃ yac cāpi vanavāsinām
c sarvam āhārayām āsa rājā śāpabhayān muneḥ
a atha sarvam upanyastam agrataś cyavanasya tat
c tataḥ sarvaṃ samānīya tac ca śayyāsanaṃ muniḥ
a vastraiḥ śubhair avacchādya bhojanopaskaraiḥ saha
c sarvam ādīpayām āsa cyavano bhṛgunandanaḥ
a na ca tau cakratuḥ kopaṃ daṃpatī sumahāvratau
c tayoḥ saṃprekṣator eva punar antarhito 'bhavat
a tatraiva ca sa rājarṣis tasthau tāṃ rajanīṃ tadā
c sabhāryo vāgyataḥ śrīmān na ca taṃ kopa āviśat
a nityaṃ saṃskṛtam annaṃ tu vividhaṃ rājaveśmani
c śayanāni ca mukhyāni pariṣekāś ca puṣkalāḥ
a vastraṃ ca vividhākāram abhavat samupārjitam
c na śaśāka tato draṣṭum antaraṃ cyavanas tadā
a punar eva ca viprarṣiḥ provāca kuśikaṃ nṛpam
c sabhāryo māṃ rathenāśu vaha yatra bravīmy aham
a tatheti ca prāha nṛpo nirviśaṅkas tapodhanam
c krīḍāratho 'stu bhagavann uta sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ
a ity uktaḥ sa munis tena rājñā hṛṣṭena tad vacaḥ
c cyavanaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ parapuraṃjayam
a sajjīkuru rathaṃ kṣipraṃ yas te sāṃgrāmiko mataḥ
c sāyudhaḥ sapatākaś ca saśaktiḥ kaṇayaṣṭimān
a kiṅkiṇīśatanirghoṣo yuktas tomarakalpanaiḥ
c gadākhaḍganibaddhaś ca parameṣuśatānvitaḥ
a tataḥ sa taṃ tathety uktvā kalpayitvā mahāratham
c bhāryāṃ vāme dhuri tadā cātmānaṃ dakṣiṇe tathā
a tridaṃṣṭraṃ vajrasūcyagraṃ pratodaṃ tatra cādadhat
c sarvam etat tato dattvā nṛpo vākyam athābravīt
a bhagavan kva ratho yātu bravītu bhṛgunandanaḥ
c yatra vakṣyasi viprarṣe tatra yāsyati te rathaḥ
a evam uktas tu bhagavān pratyuvācātha taṃ nṛpam
c itaḥprabhṛti yātavyaṃ padakaṃ padakaṃ śanaiḥ
a śramo mama yathā na syāt tathā me chandacāriṇau
c sukhaṃ caivāsmi voḍhavyo janaḥ sarvaś ca paśyatu
a notsāryaḥ pathikaḥ kaś cit tebhyo dāsyāmy ahaṃ vasu
c brāhmaṇebhyaś ca ye kāmān arthayiṣyanti māṃ pathi
a sarvaṃ dāsyāmy aśeṣeṇa dhanaṃ ratnāni caiva hi
c kriyatāṃ nikhilenaitan mā vicāraya pārthiva
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā bhṛtyān athābravīt
c yad yad brūyān munis tat tat sarvaṃ deyam aśaṅkitaiḥ
a tato ratnāny anekāni striyo yugyam ajāvikam
c kṛtākṛtaṃ ca kanakaṃ gajendrāś cācalopamāḥ
a anvagacchanta tam ṛṣiṃ rājāmātyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
c hāhābhūtaṃ ca tat sarvam āsīn nagaram ārtimat
a tau tīkṣṇāgreṇa sahasā pratodena pracoditau
c pṛṣṭhe viddhau kaṭe caiva nirvikārau tam ūhatuḥ
a vepamānau virāhārau pañcāśad rātrakarśitau
c kathaṃ cid ūhatur vīrau daṃpatī taṃ rathottamam
a bahuśo bhṛśaviddhau tau kṣaramāṇau kṣatodbhavam
c dadṛśāte mahārāja puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau
a tau dṛṣṭvā pauravargas tu bhṛśaṃ śokaparāyaṇaḥ
c abhiśāpabhayāt trasto na ca kiṃ cid uvāca ha
a dvandvaśaś cābruvan sarve paśyadhvaṃ tapaso balam
c kruddhā api muniśreṣṭhaṃ vīkṣituṃ naiva śaknumaḥ
d brāhmaṇā eva jāyeran nānyo varṇaḥ kathaṃ cana
d īdṛśaṃ ratham āruhya ko 'nyo jīvitum utsahet
a aho bhagavato vīryaṃ maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ
c rājñaś cāpi sabhāryasya dhairyaṃ paśyata yādṛśam
a śrāntāv api hi kṛcchreṇa ratham etaṃ samūhatuḥ
c na caitayor vikāraṃ vai dadarśa bhṛgunandanaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tataḥ sa nirvikārau tau dṛṣṭvā bhṛgukulodvahaḥ
c vasu viśrāṇayām āsa yathā vaiśravaṇas tathā
a tatrāpi rājā prītātmā yathājñaptam athākarot
c tato 'sya bhagavān prīto babhūva munisattamaḥ
a avatīrya rathaśreṣṭhād daṃpatī tau mumoca ha
c vimocya caitau vidhivat tato vākyam uvāca ha
a snigdhagambhīrayā vācā bhārgavaḥ suprasannayā
c dadāni vāṃ varaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tad brūtām iti bhārata
a sukumārau ca tau vidvān karābhyāṃ munisattamaḥ
c pasparśāmṛtakalpābhyāṃ snehād bharatasattama
a athābravīn nṛpo vākyaṃ śramo nāsty āvayor iha
c viśrāntau svaḥ prabhāvāt te dhyānenaiveti bhārgava
a atha tau bhagavān prāha prahṛṣṭaś cyavanas tadā
c na vṛthā vyāhṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yan mayā tad bhaviṣyati
a ramaṇīyaḥ samuddeśo gaṅgātīram idaṃ śubham
c kaṃ cit kālaṃ vrataparo nivatsyāmīha pārthiva
a gamyatāṃ svapuraṃ putra viśrāntaḥ punar eṣyasi
c ihasthaṃ māṃ sabhāryas tvaṃ draṣṭāsi śvo narādhipa
a na ca manyus tvayā kāryaḥ śreyas te samupasthitam
c yat kāṅkṣitaṃ hṛdisthaṃ te tat sarvaṃ saṃbhaviṣyati
a ity evam uktaḥ kuśikaḥ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā
c provāca muniśārdūlam idaṃ vacanam arthavat
a na me manyur mahābhāga pūto 'smi bhagavaṃs tvayā
c saṃvṛttau yauvanasthau svo vapuṣmantau balānvitau
a pratodena vraṇā ye me sabhāryasya kṛtās tvayā
c tān na paśyāmi gātreṣu svastho 'smi saha bhāryayā
a imāṃ ca devīṃ paśyāmi mune divyāpsaropamām
c śriyā paramayā yuktāṃ yathādṛṣṭāṃ mayā purā
a tava prasādāt saṃvṛttam idaṃ sarvaṃ mahāmune
c naitac citraṃ tu bhagavaṃs tvayi satyaparākrama
a ity uktaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ cyavanaḥ kuśikaṃ tadā
c āgacchethāḥ sabhāryaś ca tvam iheti narādhipa
a ity uktaḥ samanujñāto rājarṣir abhivādya tam
c prayayau vapuṣā yukto nagaraṃ devarājavat
a tata enam upājagmur amātyāḥ sapurohitāḥ
c balasthā gaṇikāyuktāḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayas tathā
a tair vṛtaḥ kuśiko rājā śriyā paramayā jvalan
c praviveśa puraṃ hṛṣṭaḥ pūjyamāno 'tha bandibhiḥ
a tataḥ praviśya nagaraṃ kṛtvā sarvāhṇikakriyāḥ
c bhuktvā sabhāryo rajanīm uvāsa sa mahīpatiḥ
a tatas tu tau navam abhivīkṣya yauvanaṃ
parasparaṃ vigatajarāv ivāmarau
c nanandatuḥ śayanagatau vapurdharau
śriyā yutau dvijavaradattayā tayā
a sa cāpy ṛṣir bhṛgukulakīrtivardhanas
tapodhano vanam abhirāmam ṛddhimat
c manīṣayā bahuvidharatnabhūṣitaṃ
sasarja yan nāsti śatakrator api
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tataḥ sa rājā rātryante pratibuddho mahāmanāḥ
c kṛtapūrvāhṇikaḥ prāyāt sabhāryas tad vanaṃ prati
a tato dadarśa nṛpatiḥ prāsādaṃ sarvakāñcanam
c maṇistambhasahasrāḍhyaṃ gandharvanagaropamam
e tatra divyān abhiprāyān dadarśa kuśikas tadā
a parvatān ramyasānūṃś ca nalinīś ca sapaṅkajāḥ
c citraśālāś ca vividhās toraṇāni ca bhārata
e śādvalopacitāṃ bhūmiṃ tathā kāñcanakuṭṭimām
a sahakārān praphullāṃś ca ketakoddālakān dhavān
c aśokān mucukundāṃś ca phullāṃś caivātimuktakān
a campakāṃs tilakān bhavyān panasān vañjulān api
c puṣpitān karṇikārāṃś ca tatra tatra dadarśa ha
a śyāmāṃ vāraṇapuṣpīṃ ca tathāṣṭāpadikāṃ latām
c tatra tatra parikḷptā dadarśa sa mahīpatiḥ
a vṛkṣān padmotpaladharān sarvartukusumāṃs tathā
c vimānacchandakāṃś cāpi prāsādān padmasaṃnibhān
a śītalāni ca toyāni kva cid uṣṇāni bhārata
c āsanāni vicitrāṇi śayanapravarāṇi ca
a paryaṅkān sarvasauvarṇān parārdhyāstaraṇāstṛtān
c bhakṣyabhojyam anantaṃ ca tatra tatropakalpitam
a vāṇīvādāñ chukāṃś cāpi śārikābhṛṅgarājakān
c kokilāñ chatapatrāṃś ca koyaṣṭimakakukkuṭān
a mayūrān kukkuṭāṃś cāpi putrakāñ jīvajīvakān
c cakorān vānarān haṃsān sārasāṃś cakrasāhvayān
a samantataḥ praṇaditān dadarśa sumanoharān
c kva cid apsarasāṃ saṃghān gandharvāṇāṃ ca pārthiva
a kāntābhir aparāṃs tatra pariṣvaktān dadarśa ha
c na dadarśa ca tān bhūyo dadarśa ca punar nṛpaḥ
a gītadhvaniṃ sumadhuraṃ tathaivādhyayanadhvanim
c haṃsān sumadhurāṃś cāpi tatra śuśrāva pārthivaḥ
a taṃ dṛṣṭvātyadbhutaṃ rājā manasācintayat tadā
c svapno 'yaṃ cittavibhraṃśa utāho satyam eva tu
a aho saha śarīreṇa prāpto 'smi paramāṃ gatim
c uttarān vā kurūn puṇyān atha vāpy amarāvatīm
a kiṃ tv idaṃ mahad āścaryaṃ saṃpaśyāmīty acintayat
c evaṃ saṃcintayann eva dadarśa munipuṃgavam
a tasmin vimāne sauvarṇe maṇistambhasamākule
c mahārhe śayane divye śayānaṃ bhṛgunandanam
a tam abhyayāt praharṣeṇa narendraḥ saha bhāryayā
c antarhitas tato bhūyaś cyavanaḥ śayanaṃ ca tat
a tato 'nyasmin vanoddeśe punar eva dadarśa tam
c kauśyāṃ bṛsyāṃ samāsīnaṃ japamānaṃ mahāvratam
e evaṃ yogabalād vipro mohayām āsa pārthivam
a kṣaṇena tad vanaṃ caiva te caivāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
c gandharvāḥ pādapāś caiva sarvam antaradhīyata
a niḥśabdam abhavac cāpi gaṅgākūlaṃ punar nṛpa
c kuśavalmīkabhūyiṣṭhaṃ babhūva ca yathā purā
a tataḥ sa rājā kuśikaḥ sabhāryas tena karmaṇā
c vismayaṃ paramaṃ prāptas tad dṛṣṭvā mahad adbhutam
a tataḥ provāca kuśiko bhāryāṃ harṣasamanvitaḥ
c paśya bhadre yathā bhāvāś citrā dṛṣṭāḥ sudurlabhāḥ
a prasādād bhṛgumukhyasya kim anyatra tapobalāt
c tapasā tad avāpyaṃ hi yan na śakyaṃ manorathaiḥ
a trailokyarājyād api hi tapa eva viśiṣyate
c tapasā hi sutaptena krīḍaty eṣa tapodhanaḥ
a aho prabhāvo brahmarṣeś cyavanasya mahātmanaḥ
c icchann eṣa tapovīryād anyāṃl lokān sṛjed api
a brāhmaṇā eva jāyeran puṇyavāgbuddhikarmaṇaḥ
c utsahed iha kartuṃ hi ko 'nyo vai cyavanād ṛte
d brāhmaṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ loke tal labdhvā durlabhaṃ tapaḥ
d siddhis tatrāpi duṣprāpā siddher api parā gatiḥ
a brāhmaṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ loke rājyaṃ hi sulabhaṃ naraiḥ
c brāhmaṇyasya prabhāvād dhi rathe yuktau svadhuryavat
a ity evaṃ cintayānaḥ sa viditaś cyavanasya vai
c saṃprekṣyovāca sa nṛpaṃ kṣipram āgamyatām iti
a ity uktaḥ sahabhāryas tam abhyagacchan mahāmunim
c śirasā vandanīyaṃ tam avandata sa pārthivaḥ
a tasyāśiṣaḥ prayujyātha sa munis taṃ narādhipam
c niṣīdety abravīd dhīmān sāntvayan puruṣarṣabha
a tataḥ prakṛtim āpanno bhārgavo nṛpate nṛpam
c uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā tarpayann iva bhārata
a rājan samyag jitānīha pañca pañcasu yat tvayā
c manaḥṣaṣṭhānīndriyāṇi kṛcchrān mukto 'si tena vai
a samyag ārādhitaḥ putra tvayāhaṃ vadatāṃ vara
c na hi te vṛjinaṃ kiṃ cit susūkṣmam api vidyate
a anujānīhi māṃ rājan gamiṣyāmi yathāgatam
c prīto 'smi tava rājendra varaś ca pratigṛhyatām
 kuśika uvāca
a agnimadhyagatenedaṃ bhagavan saṃnidhau mayā
c vartitaṃ bhṛguśārdūla yan na dagdho 'smi tad bahu
a eṣa eva varo mukhyaḥ prāpto me bhṛgunandana
c yat prīto 'si samācārāt kulaṃ pūtaṃ mamānagha
a eṣa me 'nugraho vipra jīvite ca prayojanam
c etad rājyaphalaṃ caiva tapaś caitat paraṃ mama
a yadi tu prītimān vipra mayi tvaṃ bhṛgunandana
c asti me saṃśayaḥ kaś cit tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
 cyavana uvāca
a varaś ca gṛhyatāṃ matto yaś ca te saṃśayo hṛdi
c taṃ ca brūhi naraśreṣṭha sarvaṃ saṃpādayāmi te
 kuśika uvāca
a yadi prīto 'si bhagavaṃs tato me vada bhārgava
c kāraṇaṃ śrotum icchāmi madgṛhe vāsakāritam
a śayanaṃ caikapārśvena divasān ekaviṃśatim
c akiṃcid uktvā gamanaṃ bahiś ca munipuṃgava
a antardhānam akasmāc ca punar eva ca darśanam
c punaś ca śayanaṃ vipra divasān ekaviṃśatim
a tailābhyaktasya gamanaṃ bhojanaṃ ca gṛhe mama
c samupānīya vividhaṃ yad dagdhaṃ jātavedasā
e niryāṇaṃ ca rathenāśu sahasā yat kṛtaṃ tvayā
a dhanānāṃ ca visargasya vanasyāpi ca darśanam
c prāsādānāṃ bahūnāṃ ca kāñcanānāṃ mahāmune
a maṇividrumapādānāṃ paryaṅkānāṃ ca darśanam
c punaś cādarśanaṃ tasya śrotum icchāmi kāraṇam
a atīva hy atra muhyāmi cintayāno divāniśam
c na caivātrādhigacchāmi sarvasyāsya viniścayam
e etad icchāmi kārtsnyena satyaṃ śrotuṃ tapodhana
 cyavana uvāca
a śṛṇu sarvam aśeṣeṇa yad idaṃ yena hetunā
c na hi śakyam anākhyātum evaṃ pṛṣṭena pārthiva
a pitāmahasya vadataḥ purā devasamāgame
c śrutavān asmi yad rājaṃs tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
a brahmakṣatravirodhena bhavitā kulasaṃkaraḥ
c pautras te bhavitā rājaṃs tejovīryasamanvitaḥ
a tataḥ svakularakṣārtham ahaṃ tvā samupāgamam
c cikīrṣan kuśikocchedaṃ saṃdidhakṣuḥ kulaṃ tava
a tato 'ham āgamya purā tvām avocaṃ mahīpate
c niyamaṃ kaṃ cid ārapsye śuśrūṣā kriyatām iti
a na ca te duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cid aham āsādayaṃ gṛhe
c tena jīvasi rājarṣe na bhavethās tato 'nyathā
a etāṃ buddhiṃ samāsthāya divasān ekaviṃśatim
c supto 'smi yadi māṃ kaś cid bodhayed iti pārthiva
a yadā tvayā sabhāryeṇa saṃsupto na prabodhitaḥ
c ahaṃ tadaiva te prīto manasā rājasattama
a utthāya cāsmi niṣkrānto yadi māṃ tvaṃ mahīpate
c pṛccheḥ kva yāsyasīty evaṃ śapeyaṃ tvām iti prabho
a antarhitaś cāsmi punaḥ punar eva ca te gṛhe
c yogam āsthāya saṃviṣṭo divasān ekaviṃśatim
a kṣudhito mām asūyethāḥ śramād veti narādhipa
c etāṃ buddhiṃ samāsthāya karśitau vāṃ mayā kṣudhā
a na ca te 'bhūt susūkṣmo 'pi manyur manasi pārthiva
c sabhāryasya naraśreṣṭha tena te prītimān aham
a bhojanaṃ ca samānāyya yat tad ādīpitaṃ mayā
c krudhyethā yadi mātsaryād iti tan marṣitaṃ ca te
d rathena vāhitaś cāpi śramāt krodhodbhavāya te
a tato 'haṃ ratham āruhya tvām avocaṃ narādhipa
c sabhāryo māṃ vahasveti tac ca tvaṃ kṛtavāṃs tathā
a aviśaṅko narapate prīto 'haṃ cāpi tena te
c dhanotsarge 'pi ca kṛte na tvāṃ krodhaḥ pradharṣayat
a tataḥ prītena te rājan punar etat kṛtaṃ tava
c sabhāryasya vanaṃ bhūyas tad viddhi manujādhipa
a prītyarthaṃ tava caitan me svargasaṃdarśanaṃ kṛtam
c yat te vane 'smin nṛpate dṛṣṭaṃ divyaṃ nidarśanam
a svargoddeśas tvayā rājan saśarīreṇa pārthiva
c muhūrtam anubhūto 'sau sabhāryeṇa nṛpottama
a nidarśanārthaṃ tapaso dharmasya ca narādhipa
c tatra yāsīt spṛhā rājaṃs tac cāpi viditaṃ mama
a brāhmaṇyaṃ kāṅkṣase hi tvaṃ tapaś ca pṛthivīpate
c avamanya narendratvaṃ devendratvaṃ ca pārthiva
a evam etad yathāttha tvaṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ tāta durlabham
c brāhmaṇye sati carṣitvam ṛṣitve ca tapasvitā
a bhaviṣyaty eṣa te kāmaḥ kuśikāt kauśiko dvijaḥ
c tṛtīyaṃ puruṣaṃ prāpya brāhmaṇatvaṃ gamiṣyati
