a vaṃśas te pārthivaśreṣṭha bhṛgūṇām eva tejasā
c pautras te bhavitā vipra tapasvī pāvakadyutiḥ
a yaḥ sa devamanuṣyāṇāṃ bhayam utpādayiṣyati
b jamadagnau mahābhāga tapasā bhāvitātmani
b sa cāpi bhṛguśārdūlas taṃ vedaṃ dhārayiṣyati
c trayāṇāṃ caiva lokānāṃ satyam etad bravīmi te
a varaṃ gṛhāṇa rājarṣe yas te manasi vartate
c tīrthayātrāṃ gamiṣyāmi purā kālo 'tivartate
 kuśika uvāca
a eṣa eva varo me 'dya yat tvaṃ prīto mahāmune
c bhavatv etad yathāttha tvaṃ tapaḥ pautre mamānagha
e brāhmaṇyaṃ me kulasyāstu bhagavann eṣa me varaḥ
a punaś cākhyātum icchāmi bhagavan vistareṇa vai
c katham eṣyati vipratvaṃ kulaṃ me bhṛgunandana
e kaś cāsau bhavitā bandhur mama kaś cāpi saṃmataḥ
 cyavana uvāca
a avaśyaṃ kathanīyaṃ me tavaitan narapuṃgava
c yadarthaṃ tvāham ucchettuṃ saṃprāpto manujādhipa
a bhṛgūṇāṃ kṣatriyā yājyā nityam eva janādhipa
c te ca bhedaṃ gamiṣyanti daivayuktena hetunā
a kṣatriyāś ca bhṛgūn sarvān vadhiṣyanti narādhipa
c ā garbhād anukṛntanto daivadaṇḍanipīḍitāḥ
a tata utpatsyate 'smākaṃ kule gotravivardhanaḥ
c aurvo nāma mahātejā jvalanārkasamadyutiḥ
a sa trailokyavināśāya kopāgniṃ janayiṣyati
c mahīṃ saparvatavanāṃ yaḥ kariṣyati bhasmasāt
a kaṃ cit kālaṃ tu taṃ vahniṃ sa eva śamayiṣyati
c samudre vaḍavāvaktre prakṣipya munisattamaḥ
a putraṃ tasya mahābhāgam ṛcīkaṃ bhṛgunandanam
c sākṣāt kṛtsno dhanurvedaḥ samupasthāsyate 'nagha
a kṣatriyāṇām abhāvāya daivayuktena hetunā
c sa tu taṃ pratigṛhyaiva putre saṃkrāmayiṣyati
a jamadagnau mahābhāge tapasā bhāvitātmani
c sa cāpi bhṛguśārdūlas taṃ vedaṃ dhārayiṣyati
a kulāt tu tava dharmātman kanyāṃ so 'dhigamiṣyati
b kṣatrahantā bhaved dhiṃsram iti devaṃ sanātanam
b nārāyaṇam upāsyāsya varāt taṃ putram icchati
c udbhāvanārthaṃ bhavato vaṃśasya nṛpasattama
a gādher duhitaraṃ prāpya pautrīṃ tava mahātapāḥ
c brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatradharmāṇaṃ rāmam utpādayiṣyati
a kṣatriyaṃ viprakarmāṇaṃ bṛhaspatim ivaujasā
c viśvāmitraṃ tava kule gādheḥ putraṃ sudhārmikam
e tapasā mahatā yuktaṃ pradāsyati mahādyute
a striyau tu kāraṇaṃ tatra parivarte bhaviṣyataḥ
c pitāmahaniyogād vai nānyathaitad bhaviṣyati
a tṛtīye puruṣe tubhyaṃ brāhmaṇatvam upaiṣyati
c bhavitā tvaṃ ca saṃbandhī bhṛgūṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
 bhīṣma uvāca
a kuśikas tu muner vākyaṃ cyavanasya mahātmanaḥ
c śrutvā hṛṣṭo 'bhavad rājā vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
e evam astv iti dharmātmā tadā bharatasattama
a cyavanas tu mahātejāḥ punar eva narādhipam
c varārthaṃ codayām āsa tam uvāca sa pārthivaḥ
a bāḍham evaṃ grahīṣyāmi kāmaṃ tvatto mahāmune
c brahmabhūtaṃ kulaṃ me 'stu dharme cāsya mano bhavet
a evam uktas tathety evaṃ pratyuktvā cyavano muniḥ
c abhyanujñāya nṛpatiṃ tīrthayātrāṃ yayau tadā
a etat te kathitaṃ sarvam aśeṣeṇa mayā nṛpa
c bhṛgūṇāṃ kuśikānāṃ ca prati saṃbandhakāraṇam
a yathoktaṃ muninā cāpi tathā tad abhavan nṛpa
c janma rāmasya ca muner viśvāmitrasya caiva ha
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a muhyāmīva niśamyādya cintayānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
c hīnāṃ pārthivasaṃghātaiḥ śrīmadbhiḥ pṛthivīm imām
a prāpya rājyāni śataśo mahīṃ jitvāpi bhārata
c koṭiśaḥ puruṣān hatvā paritapye pitāmaha
a kā nu tāsāṃ varastrīṇām avasthādya bhaviṣyati
c yā hīnāḥ patibhiḥ putrair mātulair bhrātṛbhis tathā
a vayaṃ hi tān gurūn hatvā jñātīṃś ca suhṛdo 'pi ca
c avākśīrṣāḥ patiṣyāmo narake nātra saṃśayaḥ
a śarīraṃ yoktum icchāmi tapasogreṇa bhārata
c upadiṣṭam ihecchāmi tattvato 'haṃ viśāṃ pate
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a yudhiṣṭhirasya tad vākyaṃ śrutvā bhīṣmo mahāmanāḥ
c parīkṣya nipuṇaṃ buddhyā yudhiṣṭhiram abhāṣata
a rahasyam adbhutaṃ caiva śṛṇu vakṣyāmi yat tvayi
c yā gatiḥ prāpyate yena pretyabhāveṣu bhārata
a tapasā prāpyate svargas tapasā prāpyate yaśaḥ
c āyuḥprakarṣo bhogāś ca labhyante tapasā vibho
a jñānaṃ vijñānam ārogyaṃ rūpaṃ saṃpat tathaiva ca
c saubhāgyaṃ caiva tapasā prāpyate bharatarṣabha
a dhanaṃ prāpnoti tapasā maunaṃ jñānaṃ prayacchati
c upabhogāṃs tu dānena brahmacaryeṇa jīvitam
a ahiṃsāyāḥ phalaṃ rūpaṃ dīkṣāyā janma vai kule
c phalamūlāśināṃ rājyaṃ svargaḥ parṇāśināṃ bhavet
a payobhakṣo divaṃ yāti snānena draviṇādhikaḥ
c guruśuśrūṣayā vidyā nityaśrāddhena saṃtatiḥ
a gavāḍhyaḥ śākadīkṣābhiḥ svargam āhus tṛṇāśanāt
c striyas triṣavaṇasnānād vāyuṃ pītvā kratuṃ labhet
a nityasnāyī bhaved dakṣaḥ saṃdhye tu dve japan dvijaḥ
c maruṃ sādhayato rājyaṃ nākapṛṣṭham anāśake
a sthaṇḍile śayamānānāṃ gṛhāṇi śayanāni ca
c cīravalkalavāsobhir vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni ca
a śayyāsanāni yānāni yogayukte tapodhane
c agnipraveśe niyataṃ brahmaloko vidhīyate
a rasānāṃ pratisaṃhārāt saubhāgyam iha vindati
c āmiṣapratisaṃhārāt prajāsyāyuṣmatī bhavet
a udavāsaṃ vased yas tu sa narādhipatir bhavet
c satyavādī naraśreṣṭha daivataiḥ saha modate
a kīrtir bhavati dānena tathārogyam ahiṃsayā
c dvijaśuśrūṣayā rājyaṃ dvijatvaṃ vāpi puṣkalam
a pānīyasya pradānena kīrtir bhavati śāśvatī
c annapānapradānena tṛpyate kāmabhogataḥ
a sāntvadaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvaśokair vimucyate
c devaśuśrūṣayā rājyaṃ divyaṃ rūpaṃ niyacchati
a dīpālokapradānena cakṣuṣmān bhavate naraḥ
c prekṣaṇīyapradānena smṛtiṃ medhāṃ ca vindati
a gandhamālyanivṛttyā tu kīrtir bhavati puṣkalā
c keśaśmaśrūn dhārayatām agryā bhavati saṃtatiḥ
a upavāsaṃ ca dīkṣāṃ ca abhiṣekaṃ ca pārthiva
c kṛtvā dvādaśa varṣāṇi vīrasthānād viśiṣyate
a dāsīdāsam alaṃkārān kṣetrāṇi ca gṛhāṇi ca
c brahmadeyāṃ sutāṃ dattvā prāpnoti manujarṣabha
a kratubhiś copavāsaiś ca tridivaṃ yāti bhārata
c labhate ca ciraṃ sthānaṃ balipuṣpaprado naraḥ
a suvarṇaśṛṅgais tu vibhūṣitānāṃ
gavāṃ sahasrasya naraḥ pradātā
c prāpnoti puṇyaṃ divi devalokam
ity evam āhur munidevasaṃghāḥ
a prayacchate yaḥ kapilāṃ sacailāṃ
kāṃsyopadohāṃ kanakāgraśṛṅgīm
c tais tair guṇaiḥ kāmadughāsya bhūtvā
naraṃ pradātāram upaiti sā gauḥ
a yāvanti lomāni bhavanti dhenvās
tāvat phalaṃ prāpnute gopradātā
c putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś ca kulaṃ ca sarvam
āsaptamaṃ tārayate paratra
a sadakṣiṇāṃ kāñcanacāruśṛṅgīṃ
kāṃsyopadohāṃ draviṇottarīyām
c dhenuṃ tilānāṃ dadato dvijāya
lokā vasūnāṃ sulabhā bhavanti
a svakarmabhir mānavaṃ saṃnibaddhaṃ
tīvrāndhakāre narake patantam
c mahārṇave naur iva vāyuyuktā
dānaṃ gavāṃ tārayate paratra
a yo brahmadeyāṃ tu dadāti kanyāṃ
bhūmipradānaṃ ca karoti vipre
c dadāti cānnaṃ vidhivac ca yaś ca
sa lokam āpnoti puraṃdarasya
a naiveśikaṃ sarvaguṇopapannaṃ
dadāti vai yas tu naro dvijāya
c svādhyāyacāritraguṇānvitāya
tasyāpi lokāḥ kuruṣūttareṣu
a dhuryapradānena gavāṃ tathāśvair
lokān avāpnoti naro vasūnām
c svargāya cāhur hi hiraṇyadānaṃ
tato viśiṣṭaṃ kanakapradānam
a chatrapradānena gṛhaṃ variṣṭhaṃ
yānaṃ tathopānahasaṃpradāne
c vastrapradānena phalaṃ surūpaṃ
gandhapradāne surabhir naraḥ syāt
a puṣpopagaṃ vātha phalopagaṃ vā
yaḥ pādapaṃ sparśayate dvijāya
c sa strīsamṛddhaṃ bahuratnapūrṇaṃ
labhaty ayatnopagataṃ gṛhaṃ vai
d labheta kāmaṃ sa bhaved arogas
d tathā surūpaś ca narendraloke
a bhakṣānnapānīyarasapradātā
sarvān avāpnoti rasān prakāmam
c pratiśrayācchādanasaṃpradātā
prāpnoti tān eva na saṃśayo 'tra
a sragdhūpagandhāny anulepanāni
snānāni mālyāni ca mānavo yaḥ
c dadyād dvijebhyaḥ sa bhaved arogas
tathābhirūpaś ca narendraloke
a bījair aśūnyaṃ śayanair upetaṃ
dadyād gṛhaṃ yaḥ puruṣo dvijāya
c puṇyābhirāmaṃ bahuratnapūrṇaṃ
labhaty adhiṣṭhānavaraṃ sa rājan
a sugandhacitrāstaraṇopapannaṃ
dadyān naro yaḥ śayanaṃ dvijāya
c rūpānvitāṃ pakṣavatīṃ manojñāṃ
bhāryām ayatnopagatāṃ labhet saḥ
a pitāmahasyānucaro vīraśāyī bhaven naraḥ
c nādhikaṃ vidyate tasmād ity āhuḥ paramarṣayaḥ
d pustakaṃ ca tathā gāvaḥ kanyā dānaṃ tathaiva ca
d ye na dāsyanti puruṣās teṣāṃ saukhyaṃ pareṇa kim
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā prītātmā kurunandanaḥ
c nāśrame 'rocayad vāsaṃ vīramārgābhikāṅkṣayā
a tato yudhiṣṭhiraḥ prāha pāṇḍavān bharatarṣabha
c pitāmahasya yad vākyaṃ tad vo rocatv iti prabhuḥ
a tatas tu pāṇḍavāḥ sarve draupadī ca yaśasvinī
c yudhiṣṭhirasya tad vākyaṃ bāḍham ity abhyapūjayan
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yānīmāni bahir vedyāṃ dānāni paricakṣate
c tebhyo viśiṣṭaṃ kiṃ dānaṃ mataṃ te kurupuṃgava
a kautūhalaṃ hi paramaṃ tatra me vartate prabho
c dātāraṃ dattam anveti yad dānaṃ tat pracakṣva me
 bhīṣma uvāca
a abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo vyasane cāpy anugraham
c yac cābhilaṣitaṃ dadyāt tṛṣitāyābhiyācate
a dattaṃ manyeta yad dattvā tad dānaṃ śreṣṭham ucyate
c dattaṃ dātāram anveti yad dānaṃ bharatarṣabha
a hiraṇyadānaṃ godānaṃ pṛthivīdānam eva ca
c etāni vai pavitrāṇi tārayanty api duṣkṛtam
a etāni puruṣavyāghra sādhubhyo dehi nityadā
c dānāni hi naraṃ pāpān mokṣayanti na saṃśayaḥ
a yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ loke yac cāsya dayitaṃ gṛhe
c tat tad guṇavate deyaṃ tad evākṣayam icchatā
a priyāṇi labhate loke priyadaḥ priyakṛt tathā
c priyo bhavati bhūtānām iha caiva paratra ca
a yācamānam abhīmānād āśāvantam akiṃcanam
c yo nārcati yathāśakti sa nṛśaṃso yudhiṣṭhira
a amitram api ced dīnaṃ śaraṇaiṣiṇam āgatam
c vyasane yo 'nugṛhṇāti sa vai puruṣasattamaḥ
a kṛśāya hrīmate tāta vṛttikṣīṇāya sīdate
c apahanyāt kṣudhaṃ yas tu na tena puruṣaḥ samaḥ
a hriyā tu niyatān sādhūn putradāraiś ca karśitān
c ayācamānān kaunteya sarvopāyair nimantraya
a āśiṣaṃ ye na deveṣu na martyeṣu ca kurvate
c arhanto nityasattvasthā yathālabdhopajīvinaḥ
a āśīviṣasamebhyaś ca tebhyo rakṣasva bhārata
c tāny uktair upajijñāsya tathā dvijavarottamān
a kṛtair āvasathair nityaṃ sapreṣyaiḥ saparicchadaiḥ
c nimantrayethāḥ kauravya sarvakāmasukhāvahaiḥ
a yadi te pratigṛhṇīyuḥ śraddhāpūtaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c kāryam ity eva manvānā dhārmikāḥ puṇyakarmiṇaḥ
a vidyāsnātā vratasnātā ye vyapāśrityajīvinaḥ
c gūḍhasvādhyāyatapaso brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
a teṣu śuddheṣu dānteṣu svadāranirateṣu ca
c yat kariṣyasi kalyāṇaṃ tat tvā lokeṣu dhāsyati
a yathāgnihotraṃ suhutaṃ sāyaṃ prātar dvijātinā
c tathā bhavati dattaṃ vai dvijebhyo 'tha kṛtātmanā
a eṣa te vitato yajñaḥ śraddhāpūtaḥ sadakṣiṇaḥ
c viśiṣṭaḥ sarvayajñebhyo dadatas tāta vartatām
a nivāpo dānasadṛśas tādṛśeṣu yudhiṣṭhira
c nivapan pūjayaṃś caiva teṣv ānṛṇyaṃ nigacchati
a ya eva no na kupyanti na lubhyanti tṛṇeṣv api
c ta eva naḥ pūjyatamā ye cānye priyavādinaḥ
a ye no na bahu manyante na pravartanti cāpare
c putravat paripālyās te namas tebhyas tathābhayam
a ṛtvikpurohitācāryā mṛdubrahmadharā hi te
c kṣatreṇāpi hi saṃsṛṣṭaṃ tejaḥ śāmyati vai dvije
a asti me balavān asmi rājāsmīti yudhiṣṭhira
c brāhmaṇān mā sma paryaśnīr vāsobhir aśanena ca
a yac chobhārthaṃ balārthaṃ vā vittam asti tavānagha
c tena te brāhmaṇāḥ pūjyāḥ svadharmam anutiṣṭhatā
a namaskāryās tvayā viprā vartamānā yathātatham
c yathāsukhaṃ yathotsāhaṃ lalantu tvayi putravat
a ko hy anyaḥ suprasādānāṃ suhṛdām alpatoṣiṇām
c vṛttim arhaty upakṣeptuṃ tvad anyaḥ kurusattama
a yathā patyāśrayo dharmaḥ strīṇāṃ loke sanātanaḥ
c sa devaḥ sā gatir nānyā tathāsmākaṃ dvijātayaḥ
a yadi no brāhmaṇās tāta saṃtyajeyur apūjitāḥ
c paśyanto dāruṇaṃ karma satataṃ kṣatriye sthitam
a avedānām akīrtīnām alokānām ayajvanām
c ko 'smākaṃ jīvitenārthas tad dhi no brāhmaṇāśrayam
a atra te vartayiṣyāmi yathā dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
c rājanyo brāhmaṇaṃ rājan purā paricacāra ha
e vaiśyo rājanyam ity eva śūdro vaiśyam iti śrutiḥ
a dūrāc chūdreṇopacaryo brāhmaṇo 'gnir iva jvalan
c saṃsparśaparicaryas tu vaiśyena kṣatriyeṇa ca
a mṛdubhāvān satyaśīlān satyadharmānupālakān
c āśīviṣān iva kruddhāṃs tān upācarata dvijān
a apareṣāṃ pareṣāṃ ca parebhyaś caiva ye pare
c kṣatriyāṇāṃ pratapatāṃ tejasā ca balena ca
e brāhmaṇeṣv eva śāmyanti tejāṃsi ca tapāṃsi ca
a na me pitā priyataro na tvaṃ tāta tathā priyaḥ
c na me pituḥ pitā rājan na cātmā na ca jīvitam
a tvattaś ca me priyataraḥ pṛthivyāṃ nāsti kaś cana
c tvatto 'pi me priyatarā brāhmaṇā bharatarṣabha
a bravīmi satyam etac ca yathāhaṃ pāṇḍunandana
c tena satyena gaccheyaṃ lokān yatra sa śaṃtanuḥ
a paśyeyaṃ ca satāṃ lokāñ chucīn brahmapuraskṛtān
c tatra me tāta gantavyam ahnāya ca cirāya ca
a so 'ham etādṛśāṃl lokān dṛṣṭvā bharatasattama
c yan me kṛtaṃ brāhmaṇeṣu na tapye tena pārthiva
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yau tu syātāṃ caraṇenopapannau
yau vidyayā sadṛśau janmanā ca
c tābhyāṃ dānaṃ katarasmai viśiṣṭam
ayācamānāya ca yācate ca
 bhīṣma uvāca
a śreyo vai yācataḥ pārtha dattam āhur ayācate
c arhattamo vai dhṛtimān kṛpaṇād adhṛtātmanaḥ
a kṣatriyo rakṣaṇadhṛtir brāhmaṇo 'narthanādhṛtiḥ
c brāhmaṇo dhṛtimān vidvān devān prīṇāti tuṣṭimān
a yācñām āhur anīśasya abhihāraṃ ca bhārata
c udvejayati yācan hi sadā bhūtāni dasyuvat
a mriyate yācamāno vai tam anu mriyate dadat
c dadat saṃjīvayaty enam ātmānaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
a ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmo yācate yat pradīyate
c ayācataḥ sīdamānān sarvopāyair nimantraya
a yadi vai tādṛśā rāṣṭre vaseyus te dvijottamāḥ
c bhasmacchannān ivāgnīṃs tān budhyethās tvaṃ prayatnataḥ
a tapasā dīpyamānās te daheyuḥ pṛthivīm api
b apūjyamānāḥ kauravya pūjārhās te tathāvidhāḥ
c pūjyā hi jñānavijñānatapoyogasamanvitāḥ
a tebhyaḥ pūjāṃ prayuñjīthā brāhmaṇebhyaḥ paraṃtapa
c dadad bahuvidhān dāyān upacchandān ayācatām
a yad agnihotre suhute sāyaṃprātar bhavet phalam
c vidyāvedavratavati tad dānaphalam ucyate
a vidyāvedavratasnātān avyapāśrayajīvinaḥ
c gūḍhasvādhyāyatapaso brāhmaṇān saṃśitavratān
a kṛtair āvasathair hṛdyaiḥ sapreṣyaiḥ saparicchadaiḥ
c nimantrayethāḥ kaunteya kāmaiś cānyair dvijottamān
a api te pratigṛhṇīyuḥ śraddhāpūtaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c kāryam ity eva manvānā dharmajñāḥ sūkṣmadarśinaḥ
a api te brāhmaṇā bhuktvā gatāḥ soddharaṇān gṛhān
c yeṣāṃ dārāḥ pratīkṣante parjanyam iva karṣakāḥ
a annāni prātaḥsavane niyatā brahmacāriṇaḥ
c brāhmaṇās tāta bhuñjānās tretāgnīn prīṇayantu te
a mādhyaṃdinaṃ te savanaṃ dadatas tāta vartatām
c gā hiraṇyāni vāsāṃsi tenendraḥ prīyatāṃ tava
a tṛtīyaṃ savanaṃ tat te vaiśvadevaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c yad devebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaś ca viprebhyaś ca prayacchasi
a ahiṃsā sarvabhūtebhyaḥ saṃvibhāgaś ca sarvaśaḥ
c damas tyāgo dhṛtiḥ satyaṃ bhavatv avabhṛthāya te
a eṣa te vitato yajñaḥ śraddhāpūtaḥ sadakṣiṇaḥ
c viśiṣṭaḥ sarvayajñebhyo nityaṃ tāta pravartatām
d yat kiṃ cit pāṇḍaraṃ puṣpaṃ yat kiṃ cid anulepanam
d alakṣmīparihārāya nityaṃ deyaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a dānaṃ yajñakriyā ceha kiṃ svit pretya mahāphalam
c kasya jyāyaḥ phalaṃ proktaṃ kīdṛśebhyaḥ kathaṃ kadā
d nityānuṣṭhānayuktāś cet pratigṛhṇanti sādhavaḥ
a etad icchāmi vijñātuṃ yāthātathyena bhārata
c vidvañ jijñāsamānāya dānadharmān pracakṣva me
a antarvedyāṃ ca yad dattaṃ śraddhayā cānṛśaṃsyataḥ
c kiṃ svin niḥśreyasaṃ tāta tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a raudraṃ karma kṣatriyasya satataṃ tāta vartate
c tasya vaitānikaṃ karma dānaṃ caiveha pāvanam
a na tu pāpakṛtāṃ rājñāṃ pratigṛhṇanti sādhavaḥ
a yājakā dvijasattamāḥ
a dhane satyapradātṝṇāṃ
c etasmāt kāraṇād yajñair yajed rājāptadakṣiṇaiḥ
a atha cet pratigṛhṇīyur dadyād aharahar nṛpaḥ
c śraddhām āsthāya paramāṃ pāvanaṃ hy etad uttamam
a brāhmaṇāṃs tarpayed dravyais tato yajñe yatavrataḥ
c maitrān sādhūn vedavidaḥ śīlavṛttataponvitān
a yat te tena kariṣyanti kṛtaṃ tena bhaviṣyati
c yajñān sādhaya sādhubhyaḥ svādvannān dakṣiṇāvataḥ
a iṣṭaṃ dattaṃ ca manyethā ātmānaṃ dānakarmaṇā
c pūjayethā yāyajūkāṃs tavāpy aṃśo bhaved yathā
d vidvadbhyaḥ saṃpradānena tatrāpy aṃśo 'sya pūjayā
d yajvabhyaś cātha vidvadbhyo dattvā lokaṃ pradāpayet
d pradadyāj jñānadātṝṇāṃ jñānadānāṃśabhāg bhavet
a prajāvato bharethāś ca brāhmaṇān bahubhāriṇaḥ
c prajāvāṃs tena bhavati yathā janayitā tathā
a yāvato vai sādhudharmān santaḥ saṃvartayanty uta
c sarve te cāpi bhartavyā narā ye bahubhāriṇaḥ
a samṛddhaḥ saṃprayacchasva brāhmaṇebhyo yudhiṣṭhira
c dhenūr anaḍuho 'nnāni cchatraṃ vāsāṃsy upānahau
a ājyāni yajamānebhyas tathānnādyāni bhārata
c aśvavanti ca yānāni veśmāni śayanāni ca
a ete deyā vyuṣṭimanto laghūpāyāś ca bhārata
c ajugupsāṃś ca vijñāya brāhmaṇān vṛttikarśitān
a upacchannaṃ prakāśaṃ vā vṛttyā tān pratipādaya
c rājasūyāśvamedhābhyāṃ śreyas tat kṣatriyān prati
a evaṃ pāpair vimuktas tvaṃ pūtaḥ svargam avāpsyasi
c sraṃsayitvā punaḥ kośaṃ yad rāṣṭraṃ pālayiṣyasi
a tataś ca brahmabhūyastvam avāpsyasi dhanāni ca
c ātmanaś ca pareṣāṃ ca vṛttiṃ saṃrakṣa bhārata
a putravac cāpi bhṛtyān svān prajāś ca paripālaya
c yogakṣemaś ca te nityaṃ brāhmaṇeṣv astu bhārata
d tadarthaṃ jīvitaṃ te 'stu mā tebhyo 'pratipālanam
d anartho brāhmaṇasyaiṣa yad vittanicayo mahān
d śriyā hy abhīkṣṇaṃ saṃvāso darpayet saṃpramohayet
d brāhmaṇeṣu pramūḍheṣu dharmo vipraṇaśed dhruvam
d dharmapraṇāśe bhūtānām abhāvaḥ syān na saṃśayaḥ
d yo rakṣibhyaḥ saṃpradāya rājā rāṣṭraṃ vilumpati
d yakṣye rāṣṭrād dhanaṃ tasmād ānayadhvam iti bruvan
d yac cādāya tad ājñaptaṃ bhītaṃ dattaṃ sudāruṇam
d yajed rājā na taṃ yajñaṃ praśaṃsanty asya sādhavaḥ
d apīḍitāḥ susaṃvṛddhā ye dadaty anukūlataḥ
d tādṛśenābhyupāyena yaṣṭavyaṃ nodyamāhṛtaiḥ
d yadā pariniṣicyeta nihito vai yathāvidhi
d tadā rājā mahāyajñair yajeta bahudakṣiṇaiḥ
d vṛddhabāladhanaṃ rakṣyam andhasya kṛpaṇasya ca
d na khātapūrvaṃ kurvīta na rudantīdhanaṃ haret
d hṛtaṃ kṛpaṇavittaṃ hi rāṣṭraṃ hanti nṛpaśriyam
d dadyāc ca mahato bhogān kṣudbhayaṃ praṇudet satām
d yeṣāṃ svādūni bhojyāni samavekṣyanti bālakāḥ
d nāśnanti vidhivat tāni kiṃ nu pāpataraṃ tataḥ
d yadi te tādṛśo rāṣṭre vidvān sīdet kṣudhā dvijaḥ
d bhrūṇahatyāṃ ca gacchethāḥ kṛtvā pāpam ivottamam
d dhik tasya jīvitaṃ rājño rāṣṭre yasyāvasīdati
d dvijo 'nyo vā manuṣyo 'pi śibir āha vaco yathā
d yasya sma viṣaye rājñaḥ snātakaḥ sīdati kṣudhā
d avṛddhim eti tad rāṣṭraṃ vindate saha rājakam
d krośantyo yasya vai rāṣṭrād dhriyante tarasā striyaḥ
d krośatāṃ patiputrāṇāṃ mṛto 'sau na sa jīvati
a arakṣitāraṃ hartāraṃ viloptāram adāyakam
c taṃ sma rājakaliṃ hanyuḥ prajāḥ saṃbhūya nirghṛṇam
a ahaṃ vo rakṣitety uktvā yo na rakṣati bhūmipaḥ
c sa saṃhatya nihantavyaḥ śveva sonmāda āturaḥ
a pāpaṃ kurvanti yat kiṃ cit prajā rājñā hy arakṣitāḥ
c caturthaṃ tasya pāpasya rājā bhārata vindati
a apy āhuḥ sarvam eveti bhūyo 'rdham iti niścayaḥ
c caturthaṃ matam asmākaṃ manoḥ śrutvānuśāsanam
a śubhaṃ vā yat prakurvanti prajā rājñā surakṣitāḥ
c caturthaṃ tasya puṇyasya rājā cāpnoti bhārata
a jīvantaṃ tvānujīvantu prajāḥ sarvā yudhiṣṭhira
c parjanyam iva bhūtāni mahādrumam iva dvijāḥ
a kuberam iva rakṣāṃsi śatakratum ivāmarāḥ
c jñātayas tvānujīvantu suhṛdaś ca paraṃtapa
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a idaṃ deyam idaṃ deyam itīyaṃ śruticodanā
c bahudeyāś ca rājānaḥ kiṃ svid deyam anuttamam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ati dānāni sarvāṇi pṛthivīdānam ucyate
c acalā hy akṣayā bhūmir dogdhrī kāmān anuttamān
a dogdhrī vāsāṃsi ratnāni paśūn vrīhiyavāṃs tathā
c bhūmidaḥ sarvabhūteṣu śāśvatīr edhate samāḥ
a yāvad bhūmer āyur iha tāvad bhūmida edhate
c na bhūmidānād astīha paraṃ kiṃ cid yudhiṣṭhira
a apy alpaṃ pradaduḥ pūrve pṛthivyā iti naḥ śrutam
c bhūmim ete daduḥ sarve ye bhūmiṃ bhuñjate janāḥ
a svakarmaivopajīvanti narā iha paratra ca
c bhūmir bhūtir mahādevī dātāraṃ kurute priyam
a ya etāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadyād akṣayāṃ pṛthivīpatiḥ
c punar naratvaṃ saṃprāpya bhavet sa pṛthivīpatiḥ
a yathā dānaṃ tathā bhoga iti dharmeṣu niścayaḥ
c saṃgrāme vā tanuṃ jahyād dadyād vā pṛthivīm imām
a ity etāṃ kṣatrabandhūnāṃ vadanti param āśiṣam
c punāti dattā pṛthivī dātāram iti śuśruma
a api pāpasamācāraṃ brahmaghnam api vānṛtam
c saiva pāpaṃ pāvayati saiva pāpāt pramocayet
a api pāpakṛtāṃ rājñāṃ pratigṛhṇanti sādhavaḥ
c pṛthivīṃ nānyad icchanti pāvanaṃ jananī yathā
a nāmāsyāḥ priyadatteti guhyaṃ devyāḥ sanātanam
c dānaṃ vāpy atha vā jñānaṃ nāmno 'syāḥ paramaṃ priyam
d ya etāṃ viduṣe dadyāt pṛthivīṃ pṛthivīpatiḥ
d pṛthivyām etad iṣṭaṃ sa rājyād rājyam iti vrajet
d punaś ca jananaṃ prāpya rājaiva syān na saṃśayaḥ
e tasmāt prāpyaiva pṛthivīṃ dadyād viprāya pārthivaḥ
a nābhūmipatinā bhūmir adhiṣṭheyā kathaṃ cana
c na vā pātreṇa vā gūhed antardhānena vā caret
e ye cānye bhūmim iccheyuḥ kuryur evam asaṃśayam
a yaḥ sādhor bhūmim ādatte na bhūmiṃ vindate tu saḥ
c bhūmiṃ tu dattvā sādhubhyo vindate bhūmim eva hi
e pretyeha ca sa dharmātmā saṃprāpnoti mahad yaśaḥ
f ekāhārakarīṃ dattvā ṣaṣṭisāhasram ūrdhvagaḥ
f tāvaty āharaṇe hṛtvā narakaṃ dviguṇottaram
a yasya viprānuśāsanti sādhor bhūmiṃ sadaiva hi
c na tasya śatravo rājan praśāsanti vasuṃdharām
a yat kiṃ cit puruṣaḥ pāpaṃ kurute vṛttikarśitaḥ
c api gocarmamātreṇa bhūmidānena pūyate
d daśahastena vaṃśena daśavaṃśān samantataḥ
d pañcahastādhikaṃ dadyād etad gocarma ucyate
a ye 'pi saṃkīrṇakarmāṇo rājāno raudrakarmiṇaḥ
c tebhyaḥ pavitram ākhyeyaṃ bhūmidānam anuttamam
a alpāntaram idaṃ śaśvat purāṇā menire janāḥ
c yo yajed aśvamedhena dadyād vā sādhave mahīm
a api cet sukṛtaṃ kṛtvā śaṅkerann api paṇḍitāḥ
c aśakyam ekam evaitad bhūmidānam anuttamam
a suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ vastraṃ maṇimuktāvasūni ca
c sarvam etan mahāprājña dadāti vasudhāṃ dadat
a tapo yajñaḥ śrutaṃ śīlam alobhaḥ satyasaṃdhatā
c gurudaivatapūjā ca nātivartanti bhūmidam
a bhartur niḥśreyase yuktās tyaktātmāno raṇe hatāḥ
c brahmalokagatāḥ siddhā nātikrāmanti bhūmidam
a yathā janitrī kṣīreṇa svaputraṃ bharate sadā
c anugṛhṇāti dātāraṃ tathā sarvarasair mahī
a mṛtyor vai kiṃkaro daṇḍas tāpo vahneḥ sudāruṇaḥ
c ghorāś ca vāruṇāḥ pāśā nopasarpanti bhūmidam
a pitṝṃś ca pitṛlokasthān devaloke ca devatāḥ
c saṃtarpayati śāntātmā yo dadāti vasuṃdharām
a kṛśāya mriyamāṇāya vṛttimlānāya sīdate
c bhūmiṃ vṛttikarīṃ dattvā satrī bhavati mānavaḥ
a yathā dhāvati gaur vatsaṃ kṣīram abhyutsṛjanty uta
c evam eva mahābhāga bhūmir bhavati bhūmidam
a halakṛṣṭāṃ mahīṃ dattvā sabījāṃ saphalām api
c udīrṇaṃ vāpi śaraṇaṃ tathā bhavati kāmadaḥ
a brāhmaṇaṃ vṛttasaṃpannam āhitāgniṃ śucivratam
c naraḥ pratigrāhya mahīṃ na yāti yamasādanam
a yathā candramaso vṛddhir ahany ahani jāyate
c tathā bhūmikṛtaṃ dānaṃ sasye sasye vivardhate
a atra gāthā bhūmigītāḥ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥ
c yāḥ śrutvā jāmadagnyena dattā bhūḥ kāśyapāya vai
a mām evādatta māṃ datta māṃ dattvā mām avāpsyatha
c asmiṃl loke pare caiva tataś cājanane punaḥ
a ya imāṃ vyāhṛtiṃ veda brāhmaṇo brahmasaṃśritaḥ
c śrāddhasya hūyamānasya brahmabhūyaṃ sa gacchati
a kṛtyānām abhiśastānāṃ duriṣṭaśamanaṃ mahat
c prāyaścittam ahaṃ kṛtvā punāty ubhayato daśa
a punāti ya idaṃ veda veda cāhaṃ tathaiva ca
c prakṛtiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ bhūmir vai śāśvatī matā
a abhiṣicyaiva nṛpatiṃ śrāvayed imam āgamam
c yathā śrutvā mahīṃ dadyān nādadyāt sādhutaś ca tām
a so 'yaṃ kṛtsno brāhmaṇārtho rājārthaś cāpy asaṃśayam
c rājā hi dharmakuśalaḥ prathamaṃ bhūtilakṣaṇam
a atha yeṣām adharmajño rājā bhavati nāstikaḥ
c na te sukhaṃ prabudhyante na sukhaṃ prasvapanti ca
a sadā bhavanti codvignās tasya duścaritair narāḥ
c yogakṣemā hi bahavo rāṣṭraṃ nāsyāviśanti tat
a atha yeṣāṃ punaḥ prājño rājā bhavati dhārmikaḥ
c sukhaṃ te pratibudhyante susukhaṃ prasvapanti ca
a tasya rājñaḥ śubhair āryaiḥ karmabhir nirvṛtāḥ prajāḥ
c yogakṣemeṇa vṛṣṭyā ca vivardhante svakarmabhiḥ
a sa kulīnaḥ sa puruṣaḥ sa bandhuḥ sa ca puṇyakṛt
c sa dātā sa ca vikrānto yo dadāti vasuṃdharām
a ādityā iva dīpyante tejasā bhuvi mānavāḥ
c dadanti vasudhāṃ sphītāṃ ye vedaviduṣi dvije
a yathā bījāni rohanti prakīrṇāni mahītale
c tathā kāmāḥ prarohanti bhūmidānasamārjitāḥ
a ādityo varuṇo viṣṇur brahmā somo hutāśanaḥ
c śūlapāṇiś ca bhagavān pratinandanti bhūmidam
a bhūmau jāyanti puruṣā bhūmau niṣṭhāṃ vrajanti ca
c caturvidho hi loko 'yaṃ yo 'yaṃ bhūmiguṇātmakaḥ
a eṣā mātā pitā caiva jagataḥ pṛthivīpate
c nānayā sadṛśaṃ bhūtaṃ kiṃ cid asti janādhipa
d sauvarṇā yatra prāsādā vasor dhārāś ca kāmadāḥ
d gandharvāpsaraso yatra tatra gacchanti bhūmidāḥ
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c bṛhaspateś ca saṃvādam indrasya ca yudhiṣṭhira
a iṣṭvā kratuśatenātha mahatā dakṣiṇāvatā
c maghavā vāgvidāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ papracchedaṃ bṛhaspatim
a bhagavan kena dānena svargataḥ sukham edhate
c yad akṣayaṃ mahārghaṃ ca tad brūhi vadatāṃ vara
a ity uktaḥ sa surendreṇa tato devapurohitaḥ
c bṛhaspatir mahātejāḥ pratyuvāca śatakratum
a suvarṇadānaṃ godānaṃ bhūmidānaṃ ca vṛtrahan
b vidyādānaṃ ca kanyānāṃ dānaṃ pāpaharaṃ param
c dadad etān mahāprājñaḥ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
a na bhūmidānād devendra paraṃ kiṃ cid iti prabho
c viśiṣṭam iti manyāmi yathā prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
d brāhmaṇārthe gavārthe vā rāṣṭraghāte 'tha svāminaḥ
d kulastrīṇāṃ paribhave mṛtās te bhūmidaiḥ saha
a ye śūrā nihatā yuddhe svaryātā dānagṛddhinaḥ
c sarve te vibudhaśreṣṭha nātikrāmanti bhūmidam
a bhartur niḥśreyase yuktās tyaktātmāno raṇe hatāḥ
c brahmalokagatāḥ śūrā nātikrāmanti bhūmidam
a pañca pūrvādipuruṣāḥ ṣaṭ ca ye vasudhāṃ gatāḥ
c ekādaśa dadad bhūmiṃ paritrātīha mānavaḥ
a ratnopakīrṇāṃ vasudhāṃ yo dadāti puraṃdara
c sa muktaḥ sarvakaluṣaiḥ svargaloke mahīyate
a mahīṃ sphītāṃ dadad rājā sarvakāmaguṇānvitām
c rājādhirājo bhavati tad dhi dānam anuttamam
a sarvakāmasamāyuktāṃ kāśyapīṃ yaḥ prayacchati
c sarvabhūtāni manyante māṃ dadātīti vāsava
a sarvakāmadughāṃ dhenuṃ sarvakāmapurogamām
c dadāti yaḥ sahasrākṣa sa svargaṃ yāti mānavaḥ
a madhusarpiḥpravāhinyaḥ payodadhivahās tathā
c saritas tarpayantīha surendra vasudhāpradam
a bhūmipradānān nṛpatir mucyate rājakilbiṣāt
c na hi bhūmipradānena dānam anyad viśiṣyate
a dadāti yaḥ samudrāntāṃ pṛthivīṃ śastranirjitām
c taṃ janāḥ kathayantīha yāvad dharati gaur iyam
a puṇyām ṛddharasāṃ bhūmiṃ yo dadāti puraṃdara
c na tasya lokāḥ kṣīyante bhūmidānaguṇārjitāḥ
a sarvathā pārthiveneha satataṃ bhūtim icchatā
c bhūr deyā vidhivac chakra pātre sukham abhīpsatā
d svanirjitāṃ svayaṃkrītāṃ bhṛtāṃ ca vārpayen nṛpa
d sunirmitāṃ suvikrītāṃ subhṛtāṃ vāpi yan nṛpaḥ
a api kṛtvā naraḥ pāpaṃ bhūmiṃ dattvā dvijātaye
c samutsṛjati tat pāpaṃ jīrṇāṃ tvacam ivoragaḥ
a sāgarān saritaḥ śailān kānanāni ca sarvaśaḥ
c sarvam etan naraḥ śakra dadāti vasudhāṃ dadat
a taḍāgāny udapānāni srotāṃsi ca sarāṃsi ca
c snehān sarvarasāṃś caiva dadāti vasudhāṃ dadat
a oṣadhīḥ kṣīrasaṃpannā nagān puṣpaphalānvitān
c kānanopalaśailāṃś ca dadāti vasudhāṃ dadat
a agniṣṭomaprabhṛtibhir iṣṭvā ca svāptadakṣiṇaiḥ
c na tat phalam avāpnoti bhūmidānād yad aśnute
a dātā daśānugṛhṇāti daśa hanti tathā kṣipan
c pūrvadattāṃ haran bhūmiṃ narakāyopagacchati
a na dadāti pratiśrutya dattvā vā harate tu yaḥ
c sa baddho vāruṇaiḥ pāśais tapyate mṛtyuśāsanāt
a āhitāgniṃ sadāyajñaṃ kṛśabhṛtyaṃ priyātithim
c ye bharanti dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ nopasarpanti te yamam
a brāhmaṇeṣv ṛṇabhūtaṃ syāt pārthivasya puraṃdara
c itareṣāṃ tu varṇānāṃ tārayet kṛśadurbalān
a nācchindyāt sparśitāṃ bhūmiṃ pareṇa tridaśādhipa
c brāhmaṇāya suraśreṣṭha kṛśabhṛtyāya kaś cana
a athāśru patitaṃ teṣāṃ dīnānām avasīdatām
c brāhmaṇānāṃ hṛte kṣetre hanyāt tripuruṣaṃ kulam
a bhūmipālaṃ cyutaṃ rāṣṭrād yas tu saṃsthāpayet punaḥ
c tasya vāsaḥ sahasrākṣa nākapṛṣṭhe mahīyate
d hṛte kṣetre daridrāṇām aśrupātaḥ sudāruṇaḥ
d iṣṭāpūrtaṃ narasyāsya hanyāt tripuruṣaṃ kulam
a ikṣubhiḥ saṃtatāṃ bhūmiṃ yavagodhūmasaṃkulām
b kadalīvanasāmrādyaiḥ supūrṇāṃ sparśayen mahīm
c gośvavāhanasaṃpūrṇāṃ bāhuvīryasamārjitām
d vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyaḥ svargaloke mahīyate
a nidhigarbhāṃ dadad bhūmiṃ sarvaratnaparicchadām
c akṣayāṃl labhate lokān bhūmisatraṃ hi tasya tat
a vidhūya kaluṣaṃ sarvaṃ virajāḥ saṃmataḥ satām
c loke mahīyate sadbhir yo dadāti vasuṃdharām
a yathāpsu patitaḥ śakra tailabindur visarpati
c tathā bhūmikṛtaṃ dānaṃ sasye sasye visarpati
a ye raṇāgre mahīpālāḥ śūrāḥ samitiśobhanāḥ
c vadhyante 'bhimukhāḥ śakra brahmalokaṃ vrajanti te
a nṛtyagītaparā nāryo divyamālyavibhūṣitāḥ
c upatiṣṭhanti devendra sadā bhūmipradaṃ divi
a modate ca sukhaṃ svarge devagandharvapūjitaḥ
c yo dadāti mahīṃ samyag vidhineha dvijātaye
a śatam apsarasaś caiva divyamālyavibhūṣitāḥ
c upatiṣṭhanti devendra sadā bhūmipradaṃ naram
c brahmaloke dharāpradam
c upatiṣṭhanti bhūtāni
a śaṅkhaṃ bhadrāsanaṃ chatraṃ varāśvā varavāraṇāḥ
c bhūmipradānāt puṣpāṇi hiraṇyanicayās tathā
a ājñā sadāpratihatā jayaśabdo bhavaty atha
c bhūmidānasya puṣpāṇi phalaṃ svargaḥ puraṃdara
a hiraṇyapuṣpāś cauṣadhyaḥ kuśakāñcanaśāḍvalāḥ
c amṛtaprasavāṃ bhūmiṃ prāpnoti puruṣo dadat
a nāsti bhūmisamaṃ dānaṃ nāsti mātṛsamo guruḥ
c nāsti satyasamo dharmo nāsti dānasamo nidhiḥ
a etad āṅgirasāc chrutvā vāsavo vasudhām imām
c vasuratnasamākīrṇāṃ dadāv āṅgirase tadā
a ya imaṃ śrāvayec chrāddhe bhūmidānasya saṃstavam
c na tasya rakṣasāṃ bhāgo nāsurāṇāṃ bhavaty uta
a akṣayaṃ ca bhaved dattaṃ pitṛbhyas tan na saṃśayaḥ
c tasmāc chrāddheṣv idaṃ vipro bhuñjataḥ śrāvayed dvijān
a ity etat sarvadānānāṃ śreṣṭham uktaṃ tavānagha
c mayā bharataśārdūla kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kāni dānāni loke 'smin dātukāmo mahīpatiḥ
c guṇādhikebhyo viprebhyo dadyād bharatasattama
a kena tuṣyanti te sadyas tuṣṭāḥ kiṃ pradiśanty uta
c śaṃsa me tan mahābāho phalaṃ puṇyakṛtaṃ mahat
a dattaṃ kiṃ phalavad rājann iha loke paratra ca
c bhavataḥ śrotum icchāmi tan me vistarato vada
 bhīṣma uvāca
a imam arthaṃ purā pṛṣṭo nārado devadarśanaḥ
c yad uktavān asau tan me gadataḥ śṛṇu bhārata
 nārada uvāca
a annam eva praśaṃsanti devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ purā
c lokatantraṃ hi yajñāś ca sarvam anne pratiṣṭhitam
a annena sadṛśaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
c tasmād annaṃ viśeṣeṇa dātum icchanti mānavāḥ
a annam ūrjaskaraṃ loke prāṇāś cānne pratiṣṭhitāḥ
c annena dhāryate sarvaṃ viśvaṃ jagad idaṃ prabho
a annād gṛhasthā loke 'smin bhikṣavas tata eva ca
c annāt prabhavati prāṇaḥ pratyakṣaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
a kuṭumbaṃ pīḍayitvāpi brāhmaṇāya mahātmane
c dātavyaṃ bhikṣave cānnam ātmano bhūtim icchatā
a brāhmaṇāyābhirūpāya yo dadyād annam arthine
c nidadhāti nidhiṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pāralaukikam ātmanaḥ
a śrāntam adhvani vartantaṃ vṛddham arham upasthitam
c arcayed bhūtim anvicchan gṛhastho gṛham āgatam
a krodham utpatitaṃ hitvā suśīlo vītamatsaraḥ
c annadaḥ prāpnute rājan divi ceha ca yat sukham
a nāvamanyed abhigataṃ na praṇudyāt kathaṃ cana
c api śvapāke śuni vā na dānaṃ vipraṇaśyati
a yo dadyād aparikliṣṭam annam adhvani vartate
c śrāntāyādṛṣṭapūrvāya sa mahad dharmam āpnuyāt
a pitṝn devān ṛṣīn viprān atithīṃś ca janādhipa
c yo naraḥ prīṇayaty annais tasya puṇyaphalaṃ mahat
a kṛtvāpi pāpakaṃ karma yo dadyād annam arthine
c brāhmaṇāya viśeṣeṇa na sa pāpena yujyate
a brāhmaṇeṣv akṣayaṃ dānam annaṃ śūdre mahāphalam
c annadānaṃ ca śūdre ca brāhmaṇe ca viśiṣyate
a na pṛcched gotracaraṇaṃ svādhyāyaṃ deśam eva vā
c bhikṣito brāhmaṇeneha janma vānnaṃ prayācitaḥ
d āśayābhyāgataṃ vipraṃ bhojanārtham upasthitam
a annadasyānnavṛkṣāś ca sarvakāmaphalānvitāḥ
c bhavantīhātha vāmutra nṛpate nātra saṃśayaḥ
a āśaṃsante hi pitaraḥ suvṛṣṭim iva karṣakāḥ
c asmākam api putro vā pautro vānnaṃ pradāsyati
a brāhmaṇo hi mahad bhūtaṃ svayaṃ dehīti yācate
c akāmo vā sakāmo vā dattvā puṇyam avāpnuyāt
a brāhmaṇaḥ sarvabhūtānām atithiḥ prasṛtāgrabhuk
c viprā yam abhigacchanti bhikṣamāṇā gṛhaṃ sadā
a satkṛtāś ca nivartante tad atīva pravardhate
c mahābhoge kule janma pretya prāpnoti bhārata
a dattvā tv annaṃ naro loke tathā sthānam anuttamam
c mṛṣṭamṛṣṭānnadāyī tu svarge vasati satkṛtaḥ
a annaṃ prāṇā narāṇāṃ hi sarvam anne pratiṣṭhitam
c annadaḥ paśumān putrī dhanavān bhogavān api
a prāṇavāṃś cāpi bhavati rūpavāṃś ca tathā nṛpa
c annadaḥ prāṇado loke sarvadaḥ procyate tu saḥ
a annaṃ hi dattvātithaye brāhmaṇāya yathāvidhi
c pradātā sukham āpnoti devaiś cāpy abhipūjyate
a brāhmaṇo hi mahad bhūtaṃ kṣetraṃ carati pādavat
c upyate tatra yad bījaṃ tad dhi puṇyaphalaṃ mahat
a pratyakṣaṃ prītijananaṃ bhoktṛdātror bhavaty uta
c sarvāṇy anyāni dānāni parokṣaphalavanty uta
a annād dhi prasavaṃ viddhi ratim annād dhi bhārata
c dharmārthāv annato viddhi roganāśaṃ tathānnataḥ
a annaṃ hy amṛtam ity āha purākalpe prajāpatiḥ
c annaṃ bhuvaṃ divaṃ khaṃ ca sarvam anne pratiṣṭhitam
a annapraṇāśe bhidyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ
c balaṃ balavato 'pīha praṇaśyaty annahānitaḥ
a āvāhāś ca vivāhāś ca yajñāś cānnam ṛte tathā
c na vartante naraśreṣṭha brahma cātra pralīyate
a annataḥ sarvam etad dhi yat kiṃ cit sthāṇu jaṅgamam
c triṣu lokeṣu dharmārtham annaṃ deyam ato budhaiḥ
a annadasya manuṣyasya balam ojo yaśaḥ sukham
c kīrtiś ca vardhate śaśvat triṣu lokeṣu pārthiva
a megheṣv ambhaḥ saṃnidhatte prāṇānāṃ pavanaḥ śivaḥ
c tac ca meghagataṃ vāri śakro varṣati bhārata
a ādatte ca rasaṃ bhaumam ādityaḥ svagabhastibhiḥ
c vāyur ādityatas tāṃś ca rasān devaḥ prajāpatiḥ
a tad yadā meghato vāri patitaṃ bhavati kṣitau
c tadā vasumatī devī snigdhā bhavati bhārata
a tataḥ sasyāni rohanti yena vartayate jagat
c māṃsamedosthiśukrāṇāṃ prādurbhāvas tataḥ punaḥ
a saṃbhavanti tataḥ śukrāt prāṇinaḥ pṛthivīpate
c agnīṣomau hi tac chukraṃ prajanaḥ puṣyataś ca ha
a evam annaṃ ca sūryaś ca pavanaḥ śukram eva ca
c eka eva smṛto rāśir yato bhūtāni jajñire
a prāṇān dadāti bhūtānāṃ tejaś ca bharatarṣabha
c gṛham abhyāgatāyāśu yo dadyād annam arthine
 bhīṣma uvāca
a nāradenaivam ukto 'ham adām annaṃ sadā nṛpa
c anasūyus tvam apy annaṃ tasmād dehi gatajvaraḥ
a dattvānnaṃ vidhivad rājan viprebhyas tvam api prabho
c yathāvad anurūpebhyas tataḥ svargam avāpsyasi
a annadānāṃ hi ye lokās tāṃs tvaṃ śṛṇu narādhipa
c bhavanāni prakāśante divi teṣāṃ mahātmanām
e nānāsaṃsthānarūpāṇi nānāstambhānvitāni ca
a candramaṇḍalaśubhrāṇi kiṅkiṇījālavanti ca
c taruṇādityavarṇāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
a anekaśatabhaumāni sāntarjalavanāni ca
c vaiḍūryārkaprakāśāni raupyarukmamayāni ca
a sarvakāmaphalāś cāpi vṛkṣā bhavanasaṃsthitāḥ
c vāpyo vīthyaḥ sabhāḥ kūpā dīrghikāś caiva sarvaśaḥ
a ghoṣavanti ca yānāni yuktāny atha sahasraśaḥ
c bhakṣyabhojyamayāḥ śailā vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni ca
a kṣīraṃ sravantyaḥ saritas tathā caivānnaparvatāḥ
c prāsādāḥ pāṇḍurābhrābhāḥ śayyāś ca kanakojjvalāḥ
e tān annadāḥ prapadyante tasmād annaprado bhava
a ete lokāḥ puṇyakṛtām annadānāṃ mahātmanām
c tasmād annaṃ viśeṣeṇa dātavyaṃ mānavair bhuvi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a śrutaṃ me bhavato vākyam annadānasya yo vidhiḥ
c nakṣatrayogasyedānīṃ dānakalpaṃ bravīhi me
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c devakyāś caiva saṃvādaṃ devarṣer nāradasya ca
a dvārakām anusaṃprāptaṃ nāradaṃ devadarśanam
c papracchainaṃ tataḥ praśnaṃ devakī dharmadarśinī
a tasyāḥ saṃpṛcchamānāyā devarṣir nāradas tadā
c ācaṣṭa vidhivat sarvaṃ yat tac chṛṇu viśāṃ pate
 nārada uvāca
a kṛttikāsu mahābhāge pāyasena sasarpiṣā
c saṃtarpya brāhmaṇān sādhūṃl lokān āpnoty anuttamān
a rohiṇyāṃ prathitair māṃsair māṣair annena sarpiṣā
c payo 'nupānaṃ dātavyam ānṛṇyārthaṃ dvijātaye
a dogdhrīṃ dattvā savatsāṃ tu nakṣatre somadaivate
c gacchanti mānuṣāl lokāt svargalokam anuttamam
a ārdrāyāṃ kṛsaraṃ dattvā tailamiśram upoṣitaḥ
c naras tarati durgāṇi kṣuradhārāṃś ca parvatān
a apūpān punarvasau dattvā tathaivānnāni śobhane
c yaśasvī rūpasaṃpanno bahvanne jāyate kule
a puṣye tu kanakaṃ dattvā kṛtaṃ cākṛtam eva ca
c anālokeṣu lokeṣu somavat sa virājate
a āśleṣāyāṃ tu yo rūpyam ṛṣabhaṃ vā prayacchati
c sa sarvabhayanirmuktaḥ śātravān adhitiṣṭhati
a maghāsu tilapūrṇāni vardhamānāni mānavaḥ
b tāmrāṇi tilapātrāṇi triṃśatpalamitāni tu
c pradāya putrapaśumān iha pretya ca modate
a phalgunīpūrvasamaye brāhmaṇānām upoṣitaḥ
c bhakṣān phāṇitasaṃyuktān dattvā saubhāgyam ṛcchati
a ghṛtakṣīrasamāyuktaṃ vidhivat ṣaṣṭikaudanam
c uttarāviṣaye dattvā svargaloke mahīyate
a yad yat pradīyate dānam uttarāviṣaye naraiḥ
c mahāphalam anantaṃ ca bhavatīti viniścayaḥ
a haste hastirathaṃ dattvā caturyuktam upoṣitaḥ
c prāpnoti paramāṃl lokān puṇyakāmasamanvitān
a citrāyām ṛṣabhaṃ dattvā puṇyān gandhāṃś ca bhārata
c caraty apsarasāṃ loke ramate nandane tathā
a svātāv atha dhanaṃ dattvā yad iṣṭatamam ātmanaḥ
c prāpnoti lokān sa śubhān iha caiva mahad yaśaḥ
a viśākhāyām anaḍvāhaṃ dhenuṃ dattvā ca dugdhadām
c saprāsaṅgaṃ ca śakaṭaṃ sadhānyaṃ vastrasaṃyutam
a pitṝn devāṃś ca prīṇāti pretya cānantyam aśnute
c na ca durgāṇy avāpnoti svargalokaṃ ca gacchati
a dattvā yathoktaṃ viprebhyo vṛttim iṣṭāṃ sa vindati
c narakādīṃś ca saṃkleśān nāpnotīti viniścayaḥ
a anurādhāsu prāvāraṃ vastrāntaram upoṣitaḥ
c dattvā yugaśataṃ cāpi naraḥ svarge mahīyate
a kālaśākaṃ tu viprebhyo dattvā martyaḥ samūlakam
c jyeṣṭhāyām ṛddhim iṣṭāṃ vai gatim iṣṭāṃ ca vindati
a mūle mūlaphalaṃ dattvā brāhmaṇebhyaḥ samāhitaḥ
c pitṝn prīṇayate cāpi gatim iṣṭāṃ ca gacchati
a atha pūrvāsv aṣāḍhāsu dadhipātrāṇy upoṣitaḥ
c kulavṛttopasaṃpanne brāhmaṇe vedapārage
e pradāya jāyate pretya kule subahugokule
a udamanthaṃ sasarpiṣkaṃ prabhūtamadhuphāṇitam
c dattvottarāsv aṣāḍhāsu sarvakāmān avāpnuyāt
a dugdhaṃ tv abhijite yoge dattvā madhughṛtāplutam
c dharmanityo manīṣibhyaḥ svargaloke mahīyate
a śravaṇe kambalaṃ dattvā vastrāntaritam eva ca
c śvetena yāti yānena sarvalokān asaṃvṛtān
a goprayuktaṃ dhaniṣṭhāsu yānaṃ dattvā samāhitaḥ
c vastraraśmidharaṃ sadyaḥ pretya rājyaṃ prapadyate
a gandhāñ śatabhiṣagyoge dattvā sāgurucandanān
c prāpnoty apsarasāṃ lokān pretya gandhāṃś ca śāśvatān
a pūrvabhādrapadāyoge rājamāṣān pradāya tu
c sarvabhakṣaphalopetaḥ sa vai pretya sukhī bhavet
a aurabhram uttarāyoge yas tu māṃsaṃ prayacchati
c sa pitṝn prīṇayati vai pretya cānantyam aśnute
a kāṃsyopadohanāṃ dhenuṃ revatyāṃ yaḥ prayacchati
c sā pretya kāmān ādāya dātāram upatiṣṭhati
a ratham aśvasamāyuktaṃ dattvāśvinyāṃ narottamaḥ
c hastyaśvarathasaṃpanne varcasvī jāyate kule
a bharaṇīṣu dvijātibhyas tiladhenuṃ pradāya vai
c gāḥ suprabhūtāḥ prāpnoti naraḥ pretya yaśas tathā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity eṣa lakṣaṇoddeśaḥ prokto nakṣatrayogataḥ
c devakyā nāradeneha sā snuṣābhyo 'bravīd idam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sarvān kāmān prayacchanti ye prayacchanti kāñcanam
c ity evaṃ bhagavān atriḥ pitāmahasuto 'bravīt
a pavitraṃ śucy athāyuṣyaṃ pitṝṇām akṣayaṃ ca tat
c suvarṇaṃ manujendreṇa hariścandreṇa kīrtitam
a pānīyadānaṃ paramaṃ dānānāṃ manur abravīt
c tasmād vāpīś ca kūpāṃś ca taḍāgāni ca khānayet
a ardhaṃ pāpasya harati puruṣasyeha karmaṇaḥ
c kūpaḥ pravṛttapānīyaḥ supravṛttaś ca nityaśaḥ
a sarvaṃ tārayate vaṃśaṃ yasya khāte jalāśaye
c gāvaḥ pibanti viprāś ca sādhavaś ca narāḥ sadā
a nidāghakāle pānīyaṃ yasya tiṣṭhaty avāritam
c sa durgaṃ viṣamaṃ kṛcchraṃ na kadā cid avāpnute
a bṛhaspater bhagavataḥ pūṣṇaś caiva bhagasya ca
c aśvinoś caiva vahneś ca prītir bhavati sarpiṣā
a paramaṃ bheṣajaṃ hy etad yajñānām etad uttamam
c rasānām uttamaṃ caitat phalānāṃ caitad uttamam
a phalakāmo yaśaskāmaḥ puṣṭikāmaś ca nityadā
c ghṛtaṃ dadyād dvijātibhyaḥ puruṣaḥ śucir ātmavān
a ghṛtaṃ māse āśvayuji viprebhyo yaḥ prayacchati
c tasmai prayacchato rūpaṃ prītau devāv ihāśvinau
a pāyasaṃ sarpiṣā miśraṃ dvijebhyo yaḥ prayacchati
c gṛhaṃ tasya na rakṣāṃsi dharṣayanti kadā cana
a pipāsayā na mriyate sopacchandaś ca dṛśyate
c na prāpnuyāc ca vyasanaṃ karakān yaḥ prayacchati
a prayato brāhmaṇāgrebhyaḥ śraddhayā parayā yutaḥ
c upasparśanaṣaḍbhāgaṃ labhate puruṣaḥ sadā
a yaḥ sādhanārthaṃ kāṣṭhāni brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchati
c pratāpārthaṃ ca rājendra vṛttavadbhyaḥ sadā naraḥ
a sidhyanty arthāḥ sadā tasya kāryāṇi vividhāni ca
c upary upari śatrūṇāṃ vapuṣā dīpyate ca saḥ
a bhagavāṃś cāsya suprīto vahnir bhavati nityaśaḥ
c na taṃ tyajante paśavaḥ saṃgrāme ca jayaty api
a putrāñ chriyaṃ ca labhate yaś chatraṃ saṃprayacchati
c cakṣurvyādhiṃ na labhate yajñabhāgam athāśnute
a nidāghakāle varṣe vā yaś chatraṃ saṃprayacchati
c nāsya kaś cin manodāhaḥ kadā cid api jāyate
e kṛcchrāt sa viṣamāc caiva vipra mokṣam avāpnute
a pradānaṃ sarvadānānāṃ śakaṭasya viśiṣyate
c evam āha mahābhāgaḥ śāṇḍilyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a dahyamānāya viprāya yaḥ prayacchaty upānahau
c yat phalaṃ tasya bhavati tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a upānahau prayacched yo brāhmaṇebhyaḥ samāhitaḥ
c mardate kaṇṭakān sarvān viṣamān nistaraty api
e sa śatrūṇām upari ca saṃtiṣṭhati yudhiṣṭhira
a yānaṃ cāśvatarīyuktaṃ tasya śubhraṃ viśāṃ pate
c upatiṣṭhati kaunteya rūpyakāñcanabhūṣaṇam
e śakaṭaṃ damyasaṃyuktaṃ dattaṃ bhavati caiva hi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yat phalaṃ tiladāne ca bhūmidāne ca kīrtitam
c gopradāne 'nnadāne ca bhūyas tad brūhi kaurava
 bhīṣma uvāca
a śṛṇuṣva mama kaunteya tiladānasya yat phalam
c niśamya ca yathānyāyaṃ prayaccha kurusattama
a pitṝṇāṃ prathamaṃ bhojyaṃ tilāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
c tiladānena vai tasmāt pitṛpakṣaḥ pramodate
a māghamāse tilān yas tu brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchati
c sarvasattvasamākīrṇaṃ narakaṃ sa na paśyati
a sarvakāmaiḥ sa yajate yas tilair yajate pitṝn
c na cākāmena dātavyaṃ tilaśrāddhaṃ kathaṃ cana
a maharṣeḥ kaśyapasyaite gātrebhyaḥ prasṛtās tilāḥ
c tato divyaṃ gatā bhāvaṃ pradāneṣu tilāḥ prabho
a pauṣṭikā rūpadāś caiva tathā pāpavināśanāḥ
c tasmāt sarvapradānebhyas tiladānaṃ viśiṣyate
a āpastambaś ca medhāvī śaṅkhaś ca likhitas tathā
c maharṣir gautamaś cāpi tiladānair divaṃ gatāḥ
a tilahomaparā viprāḥ sarve saṃyatamaithunāḥ
c samā gavyena haviṣā pravṛttiṣu ca saṃsthitāḥ
a sarveṣām eva dānānāṃ tiladānaṃ paraṃ smṛtam
c akṣayaṃ sarvadānānāṃ tiladānam ihocyate
a utpanne ca purā havye kuśikarṣiḥ paraṃtapa
c tilair agnitrayaṃ hutvā prāptavān gatim uttamām
a iti proktaṃ kuruśreṣṭha tiladānam anuttamam
c vidhānaṃ yena vidhinā tilānām iha śasyate
a ata ūrdhvaṃ nibodhedaṃ devānāṃ yaṣṭum icchatām
c samāgamaṃ mahārāja brahmaṇā vai svayaṃbhuvā
a devāḥ sametya brahmāṇaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ yiyakṣavaḥ
c śubhaṃ deśam ayācanta yajema iti pārthiva
 devā ūcuḥ
a bhagavaṃs tvaṃ prabhur bhūmeḥ sarvasya tridivasya ca
c yajemahi mahābhāga yajñaṃ bhavadanujñayā
e nānanujñātabhūmir hi yajñasya phalam aśnute
a tvaṃ hi sarvasya jagataḥ sthāvarasya carasya ca
c prabhur bhavasi tasmāt tvaṃ samanujñātum arhasi
 brahmovāca
a dadāmi medinībhāgaṃ bhavadbhyo 'haṃ surarṣabhāḥ
c yasmin deśe kariṣyadhvaṃ yajñaṃ kāśyapanandanāḥ
 devā ūcuḥ
a bhagavan kṛtakāmāḥ smo yakṣyāmas tv āptadakṣiṇaiḥ
c imaṃ tu deśaṃ munayaḥ paryupāsanta nityadā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tato 'gastyaś ca kaṇvaś ca bhṛgur atrir vṛṣākapiḥ
c asito devalaś caiva devayajñam upāgaman
a tato devā mahātmāna ījire yajñam acyuta
c tathā samāpayām āsur yathākālaṃ surarṣabhāḥ
a ta iṣṭayajñās tridaśā himavaty acalottame
c ṣaṣṭham aṃśaṃ kratos tasya bhūmidānaṃ pracakrire
a prādeśamātraṃ bhūmes tu yo dadyād anupaskṛtam
c na sīdati sa kṛcchreṣu na ca durgāṇy avāpnute
a śītavātātapasahāṃ gṛhabhūmiṃ susaṃskṛtām
c pradāya suralokasthaḥ puṇyānte 'pi na cālyate
a mudito vasate prājñaḥ śakreṇa saha pārthiva
c pratiśrayapradātā ca so 'pi svarge mahīyate
a adhyāpakakule jātaḥ śrotriyo niyatendriyaḥ
c gṛhe yasya vaset tuṣṭaḥ pradhānaṃ lokam aśnute
a tathā gavārthe śaraṇaṃ śītavarṣasahaṃ mahat
c āsaptamaṃ tārayati kulaṃ bharatasattama
a kṣetrabhūmiṃ dadal loke putra śriyam avāpnuyāt
c ratnabhūmiṃ pradattvā tu kulavaṃśaṃ vivardhayet
a na coṣarāṃ na nirdagdhāṃ mahīṃ dadyāt kathaṃ cana
c na śmaśānaparītāṃ ca na ca pāpaniṣevitām
a pārakye bhūmideśe tu pitṝṇāṃ nirvapet tu yaḥ
c tad bhūmisvāmipitṛbhiḥ śrāddhakarma vihanyate
a tasmāt krītvā mahīṃ dadyāt svalpām api vicakṣaṇaḥ
c piṇḍaḥ pitṛbhyo datto vai tasyāṃ bhavati śāśvataḥ
a aṭavīparvatāś caiva nadītīrthāni yāni ca
c sarvāṇy asvāmikāny āhur na hi tatra parigrahaḥ
a ity etad bhūmidānasya phalam uktaṃ viśāṃ pate
c ataḥ paraṃ tu godānaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi te 'nagha
a gāvo 'dhikās tapasvibhyo yasmāt sarvebhya eva ca
c tasmān maheśvaro devas tapas tābhiḥ samāsthitaḥ
a brahmaloke vasanty etāḥ somena saha bhārata
c āsāṃ brahmarṣayaḥ siddhāḥ prārthayanti parāṃ gatim
d tāṃ prāpnuvanti gāṃ dattvā vimuktāḥ sarvakilbiṣaiḥ
a payasā haviṣā dadhnā śakṛtāpy atha carmaṇā
c asthibhiś copakurvanti śṛṅgair vālaiś ca bhārata
a nāsāṃ śītātapau syātāṃ sadaitāḥ karma kurvate
c na varṣaṃ viṣamaṃ vāpi duḥkham āsāṃ bhavaty uta
a brāhmaṇaiḥ sahitā yānti tasmāt parataraṃ padam
c ekaṃ gobrāhmaṇaṃ tasmāt pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ
a rantidevasya yajñe tāḥ paśutvenopakalpitāḥ
c tataś carmaṇvatī rājan gocarmabhyaḥ pravartitā
a paśutvāc ca vinirmuktāḥ pradānāyopakalpitāḥ
c tā imā vipramukhyebhyo yo dadāti mahīpate
e nistared āpadaṃ kṛcchrāṃ viṣamastho 'pi pārthiva
a gavāṃ sahasradaḥ pretya narakaṃ na prapaśyati
c sarvatra vijayaṃ cāpi labhate manujādhipa
a amṛtaṃ vai gavāṃ kṣīram ity āha tridaśādhipaḥ
c tasmād dadāti yo dhenum amṛtaṃ sa prayacchati
a agnīnām avyayaṃ hy etad dhaumyaṃ vedavido viduḥ
c tasmād dadāti yo dhenuṃ sa haumyaṃ saṃprayacchati
a svargo vai mūrtimān eṣa vṛṣabhaṃ yo gavāṃ patim
c vipre guṇayute dadyāt sa vai svarge mahīyate
a prāṇā vai prāṇinām ete procyante bharatarṣabha
c tasmād dadāti yo dhenuṃ prāṇān vai sa prayacchati
a gāvaḥ śaraṇyā bhūtānām iti vedavido viduḥ
c tasmād dadāti yo dhenuṃ śaraṇaṃ saṃprayacchati
a na vadhārthaṃ pradātavyā na kīnāśe na nāstike
c gojīvine na dātavyā tathā gauḥ puruṣarṣabha
d gorasānāṃ na vikretur apañcayajanasya ca
a dadāti tādṛśānāṃ vai naro gāḥ pāpakarmaṇām
c akṣayaṃ narakaṃ yātīty evam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
a na kṛśāṃ pāpavatsāṃ vā vandhyāṃ rogānvitāṃ tathā
c na vyaṅgāṃ na pariśrāntāṃ dadyād gāṃ brāhmaṇāya vai
a daśagosahasradaḥ samyak śakreṇa saha modate
c akṣayāṃl labhate lokān naraḥ śatasahasradaḥ
a ity etad gopradānaṃ ca tiladānaṃ ca kīrtitam
c tathā bhūmipradānaṃ ca śṛṇuṣvānne ca bhārata
a annadānaṃ pradhānaṃ hi kaunteya paricakṣate
c annasya hi pradānena rantidevo divaṃ gataḥ
a śrāntāya kṣudhitāyānnaṃ yaḥ prayacchati bhūmipa
c svāyaṃbhuvaṃ mahābhāgaṃ sa paśyati narādhipa
a na hiraṇyair na vāsobhir nāśvadānena bhārata
c prāpnuvanti narāḥ śreyo yathehānnapradāḥ prabho
a annaṃ vai paramaṃ dravyam annaṃ śrīś ca parā matā
c annāt prāṇaḥ prabhavati tejo vīryaṃ balaṃ tathā
a sadbhyo dadāti yaś cānnaṃ sadaikāgramanā naraḥ
c na sa durgāṇy avāpnotīty evam āha parāśaraḥ
a arcayitvā yathānyāyaṃ devebhyo 'nnaṃ nivedayet
c yadanno hi naro rājaṃs tadannās tasya devatāḥ
a kaumudyāṃ śuklapakṣe tu yo 'nnadānaṃ karoty uta
c sa saṃtarati durgāṇi pretya cānantyam aśnute
a abhuktvātithaye cānnaṃ prayacched yaḥ samāhitaḥ
c sa vai brahmavidāṃ lokān prāpnuyād bharatarṣabha
a sukṛcchrām āpadaṃ prāptaś cānnadaḥ puruṣas taret
c pāpaṃ tarati caiveha duṣkṛtaṃ cāpakarṣati
a ity etad annadānasya tiladānasya caiva ha
c bhūmidānasya ca phalaṃ godānasya ca kīrtitam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a śrutaṃ dānaphalaṃ tāta yat tvayā parikīrtitam
c annaṃ tu te viśeṣeṇa praśastam iha bhārata
a pānīyadānaṃ paramaṃ kathaṃ ceha mahāphalam
c ity etac chrotum icchāmi vistareṇa pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a hanta te vartayiṣyāmi yathāvad bharatarṣabha
c gadatas tan mamādyeha śṛṇu satyaparākrama
e pānīyadānāt prabhṛti sarvaṃ vakṣyāmi te 'nagha
a yad annaṃ yac ca pānīyaṃ saṃpradāyāśnute naraḥ
c na tasmāt paramaṃ dānaṃ kiṃ cid astīti me matiḥ
a annāt prāṇabhṛtas tāta pravartante hi sarvaśaḥ
c tasmād annaṃ paraṃ loke sarvadāneṣu kathyate
a annād balaṃ ca tejaś ca prāṇināṃ vardhate sadā
c annadānam atas tasmāc chreṣṭham āha prajāpatiḥ
a sāvitryā hy api kaunteya śrutaṃ te vacanaṃ śubham
c yataś caitad yathā caitad devasatre mahāmate
a anne datte nareṇeha prāṇā dattā bhavanty uta
c prāṇadānād dhi paramaṃ na dānam iha vidyate
a śrutaṃ hi te mahābāho lomaśasyāpi tad vacaḥ
c prāṇān dattvā kapotāya yat prāptaṃ śibinā purā
a tāṃ gatiṃ labhate dattvā dvijasyānnaṃ viśāṃ pate
c gatiṃ viśiṣṭāṃ gacchanti prāṇadā iti naḥ śrutam
a annaṃ cāpi prabhavati pānīyāt kurusattama
c nīrajātena hi vinā na kiṃ cit saṃpravartate
a nīrajātaś ca bhagavān somo grahagaṇeśvaraḥ
c amṛtaṃ ca sudhā caiva svāhā caiva vaṣaṭ tathā
a annauṣadhyo mahārāja vīrudhaś ca jalodbhavāḥ
c yataḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ prāṇāḥ saṃbhavanti viśāṃ pate
a devānām amṛtaṃ cānnaṃ nāgānāṃ ca sudhā tathā
c pitṝṇāṃ ca svadhā proktā paśūnāṃ cāpi vīrudhaḥ
a annam eva manuṣyāṇāṃ prāṇān āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
c tac ca sarvaṃ naravyāghra pānīyāt saṃpravartate
a tasmāt pānīyadānād vai na paraṃ vidyate kva cit
c tac ca dadyān naro nityaṃ ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
a dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ jaladānaṃ viśāṃ pate
c śatrūṃś cāpy adhi kaunteya sadā tiṣṭhati toyadaḥ
a sarvakāmān avāpnoti kīrtiṃ caiveha śāśvatīm
c pretya cānantyam āpnoti pāpebhyaś ca pramucyate
a toyado manujavyāghra svargaṃ gatvā mahādyute
c akṣayān samavāpnoti lokān ity abravīn manuḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a tilānāṃ kīdṛśaṃ dānam atha dīpasya caiva ha
c annānāṃ vāsasāṃ caiva bhūya eva bravīhi me
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c brāhmaṇasya ca saṃvādaṃ yamasya ca yudhiṣṭhira
a madhyadeśe mahān grāmo brāhmaṇānāṃ babhūva ha
c gaṅgāyamunayor madhye yāmunasya girer adhaḥ
a parṇaśāleti vikhyāto ramaṇīyo narādhipa
c vidvāṃsas tatra bhūyiṣṭhā brāhmaṇāś cāvasaṃs tadā
a atha prāha yamaḥ kaṃ cit puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇavāsasam
c raktākṣam ūrdhvaromāṇaṃ kākajaṅghākṣināsikam
a gaccha tvaṃ brāhmaṇagrāmaṃ tato gatvā tam ānaya
c agastyaṃ gotrataś cāpi nāmataś cāpi śarmiṇam
a śame niviṣṭaṃ vidvāṃsam adhyāpakam anādṛtam
c mā cānyam ānayethās tvaṃ sagotraṃ tasya pārśvataḥ
a sa hi tādṛgguṇas tena tulyo 'dhyayanajanmanā
c apatyeṣu tathā vṛtte samastenaiva dhīmatā
e tam ānaya yathoddiṣṭaṃ pūjā kāryā hi tasya me
a sa gatvā pratikūlaṃ tac cakāra yamaśāsanam
c tam ākramyānayām āsa pratiṣiddho yamena yaḥ
a tasmai yamaḥ samutthāya pūjāṃ kṛtvā ca vīryavān
c provāca nīyatām eṣa so 'nya ānīyatām iti
a evam ukte tu vacane dharmarājena sa dvijaḥ
c uvāca dharmarājānaṃ nirviṇṇo 'dhyayanena vai
e yo me kālo bhavec cheṣas taṃ vaseyam ihācyuta
 yama uvāca
a nāhaṃ kālasya vihitaṃ prāpnomīha kathaṃ cana
c yo hi dharmaṃ carati vai taṃ tu jānāmi kevalam
a gaccha vipra tvam adyaiva ālayaṃ svaṃ mahādyute
c brūhi vā tvaṃ yathā svairaṃ karavāṇi kim ity uta
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a yat tatra kṛtvā sumahat puṇyaṃ syāt tad bravīhi me
c sarvasya hi pramāṇaṃ tvaṃ trailokyasyāpi sattama
 yama uvāca
a śṛṇu tattvena viprarṣe pradānavidhim uttamam
c tilāḥ paramakaṃ dānaṃ puṇyaṃ caiveha śāśvatam
a tilāś ca saṃpradātavyā yathāśakti dvijarṣabha
c nityadānāt sarvakāmāṃs tilā nirvartayanty uta
a tilāñ śrāddhe praśaṃsanti dānam etad dhy anuttamam
c tān prayacchasva viprebhyo vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
d vaiśākhyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ tu tilān dadyād dvijātiṣu
d teṣāṃ māghyāṃ pradānena sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt
a tilā bhakṣayitavyāś ca sadā tv ālabhanaṃ ca taiḥ
c kāryaṃ satatam icchadbhiḥ śreyaḥ sarvātmanā gṛhe
a tathāpaḥ sarvadā deyāḥ peyāś caiva na saṃśayaḥ
c puṣkariṇyas taḍāgāni kūpāṃś caivātra khānayet
a etat sudurlabhataram iha loke dvijottama
c āpo nityaṃ pradeyās te puṇyaṃ hy etad anuttamam
a prapāś ca kāryāḥ pānārthaṃ nityaṃ te dvijasattama
c bhukte 'py atha pradeyaṃ te pānīyaṃ vai viśeṣataḥ
a ity ukte sa tadā tena yamadūtena vai gṛhān
c nītaś cakāra ca tathā sarvaṃ tad yamaśāsanam
a nītvā taṃ yamadūto 'pi gṛhītvā śarmiṇaṃ tadā
c yayau sa dharmarājāya nyavedayata cāpi tam
a taṃ dharmarājo dharmajñaṃ pūjayitvā pratāpavān
c kṛtvā ca saṃvidaṃ tena visasarja yathāgatam
a tasyāpi ca yamaḥ sarvam upadeśaṃ cakāra ha
c pratyetya ca sa tat sarvaṃ cakāroktaṃ yamena tat
a tathā praśaṃsate dīpān yamaḥ pitṛhitepsayā
b pānīyābhyarthinaṃ dṛṣṭvā prītyā dadyāt tvarānvitaḥ
b vastre tantupramāṇena dīpe nimiṣavatsaram
b gavāṃ lomapramāṇena svargabhogam upāśnute
b jale bindupramāṇena tad etāny upavartaya
c tasmād dīpaprado nityaṃ saṃtārayati vai pitṝn
a dātavyāḥ satataṃ dīpās tasmād bharatasattama
c devānāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ ca cakṣuṣy āste matāḥ prabho
a ratnadānaṃ ca sumahat puṇyam uktaṃ janādhipa
c tāni vikrīya yajate brāhmaṇo hy abhayaṃkaraḥ
a yad vai dadāti viprebhyo brāhmaṇaḥ pratigṛhya vai
c ubhayoḥ syāt tad akṣayyaṃ dātur ādātur eva ca
a yo dadāti sthitaḥ sthityāṃ tādṛśāya pratigraham
c ubhayor akṣayaṃ dharmaṃ taṃ manuḥ prāha dharmavit
a vāsasāṃ tu pradānena svadāranirato naraḥ
c suvastraś ca suveṣaś ca bhavatīty anuśuśruma
a gāvaḥ suvarṇaṃ ca tathā tilāś caivānuvarṇitāḥ
c bahuśaḥ puruṣavyāghra vedaprāmāṇyadarśanāt
a vivāhāṃś caiva kurvīta putrān utpādayeta ca
c putralābho hi kauravya sarvalābhād viśiṣyate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a bhūya eva kuruśreṣṭha dānānāṃ vidhim uttamam
c kathayasva mahāprājña bhūmidānaṃ viśeṣataḥ
a pṛthivīṃ kṣatriyo dadyād brāhmaṇas tāṃ svakarmaṇā
c vidhivat pratigṛhṇīyān na tv anyo dātum arhati
a sarvavarṇais tu yac chakyaṃ pradātuṃ phalakāṅkṣibhiḥ
c vede vā yat samāmnātaṃ tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tulyanāmāni deyāni trīṇi tulyaphalāni ca
c sarvakāmaphalānīha gāvaḥ pṛthvī sarasvatī
a yo brūyāc cāpi śiṣyāya dharmyāṃ brāhmīṃ sarasvatīm
c pṛthivīgopradānābhyāṃ sa tulyaṃ phalam aśnute
a tathaiva gāḥ praśaṃsanti na ca deyaṃ tataḥ param
c saṃnikṛṣṭaphalās tā hi laghvarthāś ca yudhiṣṭhira
e mātaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ gāvaḥ sarvasukhapradāḥ
a vṛddhim ākāṅkṣatā nityaṃ gāvaḥ kāryāḥ pradakṣiṇāḥ
b saṃtāḍyā na tu pādena gavāṃ madhye ca na vrajet
c maṅgalāyatanaṃ devyas tasmāt pūjyāḥ sadaiva hi
a pracodanaṃ devakṛtaṃ gavāṃ karmasu vartatām
c pūrvam evākṣaraṃ nānyad abhidheyaṃ kathaṃ cana
a pracāre vā nipāne vā budho nodvejayeta gāḥ
c tṛṣitā hy abhivīkṣantyo naraṃ hanyuḥ sabāndhavam
a pitṛsadmāni satataṃ devatāyatanāni ca
c pūyante śakṛtā yāsāṃ pūtaṃ kim adhikaṃ tataḥ
a grāsamuṣṭiṃ paragave dadyāt saṃvatsaraṃ tu yaḥ
c akṛtvā svayam āhāraṃ vrataṃ tat sārvakāmikam
a sa hi putrān yaśorthaṃ ca śriyaṃ cāpy adhigacchati
c nāśayaty aśubhaṃ caiva duḥsvapnaṃ ca vyapohati
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a deyāḥ kiṃlakṣaṇā gāvaḥ kāś cāpi parivarjayet
c kīdṛśāya pradātavyā na deyāḥ kīdṛśāya ca
 bhīṣma uvāca
a asadvṛttāya pāpāya lubdhāyānṛtavādine
c havyakavyavyapetāya na deyā gauḥ kathaṃ cana
a bhikṣave bahuputrāya śrotriyāyāhitāgnaye
c dattvā daśagavāṃ dātā lokān āpnoty anuttamān
a yaṃ caiva dharmaṃ kurute tasya puṇyaphalaṃ ca yat
b juhoti yad bhojayati yad dadāti gavāṃ rasaiḥ
c sarvasyaivāṃśabhāg dātā tannimittaṃ pravṛttayaḥ
d arthasya daśabhāg dātā tan nivṛttapravṛttaye
a yaś cainam utpādayati yaś cainaṃ trāyate bhayāt
c yaś cāsya kurute vṛttiṃ sarve te pitaras trayaḥ
a kalmaṣaṃ guruśuśrūṣā hanti māno mahad yaśaḥ
c aputratāṃ trayaḥ putrā avṛttiṃ daśa dhenavaḥ
a vedāntaniṣṭhasya bahuśrutasya
prajñānatṛptasya jitendriyasya
c śiṣṭasya dāntasya yatasya caiva
bhūteṣu nityaṃ priyavādinaś ca
a yaḥ kṣudbhayād vai na vikarma kuryān
mṛdur dāntaś cātitheyaś ca nityam
c vṛttiṃ viprāyātisṛjeta tasmai
yas tulyaśīlaś ca saputradāraḥ
a śubhe pātre ye guṇā gopradāne
tāvān doṣo brāhmaṇasvāpahāre
c sarvāvasthaṃ brāhmaṇasvāpahāro
dārāś caiṣāṃ dūrato varjanīyāḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d brāhmaṇasvāpahāreṇa kiyān doṣo bhavaty uta
d brāhmasvam ucyate kiṃ vā tan me brūhi pitāmaha
d vipradāre parahṛte viprasvanicaye tathā
d paritrāyanti śaktās tu namas tebhyo mṛtās tu vā
d na pālayanti nihatā ye tān vaivasvato yamaḥ
d daṇḍayan bhartsayan nityaṃ nirayebhyo na muñcati
d tathā gavāṃ paritrāṇe pīḍane ca śubhāśubhe
d vipragoṣu viśeṣeṇa rakṣiteṣu gṛheṣu vā
d na mṛtaḥ svargam āpnoti putrapautrasamanvitaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atraiva kīrtyate sadbhir brāhmaṇasvābhimarśane
c nṛgeṇa sumahat kṛcchraṃ yad avāptaṃ kurūdvaha
a niviśantyāṃ purā pārtha dvāravatyām iti śrutiḥ
c adṛśyata mahākūpas tṛṇavīrutsamāvṛtaḥ
a prayatnaṃ tatra kurvāṇās tasmāt kūpāj jalārthinaḥ
c śrameṇa mahatā yuktās tasmiṃs toye susaṃvṛte
a dadṛśus te mahākāyaṃ kṛkalāsam avasthitam
c tasya coddharaṇe yatnam akurvaṃs te sahasraśaḥ
a pragrahaiś carmapaṭṭaiś ca taṃ baddhvā parvatopamam
c nāśaknuvan samuddhartuṃ tato jagmur janārdanam
a kham āvṛtyodapānasya kṛkalāsaḥ sthito mahān
c tasya nāsti samuddhartety atha kṛṣṇe nyavedayan
a sa vāsudevena samuddhṛtaś ca
pṛṣṭaś ca kāmān nijagāda rājā
c nṛgas tadātmānam atho nyavedayat
purātanaṃ yajñasahasrayājinam
a tathā bruvāṇaṃ tu tam āha mādhavaḥ
śubhaṃ tvayā karma kṛtaṃ na pāpakam
c kathaṃ bhavān durgatim īdṛśīṃ gato
narendra tad brūhi kim etad īdṛśam
a śataṃ sahasrāṇi śataṃ gavāṃ punaḥ
punaḥ śatāny aṣṭa śatāyutāni
c tvayā purā dattam itīha śuśruma
nṛpa dvijebhyaḥ kva nu tad gataṃ tava
a nṛgas tato 'bravīt kṛṣṇaṃ brāhmaṇasyāgnihotriṇaḥ
c proṣitasya paribhraṣṭā gaur ekā mama godhane
a gavāṃ sahasre saṃkhyātā tadā sā paśupair mama
c sā brāhmaṇāya me dattā pretyārtham abhikāṅkṣatā
a apaśyat parimārgaṃś ca tāṃ yāṃ paragṛhe dvijaḥ
c mameyam iti covāca brāhmaṇo yasya sābhavat
a tāv ubhau samanuprāptau vivadantau bhṛśajvarau
c bhavān dātā bhavān hartety atha tau māṃ tadocatuḥ
a śatena śatasaṃkhyena gavāṃ vinimayena vai
c yāce pratigrahītāraṃ sa tu mām abravīd idam
a deśakālopasaṃpannā dogdhrī kṣāntātivatsalā
c svādukṣīrapradā dhanyā mama nityaṃ niveśane
a kṛśaṃ ca bharate yā gaur mama putram apastanam
c na sā śakyā mayā hātum ity uktvā sa jagāma ha
a tatas tam aparaṃ vipraṃ yāce vinimayena vai
c gavāṃ śatasahasraṃ vai tatkṛte gṛhyatām iti
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a na rājñāṃ pratigṛhṇāmi śakto 'haṃ svasya mārgaṇe
c saiva gaur dīyatāṃ śīghraṃ mameti madhusūdana
a rukmam aśvāṃś ca dadato rajataṃ syandanāṃs tathā
c na jagrāha yayau cāpi tadā sa brāhmaṇarṣabhaḥ
a etasminn eva kāle tu coditaḥ kāladharmaṇā
c pitṛlokam ahaṃ prāpya dharmarājam upāgamam
a yamas tu pūjayitvā māṃ tato vacanam abravīt
c nāntaḥ saṃkhyāyate rājaṃs tava puṇyasya karmaṇaḥ
a asti caiva kṛtaṃ pāpam ajñānāt tad api tvayā
c carasva pāpaṃ paścād vā pūrvaṃ vā tvaṃ yathecchasi
a rakṣitāsmīti coktaṃ te pratijñā cānṛtā tava
c brāhmaṇasvasya cādānaṃ trividhas te vyatikramaḥ
a pūrvaṃ kṛcchraṃ cariṣye 'haṃ paścāc chubham iti prabho
c dharmarājaṃ bruvann evaṃ patito 'smi mahītale
a aśrauṣaṃ pracyutaś cāhaṃ yamasyoccaiḥ prabhāṣataḥ
c vāsudevaḥ samuddhartā bhavitā te janārdanaḥ
a pūrṇe varṣasahasrānte kṣīṇe karmaṇi duṣkṛte
c prāpsyase śāśvatāṃl lokāñ jitān svenaiva karmaṇā
a kūpe ''tmānam adhaḥśīrṣam apaśyaṃ patitaṃ ca ha
c tiryagyonim anuprāptaṃ na tu mām ajahāt smṛtiḥ
a tvayā tu tārito 'smy adya kim anyatra tapobalāt
c anujānīhi māṃ kṛṣṇa gaccheyaṃ divam adya vai
a anujñātaḥ sa kṛṣṇena namaskṛtya janārdanam
c vimānaṃ divyam āsthāya yayau divam ariṃdama
a tatas tasmin divaṃ prāpte nṛge bharatasattama
c vāsudeva imaṃ ślokaṃ jagāda kurunandana
a brāhmaṇasvaṃ na hartavyaṃ puruṣeṇa vijānatā
c brāhmaṇasvaṃ hṛtaṃ hanti nṛgaṃ brāhmaṇagaur iva
a satāṃ samāgamaḥ sadbhir nāphalaḥ pārtha vidyate
c vimuktaṃ narakāt paśya nṛgaṃ sādhusamāgamāt
a pradānaṃ phalavat tatra drohas tatra tathāphalaḥ
c apacāraṃ gavāṃ tasmād varjayeta yudhiṣṭhira
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a dattānāṃ phalasaṃprāptiṃ gavāṃ prabrūhi me 'nagha
c vistareṇa mahābāho na hi tṛpyāmi kathyatām
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c ṛṣer uddālaker vākyaṃ nāciketasya cobhayoḥ
a ṛṣir uddālakir dīkṣām upagamya tataḥ sutam
c tvaṃ mām upacarasveti nāciketam abhāṣata
e samāpte niyame tasmin maharṣiḥ putram abravīt
a upasparśanasaktasya svādhyāyaniratasya ca
c idhmā darbhāḥ sumanasaḥ kalaśaś cābhito jalam
e vismṛtaṃ me tad ādāya nadītīrād ihāvraja
a gatvānavāpya tat sarvaṃ nadīvegasamāplutam
c na paśyāmi tad ity evaṃ pitaraṃ so 'bravīn muniḥ
a kṣutpipāsāśramāviṣṭo munir uddālakis tadā
c yamaṃ paśyeti taṃ putram aśapat sa mahātapāḥ
a tathā sa pitrābhihato vāgvajreṇa kṛtāñjaliḥ
c prasīdeti bruvann eva gatasattvo 'patad bhuvi
a nāciketaṃ pitā dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ duḥkhamūrchitaḥ
c kiṃ mayā kṛtam ity uktvā nipapāta mahītale
a tasya duḥkhaparītasya svaṃ putram upagūhataḥ
c vyatītaṃ tad ahaḥśeṣaṃ sā cogrā tatra śarvarī
a pitryeṇāśruprapātena nāciketaḥ kurūdvaha
c prāspandacchayane kauśye vṛṣṭyā sasyam ivāplutam
a sa paryapṛcchat taṃ putraṃ ślāghyaṃ pratyāgataṃ punaḥ
c divyair gandhaiḥ samādigdhaṃ kṣīṇasvapnam ivotthitam
a api putra jitā lokāḥ śubhās te svena karmaṇā
c diṣṭyā cāsi punaḥ prāpto na hi te mānuṣaṃ vapuḥ
a pratyakṣadarśī sarvasya pitrā pṛṣṭo mahātmanā
c anvarthaṃ taṃ pitur madhye maharṣīṇāṃ nyavedayat
a kurvan bhavacchāsanam āśu yāto
hy ahaṃ viśālāṃ ruciraprabhāvām
c vaivasvatīṃ prāpya sabhām apaśyaṃ
sahasraśo yojanahaimabhaumām
a dṛṣṭvaiva mām abhimukham āpatantaṃ
gṛhaṃ nivedyāsanam ādideśa
c vaivasvato 'rghyādibhir arhaṇaiś ca
bhavatkṛte pūjayām āsa māṃ saḥ
a tatas tv ahaṃ taṃ śanakair avocaṃ
vṛtaṃ sadasyair abhipūjyamānam
c prāpto 'smi te viṣayaṃ dharmarāja
lokān arhe yān sma tān me vidhatsva
a yamo 'bravīn māṃ na mṛto 'si saumya
yamaṃ paśyety āha tu tvāṃ tapasvī
c pitā pradīptāgnisamānatejā
na tac chakyam anṛtaṃ vipra kartum
a dṛṣṭas te 'haṃ pratigacchasva tāta
śocaty asau tava dehasya kartā
c dadāmi kiṃ cāpi manaḥpraṇītaṃ
priyātithe tava kāmān vṛṇīṣva
a tenaivam uktas tam ahaṃ pratyavocaṃ
prāpto 'smi te viṣayaṃ durnivartyam
c icchāmy ahaṃ puṇyakṛtāṃ samṛddhāṃl
lokān draṣṭuṃ yadi te 'haṃ varārhaḥ
a yānaṃ samāropya tu māṃ sa devo
vāhair yuktaṃ suprabhaṃ bhānumantam
c saṃdarśayām āsa tadā sma lokān
sarvāṃs tadā puṇyakṛtāṃ dvijendra
a apaśyaṃ tatra veśmāni taijasāni kṛtātmanām
c nānāsaṃsthānarūpāṇi sarvaratnamayāni ca
a candramaṇḍalaśubhrāṇi kiṅkiṇījālavanti ca
c anekaśatabhaumāni sāntarjalavanāni ca
a vaiḍūryārkaprakāśāni rūpyarukmamayāni ca
c taruṇādityavarṇāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
a bhakṣyabhojyamayāñ śailān vāsāṃsi śayanāni ca
c sarvakāmaphalāṃś caiva vṛkṣān bhavanasaṃsthitān
a nadyo vīthyaḥ sabhā vāpī dīrghikāś caiva sarvaśaḥ
c ghoṣavanti ca yānāni yuktāny eva sahasraśaḥ
a kṣīrasravā vai sarito girīṃś ca
sarpis tathā vimalaṃ cāpi toyam
b kṣīrasravā vai sarito girīṃś ca sarpiṣāṃ tathā
b vimalaṃ caiva toyaṃ ca sarvaṃ svādu tathaiva ca
c vaivasvatasyānumatāṃś ca deśān
adṛṣṭapūrvān subahūn apaśyam
a sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tad ahaṃ dharmarājam
avocaṃ vai prabhaviṣṇuṃ purāṇam
c kṣīrasyaitāḥ sarpiṣaś caiva nadyaḥ
śaśvat srotāḥ kasya bhojyāḥ pradiṣṭāḥ
a yamo 'bravīd viddhi bhojyās tvam etā
ye dātāraḥ sādhavo gorasānām
c anye lokāḥ śāśvatā vītaśokāḥ
samākīrṇā gopradāne ratānām
a na tv evāsāṃ dānamātraṃ praśastaṃ
pātraṃ kālo goviśeṣo vidhiś ca
c jñātvā deyā vipra gavāntaraṃ hi
duḥkhaṃ jñātuṃ pāvakādityabhūtam
a svādhyāyāḍhyo yo 'timātraṃ tapasvī
vaitānastho brāhmaṇaḥ pātram āsām
c kṛcchrotsṛṣṭāḥ poṣaṇābhyāgatāś ca
dvārair etair goviśeṣāḥ praśastāḥ
a tisro rātrīr adbhir upoṣya bhūmau
tṛptā gāvas tarpitebhyaḥ pradeyāḥ
c vatsaiḥ prītāḥ suprajāḥ sopacārās
tryahaṃ dattvā gorasair vartitavyam
a dattvā dhenuṃ suvratāṃ kāṃsyadohāṃ
kalyāṇavatsām apalāyinīṃ ca
c yāvanti lomāni bhavanti tasyās
tāvad varṣāṇy aśnute svargalokam
a tathānaḍvāhaṃ brāhmaṇāya pradāya
dāntaṃ dhuryaṃ balavantaṃ yuvānam
c kulānujīvaṃ vīryavantaṃ bṛhantaṃ
bhuṅkte lokān saṃmitān dhenudasya
a goṣu kṣāntaṃ gośaraṇyaṃ kṛtajñaṃ
vṛttiglānaṃ tādṛśaṃ pātram āhuḥ
c vṛttiglāne saṃbhrame vā mahārthe
kṛṣyarthe vā homahetoḥ prasūtyām
a gurvarthe vā bālapuṣṭyābhiṣaṅgād
gāvo dātuṃ deśakālo 'viśiṣṭaḥ
c antarjātāḥ sukrayajñānalabdhāḥ
prāṇakrītā nirjitāś caudakāś ca
d gā vai dadyān nyāyabhūtā dvijebhyo
d yo yātum ākāṅkṣati devalokam
 nāciketa uvāca
a śrutvā vaivasvatavacas tam ahaṃ punar abruvam
c agomī gopradātṝṇāṃ kathaṃ lokān nigacchati
a tato yamo 'bravīd dhīmān gopradāne parāṃ gatim
c gopradānānukalpaṃ tu gām ṛte santi gopradāḥ
a alābhe yo gavāṃ dadyād ghṛtadhenuṃ yatavrataḥ
c tasyaitā ghṛtavāhinyaḥ kṣarante vatsalā iva
a ghṛtālābhe ca yo dadyāt tiladhenuṃ yatavrataḥ
c sa durgāt tārito dhenvā kṣīranadyāṃ pramodate
a tilālābhe ca yo dadyāj jaladhenuṃ yatavrataḥ
c sa kāmapravahāṃ śītāṃ nadīm etām upāśnute
a evamādīni me tatra dharmarājo nyadarśayat
c dṛṣṭvā ca paramaṃ harṣam avāpam aham acyuta
a nivedaye cāpi priyaṃ bhavatsu
kratur mahān alpadhanapracāraḥ
c prāpto mayā tāta sa matprasūtaḥ
prapatsyate vedavidhipravṛttaḥ
a śāpo hy ayaṃ bhavato 'nugrahāya
prāpto mayā yatra dṛṣṭo yamo me
c dānavyuṣṭiṃ tatra dṛṣṭvā mahārthāṃ
niḥsaṃdigdhaṃ dānadharmāṃś cariṣye
a idaṃ ca mām abravīd dharmarājaḥ
punaḥ punaḥ saṃprahṛṣṭo dvijarṣe
c dānena tāta prayato 'bhūḥ sadaiva
viśeṣato gopradānaṃ ca kuryāḥ
a śuddho hy artho nāvamanyaḥ svadharmāt
pātre deyaṃ deśakālopapanne
c tasmād gāvas te nityam eva pradeyā
mā bhūc ca te saṃśayaḥ kaś cid atra
a etāḥ purā adadan nityam eva
śāntātmāno dānapathe niviṣṭāḥ
c tapāṃsy ugrāṇy apratiśaṅkamānās
te vai dānaṃ pradaduś cāpi śaktyā
a kāle śaktyā matsaraṃ varjayitvā
śuddhātmānaḥ śraddhinaḥ puṇyaśīlāḥ
c dattvā taptvā lokam amuṃ prapannā
dedīpyante puṇyaśīlāś ca nāke
a etad dānaṃ nyāyalabdhaṃ dvijebhyaḥ
pātre dattaṃ prāpaṇīyaṃ parīkṣya
c kāmyāṣṭamyāṃ vartitavyaṃ daśāhaṃ
rasair gavāṃ śakṛtā prasnavair vā
a vedavratī syād vṛṣabhapradātā
vedāvāptir goyugasya pradāne
c tīrthāvāptir goprayuktapradāne
pāpotsargaḥ kapilāyāḥ pradāne
a gām apy ekāṃ kapilāṃ saṃpradāya
nyāyopetāṃ kalmaṣād vipramucyet
c gavāṃ rasāt paramaṃ nāsti kiṃ cid
gavāṃ dānaṃ sumahat tad vadanti
a gāvo lokān dhārayanti kṣarantyo
gāvaś cānnaṃ saṃjanayanti loke
c yas taj jānan na gavāṃ hārdam eti
sa vai gantā nirayaṃ pāpacetāḥ
a yat te dātuṃ gosahasraṃ śataṃ vā
śatārdhaṃ vā daśa vā sādhuvatsāḥ
c apy ekāṃ vā sādhave brāhmaṇāya
sāsyāmuṣmin puṇyatīrthā nadī vai
a prāptyā puṣṭyā lokasaṃrakṣaṇena
gāvas tulyāḥ sūryapādaiḥ pṛthivyām
c śabdaś caikaḥ saṃtatiś copabhogas
tasmād godaḥ sūrya ivābhibhāti
a guruṃ śiṣyo varayed gopradāne
sa vai vaktā niyataṃ svargadātā
c vidhijñānāṃ sumahān eṣa dharmo
vidhiṃ hy ādyaṃ vidhayaḥ saṃśrayanti
a etad dānaṃ nyāyalabdhaṃ dvijebhyaḥ
pātre dattvā prāpayethāḥ parīkṣya
c tvayy āśaṃsanty amarā mānavāś ca
vayaṃ cāpi prasṛte puṇyaśīlāḥ
a ity ukto 'haṃ dharmarājñā maharṣe
dharmātmānaṃ śirasābhipraṇamya
c anujñātas tena vaivasvatena
pratyāgamaṃ bhagavatpādamūlam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a uktaṃ vai gopradānaṃ te nāciketam ṛṣiṃ prati
c māhātmyam api caivoktam uddeśena gavāṃ prabho
a nṛgeṇa ca yathā duḥkham anubhūtaṃ mahātmanā
c ekāparādhād ajñānāt pitāmaha mahāmate
a dvāravatyāṃ yathā cāsau niviśantyāṃ samuddhṛtaḥ
c mokṣahetur abhūt kṛṣṇas tad apy avadhṛtaṃ mayā
a kiṃ tv asti mama saṃdeho gavāṃ lokaṃ prati prabho
c tattvataḥ śrotum icchāmi godā yatra viśanty uta
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c yathāpṛcchat padmayonim etad eva śatakratuḥ
 śakra uvāca
a svarlokavāsināṃ lakṣmīm abhibhūya svayā tviṣā
c golokavāsinaḥ paśye vrajataḥ saṃśayo 'tra me
a kīdṛśā bhagavaṃl lokā gavāṃ tad brūhi me 'nagha
c yān āvasanti dātāra etad icchāmi veditum
a kīdṛśāḥ kiṃphalāḥ kaḥ svit paramas tatra vai guṇaḥ
c kathaṃ ca puruṣās tatra gacchanti vigatajvarāḥ
a kiyat kālaṃ pradānasya dātā ca phalam aśnute
c kathaṃ bahuvidhaṃ dānaṃ syād alpam api vā katham
a bahvīnāṃ kīdṛśaṃ dānam alpānāṃ vāpi kīdṛśam
c adattvā gopradāḥ santi kena vā tac ca śaṃsa me
a kathaṃ ca bahudātā syād alpadātrā samaḥ prabho
c alpapradātā bahudaḥ kathaṃ ca syād iheśvara
a kīdṛśī dakṣiṇā caiva gopradāne viśiṣyate
c etat tathyena bhagavan mama śaṃsitum arhasi
 brahmovāca
a yo 'yaṃ praśnas tvayā pṛṣṭo gopradānādhikāravān
c nāsya praṣṭāsti loke 'smiṃs tvatto 'nyo hi śatakrato
a santi nānāvidhā lokā yāṃs tvaṃ śakra na paśyasi
c paśyāmi yān ahaṃ lokān ekapatnyaś ca yāḥ striyaḥ
a karmabhiś cāpi suśubhaiḥ suvratā ṛṣayas tathā
c saśarīrā hi tān yānti brāhmaṇāḥ śubhavṛttayaḥ
a śarīranyāsamokṣeṇa manasā nirmalena ca
c svapnabhūtāṃś ca tāṃl lokān paśyantīhāpi suvratāḥ
a te tu lokāḥ sahasrākṣa śṛṇu yādṛgguṇānvitāḥ
c na tatra kramate kālo na jarā na ca pāpakam
e tathānyan nāśubhaṃ kiṃ cin na vyādhis tatra na klamaḥ
a yad yac ca gāvo manasā tasmin vāñchanti vāsava
c tat sarvaṃ prāpayanti sma mama pratyakṣadarśanāt
e kāmagāḥ kāmacāriṇyaḥ kāmāt kāmāṃś ca bhuñjate
a vāpyaḥ sarāṃsi sarito vividhāni vanāni ca
c gṛhāṇi parvatāś caiva yāvad dravyaṃ ca kiṃ cana
a manojñaṃ sarvabhūtebhyaḥ sarvaṃ tatra pradṛśyate
c īdṛśān viddhi tāṃl lokān nāsti lokas tato 'dhikaḥ
a tatra sarvasahāḥ kṣāntā vatsalā guruvartinaḥ
c ahaṃkārair virahitā yānti śakra narottamāḥ
a yaḥ sarvamāṃsāni na bhakṣayīta
pumān sadā yāvad antāya yuktaḥ
c mātāpitror arcitā satyayuktaḥ
śuśrūṣitā brāhmaṇānām anindyaḥ
a akrodhano goṣu tathā dvijeṣu
dharme rato guruśuśrūṣakaś ca
c yāvajjīvaṃ satyavṛtte rataś ca
dāne rato yaḥ kṣamī cāparādhe
a mṛdur dānto devaparāyaṇaś ca
sarvātithiś cāpi tathā dayāvān
c īdṛgguṇo mānavaḥ saṃprayāti
lokaṃ gavāṃ śāśvataṃ cāvyayaṃ ca
a na pāradārī paśyati lokam enaṃ
na vai gurughno na mṛṣāpralāpī
c sadāpavādī brāhmaṇaḥ śāntavedo
doṣair anyair yaś ca yukto durātmā
a na mitradhruṅ naikṛtikaḥ kṛtaghnaḥ
śaṭho 'nṛjur dharmavidveṣakaś ca
c na brahmahā manasāpi prapaśyed
gavāṃ lokaṃ puṇyakṛtāṃ nivāsam
a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ naipuṇena sureśvara
c gopradānaratānāṃ tu phalaṃ śṛṇu śatakrato
a dāyādyalabdhair arthair yo gāḥ krītvā saṃprayacchati
c dharmārjitadhanakrītān sa lokān aśnute 'kṣayān
a yo vai dyūte dhanaṃ jitvā gāḥ krītvā saṃprayacchati
c sa divyam ayutaṃ śakra varṣāṇāṃ phalam aśnute
a dāyādyā yasya vai gāvo nyāyapūrvair upārjitāḥ
c pradattās tāḥ pradātṝṇāṃ saṃbhavanty akṣayā dhruvāḥ
a pratigṛhya ca yo dadyād gāḥ suśuddhena cetasā
c tasyāpīhākṣayāṃl lokān dhruvān viddhi śacīpate
a janmaprabhṛti satyaṃ ca yo brūyān niyatendriyaḥ
c gurudvijasahaḥ kṣāntas tasya gobhiḥ samā gatiḥ
a na jātu brāhmaṇo vācyo yad avācyaṃ śacīpate
c manasā goṣu na druhyed govṛttir gonukampakaḥ
a satye dharme ca niratas tasya śakra phalaṃ śṛṇu
c gosahasreṇa samitā tasya dhenur bhavaty uta
a kṣatriyasya guṇair ebhir anvitasya phalaṃ śṛṇu
c tasyāpi śatatulyā gaur bhavatīti viniścayaḥ
a vaiśyasyaite yadi guṇās tasya pañcāśataṃ bhavet
c śūdrasyāpi vinītasya caturbhāgaphalaṃ smṛtam
a etac caivaṃ yo 'nutiṣṭheta yuktaḥ
satyena yukto guruśuśrūṣayā ca
c dāntaḥ kṣānto devatārcī praśāntaḥ
śucir buddho dharmaśīlo 'nahaṃvāk
a mahat phalaṃ prāpnute sa dvijāya
dattvā dogdhrīṃ vidhinānena dhenum
c nityaṃ dadyād ekabhaktaḥ sadā ca
satye sthito guruśuśrūṣitā ca
a vedādhyāyī goṣu yo bhaktimāṃś ca
nityaṃ dṛṣṭvā yo 'bhinandeta gāś ca
c ā jātito yaś ca gavāṃ nameta
idaṃ phalaṃ śakra nibodha tasya
a yat syād iṣṭvā rājasūye phalaṃ tu
yat syād iṣṭvā bahunā kāñcanena
c etat tulyaṃ phalam asyāhur agryaṃ
sarve santas tv ṛṣayo ye ca siddhāḥ
a yo 'graṃ bhaktān kiṃ cid aprāśya dadyād
gobhyo nityaṃ govratī satyavādī
c śānto buddho gosahasrasya puṇyaṃ
saṃvatsareṇāpnuyāt puṇyaśīlaḥ
a ya ekaṃ bhaktam aśnīyād dadyād ekaṃ gavāṃ ca yat
c daśa varṣāṇy anantāni govratī gonukampakaḥ
a ekenaiva ca bhaktena yaḥ krītvā gāṃ prayacchati
c yāvanti tasya proktāni divasāni śatakrato
e tāvac chatānāṃ sa gavāṃ phalam āpnoti śāśvatam
f rājasūyāśvamedhābhyāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ
a brāhmaṇasya phalaṃ hīdaṃ kṣatriye 'bhihitaṃ śṛṇu
c pañcavārṣikam etat tu kṣatriyasya phalaṃ smṛtam
e tato 'rdhena tu vaiśyasya śūdro vaiśyārdhataḥ smṛtaḥ
a yaś cātmavikrayaṃ kṛtvā gāḥ krītvā saṃprayacchati
c yāvatīḥ sparśayed gā vai tāvat tu phalam aśnute
e lomni lomni mahābhāga lokāś cāsyākṣayāḥ smṛtāḥ
a saṃgrāmeṣv arjayitvā tu yo vai gāḥ saṃprayacchati
c ātmavikrayatulyās tāḥ śāśvatā viddhi kauśika
a alābhe yo gavāṃ dadyāt tiladhenuṃ yatavrataḥ
c durgāt sa tārito dhenvā kṣīranadyāṃ pramodate
a na tv evāsāṃ dānamātraṃ praśastaṃ
pātraṃ kālo goviśeṣo vidhiś ca
c kālajñānaṃ vipra gavāntaraṃ hi
duḥkhaṃ jñātuṃ pāvakādityabhūtam
a svādhyāyāḍhyaṃ śuddhayoniṃ praśāntaṃ
vaitānasthaṃ pāpabhīruṃ kṛtajñam
c goṣu kṣāntaṃ nātitīkṣṇaṃ śaraṇyaṃ
vṛttiglānaṃ tādṛśaṃ pātram āhuḥ
a vṛttiglāne sīdati cātimātraṃ
kṛṣyarthaṃ vā homahetoḥ prasūtyām
c gurvarthaṃ vā bālasaṃvṛddhaye vā
dhenuṃ dadyād deśakāle viśiṣṭe
a antarjātāḥ sukrayajñānalabdhāḥ
prāṇakrītā nirjitāś caukajāś ca
c kṛcchrotsṛṣṭāḥ poṣaṇābhyāgatāś ca
dvārair etair goviśeṣāḥ praśastāḥ
a balānvitāḥ śīlavayopapannāḥ
sarvāḥ praśaṃsanti sugandhavatyaḥ
c yathā hi gaṅgā saritāṃ variṣṭhā
tathārjunīnāṃ kapilā variṣṭhā
a tisro rātrīs tv adbhir upoṣya bhūmau
tṛptā gāvas tarpitebhyaḥ pradeyāḥ
c vatsaiḥ puṣṭaiḥ kṣīrapaiḥ supracārās
tryahaṃ dattvā gorasair vartitavyam
a dattvā dhenuṃ suvratāṃ sādhuvatsāṃ
kalyāṇavṛttām apalāyinīṃ ca
c yāvanti lomāni bhavanti tasyās
tāvanti varṣāṇi vasaty amutra
a tathānaḍvāhaṃ brāhmaṇāyātha dhuryaṃ
dattvā yuvānaṃ balinaṃ vinītam
c halasya voḍhāram anantavīryaṃ
prāpnoti lokān daśadhenudasya
a kāntāre brāhmaṇān gāś ca yaḥ paritrāti kauśika
c kṣemeṇa ca vimucyeta tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
d kāntāraṃ yaḥ prapannas tu gāṃ dvijāya prayacchati
d kṣemeṇa pratimucyeta tam adhvānaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
d yānapātraṃ samārohan yaś ca gāṃ saṃprayacchati
d tīrtvā samudraṃ kṣemeṇa pratyāyāti gṛhaṃ gṛhī
d mṛtyukāle sahasrākṣa yaś ca gāṃ saṃprayacchati
d mṛtyuṃ sukhaṃ sa labhate lokāṃś cāpnoty anuttamān
d kṣatriyo yaś ca vai kaś cid yātrākāle prayacchati
d gobhiś ca samanudhyāto jitvā śatrūn mahīyate
d yaḥ kaś cit karma yat kiṃ cit kartum ārabhate nṛṣu
d gāvo dattvā sa tat sarvaṃ sukhopāyena vindati
d yaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ samuddiśya gāṃ dvijāya prayacchati
d tasya saṃpatsyate kāmaḥ paratra ca śubhāṃ gatim
e aśvamedhakratos tulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati śāśvatam
a mṛtyukāle sahasrākṣa yāṃ vṛttim anukāṅkṣate
c lokān bahuvidhān divyān yad vāsya hṛdi vartate
a tat sarvaṃ samavāpnoti karmaṇā tena mānavaḥ
c gobhiś ca samanujñātaḥ sarvatra sa mahīyate
a yas tv etenaiva vidhinā gāṃ vaneṣv anugacchati
c tṛṇagomayaparṇāśī niḥspṛho niyataḥ śuciḥ
a akāmaṃ tena vastavyaṃ muditena śatakrato
c mama loke suraiḥ sārdhaṃ loke yatrāpi cecchati
 indra uvāca
a jānan yo gām apahared vikrīyād vārthakāraṇāt
c etad vijñātum icchāmi kā nu tasya gatir bhavet
 brahmovāca
a bhakṣārthaṃ vikrayārthaṃ vā ye 'pahāraṃ hi kurvate
c dānārthaṃ vā brāhmaṇāya tatredaṃ śrūyatāṃ phalam
a vikrayārthaṃ hi yo hiṃsyād bhakṣayed vā niraṅkuśaḥ
c ghātayānaṃ hi puruṣaṃ ye 'numanyeyur arthinaḥ
a ghātakaḥ khādako vāpi tathā yaś cānumanyate
c yāvanti tasyā lomāni tāvad varṣāṇi majjati
a ye doṣā yādṛśāś caiva dvijayajñopaghātake
c vikraye cāpahāre ca te doṣā vai smṛtāḥ prabho
a apahṛtya tu yo gāṃ vai brāhmaṇāya prayacchati
c yāvad dāne phalaṃ tasyās tāvan nirayam ṛcchati
a suvarṇaṃ dakṣiṇām āhur gopradāne mahādyute
c suvarṇaṃ paramaṃ hy uktaṃ dakṣiṇārtham asaṃśayam
a gopradānaṃ tārayate sapta pūrvāṃs tathā parān
c suvarṇaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā tāvad dviguṇam ucyate
a suvarṇaṃ paramaṃ dānaṃ suvarṇaṃ dakṣiṇā parā
c suvarṇaṃ pāvanaṃ śakra pāvanānāṃ paraṃ smṛtam
a kulānāṃ pāvanaṃ prāhur jātarūpaṃ śatakrato
c eṣā me dakṣiṇā proktā samāsena mahādyute
 bhīṣma uvāca
a etat pitāmahenoktam indrāya bharatarṣabha
c indro daśarathāyāha rāmāyāha pitā tathā
a rāghavo 'pi priyabhrātre lakṣmaṇāya yaśasvine
c ṛṣibhyo lakṣmaṇenoktam araṇye vasatā vibho
a pāraṃparyāgataṃ cedam ṛṣayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
c durdharaṃ dhārayām āsū rājānaś caiva dhārmikāḥ
e upādhyāyena gaditaṃ mama cedaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
a ya idaṃ brāhmaṇo nityaṃ vaded brāhmaṇasaṃsadi
c yajñeṣu gopradāneṣu dvayor api samāgame
a tasya lokāḥ kilākṣayyā daivataiḥ saha nityadā
c iti brahmā sa bhagavān uvāca parameśvaraḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a visrambhito 'haṃ bhavatā dharmān pravadatā vibho
c pravakṣyāmi tu saṃdehaṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha
a vratānāṃ kiṃ phalaṃ proktaṃ kīdṛśaṃ vā mahādyute
c niyamānāṃ phalaṃ kiṃ ca svadhītasya ca kiṃ phalam
a damasyeha phalaṃ kiṃ ca vedānāṃ dhāraṇe ca kim
c adhyāpane phalaṃ kiṃ ca sarvam icchāmi veditum
a apratigrāhake kiṃ ca phalaṃ loke pitāmaha
c tasya kiṃ ca phalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ yaḥ saṃprayacchati
a svakarmaniratānāṃ ca śūrāṇāṃ cāpi kiṃ phalam
c satye ca kiṃ phalaṃ proktaṃ brahmacarye ca kiṃ phalam
a pitṛśuśrūṣaṇe kiṃ ca mātṛśuśrūṣaṇe tathā
c ācāryaguruśuśrūṣāsv anukrośānukampane
a etat sarvam aśeṣeṇa pitāmaha yathātatham
c vettum icchāmi dharmajña paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
 bhīṣma uvāca
a yo vrataṃ vai yathoddiṣṭaṃ tathā saṃpratipadyate
c akhaṇḍaṃ samyag ārabdhaṃ tasya lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
a niyamānāṃ phalaṃ rājan pratyakṣam iha dṛśyate
c niyamānāṃ kratūnāṃ ca tvayāvāptam idaṃ phalam
a svadhītasyāpi ca phalaṃ dṛśyate 'mutra ceha ca
c ihaloke 'rthavān nityaṃ brahmaloke ca modate
a damasya tu phalaṃ rājañ śṛṇu tvaṃ vistareṇa me
c dāntāḥ sarvatra sukhino dāntāḥ sarvatra nirvṛtāḥ
a yatrecchāgāmino dāntāḥ sarvaśatruniṣūdanāḥ
c prārthayanti ca yad dāntā labhante tan na saṃśayaḥ
a yujyante sarvakāmair hi dāntāḥ sarvatra pāṇḍava
c svarge tathā pramodante tapasā vikrameṇa ca
a dānair yajñaiś ca vividhair yathā dāntāḥ kṣamānvitāḥ
b dānād damo viśiṣṭo hi dānaṃ kiṃ cid dvijātaye
c dātā kupyati no dāntas tasmād dānāt paro damaḥ
a yas tu dadyād akupyan hi tasya lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
c krodho hanti hi yad dānaṃ tasmād dānāt paro damaḥ
d vidyādānāt paraṃ nāsti vedavidyā mahāphalā
a adṛśyāni mahārāja sthānāny ayutaśo divi
c ṛṣīṇāṃ sarvalokeṣu yānīto yānti devatāḥ
a damena yāni nṛpate gacchanti paramarṣayaḥ
c kāmayānā mahat sthānaṃ tasmād dānāt paro damaḥ
a adhyāpakaḥ parikleśād akṣayaṃ phalam aśnute
c vidhivat pāvakaṃ hutvā brahmaloke narādhipa
a adhītyāpi hi yo vedān nyāyavidbhyaḥ prayacchati
c gurukarmapraśaṃsī ca so 'pi svarge mahīyate
a kṣatriyo 'dhyayane yukto yajane dānakarmaṇi
c yuddhe yaś ca paritrātā so 'pi svarge mahīyate
a vaiśyaḥ svakarmanirataḥ pradānāl labhate mahat
c śūdraḥ svakarmanirataḥ svargaṃ śuśrūṣayārcchati
a śūrā bahuvidhāḥ proktās teṣām arthāṃś ca me śṛṇu
c śūrānvayānāṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ phalaṃ śūrasya caiva ha
d śūrāṇāṃ cāpi nirdiṣṭaṃ phalaṃ ca niyataṃ śṛṇu
a yajñaśūrā dame śūrāḥ satyaśūrās tathāpare
c yuddhaśūrās tathaivoktā dānaśūrāś ca mānavāḥ
a buddhiśūrās tathaivānye kṣamāśūrās tathāpare
c ārjave ca tathā śūrāḥ śame vartanti mānavāḥ
a tais tais tu niyamaiḥ śūrā bahavaḥ santi cāpare
c vedādhyayanaśūrāś ca śūrāś cādhyāpane ratāḥ
a guruśuśrūṣayā śūrāḥ pitṛśuśrūṣayāpare
c mātṛśuśrūṣayā śūrā bhaikṣyaśūrās tathāpare
a sāṃkhyaśūrāś ca bahavo yogaśūrās tathāpare
c araṇye gṛhavāse ca śūrāś cātithipūjane
e sarve yānti parāṃl lokān svakarmaphalanirjitān
a dhāraṇaṃ sarvavedānāṃ sarvatīrthāvagāhanam
c satyaṃ ca bruvato nityaṃ samaṃ vā syān na vā samam
a aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam
c aśvamedhasahasrād dhi satyam eva viśiṣyate
a satyena sūryas tapati satyenāgniḥ pradīpyate
c satyena māruto vāti sarvaṃ satye pratiṣṭhitam
a satyena devān prīṇāti pitṝn vai brāhmaṇāṃs tathā
c satyam āhuḥ paraṃ dharmaṃ tasmāt satyaṃ na laṅghayet
a munayaḥ satyaniratā munayaḥ satyavikramāḥ
c munayaḥ satyaśapathās tasmāt satyaṃ viśiṣyate
e satyavantaḥ svargaloke modante bharatarṣabha
a damaḥ satyaphalāvāptir uktā sarvātmanā mayā
c asaṃśayaṃ vinītātmā sarvaḥ svarge mahīyate
a brahmacaryasya tu guṇāñ śṛṇu me vasudhādhipa
c ā janmamaraṇād yas tu brahmacārī bhaved iha
e na tasya kiṃ cid aprāpyam iti viddhi janādhipa
a bahvyaḥ koṭyas tv ṛṣīṇāṃ tu brahmaloke vasanty uta
c satye ratānāṃ satataṃ dāntānām ūrdhvaretasām
a brahmacaryaṃ dahed rājan sarvapāpāny upāsitam
c brāhmaṇena viśeṣeṇa brāhmaṇo hy agnir ucyate
a pratyakṣaṃ ca tavāpy etad brāhmaṇeṣu tapasviṣu
c bibheti hi yathā śakro brahmacāripradharṣitaḥ
e tad brahmacaryasya phalam ṛṣīṇām iha dṛśyate
a mātāpitroḥ pūjane yo dharmas tam api me śṛṇu
c śuśrūṣate yaḥ pitaraṃ na cāsūyet kathaṃ cana
e mātaraṃ vānahaṃvādī gurum ācāryam eva ca
a tasya rājan phalaṃ viddhi svarloke sthānam uttamam
c na ca paśyeta narakaṃ guruśuśrūṣur ātmavān
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a vidhiṃ gavāṃ param ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
c yena tāñ śāśvatāṃl lokān akhilān aśnuvīmahi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a na godānāt paraṃ kiṃ cid vidyate vasudhādhipa
c gaur hi nyāyāgatā dattā sadyas tārayate kulam
a satām arthe samyag utpādito yaḥ
sa vai kḷptaḥ samyag iṣṭaḥ prajābhyaḥ
c tasmāt pūrvaṃ hy ādikāle pravṛttaṃ
gavāṃ dāne śṛṇu rājan vidhiṃ me
a purā goṣūpanītāsu goṣu saṃdigdhadarśinā
c māndhātrā prakṛtaṃ praśnaṃ bṛhaspatir abhāṣata
a dvijātim abhisatkṛtya śvaḥ kālam abhivedya ca
c pradānārthe niyuñjīta rohiṇīṃ niyatavrataḥ
a āhvānaṃ ca prayuñjīta samaṅge bahuleti ca
c praviśya ca gavāṃ madhyam imāṃ śrutim udāharet
a gaur me mātā govṛṣabhaḥ pitā me
divaṃ śarma jagatī me pratiṣṭhā
c prapadyaivaṃ śarvarīm uṣya goṣu
munir vāṇīm utsṛjed gopradāne
a sa tām ekāṃ niśāṃ gobhiḥ samasakhyaḥ samavrataḥ
c aikātmyagamanāt sadyaḥ kalmaṣād vipramucyate
a utsṛṣṭavṛṣavatsā hi pradeyā sūryadarśane
c trividhaṃ pratipattavyam arthavādāśiṣaḥ stavāḥ
a ūrjasvinya ūrjamedhāś ca yajño
garbho 'mṛtasya jagataś ca pratiṣṭhā
c kṣitau rādhaḥprabhavaḥ śaśvad eva
prājāpatyāḥ sarvam ity arthavādaḥ
a gāvo mamainaḥ praṇudantu sauryās
tathā saumyāḥ svargayānāya santu
c āmnātā me dadatīr āśrayaṃ tu
tathānuktāḥ santu sarvāśiṣo me
a śeṣotsarge karmabhir dehamokṣe
sarasvatyaḥ śreyasi saṃpravṛttāḥ
c yūyaṃ nityaṃ puṇyakarmopavāhyā
diśadhvaṃ me gatim iṣṭāṃ prapannāḥ
a yā vai yūyaṃ so 'ham adyaikabhāvo
yuṣmān dattvā cāham ātmapradātā
c manaścyutā manaevopapannāḥ
saṃdhukṣadhvaṃ saumyarūpograrūpāḥ
a evaṃ tasyāgre pūrvam ardhaṃ vadeta
gavāṃ dātā vidhivat pūrvadṛṣṭam
c pratibrūyāc cheṣam ardhaṃ dvijātiḥ
pratigṛhṇan vai gopradāne vidhijñaḥ
a gāṃ dadānīti vaktavyam arghyavastravasupradaḥ
c ūdhasyā bharitavyā ca vaiṣṇavīti ca codayet
a nāma saṃkīrtayet tasyā yathāsaṃkhyottaraṃ sa vai
c phalaṃ ṣaḍviṃśad aṣṭau ca sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ
a evam etān guṇān vṛddhān gavādīnāṃ yathākramam
c gopradātā samāpnoti samastān aṣṭame krame
a godaḥ śīlī nirbhayaś cārghadātā
na syād duḥkhī vasudātā ca kāmī
c ūdhasyoḍhā bhārata yaś ca vidvān
vyākhyātās te vaiṣṇavāś candralokāḥ
a gā vai dattvā govratī syāt trirātraṃ
niśāṃ caikāṃ saṃvaseteha tābhiḥ
c kāmyāṣṭamyāṃ vartitavyaṃ trirātraṃ
rasair vā goḥ śakṛtā prasnavair vā
a vedavratī syād vṛṣabhapradātā
vedāvāptir goyugasya pradāne
c tathā gavāṃ vidhim āsādya yajvā
lokān agryān vindate nāvidhijñaḥ
a kāmān sarvān pārthivān ekasaṃsthān
yo vai dadyāt kāmadughāṃ ca dhenum
c samyak tāḥ syur havyakavyaughavatyas
tāsām ukṣṇāṃ jyāyasāṃ saṃpradānam
a na cāśiṣyāyāvratāyopakuryān
nāśraddadhānāya na vakrabuddhaye
c guhyo hy ayaṃ sarvalokasya dharmo
nemaṃ dharmaṃ yatra tatra prajalpet
a santi loke śraddadhānā manuṣyāḥ
santi kṣudrā rākṣasā mānuṣeṣu
c yeṣāṃ dānaṃ dīyamānaṃ hy aniṣṭaṃ
nāstikyaṃ cāpy āśrayante hy apuṇyāḥ
a bārhaspatyaṃ vākyam etan niśamya
ye rājāno gopradānāni kṛtvā
c lokān prāptāḥ puṇyaśīlāḥ suvṛttās
tān me rājan kīrtyamānān nibodha
a uśīnaro viṣvagaśvo nṛgaś ca
bhagīratho viśruto yauvanāśvaḥ
c māndhātā vai mucukundaś ca rājā
bhūridyumno naiṣadhaḥ somakaś ca
a purūravā bharataś cakravartī
yasyānvaye bhāratāḥ sarva eva
c tathā vīro dāśarathiś ca rāmo
ye cāpy anye viśrutāḥ kīrtimantaḥ
a tathā rājā pṛthukarmā dilīpo
divaṃ prāpto gopradāne vidhijñaḥ
c yajñair dānais tapasā rājadharmair
māndhātābhūd gopradānaiś ca yuktaḥ
a tasmāt pārtha tvam apīmāṃ mayoktāṃ
bārhaspatīṃ bhāratīṃ dhārayasva
c dvijāgryebhyaḥ saṃprayaccha pratīto
gāḥ puṇyā vai prāpya rājyaṃ kurūṇām
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tathā sarvaṃ kṛtavān dharmarājo
bhīṣmeṇokto vidhivad gopradāne
c sa māndhātur devadevopadiṣṭaṃ
samyag dharmaṃ dhārayām āsa rājā
a iti nṛpa satataṃ gavāṃ pradāne
yavaśakalān saha gomayaiḥ pibānaḥ
c kṣititalaśayanaḥ śikhī yatātmā
vṛṣa iva rājavṛṣas tadā babhūva
a sa nṛpatir abhavat sadaiva tābhyaḥ
prayatamanā hy abhisaṃstuvaṃś ca gā vai
c nṛpadhuri ca na gām ayuṅkta bhūyas
turagavarair agamac ca yatra tatra
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
