a tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā bhūyaḥ śāṃtanavaṃ nṛpa
c godāne vistaraṃ dhīmān papraccha vinayānvitaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a gopradāne guṇān samyak punaḥ prabrūhi bhārata
c na hi tṛpyāmy ahaṃ vīra śṛṇvāno 'mṛtam īdṛśam
a ity ukto dharmarājena tadā śāṃtanavo nṛpa
c samyag āha guṇāṃs tasmai gopradānasya kevalān
 bhīṣma uvāca
a vatsalāṃ guṇasaṃpannāṃ taruṇīṃ vastrasaṃvṛtām
c dattvedṛśīṃ gāṃ viprāya sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
a asuryā nāma te lokā gāṃ dattvā tatra gacchati
c pītodakāṃ jagdhatṛṇāṃ naṣṭadugdhāṃ nirindriyām
a jarogrām upayuktārthāṃ jīrṇāṃ kūpam ivājalam
c dattvā tamaḥ praviśati dvijaṃ kleśena yojayet
a duṣṭā ruṣṭā vyādhitā durbalā vā
na dātavyā yāś ca mūlyair adattaiḥ
c kleśair vipraṃ yo 'phalaiḥ saṃyunakti
tasyāvīryāś cāphalāś caiva lokāḥ
a balānvitāḥ śīlavayopapannāḥ
sarvāḥ praśaṃsanti sugandhavatyaḥ
c yathā hi gaṅgā saritāṃ variṣṭhā
tathārjunīnāṃ kapilā variṣṭhā
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kasmāt samāne bahulāpradāne
sadbhiḥ praśastaṃ kapilāpradānam
c viśeṣam icchāmi mahānubhāva
śrotuṃ samartho hi bhavān pravaktum
 bhīṣma uvāca
a vṛddhānāṃ bruvatāṃ tāta śrutaṃ me yat prabhāṣase
c vakṣyāmi tad aśeṣeṇa rohiṇyo nirmitā yathā
a prajāḥ sṛjeti vyādiṣṭaḥ pūrvaṃ dakṣaḥ svayaṃbhuvā
c asṛjad vṛttim evāgre prajānāṃ hitakāmyayā
a yathā hy amṛtam āśritya vartayanti divaukasaḥ
c tathā vṛttiṃ samāśritya vartayanti prajā vibho
a acarebhyaś ca bhūtebhyaś carāḥ śreṣṭhās tato narāḥ
c brāhmaṇāś ca tataḥ śreṣṭhās teṣu yajñāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
a yajñair āpyāyate somaḥ sa ca goṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ
c sarve devāḥ pramodante pūrvavṛttās tataḥ prajāḥ
d tataḥ prajāsu sṛṣṭāsu dakṣādyaiḥ kṣudhitāḥ prajāḥ
d prajāpatim upādhāvan viniścitya caturmukham
a etāny eva tu bhūtāni prākrośan vṛttikāṅkṣayā
c vṛttidaṃ cānvapadyanta tṛṣitāḥ pitṛmātṛvat
a itīdaṃ manasā gatvā prajāsargārtham ātmanaḥ
c prajāpatir balādhānam amṛtaṃ prāpibat tadā
a sa gatas tasya tṛptiṃ tu gandhaṃ surabhim udgiran
b mukhajā sāsṛjad dhātuḥ surabhiṃ lokamātaram
c dadarśodgārasaṃvṛttāṃ surabhiṃ mukhajāṃ sutām
a sāsṛjat saurabheyīs tu surabhir lokamātaraḥ
c suvarṇavarṇāḥ kapilāḥ prajānāṃ vṛttidhenavaḥ
a tāsām amṛtavarṇānāṃ kṣarantīnāṃ samantataḥ
c babhūvāmṛtajaḥ phenaḥ sravantīnām ivormijaḥ
a sa vatsamukhavibhraṣṭo bhavasya bhuvi tiṣṭhataḥ
c śirasy avāpa tat kruddhaḥ sa tadodaikṣata prabhuḥ
e lalāṭaprabhavenākṣṇā rohiṇīḥ pradahann iva
a tat tejas tu tato raudraṃ kapilā gā viśāṃ pate
c nānāvarṇatvam anayan meghān iva divākaraḥ
a yās tu tasmād apakramya somam evābhisaṃśritāḥ
c yathotpannāḥ svavarṇasthās tā nītā nānyavarṇatām
a atha kruddhaṃ mahādevaṃ prajāpatir abhāṣata
c amṛtenāvasiktas tvaṃ nocchiṣṭaṃ vidyate gavām
a yathā hy amṛtam ādāya somo viṣyandate punaḥ
c tathā kṣīraṃ kṣaranty etā rohiṇyo 'mṛtasaṃbhavāḥ
a na duṣyaty anilo nāgnir na suvarṇaṃ na codadhiḥ
c nāmṛtenāmṛtaṃ pītaṃ vatsapītā na vatsalā
a imāṃl lokān bhariṣyanti haviṣā prasnavena ca
c āsām aiśvaryam aśnīhi sarvāmṛtamayaṃ śubham
a vṛṣabhaṃ ca dadau tasmai saha tābhiḥ prajāpatiḥ
c prasādayām āsa manas tena rudrasya bhārata
a prītaś cāpi mahādevaś cakāra vṛṣabhaṃ tadā
c dhvajaṃ ca vāhanaṃ caiva tasmāt sa vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ
a tato devair mahādevas tadā paśupatiḥ kṛtaḥ
c īśvaraḥ sa gavāṃ madhye vṛṣāṅka iti cocyate
a evam avyagravarṇānāṃ kapilānāṃ mahaujasām
c pradāne prathamaḥ kalpaḥ sarvāsām eva kīrtitaḥ
a lokajyeṣṭhā lokavṛttipravṛttā
rudropetāḥ somaviṣyandabhūtāḥ
c saumyāḥ puṇyāḥ kāmadāḥ prāṇadāś ca
gā vai dattvā sarvakāmapradaḥ syāt
a imaṃ gavāṃ prabhavavidhānam uttamaṃ
paṭhan sadā śucir atimaṅgalapriyaḥ
c vimucyate kalikaluṣeṇa mānavaḥ
priyaṃ sutān paśudhanam āpnuyāt tathā
a havyaṃ kavyaṃ tarpaṇaṃ śāntikarma
yānaṃ vāso vṛddhabālasya puṣṭim
c etān sarvān gopradāne guṇān vai
dātā rājann āpnuyād vai sadaiva
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a pitāmahasyātha niśamya vākyaṃ
rājā saha bhrātṛbhir ājamīḍhaḥ
c sauvarṇakāṃsyopaduhās tato gāḥ
pārtho dadau brāhmaṇasattamebhyaḥ
a tathaiva tebhyo 'bhidadau dvijebhyo
gavāṃ sahasrāṇi śatāni caiva
c yajñān samuddiśya ca dakṣiṇārthe
lokān vijetuṃ paramāṃ ca kīrtim
 bhīṣma uvāca
a etasminn eva kāle tu vasiṣṭham ṛṣisattamam
b atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
b vasiṣṭhasya ca saṃvādaṃ saudāsasya mahātmanaḥ
c ikṣvākuvaṃśajo rājā saudāso dadatāṃ varaḥ
a sarvalokacaraṃ siddhaṃ brahmakośaṃ sanātanam
c purohitam idaṃ praṣṭum abhivādyopacakrame
 saudāsa uvāca
a trailokye bhagavan kiṃ svit pavitraṃ kathyate 'nagha
b lokatraye muniśreṣṭha bhagavaṃl lokabhāvana
c yat kīrtayan sadā martyaḥ prāpnuyāt puṇyam uttamam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tasmai provāca vacanaṃ praṇatāya hitaṃ tadā
c gavām upaniṣad vidvān namaskṛtya gavāṃ śuciḥ
a gāvaḥ surabhigandhinyas tathā guggulugandhikāḥ
c gāvaḥ pratiṣṭhā bhūtānāṃ gāvaḥ svastyayanaṃ mahat
a gāvo bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyac ca gāvaḥ puṣṭiḥ sanātanī
c gāvo lakṣmyās tathā mūlaṃ goṣu dattaṃ na naśyati
e annaṃ hi satataṃ gāvo devānāṃ paramaṃ haviḥ
a svāhākāravaṣaṭkārau goṣu nityaṃ pratiṣṭhitau
c gāvo yajñasya hi phalaṃ goṣu yajñāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
d gāvo bhaviṣyaṃ bhūtaṃ ca goṣu yajñāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
a sāyaṃ prātaś ca satataṃ homakāle mahāmate
c gāvo dadati vai homyam ṛṣibhyaḥ puruṣarṣabha
a kāni cid yāni durgāṇi duṣkṛtāni kṛtāni ca
c taranti caiva pāpmānaṃ dhenuṃ ye dadati prabho
a ekāṃ ca daśagur dadyād daśa dadyāc ca gośatī
c śataṃ sahasragur dadyāt sarve tulyaphalā hi te
a anāhitāgniḥ śatagur ayajvā ca sahasraguḥ
c samṛddho yaś ca kīnāśo nārghyam arhanti te trayaḥ
a kapilāṃ ye prayacchanti savatsāṃ kāṃsyadohanām
c suvratāṃ vastrasaṃvītām ubhau lokau jayanti te
a yuvānam indriyopetaṃ śatena saha yūthapam
c gavendraṃ brāhmaṇendrāya bhūriśṛṅgam alaṃkṛtam
a vṛṣabhaṃ ye prayacchanti śrotriyāya paraṃtapa
c aiśvaryaṃ te 'bhijāyante jāyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
a nākīrtayitvā gāḥ supyān nāsmṛtya punar utpatet
c sāyaṃ prātar namasyec ca gās tataḥ puṣṭim āpnuyāt
a gavāṃ mūtrapurīṣasya nodvijeta kadā cana
c na cāsāṃ māṃsam aśnīyād gavāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ tathāśnute
a gāś ca saṃkīrtayen nityaṃ nāvamanyeta gās tathā
c aniṣṭaṃ svapnam ālakṣya gāṃ naraḥ saṃprakīrtayet
a gomayena sadā snāyād gokarīṣe ca saṃviśet
c śleṣmamūtrapurīṣāṇi pratighātaṃ ca varjayet
a sārdracarmaṇi bhuñjīta nirīkṣan vāruṇīṃ diśam
c vāgyataḥ sarpiṣā bhūmau gavāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ tathāśnute
a ghṛtena juhuyād agniṃ ghṛtena svasti vācayet
c ghṛtaṃ dadyād ghṛtaṃ prāśed gavāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ tathāśnute
a gomatyā vidyayā dhenuṃ tilānām abhimantrya yaḥ
c rasaratnamayīṃ dadyān na sa śocet kṛtākṛte
a gāvo mām upatiṣṭhantu hemaśṛṅgāḥ payomucaḥ
c surabhyaḥ saurabheyāś ca saritaḥ sāgaraṃ yathā
a gāvaḥ paśyantu māṃ nityaṃ gāvaḥ paśyāmy ahaṃ tadā
c gāvo 'smākaṃ vayaṃ tāsāṃ yato gāvas tato vayam
a evaṃ rātrau divā caiva sameṣu viṣameṣu ca
c mahābhayeṣu ca naraḥ kīrtayan mucyate bhayāt
 vasiṣṭha uvāca
a śataṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ tapas taptaṃ suduścaram
c gobhiḥ pūrvavisṛṣṭābhir gacchema śreṣṭhatām iti
a loke 'smin dakṣiṇānāṃ ca sarvāsāṃ vayam uttamāḥ
c bhavema na ca lipyema doṣeṇeti paraṃtapa
a sa eva cetasā tena hato lipyeta sarvadā
c śakṛtā ca pavitrārthaṃ kurvīran devamānuṣāḥ
a tathā sarvāṇi bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
c pradātāraś ca golokān gaccheyur iti mānada
a tābhyo varaṃ dadau brahmā tapaso 'nte svayaṃ prabhuḥ
c evaṃ bhavatv iti vibhur lokāṃs tārayateti ca
a uttasthuḥ siddhikāmās tā bhūtabhavyasya mātaraḥ
b prātar namasyās tā gāvas tataḥ puṣṭim avāpnuyāt
c tapaso 'nte mahārāja gāvo lokaparāyaṇāḥ
a tasmād gāvo mahābhāgāḥ pavitraṃ param ucyate
c tathaiva sarvabhūtānāṃ gāvas tiṣṭhanti mūrdhani
a samānavatsāṃ kapilāṃ dhenuṃ dattvā payasvinīm
c suvratāṃ vastrasaṃvītāṃ brahmaloke mahīyate
a rohiṇīṃ tulyavatsāṃ tu dhenuṃ dattvā payasvinīm
c suvratāṃ vastrasaṃvītāṃ sūryaloke mahīyate
a samānavatsāṃ śabalāṃ dhenuṃ dattvā payasvinīm
c suvratāṃ vastrasaṃvītāṃ somaloke mahīyate
a samānavatsāṃ śvetāṃ tu dhenuṃ dattvā payasvinīm
c suvratāṃ vastrasaṃvītām indraloke mahīyate
a samānavatsāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ tu dhenuṃ dattvā payasvinīm
c suvratāṃ vastrasaṃvītām agniloke mahīyate
a samānavatsāṃ dhūmrāṃ tu dhenuṃ dattvā payasvinīm
c suvratāṃ vastrasaṃvītāṃ yāmyaloke mahīyate
a apāṃ phenasavarṇāṃ tu savatsāṃ kāṃsyadohanām
c pradāya vastrasaṃvītāṃ vāruṇaṃ lokam aśnute
a vātareṇusavarṇāṃ tu savatsāṃ kāṃsyadohanām
c pradāya vastrasaṃvītāṃ vāyuloke mahīyate
a hiraṇyavarṇāṃ piṅgākṣīṃ savatsāṃ kāṃsyadohanām
c pradāya vastrasaṃvītāṃ kauberaṃ lokam aśnute
a palāladhūmravarṇāṃ tu savatsāṃ kāṃsyadohanām
c pradāya vastrasaṃvītāṃ pitṛloke mahīyate
a savatsāṃ pīvarīṃ dattvā śitikaṇṭhām alaṃkṛtām
c vaiśvadevam asaṃbādhaṃ sthānaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ prapadyate
a samānavatsāṃ gaurīṃ tu dhenuṃ dattvā payasvinīm
c suvratāṃ vastrasaṃvītāṃ vasūnāṃ lokam aśnute
a pāṇḍukambalavarṇāṃ tu savatsāṃ kāṃsyadohanām
c pradāya vastrasaṃvītāṃ sādhyānāṃ lokam aśnute
a vairāṭapṛṣṭham ukṣāṇaṃ sarvaratnair alaṃkṛtam
c pradāya marutāṃ lokān ajarān pratipadyate
a vatsopapannāṃ nīlāṅgāṃ sarvaratnasamanvitām
c gandharvāpsarasāṃ lokān dattvā prāpnoti mānavaḥ
a śitikaṇṭham anaḍvāhaṃ sarvaratnair alaṃkṛtam
c dattvā prajāpater lokān viśokaḥ pratipadyate
a gopradānarato yāti bhittvā jaladasaṃcayān
c vimānenārkavarṇena divi rājan virājatā
a taṃ cāruveṣāḥ suśroṇyaḥ sahasraṃ varayoṣitaḥ
c ramayanti naraśreṣṭha gopradānarataṃ naram
a vīṇānāṃ vallakīnāṃ ca nūpurāṇāṃ ca śiñjitaiḥ
c hāsaiś ca hariṇākṣīṇāṃ prasuptaḥ pratibodhyate
a yāvanti lomāni bhavanti dhenvās
tāvanti varṣāṇi mahīyate saḥ
c svargāc cyutaś cāpi tato nṛloke
kule samutpatsyati gomināṃ saḥ
 vasiṣṭha uvāca
a ghṛtakṣīrapradā gāvo ghṛtayonyo ghṛtodbhavāḥ
c ghṛtanadyo ghṛtāvartās tā me santu sadā gṛhe
a ghṛtaṃ me hṛdaye nityaṃ ghṛtaṃ nābhyāṃ pratiṣṭhitam
c ghṛtaṃ sarveṣu gātreṣu ghṛtaṃ me manasi sthitam
a gāvo mamāgrato nityaṃ gāvaḥ pṛṣṭhata eva ca
c gāvo me sarvataś caiva gavāṃ madhye vasāmy aham
a ity ācamya japet sāyaṃ prātaś ca puruṣaḥ sadā
c yad ahnā kurute pāpaṃ tasmāt sa parimucyate
a prāsādā yatra sauvarṇā vasor dhārā ca yatra sā
c gandharvāpsaraso yatra tatra yānti sahasradāḥ
a navanītapaṅkāḥ kṣīrodā dadhiśaivalasaṃkulāḥ
c vahanti yatra nadyo vai tatra yānti sahasradāḥ
a gavāṃ śatasahasraṃ tu yaḥ prayacched yathāvidhi
c parām ṛddhim avāpyātha sa goloke mahīyate
a daśa cobhayataḥ pretya mātāpitroḥ pitāmahān
c dadhāti sukṛtāṃl lokān punāti ca kulaṃ naraḥ
a dhenvāḥ pramāṇena samapramāṇāṃ
dhenuṃ tilānām api ca pradāya
c pānīyadātā ca yamasya loke
na yātanāṃ kāṃ cid upaiti tatra
d lokān anantān samavāpya dhīraḥ
d pramodate sukṛtī svargaloke
a pavitram agryaṃ jagataḥ pratiṣṭhā
divaukasāṃ mātaro 'thāprameyāḥ
c anvālabhed dakṣiṇato vrajec ca
dadyāc ca pātre prasamīkṣya kālam
a dhenuṃ savatsāṃ kapilāṃ bhūriśṛṅgāṃ
kāṃsyopadohāṃ vasanottarīyām
c pradāya tāṃ gāhati durvigāhyāṃ
yāmyāṃ sabhāṃ vītabhayo manuṣyaḥ
a surūpā bahurūpāś ca viśvarūpāś ca mātaraḥ
c gāvo mām upatiṣṭhantām iti nityaṃ prakīrtayet
a nātaḥ puṇyataraṃ dānaṃ nātaḥ puṇyataraṃ phalam
c nāto viśiṣṭaṃ lokeṣu bhūtaṃ bhavitum arhati
a tvacā lomnātha śṛṅgaiś ca vālaiḥ kṣīreṇa medasā
c yajñaṃ vahanti saṃbhūya kim asty abhyadhikaṃ tataḥ
a yayā sarvam idaṃ vyāptaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
c tāṃ dhenuṃ śirasā vande bhūtabhavyasya mātaram
a guṇavacanasamuccayaikadeśo
nṛvara mayaiṣa gavāṃ prakīrtitas te
c na hi param iha dānam asti gobhyo
bhavanti na cāpi parāyaṇaṃ tathānyat
 bhīṣma uvāca
a param idam iti bhūmipo vicintya
pravaram ṛṣer vacanaṃ tato mahātmā
c vyasṛjata niyatātmavān dvijebhyaḥ
subahu ca godhanam āptavāṃś ca lokān
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a pavitrāṇāṃ pavitraṃ yac chreṣṭhaṃ loke ca yad bhavet
c pāvanaṃ paramaṃ caiva tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a gāvo mahārthāḥ puṇyāś ca tārayanti ca mānavān
c dhārayanti prajāś cemāḥ payasā haviṣā tathā
a na hi puṇyatamaṃ kiṃ cid gobhyo bharatasattama
c etāḥ pavitrāḥ puṇyāś ca triṣu lokeṣv anuttamāḥ
a devānām upariṣṭāc ca gāvaḥ prativasanti vai
c dattvā caitā narapate yānti svargaṃ manīṣiṇaḥ
a māndhātā yauvanāśvaś ca yayātir nahuṣas tathā
c gāvo dadantaḥ satataṃ sahasraśatasaṃmitāḥ
e gatāḥ paramakaṃ sthānaṃ devair api sudurlabham
a api cātra purāvṛttaṃ kathayiṣyāmi te 'nagha
b saurabhyaḥ puṇyakarmāṇaḥ pāvakāḥ śubhadarśanāḥ
b yadarthaṃ gośatāś caiva saurabhyaḥ surasattama
b tac ca me śṛṇu kārtsnyena vadato hy arisūdana
b purā devayuge tāta daityendreṣu mahātmasu
a ṛṣīṇām uttamaṃ dhīmān kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ śukaḥ
c abhivādyāhnikaṃ kṛtvā śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ
e pitaraṃ paripapraccha dṛṣṭalokaparāvaram
a ko yajñaḥ sarvayajñānāṃ variṣṭha upalakṣyate
c kiṃ ca kṛtvā paraṃ svargaṃ prāpnuvanti manīṣiṇaḥ
a kena devāḥ pavitreṇa svargam aśnanti vā vibho
c kiṃ ca yajñasya yajñatvaṃ kva ca yajñaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
a dānānām uttamaṃ kiṃ ca kiṃ ca satram ataḥ param
c pavitrāṇāṃ pavitraṃ ca yat tad brūhi mamānagha
a etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ vyāsaḥ paramadharmavit
c putrāyākathayat sarvaṃ tattvena bharatarṣabha
 vyāsa uvāca
a gāvaḥ pratiṣṭhā bhūtānāṃ tathā gāvaḥ parāyaṇam
c gāvaḥ puṇyāḥ pavitrāś ca pāvanaṃ dharma eva ca
a pūrvam āsannaśṛṅgā vai gāva ity anuśuśrumaḥ
b tāḥ kila śṛṅgam ākāṅkṣan varṣātapanivāraṇam
b mānuṣīṃ ca tvacaṃ gurvīṃ śītavātātapāsahām
b vastrāvaraṇagocarmam avirodhaḥ parasparam
b tato brahmā dadau tāsāṃ manasā dhāritāṃ parām
c śṛṅgārthe samupāsanta tāḥ kila prabhum avyayam
a tato brahmā tu gāḥ prāyam upaviṣṭāḥ samīkṣya ha
c īpsitaṃ pradadau tābhyo gobhyaḥ pratyekaśaḥ prabhuḥ
d āhūya manujaṃ prāha goṣu svāṃ tanum ādadhaḥ
d ācchādanaṃ cāvaraṇaṃ yūyaṃ gṛhṇīta mānavāḥ
d śītavātātapaṃ yena dhārayanti prajārthinaḥ
d sukumāratvacaṃ yūyaṃ vastrair ācchādayiṣyatha
d evam astv iti tāḥ prādāt tvacaṃ svāṃ carma eva ca
a tāsāṃ śṛṅgāṇy ajāyanta yasyā yādṛṅ manogatam
c nānāvarṇāḥ śṛṅgavantyas tā vyarocanta putraka
a brahmaṇā varadattās tā havyakavyapradāḥ śubhāḥ
c puṇyāḥ pavitrāḥ subhagā divyasaṃsthānalakṣaṇāḥ
e gāvas tejo mahad divyaṃ gavāṃ dānaṃ praśasyate
a ye caitāḥ saṃprayacchanti sādhavo vītamatsarāḥ
c te vai sukṛtinaḥ proktāḥ sarvadānapradāś ca te
e gavāṃ lokaṃ tathā puṇyam āpnuvanti ca te 'nagha
a yatra vṛkṣā madhuphalā divyapuṣpaphalopagāḥ
c puṣpāṇi ca sugandhīni divyāni dvijasattama
d phalāni ca rasāḍhyāni mṛdūni rucirāṇi ca
a sarvā maṇimayī bhūmiḥ sūkṣmakāñcanavālukā
c sarvatra sukhasaṃsparśā niṣpaṅkā nīrajā śubhā
a raktotpalavanaiś caiva maṇidaṇḍair hiraṇmayaiḥ
c taruṇādityasaṃkāśair bhānti tatra jalāśayāḥ
a mahārhamaṇipatraiś ca kāñcanaprabhakesaraiḥ
c nīlotpalavimiśraiś ca sarobhir bahupaṅkajaiḥ
a karavīravanaiḥ phullaiḥ sahasrāvartasaṃvṛtaiḥ
c saṃtānakavanaiḥ phullair vṛkṣaiś ca samalaṃkṛtāḥ
a nirmalābhiś ca muktābhir maṇibhiś ca mahādhanaiḥ
c uddhūtapulinās tatra jātarūpaiś ca nimnagāḥ
a sarvaratnamayaiś citrair avagāḍhā nagottamaiḥ
c jātarūpamayaiś cānyair hutāśanasamaprabhaiḥ
a sauvarṇagirayas tatra maṇiratnaśiloccayāḥ
c sarvaratnamayair bhānti śṛṅgaiś cārubhir ucchritaiḥ
a nityapuṣpaphalās tatra nagāḥ patrarathākulāḥ
c divyagandharasaiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalaiś ca bharatarṣabha
a ramante puṇyakarmāṇas tatra nityaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c sarvakāmasamṛddhārthā niḥśokā gatamanyavaḥ
a vimāneṣu vicitreṣu ramaṇīyeṣu bhārata
c modante puṇyakarmāṇo viharanto yaśasvinaḥ
a upakrīḍanti tān rājañ śubhāś cāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
c etāṃl lokān avāpnoti gāṃ dattvā vai yudhiṣṭhira
d apsarobhiś ca sahito bhāti vai goprado naraḥ
a yāsām adhipatiḥ pūṣā māruto balavān balī
c aiśvarye varuṇo rājā tā māṃ pāntu yugaṃdharāḥ
a surūpā bahurūpāś ca viśvarūpāś ca mātaraḥ
c prājāpatyā iti brahmañ japen nityaṃ yatavrataḥ
a gās tu śuśrūṣate yaś ca samanveti ca sarvaśaḥ
c tasmai tuṣṭāḥ prayacchanti varān api sudurlabhān
a na druhyen manasā cāpi goṣu tā hi sukhapradāḥ
c arcayeta sadā caiva namaskāraiś ca pūjayet
e dāntaḥ prītamanā nityaṃ gavāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ tathāśnute
a yena devāḥ pavitreṇa bhuñjate lokam uttamam
c yat pavitraṃ pavitrāṇāṃ tad ghṛtaṃ śirasā vahet
a ghṛtena juhuyād agniṃ ghṛtena svasti vācayet
c ghṛtaṃ prāśed ghṛtaṃ dadyād gavāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ tathāśnute
a tryaham uṣṇaṃ piben mūtraṃ tryaham uṣṇaṃ pibet payaḥ
c gavām uṣṇaṃ payaḥ pītvā tryaham uṣṇaṃ ghṛtaṃ pibet
e tryaham uṣṇaṃ ghṛtaṃ pītvā vāyubhakṣo bhavet tryaham
a nirhṛtaiś ca yavair gobhir māsaṃ prasṛtayāvakaḥ
c brahmahatyāsamaṃ pāpaṃ sarvam etena śudhyati
a parābhavārthaṃ daityānāṃ devaiḥ śaucam idaṃ kṛtam
c devatvam api ca prāptāḥ saṃsiddhāś ca mahābalāḥ
a gāvaḥ pavitrāḥ puṇyāś ca pāvanaṃ paramaṃ mahat
c tāś ca dattvā dvijātibhyo naraḥ svargam upāśnute
a gavāṃ madhye śucir bhūtvā gomatīṃ manasā japet
c pūtābhir adbhir ācamya śucir bhavati nirmalaḥ
a agnimadhye gavāṃ madhye brāhmaṇānāṃ ca saṃsadi
c vidyāvedavratasnātā brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyakarmiṇaḥ
a adhyāpayerañ śiṣyān vai gomatīṃ yajñasaṃmitām
c trirātropoṣitaḥ śrutvā gomatīṃ labhate varam
a putrakāmaś ca labhate putraṃ dhanam athāpi ca
c patikāmā ca bhartāraṃ sarvakāmāṃś ca mānavaḥ
e gāvas tuṣṭāḥ prayacchanti sevitā vai na saṃśayaḥ
a evam etā mahābhāgā yajñiyāḥ sarvakāmadāḥ
c rohiṇya iti jānīhi naitābhyo vidyate param
a ity uktaḥ sa mahātejāḥ śukaḥ pitrā mahātmanā
c pūjayām āsa gā nityaṃ tasmāt tvam api pūjaya
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ ca pitāmaha
d prabhuḥ sraṣṭā ca bhagavān munibhiḥ stūyate vibhuḥ
d tasyopari kathaṃ hy eṣa golokaḥ sthānatāṃ gataḥ
d saṃśayo me mahān eṣa tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
d bhīṣmaḥ
d manovāgbuddhayas tāvad ekasthāḥ kurusattama
d tato me śṛṇu kārtsnyena gomahābhāgyam uttamam
d puṇyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ tathā svastyayanaṃ mahat
d kīrtir viharatāṃ loke gavāṃ yogeṣu bhaktimān
d śrūyate hi purāṇeṣu maharṣīṇāṃ mahātmanām
d saṃsthāne sarvalokānāṃ devānāṃ cāpi saṃbhave
d devatārthe 'mṛtārthe ca yajñārthe caiva bhārata
d surabhir nāma vikhyātā rohiṇī kāmarūpiṇī
d saṃkalpya manasā pūrvaṃ rohiṇī hy amṛtānanā
d ghoraṃ tapaḥ samāsthāya nirmitā viśvakarmaṇā
d puruṣaṃ cāsṛjad bhūyas tejasā tapasā ca ha
d dedīpyamānaṃ vapuṣā samiddham iva pāvakam
d so 'paśyad divyarūpāṃ tāṃ surabhiṃ rohiṇīṃ tadā
d dṛṣṭvaiva cātivimanāḥ so 'bhavat kāmamohitaḥ
d taṃ kāmārtam atho jñātvā svayaṃbhūr lokabhāvanaḥ
d mārto bhava tathā caiṣa bhagavān abhyabhāṣata
d tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tatra mārtāṇḍa iti viśrutaḥ
d cakāra nāma taṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyārtībhāvam uttamam
d so 'dadād bhagavāṃs tasmai mārtāṇḍāya mahātmane
d surūpāṃ surabhiṃ kanyāṃ tapas tejomayīṃ śubhām
d yathā mayaiṣa codbhūtas tvaṃ caiveṣā ca rohiṇī
d maithunaṃ gatavantau ca tathā cotpatsyati prajā
d prajā bhaviṣyate puṇyā pavitraṃ paramaṃ ca vām
d na cāpy agamyāgamanād doṣaṃ prāpsyasi karhi cit
d tvatprajāsaṃbhavaṃ kṣīraṃ bhaviṣyati paraṃ haviḥ
d yajñeṣu cājyabhāgānāṃ tvatprajāmūlajo vidhiḥ
d prajāśuśrūṣavaś caiva ye bhaviṣyanti rohiṇi
d tava tenaiva puṇyena golokaṃ yāntu mānavāḥ
d idaṃ pavitraṃ paramam ṛṣabhaṃ nāma karhi cit
d yad vai jñātvā dvijā loke mokṣyante yonisaṃkarāt
d etatkriyāḥ prapatsyante mantrabrāhmaṇasaṃskṛtāḥ
d devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca havyakavyapurogamāḥ
d tata etena puṇyena prajās tava tu rohiṇi
d ūrdhvaṃ mamāpi lokasya vatsyante nirupadravāḥ
d bhadraṃ tebhyaś ca bhadraṃ te ye prajāsu bhavanti vai
d yugaṃdharāś ca te putrāḥ santu lokasya dhāraṇe
d yān yān kāmayase lokāṃs tāṃl lokān anuyāsyasi
d sarvadevagaṇāś caiva tava yāsyanti putratām
d tava stanasamudbhūtaṃ pibanto 'mṛtam uttamam
d evam etān varān sarvān agṛhṇāt surabhis tadā
d bruvataḥ sarvalokeśān nirvṛtiṃ cāgamat parām
d sṛṣṭvā prajāś ca vipulā lokasaṃdhāraṇāya vai
d brahmaṇā samanujñātā surabhir lokam āviśat
d evaṃ varapradānena svayaṃbhor eva bhārata
d upariṣṭād gavāṃ lokaṃ proktaṃ te sarvam āditaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d surabheḥ kāḥ prajāḥ pūrvaṃ mārtāṇḍād abhavan purā
d bhīṣmaḥ
d etan me śaṃsa tattvena goṣu me prīyate manaḥ
d śṛṇu nāmāni divyāni gomātṝṇāṃ viśeṣataḥ
d yābhir vyāptās trayo lokāḥ kalyāṇābhir janādhipa
d surabhyaḥ prathamodbhūtā yāś ca syuḥ prathamāḥ prajāḥ
d mayocyamānāḥ śṛṇu tāḥ prāpsyase vipulaṃ yaśaḥ
d taptvā tapo ghoratapāḥ surabhir dīptatejasī
d suṣāvaikādaśa sutān rudrā ye chandasi stutāḥ
d ajaikapād ahirbudhnyas tryambakaś ca mahāyaśāḥ
d vṛṣākapiś ca śaṃbhuś ca kapālī raivatas tathā
d haraś ca bahurūpaś ca ugra ugro 'tha vīryavān
d tasya caivātmajaḥ śrīmān viśvarūpo mahāyaśāḥ
d ekādaśaite kathitā rudrās te nāma nāmataḥ
d mahātmāno mahāyogās tejoyuktā mahābalāḥ
d ete variṣṭhajanmāno devānāṃ brahmavādinām
d viprāṇāṃ prakṛtir loke eta eva hi viśrutāḥ
d eta ekādaśa proktā rudrās tribhuvaneśvarāḥ
d śataṃ tv etat samākhyātaṃ śatarudraṃ mahātmanām
d suṣuve prathamāṃ kanyāṃ surabhiḥ pṛthivīṃ tadā
d viśvakāmadughā dhenur yā dhārayati dehinaḥ
d sutaṃ gobrāhmaṇaṃ rājann ekam ity abhidhīyate
d gobrāhmaṇasya jananī surabhiḥ parikīrtyate
d sṛṣṭvā tu prathamaṃ rudrān varadān brahmasaṃbhavān
d paścāt prabhuṃ grahapatiṃ suṣuve lokasaṃmatam
d somarājānam amṛtaṃ yajñasarvasvam uttamam
d oṣadhīnāṃ rasānāṃ ca devānāṃ jīvitasya ca
d tataḥ śriyaṃ ca medhāṃ ca kīrtiṃ devīṃ sarasvatīm
d catasraḥ suṣuve kanyā yogeṣu niyatāḥ sthitāḥ
d etāḥ sṛṣṭvā prajā eṣā surabhiḥ kāmarūpiṇī
d suṣuve caramaṃ bhūyo divyā gomātaraḥ śubhāḥ
d puṇyāṃ māyāṃ madhuścyotāṃ śivāṃ śīghrāṃ saridvarām
d hiraṇyavarṇāṃ subhagāṃ gavyāṃ pṛśnīṃ kuthāvatīm
d aṅgāvatīṃ ghṛtavatīṃ dadhikṣīrapayovatīm
d amoghāṃ surasāṃ satyāṃ revatīṃ mārutīṃ rasām
d ajāṃ ca sikatāṃ caiva śuddhadhūmām adhāriṇīm
d jīvāṃ prāṇavatīṃ dhanyāṃ śuddhāṃ dhenuṃ dhanāvahām
d indrām ṛddhiṃ ca śāntiṃ ca śāntapāpāṃ saridvarām
d catvāriṃśatam ekāṃ ca dhanyās tā divi pūjitāḥ
d bhūyo jajñe surabhyāś ca śrīmāṃś candrāṃśusaprabhaḥ
d vṛṣo dakṣa iti khyātaḥ kaṇṭhe maṇitalaprabhaḥ
d sragvī kakudmān dyutimān mṛṇālasadṛśaprabhaḥ
d surabhyanumate datto dhvajo māheśvaras tu saḥ
d surabhyaḥ kāmarūpiṇyo gāvaḥ puṇyārtham uttamāḥ
d ādityebhyo vasubhyaś ca viśvebhyaś ca dadur varān
d surabhis tu tapas taptvā suṣuve gās tataḥ punaḥ
d yā dattā lokapālānām indrādīnāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
d suṣṭutāṃ kapilāṃ caiva rohiṇīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
d sarvakāmadughāṃ caiva marutāṃ kāmarūpiṇīm
d gāvo mṛṣṭadughā hy etāś catasro 'mṛtasaṃskṛtāḥ
d yāsāṃ bhūtvā purā vatsāḥ pibanty amṛtam uttamam
d suṣṭutāṃ devarājāya vāsavāya mahātmane
d kapilāṃ dharmarājāya varuṇāya ca rohiṇīm
d sarvakāmadughāṃ dhenuṃ rājñe vaiśravaṇāya ca
d ity etā lokam ahitā viśrutāḥ surabheḥ prajāḥ
d etāsāṃ prajayā pūrṇā pṛthivī munipuṃgava
d gobhyaḥ prabhavate sarvaṃ yat kiṃ cid iha śobhanam
d surabhyapatyam ity etan nāmatas te 'nupūrvaśaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d kīrtitaṃ brūhi rājendra kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmi te
d surabhyās tu tadā devyāḥ kīrtir lakṣmīḥ sarasvatī
d medhā ca pravarā devī yāś catasro 'bhiviśrutāḥ
d pṛthag gobhyaḥ kim etāḥ syur utāho goṣu saṃśritāḥ
d bhīṣmaḥ
d devāḥ ke vāśritā goṣu tan me brūhi pitāmaha
d yaṃ devaṃ saṃśritā gāvas taṃ devaṃ devasaṃjñitam
d yad yad devāśritaṃ daivaṃ tat tad daivaṃ dvijā viduḥ
d sarveṣām eva devānāṃ pūrvaṃ kila samudbhave
d indraḥ
d amṛtārthe surapatiḥ surabhiṃ samupasthitaḥ
d iccheyam amṛtaṃ dattaṃ tvayā devi rasādhikam
d tvatprasādāc chivaṃ mahyam amaratvaṃ bhaved iti
d surabhiḥ
d vatso bhūtvā surapate pibasva prasnavaṃ mama
d tato 'maratvam api tat sthānam aindram avāpsyasi
d na ca te vṛtrahan yuddhe vyathāribhyo bhaviṣyati
d balārtham ātmanaḥ śakra prasnavaṃ piba me vibho
d bhīṣmaḥ
d tato 'dhayat stanaṃ tasyāḥ surabhyāḥ surasattamaḥ
d amaratvaṃ surūpatvaṃ balaṃ ca padam uttamam
d puraṃdaro 'mṛtaṃ pītvā prahṛṣṭaḥ samupasthitaḥ
d putro 'haṃ tava bhadraṃ te brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
d surabhiḥ
d kṛtaṃ putra tvayā sarvam upayāhi triviṣṭapam
d pālayasva surān sarvāñ jahi ye suraśatravaḥ
d na ca gobrāhmaṇe 'vajñā kāryā te śāntim icchatā
d gobrāhmaṇasya niḥśvāsaḥ śoṣayed api devatāḥ
d gobrāhmaṇapriyo nityaṃ svastiśabdam udāharan
d pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca nākapṛṣṭhe ca vikramet
d yac ca te 'nyad bhavet kṛtyaṃ tan me brūyāḥ samāsataḥ
d tat te sarvaṃ kariṣyāmi satyenaitad bravīmi te
d indraḥ
d iccheyaṃ goṣu niyataṃ vastuṃ devi bravīmi te
d surabhiḥ
d ebhiḥ suragaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ mamānugraham ācara
d gavāṃ śarīraṃ pratyakṣam etat kauśika lakṣaye
d yo yatrotsahate vastuṃ sa tatra vasatāṃ suraḥ
d sarvaṃ pavitraṃ paramaṃ gavāṃ gātraṃ supūjitam
d bhīṣmaḥ
d tathā kuruṣva bhadraṃ te yathā tvaṃ śakra manyase
d tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā surabhyāḥ surasattamaḥ
d saha sarvaiḥ suragaṇair abhajat saurabhīṃ prajām
d śṛṅge vaktre ca jihvāyāṃ devarājaḥ samāviśat
d sarvacchidreṣu pavanaḥ pādeṣu marutāṃ gaṇāḥ
d kakudaṃ sarvago rudraḥ kukṣau caiva hutāśanaḥ
d sarasvatī staneṣv agryā śrīḥ purīṣe jagatpriyā
d mūtre kīrtiḥ sumahatī medhā payasi śāśvatī
d vaktre somaś ca vai devo hṛdaye bhagavān yamaḥ
d dharmaḥ pucche kriyā lomni bhāskaraś cakṣuṣī śritaḥ
d siddhāḥ saṃdhiṣu siddhiś ca tapas tejaś ca ceṣṭane
d evaṃ sarve suragaṇā niyatā gātravartmasu
d mahatī devatā gāvo brāhmaṇaiḥ parisaṃskṛtāḥ
d gām āśrayanti sahitā devā hi prabhaviṣṇavaḥ
d kim anyat sarvakāmena na vidadhyād bhavān priyam
d bhāvataḥ parayā bhaktyā pūjayasva nareśvara
d gāvas tu paramaṃ loke pavitraṃ pāvanaṃ haviḥ
d nipātya bhakṣitaḥ svargād bhārgavaḥ phenapaḥ kila
d sa ca prāṇān punar labdhvā tato golokam āśritaḥ
dA yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
dA kaḥ phenapeti nāmnāsau kathaṃ vā bhakṣitaḥ purā
dA mṛta ujjīvitaḥ kasmāt kathaṃ golokam āśritaḥ
dA viruddhe mānuṣe loke tathā samayavartmasu
dA ṛte daivaṃ hi duṣprāpaṃ mānuṣeṣu viśeṣataḥ
dA bhīṣmaḥ
dA saṃśayo me mahān atra tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
dA śrūyate bhārgave vaṃśe sumitro nāma bhārata
dA vedādhyayanasaṃpanno vipule tapasi sthitaḥ
dA vānaprasthāśrame yuktaḥ svakarmanirataḥ sadā
dA vinayācāratattvajñaḥ sarvadharmārthakovidaḥ
dA yattas triṣavaṇasnāyī saṃdhyopāsanatatparaḥ
dA agnihotrarataḥ kṣānto japañ juhvac ca nityadā
dA pitṝn devāṃś ca niyatam atithīṃś caiva pūjayan
dA prāṇasaṃdhāraṇārthaṃ ca yat kiṃ cid upahārayan
dA giris triśikharo nāma yataḥ prabhavate nadī
dA kulaheti purāṇeṣu viśrutā rudranirmitā
dA tasyās tīre same deśe puṣpamālāsamākule
dA vanyauṣadhidrumopete nānāpakṣimṛgāyute
dA vyapetadaṃśamaśake dhvāṅkṣagṛdhrair asevite
dA kṛṣṇadarbhatṛṇaprāye suramye jyotiraśmini
dA sarvonnataiḥ samaiḥ śyāmair yājñīyais tarubhir vṛte
dA tatrāśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ bhṛgūṇām abhavat purā
dA uvāsa tatra niyataḥ sumitro nāma bhārgavaḥ
dA yathoddiṣṭena pūrveṣāṃ bhṛgūṇāṃ sādhuvartmanām
dA tasmā āṅgirasaḥ kaś cid dadau gāṃ śarkarīṃ śubhām
dA varṣāsu paścime māsi paurṇamāsyāṃ śucivrataḥ
dA sa tāṃ labdhvā dharmaśīlaś cintayām āsa tatparaḥ
dA sumitraḥ parayā bhaktyā jananīm iva mātaram
dA tena saṃdhukṣyamāṇā sā rohiṇī kāmacāriṇī
dA vivṛddhim agamac chreṣṭhā prāṇataś ca sudarśanā
dA sirāvimuktapārśvāntā vipulāṃ kāntim udvahat
dA śyāmapārśvāntapṛṣṭhāntā surabhir madhupiṅgalā
dA bṛhatī sūkṣmaromāntā rūpodagrā tanutvacā
dA kṛṣṇapucchā śvetavaktrā samavṛttapayodharā
dA pṛṣṭhonnatā pūrvanatā śaṅkukarṇī sulocanā
dA dīrghajihvā hrasvaśṛṅgī saṃpūrṇadaśanāntarā
dA māṃsādhikagalāntā sā prasannā śubhadarśanā
dA nityaṃ śamayutā snigdhā saṃpūrṇodāttanisvanā
dA prājāpatyair gavāṃ nityaṃ praśastair lakṣaṇair yutā
dA yauvanastheva vanitā śuśubhe rūpaśobhayā
dA vṛṣeṇopagatā sā tu kalyā madhuradarśanā
dA mithunaṃ janayām āsa tulyarūpam ivātmanaḥ
dA saṃvardhayām āsa sa tāṃ savatsāṃ bhārgavo ṛṣiḥ
dA tayoḥ prajādhisaṃsargāt sahasraṃ ca gavām abhūt
dA gavāṃ jātisahasrāṇi saṃbhūtāni parasparam
dA ṛṣabhāṇāṃ ca rājendra naivāntaḥ pratidṛśyate
dA tair āśramapadaṃ ramyam araṇyaṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ
dA samākulaṃ samabhavan meghair iva nabhaḥsthalam
dA kāni cit padmavarṇāni kiṃśukābhāni kāni cit
dA rukmavarṇāni cānyāni candrāṃśusadṛśāni ca
dA tathā rājatavarṇāni kāni cil lohitāni vai
dA nīlalohitatāmrāṇi kṛṣṇāni kapilāni ca
dA nānārāgavicitrāṇi yūthāni bahulāni ca
dA na ca kṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ snehād vatsānām upajīvati
dA bhārgavaḥ kevalaṃ cāsīd gavāṃ prāṇāyane rataḥ
dA tathā śuśrūṣatas tasya gavāṃ hitam avekṣataḥ
dA vyatīyāt sumahān kālo vatsocchiṣṭena vartataḥ
dA kṣutpipāsāpariśrāntaḥ satataṃ prasnavaṃ gavām
dA vatsair ucchiṣṭamuditaṃ bahukṣīratayā bahu
dA pītavāṃs tena nāmāsya phenapety abhiviśrutam
dA bhīṣmaḥ
dA gautamasyābhiniṣpannam evaṃ nāma yudhiṣṭhira
dA kadā cit kāmarūpiṇyo gāvaḥ strīveṣam āsthitāḥ
dA hrade krīḍanti saṃhṛṣṭā gāyantyaḥ puṇyalakṣaṇāḥ
dA dadṛśus tasya gāvo vai vismayotphullalocanāḥ
dA striyaḥ
dA ūcuś ca kā yūyam iti striyo mānuṣayā girā
dA gāva eva vayaṃ sarvāḥ karmabhiḥ śobhanair yutāḥ
dA sarvāḥ strīveṣadhāriṇyo yathākāmaṃ carāmahe
dA gāvaḥ
dA gavāṃ gāvaḥ paraṃ daivaṃ gavāṃ gāvaḥ parā gatiḥ
dA striyaḥ
dA kathayadhvam ihāsmākaṃ kena vaḥ sukṛtāṃ gatiḥ
dA asmākaṃ haviṣā devā brāhmaṇās tarpitās tathā
dA kavyena pitaraś caiva havyenāgniś ca tarpitaḥ
dA prajayā ca tathāsmākaṃ kṛṣir abhyuddhṛtā sadā
dA śakaṭaiś cāpi saṃyuktā daśavāhaśatena vai
dA tad etaiḥ sukṛtaiḥ sphītair vayaṃ yāś caiva naḥ prajāḥ
dA golokam anusaṃprāptā yaḥ paraḥ kāmagocaraḥ
dA yūyaṃ tu sarvā rohiṇyaḥ saprajāḥ sahapuṃgavāḥ
dA gāvaḥ
dA adhogāminya ity eva paśyāmo divyacakṣuṣā
dA evaṃ gavāṃ paraṃ daivaṃ gāva eva parāyaṇam
dA svapakṣyās tāraṇīyā vaḥ śaraṇāya gatā vayam
dA kim asmābhiḥ karaṇīyaṃ vartitavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
dA striyaḥ
dA prāpnuyāma ca golokaṃ bhavāma na ca garhitāḥ
dA vartate rantidevasya satraṃ varṣasahasrakam
dA tatra tasya nṛpasyāśu paśutvam upagacchata
dA tatas tasyopayogena paśutve yajñasaṃskṛtāḥ
dA bhīṣmaḥ
dA golokān prāpsyatha śubhāṃs tena puṇyena saṃyutāḥ
dA etat tāsāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā gavāṃ saṃhṛṣṭamānasāḥ
dA gamanāya manaś cakrur autsukyaṃ cāgaman param
dA na hi no bhārgavo dātā paśutvenopayojanam
dA yajñas tasya narendrasya vartate dharmatas tathā
dA vayaṃ na cānanujñātāḥ śaktā gantuṃ kathaṃ cana
dA avocann atha tatratyā bhārgavo vadhyatām ayam
dA etat sarvā rocayata na hi śakyam ato 'nyathā
dA lokān prāptuṃ sahāsmābhir niścayaḥ kriyatām ayam
dA na tu tāsāṃ sametānāṃ kā cid ghoreṇa cakṣuṣā
dA śaknoti bhārgavaṃ draṣṭuṃ satkṛtenopasaṃyutā
dA atha padmasavarṇābhā bhāskarāṃśusamaprabhāḥ
dA japālohitatāmrākṣyo nirmāṃsakaṭhinānanāḥ
dA rohiṇyaḥ kapilāḥ prāhuḥ sarvāsāṃ vai samakṣataḥ
dA meghastanitanirghoṣās tejobhir abhirañjitāḥ
dA vayaṃ hi taṃ vadhiṣyāmaḥ sumitraṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
dA gāvaḥ
dA sukṛtaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā kiṃ naḥ śreyo vidhāsyatha
dA kapilāḥ sarvavarṇeṣu pradhānatvam avāpsyatha
dA bhīṣmaḥ
dA gavāṃ śataphalāc caikāṃ dattvā phalam avāpsyati
dA etad gavāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā kapilā hṛṣṭamānasāḥ
dA bhīṣmaḥ
dA cakruḥ sarvā bhārgavasya sumitrasya vadhe matim
dA yās tu gomātaras tasya kāmacāriṇya āgatāḥ
dA samīpaṃ hi sumitrasya kṛtajñāḥ samupasthitāḥ
dA abhipraśasya caivāhus tam ṛṣiṃ puṇyadarśanāḥ
dA golokād āgatā veda ṛṣe gomātaro vayam
dA suprītāḥ sma varaṃ gṛhṇa yam icchasi mahāmune
dA sumitraḥ
dA yad dhi goṣu parāṃ buddhiṃ kṛtavān asi nityadā
dA prīto 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yan māṃ gomātaraḥ śubhāḥ
dA suprītamanasaḥ sarvās tiṣṭhante ca varapradāḥ
dA bhaved goṣv eva me bhaktir yathaivādya tathā sadā
dA gomātaraḥ
dA goghnāś caivāvasīdantu narā brahmadviṣaś ca ye
dA evam etad ṛṣiśreṣṭha hitaṃ vadasi naḥ priyam
dA sumitraḥ
dA ehi gaccha sahāsmābhir golokam ṛṣisattama
dA yūyam iṣṭāṃ gatiṃ yāntu na hy ahaṃ gantum utsahe
dA bhīṣmaḥ
dA imā gāvaḥ samutsṛjya tapasvinyo mama priyāḥ
dA tās tu tasya vacaḥ śrutvā kapilānāṃ sudāruṇam
dA ninyus tam ṛṣim utkṣipya bhārgavaṃ nabha udvahan
dA kalevaraṃ tu tatraiva tasya saṃnyasya mātaraḥ
dA niṣkṛṣya karaṇaṃ yogād anayan bhārgavasya vai
dA sarvaṃ cāsya tadācakhyuḥ kapilānāṃ viceṣṭitam
dA yadarthaṃ haraṇaṃ gobhir golokaṃ lokamātaraḥ
dA tatas tu kapilās tatra tasya dṛṣṭvā kalevaram
dA yathāpratijñaṃ śṛṅgaiś ca khuraiś cāpy avacūrṇayan
dA tataḥ saṃchidya bahudhā bhārgavaṃ nṛpasattama
dA yayur yatretarā gāvas tac ca sarvaṃ nyavedayan
dA atha gomātṛbhiḥ śaptās tā gāvaḥ pṛthivīcarāḥ
dA amedhyavadanāḥ kṣipraṃ bhavadhvaṃ brahmaghātakāḥ
dA evaṃ kṛtajñā gāvo hi yathā gomātaro nṛpa
dA ṛṣiś ca prāptavāṃl lokaṃ gāvaś ca parimokṣitāḥ
dA bhīṣmaḥ
dA tā gāvo rantidevasya gatvā yajñaṃ manīṣiṇaḥ
dA ātmānaṃ jñāpayām āsur maharṣīṇāṃ samakṣataḥ
dA rantidevas tato rājā prayataḥ prāñjaliḥ śuciḥ
dA uvāca gāvaḥ praṇataḥ kim āgamanam ity api
dA gāvaḥ
dA icchāmas tava rājendra satre 'smin viniyojanam
dA rantidevaḥ
dA paśutvam upasaṃprāptuṃ prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
dA nāsmi śakto gavāṃ ghātaṃ kartuṃ śatasahasraśaḥ
dA ghātayitvā tv ahaṃ yuṣmān katham ātmānam uddhare
dA yaḥ paśutvena saṃyojya yuṣmān svargaṃ nayed iha
dA gāvaḥ
dA ātmānaṃ caiva tapasā gāvaḥ samupagamyatām
dA asmākaṃ tāraṇe yukto dharmātmā tapasi sthitaḥ
dA rantidevaḥ
dA śruto 'smābhir bhavān rājaṃs tatas tu svayam āgatāḥ
dA mama satre paśutvaṃ vo yady evaṃ hi manīṣitam
dA samayenāham etena juhuyāṃ vo hutāśane
dA kadā cid yadi vaḥ kā cid akāmā viniyujyate
dA gāvaḥ
dA tadā samāptiḥ satrasya gavāṃ syād iti naiṣṭhikī
dA evam astu mahārāja yathā tvaṃ prabravīṣi naḥ
dA akāmāḥ syur yadā gāvas tadā satraṃ samāpyatām
dA bhīṣmaḥ
dA tataḥ pravṛtte gosatre rantidevasya dhīmataḥ
dA gosahasrāṇy aharahar niyujyante śamitṛbhiḥ
dA evaṃ bahūni varṣāṇi vyatītāni narādhipa
dA gavāṃ vai vadhyamānānāṃ na cāntaḥ pratyadṛśyata
dA gavāṃ carmasahasrais tu rāśayaḥ parvatopamāḥ
dA babhūvuḥ kuruśārdūla bahudhā meghasaṃnibhāḥ
dA medaḥkledavahā caiva prāvartata mahānadī
dA adyāpi bhuvi vikhyātā nadī carmaṇvatī śubhā
dA tataḥ kadā cit svaṃ vatsaṃ gaur upāmantrya duḥkhitā
dA ehi vatsa stanaṃ pāhi mā tvaṃ paścāt kṣudhārditaḥ
dA tapsyase vimanā duḥkhaṃ ghātitāyāṃ mayi dhruvam
dA ete hy āyānti caṇḍālāḥ saśastrā māṃ jighāṃsavaḥ
dA atha śuśrāva tāṃ vāṇīṃ mānuṣīṃ samudāhṛtām
dA rantidevo mahārāja tatas tāṃ samavārayat
dA sthāpayām āsa gosatram atha taṃ pārthivarṣabha
dA satrotsṛṣṭāḥ parityaktā gāvo 'nyāḥ samupāśritāḥ
dA yās tasya rājño nihatā gāvo yajñe mahātmanaḥ
dA tā golokam upājagmuḥ prokṣitā brahmavādibhiḥ
dA rantidevo 'pi rājarṣir iṣṭvā yajñaṃ yathāvidhi
dA tataḥ sakhyaṃ surapates tridivaṃ cākṣayaṃ yayau
dA phenapo divi goloke mumude śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
dA avaśiṣṭāś ca yā gāvas tā babhūvur vanecarāḥ
dA phenapākhyānam etat te gavāṃ māhātmyam eva ca
dA kathitaṃ pāvanaṃ puṇyaṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyaneritam
dA nārāyaṇo 'pi bhagavān dṛṣṭvā goṣu paraṃ yaśaḥ
dA śuśrūṣāṃ paramāṃ cakre bhaktiṃ ca bharatarṣabha
dA tasmāt tvam api rājendra gā vai pūjaya bhārata
dA dvijebhyaś caiva satataṃ prayaccha kurusattama

dB bhīṣmaḥ
dB mahāvrataṃ mahābhāga tan me brūhi pitāmaha
dB atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
dB pituḥ putrasya saṃvādaṃ vyāsasya ca śukasya ca
dB ṛṣīṇām uttamaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ bhāvitātmānam acyutam
dB pāraṃparyaviśeṣajñaṃ sarvaśāstrārthakovidam
dB kṛtaśaucaḥ śukas tatra kṛtajapyaḥ kṛtāhnikaḥ
dB paraṃ niyamam āsthāya paraṃ dharmam upāśritaḥ
dB praṇamya śirasā vyāsaṃ sūkṣmatattvārthadarśinam
dB śukaḥ papraccha vai praśnaṃ dānadharmakutūhalaḥ
dB bahucitrāṇi dānāni bahuśaḥ śaṃsase mune
dB mahārthaṃ pāvanaṃ puṇyaṃ kiṃ svid dānaṃ mahāphalam
dB kena durgāṇi tarati kena lokān avāpnute
dB kena vā mahad āpnoti iha loke paratra ca
dB ke vā yajñasya voḍhāraḥ keṣu yajñaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
dB kiṃ ca yajñasya yajñatvaṃ kiṃ ca yajñasya bheṣajam
dB yajñānām uttamaṃ kiṃ ca tad bhavān prabravītu me
dB sa tasmai bhajamānāya jātakautūhalāya ca
dB vyāso vratanidhiḥ prāha gavām idam anuttamam
dB dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ loke śrutisukhāvaham
dB yat pavitraṃ pavitrāṇāṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam
dB sarvapāpapraśamanaṃ tat samāsena me śṛṇu
dB yad idaṃ tiṣṭhate loke jagat sthāvarajaṃgamam
dB gāvas tāḥ prāpya tiṣṭhanti goloke puṇyadarśanāḥ
dB mātaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ viśvasya jagataś ca ha
dB rudrāṇām atha sādhyānāṃ gāva eva tu mātaraḥ
dB rudrāṇāṃ mātaro hy etā ādityānāṃ svasā smṛtāḥ
dB vasūnāṃ ca duhitryas tā brahmasaṃtānamūlajāḥ
dB yāsām adhipatiḥ pūṣā maruto vālabandhanāḥ
dB aiśvaryaṃ varuṇo rājā viśvedevāḥ samāśritāḥ
dB ya evaṃ veda tā gāvo mātaro devapūjitāḥ
dB sa vipro brahmalokāya gavāṃ lokāya vā dhruvaḥ
dB gāvas tu nāvamanyeta karmaṇā manasā girā
dB gavāṃ sthānaṃ paraṃ loke prārthayed yaḥ parāṃ gatim
dB na padbhyāṃ tāḍayed gāvo na daṇḍena na muṣṭinā
dB imāṃ vidyām upāśritya pāvanīṃ brahmanirmitām
dB mātṝṇām anupāte ca na gomadhye na govraje
dB naro mūtrapurīṣasya dṛṣṭvā kuryād visarjanam
dB śuddhāś candanaśītāṅgyaś candraraśmisamaprabhāḥ
dB saumyāḥ surabhyaḥ subhagā gāvo guggulugandhayaḥ
dB sarve devāviśan gāvaḥ samudram iva sindhavaḥ
dB divaṃ caivāntarikṣaṃ ca gavāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ samaśnute
dB dadhinā juhuyād agniṃ dadhinā svasti vācayet
dB dadhi dadyāc ca prāśeta gavāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ samaśnute
dB ghṛtena juhuyād agniṃ ghṛtena svasti vācayet
dB ghṛtam ālabhya prāśnīyād gavāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ samaśnute
dB gāvaḥ saṃjīvanā yās tu gāvo dānam anuttamam
dB tāḥ puṇyagopāḥ suphalā bhajamānaṃ bhajantu mām
dB yena devāḥ pavitreṇa svargalokam ito gatāḥ
dB tat pavitraṃ pavitrāṇāṃ mama mūrdhni pratiṣṭhitam
dB vīṇāmṛdaṅgapaṇavā gavāṃ gātraṃ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
dB krīḍārativihārārthe triṣu lokeṣu vartate
dB na tatra devā vartante nāgnihotrāṇi juhvati
dB na yajñair ijyate cātra yatra gaur vai na duhyate
dB kṣīraṃ dadhi ghṛtaṃ yāsāṃ rasānām uttamo rasaḥ
dB amṛtaprabhavā gāvas trailokyaṃ yena jīvati
dB iḍām āhūya dhenuṃ ca savatsāṃ yajñamātaram

dB kapilatvaṃ ca saṃprāptāḥ pūjyāś ca satataṃ nṛṣu

dB vasantaś ca suparṇaś ca ekataḥ samajāyata
dB netrayoḥ kapilāṃ yas tu vāhayeta duheta vā

dB narakād vipramuktas tu tiryagyoniṃ niṣevate

dB śṛṅgayoḥ kapilāṃ yas tu vāhayeta duheta vā

dB khureṣu kapilāṃ yas tu vāhayeta duheta vā

dB varṇena kapilāṃ yas tu jānann apy upajīvati

dB ghrāṇena kapilāṃ yas tu pramādād upajīvati

dB madhusarpiḥsugandhās tu kapilāḥ śāstrataḥ smṛtāḥ

 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a mayā gavāṃ purīṣaṃ vai śriyā juṣṭam iti śrutam
c etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ saṃśayo 'tra hi me mahān
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c gobhir nṛpeha saṃvādaṃ śriyā bharatasattama
a śrīḥ kṛtveha vapuḥ kāntaṃ gomadhyaṃ praviveśa ha
c gāvo 'tha vismitās tasyā dṛṣṭvā rūpasya saṃpadam
 gāva ūcuḥ
a kāsi devi kuto vā tvaṃ rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi
c vismitāḥ sma mahābhāge tava rūpasya saṃpadā
a icchāmas tvāṃ vayaṃ jñātuṃ kā tvaṃ kva ca gamiṣyasi
c tattvena ca suvarṇābhe sarvam etad bravīhi naḥ
 śrīr uvāca
a lokakāntāsmi bhadraṃ vaḥ śrīr nāmneha pariśrutā
c mayā daityāḥ parityaktā vinaṣṭāḥ śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
d mayābhipannā devāś ca modante śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
a indro vivasvān somaś ca viṣṇur āpo 'gnir eva ca
c mayābhipannā ṛdhyante ṛṣayo devatās tathā
a yāṃś ca dviṣāmy ahaṃ gāvas te vinaśyanti sarvaśaḥ
c dharmārthakāmahīnāś ca te bhavanty asukhānvitāḥ
a evaṃprabhāvāṃ māṃ gāvo vijānīta sukhapradām
c icchāmi cāpi yuṣmāsu vastuṃ sarvāsu nityadā
e āgatā prārthayānāhaṃ śrījuṣṭā bhavatānaghāḥ
 gāva ūcuḥ
a adhruvāṃ cañcalāṃ ca tvāṃ sāmānyāṃ bahubhiḥ saha

 śrīr uvāca

a satyaś ca lokavādo 'yaṃ loke carati suvratāḥ
c svayaṃ prāpte paribhavo bhavatīti viniścayaḥ

c nāvamanyā hy ahaṃ saumyās trailokye sacarācare
 gāva ūcuḥ

 bhīṣma uvāca

a nāradaḥ parvataś caiva viśvāvasuhahāhuhū

a devānāṃ bhagavan kasmāl lokeśānāṃ pitāmaha

a tena tvam āsāṃ māhātmyaṃ na vettha śṛṇu tat prabho

a yadarthaṃ gā gatāś caiva saurabhyaḥ surasattama

 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a uktaṃ pitāmahenedaṃ gavāṃ dānam anuttamam
c viśeṣeṇa narendrāṇām iti dharmam avekṣatām
a rājyaṃ hi satataṃ duḥkham āśramāś ca sudurvidāḥ
c parivāreṇa vai duḥkhaṃ durdharaṃ cākṛtātmabhiḥ
e bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ca narendrāṇāṃ vidyate na śubhā gatiḥ
a pūyante te 'tra niyataṃ prayacchanto vasuṃdharām
c pūrvaṃ ca kathitā dharmās tvayā me kurunandana
a evam eva gavām uktaṃ pradānaṃ te nṛgeṇa ha
c ṛṣiṇā nāciketena pūrvam eva nidarśitam
d nidarśitaṃ pūrvam eva ṛṣiṇā nāsiketunā
a vedopaniṣade caiva sarvakarmasu dakṣiṇā
c sarvakratuṣu coddiṣṭaṃ bhūmir gāvo 'tha kāñcanam
a tatra śrutis tu paramā suvarṇaṃ dakṣiṇeti vai
c etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ pitāmaha yathātatham
a kiṃ suvarṇaṃ kathaṃ jātaṃ kasmin kāle kim ātmakam
c kiṃ dānaṃ kiṃ phalaṃ caiva kasmāc ca param ucyate
a kasmād dānaṃ suvarṇasya pūjayanti manīṣiṇaḥ
c kasmāc ca dakṣiṇārthaṃ tad yajñakarmasu śasyate
a kasmāc ca pāvanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bhūmer gobhyaś ca kāñcanam
c paramaṃ dakṣiṇārthe ca tad bravīhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a śṛṇu rājann avahito bahukāraṇavistaram
c jātarūpasamutpattim anubhūtaṃ ca yan mayā
a pitā mama mahātejāḥ śaṃtanur nidhanaṃ gataḥ
c tasya ditsur ahaṃ śrāddhaṃ gaṅgādvāram upāgamam
a tatrāgamya pituḥ putra śrāddhakarma samārabham
c mātā me jāhnavī caiva sāhāyyam akarot tadā
a tato 'gratas tapaḥsiddhān upaveśya bahūn ṛṣīn
c toyapradānāt prabhṛti kāryāṇy aham athārabham
a tat samāpya yathoddiṣṭaṃ pūrvakarma samāhitaḥ
c dātuṃ nirvapaṇaṃ samyag yathāvad aham ārabham
a tatas taṃ darbhavinyāsaṃ bhittvā surucirāṅgadaḥ
c pralambābharaṇo bāhur udatiṣṭhad viśāṃ pate
a tam utthitam ahaṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āgamam
c pratigrahītā sākṣān me piteti bharatarṣabha
a tato me punar evāsīt saṃjñā saṃcintya śāstrataḥ
c nāyaṃ vedeṣu vihito vidhir hasta iti prabho
e piṇḍo deyo nareṇeha tato matir abhūn mama
a sākṣān neha manuṣyasya pitaro 'ntarhitāḥ kva cit
c gṛhṇanti vihitaṃ tv evaṃ piṇḍo deyaḥ kuśeṣv iti
a tato 'haṃ tad anādṛtya pitur hastanidarśanam
c śāstrapramāṇāt sūkṣmaṃ tu vidhiṃ pārthiva saṃsmaran
a tato darbheṣu tat sarvam adadaṃ bharatarṣabha
c śāstramārgānusāreṇa tad viddhi manujarṣabha
a tataḥ so 'ntarhito bāhuḥ pitur mama narādhipa
c tato māṃ darśayām āsuḥ svapnānte pitaras tadā
a prīyamāṇās tu mām ūcuḥ prītāḥ sma bharatarṣabha
c vijñānena tavānena yan na muhyasi dharmataḥ
a tvayā hi kurvatā śāstraṃ pramāṇam iha pārthiva
c ātmā dharmaḥ śrutaṃ vedāḥ pitaraś ca maharṣibhiḥ
a sākṣāt pitāmaho brahmā guravo 'tha prajāpatiḥ
c pramāṇam upanītā vai sthitiś ca na vicālitā
a tad idaṃ samyag ārabdhaṃ tvayādya bharatarṣabha
c kiṃ tu bhūmer gavāṃ cārthe suvarṇaṃ dīyatām iti
a evaṃ vayaṃ ca dharmaś ca sarve cāsmatpitāmahāḥ
c pāvitā vai bhaviṣyanti pāvanaṃ paramaṃ hi tat
a daśa pūrvān daśa parāṃs tathā saṃtārayanti te
c suvarṇaṃ ye prayacchanti evaṃ me pitaro 'bruvan
a tato 'haṃ vismito rājan pratibuddho viśāṃ pate
c suvarṇadāne 'karavaṃ matiṃ bharatasattama
a itihāsam imaṃ cāpi śṛṇu rājan purātanam
c jāmadagnyaṃ prati vibho dhanyam āyuṣyam eva ca
a jāmadagnyena rāmeṇa tīvraroṣānvitena vai
c triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivī kṛtā niḥkṣatriyā purā
a tato jitvā mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ
c ājahāra kratuṃ vīro brahmakṣatreṇa pūjitam
a vājimedhaṃ mahārāja sarvakāmasamanvitam
c pāvanaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tejodyutivivardhanam
a vipāpmāpi sa tejasvī tena kratuphalena vai
c naivātmano 'tha laghutāṃ jāmadagnyo 'bhyagacchata
a sa tu kratuvareṇeṣṭvā mahātmā dakṣiṇāvatā
c papracchāgamasaṃpannān ṛṣīn devāṃś ca bhārgavaḥ
a pāvanaṃ yat paraṃ nṝṇām ugre karmaṇi vartatām
c tad ucyatāṃ mahābhāgā iti jātaghṛṇo 'bravīt
f pratyuvāca tatas teṣāṃ vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
f rāma viprāḥ satkriyantāṃ vedaprāmāṇyadarśanāt
f bhūyaś ca viprarṣigaṇāḥ praṣṭavyāḥ pāvanaṃ prati
f te yad brūyur mahāprājñās tac caiva samudācara
f tato vasiṣṭhaṃ devarṣim agastyam atha kaśyapam
f tam evārthaṃ mahātejāḥ papraccha bhṛgunandanaḥ
f jātā matir me viprendrāḥ kathaṃ pūyeyam ity uta
f kena vā karmayogena pradāneneha kena vā
f yadi vo 'nugrahakṛtā buddhir māṃ prati sattamāḥ
f ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
f prabrūta pāvanaṃ kiṃ me bhaved iti tapodhanāḥ
f gāś ca vittaṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca dattveha bhṛgunandana
f pāpakṛn mucyate martya iti bhārgava śuśruma
f anyad dānaṃ tu viprarṣe śrūyatāṃ pāvanaṃ mahat
f divyam atyadbhutākāram apatyaṃ jātavedasaḥ
f dagdhvā lokān purā vīryāt saṃbhūtam iha śuśruma
f suvarṇam iti vikhyātaṃ tad dadat siddhim eṣyasi
f tato 'bravīd vasiṣṭhas taṃ bhagavān saṃśitavrataḥ
f śṛṇu rāma yathotpannaṃ suvarṇam analaprabham
f yat phalaṃ cāsya vihitaṃ dāne param ihocyate
f suvarṇaṃ yena yasmāc ca yathā ca guṇavattaram
f tan nibodha mahābāho sarvaṃ nigadato mama
f agnīṣomātmakam idaṃ suvarṇaṃ viddhi niścaye
f ajo 'gnir varuṇo meṣaḥ sūryo 'śva iti darśanam
f kuñjarāś ca smṛtā nāgā mahiṣāś cāsurā iti
f kukkuṭāś ca varāhāś ca rākṣasā bhṛgunandana
f iḍā gāvaḥ payaḥ somo bhūmir ity eva ca śrutiḥ
f jagat sarvaṃ vinirmathya tejorāśiḥ samutthitaḥ
f suvarṇam ebhyo viprarṣe ratnaṃ paramam uttamam
f etasmāt kāraṇād devā gandharvoragarākṣasāḥ
f manuṣyāś ca piśācāś ca prayatā dhārayanti tat
f mukuṭair aṅgadayutair alaṃkāraiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ
f suvarṇavikṛtais tatra virājante bhṛgūttama
f tasmāt sarvapavitrebhyaḥ pavitraṃ paramaṃ smṛtam
f bhūmer gobhyo 'tha ratnebhyas tad viddhi bharatarṣabha
f pṛthivīṃ gāś ca dattveha yac cānyad api kiṃ cana
f viśiṣyate suvarṇasya dānaṃ paramakaṃ vibho
f akṣayaṃ pāvanaṃ caiva suvarṇam amaradyute
f prayaccha dvijamukhyebhyaḥ pāvanaṃ hy etad uttamam
f suvarṇam eva sarvāsu dakṣiṇāsu vidhīyate
f suvarṇaṃ ye prayacchanti sarvadās te bhavanty uta
 vasiṣṭha uvāca
a devatās te prayacchanti suvarṇaṃ ye dadaty uta
c agnir hi devatāḥ sarvāḥ suvarṇaṃ ca tad ātmakam
a tasmāt suvarṇaṃ dadatā dattāḥ sarvāś ca devatāḥ
c bhavanti puruṣavyāghra na hy ataḥ paramaṃ viduḥ
a bhūya eva ca māhātmyaṃ suvarṇasya nibodha me
c gadato mama viprarṣe sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ vara
a mayā śrutam idaṃ pūrvaṃ purāṇe bhṛgunandana
c prajāpateḥ kathayato manoḥ svāyaṃbhuvasya vai
a śūlapāṇer bhagavato rudrasya ca mahātmanaḥ
c girau himavati śreṣṭhe tadā bhṛgukulodvaha
a devyā vivāhe nirvṛtte rudrāṇyā bhṛgunandana
c samāgame bhagavato devyā saha mahātmanaḥ
e tataḥ sarve samudvignā bhagavantam upāgaman
a te mahādevam āsīnaṃ devīṃ ca varadām umām
c prasādya śirasā sarve rudram ūcur bhṛgūdvaha
a ayaṃ samāgamo deva devyā saha tavānagha
c tapasvinas tapasvinyā tejasvinyātitejasaḥ
e amoghatejās tvaṃ deva devī ceyam umā tathā
a apatyaṃ yuvayor deva balavad bhavitā prabho
c tan nūnaṃ triṣu lokeṣu na kiṃ cic cheṣayiṣyati
a tad ebhyaḥ praṇatebhyas tvaṃ devebhyaḥ pṛthulocana
c varaṃ prayaccha lokeśa trailokyahitakāmyayā
e apatyārthaṃ nigṛhṇīṣva tejo jvalitam uttamam
e tejaḥ paramakaṃ vibho
e trailokyasārau hi yuvāṃ lokaṃ saṃtāpayiṣyatha
e tad apatyaṃ hi yuvayor devān abhibhaved dhruvam
e na hi te pṛthivī devī na ca dyaur na divaṃ prabho
e vīryaṃ dhārayituṃ śaktāḥ samastā iti no matiḥ
e tejaḥprabhāvān nirdagdhaṃ na syāt sarvam idaṃ jagat
e tasmāt prasādaṃ bhagavan kartum arhasi naḥ prabho
e na devyāḥ saṃbhavet putro bhavataḥ surasattama
e dhairyād eva nigṛhṇīṣva
a iti teṣāṃ kathayatāṃ bhagavān govṛṣadhvajaḥ
c evam astv iti devāṃs tān viprarṣe pratyabhāṣata
a ity uktvā cordhvam anayat tad reto vṛṣavāhanaḥ
c ūrdhvaretāḥ samabhavat tataḥprabhṛti cāpi saḥ
a rudrāṇī tu tataḥ kruddhā prajocchede tathā kṛte
c devān athābravīt tatra strībhāvāt paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
a yasmād apatyakāmo vai bhartā me vinivartitaḥ
c tasmāt sarve surā yūyam anapatyā bhaviṣyatha
a prajocchedo mama kṛto yasmād yuṣmābhir adya vai
c tasmāt prajā vaḥ khagamāḥ sarveṣāṃ na bhaviṣyati
a pāvakas tu na tatrāsīc chāpakāle bhṛgūdvaha
c devā devyās tathā śāpād anapatyās tadābhavan
a rudras tu tejo 'pratimaṃ dhārayām āsa tat tadā
c praskannaṃ tu tatas tasmāt kiṃ cit tatrāpatad bhuvi
a tat papāta tadā cāgnau vavṛdhe cādbhutopamam
c tejas tejasi saṃpṛktam ekayonitvam āgatam
a etasminn eva kāle tu devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ
c asuras tārako nāma tena saṃtāpitā bhṛśam
a ādityā vasavo rudrā maruto 'thāśvināv api
c sādhyāś ca sarve saṃtrastā daiteyasya parākramāt
a sthānāni devatānāṃ hi vimānāni purāṇi ca
c ṛṣīṇām āśramāś caiva babhūvur asurair hṛtāḥ
a te dīnamanasaḥ sarve devāś ca ṛṣayaś ca ha
c prajagmuḥ śaraṇaṃ devaṃ brahmāṇam ajaraṃ prabhum
d vareṇyaṃ varadaṃ devaṃ stotum ārebhire prabhum
 devā ūcuḥ
a asuras tārako nāma tvayā dattavaraḥ prabho
c surān ṛṣīṃś ca kliśnāti vadhas tasya vidhīyatām
a tasmād bhayaṃ samutpannam asmākaṃ vai pitāmaha
c paritrāyasva no deva na hy anyā gatir asti naḥ
 brahmovāca
a samo 'haṃ sarvabhūtānām adharmaṃ neha rocaye
c hanyatāṃ tārakaḥ kṣipraṃ surarṣigaṇabādhakaḥ
a vedā dharmāś ca notsādaṃ gaccheyuḥ surasattamāḥ
c vihitaṃ pūrvam evātra mayā vai vyetu vo jvaraḥ
 devā ūcuḥ
a varadānād bhagavato daiteyo balagarvitaḥ
c devair na śakyate hantuṃ sa kathaṃ praśamaṃ vrajet
a sa hi naiva sma devānāṃ nāsurāṇāṃ na rakṣasām
c vadhyaḥ syām iti jagrāha varaṃ tvattaḥ pitāmaha
a devāś ca śaptā rudrāṇyā prajocchede purā kṛte
c na bhaviṣyati vo 'patyam iti sarvajagatpate
 brahmovāca
a hutāśano na tatrāsīc chāpakāle surottamāḥ
c sa utpādayitāpatyaṃ vadhārthaṃ tridaśadviṣām
a tad vai sarvān atikramya devadānavarākṣasān
c mānuṣān atha gandharvān nāgān atha ca pakṣiṇaḥ
a astreṇāmoghapātena śaktyā taṃ ghātayiṣyati
c yato vo bhayam utpannaṃ ye cānye suraśatravaḥ
a sanātano hi saṃkalpaḥ kāma ity abhidhīyate
c rudrasya tejaḥ praskannam agnau nipatitaṃ ca tat
a tat tejo 'gnir mahad bhūtaṃ dvitīyam iva pāvakam
c vadhārthaṃ devaśatrūṇāṃ gaṅgāyāṃ janayiṣyati
a sa tu nāvāpa taṃ śāpaṃ naṣṭaḥ sa hutabhuk tadā
c tasmād vo bhayahṛd devāḥ samutpatsyati pāvakiḥ
a anviṣyatāṃ vai jvalanas tathā cādya niyujyatām
c tārakasya vadhopāyaḥ kathito vai mayānaghāḥ
a na hi tejasvināṃ śāpās tejaḥsu prabhavanti vai
c balāny atibalaṃ prāpya nabalāni bhavanti vai
a hanyād avadhyān varadān api caiva tapasvinaḥ
c saṃkalpābhiruciḥ kāmaḥ sanātanatamo 'nalaḥ
a jagatpatir anirdeśyaḥ sarvagaḥ sarvabhāvanaḥ
c hṛcchayaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ jyeṣṭho rudrād api prabhuḥ
a anviṣyatāṃ sa tu kṣipraṃ tejorāśir hutāśanaḥ
c sa vo manogataṃ kāmaṃ devaḥ saṃpādayiṣyati
a etad vākyam upaśrutya tato devā mahātmanaḥ
c jagmuḥ saṃsiddhasaṃkalpāḥ paryeṣanto vibhāvasum
a tatas trailokyam ṛṣayo vyacinvanta suraiḥ saha
c kāṅkṣanto darśanaṃ vahneḥ sarve tadgatamānasāḥ
a pareṇa tapasā yuktāḥ śrīmanto lokaviśrutāḥ
c lokān anvacaran siddhāḥ sarva eva bhṛgūdvaha
e naṣṭam ātmani saṃlīnaṃ nādhijagmur hutāśanam
a tataḥ saṃjātasaṃtrāsān agner darśanalālasān
c jalecaraḥ klāntamanās tejasāgneḥ pradīpitaḥ
e uvāca devān maṇḍūko rasātalatalotthitaḥ
a rasātalatale devā vasaty agnir iti prabho
c saṃtāpād iha saṃprāptaḥ pāvakaprabhavād aham
a sa saṃsupto jale devā bhagavān havyavāhanaḥ
c apaḥ saṃsṛjya tejobhis tena saṃtāpitā vayam
a tasya darśanam iṣṭaṃ vo yadi devā vibhāvasoḥ
c tatrainam abhigacchadhvaṃ kāryaṃ vo yadi vahninā
a gamyatāṃ sādhayiṣyāmo vayaṃ hy agnibhayāt surāḥ
c etāvad uktvā maṇḍūkas tvarito jalam āviśat
a hutāśanas tu bubudhe maṇḍūkasyātha paiśunam
c śaśāpa sa tam āsādya na rasān vetsyasīti vai
a taṃ sa saṃyujya śāpena maṇḍūkaṃ pāvako yayau
c anyatra vāsāya vibhur na ca devān adarśayat
a devās tv anugrahaṃ cakrur maṇḍūkānāṃ bhṛgūdvaha
c yat tac chṛṇu mahābāho gadato mama sarvaśaḥ
 devā ūcuḥ
a agniśāpād ajihvāpi rasajñānabahiṣkṛtāḥ
c sarasvatīṃ bahuvidhāṃ yūyam uccārayiṣyatha
a bilavāsagatāṃś caiva nirādānān acetasaḥ
c gatāsūn api vaḥ śuṣkān bhūmiḥ saṃdhārayiṣyati
e tamogatāyām api ca niśāyāṃ vicariṣyatha
a ity uktvā tāṃs tato devāḥ punar eva mahīm imām
c parīyur jvalanasyārthe na cāvindan hutāśanam
a atha tān dviradaḥ kaś cit surendradviradopamaḥ
c aśvatthastho 'gnir ity evaṃ prāha devān bhṛgūdvaha
a śaśāpa jvalanaḥ sarvān dviradān krodhamūrchitaḥ
c pratīpā bhavatāṃ jihvā bhavitrīti bhṛgūdvaha
a ity uktvā niḥsṛto 'śvatthād agnir vāraṇasūcitaḥ
c praviveśa śamīgarbham atha vahniḥ suṣupsayā
d viveśa kīcakānantaḥ praviśann eva sūcitaḥ
d ūṣmāyāṃ cittalair vaṃśais tāṃs tyaktvā prāviśac chamīm
a anugrahaṃ tu nāgānāṃ yaṃ cakruḥ śṛṇu taṃ prabho
c devā bhṛgukulaśreṣṭha prītāḥ satyaparākramāḥ
 devā ūcuḥ
a pratīpayā jihvayāpi sarvāhārān kariṣyatha
c vācaṃ coccārayiṣyadhvam uccair avyañjitākṣaram
e ity uktvā punar evāgnim anusasrur divaukasaḥ
a aśvatthān niḥsṛtaś cāgniḥ śamīgarbhagatas tadā
c śukena khyāpito vipra taṃ devāḥ samupādravan
a śaśāpa śukam agnis tu vāgvihīno bhaviṣyasi
c jihvāṃ cāvartayām āsa tasyāpi hutabhuk tadā
a dṛṣṭvā tu jvalanaṃ devāḥ śukam ūcur dayānvitāḥ
c bhavitā na tvam atyantaṃ śakune naṣṭavāg iti
a āvṛttajihvasya sato vākyaṃ kāntaṃ bhaviṣyati
b kriyamāṇā ca te vāṇī bhaviṣyati narair bhuvi
c bālasyeva pravṛddhasya kalam avyaktam adbhutam
a ity uktvā taṃ śamīgarbhe vahnim ālakṣya devatāḥ
c tad evāyatanaṃ cakruḥ puṇyaṃ sarvakriyāsv api
a tataḥprabhṛti cāpy agniḥ śamīgarbheṣu dṛśyate
c utpādane tathopāyam anujagmuś ca mānavāḥ
a āpo rasātale yās tu saṃsṛṣṭāś citrabhānunā
c tāḥ parvataprasravaṇair ūṣmāṃ muñcanti bhārgava
e pāvakenādhiśayatā saṃtaptās tasya tejasā
a tato 'gnir devatā dṛṣṭvā babhūva vyathitas tadā
c kim āgamanam ity evaṃ tān apṛcchata pāvakaḥ
a tam ūcur vibudhāḥ sarve te caiva paramarṣayaḥ
c tvāṃ niyokṣyāmahe kārye tad bhavān kartum arhati
e kṛte ca tasmin bhavitā tavāpi sumahān guṇaḥ
 agnir uvāca
a brūta yad bhavatāṃ kāryaṃ sarvaṃ kartāsmi tat surāḥ
c bhavatāṃ hi niyojyo 'haṃ mā vo 'trāstu vicāraṇā
 devā ūcuḥ
a asuras tārako nāma brahmaṇo varadarpitaḥ
c asmān prabādhate vīryād vadhas tasya vidhīyatām
a imān devagaṇāṃs tāta prajāpatigaṇāṃs tathā
c ṛṣīṃś cāpi mahābhāgān paritrāyasva pāvaka
a apatyaṃ tejasā yuktaṃ pravīraṃ janaya prabho
c yad bhayaṃ no 'surāt tasmān nāśayed dhavyavāhana
a śaptānāṃ no mahādevyā nānyad asti parāyaṇam
c anyatra bhavato vīryaṃ tasmāt trāyasva nas tataḥ
a ity uktaḥ sa tathety uktvā bhagavān havyakavyabhuk
c jagāmātha durādharṣo gaṅgāṃ bhāgīrathīṃ prati
a tayā cāpy abhavan miśro garbhaś cāsyābhavat tadā
c vavṛdhe sa tadā garbhaḥ kakṣe kṛṣṇagatir yathā
a tejasā tasya garbhasya gaṅgā vihvalacetanā
c saṃtāpam agamat tīvraṃ sā soḍhuṃ na śaśāka ha
a āhite jvalanenātha garbhe tejaḥsamanvite
c gaṅgāyām asuraḥ kaś cid bhairavaṃ nādam utsṛjat
a abuddhāpatitenātha nādena vipulena sā
c vitrastodbhrāntanayanā gaṅgā viplutalocanā
e visaṃjñā nāśakad garbhaṃ saṃdhārayitum ātmanā
a sā tu tejaḥparītāṅgī kampamānā ca jāhnavī
c uvāca vacanaṃ vipra tadā garbhabaloddhatā
e na te śaktāsmi bhagavaṃs tejaso 'sya vidhāraṇe
a vimūḍhāsmi kṛtānena tathāsvāsthyaṃ kṛtaṃ param
c vihvalā cāsmi bhagavaṃs tejo naṣṭaṃ ca me 'nagha
a dhāraṇe nāsya śaktāhaṃ garbhasya tapatāṃ vara
c utsrakṣye 'ham imaṃ duḥkhān na tu kāmāt kathaṃ cana
a na cetaso 'sti saṃsparśo mama deva vibhāvaso
c āpadarthe hi saṃbandhaḥ susūkṣmo 'pi mahādyute
a yad atra guṇasaṃpannam itaraṃ vā hutāśana
c tvayy eva tad ahaṃ manye dharmādharmau ca kevalau
a tām uvāca tato vahnir dhāryatāṃ dhāryatām ayam
c garbho mattejasā yukto mahāguṇaphalodayaḥ
a śaktā hy asi mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ voḍhuṃ dhārayituṃ tathā
c na hi te kiṃ cid aprāpyaṃ madretodhāraṇād ṛte
a sā vahninā vāryamāṇā devaiś cāpi saridvarā
c samutsasarja taṃ garbhaṃ merau girivare tadā
a samarthā dhāraṇe cāpi rudratejaḥpradharṣitā
c nāśakat taṃ tadā garbhaṃ saṃdhārayitum ojasā
a sā samutsṛjya taṃ duḥkhād dīptavaiśvānaraprabham
c darśayām āsa cāgnis tāṃ tadā gaṅgāṃ bhṛgūdvaha
e papraccha saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ kaccid garbhaḥ sukhodayaḥ
a kīdṛgvarṇo 'pi vā devi kīdṛgrūpaś ca dṛśyate
c tejasā kena vā yuktaḥ sarvam etad bravīhi me
 gaṅgovāca
a jātarūpaḥ sa garbho vai tejasā tvam ivānala
c suvarṇo vimalo dīptaḥ parvataṃ cāvabhāsayat
a padmotpalavimiśrāṇāṃ hradānām iva śītalaḥ
c gandho 'sya sa kadambānāṃ tulyo vai tapatāṃ vara
a tejasā tasya garbhasya bhāskarasyeva raśmibhiḥ
c yad dravyaṃ parisaṃsṛṣṭaṃ pṛthivyāṃ parvateṣu vā
e tat sarvaṃ kāñcanībhūtaṃ samantāt pratyadṛśyata
a paryadhāvata śailāṃś ca nadīḥ prasravaṇāni ca
c vyadīpayat tejasā ca trailokyaṃ sacarācaram
a evaṃrūpaḥ sa bhagavān putras te havyavāhana
c sūryavaiśvānarasamaḥ kāntyā soma ivāparaḥ
e evam uktvā tu sā devī tatraivāntaradhīyata
a pāvakaś cāpi tejasvī kṛtvā kāryaṃ divaukasām
c jagāmeṣṭaṃ tato deśaṃ tadā bhārgavanandana
a etaiḥ karmaguṇair loke nāmāgneḥ parigīyate
c hiraṇyaretā iti vai ṛṣibhir vibudhais tathā
e pṛthivī ca tadā devī khyātā vasumatīti vai
a sa tu garbho mahātejā gāṅgeyaḥ pāvakodbhavaḥ
c divyaṃ śaravaṇaṃ prāpya vavṛdhe 'dbhutadarśanaḥ
a dadṛśuḥ kṛttikās taṃ tu bālārkasadṛśadyutim
c jātasnehāś ca taṃ bālaṃ pupuṣuḥ stanyavisravaiḥ
a tataḥ sa kārttikeyatvam avāpa paramadyutiḥ
c skannatvāt skandatāṃ cāpi guhāvāsād guho 'bhavat
a evaṃ suvarṇam utpannam apatyaṃ jātavedasaḥ
c tatra jāmbūnadaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ devānām api bhūṣaṇam
a tataḥprabhṛti cāpy etaj jātarūpam udāhṛtam
c yat suvarṇaṃ sa bhagavān agnir īśaḥ prajāpatiḥ
a pavitrāṇāṃ pavitraṃ hi kanakaṃ dvijasattama
c agnīṣomātmakaṃ caiva jātarūpam udāhṛtam
a ratnānām uttamaṃ ratnaṃ bhūṣaṇānāṃ tathottamam
c pavitraṃ ca pavitrāṇāṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam
 vasiṣṭha uvāca
a api cedaṃ purā rāma śrutaṃ me brahmadarśanam
c pitāmahasya yadvṛttaṃ brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ
a devasya mahatas tāta vāruṇīṃ bibhratas tanum
c aiśvarye vāruṇe rāma rudrasyeśasya vai prabho
a ājagmur munayaḥ sarve devāś cāgnipurogamāḥ
c yajñāṅgāni ca sarvāṇi vaṣaṭkāraś ca mūrtimān
a mūrtimanti ca sāmāni yajūṃṣi ca sahasraśaḥ
c ṛgvedaś cāgamat tatra padakramavibhūṣitaḥ
d ṛgvedaś cāgamat tatra sāmāni ca yajūṃṣi ca
a lakṣaṇāni svarāḥ stobhā niruktaṃ svarabhaktayaḥ
c oṃkāraś cāvasan netre nigrahapragrahau tathā
a vedāś ca sopaniṣado vidyā sāvitry athāpi ca
c bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca dadhāra bhagavāñ śivaḥ
e juhvac cātmany athātmānaṃ svayam eva tadā prabho
f yajñaṃ ca śobhayām āsa bahurūpaṃ pinākadhṛk
f dyaur nabhaḥ pṛthivī khaṃ ca tathā caivaiṣa bhūpatiḥ
f sarvavidyeśvaraḥ śrīmān eṣa cāpi vibhāvasuḥ
f eṣa brahmā śivo rudro varuṇo 'gniḥ prajāpatiḥ
f kīrtyate bhagavān devaḥ sarvabhūtapatiḥ śivaḥ
f tasya yajñaḥ paśupates tapaḥ kratava eva ca
f dīkṣā dīptavratā devī diśaś ca sadigīśvarāḥ
f dṛṣṭvā devī tu tat skannaṃ retaḥ śūlāstradhāriṇaḥ
a devapatnyaś ca kanyāś ca devānāṃ caiva mātaraḥ
c ājagmuḥ sahitās tatra tadā bhṛgukulodvaha
a yajñaṃ paśupateḥ prītā varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ
c svayaṃbhuvas tu tā dṛṣṭvā retaḥ samapatad bhuvi
a tasya śukrasya niṣpandāt pāṃsūn saṃgṛhya bhūmitaḥ
c prāsyat pūṣā karābhyāṃ vai tasminn eva hutāśane
a tatas tasmin saṃpravṛtte satre jvalitapāvake
c brahmaṇo juhvatas tatra prādurbhāvo babhūva ha
a skannamātraṃ ca tac chukraṃ sruveṇa pratigṛhya saḥ
c ājyavan mantravac cāpi so 'juhod bhṛgunandana
a tataḥ saṃjanayām āsa bhūtagrāmaṃ sa vīryavān
c tatas tu tejasas tasmāj jajñe lokeṣu taijasam
a tamasas tāmasā bhāvā vyāpi sattvaṃ tathobhayam
c saguṇas tejaso nityaṃ tamasy ākāśam eva ca
a sarvabhūteṣv atha tathā sattvaṃ tejas tathā tamaḥ
c śukre hute 'gnau tasmiṃs tu prādurāsaṃs trayaḥ prabho
a puruṣā vapuṣā yuktā yuktāḥ prasavajair guṇaiḥ
c bhṛg ity eva bhṛguḥ pūrvam aṅgārebhyo 'ṅgirābhavat
a aṅgārasaṃśrayāc caiva kavir ity aparo 'bhavat
c saha jvālābhir utpanno bhṛgus tasmād bhṛguḥ smṛtaḥ
a marīcibhyo marīcis tu mārīcaḥ kaśyapo hy abhūt
c aṅgārebhyo 'ṅgirās tāta vālakhilyāḥ śiloccayāt
e atraivātreti ca vibho jātam atriṃ vadanty api
a tathā bhasmavyapohebhyo brahmarṣigaṇasaṃmitāḥ
c vaikhānasāḥ samutpannās tapaḥśrutaguṇepsavaḥ
e aśruto 'sya samutpannāv aśvinau rūpasaṃmatau
a śeṣāḥ prajānāṃ patayaḥ srotobhyas tasya jajñire
c ṛṣayo lomakūpebhyaḥ svedāc chando malātmakam
a etasmāt kāraṇād āhur agniṃ sarvās tu devatāḥ
c ṛṣayaḥ śrutasaṃpannā vedaprāmāṇyadarśanāt
a yāni dārūṇi te māsā niryāsāḥ pakṣasaṃjñitāḥ
c ahorātrā muhūrtās tu pittaṃ jyotiś ca vāruṇam
a raudraṃ lohitam ity āhur lohitāt kanakaṃ smṛtam
c tan maitram iti vijñeyaṃ dhūmāc ca vasavaḥ smṛtāḥ
a arciṣo yāś ca te rudrās tathādityā mahāprabhāḥ
c uddiṣṭās te tathāṅgārā ye dhiṣṇyeṣu divi sthitāḥ
a ādināthaś ca lokasya tat paraṃ brahma tad dhruvam
c sarvakāmadam ity āhus tatra havyam udāvahat
a tato 'bravīn mahādevo varuṇaḥ paramātmakaḥ
c mama satram idaṃ divyam ahaṃ gṛhapatis tv iha
a trīṇi pūrvāṇy apatyāni mama tāni na saṃśayaḥ
c iti jānīta khagamā mama yajñaphalaṃ hi tat
 agnir uvāca
a madaṅgebhyaḥ prasūtāni madāśrayakṛtāni ca
c mamaiva tāny apatyāni varuṇo hy avaśātmakaḥ
a athābravīl lokagurur brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
c mamaiva tāny apatyāni mama śukraṃ hutaṃ hi tat
a ahaṃ vaktā ca mantrasya hotā śukrasya caiva ha
c yasya bījaṃ phalaṃ tasya śukraṃ cet kāraṇaṃ matam
a tato 'bruvan devagaṇāḥ pitāmaham upetya vai
c kṛtāñjalipuṭāḥ sarve śirobhir abhivandya ca
a vayaṃ ca bhagavan sarve jagac ca sacarācaram
c tavaiva prasavāḥ sarve tasmād agnir vibhāvasuḥ
e varuṇaś ceśvaro devo labhatāṃ kāmam īpsitam
a nisargād varuṇaś cāpi brahmaṇo yādasāṃ patiḥ
c jagrāha vai bhṛguṃ pūrvam apatyaṃ sūryavarcasam
a īśvaro 'ṅgirasaṃ cāgner apatyārthe 'bhyakalpayat
c pitāmahas tv apatyaṃ vai kaviṃ jagrāha tattvavit
a tadā sa vāruṇaḥ khyāto bhṛguḥ prasavakarmakṛt
c āgneyas tv aṅgirāḥ śrīmān kavir brāhmo mahāyaśāḥ
e bhārgavāṅgirasau loke lokasaṃtānalakṣaṇau
a ete vipravarāḥ sarve prajānāṃ patayas trayaḥ
c sarvaṃ saṃtānam eteṣām idam ity upadhāraya
a bhṛgos tu putrās tatrāsan sapta tulyā bhṛgor guṇaiḥ
c cyavano vajraśīrṣaś ca śucir aurvas tathaiva ca
a śukro vareṇyaś ca vibhuḥ savanaś ceti sapta te
c bhārgavā vāruṇāḥ sarve yeṣāṃ vaṃśe bhavān api
a aṣṭau cāṅgirasaḥ putrā vāruṇās te 'py udāhṛtāḥ
c bṛhaspatir utathyaś ca vayasyaḥ śāntir eva ca
a ghoro virūpaḥ saṃvartaḥ sudhanvā cāṣṭamaḥ smṛtaḥ
c ete 'ṣṭāv agnijāḥ sarve jñānaniṣṭhā nirāmayāḥ
a brāhmaṇasya kaveḥ putrā vāruṇās te 'py udāhṛtāḥ
c aṣṭau prasavajair yuktā guṇair brahmavidaḥ śubhāḥ
a kaviḥ kāvyaś ca viṣṇuś ca buddhimān uśanās tathā
c bhṛguś ca virajāś caiva kāśī cograś ca dharmavit
a aṣṭau kavisutā hy ete sarvam ebhir jagat tatam
c prajāpataya ete hi prajānāṃ yair imāḥ prajāḥ
a evam aṅgirasaś caiva kaveś ca prasavānvayaiḥ
c bhṛgoś ca bhṛguśārdūla vaṃśajaiḥ satataṃ jagat
a varuṇaś cādito vipra jagrāha prabhur īśvaraḥ
c kaviṃ tāta bhṛguṃ caiva tasmāt tau vāruṇau smṛtau
a jagrāhāṅgirasaṃ devaḥ śikhī tasmād dhutāśanaḥ
c tasmād aṅgiraso jñeyāḥ sarva eva tadanvayāḥ
a brahmā pitāmahaḥ pūrvaṃ devatābhiḥ prasāditaḥ
c ime naḥ saṃtariṣyanti prajābhir jagadīśvarāḥ
a sarve prajānāṃ patayaḥ sarve cātitapasvinaḥ
c tvatprasādād imaṃ lokaṃ tārayiṣyanti śāśvatam
a tathaiva vaṃśakartāras tava tejovivardhanāḥ
c bhaveyur vedaviduṣaḥ sarve vākpatayas tathā
a devapakṣadharāḥ saumyāḥ prājāpatyā maharṣayaḥ
c āpnuvanti tapaś caiva brahmacaryaṃ paraṃ tathā
d anantaṃ brahma satyaṃ ca tapaś ca paramaṃ bhuvi
a sarve hi vayam ete ca tavaiva prasavaḥ prabho
c devānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca tvaṃ hi kartā pitāmaha
a marīcim āditaḥ kṛtvā sarve caivātha bhārgavāḥ
c apatyānīti saṃprekṣya kṣamayāma pitāmaha
a te tv anenaiva rūpeṇa prajaniṣyanti vai prajāḥ
c sthāpayiṣyanti cātmānaṃ yugādinidhane tathā
d ity uktaḥ sa tadā tais tu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
d tathety evābravīt prītas te 'pi jagmur yathāgatam
a evam etat purā vṛttaṃ tasya yajñe mahātmanaḥ
c devaśreṣṭhasya lokādau vāruṇīṃ bibhratas tanum
a agnir brahmā paśupatiḥ śarvo rudraḥ prajāpatiḥ
c agner apatyam etad vai suvarṇam iti dhāraṇā
a agnyabhāve ca kurvanti vahnisthāneṣu kāñcanam
c jāmadagnya pramāṇajñā vedaśrutinidarśanāt
a kuśastambe juhoty agniṃ suvarṇaṃ tatra saṃsthitam
b valmīkasya vapāyāṃ ca karṇe vājasya dakṣiṇe
b śakaṭorvyāṃ parasyāpsu brāhmaṇasya kare 'pi vā
c hute prītikarīm ṛddhiṃ bhagavāṃs tatra manyate
a tasmād agniparāḥ sarvā devatā iti śuśruma
c brahmaṇo hi prasūto 'gnir agner api ca kāñcanam
a tasmād ye vai prayacchanti suvarṇaṃ dharmadarśinaḥ
b suvarṇaṃ ye prayacchanti narāḥ śuddhena cetasā
c devatās te prayacchanti samastā iti naḥ śrutam
a tasya cātamaso lokā gacchataḥ paramāṃ gatim
c svarloke rājarājyena so 'bhiṣicyeta bhārgava
a ādityodayane prāpte vidhimantrapuraskṛtam
c dadāti kāñcanaṃ yo vai duḥsvapnaṃ pratihanti saḥ
a dadāty uditamātre yas tasya pāpmā vidhūyate
c madhyāhne dadato rukmaṃ hanti pāpam anāgatam
a dadāti paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ yaḥ suvarṇaṃ dhṛtavrataḥ
c brahmavāyvagnisomānāṃ sālokyam upayāti saḥ
a sendreṣu caiva lokeṣu pratiṣṭhāṃ prāpnute śubhām
c iha loke yaśaḥ prāpya śāntapāpmā pramodate
a tataḥ saṃpadyate 'nyeṣu lokeṣv apratimaḥ sadā
c anāvṛtagatiś caiva kāmacārī bhavaty uta
a na ca kṣarati tebhyaḥ sa śaśvac caivāpnute mahat
c suvarṇam akṣayaṃ dattvā lokān āpnoti puṣkalān
a yas tu saṃjanayitvāgnim ādityodayanaṃ prati
c dadyād vai vratam uddiśya sarvān kāmān samaśnute
a agnir ity eva tat prāhuḥ pradānaṃ vai sukhāvaham
c yatheṣṭaguṇasaṃpannaṃ pravartakam iti smṛtam
d eṣā suvarṇasyotpattiḥ kathitā te mayānagha
d kārttikeyasya ca vibho tad viddhi bhṛgunandana
d kārttikeyas tu saṃvṛddhaḥ kālena mahatā tadā
d devaiḥ senāpatitvena vṛtaḥ sendrair bhṛgūdvaha
d jaghāna tārakaṃ cāpi daityam anyāṃs tathāsurān
d tridaśendrājñayā brahmaṃl lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā
d suvarṇadāne ca mayā kathitās te guṇā vibho
d tasmāt suvarṇaṃ viprebhyaḥ prayaccha dadatāṃ vara
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktaḥ sa vasiṣṭhena jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān
c dadau suvarṇaṃ viprebhyo vyamucyata ca kilbiṣāt
a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ suvarṇasya mahīpate
c pradānasya phalaṃ caiva janma cāgnyam anuttamam
a tasmāt tvam api viprebhyaḥ prayaccha kanakaṃ bahu
c dadat suvarṇaṃ nṛpate kilbiṣād vipramokṣyasi
d evam etan mahārāja suvarṇasya mahātmanaḥ
d janma te kathitaṃ puṇyaṃ pradānaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
d iti rāmam uvācedaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhavāg ṛṣiḥ
d suvarṇadāne māhātmyaṃ tat kuruṣva yudhiṣṭhira
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a uktāḥ pitāmaheneha suvarṇasya vidhānataḥ
c vistareṇa pradānasya ye guṇāḥ śrutilakṣaṇāḥ
a yat tu kāraṇam utpatteḥ suvarṇasyeha kīrtitam
c sa kathaṃ tārakaḥ prāpto nidhanaṃ tad bravīhi me
a uktaḥ sa devatānāṃ hi avadhya iti pārthiva
c na ca tasyeha te mṛtyur vistareṇa prakīrtitaḥ
a etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tvattaḥ kurukulodvaha
c kārtsnyena tārakavadhaṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
 bhīṣma uvāca
a vipannakṛtyā rājendra devatā ṛṣayas tathā
c kṛttikāś codayām āsur apatyabharaṇāya vai
a na devatānāṃ kā cid dhi samarthā jātavedasaḥ
c ekāpi śaktā taṃ garbhaṃ saṃdhārayitum ojasā
a ṣaṇṇāṃ tāsāṃ tataḥ prītaḥ pāvako garbhadhāraṇāt
c svena tejovisargeṇa vīryeṇa parameṇa ca
a tās tu ṣaṭ kṛttikā garbhaṃ pupuṣur jātavedasaḥ
c ṣaṭsu vartmasu tejo 'gneḥ sakalaṃ nihitaṃ prabho
a tatas tā vardhamānasya kumārasya mahātmanaḥ
c tejasābhiparītāṅgyo na kva cic charma lebhire
a tatas tejaḥparītāṅgyaḥ sarvāḥ kāla upasthite
c samaṃ garbhaṃ suṣuvire kṛttikās tā nararṣabha
a tatas taṃ ṣaḍadhiṣṭhānaṃ garbham ekatvam āgatam
c pṛthivī pratijagrāha kāntīpurasamīpataḥ
a sa garbho divyasaṃsthāno dīptimān pāvakaprabhaḥ
c divyaṃ śaravaṇaṃ prāpya vavṛdhe priyadarśanaḥ
a dadṛśuḥ kṛttikās taṃ tu bālaṃ vahnisamadyutim
c jātasnehāś ca sauhārdāt pupuṣuḥ stanyavisravaiḥ
a abhavat kārttikeyaḥ sa trailokye sacarācare
c skannatvāt skandatāṃ cāpa guhāvāsād guho 'bhavat
a tato devās trayastriṃśad diśaś ca sadigīśvarāḥ
c rudro dhātā ca viṣṇuś ca yajñaḥ pūṣāryamā bhagaḥ
a aṃśo mitraś ca sādhyāś ca vasavo vāsavo 'śvinau
c āpo vāyur nabhaś candro nakṣatrāṇi grahā raviḥ
a pṛthag bhūtāni cānyāni yāni devārpaṇāni vai
c ājagmus tatra taṃ draṣṭuṃ kumāraṃ jvalanātmajam
e ṛṣayas tuṣṭuvuś caiva gandharvāś ca jagus tathā
a ṣaḍānanaṃ kumāraṃ taṃ dviṣaḍakṣaṃ dvijapriyam
c pīnāṃsaṃ dvādaśabhujaṃ pāvakādityavarcasam
a śayānaṃ śaragulmasthaṃ dṛṣṭvā devāḥ saharṣibhiḥ
c lebhire paramaṃ harṣaṃ menire cāsuraṃ hatam
a tato devāḥ priyāṇy asya sarva eva samācaran
c krīḍataḥ krīḍanīyāni daduḥ pakṣigaṇāṃś ca ha
a suparṇo 'sya dadau patraṃ mayūraṃ citrabarhiṇam
c rākṣasāś ca dadus tasmai varāhamahiṣāv ubhau
a kukkuṭaṃ cāgnisaṃkāśaṃ pradadau varuṇaḥ svayam
c candramāḥ pradadau meṣam ādityo rucirāṃ prabhām
a gavāṃ mātā ca gā devī dadau śatasahasraśaḥ
c chāgam agnir guṇopetam ilā puṣpaphalaṃ bahu
a sudhanvā śakaṭaṃ caiva rathaṃ cāmitakūbaram
c varuṇo vāruṇān divyān bhujaṃgān pradadau śubhān
e siṃhān surendro vyāghrāṃś ca dvīpino 'nyāṃś ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ
a śvāpadāṃś ca bahūn ghorāṃś chatrāṇi vividhāni ca
c rākṣasāsurasaṃghāś ca ye 'nujagmus tam īśvaram
d tasmai pradadur agryāṇi vāhanāni dhanāni ca
a vardhamānaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā prārthayām āsa tārakaḥ
c upāyair bahubhir hantuṃ nāśakac cāpi taṃ vibhum
a senāpatyena taṃ devāḥ pūjayitvā guhālayam
c śaśaṃsur viprakāraṃ taṃ tasmai tārakakāritam
a sa vivṛddho mahāvīryo devasenāpatiḥ prabhuḥ
c jaghānāmoghayā śaktyā dānavaṃ tārakaṃ guhaḥ
a tena tasmin kumāreṇa krīḍatā nihate 'sure
c surendraḥ sthāpito rājye devānāṃ punar īśvaraḥ
a sa senāpatir evātha babhau skandaḥ pratāpavān
c īśo goptā ca devānāṃ priyakṛc chaṃkarasya ca
a hiraṇyamūrtir bhagavān eṣa eva ca pāvakiḥ
c sadā kumāro devānāṃ senāpatyam avāptavān
a tasmāt suvarṇaṃ maṅgalyaṃ ratnam akṣayyam uttamam
c sahajaṃ kārttikeyasya vahnes tejaḥ paraṃ matam
a evaṃ rāmāya kauravya vasiṣṭho 'kathayat purā
c tasmāt suvarṇadānāya prayatasva narādhipa
a rāmaḥ suvarṇaṃ dattvā hi vimuktaḥ sarvakilbiṣaiḥ
c triviṣṭape mahat sthānam avāpāsulabhaṃ naraiḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a cāturvarṇyasya dharmātman dharmaḥ proktas tvayānagha
c tathaiva me śrāddhavidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ prabrūhi pārthiva
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a yudhiṣṭhireṇaivam ukto bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavas tadā
c imaṃ śrāddhavidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ pravaktum upacakrame
 bhīṣma uvāca
a śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājañ śrāddhakalpam imaṃ śubham
c dhanyaṃ yaśasyaṃ putrīyaṃ pitṛyajñaṃ paraṃtapa
a devāsuramanuṣyāṇāṃ gandharvoragarakṣasām
c piśācakiṃnarāṇāṃ ca pūjyā vai pitaraḥ sadā
a pitṝn pūjyāditaḥ paścād devān saṃtarpayanti vai
c tasmāt sarvaprayatnena puruṣaḥ pūjayet sadā
a anvāhāryaṃ mahārāja pitṝṇāṃ śrāddham ucyate
c tac cāmiṣeṇa vidhinā vidhiḥ prathamakalpitaḥ
a sarveṣv ahaḥsu prīyante kṛtaiḥ śrāddhaiḥ pitāmahāḥ
b piṇḍān vāhāryakaṃ śrāddhaṃ kuryān māsānumāsikam
b pitṛyajñaṃ tu nirvartya vipraś candrakṣaye 'gnimān
b piṇḍānāṃ māsikaṃ śrāddham anvāhāryaṃ vidur budhāḥ
b tadāmiṣeṇa kurvīta prathamaḥ prāñjaliḥ śuciḥ
c pravakṣyāmi tu te sarvāṃs tithyāṃ tithyāṃ guṇāguṇān
a yeṣv ahaḥsu kṛtaiḥ śrāddhair yat phalaṃ prāpyate 'nagha
c tat sarvaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi yathāvat tan nibodha me
a pitṝn arcya pratipadi prāpnuyāt svagṛhe striyaḥ
c abhirūpaprajāyinyo darśanīyā bahuprajāḥ
a striyo dvitīyāṃ jāyante tṛtīyāyāṃ tu vandinaḥ
c caturthyāṃ kṣudrapaśavo bhavanti bahavo gṛhe
a pañcamyāṃ bahavaḥ putrā jāyante kurvatāṃ nṛpa
c kurvāṇās tu narāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhavanti dyutibhāginaḥ
a kṛṣibhāgī bhavec chrāddhaṃ kurvāṇaḥ saptamīṃ nṛpa
c aṣṭamyāṃ tu prakurvāṇo vāṇijye lābham āpnuyāt
a navamyāṃ kurvataḥ śrāddhaṃ bhavaty ekaśaphaṃ bahu
c vivardhante tu daśamīṃ gāvaḥ śrāddhāni kurvataḥ
a kupyabhāgī bhaven martyaḥ kurvann ekādaśīṃ nṛpa
c brahmavarcasvinaḥ putrā jāyante tasya veśmani
a dvādaśyām īhamānasya nityam eva pradṛśyate
c rajataṃ bahu citraṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca manoramam
a jñātīnāṃ tu bhavec chreṣṭhaḥ kurvañ śrāddhaṃ trayodaśīm
c avaśyaṃ tu yuvāno 'sya pramīyante narā gṛhe
a yuddhabhāgī bhaven martyaḥ śrāddhaṃ kurvaṃś caturdaśīm
b caturdaśīṃ prakurvāṇaḥ sukhabhāgī bhaven naraḥ
c amāvāsyāṃ tu nivapan sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt
a kṛṣṇapakṣe daśamyādau varjayitvā caturdaśīm
c śrāddhakarmaṇi tithyaḥ syuḥ praśastā na tathetarāḥ
a yathā caivāparaḥ pakṣaḥ pūrvapakṣād viśiṣyate
c tathā śrāddhasya pūrvāhṇād aparāhṇo viśiṣyate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kiṃ svid dattaṃ pitṛbhyo vai bhavaty akṣayam īśvara
c kiṃ haviś cirarātrāya kim ānantyāya kalpate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a havīṃṣi śrāddhakalpe tu yāni śrāddhavido viduḥ
c tāni me śṛṇu kāmyāni phalaṃ caiṣāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
a tilair vrīhiyavair māṣair adbhir mūlaphalais tathā
c dattena māsaṃ prīyante śrāddhena pitaro nṛpa
a vardhamānatilaṃ śrāddham akṣayaṃ manur abravīt
c sarveṣv eva tu bhojyeṣu tilāḥ prādhānyataḥ smṛtāḥ
a dvau māsau tu bhavet tṛptir matsyaiḥ pitṛgaṇasya ha
c trīn māsān āvikenāhuś cāturmāsyaṃ śaśena tu
a ājena māsān prīyante pañcaiva pitaro nṛpa
c vārāheṇa tu ṣaṇmāsān sapta vai śākunena tu
a māsān aṣṭau pārṣatena rauraveṇa navaiva tu
c gavayasya tu māṃsena tṛptiḥ syād daśamāsikī
a māsān ekādaśa prītiḥ pitṝṇāṃ māhiṣeṇa tu
c gavyena datte śrāddhe tu saṃvatsaram ihocyate
a yathā gavyaṃ tathā yuktaṃ pāyasaṃ sarpiṣā saha
c vādhrīṇasasya māṃsena tṛptir dvādaśavārṣikī
a ānantyāya bhaved dattaṃ khaḍgamāṃsaṃ pitṛkṣaye
c kālaśākaṃ ca lauhaṃ cāpy ānantyaṃ chāga ucyate
a gāthāś cāpy atra gāyanti pitṛgītā yudhiṣṭhira
c sanatkumāro bhagavān purā mayy abhyabhāṣata
a api naḥ sa kule jāyād yo no dadyāt trayodaśīm
c maghāsu sarpiṣā yuktaṃ pāyasaṃ dakṣiṇāyane
a ājena vāpi lauhena maghāsv eva yatavrataḥ
c hasticchāyāsu vidhivat karṇavyajanavījitam
a eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā yady eko 'pi gayāṃ vrajet
b yajed vā aśvamedhena nīlaṃ vā vṛṣam utsṛjet
c yatrāsau prathito lokeṣv akṣayyakaraṇo vaṭaḥ
a āpo mūlaṃ phalaṃ māṃsam annaṃ vāpi pitṛkṣaye
c yat kiṃ cin madhusaṃmiśraṃ tad ānantyāya kalpate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a yamas tu yāni śrāddhāni provāca śaśabindave
c tāni me śṛṇu kāmyāni nakṣatreṣu pṛthak pṛthak
a śrāddhaṃ yaḥ kṛttikāyoge kurvīta satataṃ naraḥ
c agnīn ādhāya sāpatyo yajeta vigatajvaraḥ
a apatyakāmo rohiṇyām ojaskāmo mṛgottame
c krūrakarmā dadac chrāddham ārdrāyāṃ mānavo bhavet
a kṛṣibhāgī bhaven martyaḥ kurvañ śrāddhaṃ punarvasau
c puṣṭikāmo 'tha puṣyeṇa śrāddham īheta mānavaḥ
a āśleṣāyāṃ dadac chrāddhaṃ vīrān putrān prajāyate
c jñātīnāṃ tu bhavec chreṣṭho maghāsu śrāddham āvapan
a phalgunīṣu dadac chrāddhaṃ subhagaḥ śrāddhado bhavet
c apatyabhāg uttarāsu hastena phalabhāg bhavet
a citrāyāṃ tu dadac chrāddhaṃ labhed rūpavataḥ sutān
b phalgunīṣu dadac chrāddhaṃ labhed rūpavataḥ sutān
b uttarāsu dadac chrāddhaṃ rūpavān abhijāyate
b haste caiva dadac chrāddhaṃ sukham atyantam aśnute
b citrāsu ca dadac chrāddhaṃ nānāphalam avāpnuyāt
c svātiyoge pitṝn arcya vāṇijyam upajīvati
a bahuputro viśākhāsu pitryam īhan bhaven naraḥ
c anurādhāsu kurvāṇo rājacakraṃ pravartayet
a ādipatyaṃ vrajen martyo jyeṣṭhāyām apavarjayan
c naraḥ kurukulaśreṣṭha śraddhādamapuraḥsaraḥ
a mūle tv ārogyam arccheta yaśo 'ṣāḍhāsv anuttamam
c uttarāsu tv aṣāḍhāsu vītaśokaś caren mahīm
a śrāddhaṃ tv abhijitā kurvan vidyāṃ śreṣṭhām avāpnuyāt
c śravaṇe tu dadac chrāddhaṃ pretya gacchet parāṃ gatim
a rājyabhāgī dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ prāpnuyān nāpadaṃ naraḥ
c nakṣatre vāruṇe kurvan bhiṣaksiddhim avāpnuyāt
d śravaṇe śrutisaṃpattir dhaniṣṭhāsu dhanaṃ bhavet
d tathā śatabhiṣagyoge vyādhimokṣo balaṃ tathā
a pūrvaproṣṭhapadāḥ kurvan bahu vinded ajāvikam
c uttarāsv atha kurvāṇo vindate gāḥ sahasraśaḥ
a bahurūpyakṛtaṃ vittaṃ vindate revatīṃ śritaḥ
c aśvāṃś cāśvayuje vetti bharaṇīṣv āyur uttamam
a imaṃ śrāddhavidhiṃ śrutvā śaśabindus tathākarot
c akleśenājayac cāpi mahīṃ so 'nuśaśāsa ha
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kīdṛśebhyaḥ pradātavyaṃ bhavec chrāddhaṃ pitāmaha
c dvijebhyaḥ kuruśārdūla tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a brāhmaṇān na parīkṣeta kṣatriyo dānadharmavit
c daive karmaṇi pitrye tu nyāyyam āhuḥ parīkṣaṇam
a devatāḥ pūjayantīha daivenaiveha tejasā
c upetya tasmād devebhyaḥ sarvebhyo dāpayen naraḥ
a śrāddhe tv atha mahārāja parīkṣed brāhmaṇān budhaḥ
c kulaśīlavayorūpair vidyayābhijanena ca
a eṣām anye paṅktidūṣās tathānye paṅktipāvanāḥ
c apāṅkteyās tu ye rājan kīrtayiṣyāmi tāñ śṛṇu
a kitavo bhrūṇahā yakṣmī paśupālo nirākṛtiḥ
c grāmapreṣyo vārdhuṣiko gāyanaḥ sarvavikrayī
a agāradāhī garadaḥ kuṇḍāśī somavikrayī
c sāmudriko rājabhṛtyas tailikaḥ kūṭakārakaḥ
a pitrā vivadamānaś ca yasya copapatir gṛhe
c abhiśastas tathā stenaḥ śilpaṃ yaś copajīvati
a parvakāraś ca sūcī ca mitradhruk pāradārikaḥ
c avratānām upādhyāyaḥ kāṇḍapṛṣṭhas tathaiva ca
a śvabhir yaś ca parikrāmed yaḥ śunā daṣṭa eva ca
c parivittiś ca yaś ca syād duścarmā gurutalpagaḥ
e kuśīlavo devalako nakṣatrair yaś ca jīvati
f īdṛśair brāhmaṇair bhuktam apāṅkteyair yudhiṣṭhira
f rakṣāṃsi gacchate havyam ity āhur brahmavādinaḥ
f śrāddhaṃ bhuktvā tv adhīyīta vṛṣalītalpagaś ca yaḥ
f purīṣe tasya taṃ māsaṃ pitaras tasya śerate
f somavikrayiṇe viṣṭhā bhiṣaje pūyaśoṇitam
f naṣṭaṃ devalake dattam apratiṣṭhaṃ ca vārdhuṣe
f yat tu vāṇijake dattaṃ neha nāmutra tad bhavet
f bhasmanīva hutaṃ havyaṃ tathā paunarbhave dvije
f ye tu dharmavyapeteṣu cāritrāpagateṣu ca
f havyaṃ kavyaṃ prayacchanti teṣāṃ tat pretya naśyati
f jñānapūrvaṃ tu ye tebhyaḥ prayacchanty alpabuddhayaḥ
f purīṣaṃ bhuñjate tasya pitaraḥ pretya niścayaḥ
a etān iha vijānīyād apāṅkteyān dvijādhamān
c śūdrāṇām upadeśaṃ ca ye kurvanty alpacetasaḥ
a ṣaṣṭiṃ kāṇaḥ śataṃ ṣaṇḍhaḥ śvitrī yāvat prapaśyati
c paṅktyāṃ samupaviṣṭāyāṃ tāvad dūṣayate nṛpa
a yad veṣṭitaśirā bhuṅkte yad bhuṅkte dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ
c sopānatkaś ca yad bhuṅkte sarvaṃ vidyāt tad āsuram
a asūyatā ca yad dattaṃ yac ca śraddhāvivarjitam
c sarvaṃ tad asurendrāya brahmā bhāgam akalpayat
a śvānaś ca paṅktidūṣāś ca nāvekṣeran kathaṃ cana
c tasmāt parivṛte dadyāt tilāṃś cānvavakīrayet
a tilādāne ca kravyādā ye ca krodhavaśā gaṇāḥ
b tilair virahitaṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ krodhavaśena ca
c yātudhānāḥ piśācāś ca vipralumpanti tad dhaviḥ
a yāvad dhy apaṅktyaḥ paṅktyāṃ vai bhuñjānān anupaśyati
c tāvat phalād bhraṃśayati dātāraṃ tasya bāliśam
a ime tu bharataśreṣṭha vijñeyāḥ paṅktipāvanāḥ
c ye tv atas tān pravakṣyāmi parīkṣasveha tān dvijān
a vedavidyāvratasnātā brāhmaṇāḥ sarva eva hi
b sadācāraparāś caiva vijñeyāḥ sarvapāvanāḥ
c pāṅkteyān yāṃs tu vakṣyāmi jñeyās te paṅktipāvanāḥ
a triṇāciketaḥ pañcāgnis trisuparṇaḥ ṣaḍaṅgavit
c brahmadeyānusaṃtānaś chandogo jyeṣṭhasāmagaḥ
a mātāpitror yaś ca vaśyaḥ śrotriyo daśapūruṣaḥ
c ṛtukālābhigāmī ca dharmapatnīṣu yaḥ sadā
e vedavidyāvratasnāto vipraḥ paṅktiṃ punāty uta
a atharvaśiraso 'dhyetā brahmacārī yatavrataḥ
c satyavādī dharmaśīlaḥ svakarmanirataś ca yaḥ
a ye ca puṇyeṣu tīrtheṣu abhiṣekakṛtaśramāḥ
c makheṣu ca samantreṣu bhavanty avabhṛthāplutāḥ
a akrodhanā acapalāḥ kṣāntā dāntā jitendriyāḥ
c sarvabhūtahitā ye ca śrāddheṣv etān nimantrayet
e eteṣu dattam akṣayyam ete vai paṅktipāvanāḥ
a ime pare mahārāja vijñeyāḥ paṅktipāvanāḥ
c yatayo mokṣadharmajñā yogāḥ sucaritavratāḥ
d pañcarātravido mukhyās tathā bhāgavatāḥ pare
d vaikhānasāḥ kulaśreṣṭhā vaidikācāracāriṇaḥ
a ye cetihāsaṃ prayatāḥ śrāvayanti dvijottamān
c ye ca bhāṣyavidaḥ ke cid ye ca vyākaraṇe ratāḥ
a adhīyate purāṇaṃ ye dharmaśāstrāṇy athāpi ca
c adhītya ca yathānyāyaṃ vidhivat tasya kāriṇaḥ
a upapanno gurukule satyavādī sahasradaḥ
c agryaḥ sarveṣu vedeṣu sarvapravacaneṣu ca
a yāvad ete prapaśyanti paṅktyās tāvat punanty uta
c tato hi pāvanāt paṅktyāḥ paṅktipāvana ucyate
a krośād ardhatṛtīyāt tu pāvayed eka eva hi
c brahmadeyānusaṃtāna iti brahmavido viduḥ
a anṛtvig anupādhyāyaḥ sa ced agrāsanaṃ vrajet
c ṛtvigbhir ananujñātaḥ paṅktyā harati duṣkṛtam
a atha ced vedavit sarvaiḥ paṅktidoṣair vivarjitaḥ
b atharvavedavit sarvaṃ paṅktidoṣaṃ vyapānudet
b vedaśāstravidaṃ vipraṃ sarvadoṣair vivarjitam
c na ca syāt patito rājan paṅktipāvana eva saḥ
a tasmāt sarvaprayatnena parīkṣyāmantrayed dvijān
c svakarmaniratān dāntān kule jātān bahuśrutān
a yasya mitrapradhānāni śrāddhāni ca havīṃṣi ca
c na prīṇāti pitṝn devān svargaṃ ca na sa gacchati
a yaś ca śrāddhe kurute saṃgatāni
na devayānena pathā sa yāti
c sa vai muktaḥ pippalaṃ bandhanād vā
svargāl lokāc cyavate śrāddhamitraḥ
a tasmān mitraṃ śrāddhakṛn nādriyeta
dadyān mitrebhyaḥ saṃgrahārthaṃ dhanāni
c yaṃ manyate naiva śatruṃ na mitraṃ
taṃ madhyasthaṃ bhojayed dhavyakavye
a yathoṣare bījam uptaṃ na rohen
na cāsyoptā prāpnuyād bījabhāgam
c evaṃ śrāddhaṃ bhuktam anarhamāṇair
na ceha nāmutra phalaṃ dadāti
a brāhmaṇo hy anadhīyānas tṛṇāgnir iva śāmyati
c tasmai śrāddhaṃ na dātavyaṃ na hi bhasmani hūyate
a saṃbhojanī nāma piśācadakṣiṇā
sā naiva devān na pitṝn upaiti
c ihaiva sā bhrāmyati kṣīṇapuṇyā
śālāntare gaur iva naṣṭavatsā
a yathāgnau śānte ghṛtam ājuhoti
tan naiva devān na pitṝn upaiti
c tathā dattaṃ nartane gāyane ca
yāṃ cānṛce dakṣiṇām āvṛṇoti
a ubhau hinasti na bhunakti caiṣā
yā cānṛce dakṣiṇā dīyate vai
c āghātanī garhitaiṣā patantī
teṣāṃ pretān pātayed devayānāt
a ṛṣīṇāṃ samayaṃ nityaṃ ye caranti yudhiṣṭhira
c niścitāḥ sarvadharmajñās tān devā brāhmaṇān viduḥ
a svādhyāyaniṣṭhā ṛṣayo jñānaniṣṭhās tathaiva ca
c taponiṣṭhāś ca boddhavyāḥ karmaniṣṭhāś ca bhārata
a kavyāni jñānaniṣṭhebhyaḥ pratiṣṭhāpyāni bhārata
c tatra ye brāhmaṇāḥ ke cin na nindati hi te varāḥ
a ye tu nindanti jalpeṣu na tāñ śrāddheṣu bhojayet
c brāhmaṇā ninditā rājan hanyus tripuruṣaṃ kulam
a vaikhānasānāṃ vacanam ṛṣīṇāṃ śrūyate nṛpa
c dūrād eva parīkṣeta brāhmaṇān vedapāragān
e priyān vā yadi vā dveṣyāṃs teṣu tac chrāddham āvapet
a yaḥ sahasraṃ sahasrāṇāṃ bhojayed anṛcāṃ naraḥ
c ekas tān mantravit prītaḥ sarvān arhati bhārata
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kena saṃkalpitaṃ śrāddhaṃ kasmin kāle kim ātmakam
c bhṛgvaṅgirasake kāle muninā katareṇa vā
a kāni śrāddheṣu varjyāni tathā mūlaphalāni ca
c dhānyajātiś ca kā varjyā tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a yathā śrāddhaṃ saṃpravṛttaṃ yasmin kāle yad ātmakam
c yena saṃkalpitaṃ caiva tan me śṛṇu janādhipa
a svāyaṃbhuvo 'triḥ kauravya paramarṣiḥ pratāpavān
c tasya vaṃśe mahārāja dattātreya iti smṛtaḥ
a dattātreyasya putro 'bhūn nimir nāma tapodhanaḥ
c nimeś cāpy abhavat putraḥ śrīmān nāma śriyā vṛtaḥ
a pūrṇe varṣasahasrānte sa kṛtvā duṣkaraṃ tapaḥ
c kāladharmaparītātmā nidhanaṃ samupāgataḥ
a nimis tu kṛtvā śaucāni vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
c saṃtāpam agamat tīvraṃ putraśokaparāyaṇaḥ
a atha kṛtvopahāryāṇi caturdaśyāṃ mahāmatiḥ
c tam eva gaṇayañ śokaṃ virātre pratyabudhyata
a tasyāsīt pratibuddhasya śokena pihitātmanaḥ
c manaḥ saṃhṛtya viṣaye buddhir vistaragāminī
a tataḥ saṃcintayām āsa śrāddhakalpaṃ samāhitaḥ
c yāni tasyaiva bhojyāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca
a uktāni yāni cānyāni yāni ceṣṭāni tasya ha
c tāni sarvāṇi manasā viniścitya tapodhanaḥ
a amāvāsyāṃ mahāprājña viprān ānāyya pūjitān
c dakṣiṇāvartikāḥ sarvā bṛsīḥ svayam athākarot
a sapta viprāṃs tato bhojye yugapat samupānayat
c ṛte ca lavaṇaṃ bhojyaṃ śyāmākānnaṃ dadau prabhuḥ
a dakṣiṇāgrās tato darbhā viṣṭareṣu niveśitāḥ
c pādayoś caiva viprāṇāṃ ye tv annam upabhuñjate
a kṛtvā ca dakṣiṇāgrān vai darbhān suprayataḥ śuciḥ
c pradadau śrīmate piṇḍaṃ nāmagotram udāharan
a tat kṛtvā sa muniśreṣṭho dharmasaṃkaram ātmanaḥ
b buddhvātriṃ manasā dadhyau bhagavantaṃ samāhitaḥ
c paścāttāpena mahatā tapyamāno 'bhyacintayat
a akṛtaṃ munibhiḥ pūrvaṃ kiṃ mayaitad anuṣṭhitam
c kathaṃ nu śāpena na māṃ daheyur brāhmaṇā iti
a tataḥ saṃcintayām āsa vaṃśakartāram ātmanaḥ
c dhyātamātras tathā cātrir ājagāma tapodhanaḥ
a athātris taṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā putraśokena karśitam
c bhṛśam āśvāsayām āsa vāgbhir iṣṭābhir avyayaḥ
a nime saṃkalpitas te 'yaṃ pitṛyajñas tapodhanaḥ
c mā te bhūd bhīḥ pūrvadṛṣṭo dharmo 'yaṃ brahmaṇā svayam
a so 'yaṃ svayaṃbhuvihito dharmaḥ saṃkalpitas tvayā
c ṛte svayaṃbhuvaḥ ko 'nyaḥ śrāddheyaṃ vidhim āharet
a ākhyāsyāmi ca te bhūyaḥ śrāddheyaṃ vidhim uttamam
c svayaṃbhuvihitaṃ putra tat kuruṣva nibodha me
a kṛtvāgnikaraṇaṃ pūrvaṃ mantrapūrvaṃ tapodhana
c tato 'ryamṇe ca somāya varuṇāya ca nityaśaḥ
a viśvedevāś ca ye nityaṃ pitṛbhiḥ saha gocarāḥ
c tebhyaḥ saṃkalpitā bhāgāḥ svayam eva svayaṃbhuvā
a stotavyā ceha pṛthivī nivāpasyeha dhāriṇī
c vaiṣṇavī kāśyapī ceti tathaivehākṣayeti ca
a udakānayane caiva stotavyo varuṇo vibhuḥ
c tato 'gniś caiva somaś ca āpyāyyāv iha te 'nagha
a devās tu pitaro nāma nirmitā vai svayaṃbhuvā
c ūṣmapāḥ sumahābhāgās teṣāṃ bhāgāḥ prakalpitāḥ
d somapāś ca haviṣmantas tathā barhiṣadā api
