a te śrāddhenārcyamānā vai vimucyante ha kilbiṣāt
c saptakaḥ pitṛvaṃśas tu pūrvadṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃbhuvā
a viśve cāgnimukhā devāḥ saṃkhyātāḥ pūrvam eva te
c teṣāṃ nāmāni vakṣyāmi bhāgārhāṇāṃ mahātmanām
a sahaḥ kṛtir vipāpmā ca puṇyakṛt pāvanas tathā
c grāmniḥ kṣemaḥ samūhaś ca divyasānus tathaiva ca
a vivasvān vīryavān hrīmān kīrtimān kṛta eva ca
c vipūrvaḥ somapūrvaś ca sūryaśrīś ceti nāmataḥ
a somapaḥ sūryasāvitro dattātmā puṣkarīyakaḥ
c uṣṇīnābho nabhodaś ca viśvāyur dīptir eva ca
a camūharaḥ suveṣaś ca vyomāriḥ śaṃkaro bhavaḥ
c īśaḥ kartā kṛtir dakṣo bhuvano divyakarmakṛt
a gaṇitaḥ pañcavīryaś ca ādityo raśmimāṃs tathā
c saptakṛt somavarcāś ca viśvakṛt kavir eva ca
a anugoptā sugoptā ca naptā ceśvara eva ca
b ajo marīcir ity eva viśvedevāḥ sanātanāḥ
c jitātmā munivīryaś ca dīptalomā bhayaṃkaraḥ
a atikarmā pratītaś ca pradātā cāṃśumāṃs tathā
c śailābhaḥ paramakrodhī dhīroṣṇī bhūpatis tathā
a srajī vajrī varī caiva viśvedevāḥ sanātanāḥ
c kīrtitās te mahābhāgāḥ kālasya gatigocarāḥ
a aśrāddheyāni dhānyāni kodravāḥ pulakās tathā
c hiṅgu dravyeṣu śākeṣu palāṇḍuṃ laśunaṃ tathā
a palāṇḍuḥ saubhañjanakas tathā gṛñjanakādayaḥ
c kūṣmāṇḍajātyalābuṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ lavaṇam eva ca
a grāmyaṃ vārāhamāṃsaṃ ca yac caivāprokṣitaṃ bhavet
c kṛṣṇājājī viḍaś caiva śītapākī tathaiva ca
e aṅkurādyās tathā varjyā iha śṛṅgāṭakāni ca
a varjayel lavaṇaṃ sarvaṃ tathā jambūphalāni ca
c avakṣutāvaruditaṃ tathā śrāddheṣu varjayet
a nivāpe havyakavye vā garhitaṃ ca śvadarśanam
c pitaraś caiva devāś ca nābhinandanti tad dhaviḥ
a caṇḍālaśvapacau varjyau nivāpe samupasthite
c kāṣāyavāsī kuṣṭhī vā patito brahmahāpi vā
a saṃkīrṇayonir vipraś ca saṃbandhī patitaś ca yaḥ
c varjanīyā budhair ete nivāpe samupasthite
a ity evam uktvā bhagavān svavaṃśajam ṛṣiṃ purā
c pitāmahasabhāṃ divyāṃ jagāmātris tapodhanaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tathā vidhau pravṛtte tu sarva eva maharṣayaḥ
c pitṛyajñān akurvanta vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
a ṛṣayo dharmanityās tu kṛtvā nivapanāny uta
c tarpaṇaṃ cāpy akurvanta tīrthāmbhobhir yatavratāḥ
a nivāpair dīyamānaiś ca cāturvarṇyena bhārata
c tarpitāḥ pitaro devās te nānnaṃ jarayanti vai
a ajīrṇenābhihanyante te devāḥ pitṛbhiḥ saha
c somam evābhyapadyanta nivāpānnābhipīḍitāḥ
a te 'bruvan somam āsādya pitaro 'jīrṇapīḍitāḥ
c nivāpānnena pīḍyāmaḥ śreyo no 'tra vidhīyatām
a tān somaḥ pratyuvācātha śreyaś ced īpsitaṃ surāḥ
c svayaṃbhūsadanaṃ yāta sa vaḥ śreyo vidhāsyati
a te somavacanād devāḥ pitṛbhiḥ saha bhārata
c meruśṛṅge samāsīnaṃ pitāmaham upāgaman
 pitara ūcuḥ
a nivāpānnena bhagavan bhṛśaṃ pīḍyāmahe vayam
c prasādaṃ kuru no deva śreyo naḥ saṃvidhīyatām
a iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā svayaṃbhūr idam abravīt
c eṣa me pārśvato vahnir yuṣmacchreyo vidhāsyati
 agnir uvāca
a sahitās tāta bhokṣyāmo nivāpe samupasthite
c jarayiṣyatha cāpy annaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
a etac chrutvā tu pitaras tatas te vijvarābhavan
c etasmāt kāraṇāc cāgneḥ prāktanaṃ dīyate nṛpa
a nivapte cāgnipūrve vai nivāpe puruṣarṣabha
c na brahmarākṣasās taṃ vai nivāpaṃ dharṣayanty uta
e rakṣāṃsi cāpavartante sthite deve vibhāvasau
a pūrvaṃ piṇḍaṃ pitur dadyāt tato dadyāt pitāmahe
c prapitāmahāya ca tata eṣa śrāddhavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
a brūyāc chrāddhe ca sāvitrīṃ piṇḍe piṇḍe samāhitaḥ
c somāyeti ca vaktavyaṃ tathā pitṛmateti ca
a rajasvalā ca yā nārī vyaṅgitā karṇayoś ca yā
c nivāpe nopatiṣṭheta saṃgrāhyā nānyavaṃśajāḥ
a jalaṃ prataramāṇaś ca kīrtayeta pitāmahān
c nadīm āsādya kurvīta pitṝṇāṃ piṇḍatarpaṇam
a pūrvaṃ svavaṃśajānāṃ tu kṛtvādbhis tarpaṇaṃ punaḥ
c suhṛtsaṃbandhivargāṇāṃ tato dadyāj jalāñjalim
a kalmāṣagoyugenātha yuktena tarato jalam
c pitaro 'bhilaṣante vai nāvaṃ cāpy adhirohataḥ
e sadā nāvi jalaṃ tajjñāḥ prayacchanti samāhitāḥ
a māsārdhe kṛṣṇapakṣasya kuryān nivapanāni vai
c puṣṭir āyus tathā vīryaṃ śrīś caiva pitṛvartinaḥ
a pitāmahaḥ pulastyaś ca vasiṣṭhaḥ pulahas tathā
c aṅgirāś ca kratuś caiva kaśyapaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
e ete kurukulaśreṣṭha mahāyogeśvarāḥ smṛtāḥ
a ete ca pitaro rājann eṣa śrāddhavidhiḥ paraḥ
c pretās tu piṇḍasaṃbandhān mucyante tena karmaṇā
a ity eṣā puruṣaśreṣṭha śrāddhotpattir yathāgamam
c khyāpitā pūrvanirdiṣṭā dānaṃ vakṣyāmy ataḥ param
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a dvijātayo vratopetā havis te yadi bhuñjate
c annaṃ brāhmaṇakāmāya katham etat pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a avedoktavratāś caiva bhuñjānāḥ kāryakāriṇaḥ
c vedokteṣu tu bhuñjānā vrataluptā yudhiṣṭhira
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yad idaṃ tapa ity āhur upavāsaṃ pṛthagjanāḥ
c tapaḥ syād etad iha vai tapo 'nyad vāpi kiṃ bhavet
 bhīṣma uvāca
a māsārdhamāsau nopavased yat tapo manyate janaḥ
c ātmatantropaghātī yo na tapasvī na dharmavit
a tyāgasyāpi ca saṃpattiḥ śiṣyate tapa uttamam
c sadopavāsī ca bhaved brahmacārī tathaiva ca
a muniś ca syāt sadā vipro devāṃś caiva sadā yajet
c kuṭumbiko dharmakāmaḥ sadāsvapnaś ca bhārata
a amṛtāśī sadā ca syāt pavitrī ca sadā bhavet
c ṛtavādī sadā ca syān niyataś ca sadā bhavet
a vighasāśī sadā ca syāt sadā caivātithipriyaḥ
c amāṃsāśī sadā ca syāt pavitrī ca sadā bhavet
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kathaṃ sadopavāsī syād brahmacārī ca pārthiva
c vighasāśī kathaṃ ca syāt kathaṃ caivātithipriyaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a antarā sāyamāśaṃ ca prātarāśaṃ tathaiva ca
c sadopavāsī bhavati yo na bhuṅkte 'ntarā punaḥ
d yo na bhuṅkte sa bhavati upavāsī sadā dvijaḥ
a bhāryāṃ gacchan brahmacārī sadā bhavati caiva ha
c ṛtavādī sadā ca syād dānaśīlaś ca mānavaḥ
a abhakṣayan vṛthā māṃsam amāṃsāśī bhavaty uta
c dānaṃ dadat pavitrī syād asvapnaś ca divāsvapan
a bhṛtyātithiṣu yo bhuṅkte bhuktavatsu naraḥ sadā
c amṛtaṃ kevalaṃ bhuṅkte iti viddhi yudhiṣṭhira
a abhuktavatsu nāśnāti brāhmaṇeṣu tu yo naraḥ
c abhojanena tenāsya jitaḥ svargo bhavaty uta
a devebhyaś ca pitṛbhyaś ca bhṛtyebhyo 'tithibhiḥ saha
c avaśiṣṭāni yo bhuṅkte tam āhur vighasāśinam
a teṣāṃ lokā hy aparyantāḥ sadane brahmaṇaḥ smṛtāḥ
c upasthitā hy apsarobhir gandharvaiś ca janādhipa
a devatātithibhiḥ sārdhaṃ pitṛbhiś copabhuñjate
c ramante putrapautraiś ca teṣāṃ gatir anuttamā
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchanti dānāni vividhāni ca
c dātṛpratigrahītror vā ko viśeṣaḥ pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sādhor yaḥ pratigṛhṇīyāt tathaivāsādhuto dvijaḥ
c guṇavaty alpadoṣaḥ syān nirguṇe tu nimajjati
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c vṛṣādarbheś ca saṃvādaṃ saptarṣīṇāṃ ca bhārata
a kaśyapo 'trir vasiṣṭhaś ca bharadvājo 'tha gautamaḥ
c viśvāmitro jamadagniḥ sādhvī caivāpy arundhatī
d kāśyapo 'trir bharadvājo viśvāmitro 'tha gautamaḥ
d jamadagnir vasiṣṭhaś ca sādhvī caivāpy arundhatī
a sarveṣām atha teṣāṃ tu gaṇḍābhūt karmakārikā
c śūdraḥ paśusakhaś caiva bhartā cāsyā babhūva ha
a te vai sarve tapasyantaḥ purā cerur mahīm imām
c samādhinopaśikṣanto brahmalokaṃ sanātanam
a athābhavad anāvṛṣṭir mahatī kurunandana
c kṛcchraprāṇo 'bhavad yatra loko 'yaṃ vai kṣudhānvitaḥ
a kasmiṃś cic ca purā yajñe yājyena śibisūnunā
c dakṣiṇārthe 'tha ṛtvigbhyo dattaḥ putro nijaḥ kila
a tasmin kāle 'tha so 'lpāyur diṣṭāntam agamat prabho
c te taṃ kṣudhābhisaṃtaptāḥ parivāryopatasthire
a yājyātmajam atho dṛṣṭvā gatāsum ṛṣisattamāḥ
c apacanta tadā sthālyāṃ kṣudhārtāḥ kila bhārata
a nirādye martyaloke 'sminn ātmānaṃ te parīpsavaḥ
c kṛcchrām āpedire vṛttim annahetos tapasvinaḥ
a aṭamāno 'tha tān mārge pacamānān mahīpatiḥ
c rājā śaibyo vṛṣādarbhiḥ kliśyamānān dadarśa ha
d pratigrahanimittaṃ vai pratyuvāca sa tān nṛpaḥ
 vṛṣādarbhir uvāca
a pratigrahas tārayati puṣṭir vai pratigṛhṇatām
b tasmād dadāmi vo vittaṃ tad gṛhṇīdhvaṃ tapodhanāḥ
c mayi yad vidyate vittaṃ tac chṛṇudhvaṃ tapodhanāḥ
a priyo hi me brāhmaṇo yācamāno
dadyām ahaṃ vo 'śvatarīsahasram
b dhenūnāṃ dadāmy ayutaṃ samagram
c ekaikaśaḥ savṛṣāḥ saṃprasūtāḥ
sarveṣāṃ vai śīghragāḥ śvetalomāḥ
d manojavān pradadāmy arbudāni
a kulaṃbharān anaḍuhaḥ śataṃśatān
dhuryāñ śubhān sarvaśo 'haṃ dadāni
c pṛthvīvāhān pīvarāṃś caiva tāvad
agryā gṛṣṭyo dhenavaḥ suvratāś ca
a varān grāmān vrīhiyavaṃ rasāṃś ca
ratnaṃ cānyad durlabhaṃ kiṃ dadāni
c mā smābhakṣye bhāvam evaṃ kurudhvaṃ
puṣṭyarthaṃ vai kiṃ prayacchāmy ahaṃ vaḥ
 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
a rājan pratigraho rājño madhvāsvādo viṣopamaḥ
c taj jānamānaḥ kasmāt tvaṃ kuruṣe naḥ pralobhanam
d daśasūnāsamaś cakrī daśacakrisamo dhvajī
d daśadhvajisamā veśyā daśaveśyāsamo nṛpaḥ
d daśasūnāsahasrāṇi yo vāhayati sainikaḥ
d tena tulyo bhaved rājā ghoras tasya pratigrahaḥ
a kṣatraṃ hi daivatam iva brāhmaṇaṃ samupāśritam
c amalo hy eṣa tapasā prītaḥ prīṇāti devatāḥ
a ahnāpīha tapo jātu brāhmaṇasyopajāyate
b yad ahobhiḥ subahubhiḥ saṃcitaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ
c tad dāva iva nirdahyāt prāpto rājapratigrahaḥ
a kuśalaṃ saha dānena rājann astu sadā tava
c arthibhyo dīyatāṃ sarvam ity uktvā te tato yayuḥ
a apakvam eva tan māṃsam abhūt teṣāṃ ca dhīmatām
c atha hitvā yayuḥ sarve vanam āhārakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
a tataḥ pracoditā rājñā vanaṃ gatvāsya mantriṇaḥ
c pracīyodumbarāṇi sma dānaṃ dātuṃ pracakramuḥ
a udumbarāṇy athānyāni hemagarbhāṇy upāharan
c bhṛtyās teṣāṃ tatas tāni pragrāhitum upādravan
d dṛṣṭvā phalāni munayas te grahītum upādravan
a gurūṇīti viditvātha na grāhyāṇy atrir abravīt
c na sma he mūḍhavijñānā na sma he mandabuddhayaḥ
e haimānīmāni jānīmaḥ pratibuddhāḥ sma jāgṛmaḥ
a iha hy etad upādattaṃ pretya syāt kaṭukodayam
c apratigrāhyam evaitat pretya ceha sukhepsunā
 vasiṣṭha uvāca
a śatena niṣkaṃ gaṇitaṃ sahasreṇa ca saṃmitam
c yathā bahu pratīcchan hi pāpiṣṭhāṃ labhate gatim
 kaśyapa uvāca
a yat pṛthivyāṃ vrīhiyavaṃ hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥ
c sarvaṃ tan nālam ekasya tasmād vidvāñ śamaṃ vrajet
 bharadvāja uvāca
a utpannasya ruroḥ śṛṅgaṃ vardhamānasya vardhate
c prārthanā puruṣasyeva tasya mātrā na vidyate
 gautama uvāca
a na tal loke dravyam asti yal lokaṃ pratipūrayet
c samudrakalpaḥ puruṣo na kadā cana pūryate
 viśvāmitra uvāca
a kāmaṃ kāmayamānasya yadā kāmaḥ samṛdhyate
c athainam aparaḥ kāmas tṛṣṇā vidhyati bāṇavat
d atriḥ
d na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati
d haviṣā kṛṣṇavartmeva bhūya evābhivardhate
 jamadagnir uvāca
a pratigrahe saṃyamo vai tapo dhārayate dhruvam
c tad dhanaṃ brāhmaṇasyeha lubhyamānasya visravet
 arundhaty uvāca
a dharmārthaṃ saṃcayo yo vai dravyāṇāṃ pakṣasaṃmataḥ
c tapaḥsaṃcaya eveha viśiṣṭo dravyasaṃcayāt
 gaṇḍovāca
a ugrād ito bhayād yasmād bibhyatīme mameśvarāḥ
c balīyāṃso durbalavad bibhemy aham ataḥ param
 paśusakha uvāca
 yathā caranti vidvāṃsas tathā dharmaparāyaṇāḥ
 tad eva viduṣā kāryam ātmano hitam icchatā
a yad vai dharme paraṃ nāsti brāhmaṇās tad dhanaṃ viduḥ
c vinayārthaṃ suvidvāṃsam upāseyaṃ yathātatham
 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
 yasya syād vibhavotkaṇṭhā tṛṣṇā yasyādhikā bhavet
 vinayāt sa samṛddhārthān samupāsīta yatnataḥ
a kuśalaṃ saha dānāya tasmai yasya prajā imāḥ
b kaśmalādhamadānāya pratiyatnāḥ prajādhamāḥ
c phalāny upadhiyuktāni ya evaṃ naḥ prayacchasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktvā hemagarbhāṇi hitvā tāni phalāni te
c ṛṣayo jagmur anyatra sarva eva dhṛtavratāḥ
d atha te mantriṇaḥ sarve rājānam idam abruvan
 mantriṇaḥ ūcuḥ
a upadhiṃ śaṅkamānās te hitvemāni phalāni vai
c tato 'nyenaiva gacchanti viditaṃ te 'stu pārthiva
a ity uktaḥ sa tu bhṛtyais tair vṛṣādarbhiś cukopa ha
c teṣāṃ saṃpratikartuṃ ca sarveṣām agamad gṛham
a sa gatvāhavanīye 'gnau tīvraṃ niyamam āsthitaḥ
c juhāva saṃskṛtāṃ mantrair ekaikām āhutiṃ nṛpaḥ
a tasmād agneḥ samuttasthau kṛtyā lokabhayaṃkarī
c tasyā nāma vṛṣādarbhir yātudhānīty athākarot
a sā kṛtyā kālarātrīva kṛtāñjalir upasthitā
c vṛṣādarbhiṃ narapatiṃ kiṃ karomīti cābravīt
 vṛṣādarbhir uvāca
a ṛṣīṇāṃ gaccha saptānām arundhatyās tathaiva ca
c dāsībhartuś ca dāsyāś ca manasā nāma dhāraya
a jñātvā nāmāni caiteṣāṃ sarvān etān vināśaya
c vinaṣṭeṣu yathā svairaṃ gaccha yatrepsitaṃ tava
a sā tatheti pratiśrutya yātudhānī svarūpiṇī
c jagāma tad vanaṃ yatra vicerus te maharṣayaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a athātripramukhā rājan vane tasmin maharṣayaḥ
c vyacaran bhakṣayanto vai mūlāni ca phalāni ca
a athāpaśyan supīnāṃsapāṇipādamukhodaram
c parivrajantaṃ sthūlāṅgaṃ parivrājaṃ śunaḥsakham
a arundhatī tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvāṅgopacitaṃ śubhā
c bhavitāro bhavanto vai naivam ity abravīd ṛṣīn
 vasiṣṭha uvāca
a naitasyeha yathāsmākam agnihotram anirhutam
c sāyaṃ prātaś ca hotavyaṃ tena pīvāñ śunaḥsakhaḥ
 atrir uvāca
a naitasyeha yathāsmākaṃ kṣudhā vīryaṃ samāhatam
c kṛcchrādhītaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ ca tena pīvāñ śunaḥsakhaḥ
 viśvāmitra uvāca
a naitasyeha yathāsmākaṃ śaśvac chāstraṃ jaradgavaḥ
c alasaḥ kṣutparo mūrkhas tena pīvāñ śunaḥsakhaḥ
 jamadagnir uvāca
a naitasyeha yathāsmākaṃ bhaktam indhanam eva ca
c saṃcintya vārṣikaṃ kiṃ cit tena pīvāñ śunaḥsakhaḥ
 kaśyapa uvāca
a naitasyeha yathāsmākaṃ catvāraś ca sahodarāḥ
c dehi dehīti bhikṣanti tena pīvāñ śunaḥsakhaḥ
 bharadvāja uvāca
a naitasyeha yathāsmākaṃ brahmabandhor acetasaḥ
c śoko bhāryāpavādena tena pīvāñ śunaḥsakhaḥ
 gautama uvāca
a naitasyeha yathāsmākaṃ trikauśeyaṃ hi rāṅkavam
c ekaikaṃ vai trivārṣīyaṃ tena pīvāñ śunaḥsakhaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atha dṛṣṭvā parivrāṭ sa tān maharṣīñ śunaḥsakhaḥ
c abhigamya yathānyāyaṃ pāṇisparśam athācarat
a paricaryāṃ vane tāṃ tu kṣutpratīghātakārikām
c anyonyena nivedyātha prātiṣṭhanta sahaiva te
a ekaniścayakāryāś ca vyacaranta vanāni te
c ādadānāḥ samuddhṛtya mūlāni ca phalāni ca
a kadā cid vicarantas te vṛkṣair aviralair vṛtām
c śucivāriprasannodāṃ dadṛśuḥ padminīṃ śubhām
a bālādityavapuḥprakhyaiḥ puṣkarair upaśobhitām
c vaidūryavarṇasadṛśaiḥ padmapatrair athāvṛtām
a nānāvidhaiś ca vihagair jalaprakarasevibhiḥ
c ekadvārām anādeyāṃ sūpatīrthām akardamām
a vṛṣādarbhiprayuktā tu kṛtyā vikṛtadarśanā
c yātudhānīti vikhyātā padminīṃ tām arakṣata
a śunaḥsakhasahāyās tu bisārthaṃ te maharṣayaḥ
c padminīm abhijagmus te sarve kṛtyābhirakṣitām
a tatas te yātudhānīṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vikṛtadarśanām
c sthitāṃ kamalinītīre kṛtyām ūcur maharṣayaḥ
a ekā tiṣṭhasi kā nu tvaṃ kasyārthe kiṃ prayojanam
c padminītīram āśritya brūhi tvaṃ kiṃ cikīrṣasi
 yātudhāny uvāca
a yāsmi sāsmy anuyogo me na kartavyaḥ kathaṃ cana
c ārakṣiṇīṃ māṃ padminyā vitta sarve tapodhanāḥ
 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
a sarva eva kṣudhārtāḥ sma na cānyat kiṃ cid asti naḥ
c bhavatyāḥ saṃmate sarve gṛhṇīmahi bisāny uta
 yātudhāny uvāca
a samayena bisānīto gṛhṇīdhvaṃ kāmakārataḥ
c ekaiko nāma me proktvā tato gṛhṇīta māciram
 bhīṣma uvāca
a vijñāya yātudhānīṃ tāṃ kṛtyām ṛṣivadhaiṣiṇīm
c atriḥ kṣudhāparītātmā tato vacanam abravīt
a arātrir atreḥ sā rātrir yāṃ nādhīte trir adya vai
c arātrir atrir ity eva nāma me viddhi śobhane
 yātudhāny uvāca
a yathodāhṛtam etat te mayi nāma mahāmune
c durdhāryam etan manasā gacchāvatara padminīm
 vasiṣṭha uvāca
a vasiṣṭho 'smi variṣṭho 'smi vase vāsaṃ gṛheṣv api
c variṣṭhatvāc ca vāsāc ca vasiṣṭha iti viddhi mām
 yātudhāny uvāca
a nāmanairuktam etat te duḥkhavyābhāṣitākṣaram
c naitad dhārayituṃ śakyaṃ gacchāvatara padminīm
 kaśyapa uvāca
a kulaṃ kulaṃ ca kupapaḥ kupayaḥ kaśyapo dvijaḥ
c kāśyaḥ kāśanikāśatvād etan me nāma dhāraya
 yātudhāny uvāca
a yathodāhṛtam etat te mayi nāma mahāmune
c durdhāryam etan manasā gacchāvatara padminīm
 bharadvāja uvāca
a bhare sutān bhare śiṣyān bhare devān bhare dvijān
c bhare bhāryām anavyājo bharadvājo 'smi śobhane
 yātudhāny uvāca
a nāmanairuktam etat te duḥkhavyābhāṣitākṣaram
c naitad dhārayituṃ śakyaṃ gacchāvatara padminīm
 gautama uvāca
a godamo damago 'dhūmo damo durdarśanaś ca te
b gobhis tamo mama dhvastaṃ jātamātrasya dehataḥ
c viddhi māṃ gautamaṃ kṛtye yātudhāni nibodha me
 yātudhāny uvāca
a yathodāhṛtam etat te mayi nāma mahāmune
c naitad dhārayituṃ śakyaṃ gacchāvatara padminīm
 viśvāmitra uvāca
a viśvedevāś ca me mitraṃ mitram asmi gavāṃ tathā
c viśvāmitram iti khyātaṃ yātudhāni nibodha me
 yātudhāny uvāca
a nāmanairuktam etat te duḥkhavyābhāṣitākṣaram
c naitad dhārayituṃ śakyaṃ gacchāvatara padminīm
 jamadagnir uvāca
a jājamadyajajā nāma mṛjā māha jijāyiṣe
c jamadagnir iti khyātam ato māṃ viddhi śobhane
 yātudhāny uvāca
a yathodāhṛtam etat te mayi nāma mahāmune
c naitad dhārayituṃ śakyaṃ gacchāvatara padminīm
 arundhaty uvāca
a dharāṃ dharitrīṃ vasudhāṃ bhartus tiṣṭhāmy anantaram
c mano 'nurundhatī bhartur iti māṃ viddhy arundhatīm
 yātudhāny uvāca
a nāmanairuktam etat te duḥkhavyābhāṣitākṣaram
c naitad dhārayituṃ śakyaṃ gacchāvatara padminīm
 gaṇḍovāca
a gaṇḍaṃ gaṇḍaṃ gatavatī gaṇḍagaṇḍeti saṃjñitā
c gaṇḍagaṇḍeva gaṇḍeti viddhi mānalasaṃbhave
d vaktraikadeśe gaṇḍeti dhātum etaṃ pracakṣate
d tenonnatena gaṇḍeti viddhi mānalasaṃbhave
 yātudhāny uvāca
a nāmanairuktam etat te duḥkhavyābhāṣitākṣaram
c naitad dhārayituṃ śakyaṃ gacchāvatara padminīm
 paśusakha uvāca
a sakhā sakhe yaḥ sakhyeyaḥ paśūnāṃ ca sakhā sadā
c gauṇaṃ paśusakhety evaṃ viddhi mām agnisaṃbhave
 yātudhāny uvāca
a nāmanairuktam etat te duḥkhavyābhāṣitākṣaram
c naitad dhārayituṃ śakyaṃ gacchāvatara padminīm
 śunaḥsakha uvāca
a ebhir uktaṃ yathā nāma nāhaṃ vaktum ihotsahe
c śunaḥsakhasakhāyaṃ māṃ yātudhāny upadhāraya
 yātudhāny uvāca
a nāma te 'vyaktam uktaṃ vai vākyaṃ saṃdigdhayā girā
c tasmāt sakṛd idānīṃ tvaṃ brūhi yan nāma te dvija
 śunaḥsakha uvāca
a sakṛd uktaṃ mayā nāma na gṛhītaṃ yadā tvayā
c tasmāt tridaṇḍābhihatā gaccha bhasmeti māciram
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sā brahmadaṇḍakalpena tena mūrdhni hatā tadā
c kṛtyā papāta medinyāṃ bhasmasāc ca jagāma ha
a śunaḥsakhaś ca hatvā tāṃ yātudhānīṃ mahābalām
c bhuvi tridaṇḍaṃ viṣṭabhya śādvale samupāviśat
a tatas te munayaḥ sarve puṣkarāṇi bisāni ca
c yathākāmam upādāya samuttasthur mudānvitāḥ
a śrameṇa mahatā yuktās te bisāni kalāpaśaḥ
c tīre nikṣipya padminyās tarpaṇaṃ cakrur ambhasā
a athotthāya jalāt tasmāt sarve te vai samāgaman
c nāpaśyaṃś cāpi te tāni bisāni puruṣarṣabha
 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
a kena kṣudhābhibhūtānām asmākaṃ pāpakarmaṇā
c nṛśaṃsenāpanītāni bisāny āhārakāṅkṣiṇām
a te śaṅkamānās tv anyonyaṃ papracchur dvijasattamāḥ
c ta ūcuḥ śapathaṃ sarve kurma ity arikarśana
a ta uktvā bāḍham ity eva sarva eva śunaḥsakham
c kṣudhārtāḥ supariśrāntāḥ śapathāyopacakramuḥ
 atrir uvāca
a sa gāṃ spṛśatu pādena sūryaṃ ca pratimehatu
c anadhyāyeṣv adhīyīta bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
 vasiṣṭha uvāca
a anadhyāyaparo loke śunaḥ sa parikarṣatu
c parivrāṭ kāmavṛtto 'stu bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
a śaraṇāgataṃ hantu mitraṃ svasutāṃ copajīvatu
c arthān kāṅkṣatu kīnāśād bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
 kaśyapa uvāca
a sarvatra sarvaṃ paṇatu nyāsalopaṃ karotu ca
c kūṭasākṣitvam abhyetu bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
a vṛthāmāṃsaṃ samaśnātu vṛthādānaṃ karotu ca
c yātu striyaṃ divā caiva bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
 bharadvāja uvāca
a nṛśaṃsas tyaktadharmāstu strīṣu jñātiṣu goṣu ca
c brāhmaṇaṃ cāpi jayatāṃ bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
a upādhyāyam adhaḥ kṛtvā ṛco 'dhyetu yajūṃṣi ca
c juhotu ca sa kakṣāgnau bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
 jamadagnir uvāca
a purīṣam utsṛjatv apsu hantu gāṃ cāpi dohinīm
c anṛtau maithunaṃ yātu bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
a dveṣyo bhāryopajīvī syād dūrabandhuś ca vairavān
c anyonyasyātithiś cāstu bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
 gautama uvāca
a adhītya vedāṃs tyajatu trīn agnīn apavidhyatu
c vikrīṇātu tathā somaṃ bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
a udapānaplave grāme brāhmaṇo vṛṣalīpatiḥ
c tasya sālokyatāṃ yātu bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
d udapāne śleṣmamūtre cotsṛjed vṛṣalīpatiḥ
d yātu pāpīyasāṃ lokaṃ bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
 viśvāmitra uvāca
a jīvato vai gurūn bhṛtyān bharantv asya pare janāḥ
c agatir bahuputraḥ syād bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
a aśucir brahmakūṭo 'stu ṛddhyā caivāpy ahaṃkṛtaḥ
c karṣako matsarī cāstu bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
a varṣān karotu bhṛtako rājñaś cāstu purohitaḥ
c ayājyasya bhaved ṛtvig bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
 arundhaty uvāca
a nityaṃ parivadec chvaśrūṃ bhartur bhavatu durmanāḥ
b śvaśrvā vivādaṃ vadatu bhartṛhīnā ca jīvatu
c ekā svādu samaśnātu bisastainyaṃ karoti yā
a jñātīnāṃ gṛhamadhyasthā saktūn attu dinakṣaye
c abhāgyāvīrasūr astu bisastainyaṃ karoti yā
 gaṇḍovāca
a anṛtaṃ bhāṣatu sadā sādhubhiś ca virudhyatu
c dadātu kanyāṃ śulkena bisastainyaṃ karoti yā
a sādhayitvā svayaṃ prāśed dāsye jīvatu caiva ha
c vikarmaṇā pramīyeta bisastainyaṃ karoti yā
 paśusakha uvāca
a dāsya eva prajāyeta so 'prasūtir akiṃcanaḥ
c daivateṣv anamaskāro bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
 śunaḥsakha uvāca
a adhvaryave duhitaraṃ dadātu
cchandoge vā caritabrahmacarye
c ātharvaṇaṃ vedam adhītya vipraḥ
snāyīta yo vai harate bisāni
 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
a iṣṭam etad dvijātīnāṃ yo 'yaṃ te śapathaḥ kṛtaḥ
c tvayā kṛtaṃ bisastainyaṃ sarveṣāṃ naḥ śunaḥsakha
 śunaḥsakha uvāca
a nyastam ādyam apaśyadbhir yad uktaṃ kṛtakarmabhiḥ
c satyam etan na mithyaitad bisastainyaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā
a mayā hy antarhitānīha bisānīmāni paśyata
c parīkṣārthaṃ bhagavatāṃ kṛtam etan mayānaghāḥ
e rakṣaṇārthaṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhavatām aham āgataḥ
a yātudhānī hy atikruddhā kṛtyaiṣā vo vadhaiṣiṇī
c vṛṣādarbhiprayuktaiṣā nihatā me tapodhanāḥ
a duṣṭā hiṃsyād iyaṃ pāpā yuṣmān praty agnisaṃbhavā
c tasmād asmy āgato viprā vāsavaṃ māṃ nibodhata
a alobhād akṣayā lokāḥ prāptā vaḥ sārvakāmikāḥ
c uttiṣṭhadhvam itaḥ kṣipraṃ tān avāpnuta vai dvijāḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tato maharṣayaḥ prītās tathety uktvā puraṃdaram
c sahaiva tridaśendreṇa sarve jagmus triviṣṭapam
a evam ete mahātmāno bhogair bahuvidhair api
c kṣudhā paramayā yuktāś chandyamānā mahātmabhiḥ
e naiva lobhaṃ tadā cakrus tataḥ svargam avāpnuvan
a tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu naro lobhaṃ vivarjayet
c eṣa dharmaḥ paro rājann alobha iti viśrutaḥ
a idaṃ naraḥ saccaritaṃ samavāyeṣu kīrtayet
c sukhabhāgī ca bhavati na ca durgāṇy avāpnute
a prīyante pitaraś cāsya ṛṣayo devatās tathā
c yaśodharmārthabhāgī ca bhavati pretya mānavaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c yad vṛttaṃ tīrthayātrāyāṃ śapathaṃ prati tac chṛṇu
a puṣkarārthaṃ kṛtaṃ stainyaṃ purā bharatasattama
c rājarṣibhir mahārāja tathaiva ca dvijarṣibhiḥ
a ṛṣayaḥ sametāḥ paścime vai prabhāse
samāgatā mantram amantrayanta
c carāma sarve pṛthivīṃ puṇyatīrthāṃ
tan naḥ kāryaṃ hanta gacchāma sarve
a śukro 'ṅgirāś caiva kaviś ca vidvāṃs
tathāgastyo nāradaparvatau ca
c bhṛgur vasiṣṭhaḥ kaśyapo gautamaś ca
viśvāmitro jamadagniś ca rājan
a ṛṣis tathā gālavo 'thāṣṭakaś ca
bharadvājo 'rundhatī vālakhilyāḥ
c śibir dilīpo nahuṣo 'mbarīṣo
rājā yayātir dhundhumāro 'tha pūruḥ
a jagmuḥ puraskṛtya mahānubhāvaṃ
śatakratuṃ vṛtrahaṇaṃ narendra
c tīrthāni sarvāṇi parikramanto
māghyāṃ yayuḥ kauśikīṃ puṇyatīrthām
a sarveṣu tīrtheṣv atha dhūtapāpā
jagmus tato brahmasaraḥ supuṇyam
c devasya tīrthe jalam agnikalpā
vigāhya te bhuktabisaprasūnāḥ
a ke cid bisāny akhanaṃs tatra rājann
anye mṛṇālāny akhanaṃs tatra viprāḥ
c athāpaśyan puṣkaraṃ te hriyantaṃ
hradād agastyena samuddhṛtaṃ vai
a tān āha sarvān ṛṣimukhyān agastyaḥ
kenādattaṃ puṣkaraṃ me sujātam
c yuṣmāñ śaṅke dīyatāṃ puṣkaraṃ me
na vai bhavanto hartum arhanti padmam
a śṛṇomi kālo hiṃsate dharmavīryaṃ
seyaṃ prāptā vardhate dharmapīḍā
c purādharmo vardhate neha yāvat
tāvad gacchāmi paralokaṃ cirāya
a purā vedān brāhmaṇā grāmamadhye
ghuṣṭasvarā vṛṣalāñ śrāvayanti
c purā rājā vyavahārān adharmyān
paśyaty ahaṃ paralokaṃ vrajāmi
a purāvarān pratyavarān garīyaso
yāvan narā nāvamaṃsyanti sarve
c tamottaraṃ yāvad idaṃ na vartate
tāvad vrajāmi paralokaṃ cirāya
a purā prapaśyāmi pareṇa martyān
balīyasā durbalān bhujyamānān
c tasmād yāsyāmi paralokaṃ cirāya
na hy utsahe draṣṭum īdṛṅ nṛloke
a tam āhur ārtā ṛṣayo maharṣiṃ
na te vayaṃ puṣkaraṃ corayāmaḥ
c mithyābhiṣaṅgo bhavatā na kāryaḥ
śapāma tīkṣṇāñ śapathān maharṣe
a te niścitās tatra maharṣayas tu
saṃmanyanto dharmam evaṃ narendra
c tato 'śapañ śapathān paryayeṇa
sahaiva te pārthiva putrapautraiḥ
 bhṛgur uvāca
a pratyākrośed ihākruṣṭas tāḍitaḥ pratitāḍayet
c khādec ca pṛṣṭhamāṃsāni yas te harati puṣkaram
 vasiṣṭha uvāca
a asvādhyāyaparo loke śvānaṃ ca parikarṣatu
c pure ca bhikṣur bhavatu yas te harati puṣkaram
 kaśyapa uvāca
a sarvatra sarvaṃ paṇatu nyāse lobhaṃ karotu ca
c kūṭasākṣitvam abhyetu yas te harati puṣkaram
 gautama uvāca
a jīvatv ahaṃkṛto buddhyā vipaṇatv adhamena saḥ
c karṣako matsarī cāstu yas te harati puṣkaram
 aṅgirā uvāca
a aśucir brahmakūṭo 'stu śvānaṃ ca parikarṣatu
c brahmahānikṛtiś cāstu yas te harati puṣkaram
 dhundhumāra uvāca
a akṛtajño 'stu mitrāṇāṃ śūdrāyāṃ tu prajāyatu
c ekaḥ saṃpannam aśnātu yas te harati puṣkaram
 pūrur uvāca
a cikitsāyāṃ pracaratu bhāryayā caiva puṣyatu
c śvaśurāt tasya vṛttiḥ syād yas te harati puṣkaram
 dilīpa uvāca
a udapānaplave grāme brāhmaṇo vṛṣalīpatiḥ
c tasya lokān sa vrajatu yas te harati puṣkaram
 śukra uvāca
a pṛṣṭhamāṃsaṃ samaśnātu divā gacchatu maithunam
c preṣyo bhavatu rājñaś ca yas te harati puṣkaram
 jamadagnir uvāca
a anadhyāyeṣv adhīyīta mitraṃ śrāddhe ca bhojayet
c śrāddhe śūdrasya cāśnīyād yas te harati puṣkaram
 śibir uvāca
a anāhitāgnir mriyatāṃ yajñe vighnaṃ karotu ca
c tapasvibhir virudhyeta yas te harati puṣkaram
 yayātir uvāca
a anṛtau jaṭī vratinyāṃ vai bhāryāyāṃ saṃprajāyatu
c nirākarotu vedāṃś ca yas te harati puṣkaram
 nahuṣa uvāca
a atithiṃ gṛhastho nudatu kāmavṛtto 'stu dīkṣitaḥ
c vidyāṃ prayacchatu bhṛto yas te harati puṣkaram
 ambarīṣa uvāca
a nṛśaṃsas tyaktadharmo 'stu strīṣu jñātiṣu goṣu ca
c brāhmaṇaṃ cāpi jahatu yas te harati puṣkaram
 nārada uvāca
a gūḍho 'jñānī bahiḥ śāstraṃ paṭhatāṃ visvaraṃ padam
c garīyaso 'vajānātu yas te harati puṣkaram
 nābhāga uvāca
a anṛtaṃ bhāṣatu sadā sadbhiś caiva virudhyatu
c śulkena kanyāṃ dadatu yas te harati puṣkaram
 kavir uvāca
a padā sa gāṃ tāḍayatu sūryaṃ ca prati mehatu
c śaraṇāgataṃ ca tyajatu yas te harati puṣkaram
 viśvāmitra uvāca
a karotu bhṛtako 'varṣāṃ rājñaś cāstu purohitaḥ
c ṛtvig astu hy ayājyasya yas te harati puṣkaram
 parvata uvāca
a grāme cādhikṛtaḥ so 'stu kharayānena gacchatu
c śunaḥ karṣatu vṛttyarthe yas te harati puṣkaram
 bharadvāja uvāca
a sarvapāpasamādānaṃ nṛśaṃse cānṛte ca yat
c tat tasyāstu sadā pāpaṃ yas te harati puṣkaram
 aṣṭaka uvāca
a sa rājāstv akṛtaprajñaḥ kāmavṛttiś ca pāpakṛt
c adharmeṇānuśāstūrvīṃ yas te harati puṣkaram
d śukaḥ
d śūdrayonau dvijātis tu reto muñcatu kāmataḥ
d saṃnyāsī maithunaṃ gacched yas te harati puṣkaram
d yamaḥ
d aupāsanavihīnas tu devabrāhmaṇanindakaḥ
d devasatrādhikāryas tu yas te harati puṣkaram
 gālava uvāca
a pāpiṣṭhebhyas tv anarghārhaḥ sa naro 'stu svapāpakṛt
c dattvā dānaṃ kīrtayatu yas te harati puṣkaram
 arundhaty uvāca
a śvaśrvāpavādaṃ vadatu bhartur bhavatu durmanāḥ
c ekā svādu samaśnātu yā te harati puṣkaram
d śunakaḥ
d vāsudevaṃ parityajya so 'nyaṃ devam upāsatu
d bharadvājaḥ
d sadā vasatu saṃnyāsī grāme vā nagare 'pi vā
d bandhubhiḥ saha vāso 'stu yas te harati puṣkaram
 vālakhilyā ūcuḥ
a ekapādena vṛttyarthaṃ grāmadvāre sa tiṣṭhatu
c dharmajñas tyaktadharmo 'stu yas te harati puṣkaram
 paśusakha uvāca
a agnihotram anādṛtya sukhaṃ svapatu sa dvijaḥ
c parivrāṭ kāmavṛtto 'stu yas te harati puṣkaram
 surabhy uvāca
a bālvajena nidānena kāṃsyaṃ bhavatu dohanam
c duhyeta paravatsena yā te harati puṣkaram
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tatas tu taiḥ śapathaiḥ śapyamānair
nānāvidhair bahubhiḥ kauravendra
c sahasrākṣo devarāṭ saṃprahṛṣṭaḥ
samīkṣya taṃ kopanaṃ vipramukhyam
a athābravīn maghavā pratyayaṃ svaṃ
samābhāṣya tam ṛṣiṃ jātaroṣam
c brahmarṣidevarṣinṛparṣimadhye
yat tan nibodheha mamādya rājan
 śakra uvāca
a adhvaryave duhitaraṃ dadātu
cchandoge vā caritabrahmacarye
c ātharvaṇaṃ vedam adhītya vipraḥ
snāyīta yaḥ puṣkaram ādadāti
a sarvān vedān adhīyīta puṇyaśīlo 'stu dhārmikaḥ
c brahmaṇaḥ sadanaṃ yātu yas te harati puṣkaram
d vāsudevaṃ jagadyoniṃ sarvādhāram anāmakam
d parāṇāṃ paramaṃ yātu yas te harati puṣkaram
 agastya uvāca
a āśīrvādas tvayā proktaḥ śapatho balasūdana
c dīyatāṃ puṣkaraṃ mahyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
 indra uvāca
a na mayā bhagavaṃl lobhād dhṛtaṃ puṣkaram adya vai
c dharmaṃ tu śrotukāmena hṛtaṃ na kroddhum arhasi
a dharmaḥ śrutisamutkarṣo dharmasetur anāmayaḥ
c ārṣo vai śāśvato nityam avyayo 'yaṃ mayā śrutaḥ
a tad idaṃ gṛhyatāṃ vidvan puṣkaraṃ munisattama
c atikramaṃ me bhagavan kṣantum arhasy anindita
d tvayā lokahitārthāya pīto vai lavaṇāmbudhiḥ
d vindhyo nivārito yena vātāpiś ca niṣūditaḥ
d nahuṣaḥ sarpatāṃ nīto bhavatā yad dvijottama
d jijñāsamānena mayā kṛtaṃ tat kṣantum arhasi
a ity uktaḥ sa mahendreṇa tapasvī kopano bhṛśam
c jagrāha puṣkaraṃ dhīmān prasannaś cābhavan muniḥ
a prayayus te tato bhūyas tīrthāni vanagocarāḥ
c puṇyatīrtheṣu ca tathā gātrāṇy āplāvayanti te
d puṇyatīrtheṣu gātrāṇi plāvayām āsur añjasā
a ākhyānaṃ ya idaṃ yuktaḥ paṭhet parvaṇi parvaṇi
c na mūrkhaṃ janayet putraṃ na bhavec ca nirākṛtiḥ
a na tam āpat spṛśet kā cin na jvaro na rujaś ca ha
c virajāḥ śreyasā yuktaḥ pretya svargam avāpnuyāt
a yaś ca śāstram anudhyāyed ṛṣibhiḥ paripālitam
c sa gacched brahmaṇo lokam avyayaṃ ca narottama
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yad idaṃ śrāddhadharmeṣu dīyate bharatarṣabha
c chatraṃ copānahau caiva kenaitat saṃpravartitam
e kathaṃ caitat samutpannaṃ kimarthaṃ ca pradīyate
a na kevalaṃ śrāddhadharme puṇyakeṣv api dīyate
b bahuṣv api nimitteṣu puṇyam āśritya dīyate
c etad vistarato rājañ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a śṛṇu rājann avahitaś chatropānahavistaram
c yathaitat prathitaṃ loke yena caitat pravartitam
a yathā cākṣayyatāṃ prāptaṃ puṇyatāṃ ca yathā gatam
c sarvam etad aśeṣeṇa pravakṣyāmi janādhipa
a itihāsaṃ purāvṛttam imaṃ śṛṇu narādhipa
c jamadagneś ca saṃvādaṃ sūryasya ca mahātmanaḥ
a purā sa bhagavān sākṣād dhanuṣākrīḍata prabho
c saṃdhāya saṃdhāya śarāṃś cikṣepa kila bhārgavaḥ
a tān kṣiptān reṇukā sarvāṃs tasyeṣūn dīptatejasaḥ
c ānāyya sā tadā tasmai prādād asakṛd acyuta
a atha tena sa śabdena jyātalasya śarasya ca
c prahṛṣṭaḥ saṃpracikṣepa sā ca pratyājahāra tān
a tato madhyāhnam ārūḍhe jyeṣṭhāmūle divākare
c sa sāyakān dvijo viddhvā reṇukām idam abravīt
a gacchānaya viśālākṣi śarān etān dhanuścyutān
c yāvad etān punaḥ subhru kṣipāmīti janādhipa
a sā gacchaty antarā chāyāṃ vṛkṣam āśritya bhāminī
c tasthau tasyā hi saṃtaptaṃ śiraḥ pādau tathaiva ca
a sthitā sā tu muhūrtaṃ vai bhartuḥ śāpabhayāc chubhā
c yayāv ānayituṃ bhūyaḥ sāyakān asitekṣaṇā
e pratyājagāma ca śarāṃs tān ādāya yaśasvinī
a sā prasvinnā sucārvaṅgī padbhyāṃ duḥkhaṃ niyacchatī
c upājagāma bhartāraṃ bhayād bhartuḥ pravepatī
a sa tām ṛṣis tataḥ kruddho vākyam āha śubhānanām
c reṇuke kiṃ cireṇa tvam āgateti punaḥ punaḥ
 reṇukovāca
a śiras tāvat pradīptaṃ me pādau caiva tapodhana
c sūryatejoniruddhāhaṃ vṛkṣacchāyām upāśritā
a etasmāt kāraṇād brahmaṃś ciram etat kṛtaṃ mayā
c etaj jñātvā mama vibho mā krudhas tvaṃ tapodhana
 jamadagnir uvāca
a adyainaṃ dīptakiraṇaṃ reṇuke tava duḥkhadam
c śarair nipātayiṣyāmi sūryam astrāgnitejasā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sa visphārya dhanur divyaṃ gṛhītvā ca bahūñ śarān
c atiṣṭhat sūryam abhito yato yāti tatomukhaḥ
a atha taṃ prahariṣyantaṃ sūryo 'bhyetya vaco 'bravīt
c dvijarūpeṇa kaunteya kiṃ te sūryo 'parādhyate
a ādatte raśmibhiḥ sūryo divi vidvaṃs tatas tataḥ
c rasaṃ sa taṃ vai varṣāsu pravarṣati divākaraḥ
a tato 'nnaṃ jāyate vipra manuṣyāṇāṃ sukhāvaham
c annaṃ prāṇā iti yathā vedeṣu paripaṭhyate
a athābhreṣu nigūḍhaś ca raśmibhiḥ parivāritaḥ
c sapta dvīpān imān brahman varṣeṇābhipravarṣati
a tatas tadauṣadhīnāṃ ca vīrudhāṃ patrapuṣpajam
c sarvaṃ varṣābhinirvṛttam annaṃ saṃbhavati prabho
a jātakarmāṇi sarvāṇi vratopanayanāni ca
c godānāni vivāhāś ca tathā yajñasamṛddhayaḥ
a satrāṇi dānāni tathā saṃyogā vittasaṃcayāḥ
c annataḥ saṃpravartante yathā tvaṃ vettha bhārgava
a ramaṇīyāni yāvanti yāvad ārambhakāṇi ca
c sarvam annāt prabhavati viditaṃ kīrtayāmi te
a sarvaṃ hi vettha vipra tvaṃ yad etat kīrtitaṃ mayā
c prasādaye tvā viprarṣe kiṃ te sūryo nipātyate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a evaṃ tadā prayācantaṃ bhāskaraṃ munisattamaḥ
c jamadagnir mahātejāḥ kiṃ kāryaṃ pratyapadyata
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tathā prayācamānasya munir agnisamaprabhaḥ
c jamadagniḥ śamaṃ naiva jagāma kurunandana
a tataḥ sūryo madhurayā vācā tam idam abravīt
c kṛtāñjalir viprarūpī praṇamyedaṃ viśāṃ pate
a calaṃ nimittaṃ viprarṣe sadā sūryasya gacchataḥ
c kathaṃ calaṃ vetsyasi tvaṃ sadā yāntaṃ divākaram
 jamadagnir uvāca
a sthiraṃ vāpi calaṃ vāpi jāne tvāṃ jñānacakṣuṣā
c avaśyaṃ vinayādhānaṃ kāryam adya mayā tava
a aparāhṇe nimeṣārdhaṃ tiṣṭhasi tvaṃ divākara
c tatra vetsyāmi sūrya tvāṃ na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
 sūrya uvāca
a asaṃśayaṃ māṃ viprarṣe vetsyase dhanvināṃ vara
c apakāriṇaṃ tu māṃ viddhi bhagavañ śaraṇāgatam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tataḥ prahasya bhagavāñ jamadagnir uvāca tam
c na bhīḥ sūrya tvayā kāryā praṇipātagato hy asi
a brāhmaṇeṣv ārjavaṃ yac ca sthairyaṃ ca dharaṇītale
c saumyatāṃ caiva somasya gāmbhīryaṃ varuṇasya ca
a dīptim agneḥ prabhāṃ meroḥ pratāpaṃ tapanasya ca
c etāny atikramed yo vai sa hanyāc charaṇāgatam
a bhavet sa gurutalpī ca brahmahā ca tathā bhavet
c surāpānaṃ ca kuryāt sa yo hanyāc charaṇāgatam
a etasya tv apanītasya samādhiṃ tāta cintaya
c yathā sukhagamaḥ panthā bhavet tvadraśmitāpitaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a etāvad uktvā sa tadā tūṣṇīm āsīd bhṛgūdvahaḥ
c atha sūryo dadau tasmai chatropānaham āśu vai
 sūrya uvāca
a maharṣe śirasas trāṇaṃ chatraṃ madraśmivāraṇam
c pratigṛhṇīṣva padbhyāṃ ca trāṇārthaṃ carmapāduke
a adyaprabhṛti caivaital loke saṃpracariṣyati
c puṇyadāneṣu sarveṣu param akṣayyam eva ca
 bhīṣma uvāca
a upānacchatram etad vai sūryeṇeha pravartitam
c puṇyam etad abhikhyātaṃ triṣu lokeṣu bhārata
a tasmāt prayaccha viprebhyaś chatropānaham uttamam
c dharmas te sumahān bhāvī na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
a chatraṃ hi bharataśreṣṭha yaḥ pradadyād dvijātaye
c śubhraṃ śataśalākaṃ vai sa pretya sukham edhate
a sa śakraloke vasati pūjyamāno dvijātibhiḥ
c apsarobhiś ca satataṃ devaiś ca bharatarṣabha
a dahyamānāya viprāya yaḥ prayacchaty upānahau
b upānahau ca yo dadyāc ślakṣṇau snehasamanvitau
c snātakāya mahābāho saṃśitāya dvijātaye
a so 'pi lokān avāpnoti daivatair abhipūjitān
c goloke sa mudā yukto vasati pretya bhārata
a etat te bharataśreṣṭha mayā kārtsnyena kīrtitam
c chatropānahadānasya phalaṃ bharatasattama
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d śūdrāṇām iha śuśrūṣā nityam evānuvarṇitā
d kaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ katividhā śuśrūṣā samudāhṛtā
d ke ca śuśrūṣayā lokā vihitā bharatarṣabha
d śūdrāṇāṃ bharataśreṣṭha brūhi me dharmalakṣaṇam
d bhīṣmaḥ
d atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
d śūdrāṇām anukampārthaṃ yad uktaṃ brahmavādinā
d vṛddhaḥ parāśaraḥ prāha dharmaṃ śubhram anāmayam
d anugrahārthaṃ varṇānāṃ śaucācārasamanvitam
d dharmopadeśam akhilaṃ yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ
d śiṣyān adhyāpayām āsa śāstram arthavad arthavit
d kṣāntendriyeṇa mānena śucinācāpalena vai
d adurbalena dhīreṇa nottarottaravādinā
d alubdhenānṛśaṃsena ṛjunā brahmavādinā
d cāritratatpareṇaiva sarvabhūtahitātmanā
d arayaḥ ṣaḍ vijetavyā nityaṃ svaṃ deham āśritāḥ
d kāmakrodhau ca lobhaś ca mānamohau madas tathā
d vidhinā dhṛtim āsthāya śuśrūṣur anahaṃkṛtaḥ
d varṇatrayasyānumato yathāśakti yathābalam
d karmaṇā manasā vācā cakṣuṣā ca caturvidham
d āsthāya niyamaṃ dhīmāñ śānto dānto jitendriyaḥ
d rakṣoyakṣajanadveṣī śeṣānnakṛtabhojanaḥ
d varṇatrayān madhu yathā bhramaro dharmam ācaret
d yadi śūdras tapaḥ kuryād vedadṛṣṭena karmaṇā
d iha cāsya parikleśaḥ pretya cāsyāśubhā gatiḥ
d adharmyam ayaśasyaṃ ca tapaḥ śūdre pratiṣṭhitam
d amārgeṇa tapas taptvā mleccheṣu phalam aśnute
d anyathā vartamāno hi na śūdro dharmam arhati
d amārgeṇa prayātānāṃ pratyakṣād upalabhyate
d cāturvarṇyavyapetānāṃ jātimūrtiparigrahaḥ
d tathā te hi śakāś cīnāḥ kāmbhojāḥ pāradās tathā
d śabarāḥ paplavāś caiva tuṣārayavanās tathā
d dārvāś ca daradāś caiva ujjihānās tathetarāḥ
d veṇāś ca kaṅkaṇāś caiva siṃhalā madrakās tathā
d kiṣkindhakāḥ pulindāś ca kahvāś cāndhrāḥ sanīragāḥ
d gandhikā dramiḍāś caiva barbarāś cūcukās tathā
d kirātāḥ pārvateyāś ca kolāś colāḥ sakhāṣakāḥ
d ārukāś caiva dohāś ca yāś cānyā mlecchajātayaḥ
d vikṛtā vikṛtācārā dṛśyante krūrabuddhayaḥ
d amārgeṇāśritā dharmaṃ tato jātyantaraṃ gatāḥ
d amārgopārjitasyaitat tapaso viditaṃ phalam
d na naśyati kṛtaṃ karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
d atrāpy ete vasu prāpya vikarmatapasārjitam
d pāṣaṇḍān arcayiṣyanti dharmakāmā vṛthāśramāḥ
d evaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ ca pārthiva
d viparītaṃ vartamānā mlecchā jāyanty abuddhayaḥ
d adhyāyadhanino viprāḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ balaṃ dhanam
d vaṇik kṛṣiś ca vaiśyānāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ paricārikā
d vyucchedāt tasya dharmasya nirayāyopapadyate
d tato mlecchā bhavanty ete nirghṛṇā dharmavarjitāḥ
d punaś ca nirayas teṣāṃ tiryagyoniś ca śāśvatī
d ye tu satpatham āsthāya varṇāśramakṛtaṃ purā
d sarvān vimārgān utsṛjya svadharmapatham āśritāḥ
d sarvabhūtadayāvanto daivatadvijapūjakāḥ
d śāstradṛṣṭena vidhinā śraddhayā jitamanyavaḥ
d teṣāṃ vidhiṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ
d upādānavidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ śuśrūṣādhigamaṃ tathā
d śiṣṭopanayanaṃ caiva mantrāṇi vividhāni ca
d tathā śiṣyaparīkṣāṃ ca śāstraprāmāṇyadarśanāt
d pravakṣyāmi yathātattvaṃ yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ
d śaucakṛtyasya śaucārthān sarvān eva viśeṣataḥ
d mahāśaucaprabhṛtayo dṛṣṭās tattvārthadarśibhiḥ
d tatrāpi śūdro bhikṣūṇām idaṃ śeṣaṃ ca kalpayet
d bhikṣubhiḥ sukṛtaprajñaiḥ kevalaṃ dharmam āśritaiḥ
d samyagdarśanasaṃpannair gatādhvani hitārthibhiḥ
d avakāśam imaṃ medhyaṃ nirmitaṃ kāmavīrudham
d nirjanaṃ saṃvṛtaṃ buddhvā niyatātmā jitendriyaḥ
d sajalaṃ bhājanaṃ sthāpya mṛttikāṃ ca parīkṣitām
d parīkṣya bhūmiṃ mūtrārthī tata āsīta vāgyataḥ
d udaṅmukho divā kuryād rātrau ced dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ
d antarhitāyāṃ bhūmau tu antarhitaśirās tathā
d asamāpte tathā śauce na vācaṃ kiṃ cid īrayet
d kṛtakṛtyas tathācamya gacchan nodīrayed vacaḥ
d śaucārtham upaviṣṭas tu mṛdbhājanapuraskṛtaḥ
d sthāpyaṃ kamaṇḍaluṃ gṛhya pārśvorubhyām athāntare
d śaucaṃ kuryāc chanair vīro buddhipūrvam asaṃkaram
d pāṇinā śuddham udakaṃ saṃgṛhya vidhipūrvakam
d vipruṣaś ca yathā na syur yathā corū na saṃspṛśet
d apāne mṛttikās tisraḥ pradeyās tv anupūrvaśaḥ
d hastābhyāṃ ca tathā vipro hastaṃ hastena saṃspṛśet
d apāne nava deyāḥ syur iti vṛddhānuśāsanam
d mṛttikā dīyamānā hi śodhayed deśam añjasā
d tasmāt pāṇitale deyā mṛttikās tu punaḥ punaḥ
d buddhipūrvaṃ prayatnena yathā naiva spṛśet sphijau
d yathā ghāto hi na bhaved kledajaḥ paridhānake
d tathā gudaṃ pramārjeta śaucārthaṃ tu punaḥ punaḥ
d pratipādaṃ tatas tyaktvā śaucam utthāya kārayet
d savye dvādaśa deyāḥ syus tisras tisraḥ punaḥ punaḥ
d deyāḥ kūrparake haste pṛṣṭhabandhe punaḥ punaḥ
d tathaivādarśake dadyāc catasras tūbhayor api
d ubhayor hastayor ekaṃ sapta sapta pradāpayet
d tato 'nyāṃ mṛttikāṃ gṛhya kāryaṃ śaucaṃ punas tayoḥ
d hastayor evam etad dhi mahāśaucaṃ vidhīyate
d tato 'nyathā na kurvīta vidhir eṣa sanātanaḥ
d upasthe mūtraśaucasya ata ūrdhvaṃ vidhīyate
d ato 'nyathā tu yaḥ kuryāt prāyaścittīyate tu saḥ
d malopahatacelasya dviguṇaṃ tu vidhīyate
d sahapādam athorubhyāṃ hastaśaucam asaṃśayam
d avadhīrayamāṇasya saṃdeha upajāyate
d yathā yathā viśudhyeta tat tathā tad upakrame
d sakardamaṃ tu varṣāsu gṛham āviśya saṃkaṭam
d hastayor mṛttikās tisraḥ pādayoḥ ṣaṭ pradāpayet
d kāmaṃ dattvā gude dadyāt tisraḥ padbhyāṃ tathaiva ca
d hastaśaucaṃ prakartavyaṃ mūtraśaucavidhes tathā
d mūtraśauce tathā hastau pādābhyāṃ cānupūrvaśaḥ
d naiṣṭhike sthānaśauce tu mahāśaucaṃ vidhīyate
d kṣārauṣarābhyāṃ vastrasya kuryāc chaucaṃ mṛdā saha
d lepagandhāpanayanam amedhyasya vidhīyate
d snānaśāṭyāṃ mṛdas tisro hastābhyāṃ cānupūrvaśaḥ
d śaucaṃ prayatnataḥ kṛtvā kampayānaḥ samuddharet
d deyāś catasras tisro vā dvir vāpy ekā tathāpadi
d kālam āsādya deśaṃ ca śaucasya gurulāghavam
d vidhinānena śaucaṃ tu nityaṃ kuryād atandritaḥ
d aviprekṣann asaṃbhrāntaḥ pādau prakṣālya tatparaḥ
d aprakṣālitapādas tu pāṇim ā maṇibandhanāt
d adhastād upariṣṭāc ca tataḥ pāṇim upaspṛśet
d manogatās tu niḥśabdā niḥśabdaṃ trir apaḥ pibet
d dvir mukhaṃ parimṛjyāc ca khāni copaspṛśed budhaḥ
d ṛgvedaṃ tena prīṇāti prathamaṃ yaḥ pibed apaḥ
d dvitīyaṃ tu yajurvedaṃ tṛtīyaṃ sāma eva ca
d mṛjyate prathamaṃ tena atharvā prītim āpnuyāt
d dvitīyenetihāsaṃ ca purāṇasmṛtidevatāḥ
d yac cakṣuṣi samādhatte tenādityaṃ tu prīṇayet
d prīṇāti vāyuṃ ghrāṇaṃ ca diśaś cāpy atha śrotrayoḥ
d brahmāṇaṃ tena prīṇāti yan mūrdhani samāpayet
d samutkṣipati cāpordhvam ākāśaṃ tena prīṇayet
d prīṇāti viṣṇuṃ padbhyāṃ tu salilaṃ vai samādadhat
d prāṅmukhodaṅmukho vāpi antarjānur upaspṛśet
d sarvatra vidhir ity eṣa bhojanādiṣu nityaśaḥ
d anneṣu dantalagneṣu ucchiṣṭaḥ punar ācamet
d vidhir eṣa samuddiṣṭaḥ śauce cābhyukṣaṇaṃ smṛtam
d śūdrasyaiṣa vidhir dṛṣṭo gṛhān niṣkramataḥ sataḥ
d nityaṃ tv aluptaśaucena vartitavyaṃ kṛtātmanā
d yaśaskāmena bhikṣubhyaḥ śūdreṇātmahitārthinā
d parāśaraḥ
d kṣatrā ārambhayajñās tu vīryayajñā viśaḥ smṛtāḥ
d śūdrāḥ paricarāyajñā japayajñās tu brāhmaṇāḥ
d śuśrūṣājīvinaḥ śūdrā vaiśyā vipaṇijīvinaḥ
d aniṣṭanigrahāḥ kṣatrā viprāḥ svādhyāyajīvinaḥ
d tapasā śobhate vipro rājanyaḥ pālanādibhiḥ
d ātithyena tathā vaiśyaḥ śūdro dāsyena śobhate
d yatātmanā tu śūdreṇa śuśrūṣā nityam eva ca
d kartavyā triṣu varṇeṣu prāyeṇāśramavāsiṣu
d aśaktena trivargasya sevyā hy āśramavāsinaḥ
d yathāśakyaṃ yathāprajñaṃ yathādharmaṃ yathāśrutam
d viśeṣeṇaiva kartavyā śuśrūṣā bhikṣukāśrame
d āśramāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ caturṇāṃ bhikṣukāśramam
d pradhānam iti varṇyante śiṣṭāḥ śāstraviniścaye
d yac copadiśyate śiṣṭaiḥ śrutismṛtividhānataḥ
d tathā stheyam aśaktena sa dharma iti niścitaḥ
d ato 'nyathā tu kurvāṇaḥ śreyo nāpnoti mānavaḥ
d tasmād bhikṣuṣu śūdreṇa kāryam ātmahitaṃ sadā
d iha yat kurute śreyas tat pretya samupāśnute
d tac cānasūyatā kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ yad dhi manyate
d asūyatā kṛtasyeha phalaṃ duḥkhād avāpyate
d priyavādī jitakrodho vītatandrir amatsaraḥ
d kṣamāvāñ śīlasaṃpannaḥ satyadharmaparāyaṇaḥ
d āpadbhāvena kuryād dhi śuśrūṣāṃ bhikṣukāśrame
d ayaṃ me paramo dharmas tv anenemaṃ suduṣkaram
d saṃsārasāgaraṃ ghoraṃ tariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
d vibhayo deham utsṛjya yāsyāmi paramāṃ gatim
d nātaḥ paraṃ mamāpy anya eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
d evaṃ saṃcintya manasā śūdro buddhisamādhinā
d kuryād avimanā nityaṃ śuśrūṣādharmam uttamam
d śuśrūṣāniyameneha bhāvyaṃ śiṣṭāśinā sadā
d śamānvitena dāntena kāryākāryavidā sadā
d sarvakāryeṣu kṛtyāni kṛtāny eva tu darśayet
d yathā priyo bhaved bhikṣus tathā kāryaṃ prasādhayet
d yad akalpaṃ bhaved bhikṣor na tat kāryaṃ samācaret
d yadāśramasyāviruddhaṃ dharmamātrābhisaṃhitam
d tat kāryam avicāreṇa nityam eva śubhārthinā
d manasā karmaṇā vācā nityam eva prasādayet
d sthātavyaṃ tiṣṭhamāneṣu gacchamānān anuvrajet
d āsīneṣv āsitavyaṃ ca nityam evānuvartatā
d dharmalabdhena snehena pādau saṃpīḍayet sadā
d udvartanādīṃś ca tathā kuryād apraticoditaḥ
d naiśakāryāṇi kṛtvā tu nityaṃ caivānucoditaḥ
d yathāvidhir upaspṛśya saṃnyasya jalabhājanam
d bhikṣūṇāṃ nilayaṃ gatvā praṇamya vidhipūrvakam
d brahmapūrvān gurūṃs tatra praṇamya niyatendriyaḥ
d tathācāryapurogāṇām anukuryān namaskriyām
d svadharmacāriṇāṃ cāpi sukhaṃ pṛṣṭvābhivādya ca
d yo bhavet pūrvasaṃsiddhas tulyadharmā bhavet sadā
d tasmai praṇāmaḥ kartavyo netareṣu kadā cana
d anuktvā teṣu cotthāya nityam eva yatavrataḥ
d saṃmārjanam atho kṛtvā kṛtvā cāpy upalepanam
d tataḥ puṣpabaliṃ dadyāt puṣpāṇy ādāya dharmataḥ
d niṣkramyāvasathāt tūrṇam anyat karma samācaret
d yathopaghāto na bhavet svādhyāye ''śramiṇāṃ tathā
d upaghātaṃ tu kurvāṇa enasā saṃprayujyate
d tathātmā praṇidhātavyo yathā te prītim āpnuyuḥ
d paricārako 'haṃ varṇānāṃ trayāṇāṃ dharmataḥ smṛtaḥ
d kim utāśramavṛddhānāṃ yathālabdhopajīvinām
d bhikṣūṇāṃ gatarāgāṇāṃ kevalaṃ jñānadarśinām
d viśeṣeṇa mayā kāryā śuśrūṣā niyatātmanā
d teṣāṃ prasādāt tapasā prāpsyāmīṣṭāṃ śubhāṃ gatim
d evam etad viniścitya yadi seveta bhikṣukān
d vidhinā svopadiṣṭena prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim
d parāśaraḥ
d na tathā saṃpradānena nopavāsādibhis tathā
d iṣṭāṃ gatim avāpnoti yathā śuśrūṣakarmaṇā
d yādṛśena tu toyena śuddhiṃ prakurute naraḥ
d tādṛg bhavati tad dhautam udakasya svabhāvataḥ
d śūdro 'py etena mārgeṇa yādṛśaṃ sevate janam
d tādṛg bhavati saṃsargād acireṇa na saṃśayaḥ
d tasmāt prayatnataḥ sevyā bhikṣavo niyatātmanā
d udakagrahaṇādyena snapanodvartanais tathā
d adhvanā karśitānāṃ ca vyādhitānāṃ tathaiva ca
d śuśrūṣāṃ niyataṃ kuryāt teṣām āpadi yatnataḥ
d darbhājināny avekṣeta bhaikṣabhājanam eva ca
d yathākāmaṃ ca kāryāṇi sarvāṇy evopasādhayet
d prāyaścittaṃ yathā na syāt tathā sarvaṃ samācaret
d vyādhitānāṃ tu prayataś cailaprakṣālanādibhiḥ
d pratikarmakriyā kāryā bheṣajānayanais tathā
d piṃṣaṇālepanaṃ cūrṇaṃ kaṣāyam atha sādhanam
d nānyasya praticāreṣu sukhārtham upapādayet
d bhikṣāṭano 'bhigaccheta bhiṣajaś ca vipaścitaḥ
d tato viniṣkrayārthāni dravyāṇi samupārjayet
d yaś ca prītamanā dadyād ādadyād bheṣajaṃ naraḥ
d aśraddhayā hi dattāni tāny abhojyāni bhikṣubhiḥ
d śraddhayā yad upādattaṃ śraddhayā copapāditam
d tasyopabhogād dharmaḥ syād vyādhibhiś ca nivartyate
d ā dehapatanād evaṃ śuśrūṣārtham atandritaiḥ
d na tv eva dharmam utsṛjya kuryāt teṣāṃ pratikriyām
d svabhāvato hi dvaṃdvāni viprayānty upayānti ca
d svabhāvataḥ sarvabhāvā bhavanti na bhavanti ca
d sāgarasyormisadṛśā vijñātavyā guṇātmakāḥ
d vidyād evaṃ hi yo dhīmāṃs tattvavit tattvadarśanaḥ
d parāśaraḥ
d na sa lipyeta pāpena padmapatram ivāmbhasā
d evaṃ prayatitavyaṃ hi śuśrūṣārtham atandritaiḥ
d sarvābhir upasevābhis tuṣyanti yatayo yathā
d nāparādhyeta bhikṣos tu na cainam avadhīrayet
d uttaraṃ ca na saṃdadyāt kruddhaṃ caiva prasādayet
d śreya evābhidhātavyaṃ kartavyaṃ ca prahṛṣṭavat
d tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vai tatra na kruddham abhisaṃvadet
d nādadīta parasvāni na gṛhṇīyād ayācitam
d labdhālabdhena jīveta tathaiva paritoṣayet
d kopinaṃ tu na yāceta jñānavidveṣakāritaḥ
d sthāvareṣu dayāṃ kuryāj jaṃgameṣu ca prāṇiṣu
d yathātmani tathānyeṣu samāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ nipātayet
d sarvabhūteṣu cātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmani
d saṃpaśyamāno vicaran brahmabhūyāya kalpate
d hiṃsāṃ vā yadi vāhiṃsāṃ na kuryād ātmakāraṇāt
d yatretaro bhaven nityaṃ doṣaṃ tatra na kārayet
d evaṃ sa mucyate doṣāt parān āśritya vartayan
d ātmāśrayeṇa doṣeṇa lipyate hy alpabuddhimān
d jarāyujāṇḍajāś caiva udbhijjāḥ svedajāś ca ye
d avadhyāḥ sarva evaite budhaiḥ samanuvarṇitāḥ
d niścayārthaṃ vibuddhānāṃ prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyate
d hiṃsā yathānyā vihitā tathā doṣaṃ prayojayet
d yathopadiṣṭaṃ guruṇā śiṣyasya carato vidhim
d na hi lobhaḥ prabhavati hiṃsā vāpi tadātmikā
d śāstradarśanam etad dhi vihitaṃ viśvayoninā
d yady etad evaṃ manyeta śūdro hy api ca buddhimān
d kṛtaṃ kṛtavatāṃ gacchet kiṃ punar yo niṣevate
d na śūdraḥ patate kaś cin na ca saṃskāram arhati
d nāsyādhikāro dharme 'sti na dharmāt pratiṣedhanam
d anugrahārthaṃ manunā sarvavarṇeṣu varṇitam
d yadāpavādas tu bhavet strīkṛtaḥ paricārake
d abhrāvakāśaśayanaṃ tasya saṃvatsaraṃ smṛtam
d tena tasya bhavec chāntis tato bhūyo 'py upāvrajet
d savarṇāyā bhaved etad dhīnāyās tv ardham arhati
d varṣatrayaṃ tu vaiśyāyāḥ kṣatriyāyās tu ṣaṭ samāḥ
d brāhmaṇyā tu sametasya samā dvādaśa kīrtitāḥ
d kaṭāgninā vā dagdhavyas tasminn eva kṣaṇe bhavet
d śiśnāvapātanād vāpi viśuddhiṃ samavāpnuyāt
d anasthibandham ekaṃ tu yadi prāṇair viyojayet
d upoṣyaikāham ādadyāt prāṇāyāmāṃs tu dvādaśa
d triḥ snānam udake kṛtvā tasmāt pāpāt pramucyate
d asthibandheṣu dviguṇaṃ prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyate
d anena vidhinā vāpi sthāvareṣu na saṃśayaḥ
d kāyena padbhyāṃ hastābhyām aparādhāt tu mucyate
d aduṣṭaṃ kṣapayed yas tu sarvavarṇeṣu vācayet
d tasyāpy aṣṭaguṇaṃ vidyāt prāyaścittaṃ tad eva tu
d caturguṇaṃ karmakṛte dviguṇaṃ vākpradūṣite
d kṛtvā tu mānasaṃ pāpaṃ tathaivaikaguṇaṃ smṛtam
d tasmād etāni sarvāṇi viditvā na samācaret
d sarvabhūtahitārthaṃ hi kuśalāni samācaret
d evaṃ samāhitamanāḥ sevate yadi sattamān
d tadgatis tatsamācāras tanmanās tatparāyaṇaḥ
d nābhinandeta maraṇaṃ nābhinandeta jīvitam
d kālam eva pratīkṣeta nirveśaṃ bhṛtako yathā
d evaṃ pravartamānas tu vinītaḥ prayatātmavān
d parāśaraḥ
d nirṇayaṃ puṇyapāpābhyām acireṇopagacchati
d śuśrūṣānirato nityam ariṣṭāny upalakṣayet
d traivārṣikaṃ dvivārṣikaṃ vā vārṣikaṃ vā samutthitam
d ṣāṇmāsikaṃ māsikaṃ vā saptarātrikam eva vā
d sarvāṃs tadarthān vā vidyāt teṣāṃ cihnāni lakṣayet
d puruṣaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ yas tu tiṣṭhantaṃ dakṣiṇāmukham
d lakṣayed uttareṇaiva mṛtyus traivārṣiko bhavet
d śuddhamaṇḍalam ādityam araśmiṃ saṃprapaśyataḥ
d saṃvatsaradvayenaiva tasya mṛtyuṃ samādiśet
d jyotsnāyām ātmanaś chāyāṃ sacchidrāṃ yaḥ prapaśyati
d mṛtyuṃ saṃvatsareṇaiva jānīyāt sa vicakṣaṇaḥ
d viśiraskāṃ yadā chāyāṃ paśyet puruṣa ātmanaḥ
d jānīyād ātmano mṛtyuṃ ṣaṇmāseneha buddhimān
d karṇau pidhāya hastābhyāṃ śabdaṃ na śṛṇute yadi
d jānīyād ātmano mṛtyuṃ māsenaiva vicakṣaṇaḥ
d śavagandham upāghrāti anyad vā surabhiṃ naraḥ
d devatāyatanastho vai saptarātreṇa mṛtyubhāk
d karṇanāsāpanayanaṃ dantadṛṣṭivirāgatā
d luptasaṃjñaṃ hi karaṇaṃ sadyo mṛtyuṃ samādiśet
d evam eṣām ariṣṭānāṃ paśyed anyatamaṃ yadi
d na taṃ kālaṃ parīkṣeta yathāriṣṭaṃ prakalpitam
d abhyāśena tu kālasya gaccheta pulinaṃ śuci
d tatra prāṇān pramuñceta tam īśānam anusmaran
d tato 'nyaṃ deham āsādya gāndharvaṃ sthānam āpnuyāt
d tatrastho vasate viṃśatpadmāni sa mahādyutiḥ
d gandharvaiś citrasenādyaiḥ sahitaḥ satkṛtas tathā
d nīlavaiḍūryavarṇena vimānenāvabhāsayan
d nabhaḥsthalam adīnātmā sārdham apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
d chandakāmānusārī ca tatra tatra mahīyate
d modate 'maratulyātmā sadāmaragaṇaiḥ saha
d patitaś ca kṣaye kāle kṣaṇena vimaladyutiḥ
d vaiśyasya bahuvittasya kule 'grye bahugodhane
d avāpya tatra vai janma sa pūto devakarmaṇā
d chandasā jāgatenaiva prāptopanayanaṃ tataḥ
d kṣaumavastropakaraṇaṃ dvijatvaṃ samavāpya tu
d adhīyamāno vedārthān guruśuśrūṣaṇe rataḥ
d brahmacārī jitakrodhas tapasvī jāyate tataḥ
d adhītya dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā gurave vidhipūrvakam
d kṛtadāraḥ samupaiti gṛhasthavratam uttamam
d dadāti yajate caiva yajñair vipuladakṣiṇaiḥ
d agnihotram upāsan vai juhvac caiva yathāvidhi
d dharmaṃ saṃcinute nityaṃ mṛdugāmī jitendriyaḥ
d sa kālapariṇāmāt tu mṛtyunā saṃprayujyate
d saṃskṛtaś cāgnihotreṇa kṛtapātropadhānavān
d saṃskṛto deham utsṛjya marudbhir upapadyate
d marudbhiḥ sahitaś cāpi tulyatejā mahādyutiḥ
d bālārkasamavarṇena vimānena virājatā
d sukhaṃ carati tatrastho gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
d virajombarasaṃvītas taptakāñcanabhūṣaṇaḥ
d chandakāmānusārī ca dviguṇaṃ kālam āvaset
d saṃnivarteta kālena sthānāt tasmāt paricyutaḥ
d avitṛptavihārārtho divyabhogān vihāya tu
d sa jāyate nṛpakule gajāśvarathasaṃkule
d pārthivīṃ śriyam āpannaḥ śrīmān dharmapatir yathā
d janmaprabhṛti saṃskāraṃ caulopanayanāni ca
d prāpya rājakule tatra yathāvad vidhipūrvakam
d chandasā traiṣṭubheneha dvijatvam upanīyate
d adhītya vedam akhilaṃ dhanurvedaṃ ca mukhyaśaḥ
d samāvṛttas tataḥ pitrā yauvarājye 'bhiṣicyate
d kṛtadārakriyaḥ śrīmān rājyaṃ saṃprāpya dharmataḥ
d prajāḥ pālayate samyak ṣaḍbhāgakṛtasaṃvidhiḥ
d yajñair bahubhir ījānaḥ samyag āptārthadakṣiṇaiḥ
d praśāsati mahīṃ śrīmān rājyam indrasamadyutiḥ
d svadharmanirato nityaṃ putrapautrasahāyavān
d kālasya vaśam āpannaḥ prāṇāṃs tyajati saṃyuge
d devarājasya bhavanam indralokam avāpnute
d saṃpūjyamānas tridaśair vicacāra yathāsukham
d rājarṣibhiḥ puṇyakṛdbhir yathā devapatis tathā
d taiḥ stūyate bandibhis tu nānāvādyaiḥ prabodhyate
d divyajāmbūnadamayaṃ bhrājamānaṃ samantataḥ
d varāpsarobhiḥ saṃpūrṇaṃ devagandharvasevitam
d yānam āruhya vicared yathā śakraḥ śacīpatiḥ
d sa tatra vasate ṣaṣṭiṃ padmānīha mudānvitaḥ
d sarvāṃl lokān anucaran maharddhir avabhāsayan
d atha puṇyakṣayāt tasmāt sthāpyate bhuvi bhārata
d parāśaraḥ
d jāyate ca dvijakule vedavedāṅgapārage
d tataḥ śrutisamāpannaḥ saṃskṛtaś ca yathāvidhi
d caulopanayanaṃ tasya yathāvat kriyate dvijaiḥ
d tato 'ṣṭame sa varṣe tu vratopanayanādibhiḥ
d kriyābhir vidhidṛṣṭābhir brahmatvam upanīyate
d gāyatreṇa cchandasā tu saṃskṛtaś caritavrataḥ
d adhīyamāno medhāvī śuddhātmā niyatavrataḥ
d acireṇaiva kālena sāṅgān vedān avāpnute
d samāvṛttaḥ sa dharmātmā samāvṛttakriyas tathā
d yājanādhyāpanarataḥ kuśale karmaṇi sthitaḥ
d agnihotraparo nityaṃ devatātithipūjakaḥ
d yajate vividhair yajñair japayajñais tathaiva ca
d nyāyāgatadhanānveṣī nyāyavṛttas tapodhanaḥ
d sarvabhūtahitaś caiva sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ
d svadāraparituṣṭātmā ṛtugāmī jitendriyaḥ
d parāpavādavirataḥ satyavrataparaḥ sadā
d sa kālapariṇāmāt tu saṃyuktaḥ kāladharmaṇā
d saṃskṛtaś cāgnihotreṇa yathāvad vidhipūrvakam
d somalokam avāpnoti dehanyāsān na saṃśayaḥ
d tatra somaprabhair devair agniṣv āttaiś ca bhāsvaraiḥ
d tathā barhiṣadaiś caiva devair āṅgirasair api
d viśvebhiś caiva devaiś ca tathā brahmarṣibhiḥ punaḥ
d devarṣibhiś cāpratimais tathaivāpsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
d sādhyaiḥ siddhaiś ca satataṃ satkṛtas tatra modate
d jātarūpamayaṃ divyam arkatulyaṃ manojavam
d devagandharvasaṃkīrṇaṃ vimānam adhirohati
d saumyarūpā manaḥkāntās taptakāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ
d somakanyā vimānasthaṃ ramayanti mudānvitāḥ
d sa tatra ramate prītaḥ saha devaiḥ saharṣibhiḥ
d lokān sarvān anucaran dīptatejā manojavaḥ
d sabhāṃ kāmajavīṃ cāpi nityam evābhigacchati
d sarvalokeśvaram ṛṣiṃ namaskṛtya pitāmaham
d parameṣṭhir anantaśrīr lokānāṃ prabhavāpyayaḥ
d yataḥ sarvāḥ pravartante sargapralayavikriyāḥ
d sa tatra vartate śrīmān dviśataṃ dvijasattamaḥ
d atha kālakṣayāt tasmāt sthānād āvartate punaḥ
d jātidharmāṃs tathā sarvān sargād āvartanāni ca
d aśāśvatam idaṃ sarvam iti cintyopalabhya ca
d śāśvataṃ divyam acalam adīnam apunarbhavam
d āsthāsyaty abhayaṃ nityaṃ yatrāvṛttir na vidyate
d yatra gatvā na mriyate janma cāpi na vidyate
d garbhakleśā mayā prāptā jāyatā ca punaḥ punaḥ
d kāyakleśāś ca vividhā dvaṃdvāni vividhāni ca
d śītoṣṇasukhaduḥkhāni īrṣyādveṣakṛtāni ca
d tatratatropabhuktāni na kva cic chāśvatī sthitiḥ
d evaṃ sa niścayaṃ kṛtvā nirmucya grahabandhanāt
d chittvā bhāryāmayaṃ pāśaṃ tathaivāpatyasaṃbhavam
d yatidharmam upāśritya guruśuśrūṣaṇe rataḥ
d acireṇaiva kālena śreyaḥ samadhigacchati
d yogaśāstraṃ ca sāṃkhyaṃ ca viditvā so 'rthatattvataḥ
d anujñātaś ca guruṇā yathāśāstram avasthitaḥ
d puṇyatīrthānusevī ca nadīnāṃ pulināśrayaḥ
d śūnyāgāraniketaś ca vanavṛkṣaguhāśayaḥ
d araṇyānucaro nityaṃ devāraṇyaniketanaḥ
d ekarātraṃ dvirātraṃ vā na kva cit sajjate dvijaḥ
d śīrṇaparṇapuṭe cāpi vyahne carati bhikṣukaḥ
d na bhogārtham anupretya yātrāmātraṃ samaśnute
d dharmalabdhaṃ samaśnāti na kāmāt kiṃ cid aśnute
d yugamātradṛg adhvānaṃ krośād ūrdhvaṃ na gacchati
d samo mānāvamānābhyāṃ samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ
d sarvabhūtābhayakaras tathaivābhayadakṣiṇaḥ
d nirdvaṃdvo nirnamaskāro nirānandaparigrahaḥ
d nirmamo nirahaṃkāraḥ sarvabhūtanirāśrayaḥ
d parisaṃkhyānatattvajñas tadā satyarataḥ sadā
d ūrdhvaṃ nādho na tiryak ca na kiṃ cid abhikāmayet
d evaṃ hi ramamāṇas tu yatidharmaṃ yathāvidhi
d kālasya parimāṇāt tu yathā pakvaphalaṃ tathā
d sa visṛjya svakaṃ dehaṃ praviśed brahma śāśvatam
d nirāmayam anādyantaṃ guṇasaumyam acetanam
d nirakṣaram abījaṃ ca nirindriyam ajaṃ tathā
d ajayyam akṣayaṃ yat tad abhedyaṃ sūkṣmam eva ca
d nirguṇaṃ ca prakṛtiman nirvikāraṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
d bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyasya kālasya parameśvaram
d parāśaraḥ
d avyaktaṃ puruṣaṃ kṣetram ānantyāya prapadyate
d evaṃ sa bhikṣur nirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyād dagdhakilbiṣaḥ
d ihastho deham utsṛjya nīḍaṃ śakunivad yathā
d satpathālambanād eva śūdraḥ prāpnoti sadgatim
d brahmaṇaḥ sthānam acalaṃ sthānāt sthānam avāpnuyāt
d yathā khanan khanitreṇa jāṅgale vāri vindati
d anirvedāt tataḥ sthānam īpsitaṃ pratipadyate
d saiṣā gatir anādyantā sarvair apy upadhāritā
d tasmāc chūdrair anirvedāc chraddadhānais tu nityadā
d vartitavyaṃ yathāśaktyā yathā proktaṃ manīṣibhiḥ
d yat karoti tad aśnāti śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
d nākṛtaṃ bhujyate karma na kṛtaṃ naśyate phalam
d tathā śubhasamācāraḥ śubham evāpnute phalam
d tathāśubhasamācāro hy aśubhaṃ samavāpnute
d tathā śubhasamācāro hy aśubhāni vivarjayet
d śubhāny eva samādadyād ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
d bhūtiś ca nānyataḥ śakyā śūdrāṇām iti niścayaḥ
d ṛte yatīnāṃ śuśrūṣām iti santo vyavasthitāḥ
d tasmād āgamasaṃpanno bhavet suniyatendriyaḥ
d śakyate hy āgamād eva gatiṃ prāptum anāmayām
d parā caiṣāṃ gatir dṛṣṭā yām anveṣanti sādhavaḥ
d yatrāmṛtatvaṃ labhate tyaktvā duḥkham anantakam
d imaṃ hi dharmam āsthāya ye 'pi syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ
d striyo vaiśyāś ca śūdrāś ca prāpnuyuḥ paramāṃ gatim
d kiṃ punar brāhmaṇo vidvān kṣatriyo vā bahuśrutaḥ
d na cāpy akṣīṇapāpasya jñānaṃ bhavati dehinaḥ
d jñānopalabdhir bhavati kṛtakṛtyo yadā bhavet
d upalabhya tu vijñānaṃ jñānaṃ vāpy anasūyakaḥ
d tathaiva varted guruṣu bhūyāṃsaṃ vā samāhitaḥ
d athāvamanyeta guruṃ tathā teṣu pravartate
d vyartham asya śrutaṃ bhavati jñānam ajñānatāṃ vrajet
d gatiṃ cāpy aśubhāṃ gacchen nirayāya na saṃśayaḥ
d prakṣīyate tasya puṇyaṃ jñānam asya virudhyate
d adṛṣṭapūrvakalyāṇo yathā dṛṣṭvā vidhiṃ naraḥ
d utsekān moham āpadya tattvajñānam avāptavān
d evam eva hi notsekaḥ kartavyo jñānasaṃbhavaḥ
d phalaṃ jñānasya hi śamaḥ praśamāya yatet sadā
d upaśāntena dāntena kṣamāyuktena sarvadā
d śuśrūṣā pratipattavyā nityam evānasūyatā
d dhṛtyā śiśnodaraṃ rakṣet pāṇipādaṃ ca cakṣuṣā
d indriyārthāṃś ca manasā mano buddhau samādadhet
d dhṛtyāsīta tato gatvā śuddhadeśaṃ susaṃvṛtam
d labdhvāsanaṃ yathādṛṣṭaṃ vidhipūrvaṃ samācaret
d jñānayuktas tathā devaṃ hṛdistham upalakṣayet
d ādīpyamānaṃ vapuṣā vidhūmam analaṃ yathā
d raśmimantam ivādityaṃ vaidyutāgnim ivāmbare
d saṃsthitaṃ hṛdaye paśyed īśaṃ śāśvatam avyayam
d na cāyuktena śakyeta draṣṭuṃ dehe maheśvaraḥ
d yuktas tu paśyate buddhyā saṃniveśya mano hṛdi
d atha tv evaṃ na śaknoti kartuṃ hṛdayadhāraṇam
d yathāsāṃkhyam upāsīta yathāvad yogam āsthitaḥ
d pañca buddhīndriyāṇīha pañca karmendriyāṇy api
d pañcabhūtaviśeṣāś ca manaś caiva tu ṣoḍaśa
d tanmātrāṇy api pañcaiva mano 'haṃkāra eva ca
d aṣṭamaṃ cāpy athāvyaktam etāḥ prakṛtisaṃjñitāḥ
d etāḥ prakṛtayaś cāṣṭau vikārāś cāpi ṣoḍaśa
d evam etad ihasthena vijñeyaṃ tattvabuddhinā
d evaṃ varṣaṃ samuttīrya tīrṇo bhavati nānyathā
d parisaṃkhyānam evaitan mantavyaṃ jñānabuddhinā
d ahany ahani śāntātmā pāvanāya hitāya ca
d evam eva prasaṃkhyāya tattvabuddhir vimucyate
d niṣkalaṃ kevalaṃ bhavati śuddhatattvārthatattvavit
d bhikṣukāśramam āsthāya śuśrūṣānirato budhaḥ
d śūdro nirmucyate sattvasaṃsargād eva nānyathā
d satsaṃnikarṣe parivartitavyaṃ
d vidyādhikāś cāpi niṣevitavyāḥ
d savarṇatāṃ gacchati saṃnikarṣān
d nīlaḥ khago merum ivāśrayan vai
d bhīṣmaḥ
d ity evam ākhyāya mahāmunis tadā
d caturthavarṇeṣu vidhānam arthavit
d śuśrūṣayā vṛttagatiṃ samādhinā
d samādhiyuktaḥ prayayau svam āśramam
dA yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
dA keṣāṃ devā mahābhāgāḥ saṃnamante mahātmanām
dA bhīṣmaḥ
dA loke 'smiṃs tān ṛṣīn sarvāñ śrotum icchāmi sattama
dA itihāsam imaṃ viprāḥ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥ
dA asminn arthe mahāprājñās taṃ nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
dA vṛtraṃ hatvāpy upāvṛttaṃ tridaśānāṃ puraskṛtam
dA mahendram anusaṃprāptaṃ stūyamānaṃ maharṣibhiḥ
dA śriyā paramayā yuktaṃ rathasthaṃ harivāhanam
dA mātaliḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā devam indram uvāca ha
dA namaskṛtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhagavaṃs tvaṃ puraskṛtaḥ
dA bhīṣmaḥ
dA yeṣāṃ loke namaskuryāt tān bravītu bhavān mama
dA tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā devarājaḥ śacīpatiḥ
dA yantāraṃ paripṛcchantaṃ tam indraḥ pratyuvāca saḥ
dA dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca yeṣāṃ cintayatāṃ matiḥ
dA nādharme vartate nityaṃ tān namasyāmi mātale
dA ye rūpaguṇasaṃpannāḥ pramadāhṛdayaṃgamāḥ
dA nivṛttāḥ kāmabhogeṣu tān namasyāmi mātale
dA sveṣu bhogeṣu saṃtuṣṭāḥ suvāco vacanakṣamāḥ
dA amānakāmāś cārghyārhās tān namasyāmi mātale
dA dhanaṃ vidyās tathaiśvaryaṃ yeṣāṃ na calayen matim
dA calitāṃ ye nigṛhṇanti tān nityaṃ pūjayāmy aham
dA iṣṭair dārair upetānāṃ śucīnām agnihotriṇām
dA catuṣpādakuṭumbānāṃ mātale praṇamāmy aham
dA mahatas tapasā prāptau dhanasya vipulasya ca
dA tyāgas tasya na vai kāryo yo ''tmānaṃ nāvabudhyate
dA yeṣām arthas tathā kāmo dharmamūlavivardhitaḥ
dA dharmārthau yasya niyatau tān namasyāmi mātale
dA dharmamūlārthakāmānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ gavām api
dA pativratānāṃ nārīṇāṃ praṇāmaṃ prakaromy aham
dA ye bhuktvā mānuṣān bhogān pūrve vayasi mātale
dA tapasā svargam āyānti śaśvat tān pūjayāmy aham
dA asaṃbhogān na cāsaktān dharmanityāñ jitendriyān
dA saṃnyastān acalaprakhyān manasā pūjayāmi tān
dA jñānaprasannavidyānāṃ nirūḍhaṃ dharmam icchatām
dA paraiḥ kīrtitaśaucānāṃ mātale tān namāmy aham
d mayā bhārataśārdūla kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ārāmāṇāṃ taḍāgānāṃ yat phalaṃ kurunandana
c tad ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi tvatto 'dya bharatarṣabha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a supradarśā vanavatī citradhātuvibhūṣitā
c upetā sarvabījaiś ca śreṣṭhā bhūmir ihocyate
a tasyāḥ kṣetraviśeṣaṃ ca taḍāgānāṃ niveśanam
c audakāni ca sarvāṇi pravakṣyāmy anupūrvaśaḥ
a taḍāgānāṃ ca vakṣyāmi kṛtānāṃ cāpi ye guṇāḥ
c triṣu lokeṣu sarvatra pūjito yas taḍāgavān
a atha vā mitrasadanaṃ maitraṃ mitravivardhanam
c kīrtisaṃjananaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ taḍāgānāṃ niveśanam
a dharmasyārthasya kāmasya phalam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
c taḍāgaṃ sukṛtaṃ deśe kṣetram eva mahāśrayam
a caturvidhānāṃ bhūtānāṃ taḍāgam upalakṣayet
c taḍāgāni ca sarvāṇi diśanti śriyam uttamām
a devā manuṣyā gandharvāḥ pitaroragarākṣasāḥ
c sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃśrayanti jalāśayam
a tasmāt tāṃs te pravakṣyāmi taḍāge ye guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
c yā ca tatra phalāvāptir ṛṣibhiḥ samudāhṛtā
a varṣamātre taḍāge tu salilaṃ yasya tiṣṭhati
c agnihotraphalaṃ tasya phalam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
a śaratkāle tu salilaṃ taḍāge yasya tiṣṭhati
c gosahasrasya sa pretya labhate phalam uttamam
a hemantakāle salilaṃ taḍāge yasya tiṣṭhati
c sa vai bahusuvarṇasya yajñasya labhate phalam
a yasya vai śaiśire kāle taḍāge salilaṃ bhavet
c agniṣṭomasya yajñasya phalam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
a taḍāgaṃ sukṛtaṃ yasya vasante tu mahāśrayam
b vasantakāle pānīyaṃ taḍāge yasya tiṣṭhati
c atirātrasya yajñasya phalaṃ sa samupāśnute
a nidāghakāle pānīyaṃ taḍāge yasya tiṣṭhati
c vājapeyasamaṃ tasya phalaṃ vai munayo viduḥ
a sa kulaṃ tārayet sarvaṃ yasya khāte jalāśaye
c gāvaḥ pibanti pānīyaṃ sādhavaś ca narāḥ sadā
a taḍāge yasya gāvas tu pibanti tṛṣitā jalam
c mṛgapakṣimanuṣyāś ca so 'śvamedhaphalaṃ labhet
a yat pibanti jalaṃ tatra snāyante viśramanti ca
c taḍāgadasya tat sarvaṃ pretyānantyāya kalpate
a durlabhaṃ salilaṃ tāta viśeṣeṇa paratra vai
c pānīyasya pradānena prītir bhavati śāśvatī
a tilān dadata pānīyaṃ dīpān dadata jāgrata
c jñātibhiḥ saha modadhvam etat preteṣu durlabham
a sarvadānair gurutaraṃ sarvadānair viśiṣyate
c pānīyaṃ naraśārdūla tasmād dātavyam eva hi
a evam etat taḍāgeṣu kīrtitaṃ phalam uttamam
b ekāham api kaunteya bhūmistham udakaṃ kuru
b kulaṃ tārayate janma sapta sapta ca sapta ca
c ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi vṛkṣāṇām api ropaṇe
a sthāvarāṇāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ jātayaḥ ṣaṭ prakīrtitāḥ
c vṛkṣagulmalatāvallyas tvaksārās tṛṇajātayaḥ
a etā jātyas tu vṛkṣāṇāṃ teṣāṃ rope guṇās tv ime
b panasāmrādayo vṛkṣā gulmā mandārapūrvakāḥ
b nāgikā maricā vallyo mālatītyādikā latāḥ
b veṇukramukatvaksārāḥ sasyāni tṛṇajātayaḥ
b sasyāni ropaṇād eṣāṃ tṛptir bhavati śāśvatī
c kīrtiś ca mānuṣe loke pretya caiva phalaṃ śubham
a labhate nāma loke ca pitṛbhiś ca mahīyate
c devalokagatasyāpi nāma tasya na naśyati
a atītānāgate cobhe pitṛvaṃśaṃ ca bhārata
b śatāvarāñ śataparān mātāpitṛpitāmahān
c tārayed vṛkṣaropī ca tasmād vṛkṣān praropayet
d ropayitvā tu yo vṛkṣān kāle śuśrūṣate nagān
a tasya putrā bhavanty ete pādapā nātra saṃśayaḥ
c paralokagataḥ svargaṃ lokāṃś cāpnoti so 'vyayān
a puṣpaiḥ suragaṇān vṛkṣāḥ phalaiś cāpi tathā pitṝn
c chāyayā cātithīṃs tāta pūjayanti mahīruhāḥ
d pūjayanti kṣitiruhāś chāyayā hy atithīn sadā
a kiṃnaroragarakṣāṃsi devagandharvamānavāḥ
c tathā ṛṣigaṇāś caiva saṃśrayanti mahīruhān
a puṣpitāḥ phalavantaś ca tarpayantīha mānavān
c vṛkṣadaṃ putravad vṛkṣās tārayanti paratra ca
a tasmāt taḍāge vṛkṣā vai ropyāḥ śreyorthinā sadā
c putravat paripālyāś ca putrās te dharmataḥ smṛtāḥ
a taḍāgakṛd vṛkṣaropī iṣṭayajñaś ca yo dvijaḥ
c ete svarge mahīyante ye cānye satyavādinaḥ
a tasmāt taḍāgaṃ kurvīta ārāmāṃś caiva ropayet
c yajec ca vividhair yajñaiḥ satyaṃ ca satataṃ vadet
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a gārhasthyaṃ dharmam akhilaṃ prabrūhi bharatarṣabha
c ṛddhim āpnoti kiṃ kṛtvā manuṣya iha pārthiva
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atra te vartayiṣyāmi purāvṛttaṃ janādhipa
c vāsudevasya saṃvādaṃ pṛthivyāś caiva bhārata
a saṃstūya pṛthivīṃ devīṃ vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān
c papraccha bharataśreṣṭha yad etat pṛcchase 'dya mām
 vāsudeva uvāca
a gārhasthyaṃ dharmam āśritya mayā vā madvidhena vā
c kim avaśyaṃ dhare kāryaṃ kiṃ vā kṛtvā sukhī bhavet
 pṛthivy uvāca
a ṛṣayaḥ pitaro devā manuṣyāś caiva mādhava
c ijyāś caivārcanīyāś ca yathā caivaṃ nibodha me
a sadā yajñena devāṃś ca ātithyena ca mānavān
c chandataś ca yathānityam arhān yuñjīta nityaśaḥ
e tena hy ṛṣigaṇāḥ prītā bhavanti madhusūdana
a nityam agniṃ paricared abhuktvā balikarma ca
c kuryāt tathaiva devā vai prīyante madhusūdana
a kuryād aharahaḥ śrāddham annādyenodakena vā
c payomūlaphalair vāpi pitṝṇāṃ prītim āharan
a siddhānnād vaiśvadevaṃ vai kuryād agnau yathāvidhi
c agnīṣomaṃ vaiśvadevaṃ dhānvantaryam anantaram
a prajānāṃ pataye caiva pṛthag ghomo vidhīyate
c tathaiva cānupūrvyeṇa balikarma prayojayet
a dakṣiṇāyāṃ yamāyeha pratīcyāṃ varuṇāya ca
c somāya cāpy udīcyāṃ vai vāstumadhye dvijātaye
a dhanvantareḥ prāg udīcyāṃ prācyāṃ śakrāya mādhava
c manor vai iti ca prāhur baliṃ dvāre gṛhasya vai
e marudbhyo devatābhyaś ca balim antargṛhe haret
a tathaiva viśvedevebhyo balim ākāśato haret
c niśācarebhyo bhūtebhyo baliṃ naktaṃ tathā haret
a evaṃ kṛtvā baliṃ samyag dadyād bhikṣāṃ dvijātaye
c alābhe brāhmaṇasyāgnāv agram utkṣipya nikṣipet
a yadā śrāddhaṃ pitṛbhyaś ca dātum iccheta mānavaḥ
c tadā paścāt prakurvīta nivṛtte śrāddhakarmaṇi
a pitṝn saṃtarpayitvā tu baliṃ kuryād vidhānataḥ
c vaiśvadevaṃ tataḥ kuryāt paścād brāhmaṇavācanam
a tato 'nnenāvaśeṣeṇa bhojayed atithīn api
c arcāpūrvaṃ mahārāja tataḥ prīṇāti mānuṣān
a anityaṃ hi sthito yasmāt tasmād atithir ucyate
a ācāryasya pituś caiva sakhyur āptasya cātitheḥ
c idam asti gṛhe mahyam iti nityaṃ nivedayet
a te yad vadeyus tat kuryād iti dharmo vidhīyate
c gṛhasthaḥ puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇa śiṣṭāśī ca sadā bhavet
a rājartvijaṃ snātakaṃ ca guruṃ śvaśuram eva ca
c arcayen madhuparkeṇa parisaṃvatsaroṣitān
a śvabhyaś ca śvapacebhyaś ca vayobhyaś cāvaped bhuvi
c vaiśvadevaṃ hi nāmaitat sāyaṃprātar vidhīyate
a etāṃs tu dharmān gārhasthān yaḥ kuryād anasūyakaḥ
c sa iharddhiṃ parāṃ prāpya pretya nāke mahīyate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a iti bhūmer vacaḥ śrutvā vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān
c tathā cakāra satataṃ tvam apy evaṃ samācara
a evaṃ gṛhasthadharmaṃ tvaṃ cetayāno narādhipa
c ihaloke yaśaḥ prāpya pretya svargam avāpsyasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ālokadānaṃ nāmaitat kīdṛśaṃ bharatarṣabha
c katham etat samutpannaṃ phalaṃ cātra bravīhi me
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c manoḥ prajāpater vādaṃ suvarṇasya ca bhārata
a tapasvī kaś cid abhavat suvarṇo nāma nāmataḥ
c varṇato hemavarṇaḥ sa suvarṇa iti paprathe
a kulaśīlaguṇopetaḥ svādhyāye ca paraṃ gataḥ
c bahūn svavaṃśaprabhavān samatītaḥ svakair guṇaiḥ
a sa kadā cin manuṃ vipro dadarśopasasarpa ca
c kuśalapraśnam anyonyaṃ tau ca tatra pracakratuḥ
a tatas tau siddhasaṃkalpau merau kāñcanaparvate
c ramaṇīye śilāpṛṣṭhe sahitau saṃnyaṣīdatām
a tatra tau kathayām āstāṃ kathā nānāvidhāśrayāḥ
c brahmarṣidevadaityānāṃ purāṇānāṃ mahātmanām
a suvarṇas tv abravīd vākyaṃ manuṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ prabhum
c hitārthaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ praśnaṃ me vaktum arhasi
a sumanobhir yad ijyante daivatāni prajeśvara
b sumanogandhadhūpādyair ijyante daivatāni ca
c kim etat katham utpannaṃ phalayogaṃ ca śaṃsa me
 manur uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c śukrasya ca baleś caiva saṃvādaṃ vai samāgame
a baler vairocanasyeha trailokyam anuśāsataḥ
c samīpam ājagāmāśu śukro bhṛgukulodvahaḥ
a tam arghyādibhir abhyarcya bhārgavaṃ so 'surādhipaḥ
c niṣasādāsane paścād vidhivad bhūridakṣiṇaḥ
a katheyam abhavat tatra yā tvayā parikīrtitā
c sumanodhūpadīpānāṃ saṃpradāne phalaṃ prati
a tataḥ papraccha daityendraḥ kavīndraṃ praśnam uttamam
c sumanodhūpadīpānāṃ kiṃ phalaṃ brahmavittama
e pradānasya dvijaśreṣṭha tad bhavān vaktum arhati
 śukra uvāca
 agniṣomādisṛṣṭau tu viṣṇoḥ sarvātmanaḥ prabho
a tapaḥ pūrvaṃ samutpannaṃ dharmas tasmād anantaram
c etasminn antare caiva vīrudoṣadhya eva ca
a somasyātmā ca bahudhā saṃbhūtaḥ pṛthivītale
c amṛtaṃ ca viṣaṃ caiva yāś cānyās tulyajātayaḥ
a amṛtaṃ manasaḥ prītiṃ sadyaḥ puṣṭiṃ dadāti ca
c mano glapayate tīvraṃ viṣaṃ gandhena sarvaśaḥ
a amṛtaṃ maṅgalaṃ viddhi mahad viṣam amaṅgalam
c oṣadhyo hy amṛtaṃ sarvaṃ viṣaṃ tejo 'gnisaṃbhavam
a mano hlādayate yasmāc chriyaṃ cāpi dadhāti ha
b amṛtaṃ mano hlādayati śriyaṃ caiva dadāti ha
c tasmāt sumanasaḥ proktā naraiḥ sukṛtakarmabhiḥ
a devatābhyaḥ sumanaso yo dadāti naraḥ śuciḥ
c tasmāt sumanasaḥ proktā yasmāt tuṣyanti devatāḥ
d tasya tuṣyanti vai devās tuṣṭāḥ puṣṭiṃ dadaty api
d tasmai sumanaso devās tasmāt sumanasaḥ smṛtāḥ
a yaṃ yam uddiśya dīyeran devaṃ sumanasaḥ prabho
c maṅgalārthaṃ sa tenāsya prīto bhavati daityapa
a jñeyās tūgrāś ca saumyāś ca tejasvinyaś ca tāḥ pṛthak
c oṣadhyo bahuvīryāś ca bahurūpās tathaiva ca
a yajñiyānāṃ ca vṛkṣāṇām ayajñiyān nibodha me
c āsurāṇi ca mālyāni daivatebhyo hitāni ca
a rākṣasānāṃ surāṇāṃ ca yakṣāṇāṃ ca tathā priyāḥ
c pitṝṇāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca kāntā yās tv anupūrvaśaḥ
a vanyā grāmyāś ceha tathā kṛṣṭoptāḥ parvatāśrayāḥ
c akaṇṭakāḥ kaṇṭakinyo gandharūparasānvitāḥ
a dvividho hi smṛto gandha iṣṭo 'niṣṭaś ca puṣpajaḥ
c iṣṭagandhāni devānāṃ puṣpāṇīti vibhāvayet
a akaṇṭakānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ śvetaprāyāś ca varṇataḥ
c teṣāṃ puṣpāṇi devānām iṣṭāni satataṃ prabho
d padmaṃ ca tulasījātir api sarveṣu pūjitāḥ
a jalajāni ca mālyāni padmādīni ca yāni ca
c gandharvanāgayakṣebhyas tāni dadyād vicakṣaṇaḥ
a oṣadhyo raktapuṣpāś ca kaṭukāḥ kaṇṭakānvitāḥ
c śatrūṇām abhicārārtham atharvasu nidarśitāḥ
a tīkṣṇavīryās tu bhūtānāṃ durālambhāḥ sakaṇṭakāḥ
c raktabhūyiṣṭhavarṇāś ca kṛṣṇāś caivopahārayet
a manohṛdayanandinyo vimarde madhurāś ca yāḥ
c cārurūpāḥ sumanaso mānuṣāṇāṃ smṛtā vibho
a na tu śmaśānasaṃbhūtā na devāyatanodbhavāḥ
c saṃnayet puṣṭiyukteṣu vivāheṣu rahaḥsu ca
a girisānuruhāḥ saumyā devānām upapādayet
c prokṣitābhyukṣitāḥ saumyā yathāyogaṃ yathāsmṛti
a gandhena devās tuṣyanti darśanād yakṣarākṣasāḥ
c nāgāḥ samupabhogena tribhir etais tu mānuṣāḥ
a sadyaḥ prīṇāti devān vai te prītā bhāvayanty uta
c saṃkalpasiddhā martyānām īpsitaiś ca manorathaiḥ
a devāḥ prīṇanti satataṃ mānitā mānayanti ca
c avajñātāvadhūtāś ca nirdahanty adhamān narān
a ataūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi dhūpadānavidhau phalam
c dhūpāṃś ca vividhān sādhūn asādhūṃś ca nibodha me
a niryāsaḥ saralaś caiva kṛtrimaś caiva te trayaḥ
c iṣṭāniṣṭo bhaved gandhas tan me vistarataḥ śṛṇu
a niryāsāḥ sallakīvarjyā devānāṃ dayitās tu te
c gugguluḥ pravaras teṣāṃ sarveṣām iti niścayaḥ
a aguruḥ sāriṇāṃ śreṣṭho yakṣarākṣasabhoginām
c daityānāṃ sallakījaś ca kāṅkṣito yaś ca tadvidhaḥ
a atha sarjarasādīnāṃ gandhaiḥ pārthivadāravaiḥ
c phāṇitāsavasaṃyuktair manuṣyāṇāṃ vidhīyate
a devadānavabhūtānāṃ sadyas tuṣṭikaraḥ smṛtaḥ
c ye 'nye vaihārikās te tu mānuṣāṇām iti smṛtāḥ
a ya evoktāḥ sumanasāṃ pradāne guṇahetavaḥ
c dhūpeṣv api parijñeyās ta eva prītivardhanāḥ
a dīpadāne pravakṣyāmi phalayogam anuttamam
c yathā yena yadā caiva pradeyā yādṛśāś ca te
a jyotis tejaḥ prakāśaś cāpy ūrdhvagaṃ cāpi varṇyate
c pradānaṃ tejasāṃ tasmāt tejo vardhayate nṛṇām
a andhaṃ tamas tamisraṃ ca dakṣiṇāyanam eva ca
c uttarāyaṇam etasmāj jyotirdānaṃ praśasyate
a yasmād ūrdhvagam etat tu tamasaś caiva bheṣajam
c tasmād ūrdhvagater dātā bhaved iti viniścayaḥ
a devās tejasvino yasmāt prabhāvantaḥ prakāśakāḥ
c tāmasā rākṣasāś ceti tasmād dīpaḥ pradīyate
a ālokadānāc cakṣuṣmān prabhāyukto bhaven naraḥ
c tān dattvā nopahiṃseta na haren nopanāśayet
a dīpahartā bhaved andhas tamogatir asuprabhaḥ
c dīpapradaḥ svargaloke dīpamālī virājate
a haviṣā prathamaḥ kalpo dvitīyas tv auṣadhīrasaiḥ
c vasāmedosthiniryāsair na kāryaḥ puṣṭim icchatā
a giriprapāte gahane caityasthāne catuṣpathe
b devālaye sabhāyāṃ ca girau caitye catuṣpathe
b gobrāhmaṇālaye durge dīpo bhūtipradaḥ śuciḥ
c dīpadātā bhaven nityaṃ ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
a kuloddyoto viśuddhātmā prakāśatvaṃ ca gacchati
c jyotiṣāṃ caiva sālokyaṃ dīpadātā naraḥ sadā
a balikarmasu vakṣyāmi guṇān karmaphalodayān
c devayakṣoraganṛṇāṃ bhūtānām atha rakṣasām
a yeṣāṃ nāgrabhujo viprā devatātithibālakāḥ
c rākṣasān eva tān viddhi nirvaṣaṭkāramaṅgalān
a tasmād agraṃ prayaccheta devebhyaḥ pratipūjitam
c śirasā praṇataś cāpi hared balim atandritaḥ
a gṛhyā hi devatā nityam āśaṃsanti gṛhāt sadā
c bāhyāś cāgantavo ye 'nye yakṣarākṣasapannagāḥ
a ito dattena jīvanti devatāḥ pitaras tathā
c te prītāḥ prīṇayanty etān āyuṣā yaśasā dhanaiḥ
a balayaḥ saha puṣpais tu devānām upahārayet
c dadhidrapsayutāḥ puṇyāḥ sugandhāḥ priyadarśanāḥ
a kāryā rudhiramāṃsāḍhyā balayo yakṣarakṣasām
c surāsavapuraskārā lājollepanabhūṣitāḥ
a nāgānāṃ dayitā nityaṃ padmotpalavimiśritāḥ
c tilān guḍasusaṃpannān bhūtānām upahārayet
a agradātāgrabhogī syād balavarṇasamanvitaḥ
c tasmād agraṃ prayaccheta devebhyaḥ pratipūjitam
a jvalaty aharaho veśma yāś cāsya gṛhadevatāḥ
c tāḥ pūjyā bhūtikāmena prasṛtāgrapradāyinā
a ity etad asurendrāya kāvyaḥ provāca bhārgavaḥ
c suvarṇāya manuḥ prāha suvarṇo nāradāya ca
a nārado 'pi mayi prāha guṇān etān mahādyute
c tvam apy etad viditveha sarvam ācara putraka
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a śrutaṃ me bharataśreṣṭha puṣpadhūpapradāyinām
c phalaṃ balividhāne ca tad bhūyo vaktum arhasi
d phalaṃ pradānena ca tad bhūyo vaktuṃ tvam arhasi
a dhūpapradānasya phalaṃ pradīpasya tathaiva ca
c balayaś ca kimarthaṃ vai kṣipyante gṛhamedhibhiḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c nahuṣaṃ prati saṃvādam agastyasya bhṛgos tathā
a nahuṣo hi mahārāja rājarṣiḥ sumahātapāḥ
c devarājyam anuprāptaḥ sukṛteneha karmaṇā
a tatrāpi prayato rājan nahuṣas tridive vasan
c mānuṣīś caiva divyāś ca kurvāṇo vividhāḥ kriyāḥ
a mānuṣyas tatra sarvāḥ sma kriyās tasya mahātmanaḥ
c pravṛttās tridive rājan divyāś caiva sanātanāḥ
a agnikāryāṇi samidhaḥ kuśāḥ sumanasas tathā
c balayaś cānnalājābhir dhūpanaṃ dīpakarma ca
a sarvaṃ tasya gṛhe rājñaḥ prāvartata mahātmanaḥ
c japayajñān manoyajñāṃs tridive 'pi cakāra saḥ
a daivatāny arcayaṃś cāpi vidhivat sa sureśvaraḥ
c sarvāṇy eva yathānyāyaṃ yathāpūrvam ariṃdama
a athendrasya bhaviṣyatvād ahaṃkāras tam āviśat
c sarvāś caiva kriyās tasya paryahīyanta bhūpate
a sa ṛṣīn vāhayām āsa varadānamadānvitaḥ
c parihīnakriyaś cāpi durbalatvam upeyivān
a tasya vāhayataḥ kālo munimukhyāṃs tapodhanān
c ahaṃkārābhibhūtasya sumahān atyavartata
a atha paryāyaśa ṛṣīn vāhanāyopacakrame
c paryāyaś cāpy agastyasya samapadyata bhārata
a athāgamya mahātejā bhṛgur brahmavidāṃ varaḥ
c agastyam āśramasthaṃ vai samupetyedam abravīt
a evaṃ vayam asatkāraṃ devendrasyāsya durmateḥ
c nahuṣasya kimarthaṃ vai marṣayāma mahāmune
 agastya uvāca
a katham eṣa mayā śakyaḥ śaptuṃ yasya mahāmune
c varadena varo datto bhavato viditaś ca saḥ
a yo me dṛṣṭipathaṃ gacchet sa me vaśyo bhaved iti
c ity anena varo devād yācito gacchatā divam
a evaṃ na dagdhaḥ sa mayā bhavatā ca na saṃśayaḥ
c anyenāpy ṛṣimukhyena na śapto na ca pātitaḥ
a amṛtaṃ caiva pānāya dattam asmai purā vibho
c mahātmane tadarthaṃ ca nāsmābhir vinipātyate
a prāyacchata varaṃ devaḥ prajānāṃ duḥkhakārakam
c dvijeṣv adharmayuktāni sa karoti narādhamaḥ
a atra yat prāptakālaṃ nas tad brūhi vadatāṃ vara
c bhavāṃś cāpi yathā brūyāt kurvīmahi tathā vayam
 bhṛgur uvāca
a pitāmahaniyogena bhavantam aham āgataḥ
c pratikartuṃ balavati nahuṣe darpam āsthite
a adya hi tvā sudurbuddhī rathe yokṣyati devarāṭ
c adyainam aham udvṛttaṃ kariṣye 'nindram ojasā
a adyendraṃ sthāpayiṣyāmi paśyatas te śatakratum
c saṃcālya pāpakarmāṇam indrasthānāt sudurmatim
a adya cāsau kudevendras tvāṃ padā dharṣayiṣyati
c daivopahatacittatvād ātmanāśāya mandadhīḥ
a vyutkrāntadharmaṃ tam ahaṃ dharṣaṇāmarṣito bhṛśam
c ahir bhavasveti ruṣā śapsye pāpaṃ dvijadruham
a tata enaṃ sudurbuddhiṃ dhikśabdābhihatatviṣam
c dharaṇyāṃ pātayiṣyāmi prekṣatas te mahāmune
a nahuṣaṃ pāpakarmāṇam aiśvaryabalamohitam
c yathā ca rocate tubhyaṃ tathā kartāsmy ahaṃ mune
a evam uktas tu bhṛguṇā maitrāvaruṇir avyayaḥ
c agastyaḥ paramaprīto babhūva vigatajvaraḥ
d tathā cakāra tat sarvaṃ papāta nahuṣo yathā
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kathaṃ sa vai vipannaś ca kathaṃ vai pātito bhuvi
c kathaṃ cānindratāṃ prāptas tad bhavān vaktum arhati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evaṃ tayoḥ saṃvadatoḥ kriyās tasya mahātmanaḥ
c sarvā evābhyavartanta yā divyā yāś ca mānuṣāḥ
a tathaiva dīpadānāni sarvopakaraṇāni ca
c balikarma ca yac cānyad utsekāś ca pṛthagvidhāḥ
e sarvās tasya samutpannā devarājño mahātmanaḥ
a devaloke nṛloke ca sadācārā budhaiḥ smṛtāḥ
c te ced bhavanti rājendra ṛdhyante gṛhamedhinaḥ
e dhūpapradānair dīpaiś ca namaskārais tathaiva ca
a yathā siddhasya cānnasya dvijāyāgraṃ pradīyate
c balayaś ca gṛhoddeśe ataḥ prīyanti devatāḥ
a yathā ca gṛhiṇas toṣo bhaved vai balikarmaṇā
c tathā śataguṇā prītir devatānāṃ sma jāyate
a evaṃ dhūpapradānaṃ ca dīpadānaṃ ca sādhavaḥ
c praśaṃsanti namaskārair yuktam ātmaguṇāvaham
a snānenādbhiś ca yat karma kriyate vai vipaścitā
c namaskāraprayuktena tena prīyanti devatāḥ
d pitaraś ca mahābhāgā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
e gṛhyāś ca devatāḥ sarvāḥ prīyante vidhinārcitāḥ
a ity etāṃ buddhim āsthāya nahuṣaḥ sa nareśvaraḥ
c surendratvaṃ mahat prāpya kṛtavān etad adbhutam
a kasya cit tv atha kālasya bhāgyakṣaya upasthite
c sarvam etad avajñāya na cakāraitad īdṛśam
a tataḥ sa parihīṇo 'bhūt surendro balikarmataḥ
c dhūpadīpodakavidhiṃ na yathāvac cakāra ha
e tato 'sya yajñaviṣayo rakṣobhiḥ paryabādhyata
a athāgastyam ṛṣiśreṣṭhaṃ vāhanāyājuhāva ha
c drutaṃ sarasvatīkūlāt smayann iva mahābalaḥ
a tato bhṛgur mahātejā maitrāvaruṇim abravīt
c nimīlayasva nayane jaṭā yāvad viśāmi te
d surendrapātanāyeti sa ca netre nyamīlayat
a sthāṇubhūtasya tasyātha jaṭāḥ prāviśad acyutaḥ
c bhṛguḥ sa sumahātejāḥ pātanāya nṛpasya ha
a tataḥ sa devarāṭ prāptas tam ṛṣiṃ vāhanāya vai
c tato 'gastyaḥ surapatiṃ vākyam āha viśāṃ pate
a yojayasvendra māṃ kṣipraṃ kaṃ ca deśaṃ vahāmi te
c yatra vakṣyasi tatra tvāṃ nayiṣyāmi surādhipa
a ity ukto nahuṣas tena yojayām āsa taṃ munim
c bhṛgus tasya jaṭāsaṃstho babhūva hṛṣito bhṛśam
a na cāpi darśanaṃ tasya cakāra sa bhṛgus tadā
c varadānaprabhāvajño nahuṣasya mahātmanaḥ
a na cukopa sa cāgastyo yukto 'pi nahuṣeṇa vai
c taṃ tu rājā pratodena codayām āsa bhārata
d śrutismṛtī pramāṇaṃ vā neti vāde sa devarāṭ
a na cukopa sa dharmātmā tataḥ pādena devarāṭ
c agastyasya tadā kruddho vāmenābhyahanac chiraḥ
a tasmiñ śirasy abhihate sa jaṭāntargato bhṛguḥ
c śaśāpa balavat kruddho nahuṣaṃ pāpacetasam
 bhṛgur uvāca
a yasmāt padāhanaḥ krodhāc chirasīmaṃ mahāmunim
c tasmād āśu mahīṃ gaccha sarpo bhūtvā sudurmate
a ity uktaḥ sa tadā tena sarpo bhūtvā papāta ha
c adṛṣṭenātha bhṛguṇā bhūtale bharatarṣabha
a bhṛguṃ hi yadi so 'drākṣīn nahuṣaḥ pṛthivīpate
c na sa śakto 'bhaviṣyad vai pātane tasya tejasā
a sa tu tais taiḥ pradānaiś ca tapobhir niyamais tathā
c patito 'pi mahārāja bhūtale smṛtimān abhūt
e prasādayām āsa bhṛguṃ śāpānto me bhaved iti
a tato 'gastyaḥ kṛpāviṣṭaḥ prāsādayata taṃ bhṛgum
c śāpāntārthaṃ mahārāja sa ca prādāt kṛpānvitaḥ
 bhṛgur uvāca
a rājā yudhiṣṭhiro nāma bhaviṣyati kurūdvahaḥ
c sa tvāṃ mokṣayitā śāpād ity uktvāntaradhīyata
a agastyo 'pi mahātejāḥ kṛtvā kāryaṃ śatakratoḥ
c svam āśramapadaṃ prāyāt pūjyamāno dvijātibhiḥ
a nahuṣo 'pi tvayā rājaṃs tasmāc chāpāt samuddhṛtaḥ
c jagāma brahmasadanaṃ paśyatas te janādhipa
a tadā tu pātayitvā taṃ nahuṣaṃ bhūtale bhṛguḥ
c jagāma brahmasadanaṃ brahmaṇe ca nyavedayat
a tataḥ śakraṃ samānāyya devān āha pitāmahaḥ
c varadānān mama surā nahuṣo rājyam āptavān
e sa cāgastyena kruddhena bhraṃśito bhūtalaṃ gataḥ
a na ca śakyaṃ vinā rājñā surā vartayituṃ kva cit
c tasmād ayaṃ punaḥ śakro devarājye 'bhiṣicyatām
a evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇaṃ tu devāḥ pārtha pitāmaham
c evam astv iti saṃhṛṣṭāḥ pratyūcus te pitāmaham
a so 'bhiṣikto bhagavatā devarājyena vāsavaḥ
c brahmaṇā rājaśārdūla yathāpūrvaṃ vyarocata
a evam etat purāvṛttaṃ nahuṣasya vyatikramāt
c sa ca tair eva saṃsiddho nahuṣaḥ karmabhiḥ punaḥ
a tasmād dīpāḥ pradātavyāḥ sāyaṃ vai gṛhamedhibhiḥ
c divyaṃ cakṣur avāpnoti pretya dīpapradāyakaḥ
e pūrṇacandrapratīkāśā dīpadāś ca bhavanty uta
a yāvad akṣinimeṣāṇi jvalate tāvatīḥ samāḥ
c rūpavān dhanavāṃś cāpi naro bhavati dīpadaḥ
d ya idaṃ śṛṇuyād vāpi paṭhate yo dvijottamaḥ
d brahmalokam avāpnoti sa ca naivātra saṃśayaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a brāhmaṇasvāni ye mandā haranti bharatarṣabha
c nṛśaṃsakāriṇo mūḍhāḥ kva te gacchanti mānavāḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c caṇḍālasya ca saṃvādaṃ kṣatrabandhoś ca bhārata
d pātakānāṃ paraṃ hy etad brahmasvaharaṇaṃ balāt
d sānvayās te vinaśyanti caṇḍālāḥ pretya ceha ca
 rājanya uvāca
a vṛddharūpo 'si caṇḍāla bālavac ca viceṣṭase
c śvakharāṇāṃ rajaḥsevī kasmād udvijase gavām
a sādhubhir garhitaṃ karma caṇḍālasya vidhīyate
c kasmād gorajasā dhvastam apāṃ kuṇḍe niṣiñcasi
 caṇḍāla uvāca
a brāhmaṇasya gavāṃ rājan hriyatīnāṃ rajaḥ purā
c somam uddhvaṃsayām āsa taṃ somaṃ ye 'piban dvijāḥ
d bhṛtyānām api rājñāṃ tu rajasā dhvaṃsitaṃ makhe
d tatpānāc ca dvijāḥ sarve kṣipraṃ narakam āviśan
a dīkṣitaś ca sa rājāpi kṣipraṃ narakam āviśat
c saha tair yājakaiḥ sarvair brahmasvam upajīvya tat
a ye 'pi tatrāpiban kṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ dadhi ca mānavāḥ
c brāhmaṇāḥ saharājanyāḥ sarve narakam āviśan
a jaghnus tāḥ payasā putrāṃs tathā pautrān vidhunvatīḥ
c paśūn avekṣamāṇāś ca sādhuvṛttena daṃpatī
a ahaṃ tatrāvasaṃ rājan brahmacārī jitendriyaḥ
c tāsāṃ me rajasā dhvastaṃ bhaikṣam āsīn narādhipa
a caṇḍālo 'haṃ tato rājan bhuktvā tad abhavaṃ mṛtaḥ
c brahmasvahārī ca nṛpaḥ so 'pratiṣṭhāṃ gatiṃ yayau
a tasmād dharen na viprasvaṃ kadā cid api kiṃ cana
b na paśyen nānumodec ca na hartuṃ kiṃ cid ācaret
c brahmasvarajasā dhvastaṃ bhuktvā māṃ paśya yādṛśam
a tasmāt somo 'py avikreyaḥ puruṣeṇa vipaścitā
b etad dhi dhanam utkṛṣṭaṃ dvijānām aviśeṣataḥ
c vikrayaṃ hīha somasya garhayanti manīṣiṇaḥ
a ye cainaṃ krīṇate rājan ye ca vikrīṇate janāḥ
c te tu vaivasvataṃ prāpya rauravaṃ yānti sarvaśaḥ
a somaṃ tu rajasā dhvastaṃ vikrīyād buddhipūrvakam
c śrotriyo vārdhuṣī bhūtvā cirarātrāya naśyati
e narakaṃ triṃśataṃ prāpya śvaviṣṭhām upajīvati
f brahmasvahārī narakān yātanāś cānubhūya tu
f maleṣu ca kṛmir bhūtvā śvaviṣṭhām upajīvati
a śvacaryām atimānaṃ ca sakhidāreṣu viplavam
c tulayādhārayad dharmo hy atimāno 'tiricyate
