a śvānaṃ vai pāpinaṃ paśya vivarṇaṃ hariṇaṃ kṛśam
c atimānena bhūtānām imāṃ gatim upāgatam
a ahaṃ vai vipule jātaḥ kule dhanasamanvite
c anyasmiñ janmani vibho jñānavijñānapāragaḥ
a abhavaṃ tatra jānāno hy etān doṣān madāt tadā
c saṃrabdha eva bhūtānāṃ pṛṣṭhamāṃsāny abhakṣayam
d so 'haṃ vai viditaḥ sarvair dūrago malino vane
d sādhūnāṃ paribhāvepsur viprāṇāṃ garvito dhanaiḥ
a so 'haṃ tena ca vṛttena bhojanena ca tena vai
c imām avasthāṃ saṃprāptaḥ paśya kālasya paryayam
a ādīptam iva cailāntaṃ bhramarair iva cārditam
c dhāvamānaṃ susaṃrabdhaṃ paśya māṃ rajasānvitam
a svādhyāyais tu mahat pāpaṃ taranti gṛhamedhinaḥ
c dānaiḥ pṛthagvidhaiś cāpi yathā prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
a tathā pāpakṛtaṃ vipram āśramasthaṃ mahīpate
c sarvasaṅgavinirmuktaṃ chandāṃsy uttārayanty uta
a ahaṃ tu pāpayonyāṃ vai prasūtaḥ kṣatriyarṣabha
c niścayaṃ nādhigacchāmi kathaṃ mucyeyam ity uta
a jātismaratvaṃ tu mama kena cit pūrvakarmaṇā
c śubhena yena mokṣaṃ vai prāptum icchāmy ahaṃ nṛpa
a tvam imaṃ me prapannāya saṃśayaṃ brūhi pṛcchate
c caṇḍālatvāt katham ahaṃ mucyeyam iti sattama
 rājanya uvāca
a caṇḍāla pratijānīhi yena mokṣam avāpsyasi
c brāhmaṇārthe tyajan prāṇān gatim iṣṭām avāpsyasi
a dattvā śarīraṃ kravyādbhyo raṇāgnau dvijahetukam
c hutvā prāṇān pramokṣas te nānyathā mokṣam arhasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktaḥ sa tadā rājan brahmasvārthe paraṃtapa
c hutvā raṇamukhe prāṇān gatim iṣṭām avāpa ha
a tasmād rakṣyaṃ tvayā putra brahmasvaṃ bharatarṣabha
c yadīcchasi mahābāho śāśvatīṃ gatim uttamām
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a eko lokaḥ sukṛtināṃ sarve tv āho pitāmaha
c uta tatrāpi nānātvaṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a karmabhiḥ pārtha nānātvaṃ lokānāṃ yānti mānavāḥ
c puṇyān puṇyakṛto yānti pāpān pāpakṛto janāḥ
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c gautamasya munes tāta saṃvādaṃ vāsavasya ca
a brāhmaṇo gautamaḥ kaś cin mṛdur dānto jitendriyaḥ
c mahāvane hastiśiśuṃ paridyūnam amātṛkam
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā jīvayām āsa sānukrośo dhṛtavrataḥ
c sa tu dīrgheṇa kālena babhūvātibalo mahān
a taṃ prabhinnaṃ mahānāgaṃ prasrutaṃ sarvato madam
c dhṛtarāṣṭrasya rūpeṇa śakro jagrāha hastinam
a hriyamāṇaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā gautamaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
c abhyabhāṣata rājānaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ mahātapāḥ
a mā me hārṣīr hastinaṃ putram enaṃ
duḥkhāt puṣṭaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrākṛtajña
c mitraṃ satāṃ saptapadaṃ vadanti
mitradroho naiva rājan spṛśet tvām
a idhmodakapradātāraṃ śūnyapālakam āśrame
c vinītam ācāryakule suyuktaṃ gurukarmaṇi
a śiṣṭaṃ dāntaṃ kṛtajñaṃ ca priyaṃ ca satataṃ mama
c na me vikrośato rājan hartum arhasi kuñjaram
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a gavāṃ sahasraṃ bhavate dadāmi
dāsīśataṃ niṣkaśatāni pañca
c anyac ca vittaṃ vividhaṃ maharṣe
kiṃ brāhmaṇasyeha gajena kṛtyam
 gautama uvāca
a tvām eva gāvo 'bhi bhavantu rājan
dāsyaḥ saniṣkā vividhaṃ ca ratnam
c anyac ca vittaṃ vividhaṃ narendra
kiṃ brāhmaṇasyeha dhanena kṛtyam
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a brāhmaṇānāṃ hastibhir nāsti kṛtyaṃ
rājanyānāṃ nāgakulāni vipra
c svaṃ vāhanaṃ nayato nāsty adharmo
nāgaśreṣṭhād gautamāsmān nivarta
 gautama uvāca
a yatra preto nandati puṇyakarmā
yatra pretaḥ śocati pāpakarmā
c vaivasvatasya sadane mahātmanas
tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a ye niṣkriyā nāstikāḥ śraddadhānāḥ
pāpātmāna indriyārthe niviṣṭāḥ
c yamasya te yātanāṃ prāpnuvanti
paraṃ gantā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
 gautama uvāca
a vaivasvatī saṃyamanī janānāṃ
yatrānṛtaṃ nocyate yatra satyam
c yatrābalā balinaṃ yātayanti
tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a jyeṣṭhāṃ svasāraṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca
guruṃ yathā mānayantaś caranti
c tathāvidhānām eṣa loko maharṣe
paraṃ gantā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
 gautama uvāca
a mandākinī vaiśravaṇasya rājño
mahābhogā bhogijanapraveśyā
c gandharvayakṣair apsarobhiś ca juṣṭā
tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a atithivratāḥ suvratā ye janā vai
pratiśrayaṃ dadati brāhmaṇebhyaḥ
c śiṣṭāśinaḥ saṃvibhajyāśritāṃś ca
mandākinīṃ te 'pi vibhūṣayanti
 gautama uvāca
a meror agre yad vanaṃ bhāti ramyaṃ
supuṣpitaṃ kiṃnaragītajuṣṭam
c sudarśanā yatra jambūr viśālā
tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a ye brāhmaṇā mṛdavaḥ satyaśīlā
bahuśrutāḥ sarvabhūtābhirāmāḥ
c ye 'dhīyante setihāsaṃ purāṇaṃ
madhvāhutyā juhvati ca dvijebhyaḥ
a tathāvidhānām eṣa loko maharṣe
paraṃ gantā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
c yad vidyate viditaṃ sthānam asti
tad brūhi tvaṃ tvarito hy eṣa yāmi
 gautama uvāca
a supuṣpitaṃ kiṃnararājajuṣṭaṃ
priyaṃ vanaṃ nandanaṃ nāradasya
c gandharvāṇām apsarasāṃ ca sadma
tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a ye nṛttagītakuśalā janāḥ sadā
hy ayācamānāḥ sahitāś caranti
c tathāvidhānām eṣa loko maharṣe
paraṃ gantā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
 gautama uvāca
a yatrottarāḥ kuravo bhānti ramyā
devaiḥ sārdhaṃ modamānā narendra
c yatrāgniyaunāś ca vasanti viprā
hy ayonayaḥ parvatayonayaś ca
a yatra śakro varṣati sarvakāmān
yatra striyaḥ kāmacārāś caranti
c yatra cerṣyā nāsti nārīnarāṇāṃ
tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a ye sarvabhūteṣu nivṛttakāmā
amāṃsādā nyastadaṇḍāś caranti
c na hiṃsanti sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca
bhūtānāṃ ye sarvabhūtātmabhūtāḥ
a nirāśiṣo nirmamā vītarāgā
lābhālābhe tulyanindāpraśaṃsāḥ
c tathāvidhānām eṣa loko maharṣe
paraṃ gantā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
 gautama uvāca
a tataḥ paraṃ bhānti lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
supuṇyagandhā nirmalā vītaśokāḥ
c somasya rājñaḥ sadane mahātmanas
tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a ye dānaśīlā na pratigṛhṇate sadā
na cāpy arthān ādadate parebhyaḥ
c yeṣām adeyam arhate nāsti kiṃ cit
sarvātithyāḥ suprasādā janāś ca
a ye kṣantāro nābhijalpanti cānyāñ
śaktā bhūtvā satataṃ puṇyaśīlāḥ
c tathāvidhānām eṣa loko maharṣe
paraṃ gantā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
 gautama uvāca
a tataḥ paraṃ bhānti lokāḥ sanātanā
virajaso vitamaskā viśokāḥ
c ādityasya sumahāntaḥ suvṛttās
tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a svādhyāyaśīlā guruśuśrūṣaṇe ratās
tapasvinaḥ suvratāḥ satyasaṃdhāḥ
c ācāryāṇām apratikūlabhāṣiṇo
nityotthitā gurukarmasv acodyāḥ
a tathāvidhānām eṣa loko maharṣe
viśuddhānāṃ bhāvitavāṅmatīnām
c satye sthitānāṃ vedavidāṃ mahātmanāṃ
paraṃ gantā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
 gautama uvāca
a tataḥ pare bhānti lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
supuṇyagandhā virajā viśokāḥ
c varuṇasya rājñaḥ sadane mahātmanas
tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a cāturmāsyair ye yajante janāḥ sadā
tatheṣṭīnāṃ daśaśataṃ prāpnuvanti
c ye cāgnihotraṃ juhvati śraddadhānā
yathānyāyaṃ trīṇi varṣāṇi viprāḥ
a svadāriṇāṃ dharmadhure mahātmanāṃ
yathocite vartmani susthitānām
c dharmātmanām udvahatāṃ gatiṃ tāṃ
paraṃ gantā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
 gautama uvāca
a indrasya lokā virajā viśokā
duranvayāḥ kāṅkṣitā mānavānām
c tasyāhaṃ te bhavane bhūritejaso
rājann imaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a śatavarṣajīvī yaś ca śūro manuṣyo
vedādhyāyī yaś ca yajvāpramattaḥ
c ete sarve śakralokaṃ vrajanti
paraṃ gantā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
 gautama uvāca
a prājāpatyāḥ santi lokā mahānto
nākasya pṛṣṭhe puṣkalā vītaśokāḥ
c manīṣitāḥ sarvalokodbhavānāṃ
tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a ye rājāno rājasūyābhiṣiktā
dharmātmāno rakṣitāraḥ prajānām
c ye cāśvamedhāvabhṛthāplutāṅgās
teṣāṃ lokā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
 gautama uvāca
a tataḥ paraṃ bhānti lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
supuṇyagandhā virajā vītaśokāḥ
c tasminn ahaṃ durlabhe tvāpradhṛṣye
gavāṃ loke hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a yo gosahasrī śatadaḥ samāṃ samāṃ
yo gośatī daśa dadyāc ca śaktyā
c tathā daśabhyo yaś ca dadyād ihaikāṃ
pañcabhyo vā dānaśīlas tathaikām
a ye jīryante brahmacaryeṇa viprā
brāhmīṃ vācaṃ parirakṣanti caiva
c manasvinas tīrthayātrāparāyaṇās
te tatra modanti gavāṃ vimāne
a prabhāsaṃ mānasaṃ puṇyaṃ puṣkarāṇi mahat saraḥ
c puṇyaṃ ca naimiṣaṃ tīrthaṃ bāhudāṃ karatoyinīm
a gayāṃ gayaśiraś caiva vipāśāṃ sthūlavālukām
c tūṣṇīṃgaṅgāṃ daśagaṅgāṃ mahāhradam athāpi ca
a gautamīṃ kauśikīṃ pākāṃ mahātmāno dhṛtavratāḥ
c sarasvatīdṛṣadvatyau yamunāṃ ye prayānti ca
a tatra te divyasaṃsthānā divyamālyadharāḥ śivāḥ
c prayānti puṇyagandhāḍhyā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra vai
 gautama uvāca
a yatra śītabhayaṃ nāsti na coṣṇabhayam aṇv api
c na kṣutpipāse na glānir na duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ tathā
a na dveṣyo na priyaḥ kaś cin na bandhur na ripus tathā
c na jarāmaraṇe vāpi na puṇyaṃ na ca pātakam
a tasmin virajasi sphīte prajñāsattvavyavasthite
c svayaṃbhubhavane puṇye hastinaṃ me yatiṣyati
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a nirmuktāḥ sarvasaṅgebhyo kṛtātmāno yatavratāḥ
c adhyātmayogasaṃsthāne yuktāḥ svargagatiṃ gatāḥ
a te brahmabhavanaṃ puṇyaṃ prāpnuvantīha sāttvikāḥ
c na tatra dhṛtarāṣṭras te śakyo draṣṭuṃ mahāmune
 gautama uvāca
a rathantaraṃ yatra bṛhac ca gīyate
yatra vedī puṇḍarīkaiḥ stṛṇoti
c yatropayāti haribhiḥ somapīthī
tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
a budhyāmi tvāṃ vṛtrahaṇaṃ śatakratuṃ
vyatikramantaṃ bhuvanāni viśvā
c kaccin na vācā vṛjinaṃ kadā cid
akārṣaṃ te manaso 'bhiṣaṅgāt
 śakra uvāca
a yasmād imaṃ lokapathaṃ prajānām
anvāgamaṃ padavāde gajasya
c tasmād bhavān praṇataṃ mānuśāstu
bravīṣi yat tat karavāṇi sarvam
 gautama uvāca
a śvetaṃ kareṇuṃ mama putranāgaṃ
yaṃ me 'hārṣīr daśavarṣāṇi bālam
c yo me vane vasato 'bhūd dvitīyas
tam eva me dehi surendra nāgam
 śakra uvāca
a ayaṃ sutas te dvijamukhya nāgaś
cāghrāyate tvām abhivīkṣamāṇaḥ
c pādau ca te nāsikayopajighrate
śreyo mama dhyāhi namaś ca te 'stu
 gautama uvāca
a śivaṃ sadaiveha surendra tubhyaṃ
dhyāyāmi pūjāṃ ca sadā prayuñje
c mamāpi tvaṃ śakra śivaṃ dadasva
tvayā dattaṃ pratigṛhṇāmi nāgam
 śakra uvāca
a yeṣāṃ vedā nihitā vai guhāyāṃ
manīṣiṇāṃ sattvavatāṃ mahātmanām
c teṣāṃ tvayaikena mahātmanāsmi
buddhas tasmāt prītimāṃs te 'ham adya
a hantaihi brāhmaṇa kṣipraṃ saha putreṇa hastinā
c prāpnuhi tvaṃ śubhāṃl lokān ahnāya ca cirāya ca
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sa gautamaṃ puraskṛtya saha putreṇa hastinā
c divam ācakrame vajrī sadbhiḥ saha durāsadam
d ya idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ yaḥ paṭhed vā jitendriyaḥ
d sa yāti brahmaṇo lokaṃ brāhmaṇo gautamo yathā
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a dānaṃ bahuvidhākāraṃ śāntiḥ satyam ahiṃsatā
c svadāratuṣṭiś coktā te phalaṃ dānasya caiva yat
a pitāmahasya viditaṃ kim anyatra tapobalāt
c tapaso yat paraṃ te 'dya tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tapaḥ pracakṣate yāvat tāval lokā yudhiṣṭhira
c mataṃ mama tu kaunteya tapo nānaśanāt param
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c bhagīrathasya saṃvādaṃ brahmaṇaś ca mahātmanaḥ
a atītya suralokaṃ ca gavāṃ lokaṃ ca bhārata
c ṛṣilokaṃ ca so 'gacchad bhagīratha iti śrutiḥ
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā sa vacaḥ prāha brahmā rājan bhagīratham
c kathaṃ bhagīrathāgās tvam imaṃ deśaṃ durāsadam
a na hi devā na gandharvā na manuṣyā bhagīratha
c āyānty ataptatapasaḥ kathaṃ vai tvam ihāgataḥ
 bhagīratha uvāca
a niḥśaṅkam annam adadaṃ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ
śataṃ sahasrāṇi sadaiva dānam
c brāhmaṃ vrataṃ nityam āsthāya viddhi
na tv evāhaṃ tasya phalād ihāgām
a daśaikarātrān daśa pañcarātrān
ekādaśaikādaśakān kratūṃś ca
c jyotiṣṭomānāṃ ca śataṃ yad iṣṭaṃ
phalena tenāpi ca nāgato 'ham
a yac cāvasaṃ jāhnavītīranityaḥ
śataṃ samās tapyamānas tapo 'ham
c adāṃ ca tatrāśvatarīsahasraṃ
nārīpuraṃ na ca tenāham āgām
a daśāyutāni cāśvānām ayutāni ca viṃśatim
c puṣkareṣu dvijātibhyaḥ prādāṃ gāś ca sahasraśaḥ
a suvarṇacandroḍupadhāriṇīnāṃ
kanyottamānām adadaṃ sragviṇīnām
c ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrāṇi vibhūṣitānāṃ
jāmbūnadair ābharaṇair na tena
a daśārbudāny adadaṃ gosavejyāsv
ekaikaśo daśa gā lokanātha
c samānavatsāḥ payasā samanvitāḥ
suvarṇakāṃsyopaduhā na tena
a aptoryāmeṣu niyatam ekaikasmin daśādadam
c gṛṣṭīnāṃ kṣīradātrīṇāṃ rohiṇīnāṃ na tena ca
a dogdhrīṇāṃ vai gavāṃ caiva prayutāni daśaiva ha
c prādāṃ daśaguṇaṃ brahman na ca tenāham āgataḥ
a vājināṃ bāhlijātānām ayutāny adadaṃ daśa
c karkāṇāṃ hemamālānāṃ na ca tenāham āgataḥ
a koṭīś ca kāñcanasyāṣṭau prādāṃ brahman daśa tv aham
c ekaikasmin kratau tena phalenāhaṃ na cāgataḥ
a vājināṃ śyāmakarṇānāṃ haritānāṃ pitāmaha
c prādāṃ hemasrajāṃ brahman koṭīr daśa ca sapta ca
a īṣādantān mahākāyān kāñcanasragvibhūṣitān
c patnīmataḥ sahasrāṇi prāyacchaṃ daśa sapta ca
a alaṃkṛtānāṃ deveśa divyaiḥ kanakabhūṣaṇaiḥ
c rathānāṃ kāñcanāṅgānāṃ sahasrāṇy adadaṃ daśa
e sapta cānyāni yuktāni vājibhiḥ samalaṃkṛtaiḥ
a dakṣiṇāvayavāḥ ke cid vedair ye saṃprakīrtitāḥ
c vājapeyeṣu daśasu prādāṃ tenāpi nāpy aham
a śakratulyaprabhāvānām ijyayā vikrameṇa ca
c sahasraṃ niṣkakaṇṭhānām adadaṃ dakṣiṇām aham
a vijitya nṛpatīn sarvān makhair iṣṭvā pitāmaha
c aṣṭabhyo rājasūyebhyo na ca tenāham āgataḥ
a srotaś ca yāvad gaṅgāyāś channam āsīj jagatpate
c dakṣiṇābhiḥ pravṛttābhir mama nāgāṃ ca tatkṛte
a vājināṃ ca sahasre dve suvarṇaśatabhūṣite
c varaṃ grāmaśataṃ cāham ekaikasya tridhādadam
e tapasvī niyatāhāraḥ śamam āsthāya vāgyataḥ
a dīrghakālaṃ himavati gaṅgāyāś ca durutsahām
c mūrdhnā dhārāṃ mahādevaḥ śirasā yām adhārayat
e na tenāpy aham āgacchaṃ phaleneha pitāmaha
a śamyākṣepair ayajaṃ yac ca devān
sadyaskānām ayutaiś cāpi yat tat
c trayodaśadvādaśāhāṃś ca deva
sapauṇḍarīkān na ca teṣāṃ phalena
a aṣṭau sahasrāṇi kakudminām ahaṃ
śuklarṣabhāṇām adadaṃ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ
c ekaikaṃ vai kāñcanaṃ śṛṅgam ebhyaḥ
patnīś caiṣām adadaṃ niṣkakaṇṭhīḥ
a hiraṇyaratnanicitān adadaṃ ratnaparvatān
c dhanadhānyasamṛddhāṃś ca grāmāñ śatasahasraśaḥ
a śataṃ śatānāṃ gṛṣṭīnām adadaṃ cāpy atandritaḥ
c iṣṭvānekair mahāyajñair brāhmaṇebhyo na tena ca
a ekādaśāhair ayajaṃ sadakṣiṇair
dvirdvādaśāhair aśvamedhaiś ca deva
c ārkāyaṇaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiś ca brahmaṃs
teṣāṃ phaleneha na cāgato 'smi
a niṣkaikakaṇṭham adadaṃ yojanāyataṃ
tad vistīrṇaṃ kāñcanapādapānām
c vanaṃ cūtānāṃ ratnavibhūṣitānāṃ
na caiva teṣām āgato 'haṃ phalena
a turāyaṇaṃ hi vratam apradhṛṣyam
akrodhano 'karavaṃ triṃśato 'bdān
c śataṃ gavām aṣṭa śatāni caiva
dine dine hy adadaṃ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ
a payasvinīnām atha rohiṇīnāṃ
tathaiva cāpy anaḍuhāṃ lokanātha
c prādāṃ nityaṃ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ sureśa
nehāgatas tena phalena cāham
d śamyākṣepeṇa pṛthivīṃ tridhā paryacaraṃ yajan
a triṃśad agnim ahaṃ brahmann ayajaṃ yac ca nityadā
c aṣṭābhiḥ sarvamedhaiś ca naramedhaiś ca saptabhiḥ
a daśabhir viśvajidbhiś ca śatair aṣṭādaśottaraiḥ
c na caiva teṣāṃ deveśa phalenāham ihāgataḥ
a sarayvāṃ bāhudāyāṃ ca gaṅgāyām atha naimiṣe
c gavāṃ śatānām ayutam adadaṃ na ca tena vai
a indreṇa guhyaṃ nihitaṃ vai guhāyāṃ
yad bhārgavas tapasehābhyavindat
c jājvalyamānam uśanastejaseha
tat sādhayām āsa mahaṃ vareṇyam
d brāhmaṇārthāya karmāṇi raṇaṃ caiva karomi yat
a tato me brāhmaṇās tuṣṭās tasmin karmaṇi sādhite
b pūjitair brāhmaṇair nityaṃ vacanenāham āgataḥ
c sahasram ṛṣayaś cāsan ye vai tatra samāgatāḥ
e uktas tair asmi gaccha tvaṃ brahmalokam iti prabho
a prītenoktaḥ sahasreṇa brāhmaṇānām ahaṃ prabho
c imaṃ lokam anuprāpto mā bhūt te 'tra vicāraṇā
a kāmaṃ yathāvad vihitaṃ vidhātrā
pṛṣṭena vācyaṃ tu mayā yathāvat
c tapo hi nānyac cānaśanān mataṃ me
namo 'stu te devavara prasīda
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktavantaṃ taṃ brahmā rājānaṃ sma bhagīratham
c pūjayām āsa pūjārhaṃ vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
d tasmād anaśanair yukto viprān pūjaya nityadā
d viprāṇāṃ vacanāt sarvaṃ paratreha ca sidhyati
d vāsobhir annair gobhiś ca śubhair naiveśikair api
d śubhaiḥ surakṣaṇaiś cāpi toṣyā eva dvijās tvayā
d etad eva paraṃ guhyam alobhena samācara
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a śatāyur uktaḥ puruṣaḥ śatavīryaś ca vaidike
c kasmān mriyante puruṣā bālā api pitāmaha
a āyuṣmān kena bhavati svalpāyur vāpi mānavaḥ
c kena vā labhate kīrtiṃ kena vā labhate śriyam
a tapasā brahmacaryeṇa japair homais tathauṣadhaiḥ
c janmanā yadi vācārāt tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atra te vartayiṣyāmi yan māṃ tvam anupṛcchasi
c alpāyur yena bhavati dīrghāyur vāpi mānavaḥ
a yena vā labhate kīrtiṃ yena vā labhate śriyam
c yathā ca vartan puruṣaḥ śreyasā saṃprayujyate
a ācārāl labhate hy āyur ācārāl labhate śriyam
b ācārād dhanam akṣayyam ācāro hanti kilbiṣam
c ācārāt kīrtim āpnoti puruṣaḥ pretya ceha ca
a durācāro hi puruṣo nehāyur vindate mahat
c trasanti yasmād bhūtāni tathā paribhavanti ca
a tasmāt kuryād ihācāraṃ ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
c api pāpaśarīrasya ācāro hanty alakṣaṇam
a ācāralakṣaṇo dharmaḥ santaś cācāralakṣaṇāḥ
c sādhūnāṃ ca yathā vṛttam etad ācāralakṣaṇam
a apy adṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vāpi puruṣaṃ dharmacāriṇam
c bhūtikarmāṇi kurvāṇaṃ taṃ janāḥ kurvate priyam
a ye nāstikā niṣkriyāś ca guruśāstrātilaṅghinaḥ
c adharmajñā durācārās te bhavanti gatāyuṣaḥ
a viśīlā bhinnamaryādā nityaṃ saṃkīrṇamaithunāḥ
c alpāyuṣo bhavantīha narā nirayagāminaḥ
a sarvalakṣaṇahīno 'pi samudācāravān naraḥ
c śraddadhāno 'nasūyaś ca śataṃ varṣāṇi jīvati
a akrodhanaḥ satyavādī bhūtānām avihiṃsakaḥ
c anasūyur ajihmaś ca śataṃ varṣāṇi jīvati
a loṣṭamardī tṛṇacchedī nakhakhādī ca yo naraḥ
b sa vināśaṃ vrajaty āśu sūdako 'śucir eva ca
c nityocchiṣṭaḥ saṃkusuko nehāyur vindate mahat
a brāhme muhūrte budhyeta dharmārthau cānucintayet
c utthāyācamya tiṣṭheta pūrvāṃ saṃdhyāṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ
a evam evāparāṃ saṃdhyāṃ samupāsīta vāgyataḥ
b utthāyāvaśyakaṃ kṛtvā kṛtaśaucaḥ samāhitaḥ
c nekṣetādityam udyantaṃ nāstaṃ yāntaṃ kadā cana
d nopasṛṣṭaṃ na vāristhaṃ na madhyaṃ nabhaso gatam
a ṛṣayo dīrghasaṃdhyatvād dīrgham āyur avāpnuvan
b sa darbhapāṇis tat kurvan vāgyatas tanmanāḥ śuciḥ
c tasmāt tiṣṭhet sadā pūrvāṃ paścimāṃ caiva vāgyataḥ
a ye ca pūrvām upāsante dvijāḥ saṃdhyāṃ na paścimām
c sarvāṃs tān dhārmiko rājā śūdrakarmāṇi kārayet
a paradārā na gantavyāḥ sarvavarṇeṣu karhi cit
c na hīdṛśam anāyuṣyaṃ loke kiṃ cana vidyate
e yādṛśaṃ puruṣasyeha paradāropasevanam
f yāvaṃto romakūpāḥ syuḥ strīṇāṃ gātreṣu nirmitāḥ
f tāvad varṣasahasrāṇi narakaṃ paryupāsate
f tādṛśaṃ vidyate kiṃ cid anāyuṣyaṃ nṛṇām iha
f tādṛśaṃ puruṣasyeha dhanāyuṣyaharaṃ nṛṇām
a prasādhanaṃ ca keśānām añjanaṃ dantadhāvanam
c pūrvāhṇa eva kurvīta devatānāṃ ca pūjanam
a purīṣamūtre nodīkṣen nādhitiṣṭhet kadā cana
c udakyayā ca saṃbhāṣāṃ na kurvīta kadā cana
a notsṛjeta purīṣaṃ ca kṣetre grāmasya cāntike
c ubhe mūtrapurīṣe tu nāpsu kuryāt kadā cana
d annaṃ bubhukṣamāṇas tu trir mukhena spṛśed apaḥ
d bhuktvā cānnaṃ tathaiva trir dviḥ punaḥ parimārjayet
d devālaye 'tha govṛnde caitye sasyeṣu viśrame
d bhokṣyan bhuktvā kṣute 'dhvānaṃ gatvā mūtrapurīṣayoḥ
d dvir ācāmed yathānyāyaṃ hṛdgataṃ tu pibann apaḥ
a prāṅmukho nityam aśnīyād vāgyato 'nnam akutsayan
c praskandayec ca manasā bhuktvā cāgnim upaspṛśet
d tatrācāntaḥ spṛśed agniṃ tathā mṛdugatir vrajet
a āyuṣyaṃ prāṅmukho bhuṅkte yaśasyaṃ dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ
c dhanyaṃ paścānmukho bhuṅkte ṛtaṃ bhuṅkte udaṅmukhaḥ
d agnim ālabhya toyena sarvān prāṇān upaspṛśet
d gātrāṇi caiva sarvāṇi nābhiṃ pāṇitalena tu
d agrāsano jitakrodhī bālapūrvas tv alaṃkṛtaḥ
d ghṛtāhutiviśuddhānnaṃ hutāgniś cākṣipan graset
a nādhitiṣṭhet tuṣāñ jātu keśabhasmakapālikāḥ
c anyasya cāpy upasthānaṃ dūrataḥ parivarjayet
a śāntihomāṃś ca kurvīta sāvitrāṇi ca kārayet
c niṣaṇṇaś cāpi khādeta na tu gacchan kathaṃ cana
a mūtraṃ na tiṣṭhatā kāryaṃ na bhasmani na govraje
a ārdrapādas tu bhuñjīta nārdrapādas tu saṃviśet
c ārdrapādas tu bhuñjāno varṣāṇāṃ jīvate śatam
a trīṇi tejāṃsi nocchiṣṭa ālabheta kadā cana
c agniṃ gāṃ brāhmaṇaṃ caiva tathāsyāyur na riṣyate
a trīṇi tejāṃsi nocchiṣṭa udīkṣeta kadā cana
c sūryācandramasau caiva nakṣatrāṇi ca sarvaśaḥ
a ūrdhvaṃ prāṇā hy utkrāmanti yūnaḥ sthavira āyati
c pratyutthānābhivādābhyāṃ punas tān pratipadyate
a abhivādayeta vṛddhāṃś ca āsanaṃ caiva dāpayet
c kṛtāñjalir upāsīta gacchantaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nviyāt
a na cāsītāsane bhinne bhinnaṃ kāṃsyaṃ ca varjayet
c naikavastreṇa bhoktavyaṃ na nagnaḥ snātum arhati
e svaptavyaṃ naiva nagnena na cocchiṣṭo 'pi saṃviśet
a ucchiṣṭo na spṛśec chīrṣaṃ sarve prāṇās tadāśrayāḥ
c keśagrahān prahārāṃś ca śirasy etān vivarjayet
a na pāṇibhyām ubhābhyāṃ ca kaṇḍūyej jātu vai śiraḥ
c na cābhīkṣṇaṃ śiraḥ snāyāt tathāsyāyur na riṣyate
a śiraḥsnātaś ca tailena nāṅgaṃ kiṃ cid upaspṛśet
c tilapiṣṭaṃ na cāśnīyāt tathāyur vindate mahat
a nādhyāpayet tathocchiṣṭo nādhīyīta kadā cana
c vāte ca pūtigandhe ca manasāpi na cintayet
a atra gāthā yamodgītāḥ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥ
c āyur asya nikṛntāmi prajām asyādade tathā
a ya ucchiṣṭaḥ pravadati svādhyāyaṃ cādhigacchati
c yaś cānadhyāyakāle 'pi mohād abhyasyati dvijaḥ
d tasya vedaḥ praṇaśyeta āyuś ca parihīyate
d na śūdrapatitābhyāśe caṇḍālaśravaṇena ca
e tasmād yukto 'py anadhyāye nādhīyīta kadā cana
a praty ādityaṃ praty anilaṃ prati gāṃ ca prati dvijān
c ye mehanti ca panthānaṃ te bhavanti gatāyuṣaḥ
a ubhe mūtrapurīṣe tu divā kuryād udaṅmukhaḥ
c dakṣiṇābhimukho rātrau tathāsyāyur na riṣyate
a trīn kṛśān nāvajānīyād dīrgham āyur jijīviṣuḥ
c brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyaṃ sarpaṃ sarve hy āśīviṣās trayaḥ
a dahaty āśīviṣaḥ kruddho yāvat paśyati cakṣuṣā
c kṣatriyo 'pi dahet kruddho yāvat spṛśati tejasā
a brāhmaṇas tu kulaṃ hanyād dhyānenāvekṣitena ca
c tasmād etat trayaṃ yatnād upaseveta paṇḍitaḥ
a guruṇā vairanirbandho na kartavyaḥ kadā cana
c anumānyaḥ prasādyaś ca guruḥ kruddho yudhiṣṭhira
a samyaṅ mithyāpravṛtte 'pi vartitavyaṃ gurāv iha
c gurunindā dahaty āyur manuṣyāṇāṃ na saṃśayaḥ
a dūrād āvasathān mūtraṃ dūrāt pādāvasecanam
c ucchiṣṭotsarjanaṃ caiva dūre kāryaṃ hitaiṣiṇā
a nātikalpaṃ nātisāyaṃ na ca madhyaṃdine sthite
c nājñātaiḥ saha gaccheta naiko na vṛṣalaiḥ saha
a panthā deyo brāhmaṇāya gobhyo rājabhya eva ca
c vṛddhāya bhārataptāya garbhiṇyai durbalāya ca
a pradakṣiṇaṃ ca kurvīta parijñātān vanaspatīn
c catuṣpathān prakurvīta sarvān eva pradakṣiṇān
a madhyaṃdine niśākāle madhyarātre ca sarvadā
c catuṣpathān na seveta ubhe saṃdhye tathaiva ca
a upānahau ca vastraṃ ca dhṛtam anyair na dhārayet
c brahmacārī ca nityaṃ syāt pādaṃ pādena nākramet
a amāvāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
c aṣṭamyāṃ sarvapakṣāṇāṃ brahmacārī sadā bhavet
a vṛthā māṃsaṃ na khādeta pṛṣṭhamāṃsaṃ tathaiva ca
c ākrośaṃ parivādaṃ ca paiśunyaṃ ca vivarjayet
a nāruṃtudaḥ syān na nṛśaṃsavādī
na hīnataḥ param abhyādadīta
c yayāsya vācā para udvijeta
na tāṃ vaded ruśatīṃ pāpalokyām
a vāksāyakā vadanān niṣpatanti
yair āhataḥ śocati rātryahāni
c parasya nāmarmasu te patanti
tān paṇḍito nāvasṛjet pareṣu
a rohate sāyakair viddhaṃ vanaṃ paraśunā hatam
c vācā duruktaṃ bībhatsaṃ na saṃrohati vākkṣatam
d karṇinālīkanārācān nirharanti śarīrataḥ
d vākśalyas tu na nirhartuṃ śakyo hṛdiśayo hi saḥ
a hīnāṅgān atiriktāṅgān vidyāhīnān vayodhikān
c rūpadraviṇahīnāṃś ca sattvahīnāṃś ca nākṣipet
a nāstikyaṃ vedanindāṃ ca devatānāṃ ca kutsanam

d itihāsapurāṇāni dānaṃ vedaṃ ca nityaśaḥ
d gāyatrīmananaṃ nityaṃ kuryāt saṃdhyāṃ samāhitaḥ
a kṛtvā mūtrapurīṣe tu rathyām ākramya vā punaḥ

a saṃyāvaṃ kṛsaraṃ māṃsaṃ śaṣkulī pāyasaṃ tathā

a udaṅmukhaś ca satataṃ śaucaṃ kuryāt samāhitaḥ

a akṛtvā devatāpūjāṃ nānyaṃ gacchet kadā cana

d dārasaṃgrahaṇāt pūrvaṃ nācaren maithunaṃ budhaḥ

d nodīkṣet paradārāṃś ca rahasy ekāsano bhavet

a udakśirā na svapeta tathā pratyakśirā na ca

a na bhagne nāvadīrṇe vā śayane prasvapeta ca

c snātvā ca nāvamṛjyeta gātrāṇi suvicakṣaṇaḥ
d tiryaṅ na ca śayen nityaṃ nāntardhānena saṃyutaḥ

a raktamālyaṃ na dhāryaṃ syāc chuklaṃ dhāryaṃ tu paṇḍitaiḥ

c gṛhe vāsayitavyās te dhanyam āyuṣyam eva ca

b devatāḥ pratimādarśāś candanāḥ puṣpavallikāḥ
b śuddhaṃ jalaṃ suvarṇaṃ ca rajataṃ gṛhamaṅgalam
c gṛheṣv ete na pāpāya tathā vai tailapāyikāḥ
a uddīpakāś ca gṛdhrāś ca kapotā bhramarās tathā

a agamyāś ca na gaccheta rājapatnīḥ sakhīs tathā
c vaidyānāṃ bālavṛddhānāṃ bhṛtyānāṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira

a na cerṣyā strīṣu kartavyā dārā rakṣyāś ca sarvaśaḥ

e dharmaṃ hi śreya ity āhur iti dharmavido viduḥ
f same tu jyeṣṭhatantrāḥ syuḥ kiṃ cid ūne 'pi nityaśaḥ
a daśācāryān upādhyāya upādhyāyān pitā daśa
c daśa caiva pitṝn mātā sarvāṃ vā pṛthivīm api
a gauraveṇābhibhavati nāsti mātṛsamo guruḥ
c mātā garīyasī yac ca tenaitāṃ manyate janaḥ
a jyeṣṭho bhrātā pitṛsamo mṛte pitari bhārata
c sa hy eṣāṃ vṛttidātā syāt sa caitān paripālayet
a kaniṣṭhās taṃ namasyeran sarve chandānuvartinaḥ
c tam eva copajīveran yathaiva pitaraṃ tathā
a śarīram etau sṛjataḥ pitā mātā ca bhārata
c ācāryaśāstā yā jātiḥ sā satyā sājarāmarā
a jyeṣṭhā mātṛsamā cāpi bhaginī bharatarṣabha
c bhrātur bhāryā ca tadvat syād yasyā bālye stanaṃ pibet
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ mlecchānāṃ ca pitāmaha
c upavāse matir iyaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca na vidmahe
a brahmakṣatreṇa niyamāś cartavyā iti naḥ śrutam
c upavāse kathaṃ teṣāṃ kṛtyam asti pitāmaha
a niyamaṃ copavāsānāṃ sarveṣāṃ brūhi pārthiva
c avāpnoti gatiṃ kāṃ ca upavāsaparāyaṇaḥ
a upavāsaḥ paraṃ puṇyam upavāsaḥ parāyaṇam
c upoṣyeha naraśreṣṭha kiṃ phalaṃ pratipadyate
a adharmān mucyate kena dharmam āpnoti vai katham
c svargaṃ puṇyaṃ ca labhate kathaṃ bharatasattama
a upoṣya cāpi kiṃ tena pradeyaṃ syān narādhipa
c dharmeṇa ca sukhān arthāṃl labhed yena bravīhi tam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ kaunteyaṃ dharmajñaṃ dharmatattvavit
c dharmaputram idaṃ vākyaṃ bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo 'bravīt
a idaṃ khalu mahārāja śrutam āsīt purātanam
c upavāsavidhau śreṣṭhā ye guṇā bharatarṣabha
a prājāpatyaṃ hy aṅgirasaṃ pṛṣṭavān asmi bhārata
c yathā māṃ tvaṃ tathaivāhaṃ pṛṣṭavāṃs taṃ tapodhanam
a praśnam etaṃ mayā pṛṣṭo bhagavān agnisaṃbhavaḥ
c upavāsavidhiṃ puṇyam ācaṣṭa bharatarṣabha
 aṅgirā uvāca
a brahmakṣatre trirātraṃ tu vihitaṃ kurunandana
c dvistrirātram athaivātra nirdiṣṭaṃ puruṣarṣabha
a vaiśyaśūdrau tu yau mohād upavāsaṃ prakurvate
c trirātraṃ dvistrirātraṃ vā tayoḥ puṣṭir na vidyate
a caturthabhaktakṣapaṇaṃ vaiśyaśūdre vidhīyate
c trirātraṃ na tu dharmajñair vihitaṃ brahmavādibhiḥ
a pañcamyāṃ caiva ṣaṣṭhyāṃ ca paurṇamāsyāṃ ca bhārata
b upoṣya ekabhaktena niyatātmā jitendriyaḥ
c kṣamāvān rūpasaṃpannaḥ śrutavāṃś caiva jāyate
a nānapatyo bhavet prājño daridro vā kadā cana
c yajiṣṇuḥ pañcamīṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ kṣaped yo bhojayed dvijān
a aṣṭamīm atha kaunteya śuklapakṣe caturdaśīm
c upoṣya vyādhirahito vīryavān abhijāyate
a mārgaśīrṣaṃ tu yo māsam ekabhaktena saṃkṣipet
c bhojayec ca dvijān bhaktyā sa mucyed vyādhikilbiṣaiḥ
a sarvakalyāṇasaṃpūrṇaḥ sarvauṣadhisamanvitaḥ
c kṛṣibhāgī bahudhano bahuputraś ca jāyate
a pauṣamāsaṃ tu kaunteya bhaktenaikena yaḥ kṣapet
c subhago darśanīyaś ca yaśobhāgī ca jāyate
a pitṛbhakto māghamāsam ekabhaktena yaḥ kṣapet
c śrīmatkule jñātimadhye sa mahattvaṃ prapadyate
a bhagadaivaṃ tu yo māsam ekabhaktena yaḥ kṣapet
c strīṣu vallabhatāṃ yāti vaśyāś cāsya bhavanti tāḥ
a caitraṃ tu niyato māsam ekabhaktena yaḥ kṣapet
c suvarṇamaṇimuktāḍhye kule mahati jāyate
a nistared ekabhaktena vaiśākhaṃ yo jitendriyaḥ
c naro vā yadi vā nārī jñātīnāṃ śreṣṭhatāṃ vrajet
a jyeṣṭhāmūlaṃ tu yo māsam ekabhaktena saṃkṣapet
c aiśvaryam atulaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pumān strī vābhijāyate
a āṣāḍham ekabhaktena sthitvā māsam atandritaḥ
c bahudhānyo bahudhano bahuputraś ca jāyate
a śrāvaṇaṃ niyato māsam ekabhaktena yaḥ kṣapet
b rūpadraviṇasaṃpannaḥ sukhī bhavati nityaśaḥ
c yatra tatrābhiṣekeṇa yujyate jñātivardhanaḥ
d dhanavān kīrtimāṃś caiva kule mahati jāyate
a prauṣṭhapadaṃ tu yo māsam ekāhāro bhaven naraḥ
c dhanāḍhyaṃ sphītam acalam aiśvaryaṃ pratipadyate
a tathaivāśvayujaṃ māsam ekabhaktena yaḥ kṣapet
c prajāvān vāhanāḍhyaś ca bahuputraś ca jāyate
a kārttikaṃ tu naro māsaṃ yaḥ kuryād ekabhojanam
c śūraś ca bahubhāryaś ca kīrtimāṃś caiva jāyate
a iti māsā naravyāghra kṣapatāṃ parikīrtitāḥ
c tithīnāṃ niyamā ye tu śṛṇu tān api pārthiva
a pakṣe pakṣe gate yas tu bhaktam aśnāti bhārata
c gavāḍhyo bahuputraś ca dīrghāyuś ca sa jāyate
a māsi māsi trirātrāṇi kṛtvā varṣāṇi dvādaśa
c gaṇādhipatyaṃ prāpnoti niḥsapatnam anāvilam
a ete tu niyamāḥ sarve kartavyāḥ śarado daśa
c dve cānye bharataśreṣṭha pravṛttim anuvartatā
a yas tu prātas tathā sāyaṃ bhuñjāno nāntarā pibet
c ahiṃsānirato nityaṃ juhvāno jātavedasam
a ṣaḍbhiḥ sa varṣair nṛpate sidhyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
c agniṣṭomasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ
a adhivāse so 'psarasāṃ nṛtyagītavinādite
b ramate strīsahasrāḍhye sukṛtī virajā naraḥ
c taptakāñcanavarṇābhaṃ vimānam adhirohati
a pūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu brahmaloke mahīyate
c tatkṣayād iha cāgamya māhātmyaṃ pratipadyate
a yas tu saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇam ekāhāro bhaven naraḥ
c atirātrasya yajñasya sa phalaṃ samupāśnute
a daśavarṣasahasrāṇi svarge ca sa mahīyate
c tatkṣayād iha cāgamya māhātmyaṃ pratipadyate
a yas tu saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇaṃ caturthaṃ bhaktam aśnute
c ahiṃsānirato nityaṃ satyavāṅ niyatendriyaḥ
a vājapeyasya yajñasya phalaṃ vai samupāśnute
c triṃśadvarṣasahasrāṇi svarge ca sa mahīyate
a ṣaṣṭhe kāle tu kaunteya naraḥ saṃvatsaraṃ kṣapet
c aśvamedhasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ
a cakravākaprayuktena vimānena sa gacchati
c catvāriṃśat sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ divi modate
a aṣṭamena tu bhaktena jīvan saṃvatsaraṃ nṛpa
c gavāmayasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ
a haṃsasārasayuktena vimānena sa gacchati
c pañcāśataṃ sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ divi modate
a pakṣe pakṣe gate rājan yo 'śnīyād varṣam eva tu
c ṣaṇmāsānaśanaṃ tasya bhagavān aṅgirābravīt
e ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣasahasrāṇi divam āvasate ca saḥ
a vīṇānāṃ vallakīnāṃ ca veṇūnāṃ ca viśāṃ pate
c sughoṣair madhuraiḥ śabdaiḥ suptaḥ sa pratibodhyate
a saṃvatsaram ihaikaṃ tu māsi māsi pibet payaḥ
c phalaṃ viśvajitas tāta prāpnoti sa naro nṛpa
a siṃhavyāghraprayuktena vimānena sa gacchati
c saptatiṃ ca sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ divi modate
a māsād ūrdhvaṃ naravyāghra nopavāso vidhīyate
c vidhiṃ tv anaśanasyāhuḥ pārtha dharmavido janāḥ
a anārto vyādhirahito gacched anaśanaṃ tu yaḥ
c pade pade yajñaphalaṃ sa prāpnoti na saṃśayaḥ
a divaṃ haṃsaprayuktena vimānena sa gacchati
c śataṃ cāpsarasaḥ kanyā ramayanty api taṃ naram
a ārto vā vyādhito vāpi gacched anaśanaṃ tu yaḥ
c śataṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ modate divi sa prabho
e kāñcīnūpuraśabdena suptaś caiva prabodhyate
a sahasrahaṃsasaṃyukte vimāne somavarcasi
c sa gatvā strīśatākīrṇe ramate bharatarṣabha
a kṣīṇasyāpyāyanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kṣatasya kṣatarohaṇam
c vyādhitasyauṣadhagrāmaḥ kruddhasya ca prasādanam
a duḥkhitasyārthamānābhyāṃ dravyāṇāṃ pratipādanam
c na caite svargakāmasya rocante sukhamedhasaḥ
d na caitad rocate teṣāṃ ye dhanaiḥ sukhamedhinaḥ
a ataḥ sa kāmasaṃyukto vimāne hemasaṃnibhe
c ramate strīśatākīrṇe puruṣo 'laṃkṛtaḥ śubhe
a svasthaḥ saphalasaṃkalpaḥ sukhī vigatakalmaṣaḥ
c anaśnan deham utsṛjya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ
a bālasūryapratīkāśe vimāne hemavarcasi
c vaiḍūryamuktākhacite vīṇāmurajanādite
a patākādīpikākīrṇe divyaghaṇṭāninādite
c strīsahasrānucarite sa naraḥ sukham edhate
a yāvanti romakūpāṇi tasya gātreṣu pāṇḍava
c tāvanty eva sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ divi modate
a nāsti vedāt paraṃ śāstraṃ nāsti mātṛsamo guruḥ
c na dharmāt paramo lābhas tapo nānaśanāt param
a brāhmaṇebhyaḥ paraṃ nāsti pāvanaṃ divi ceha ca
c upavāsais tathā tulyaṃ tapaḥkarma na vidyate
a upoṣya vidhivad devās tridivaṃ pratipedire
c ṛṣayaś ca parāṃ siddhim upavāsair avāpnuvan
a divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ hi viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā
c kṣāntam ekena bhaktena tena vipratvam āgataḥ
a cyavano jamadagniś ca vasiṣṭho gautamo bhṛguḥ
c sarva eva divaṃ prāptāḥ kṣamāvanto maharṣayaḥ
a idam aṅgirasā pūrvaṃ maharṣibhyaḥ pradarśitam
c yaḥ pradarśayate nityaṃ na sa duḥkham avāpnute
a imaṃ tu kaunteya yathākramaṃ vidhiṃ
pravartitaṃ hy aṅgirasā maharṣiṇā
c paṭheta yo vai śṛṇuyāc ca nityadā
na vidyate tasya narasya kilbiṣam
a vimucyate cāpi sa sarvasaṃkarair
na cāsya doṣair abhibhūyate manaḥ
c viyonijānāṃ ca vijānate rutaṃ
dhruvāṃ ca kīrtiṃ labhate narottamaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a pitāmahena vidhivad yajñāḥ proktā mahātmanā
c guṇāś caiṣāṃ yathātattvaṃ pretya ceha ca sarvaśaḥ
a na te śakyā daridreṇa yajñāḥ prāptuṃ pitāmaha
c bahūpakaraṇā yajñā nānāsaṃbhāravistarāḥ
a pārthivai rājaputrair vā śakyāḥ prāptuṃ pitāmaha
c nārthanyūnair avaguṇair ekātmabhir asaṃhataiḥ
a yo daridrair api vidhiḥ śakyaḥ prāptuṃ sadā bhavet
c tulyo yajñaphalair etais tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a idam aṅgirasā proktam upavāsaphalātmakam
c vidhiṃ yajñaphalais tulyaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
a yas tu kalyaṃ tathā sāyaṃ bhuñjāno nāntarā pibet
c ahiṃsānirato nityaṃ juhvāno jātavedasam
a ṣaḍbhir eva tu varṣaiḥ sa sidhyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
c taptakāñcanavarṇaṃ ca vimānaṃ labhate naraḥ
a devastrīṇām adhīvāse nṛtyagītaninādite
c prājāpatye vaset padmaṃ varṣāṇām agnisaṃnibhe
a trīṇi varṣāṇi yaḥ prāśet satataṃ tv ekabhojanam
c dharmapatnīrato nityam agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labhet
a dvitīye divase yas tu prāśnīyād ekabhojanam
c sadā dvādaśamāsāṃs tu juhvāno jātavedasam
e yajñaṃ bahusuvarṇaṃ vā vāsavapriyam āharet
a satyavāg dānaśīlaś ca brahmaṇyaś cānasūyakaḥ
c kṣānto dānto jitakrodhaḥ sa gacchati parāṃ gatim
a pāṇḍurābhrapratīkāśe vimāne haṃsalakṣaṇe
c dve samāpte tataḥ padme so 'psarobhir vaset saha
d agnikāryaparo nityaṃ nityaṃ kalyaprabodhanaḥ
d agniṣṭomasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ
d haṃsasārasayuktaṃ ca vimānaṃ labhate naraḥ
d indraloke ca vasate varastrībhiḥ samāvṛtaḥ
a tṛtīye divase yas tu prāśnīyād ekabhojanam
c sadā dvādaśamāsāṃs tu juhvāno jātavedasam
a atirātrasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoty anuttamam
c mayūrahaṃsasaṃyuktaṃ vimānaṃ labhate naraḥ
a saptarṣīṇāṃ sadā loke so 'psarobhir vaset saha
c nivartanaṃ ca tatrāsya trīṇi padmāni vai viduḥ
a divase yaś caturthe tu prāśnīyād ekabhojanam
c sadā dvādaśamāsān vai juhvāno jātavedasam
a vājapeyasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoty anuttamam
c indrakanyābhirūḍhaṃ ca vimānaṃ labhate naraḥ
a sāgarasya ca paryante vāsavaṃ lokam āvaset
c devarājasya ca krīḍāṃ nityakālam avekṣate
a divase pañcame yas tu prāśnīyād ekabhojanam
c sadā dvādaśamāsāṃs tu juhvāno jātavedasam
a alubdhaḥ satyavādī ca brahmaṇyaś cāvihiṃsakaḥ
c anasūyur apāpastho dvādaśāhaphalaṃ labhet
a jāmbūnadamayaṃ divyaṃ vimānaṃ haṃsalakṣaṇam
b atirātraphalaṃ prāpya apsarobhiḥ pramodate
c sūryamālāsamābhāsam ārohet pāṇḍuraṃ gṛham
a āvartanāni catvāri tathā padmāni dvādaśa
c śarāgniparimāṇaṃ ca tatrāsau vasate sukham
a divase yas tu ṣaṣṭhe vai muniḥ prāśeta bhojanam
c sadā dvādaśamāsān vai juhvāno jātavedasam
a sadā triṣavaṇasnāyī brahmacāry anasūyakaḥ
c gavāmayasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoty anuttamam
a agnijvālāsamābhāsaṃ haṃsabarhiṇasevitam
c śātakumbhamayaṃ yuktaṃ sādhayed yānam uttamam
a tathaivāpsarasām aṅke prasuptaḥ pratibudhyate
c nūpurāṇāṃ ninādena mekhalānāṃ ca nisvanaiḥ
a koṭīsahasraṃ varṣāṇāṃ trīṇi koṭiśatāni ca
c padmāny aṣṭādaśa tathā patāke dve tathaiva ca
a ayutāni ca pañcāśad ṛkṣacarmaśatasya ca
c lomnāṃ pramāṇena samaṃ brahmaloke mahīyate
a divase saptame yas tu prāśnīyād ekabhojanam
c sadā dvādaśamāsān vai juhvāno jātavedasam
a sarasvatīṃ gopayāno brahmacaryaṃ samācaran
c sumanovarṇakaṃ caiva madhumāṃsaṃ ca varjayet
a puruṣo marutāṃ lokam indralokaṃ ca gacchati
c tatra tatra ca siddhārtho devakanyābhir uhyate
a phalaṃ bahusuvarṇasya yajñasya labhate naraḥ
c saṃkhyām atiguṇāṃ cāpi teṣu lokeṣu modate
a yas tu saṃvatsaraṃ kṣānto bhuṅkte 'hany aṣṭame naraḥ
c devakāryaparo nityaṃ juhvāno jātavedasam
a pauṇḍarīkasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoty anuttamam
c padmavarṇanibhaṃ caiva vimānam adhirohati
a kṛṣṇāḥ kanakagauryaś ca nāryaḥ śyāmās tathāparāḥ
c vayorūpavilāsinyo labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ
a yas tu saṃvatsaraṃ bhuṅkte navame navame 'hani
c sadā dvādaśamāsān vai juhvāno jātavedasam
a aśvamedhasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ
c puṇḍarīkaprakāśaṃ ca vimānaṃ labhate naraḥ
a dīptasūryāgnitejobhir divyamālābhir eva ca
c nīyate rudrakanyābhiḥ so 'ntarikṣaṃ sanātanam
a aṣṭādaśasahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ kalpam eva ca
c koṭīśatasahasraṃ ca teṣu lokeṣu modate
a yas tu saṃvatsaraṃ bhuṅkte daśāhe vai gate gate
c sadā dvādaśamāsān vai juhvāno jātavedasam
a brahmakanyāniveśe ca sarvabhūtamanohare
c aśvamedhasahasrasya phalaṃ prāpnoty anuttamam
a rūpavatyaś ca taṃ kanyā ramayanti sadā naram
c nīlotpalanibhair varṇai raktotpalanibhais tathā
a vimānaṃ maṇḍalāvartam āvartagahanāvṛtam
c sāgarormipratīkāśaṃ sādhayed yānam uttamam
a vicitramaṇimālābhir nāditaṃ śaṅkhapuṣkaraiḥ
c sphāṭikair vajrasāraiś ca stambhaiḥ sukṛtavedikam
e ārohati mahad yānaṃ haṃsasārasavāhanam
a ekādaśe tu divase yaḥ prāpte prāśate haviḥ
c sadā dvādaśamāsān vai juhvāno jātavedasam
a parastriyo nābhilaṣed vācātha manasāpi vā
c anṛtaṃ ca na bhāṣeta mātāpitroḥ kṛte 'pi vā
a abhigacchen mahādevaṃ vimānasthaṃ mahābalam
c svayaṃbhuvaṃ ca paśyeta vimānaṃ samupasthitam
a kumāryaḥ kāñcanābhāsā rūpavatyo nayanti tam
c rudrāṇāṃ tam adhīvāsaṃ divi divyaṃ manoharam
a varṣāṇy aparimeyāni yugāntam api cāvaset
c koṭīśatasahasraṃ ca daśa koṭiśatāni ca
a rudraṃ nityaṃ praṇamate devadānavasaṃmatam
c sa tasmai darśanaṃ prāpto divase divase bhavet
a divase dvādaśe yas tu prāpte vai prāśate haviḥ
c sadā dvādaśamāsān vai sarvamedhaphalaṃ labhet
c juhvāno jātavedasam
c niyamena samāyuktaḥ
a ādityair dvādaśais tasya vimānaṃ saṃvidhīyate
c maṇimuktāpravālaiś ca mahārhair upaśobhitam
a haṃsamālāparikṣiptaṃ nāgavīthīsamākulam
c mayūraiś cakravākaiś ca kūjadbhir upaśobhitam
a aṭṭair mahadbhiḥ saṃyuktaṃ brahmaloke pratiṣṭhitam
c nityam āvasate rājan naranārīsamāvṛtam
e ṛṣir evaṃ mahābhāgas tv aṅgirāḥ prāha dharmavit
f vimānam adhiruhyāśu brahmaloke mahīyate
a trayodaśe tu divase yaḥ prāpte prāśate haviḥ
c sadā dvādaśa māsān vai devasatraphalaṃ labhet
a raktapadmodayaṃ nāma vimānaṃ sādhayen naraḥ
b tatra gatvā samutthito devakanyābhir āvṛtaḥ
c jātarūpaprayuktaṃ ca ratnasaṃcayabhūṣitam
a devakanyābhir ākīrṇaṃ divyābharaṇabhūṣitam
c puṇyagandhodayaṃ divyaṃ vāyavyair upaśobhitam
a tatra śaṅkupatākaṃ ca yugāntaṃ kalpam eva ca
c ayutāyutaṃ tathā padmaṃ samudraṃ ca tathā vaset
a gītagandharvaghoṣaiś ca bherīpaṇavanisvanaiḥ
c sadā pramuditas tābhir devakanyābhir īḍyate
a caturdaśe tu divase yaḥ pūrṇe prāśate haviḥ
c sadā dvādaśa māsān vai mahāmedhaphalaṃ labhet
a anirdeśyavayorūpā devakanyāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ
c mṛṣṭataptāṅgadadharā vimānair anuyānti tam
a kalahaṃsavinirghoṣair nūpurāṇāṃ ca nisvanaiḥ
c kāñcīnāṃ ca samutkarṣais tatra tatra vibodhyate
a devakanyānivāse ca tasmin vasati mānavaḥ
c jāhnavīvālukākīrṇe pūrṇaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ naraḥ
a yas tu pakṣe gate bhuṅkte ekabhaktaṃ jitendriyaḥ
c sadā dādaśa māsāṃs tu juhvāno jātavedasam
e rājasūyasahasrasya phalaṃ prāpnoty anuttamam
a yānam ārohate nityaṃ haṃsabarhiṇasevitam
c maṇimaṇḍalakaiś citraṃ jātarūpasamāvṛtam
a divyābharaṇaśobhābhir varastrībhir alaṃkṛtam
c ekastambhaṃ caturdvāraṃ saptabhaumaṃ sumaṅgalam
e vaijayantīsahasraiś ca śobhitaṃ gītanisvanaiḥ
a divyaṃ divyaguṇopetaṃ vimānam adhirohati
c maṇimuktāpravālaiś ca bhūṣitaṃ vaidyutaprabham
e vased yugasahasraṃ ca khaḍgakuñjaravāhanaḥ
a ṣoḍaśe divase yas tu saṃprāpte prāśate haviḥ
c sadā dvādaśa māsān vai somayajñaphalaṃ labhet
a somakanyānivāseṣu so 'dhyāvasati nityadā
c saumyagandhānuliptaś ca kāmacāragatir bhavet
a sudarśanābhir nārībhir madhurābhis tathaiva ca
c arcyate vai vimānasthaḥ kāmabhogaiś ca sevyate
a phalaṃ padmaśataprakhyaṃ mahākalpaṃ daśādhikam
c āvartanāni catvāri sāgare yāty asau naraḥ
a divase saptadaśame yaḥ prāpte prāśate haviḥ
c sadā dvādaśa māsān vai juhvāno jātavedasam
a sthānaṃ vāruṇam aindraṃ ca raudraṃ caivādhigacchati
c mārutauśanase caiva brahmalokaṃ ca gacchati
a tatra daivatakanyābhir āsanenopacaryate
c bhūr bhuvaṃ cāpi devarṣiṃ viśvarūpam avekṣate
a tatra devādhidevasya kumāryo ramayanti tam
c dvātriṃśad rūpadhāriṇyo madhurāḥ samalaṃkṛtāḥ
a candrādityāv ubhau yāvad gagane carataḥ prabho
c tāvac caraty asau vīraḥ sudhāmṛtarasāśanaḥ
a aṣṭādaśe tu divase prāśnīyād ekabhojanam
c sadā dvādaśa māsān vai sapta lokān sa paśyati
a rathaiḥ sanandighoṣaiś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ so 'nugamyate
c devakanyādhirūḍhais tu bhrājamānaiḥ svalaṃkṛtaiḥ
a vyāghrasiṃhaprayuktaṃ ca meghasvananināditam
c vimānam uttamaṃ divyaṃ susukhī hy adhirohati
a tatra kalpasahasraṃ sa kāntābhiḥ saha modate
c sudhārasaṃ ca bhuñjīta amṛtopamam uttamam
a ekonaviṃśe divase yo bhuṅkte ekabhojanam
c sadā dvādaśa māsān vai sapta lokān sa paśyati
a uttamaṃ labhate sthānam apsarogaṇasevitam
c gandharvair upagītaṃ ca vimānaṃ sūryavarcasam
a tatrāmaravarastrībhir modate vigatajvaraḥ
c divyāmbaradharaḥ śrīmān ayutānāṃ śataṃ samāḥ
a pūrṇe 'tha divase viṃśe yo bhuṅkte hy ekabhojanam
c sadā dvādaśa māsāṃs tu satyavādī dhṛtavrataḥ
a amāṃsāśī brahmacārī sarvabhūtahite rataḥ
c sa lokān vipulān divyān ādityānām upāśnute
a gandharvair apsarobhiś ca divyamālyānulepanaiḥ
c vimānaiḥ kāñcanair divyaiḥ pṛṣṭhataś cānugamyate
a ekaviṃśe tu divase yo bhuṅkte hy ekabhojanam
c sadā dvādaśa māsān vai juhvāno jātavedasam
a lokam auśanasaṃ divyaṃ śakralokaṃ ca gacchati
c aśvinor marutāṃ caiva sukheṣv abhirataḥ sadā
a anabhijñaś ca duḥkhānāṃ vimānavaram āsthitaḥ
c sevyamāno varastrībhiḥ krīḍaty amaravat prabhuḥ
a dvāviṃśe divase prāpte yo bhuṅkte hy ekabhojanam
c sadā dvādaśa māsān vai juhvāno jātavedasam
a dhṛtimān ahiṃsānirataḥ satyavāg anasūyakaḥ
c lokān vasūnām āpnoti divākarasamaprabhaḥ
a kāmacārī sudhāhāro vimānavaram āsthitaḥ
c ramate devakanyābhir divyābharaṇabhūṣitaḥ
a trayoviṃśe tu divase prāśed yas tv ekabhojanam
c sadā dvādaśa māsāṃs tu mitāhāro jitendriyaḥ
a vāyor uśanasaś caiva rudralokaṃ ca gacchati
c kāmacārī kāmagamaḥ pūjyamāno 'psarogaṇaiḥ
a anekaguṇaparyantaṃ vimānavaram āsthitaḥ
c ramate devakanyābhir divyābharaṇabhūṣitaḥ
a caturviṃśe tu divase yaḥ prāśed ekabhojanam
c sadā dvādaśa māsān vai juhvāno jātavedasam
a ādityānām adhīvāse modamāno vasec ciram
c divyamālyāmbaradharo divyagandhānulepanaḥ
a vimāne kāñcane divye haṃsayukte manorame
c ramate devakanyānāṃ sahasrair ayutais tathā
a pañcaviṃśe tu divase yaḥ prāśed ekabhojanam
c sadā dvādaśa māsāṃs tu puṣkalaṃ yānam āruhet
a siṃhavyāghraprayuktaiś ca meghasvananināditaiḥ
c rathaiḥ sanandighoṣaiś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ so 'nugamyate
a devakanyāsamārūḍhai rājatair vimalaiḥ śubhaiḥ
c vimānam uttamaṃ divyam āsthāya sumanoharam
a tatra kalpasahasraṃ vai vasate strīśatāvṛte
c sudhārasaṃ copajīvann amṛtopamam uttamam
a ṣaḍviṃśe divase yas tu prāśnīyād ekabhojanam
c sadā dvādaśa māsāṃs tu niyato niyatāśanaḥ
a jitendriyo vītarāgo juhvāno jātavedasam
c sa prāpnoti mahābhāgaḥ pūjyamāno 'psarogaṇaiḥ
a saptānāṃ marutāṃ lokān vasūnāṃ cāpi so 'śnute
c vimāne sphāṭike divye sarvaratnair alaṃkṛte
a gandharvair apsarobhiś ca pūjyamānaḥ pramodate
c dve yugānāṃ sahasre tu divye divyena tejasā
a saptaviṃśe tu divase yaḥ prāśed ekabhojanam
c sadā dvādaśa māsāṃs tu juhvāno jātavedasam
a phalaṃ prāpnoti vipulaṃ devaloke ca pūjyate
c amṛtāśī vasaṃs tatra sa vitṛptaḥ pramodate
a devarṣicaritaṃ rājan rājarṣibhir adhiṣṭhitam
c adhyāvasati divyātmā vimānavaram āsthitaḥ
a strībhir manobhirāmābhī ramamāṇo madotkaṭaḥ
c yugakalpasahasrāṇi trīṇy āvasati vai sukham
a yo 'ṣṭāviṃśe tu divase prāśnīyād ekabhojanam
c sadā dvādaśa māsāṃs tu jitātmā vijitendriyaḥ
a phalaṃ devarṣicaritaṃ vipulaṃ samupāśnute
c bhogavāṃs tejasā bhāti sahasrāṃśur ivāmalaḥ
a sukumāryaś ca nāryas taṃ ramamāṇāḥ suvarcasaḥ
c pīnastanorujaghanā divyābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ
a ramayanti manaḥ kāntā vimāne sūryasaṃnibhe
c sarvakāmagame divye kalpāyutaśataṃ samāḥ
a ekonatriṃśe divase yaḥ prāśed ekabhojanam
c sadā dvādaśa māsān vai satyavrataparāyaṇaḥ
a tasya lokāḥ śubhā divyā devarājarṣipūjitāḥ
c vimānaṃ candraśubhrābhaṃ divyaṃ samadhigacchati
a jātarūpamayaṃ yuktaṃ sarvaratnavibhūṣitam
c apsarogaṇasaṃpūrṇaṃ gandharvair abhināditam
a tatra cainaṃ śubhā nāryo divyābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ
c manobhirāmā madhurā ramayanti madotkaṭāḥ
a bhogavāṃs tejasā yukto vaiśvānarasamaprabhaḥ
c divyo divyena vapuṣā bhrājamāna ivāmaraḥ
a vasūnāṃ marutāṃ caiva sādhyānām aśvinos tathā
c rudrāṇāṃ ca tathā lokān brahmalokaṃ ca gacchati
a yas tu māse gate bhuṅkte ekabhaktaṃ śamātmakaḥ
c sadā dvādaśa māsān vai brahmalokam avāpnuyāt
a sudhārasakṛtāhāraḥ śrīmān sarvamanoharaḥ
c tejasā vapuṣā lakṣmyā bhrājate raśmivān iva
a divyamālyāmbaradharo divyagandhānulepanaḥ
c sukheṣv abhirato yogī duḥkhānām avijānakaḥ
a svayaṃprabhābhir nārībhir vimānastho mahīyate
c rudradevarṣikanyābhiḥ satataṃ cābhipūjyate
a nānāvidhasurūpābhir nānārāgābhir eva ca
c nānāmadhurabhāṣābhir nānāratibhir eva ca
d nānāvidhasugaṃdhābhir nānāveṣābhir eva ca
a vimāne nagarākāre sūryavat sūryasaṃnibhe
c pṛṣṭhataḥ somasaṃkāśe udak caivābhrasaṃnibhe
a dakṣiṇāyāṃ tu raktābhe adhastān nīlamaṇḍale
c ūrdhvaṃ citrābhisaṃkāśe naiko vasati pūjitaḥ
a yāvad varṣasahasraṃ tu jambūdvīpe pravarṣati
b tāvad brahmādikā lokā varṣadhārāpramāṇataḥ
c tāvat saṃvatsarāḥ proktā brahmalokasya dhīmataḥ
a vipruṣaś caiva yāvantyo nipatanti nabhastalāt
c varṣāsu varṣatas tāvan nivasaty amaraprabhaḥ
a māsopavāsī varṣais tu daśabhiḥ svargam uttamam
c maharṣitvam athāsādya saśarīragatir bhavet
a munir dānto jitakrodho jitaśiśnodaraḥ sadā
c juhvann agnīṃś ca niyataḥ saṃdhyopāsanasevitā
a bahubhir niyamair evaṃ māsān aśnāti yo naraḥ
c abhrāvakāśaśīlaś ca tasya vāso nirucyate
a divaṃ gatvā śarīreṇa svena rājan yathāmaraḥ
c svargaṃ puṇyaṃ yathākāmam upabhuṅkte yathāvidhi
a eṣa te bharataśreṣṭha yajñānāṃ vidhir uttamaḥ
c vyākhyāto hy ānupūrvyeṇa upavāsaphalātmakaḥ
a daridrair manujaiḥ pārtha prāpyaṃ yajñaphalaṃ yathā
c upavāsam imaṃ kṛtvā gacchec ca paramāṃ gatim
d vaiṣṇavīṃ vātha raudrīṃ vā pañcamīṃ brahmacāriṇaḥ
d saṃvatsaravrataṃ kṛtvā kramante lokam uttamam
e devadvijātipūjāyāṃ rato bharatasattama
a upavāsavidhis tv eṣa vistareṇa prakīrtitaḥ
c niyateṣv apramatteṣu śaucavatsu mahātmasu
a dambhadrohanivṛtteṣu kṛtabuddhiṣu bhārata
c acaleṣv aprakampeṣu mā te bhūd atra saṃśayaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d pitāmahena kathitā dānadharmāśritāḥ kathāḥ
d mayā śrutā ṛṣīṇāṃ tu saṃnidhau keśavasya ca
d punaḥ kautūhalam abhūt tām evādhyātmikīṃ prati
d kathāṃ kathaya rājendra tvad anyaḥ ka udāharet
d eṣa yādavadāyādas tathānujñātum arhati
d jñāte tu yasmiñ jñātavyaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati bhārata
d paścāc chroṣyāmahe rājñāṃ śrāvyān dharmān pitāmaha
d kautūhalam ṛṣīṇāṃ tu cchettum arhasi sāṃpratam
d bhīṣmaḥ
d ata ūrdhvaṃ mahārāja sāṃkhyayogobhayaśāstrādhigatayāthātmyadarśanasaṃpannayor ācāryayoḥ saṃvādam anuvyākhyāsyāmaḥ 
tad yathābhagavantaṃ sanatkumāram āsīnam aṅguṣṭhaparvamātraṃ mahati vimānavare 
yojanasahasramaṇḍale taruṇabhāskarapratīkāśe śayanīye mahati baddhāsanam anudhyāyantam
amṛtam anāvartakaram amūrtam akṣayajam athopadiṣṭam upasasarpa bhagavantam ācāryaṃ
bhagavān ācāryo rudras taṃ provāca  svāgataṃ maheśvara brahmasuta 
etad āsanam āstāṃ bhagavān 
ity ukte cāsīno bhagavān anantarūpo rudras taṃ provāca  bhagavān api dhyānam āvartayati 
ity ukte cāha bhagavān sanatkumāras tatheti 
d tathety uktaś ca provāca bhagavāñ śaṃkaras tadā
d parāvarajñaṃ sarvasya trailokyasya mahāmunim
d kiṃ vā dhyānena draṣṭavyaṃ yad bhavān anupaśyati
d yac ca dhyātvā na śocanti yatayas tattvadarśinaḥ
d kathaya tvam imaṃ devaṃ dehināṃ yatisattama
d yac ca tatpuruṣaṃ śuddham ity uktaṃ yogasāṃkhyayoḥ
d kim adhyātmādhibhūtaṃ ca tathā cāpy adhidaivatam
d kālasaṃkhyā ca kā deva draṣṭavyā tasya brahmaṇaḥ
d saṃkhyā saṃkhyādanasyaiva yā proktā paramarṣibhiḥ
d śāstradṛṣṭena mārgeṇa yathāvad yatisattama
d yac ca tatpuruṣaṃ śuddhaṃ prabuddham ajaraṃ dhruvam
d budhyamānāprabuddhābhyāṃ vidyāvedyaṃ tathaiva ca
d vimokṣaṃ trividhaṃ caiva brūhi mokṣavidāṃ vara
d parisaṃkhyāṃ ca sāṃkhyānāṃ dhyānaṃ yogeṣu cārthavat
d ekatvadarśanaṃ caiva tathā nānātvadarśanam
d ariṣṭāni ca tattvena tathaivotkramaṇāni ca
d daivatāni ca sarvāṇi nikhilenānupūrvaśaḥ
d yāny āśritāni deheṣu dehināṃ yatisattama
d sarvam etad yathātattvam ākhyāhi munisattama
d śreṣṭho bhavān hi sarveṣāṃ brahmajñānām anindita
d caturthas tvaṃ trayāṇāṃ tu ye gatāḥ paramāṃ gatim
d jñānena ca prākṛtena nirmukto mṛtyubandhanāt
d vayaṃ tu vaikṛtaṃ mārgam āśritā vai kṣaraṃ sadā
d param utsṛjya panthānam amṛtākṣaram eva tu
d nyūne pathi nimagnās tu aiśvarye 'ṣṭaguṇe tathā
d mahimānaṃ pragṛhyemaṃ vicarāmo yathāsukham
d na caitat sukham atyantaṃ nyūnam etad anantaram
d mūrtimat param etat syāt tv idam evaṃ susattama
d punaḥ punaś ca patanaṃ mūrtimaty upadiśyate
d na punar mṛtyur ity anyaṃ nirmuktānāṃ tu mūrtitaḥ
d mṛtyudoṣās tv anantā vai utpadyante kṛtātmanām
d martyeṣu nākapṛṣṭheṣu nirayeṣu mahāmune
d tatra majjanti puruṣāḥ sukhaduḥkhena ceṣṭitāḥ
d sukhaduḥkhavyapetaṃ ca yad āhur amṛtaṃ padam
d tad ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi yathāvac chrutidarśanāt
d sanatkumāraḥ
d yad uktaṃ bhavatā vākyaṃ tattvasaṃjñeti dehinām
d caturviṃśatim evātra ke cid āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
d ke cid āhus trayoviṃśaṃ yathāśrutinidarśanāt
d vayaṃ tu pañcaviṃśaṃ vai tad adhiṣṭhānasaṃjñitam
d tattvaṃ samadhimanyāmaḥ sarvatantrapralāpanāt
d avyayaś caiva vai vyaktāv ubhāv api pinākadhṛk
d saha caiva vinā caiva tāv anyonyaṃ pratiṣṭhitau
d hiraṇmayīṃ praviśyaiṣa mūrtiṃ mūrtimatāṃ vara
d cakāra puruṣas tāta vikārapuruṣāv ubhau
d avyaktād eka evaiṣa mahān ātmā prasūyate
d ahaṃkāreṇa lokāṃś ca vyāpya cāhaṃkṛtena vai
d vinā sarvaṃ tad avyaktād abhimanyasva śūladhṛk
d bhūtasargam ahaṃkārāt tṛtīyaṃ viddhi vai kramāt
d ahaṃkārāc ca bhūteṣu caturthaṃ viddhi vaikṛtam
d ahaṃkārāc ca jātāni yugapad vibudheśvara
d saviśeṣāṇi bhūtāni pañca prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
d caturviṃśāt tu vai proktāt pañcaviṃśo 'dhitiṣṭhati
d ete sargā mayā proktāś catvāraḥ prākṛtās tv iha
d ahaṃkārāc ca jātāni yugapad vibudheśvara
d ahaṃkārāc ca bhūteṣu vividhārthaṃ vyajāyata
d indriyair yugapat sarvaiḥ so 'nityaś ca samīkṣyate
d maruttvaṃ sattvasargaś ca tuṣṭiḥ siddhis tathaiva ca
d vaikṛtāni pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tāni mahāmate
d eṣā tattvacaturviṃśan mayā śāstrānumānataḥ
d varṇitā tava deveśa pañcaviṃśasamanvitā
d pañcamo 'nugrahaś caiva navaite prākṛtaiḥ saha
d aindre 'py aham athāpy anyan mamātmani ca bhāsvaraḥ
d yac ca dehamayaṃ kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
d sarvatraivābhimantavyaṃ tvayā tripurasūdana
d anyathā ye tu paśyanti te na paśyanti brahmaja
d etad avyaktaviṣayaṃ pañcaviṃśasamanvitam
d anena kāraṇenaiva tattvam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
d vikāramātram etat tu tattvam ācakṣate param
d nistattvaś caiṣa deveśa boddhavyaṃ tu na budhyate
d yadi budhyet paraṃ buddhaṃ budhyamānaḥ surarṣabha
d sanatkumāraḥ
d prabuddho hy abhimanyeta yo 'yaṃ nāham iti prabho
d tattvasaṃkhyā śrutā caiṣā yeṣāṃ brahmavidāṃ vara
d sargasaṃkhyā mayā proktā navānām anupūrvaśaḥ
d pravakṣyāmi tu te 'dhyātmam adhibhūtādhidaivatam
d naitad yuktair vedavidbhir gṛhasthair
d mānyair ebhis tapasā vābhipannaiḥ
d yatnena dṛṣṭaṃ paramātmatattvaṃ
d tattvena prāpyaṃ tu yathoktam etat
d paraṃ parebhyas tv amṛtārthatattvaṃ
d svabhāvasattvastham anīśam īśam
d kaivalyatāṃ prāpya mahāsurottama
d tavaitad ākhyāmi munīndra vṛttyā
d rahasyam evānyad avāpya divyaṃ
d pavitrapūtas tava mṛtyujālam
d pṛthvīm imāṃ yady api ratnapūrṇāṃ
d dadyān na deyaṃ tv aparīkṣitāya
d nāśraddadhānāya na cānyabuddher
d nājñānayuktāya na vismitāya
d svādhyāyayuktāya guṇānvitāya
d pradeyam etan niyatendriyāya
d saṃkṣepaṃ cāpy athaiteṣāṃ tattvānāṃ vṛṣabhadhvaja
d anulomānujātānāṃ pratilomaṃ pralīyatām
d pravakṣyāmi tam adhyātmaṃ sādhibhūtādhidaivatam
d yathāṃśujālam arkasya tathaitat pravadanti vai
d saṃkṣīṇe brahmadivase jagaj jaladhim āviśet
d pralīyate jale bhūmir jalam agnau pralīyate
d līyate 'gnis tathā vāyau vāyur ākāśa eva tu
d manasi pralīyate khaṃ tu mano 'haṃkāra eva ca
d ahaṃkāras tathā tasmin mahati pravilīyate
d mahān avyakta ity āhus tad ekatvaṃ pracakṣate
d avyaktasya mahādeva pralayaṃ viddhi brahmaṇi
d evam asyāsakṛt krīḍām āhus tattvavido janāḥ
d adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca tathaivāpy adhidaivatam
d yathāvad uditaṃ śāstraṃ yoge tu sumahātmabhiḥ
d tathaiva ceha sāṃkhye tu parisaṃkhyātmacintakaiḥ
d prapañcitārtham etāvan mahādeva mahātmabhiḥ
d brahmeti vidyād adhyātmaṃ puruṣaṃ cādhidaivatam
d prabhavaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ tatra karma ca
d adhyātmaṃ prāṇam ity āhuḥ kratum apy adhidaivatam
d rathaṃ ca yajñavāho 'tra karmāhaṃkāra eva ca
d adhyātmaṃ tu mano vidyāc candramāś cādhidaivatam
d daivaṃ ca prabhavaś caiva karma vyāhṛtayas tathā
d vidyāt tu śrotram adhyātmam ākāśam adhidaivatam
d sarvabhāvābhidhānārthaṃ śabdaḥ karma sadā smṛtam
d tvag adhyātmam atho vidyād vāyur atrādhidaivatam
d saṃnipātaya vijñānaṃ sarvakarma ca tatra ha
d adhyātmaṃ cakṣur ity āhur bhāskaro 'trādhidaivatam
d jñāpanaṃ sarvavarṇānāṃ rūpaṃ karma sadā smṛtam
d jihveti vidyād adhyātmam āpaś cātrādhidaivatam
d pāyur adhyātmam ity āhur yathāvad yatisattamāḥ
d visargam adhibhūtaṃ ca mitraṃ cāpy adhidaivatam
d upastho 'dhyātmam ity āhur devadeva pinākadhṛk
d anubhāvo 'dhibhūtaṃ tu daivataṃ ca prajāpatiḥ
d pādāv adhyātmam ity āhus triśūlāṅka manīṣiṇaḥ
d gantavyam adhibhūtaṃ tu viṣṇus tatrādhidaivatam
d vāg adhyātmaṃ tathaivāhuḥ pinākiṃs tattvadarśinaḥ
d vaktavyam adhibhūtaṃ tu vahnis tatrādhidaivatam
d etad adhyātmam atulaṃ sādhibhūtādhidaivatam
d mayā tu varṇitaṃ samyag dehinām amararṣabha
d etat kīṭapataṃge ca śvapāke śuni hastini
d putrikādaṃśamaśake brāhmaṇe gavi pārthive
d sarvam eva hi draṣṭavyam anyathā mā vicintaya
d ato 'nyathā ye paśyanti na samyak teṣu darśanam
d devadānavagandharvayakṣarākṣasakiṃnarāḥ
d yan na jānanti ko hy eṣa kuto vā bhagavān iti
d om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma yat tat sadasataḥ param
d anādimadhyaparyantaṃ kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvam
d yogeśvaraṃ padmanābhaṃ viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuṃ jagatpatim
d anādinidhanaṃ devaṃ devadevaṃ sanātanam
d aprameyam avijñeyaṃ hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum
d kṛtāñjaliḥ śucir bhūtvā praṇamya prayato 'rcayet
d anādyantaṃ paraṃ brahma na devā ṛṣayo viduḥ
d eko 'yaṃ veda bhagavāṃs trātā nārāyaṇo hariḥ
d nārāyaṇād ṛṣigaṇās tataḥ siddhā mahoragāḥ
d devā devarṣayaś caiva yaṃ vidur duḥkhabheṣajam
d yam āhur vijitakleśaṃ yasmiṃś ca vihitāḥ prajāḥ
d yasmiṃl lokāḥ sphurantīme jāle śakunayo yathā
d saptarṣayo manaḥ sapta sāṃkhyās tu munidarśanāt
d saptarṣayaś cendriyāṇi pañca buddhīndriyāṇi ca
d śrotrayoś ca diśaḥ prāhur manasi tv atha candramāḥ
d manaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ buddhiḥ saptamī hy ātmani sthāpitāni
śarīreṣu nātmani 
d tasya hi kāraṇāni bhavanti 
sarvāṇy api sarvakarmasu vā viṣayeṣu vā yuñjanti yathātmani svāni karmāṇi pravṛttāni 
saptasv api viṣayāṇāṃ vyāpakāni 
 d tāny eva svapato bhūtagrāmasyājam ātmānaṃ devalokasthānasaṃmitaṃ dehāntaragāminaṃ mumukṣuṃ vānupraviśanti sūkṣmāṇi pralīyante 
d mokṣakāle tam ekaṃ na kaś cid vetti svāparam 
d evaṃ praviṣṭeṣu bhūteṣu ko jāgartīty ucyate 
nidrāprasupteṣu vātra jāgrat svapnaśīlo 'tra sadane ca devadyotano bhagavāṃś cātra kṣetrajño buddhir vā 
sa hi suptasyāpi svapnadarśanāni paśyati 
d apratibuddheṣu lokeṣu sa eva pratibudhyate 
d sanatkumāraḥ
d sa eṣa prājñaḥ 
atha taijasaḥ kāyāgniḥ 
sa hi suptasyātmā vā 
aviduṣo vāpratibudhyamānasyānnaṃ pacatīty ante 'vatiṣṭhate 
etad ātmānam adhikṛtyānujñātam iti 
d prabhavaś cāpyayas tāta varṇitas te 'nupūrvaśaḥ
d tathādhyātmādhibhūtaṃ ca tathaivātrādhidaivatam
d nikhilena tu vakṣyāmi daivatānīha dehinām
d yāny āśritāni deheṣu yāni pṛcchasi śaṃkara
d vācy agnis tv atha jihvāyāṃ somaḥ prāṇe tu mārutaḥ
d rūpe cāpy atha nakṣatraṃ jihvāyāṃ cāpa eva tu
d nābhyāṃ samudraś ca vibhur nakharoma tathaiva ca
d vanaspativanauṣadhyas tv aṅgeṣu marutas tathā
d saṃvatsarāḥ parvasu ca ākāśe daivamānuṣe
d udāne vidyud abhavad vyāne parjanya eva ca
d stanayor eva cākāśaṃ bale cendras tathābhavat
d matāv apy atha ceśānas tv apāne rudra eva ca
d gandharvāpsaraso vyāne satye mitraś ca śaṃkara
d prajñāyāṃ varuṇaś caiva cakṣuṣy āditya eva ca
d śarīre pṛthivī caiva pādayor viṣṇur eva ca
d pāyau mitras tathopasthe prajāpatir ariṃdama
d mūrdhni caiva diśaḥ prāhur buddhau brahmā pratiṣṭhitaḥ
d budhyamāno ''tmaniṣṭhaḥ syād adhiṣṭhātā tu śaṃkara
d abuddhaś cābhavat tasmād budhyamānān na saṃśayaḥ
d ābhyām anyaḥ paro buddho vedavādeṣu śaṃkara
d yadāśritāni deheṣu daivatāni pṛthak pṛthak
d yo 'gnaye yajate nityam ātmayājī samāhitaḥ
d ya evam anupaśyeta daivatāni samāhitaḥ
d so 'tra yogī bhavaty eva ya evam anupaśyati
d sa sarvayajñayājibhyo hy ātmayājī viśiṣyate
d mukhe juhoti yo nityaṃ kṛtsnaṃ viśvam idaṃ jagat
d so ''tmavit procyate tajjñair mahādeva mahātmabhiḥ
d sarvebhyaḥ paramebhyo vai daivatebhyo hy ātmayājinā
d gantavyaṃ param ākāṅkṣan param eva vicintayan
d yathā saṃkramate dehād dehī tripurasūdana
d tathāsya sthānam ākhyāsye pṛthaktveneha śaṃkara
d pādābhyāṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ sthānam āpnoti viniyojanāt
d pāyunā mitram āpnoti upasthena prajāpatim
d nābhyā ca vāruṇaṃ sthānaṃ stanābhyāṃ tu bhuvo labhet
d bāhubhyāṃ vāsavaṃ sthānaṃ śrotrābhyām āpnuyād diśaḥ
d ādityaṃ cakṣuṣā sthānaṃ mūrdhnā brahmaṇa eva ca
d atha mūrdhasu yaḥ prāṇān dhārayeta samāhitaḥ
d buddhyā mānam avāpnoti dravyāvasthaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
d avyaktāt paramaṃ śuddham aprameyam anāmayam
d tam āhuḥ paramaṃ nityaṃ yad yad āpnoti buddhimān
d budhyamānāprabuddhābhyāṃ sa buddha iti paṭhyate
d budhyamānam abuddhaś ca nityam evānupaśyati
d vikārapuruṣas tv eṣa budhyamāna iti smṛtaḥ
d pañcaviṃśatitattvaṃ tat procyate tatra saṃśayaḥ
d sa eṣa prakṛtisthatvāt tasthur ity upadiśyate
d mahān ātmā mahādeva mahān atrādhitiṣṭhati
d adhiṣṭhānād adhiṣṭhātā procyate śāstradarśanāt
d eṣa cetayate deva mohajālam abuddhimān
d avyaktasyaiva sādharmyam etad āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
d so 'haṃ so 'ham ato nityād ajñānād iti manyate
d yadi budhyati caivāyaṃ manyeyam iti bhāsvaraḥ
d na prabuddho na varteta pānīyaṃ matsyako yathā
d devatā nikhilenaitāḥ proktās tribhuvaneśvara
d yogakṛtyaṃ tu tāvan me tvaṃ nibodhānupūrvaśaḥ
d śūnyāgāreṣv araṇyeṣu sāgare vā guhāsu vā
d viṣṭambhayitvā trīn daṇḍān avāpto hy advayo bhavet
d prāṅmukhodaṅmukho vāpi tathā paścānmukho 'pi vā
d dakṣiṇāvadano vāpi baddhvā vidhivad āsanam
d svastikenopasaṃviṣṭaḥ kāyam unnāmya bhāsvaram
d yathopadiṣṭaṃ guruṇā tathā tad brahma dhārayet
d laghvāhāro yato dāntas trikālaparivarjakaḥ
d mūtrotsargapurīṣābhyām āhāre ca samāhitaḥ
d śeṣakālaṃ tu yuñjīta manasā susamāhitaḥ
d indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyo manasā vinivartayet
d manas tathaiva saṃgṛhya buddhyā buddhimatāṃ vara
d vidhāvamānaṃ dhairyeṇa visphurantam itas tataḥ
d nirudhya sarvasaṃkalpāṃs tato vai sthiratāṃ vrajet
d ekāgras tad vijānīyāt sarvaṃ guhyatamaṃ param
d nivātastha ivālolo yathā dīpo 'tidīpyate
d ūrdhvam eva na tiryak ca tathaiva bhrāmyate manaḥ
d hṛdisthas tiṣṭhate yo 'sau tathaivābhimukho yadā
d mano bhavati deveśa pāṣāṇam iva niścalam
d sa nirjane vinirghoṣe saghoṣe cāvasañ jane
d yukto yo na vikampeta yogī yogavidhiḥ śrutaḥ
d tataḥ paśyati tad brahma jvalad ātmani saṃsthitam
d vidyud ambudhare yadvat tadvad ekam anāśrayam
d tamasy agādhe tiṣṭhantaṃ nistamaskam acetanam
d cetayānam acetaṃ ca dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā
d aṅguṣṭhaparvamātraṃ tan naiḥśreyasam aninditam
d mahad bhūtam anantaṃ ca svatantraṃ vigatajvaram
d jyotiṣāṃ jyotiṣaṃ devaṃ viṣṇum atyantanirmalam
d nārāyaṇam aṇīyāṃsam īśvarāṇām adhīśvaram
d viśvataḥ paramaṃ nityaṃ viśvaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum
d avijñāya nimajjanti lokāḥ saṃsārasāgare
d yaṃ dṛṣṭvā yatayas tāta na śocanti gatajvarāḥ
d janmamṛtyubhayān muktās tīrṇāḥ saṃsārasāgaram
d aṇimā laghimā bhūmā prāptiḥ prākāmyam eva ca
d īśitvaṃ ca vaśitvaṃ ca yatrakāmāvasāyitā
d etad aṣṭaguṇaṃ yogaṃ yogānām abhitaḥ smṛtam
d dṛṣṭvātmānaṃ nirātmānam aprameyaṃ sanātanam
d te viśanti śarīrāṇi yogenānena bhāsvaram
d daityadevamanuṣyāṇāṃ balena balavattamāḥ
d etat tattvam anādyantaṃ yad bhavān anupṛcchati
d nityaṃ vayam upāsyāmo yogadharmaṃ sanātanam
d yogadharmān na dharmo 'sti garīyān surasattama
d etad dharmaṃ hi dharmāṇām apunarbhavasaṃskṛtam
d tattvataḥ param astīti ke cid āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
d ke cid āhuḥ paraṃ nāsti ye jñānaphalam āśritāḥ
d jñānasthaḥ puruṣas tv eṣa vikṛtaḥ svena varṇitaḥ
d yaṃ dhyānenānupaśyanti nityaṃ yogaparāyaṇāḥ
d tam eva puruṣaṃ devaṃ ke cid eva maheśvara
d nityam anyatamāḥ prāhur jñānaṃ paramakaṃ smṛtam
d jñānam eva vinirmuktāḥ sāṃkhyā gacchanti kevalam
d cintādhyātmani cānyatra yogāḥ paramabuddhayaḥ
d uktam etāvad etat te yogadarśanam uttamam
d sanatkumāraḥ
d sāṃkhyajñānaṃ pravakṣyāmi parisaṃkhyānidarśanam
d indriyebhyo manaḥ pūrvam ahaṃkāras tataḥ param
d ahaṃkārāt parā buddhir buddheḥ parataraṃ mahat
d mahataḥ param avyaktam avyaktāt puruṣaḥ paraḥ
d etāvad etat sāṃkhyānāṃ darśanaṃ devasattama
d avyaktaṃ buddhyahaṃkārau mahābhūtāni pañca ca
d manas tathā viśeṣāś ca daśa caivendriyāṇi ca
d eṣā tattvacaturviṃśan mahāpuruṣasaṃmitā
d budhyamānena deveśa cetanena mahātmanā
d saṃyogam etayor nityam āhur avyaktapuṃsayoḥ
d ekatvaṃ ca bahutvaṃ ca sargapralayakoṭiśaḥ
d tamaḥsaṃjñitam etad dhi pravadanti triśūladhṛk
d samutpāṭya yathāvyaktāj jīvā yānti punaḥ punaḥ
d ādir eṣa mahān ātmā guṇānām iti naḥ prabho
d guṇasthatvād guṇaṃ tv enam āhur avyaktalakṣaṇam
d etenādhyuṣito vyaktas triguṇaṃ cetayaty atha
d acetanaprakṛtyaiṣa na cānyam anubudhyate
d budhyamāno hy ahaṃkārī nityaṃ mānāprabodhanāt
d vimalasya viśuddhasya nīrujasya mahātmanaḥ
d vimalodāraśīlaḥ syād budhyamānāprabuddhayoḥ
d draṣṭā bhavaty abhoktā ca sattvamūrtiś ca nirguṇaḥ
d budhyamānāprabuddhābhyām anya eva tu nirguṇaḥ
d upekṣakaḥ śucis tābhyām ubhābhyām ayutas tathā
d budhyamāno na budhyeta buddham evaṃ sanātanam
d sa eva buddher avyaktasvabhāvatvād acetanaḥ
d so 'ham eva na me 'nyo 'sti ya evam abhimanyate
d na manyate mamānyo 'sti yena ceto 'smy acetanaḥ
d evam evābhimanyeta budhyamāno 'py anātmavān
d aham eva na me 'nyo 'sti na prabuddhavaśānugaḥ
d avyaktastho guṇān eṣa nityam evābhimanyate
d tenādhiṣṭhitatattvajñair mahadbhir abhidhīyate
d ahaṃkāreṇa saṃyuktas tatas tam abhimanyate
d kṣetraṃ praviśya durbuddhir budhyamāno hy anātmavān
d aham eva sṛjaty anyaṃ dvitīyaṃ lokasārathiḥ
d sarvabhāvair ahaṃkārais tṛtīyaṃ sargasaṃjñitam
d tato bhūtāny ahaṃkāram ahaṃkāro mano 'sṛjat
d sarvasrotasy abhimukhaṃ saṃprāvartata buddhimān
d tathaiva yajñe bhūteṣu viṣayārthī punaḥ punaḥ
d indriyaiḥ saha śūlāṅka pañcapañcabhir eva ca
d mano veda na cātmānam ahaṃkāraṃ prajāpatiḥ
d na veda vāpy ahaṃkāro buddhiṃ buddhimatāṃ vara
d evam ete mahābhāga netare nayavādinaḥ
d ahaṃkāreṇa saṃyuktaḥ srotasy abhimukhaḥ sadā
d evam eṣa vikārātmā mahāpuruṣasaṃjñakaḥ
d pratanoti jagat kṛtsnaṃ punar ādadate 'sakṛt
d saṃsaktatvāj jagat kṛtsnam avyaktasya hṛdi sthitam
d saṃviśad rajanīṃ kṛtsnāṃ niśānte divasāgame
d punar ātmā vijayate bahavo nirguṇās tathā
d ajñānena samāyuktaḥ so 'vyaktena tamotmanā
d yadi hy eṣo nu manyeta mamāsti parato 'paraḥ
d sa punaḥ punar ātmānaṃ na kuryād ākṣipeta ca
d etam avyaktaviṣayaṃ sūkṣmaṃ manyeta buddhimān
d pañcaviṃśaṃ mahādeva mahāpuruṣavaikṛtam
d prabuddho buddhavān etat sṛjamānam abuddhavān
d guṇān punaś ca tān eva so ''tmanātmani nikṣipet
d avyaktasya vaśībhūto so 'jñānasya tamotmanaḥ
d budhyamāno hy abuddhasya buddhas tad anubhujyate
d upekṣakaḥ śucir vyagraḥ so 'liṅgaḥ so 'vraṇo 'malaḥ
d ṣaḍviṃśo bhagavān āste buddhaḥ śuddho nirāmayaḥ
d avyaktādi viśeṣāntam etad vaidyā vadanty uta
d etair eva vihīnaṃ tu ke cid āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
d nistattvaṃ budhyamānās tu ke cid āhur mahāmate
d ke cid āhur mahātmānas tattvasaṃjñitam eva tu
d tattvasya śravaṇād enaṃ tattvam eva vadanti vai
d tattvasaṃśrayaṇāc caiva sattvavantaṃ maheśvara
d evam eṣa vikārātmā budhyamāno mahābhuja
d avyakto bhavate vyaktau sattvaṃ sattvaṃ tathā guṇau
d vidyā ca bhavate 'vidyā bhavate grahasaṃjñitam
d ya evam anubudhyante yogasāṃkhyāś ca tattvataḥ
d te 'vyaktaṃ śaṃkarāgāḍhaṃ muñcante śāstrabuddhayaḥ
d teṣām evaṃ tu vadatāṃ śāstrārthaṃ sūkṣmadarśinām
d buddhir vistīryate sarvaṃ tailabindur ivāmbhasi
d vidyā tu sarvavidyānām avabodha iti smṛtaḥ
d yena vidyām avidyāṃ ca vindanti yatisattamāḥ
d saiṣā trayī parā vidyā caturthy ānvīkṣikī smṛtā
d yāṃ budhyamāno budhyeta buddhyātmani samaṃ gataḥ
d aprabuddham athāvyaktam avidyāsaṃjñakaṃ smṛtam
d vimohanaṃ tu śokena kevalena samanvitam
d etad buddhvā bhaved buddhaḥ kim anyad buddhalakṣaṇam
d ye tv etan nāvabudhyante te prabuddhavaśānugāḥ
d te punaḥ punar avyaktāj janiṣyanty abudhātmanaḥ
d tam eva tulayiṣyanti abuddhavaśavartinaḥ
d ye cāpy anye tanmanasas te 'py etatphalabhāginaḥ
d viditvaitaṃ na śocanti yogopetārthadarśinaḥ
d svātantryaṃ pratilapsyante kevalatvaṃ ca bhāsvaram
d ajñānabandhanān muktās tīrṇāḥ saṃsārabandhanāt
d ajñānasāgaraṃ ghoram agādhaṃ tam asaṃjñakam
d yatra majjanti bhūtāni punaḥ punar ariṃdama
d eṣā vidyā tathāvidyā kathitā te mayārthataḥ
d yasmin deyaṃ ca no grāhyaṃ sāṃkhyāḥ sāṃkhyaṃ tathaiva ca
d tathā caikatvanānātvam akṣaraṃ kṣaram eva ca
d nigadiṣyāmi deveśa vimokṣaṃ trividhaṃ ca te
d budhyamānāprabuddhābhyām abuddhasya prapañcanam
d bhūya eva nibodha tvaṃ devānāṃ devasattama
d yac ca kiṃ cic chrutaṃ na syād dṛṣṭaṃ naiva ca kiṃ cana
d sanatkumāraḥ
d tac ca te saṃpravakṣyāmi ekāgraḥ śṛṇu tatparaḥ
d ariṣṭāni pravakṣyāmi tattvena śṛṇu tad bhavān
d madhya uttaratas tāta dakṣiṇāmukhaniṣṭhitam
d vidyutsaṃsthānapuruṣaṃ yadi paśyeta mānavaḥ
d varṣatrayeṇa jānīyād dehanyāsam upasthitam
d etat phalam ariṣṭasya śaṃkarāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
d śuddhamaṇḍalam ādityam araśmim atha paśyataḥ
d varṣārdhakena jānīyād dehanyāsam upasthitam
d chidrāṃ candramasaś chāyāṃ pādāv apy anupaśyataḥ
d saṃvatsareṇa jānīyād dehanyāsam upasthitam
d kanīnikāyām aśiraḥ puruṣaṃ yadi paśyati
d jānīyāt ṣaṭsu māseṣu dehanyāsam upasthitam
d karṇau pidhāya hastābhyāṃ śabdaṃ na śṛṇuyād yadi
d vijānīyāt tu māsena dehanyāsam upasthitam
d visragandham upāghrāti surabhiṃ prāpya bhāsvaram
d devatāyatanastho 'pi saptarātreṇa mṛtyubhāk
d sarvāṅgadhāraṇāvasthāṃ dhārayeta samāhitaḥ
d yathā sa mṛtyuṃ jayati nānyatheha maheśvara
d yadi jīvitum iccheta cirakālaṃ mahāmune
d atha necchec ciraṃ kālaṃ tyajed ātmānam ātmanā
d kevalaṃ cintayānas tu niṣkalaṃ sa nirāmayam
d atha taṃ nirvikāraṃ tu prakṛteḥ paramaṃ śuciḥ
d puruṣaṃ tena sādharmyaṃ dehanyāsam upāśnuyāt
d jāgrato hi mayoktāni tavāriṣṭāni tattvataḥ
d dhāraṇāc caiva sarvāṅge mṛtyuṃ jīyāt surarṣabha
d ekatvadarśanaṃ bhūyo nānātvaṃ ca nibodha me
d akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva catuṣṭayavidhānataḥ
d avyaktādīni tattvāni sarvāṇy eva mahādyute
d āhuś caturviṃśatimaṃ vikāraṃ puruṣānvitam
d ekatvadarśanaṃ caiva nānātvenāvaraṃ smṛtam
d pañcaviṃśativargaḥ syād apavargo 'jarāmaraḥ
d sa nirvikāraḥ puruṣas tattvenaivopadiśyate
d sa eva pañcaviṃśas tu vikāraḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
d yady eṣa nirvikāraḥ syāt tattvaṃ na tu bhaved bhava
d vikārā vidyamānās tu tattvasaṃjñaka ucyate
d yady eṣo 'vyaktatāṃ naiti vyatirekān na saṃśayaḥ
d tathā bhavati nistattvas tathā sattvas tathā guṇaḥ
d vikāraguṇasaṃtyāgāt prakṛtyanyatvataḥ śuciḥ
d tadā nānātvatām eti sargahīno 'pavargabhāk
d bodhyamānaḥ prabudhyeta samo bhavati buddhimān
d akṣaraś ca bhavaty eṣa yathā vā cyutavān kṣaṇāt
d avyaktā vyaktir uktā syān nirguṇasya guṇākarāt
d etad ekatvanānātvam akṣaraḥ kṣara eva ca
d vyākhyātaṃ tava śūlāṅka tathāriṣṭāni caiva hi
d vimokṣalakṣaṇaṃ śeṣaṃ tad apīha bravīmi te
d yaṃ jñātvā yatayaḥ prāptāḥ kevalatvam anāmayam
d sāṃkhyāś cāpy atha yogāś ca dagdhapaṅkā gatajvarāḥ
d amūrtitvam anuprāptā nirguṇā nirbhayā bhava
d vipāpmāno mahādeva muktāḥ saṃsārasāgarāt
d saraṇe prajanādāne guṇānāṃ prakṛtiḥ sadā
d parā pramattā satatam etāvat kāryakāraṇam
d asac caiva ca sac caiva kurute sa punaḥ punaḥ
d caitanyena purāṇena cetanācetanāt paraḥ
d yas tu cetayate ceto manasā caikabuddhikam
d sa naiva san na caivāsat sadasan na ca saṃsmṛtaḥ
d vyatiriktaś ca śuddhaś ca so 'nyaś cāprakṛtis tathā
d upekṣakaś ca prakṛter vikārapuruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
d vikārapuruṣeṇaiṣā saṃyuktā sṛjate jagat
d punar ādadate caiva guṇānām anyathātmani
d matsyodakāt sa saṃjñātaḥ prakṛter eva karmaṇaḥ
d tadvat kṣetrasahasrāṇi sa eva prakariṣyati
d kṣetrapralayatajjñas tu kṣetrajña iti cocyate
d saṃyogo nitya ity āhur ye janās tattvadarśinaḥ
d evam eṣa hy asat sac ca vikārapuruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
d vikārāpadyamānaṃ tu vikṛtiṃ pravadanti naḥ
d yadā tv eṣa vikārasya prakṛtānīti manyate
d tadā vikāratām eti vikārānyatvatāṃ vrajet
d prakṛtyā ca vikāraiś ca vyatirikto yadā bhavet
d śuci yat paramaṃ śuddhaṃ pratibuddhaṃ sanātanam
d ayuktaṃ niṣkalaṃ śuddham avyayājaram avraṇam
d sametya tena śuddhena budhyamānaḥ sa bhāsvaraḥ
d vimokṣaṃ bhajate vyaktād aprabuddhād acetanāt
d udumbarād vā maśakaḥ pralayān nirgato yathā
d tathāvyaktasya saṃtyāgān nirmamaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ
d yathā puṣkaraparṇastho jalabindur na saṃśliṣet
d tathaivāvyaktaviṣaye na lipyet pañcaviṃśakaḥ
d ākāśa iva niḥsaṅgas tathāsaṅgas tathā varaḥ
d pañcaviṃśatitamo buddho buddhena samatāṃ gataḥ
d etad dhi prakṛtaṃ jñānaṃ tattvataś ca samutthitam
d pūrvajebhyas tathotpannaṃ brahmajebhyas tato 'nagha
d ādisargo mahābāho tāmasenāvṛtaṃ param
d praviṣṭāvayavaṃ devam abhedyam ajarāmaram
d sanakaḥ sanandanaś caiva tṛtīyaś ca sanātanaḥ
d te viduḥ paramaṃ dharmam avyayaṃ vyayadharṣaṇam
d avyaktāt paramāt sūkṣmād avraṇān mūrtisaṃjñakāt
d kṣetrajño bhagavān āste nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ
d asmākaṃ sahajātānām utpannaṃ jñānam uttamam
d ete hi mūrtimanto vai lokān pravicarāmahe
d punaḥ punaḥ prajātā vai tatra tatra pinākadhṛk
d dvaṃdvair virajyamānasya jñānam utpannam uttamam
d kapilān mūlaācāryāt tattvabuddhiviniścayam
d yogasāṃkhyam avāptaṃ me kārtsnyena munisattamāt
d tena saṃbodhitāḥ śiṣyā bahavas tattvadarśinaḥ
d tad buddhvā bahavaḥ śiṣyā mayāpy etan nidarśitāḥ
d janmamṛtyuharaṃ tathyaṃ jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ sanātanam
d yaj jñātvā nānuśocanti tattvajñānān nirindriyāḥ
d śuddhabījamalāś caiva vipaṅkā vai nirakṣarāḥ
d svatantrās te svatantreṇa saṃmitā niṣkalāḥ smṛtāḥ
d śāśvatāś cāvyayāś caiva tamogrāhyāś ca bhāsvarāḥ
d vipāpmānas tathā sarve sattvasthāś cāpi nirvraṇāḥ
d vimuktāḥ kevalāś caiva vītamohabhayās tathā
d amūrtās te mahābhāga sarve ca vigatajvarāḥ
d hiraṇyanābhas triśirās tathā prahrādabhāskarau
d vasur viśvāvasuś caiva sārdhaṃ pañcaśikhas tathā
d gārgyo 'thāsurir āvantyo gautamo 'vrata eva ca
d kātyāyano 'tha namucir hariś ca damanaś ca ha
d ete cānye ca bahavas tattvam evopadarśitāḥ
d ke cin muktāḥ sthitāḥ ke cic chandataś cāpare mṛtāḥ
d darśitās trividhaṃ bandhaṃ vimokṣaṃ trividhaṃ tathā
d ajñānaṃ caiva rāgaś ca saṃyogaṃ prākṛtaṃ tathā
d etebhyo bandhanaṃ proktaṃ vimokṣam api me śṛṇu
d paritas tāvatā samyak saṃbandho yāvatā kṛtaḥ
d kṛtsnakṣayaparityāgād vimokṣa iti naḥ śrutiḥ
d bhīṣmaḥ
d nivṛttaḥ sarvasaṅgebhyaḥ kevalaḥ puruṣo 'malaḥ
d ity evam uktvā bhagavān īśvarāya mahātmane
d sanatkumāraḥ prayayāv ākāśaṃ samupāśritaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yad varaṃ sarvatīrthānāṃ tad bravīhi pitāmaha
c yatra vai paramaṃ śaucaṃ tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sarvāṇi khalu tīrthāni guṇavanti manīṣiṇām
c yat tu tīrthaṃ ca śaucaṃ ca tan me śṛṇu samāhitaḥ
a agādhe vimale śuddhe satyatoye dhṛtihrade
c snātavyaṃ mānase tīrthe sattvam ālambya śāśvatam
a tīrthaśaucam anarthitvamārdavaṃ satyam ārjavam
c ahiṃsā sarvabhūtānām ānṛśaṃsyaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ
a nirmamā nirahaṃkārā nirdvaṃdvā niṣparigrahāḥ
c śucayas tīrthabhūtās te ye bhaikṣam upabhuñjate
a tattvavit tv anahaṃbuddhis tīrthaṃ paramam ucyate
b nārāyaṇe 'tha rudre vā bhaktis tīrthaṃ paraṃ matam
c śaucalakṣaṇam etat te sarvatraivānvavekṣaṇam
a rajas tamaḥ sattvam atho yeṣāṃ nirdhautam ātmanaḥ
c śaucāśauce na te saktāḥ svakāryaparimārgiṇaḥ
a sarvatyāgeṣv abhiratāḥ sarvajñāḥ sarvadarśinaḥ
c śaucena vṛttaśaucārthās te tīrthāḥ śucayaś ca te
a nodakaklinnagātras tu snāta ity abhidhīyate
c sa snāto yo damasnātaḥ sabāhyābhyantaraḥ śuciḥ
a atīteṣv anapekṣā ye prāpteṣv artheṣu nirmamāḥ
c śaucam eva paraṃ teṣāṃ yeṣāṃ notpadyate spṛhā
a prajñānaṃ śaucam eveha śarīrasya viśeṣataḥ
c tathā niṣkiṃcanatvaṃ ca manasaś ca prasannatā
a vṛttaśaucaṃ manaḥśaucaṃ tīrthaśaucaṃ paraṃ hitam
c jñānotpannaṃ ca yac chaucaṃ tac chaucaṃ paramaṃ matam
a manasātha pradīpena brahmajñānabalena ca
c snātā ye mānase tīrthe tajjñāḥ kṣetrajñadarśinaḥ
a samāropitaśaucas tu nityaṃ bhāvasamanvitaḥ
c kevalaṃ guṇasaṃpannaḥ śucir eva naraḥ sadā
a śarīrasthāni tīrthāni proktāny etāni bhārata
c pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni puṇyāni śṛṇu tāny api
a yathā śarīrasyoddeśāḥ śucayaḥ parinirmitāḥ
c tathā pṛthivyā bhāgāś ca puṇyāni salilāni ca
a prārthanāc caiva tīrthasya snānāc ca pitṛtarpaṇāt
c dhunanti pāpaṃ tīrtheṣu pūtā yānti divaṃ sukham
a parigrahāc ca sādhūnāṃ pṛthivyāś caiva tejasā
c atīva puṇyās te bhāgāḥ salilasya ca tejasā
a manasaś ca pṛthivyāś ca puṇyatīrthās tathāpare
c ubhayor eva yaḥ snātaḥ sa siddhiṃ śīghram āpnuyāt
a yathā balaṃ kriyāhīnaṃ kriyā vā balavarjitā
c neha sādhayate kāryaṃ samāyuktas tu sidhyati
a evaṃ śarīraśaucena tīrthaśaucena cānvitaḥ
c tataḥ siddhim avāpnoti dvividhaṃ śaucam uttamam
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d sarveṣām upavāsānāṃ yac chreyaḥ sumahat phalam
d bhīṣmaḥ
d yac cāpy asaṃśayaṃ loke tan me tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
d śṛṇu rājan yathā gītaṃ svayam eva svayaṃbhuvā
d yat kṛtvā nirvṛto bhūyāt puruṣo nātra saṃśayaḥ
d dvādaśyāṃ mārgaśīrṣe tu ahorātreṇa keśavam
d arcyāśvamedham āpnoti duṣkṛtaṃ cāsya naśyati
d tathaiva pauṣamāse tu pūjya nārāyaṇeti ca
d vājapeyam avāpnoti siddhiṃ ca paramāṃ vrajet
d ahorātreṇa dvādaśyāṃ māghamāse tu mādhavam
d rājasūyam avāpnoti kulaṃ caiva samuddharet
d tathaiva phālgune māsi govindeti ca pūjayet
d atirātram avāpnoti somalokaṃ ca gacchati
d ahorātreṇa dvādaśyāṃ caitre viṣṇur iti smaran
d pauṇḍarīkam avāpnoti devalokaṃ ca gacchati
d vaiśākhamāse dvādaśyāṃ pūjayan madhusūdanam
d agniṣṭomam avāpnoti somalokaṃ ca gacchati
d ahorātreṇa dvādaśyāṃ jyeṣṭhe māsi trivikramam
d gavāmayam avāpnoti apsarobhiś ca modate
d āṣāḍhe māsi dvādaśyāṃ vāmaneti ca pūjayet
d naramedham avāpnoti puṇyaṃ ca labhate mahat
d ahorātreṇa dvādaśyāṃ śrāvaṇe māsi śrīdharam
d pañcayajñān avāpnoti vimānasthaḥ sa modate
d tathā bhādrapade māsi hṛṣīkeśeti pūjayan
d sautrāmaṇim avāpnoti pūtātmā bhavate ca hi
d dvādaśyām āśvine māsi padmanābheti cārcayan
d gosahasraphalaṃ puṇyaṃ prāpnuyān nātra saṃśayaḥ
d dvādaśyāṃ kārttike māsi pūjya dāmodareti ca
d gavāṃ yajñam avāpnoti pumān strī vā na saṃśayaḥ
d abhyarcya puṇḍarīkākṣam evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ tu yaḥ
d jātismaratvaṃ prāpnoti vindyād bahu suvarṇakam
d ahany ahani tadbhāvam upendraṃ yo 'dhigacchati
d samāpte bhojayed viprān atha vā dāpayed dhṛtam
d ataḥparaṃ nopavāso bhavatīti viniścayaḥ
d uvāca bhagavān viṣṇuḥ svayam eva purātanam
dA vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
dA śaratalpagataṃ bhīṣmaṃ vṛddhaṃ kurupitāmaham
dA upagamya mahāprājñaḥ paryapṛcchad yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
dA yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
dA jñānaṃ rūpaṃ ca saubhāgyaṃ priyatvaṃ ca kathaṃ bhavet
dA bhīṣmaḥ
dA dharmārthakāmasaṃyuktaḥ sukhabhāgī kathaṃ bhavet
dA mārgaśīrṣasya māsasya candre mūlena saṃyute
dA pādau mūlena rājendra jaṅghāyām atha rohiṇīm
dA aśvinyāṃ sakthinī caiva ūrū cāṣāḍhayos tathā
dA guhyaṃ tu phālgunī vidyāt kṛttikā kaṭikās tathā
dA nābhiṃ bhādrapade vidyād revatyām akṣimaṇḍalam
dA pṛṣṭham eva dhaniṣṭhāsu anurādhottarās tathā
dA bāhubhyāṃ tu viśākhāsu hastau hasteṣu nirdiśet
dA punarvasv aṅgulī rājann āśleṣāsu nakhās tathā
dA grīvā jyeṣṭhā ca rājendra śravaṇena tu karṇayoḥ
dA mukhaṃ puṣyeṇa rājendra dantoṣṭhau svātir ucyate
dA hastaṃ śatabhiṣāṃ caiva maghāṃ caivātha nāsikām
dA netre mṛgaśiro vidyāl lalāṭaṃ mitram eva tu
dA bharaṇyāṃ tu śiro vidyāt keśān ārdrāṃ narādhipa
dA samāpte tu ghṛtaṃ dadyād brāhmaṇe vedapārage
dA subhago darśanīyaś ca jñānī bhogī ca jāyate
dA jāyate paripūrṇāṅgaḥ paurṇamāsyām ivoḍurāṭ

a pitāmaha mahābāho sarvaśāstraviśārada
c śrotum icchāmi martyānāṃ saṃsāravidhim uttamam

c prāpnuvanty uttamaṃ svargaṃ kathaṃ ca narakaṃ nṛpa
a mṛtaṃ śarīram utsṛjya kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamaṃ janāḥ
c prayānty amuṃ lokam itaḥ ko vai tān anugacchati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a asāv āyāti bhagavān bṛhaspatir udāradhīḥ

a naitad anyena śakyaṃ hi vaktuṃ kena cid adya vai

 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
