c strīṇāṃ puṣpaṃ samāsādya sūte kālena bhārata
a yamasya puruṣaiḥ kleśaṃ yamasya puruṣair vadham
c duḥkhaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ ca naraḥ kleśaṃ ca vindati
a ihaloke ca sa prāṇī janmaprabhṛti pārthiva
c svakṛtaṃ karma vai bhuṅkte dharmasya phalam āśritaḥ
a yadi dharmaṃ yathāśakti janmaprabhṛti sevate
c tataḥ sa puruṣo bhūtvā sevate nityadā sukham
a athāntarā tu dharmasya adharmam upasevate
c sukhasyānantaraṃ duḥkhaṃ sa jīvo 'py adhigacchati
c duḥkhasyānantaraṃ sukham
c etad dvayaṃ dhruvaṃ baddhaḥ
a adharmeṇa samāyukto yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥ
c mahad duḥkhaṃ samāsādya tiryagyonau prajāyate
a karmaṇā yena yeneha yasyāṃ yonau prajāyate
c jīvo mohasamāyuktas tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
a yad etad ucyate śāstre setihāse sacchandasi
c yamasya viṣayaṃ ghoraṃ martyo lokaḥ prapadyate
d yad etad ucyate nityam akṛtvā puruṣaḥ sadā
d kṛmiyonim avāpnoti bahuśaḥ patitas tathā
d iha sthānāni puṇyāni devatulyāni bhūtale
d tiryagyonyatiriktāni gatimanti ca sarvaśaḥ
d yamasya viṣaye puṇye brahmalokasame guṇaiḥ
d karmabhir niyatair baddho jantur duḥkhāny upāśnute
d yena yena tu pāpena karmaṇā puruṣo gatim
d prayāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ tat te vakṣyāmy ataḥ param
a adhītya caturo vedān dvijo mohasamanvitaḥ
c patitāt pratigṛhyātha kharayonau prajāyate
a kharo jīvati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bhārata
c kharo mṛto balīvardaḥ sapta varṣāṇi jīvati
a balīvardo mṛtaś cāpi jāyate brahmarākṣasaḥ
c brahmarakṣas tu trīn māsāṃs tato jāyati brāhmaṇaḥ
a patitaṃ yājayitvā tu kṛmiyonau prajāyate
c tatra jīvati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bhārata
a kṛmibhāvāt pramuktas tu tato jāyati gardabhaḥ
c gardabhaḥ pañca varṣāṇi pañca varṣāṇi sūkaraḥ
d kukkuṭaḥ pañca varṣāṇi pañca varṣāṇi jambukaḥ
e śvā varṣam ekaṃ bhavati tato jāyati mānavaḥ
a upādhyāyasya yaḥ pāpaṃ śiṣyaḥ kuryād abuddhimān
c sa jīva iha saṃsārāṃs trīn āpnoti na saṃśayaḥ
a prāk śvā bhavati rājendra tataḥ kravyāt tataḥ kharaḥ
c tataḥ pretaḥ parikliṣṭaḥ paścāj jāyati brāhmaṇaḥ
a manasāpi guror bhāryāṃ yaḥ śiṣyo yāti pāpakṛt
c so 'dhamān yāti saṃsārān adharmeṇeha cetasā
a śvayonau tu sa saṃbhūtas trīṇi varṣāṇi jīvati
c tatrāpi nidhanaṃ prāptaḥ kṛmiyonau prajāyate
a kṛmibhāvam anuprāpto varṣam ekaṃ sa jīvati
c tatas tu nidhanaṃ prāpya brahmayonau prajāyate
a yadi putrasamaṃ śiṣyaṃ gurur hanyād akāraṇe
c ātmanaḥ kāmakāreṇa so 'pi haṃsaḥ prajāyate
a pitaraṃ mātaraṃ vāpi yas tu putro 'vamanyate
c so 'pi rājan mṛto jantuḥ pūrvaṃ jāyati gardabhaḥ
d gardabhatvaṃ tu saṃprāpya daśa varṣāṇi jīvati
d saṃvatsaraṃ tu kumbhīras tato jāyati mānavaḥ
d putrasya mātāpitarau yasya ruṣṭāv ubhāv api
d gurvapadhyānataḥ so 'pi mṛto jāyati gardabhaḥ
a kharo jīvati māsāṃs tu daśa śvā ca caturdaśa
c biḍālaḥ sapta māsāṃs tu tato jāyati mānavaḥ
a mātāpitaram ākruśya sārikaḥ saṃprajāyate
c tāḍayitvā tu tāv eva jāyate kacchapo nṛpa
a kacchapo daśa varṣāṇi trīṇi varṣāṇi śalyakaḥ
c vyālo bhūtvā tu ṣaṇ māsāṃs tato jāyati mānuṣaḥ
a bhartṛpiṇḍam upāśnan yo rājadviṣṭāni sevate
c so 'pi mohasamāpanno mṛto jāyati vānaraḥ
a vānaro daśa varṣāṇi trīṇi varṣāṇi mūṣakaḥ
c śvā bhūtvā cātha ṣaṇ māsāṃs tato jāyati mānuṣaḥ
d mṛto vānarayonau syāt tato bhavati sūkaraḥ
d tataḥ śvā cāpi bhavati tato bhavati mānuṣaḥ
a nyāsāpahartā tu naro yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥ
c saṃsārāṇāṃ śataṃ gatvā kṛmiyonau prajāyate
a tatra jīvati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bhārata
c duṣkṛtasya kṣayaṃ gatvā tato jāyati mānuṣaḥ
a asūyako naraś cāpi mṛto jāyati śārṅgakaḥ
b asūyakaḥ kutsitaś ca caṇḍālo duḥkham aśnute
c viśvāsahartā tu naro mīno jāyati durmatiḥ
a bhūtvā mīno 'ṣṭa varṣāṇi mṛgo jāyati bhārata
c mṛgas tu caturo māsāṃs tataś chāgaḥ prajāyate
a chāgas tu nidhanaṃ prāpya pūrṇe saṃvatsare tataḥ
c kīṭaḥ saṃjāyate jantus tato jāyati mānuṣaḥ
a dhānyān yavāṃs tilān māṣān kulatthān sarṣapāṃś caṇān
c kalāyān atha mudgāṃś ca godhūmān atasīs tathā
a sasyasyānyasya hartā ca mohāj jantur acetanaḥ
c sa jāyate mahārāja mūṣako nirapatrapaḥ
d mūṣako jāyate paścāt sūkaro jāyate tataḥ
a tataḥ pretya mahārāja punar jāyati sūkaraḥ
c sūkaro jātamātras tu rogeṇa mriyate nṛpa
a śvā tato jāyate mūḍhaḥ karmaṇā tena pārthiva
c śvā bhūtvā pañca varṣāṇi tato jāyati mānuṣaḥ
a paradārābhimarśaṃ tu kṛtvā jāyati vai vṛkaḥ
c śvā sṛgālas tato gṛdhro vyālaḥ kaṅko bakas tathā
a bhrātur bhāryāṃ tu durbuddhir yo dharṣayati mohitaḥ
c puṃskokilatvam āpnoti so 'pi saṃvatsaraṃ nṛpa
a sakhibhāryāṃ guror bhāryāṃ rājabhāryāṃ tathaiva ca
c pradharṣayitvā kāmād yo mṛto jāyati sūkaraḥ
d śvā biḍālaḥ kukkuṭaś ca jāyetāpi pipīlikāḥ
a sūkaraḥ pañca varṣāṇi pañca varṣāṇi śvāvidhaḥ
b vilāḷaḥ pañca varṣāṇi pañca varṣāṇi kukkuṭaḥ
c pipīlakas tu ṣaṇ māsān kīṭaḥ syān māsam eva ca
e etān āsādya saṃsārān kṛmiyonau prajāyate
a tatra jīvati māsāṃs tu kṛmiyonau trayodaśa
c tato 'dharmakṣayaṃ kṛtvā punar jāyati mānuṣaḥ
a upasthite vivāhe tu dāne yajñe 'pi vābhibho
c mohāt karoti yo vighnaṃ sa mṛto jāyate kṛmiḥ
d devālayādhipatyaṃ hi kuryāt tad dravyabhakṣakaḥ
d śvā bhūtvā sapta janmāni tato jāyati mānavaḥ
d dvijagrāmādhipatyaṃ hi kṛtvā brahmasvabhakṣakaḥ
d śvānayoniśataṃ prāpya caṇḍālaḥ puṣkalas tataḥ
d varṣāt pañcadaśāt pūrvaṃ kramād bhavati mānuṣaḥ
a kṛmir jīvati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bhārata
c adharmasya kṣayaṃ kṛtvā tato jāyati mānuṣaḥ
a pūrvaṃ dattvā tu yaḥ kanyāṃ dvitīye saṃprayacchati
c so 'pi rājan mṛto jantuḥ kṛmiyonau prajāyate
a tatra jīvati varṣāṇi trayodaśa yudhiṣṭhira
c adharmasaṃkṣaye yuktas tato jāyati mānuṣaḥ
d tato nidhanam āpanno mānuṣatvam upāśnute
a devakāryam upākṛtya pitṛkāryam athāpi ca
c anirvāpya samaśnan vai tato jāyati vāyasaḥ
a vāyaso daśa varṣāṇi tato jāyati kukkuṭaḥ
c jāyate lavakaś cāpi māsaṃ tasmāt tu mānuṣaḥ
a jyeṣṭhaṃ pitṛsamaṃ cāpi bhrātaraṃ yo 'vamanyate
c so 'pi mṛtyum upāgamya krauñcayonau prajāyate
a krauñco jīvati māsāṃs tu daśa dvau sapta pañca ca
c tato nidhanam āpanno mānuṣatvam upāśnute
a vṛṣalo brāhmaṇīṃ gatvā kṛmiyonau prajāyate
c tatrāpatyaṃ samutpādya tato jāyati mūṣakaḥ
a kṛtaghnas tu mṛto rājan yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥ
c yamasya viṣaye kruddhair vadhaṃ prāpnoti dāruṇam
a paṭṭisaṃ mudgaraṃ śūlam agnikumbhaṃ ca dāruṇam
c asipatravanaṃ ghoraṃ vālukāṃ kūṭaśālmalīm
a etāś cānyāś ca bahvīḥ sa yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥ
b anyāś ca yātanāḥ prāpya kṛmiyonau prajāyate
b tato hataḥ kṛtaghnaḥ sa tatrograir bharatarṣabha
c yātanāḥ prāpya tatrogrās tato vadhyati bhārata
a saṃsāracakram āsādya kṛmiyonau prajāyate
c kṛmir bhavati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bhārata
e tato garbhaṃ samāsādya tatraiva mriyate śiśuḥ
a tato garbhaśatair jantur bahubhiḥ saṃprajāyate
c saṃsārāṃś ca bahūn gatvā tatas tiryak prajāyate
a mṛto duḥkham anuprāpya bahuvarṣagaṇān iha
c apunarbhāvasaṃyuktas tataḥ kūrmaḥ prajāyate
a aśastraṃ puruṣaṃ hatvā saśastraḥ puruṣādhamaḥ
c arthārthī yadi vā vairī sa mṛto jāyate kharaḥ
a kharo jīvati varṣe dve tataḥ śastreṇa vadhyate
c sa mṛto mṛgayonau tu nityodvigno 'bhijāyate
a mṛgo vadhyati śastreṇa gate saṃvatsare tu saḥ
b mṛgo bhūtvā tataḥ śastrair vadhyate bhṛśadāruṇam
c hato mṛgas tato mīnaḥ so 'pi jālena badhyate
a māse caturthe saṃprāpte śvāpadaḥ saṃprajāyate
c śvāpado daśa varṣāṇi dvīpī varṣāṇi pañca ca
a tatas tu nidhanaṃ prāptaḥ kālaparyāyacoditaḥ
c adharmasya kṣayaṃ kṛtvā tato jāyati mānuṣaḥ
a striyaṃ hatvā tu durbuddhir yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥ
c bahūn kleśān samāsādya saṃsārāṃś caiva viṃśatim
a tataḥ paścān mahārāja kṛmiyonau prajāyate
c kṛmir viṃśativarṣāṇi bhūtvā jāyati mānuṣaḥ
a bhojanaṃ corayitvā tu makṣikā jāyate naraḥ
c makṣikāsaṃghavaśago bahūn māsān bhavaty uta
e tataḥ pāpakṣayaṃ kṛtvā mānuṣatvam avāpnute
a vādyaṃ hṛtvā tu puruṣo maśakaḥ saṃprajāyate
c tathā piṇyākasaṃmiśram aśanaṃ corayen naraḥ
e sa jāyate babhrusamo dāruṇo mūṣako naraḥ
f daśan vai mānuṣān nityaṃ pāpātmā sa viśāṃ pate
f ghṛtaṃ hṛtvā tu durbuddhiḥ kākamadguḥ prajāyate
f matsyamāṃsam atho hṛtvā kāko jāyati durmatiḥ
a lavaṇaṃ corayitvā tu cīrīvākaḥ prajāyate
c dadhi hṛtvā bakaś cāpi plavo matsyān asaṃskṛtān
a corayitvā payaś cāpi balākā saṃprajāyate
c yas tu corayate tailaṃ tailapāyī prajāyate
c naro mohasamanvitaḥ
c so 'pi rājan mṛto jantus
e corayitvā tu durbuddhir madhu daṃśaḥ prajāyate
a ayo hṛtvā tu durbuddhir vāyaso jāyate naraḥ
c pāyasaṃ corayitvā tu tittiritvam avāpnute
a hṛtvā paiṣṭam apūpaṃ ca kumbholūkaḥ prajāyate
c phalaṃ vā mūlakaṃ hṛtvā apūpaṃ vā pipīlikaḥ
d phalāni vānaro hṛtvāpūpaṃ hṛtvā pipīlikaḥ
d corayitvā tu niṣpāvaṃ jāyate halagolakaḥ
a kāṃsyaṃ hṛtvā tu durbuddhir hārīto jāyate naraḥ
c rājataṃ bhājanaṃ hṛtvā kapotaḥ saṃprajāyate
a hṛtvā tu kāñcanaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kṛmiyonau prajāyate
b patrorṇaṃ corayitvā tu kṛkalatvaṃ nigacchati
b kauśikaṃ tu tato hṛtvā naro jāyati vartakaḥ
b aṃśukaṃ corayitvā tu śuko jāyati mānavaḥ
b corayitvā dukūlaṃ tu mṛto haṃsaḥ prajāyate
c krauñcaḥ kārpāsikaṃ hṛtvā mṛto jāyati mānavaḥ
d sarpaḥ kārpāsakaṃ hṛtvā kṣaumaṃ hṛtvā śaśo bhavet
d chāgaś cāpy āvikaṃ hṛtvā kūrmaś carmāpahārakaḥ
a corayitvā naraḥ paṭṭaṃ tv āvikaṃ vāpi bhārata
c kṣaumaṃ ca vastram ādāya śaśo jantuḥ prajāyate
a varṇān hṛtvā tu puruṣo mṛto jāyati barhiṇaḥ
c hṛtvā raktāni vastrāṇi jāyate jīvajīvakaḥ
a varṇakādīṃs tathā gandhāṃś corayitvā tu mānavaḥ
c chucchundaritvam āpnoti rājaṃl lobhaparāyaṇaḥ
d tatra jīvati varṣāṇi tato daśa ca pañca ca
d adharmasya kṣayaṃ gatvā tato jāyati mānuṣaḥ
a viśvāsena tu nikṣiptaṃ yo nihnavati mānavaḥ
c sa gatāsur naras tādṛṅ matsyayonau prajāyate
a matsyayonim anuprāpya mṛto jāyati mānuṣaḥ
c mānuṣatvam anuprāpya kṣīṇāyur upapadyate
a pāpāni tu naraḥ kṛtvā tiryag jāyati bhārata
c na cātmanaḥ pramāṇaṃ te dharmaṃ jānanti kiṃ cana
a ye pāpāni narāḥ kṛtvā nirasyanti vrataiḥ sadā
c sukhaduḥkhasamāyuktā vyādhitās te bhavanty uta
a asaṃvāsāḥ prajāyante mlecchāś cāpi na saṃśayaḥ
c narāḥ pāpasamācārā lobhamohasamanvitāḥ
a varjayanti ca pāpāni janmaprabhṛti ye narāḥ
b janmaprabhṛti pāpāni varjayanti ca ye narāḥ
c arogā rūpavantas te dhaninaś ca bhavanty uta
a striyo 'py etena kalpena kṛtvā pāpam avāpnuyuḥ
c eteṣām eva jantūnāṃ patnītvam upayānti tāḥ
a parasvaharaṇe doṣāḥ sarva eva prakīrtitāḥ
c etad vai leśamātreṇa kathitaṃ te mayānagha
e aparasmin kathāyoge bhūyaḥ śroṣyasi bhārata
a etan mayā mahārāja brahmaṇo vadataḥ purā
c surarṣīṇāṃ śrutaṃ madhye pṛṣṭaś cāpi yathātatham
a mayāpi tava kārtsnyena yathāvad anuvarṇitam
c etac chrutvā mahārāja dharme kuru manaḥ sadā
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a adharmasya gatir brahman kathitā me tvayānagha
c dharmasya tu gatiṃ śrotum icchāmi vadatāṃ vara
e kṛtvā karmāṇi pāpāni kathaṃ yānti śubhāṃ gatim
f karmaṇā ca kṛteneha kena yānti śubhāṃ gatim
 bṛhaspatir uvāca
a kṛtvā pāpāni karmāṇi adharmavaśam āgataḥ
c manasā viparītena nirayaṃ pratipadyate
a mohād adharmaṃ yaḥ kṛtvā punaḥ samanutapyate
c manaḥsamādhisaṃyukto na sa seveta duṣkṛtam
d yathā yathā manas tasya duṣkṛtaṃ karma garhate
d tathā tathā śarīraṃ tu tenādharmeṇa mucyate
d yadi vyāharate rājan viprāṇāṃ dharmavādinām
d tato 'dharmakṛtāt kṣipram apavādāt pramucyate
a yathā yathā naraḥ samyag adharmam anubhāṣate
c samāhitena manasā vimucyati tathā tathā
e bhujaṃga iva nirmokāt pūrvabhuktāj jarānvitāt
a adattvāpi pradānāni vividhāni samāhitaḥ
c manaḥsamādhisaṃyuktaḥ sugatiṃ pratipadyate
a pradānāni tu vakṣyāmi yāni dattvā yudhiṣṭhira
c naraḥ kṛtvāpy akāryāṇi tadā dharmeṇa yujyate
a sarveṣām eva dānānām annaṃ śreṣṭham udāhṛtam
c pūrvam annaṃ pradātavyam ṛjunā dharmam icchatā
a prāṇā hy annaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tasmāj jantuś ca jāyate
c anne pratiṣṭhitā lokās tasmād annaṃ prakāśate
a annam eva praśaṃsanti devarṣipitṛmānavāḥ
c annasya hi pradānena svargam āpnoti kauśikaḥ
a nyāyalabdhaṃ pradātavyaṃ dvijebhyo hy annam uttamam
c svādhyāyasamupetebhyaḥ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā
a yasya hy annam upāśnanti brāhmaṇānāṃ śatā daśa
c hṛṣṭena manasā dattaṃ na sa tiryaggatir bhavet
a brāhmaṇānāṃ sahasrāṇi daśa bhojya nararṣabha
c naro 'dharmāt pramucyeta pāpeṣv abhirataḥ sadā
a bhaikṣeṇānnaṃ samāhṛtya vipro vedapuraskṛtaḥ
b suvarṇadānāt pāpāni naśyanti subahūny api
b dattvā vṛttikarīṃ bhūmiṃ pātakenāpi mucyate
b pārāyaṇaiś ca vedānāṃ mucyate pātakair dvijaḥ
b gāyatryāś caiva lakṣeṇa gosahasrasya tarpaṇāt
b vedārthaṃ jñāpayitvā tu śuddhān viprān yathārthataḥ
b sarvatyāgādibhiś cāpi mucyate pātakair dvijaḥ
b sarvātithyaṃ paraṃ hy eṣāṃ tasmād annaṃ paraṃ smṛtam
c svādhyāyanirate vipre dattveha sukham edhate
a ahiṃsan brāhmaṇaṃ nityaṃ nyāyena paripālya ca
c kṣatriyas tarasā prāptam annaṃ yo vai prayacchati
a dvijebhyo vedavṛddhebhyaḥ prayataḥ susamāhitaḥ
c tenāpohati dharmātmā duṣkṛtaṃ karma pāṇḍava
a ṣaḍbhāgapariśuddhaṃ ca kṛṣer bhāgam upārjitam
c vaiśyo dadad dvijātibhyaḥ pāpebhyaḥ parimucyate
a avāpya prāṇasaṃdehaṃ kārkaśyena samārjitam
c annaṃ dattvā dvijātibhyaḥ śūdraḥ pāpāt pramucyate
a aurasena balenānnam arjayitvāvihiṃsakaḥ
c yaḥ prayacchati viprebhyo na sa durgāṇi sevate
a nyāyenāvāptam annaṃ tu naro lobhavivarjitaḥ
c dvijebhyo vedavṛddhebhyo dattvā pāpāt pramucyate
a annam ūrjaskaraṃ loke dattvorjasvī bhaven naraḥ
b śūdrānnaṃ naiva bhoktavyaṃ viprair dharmaparāyaṇaiḥ
b āpady eva svadāsānāṃ bhoktavyaṃ svayam udyatam
c satāṃ panthānam āśritya sarvapāpāt pramucyate
a dānakṛdbhiḥ kṛtaḥ panthā yena yānti manīṣiṇaḥ
c te sma prāṇasya dātāras tebhyo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
a sarvāvasthaṃ manuṣyeṇa nyāyenānnam upārjitam
c kāryaṃ pātragataṃ nityam annaṃ hi paramā gatiḥ
a annasya hi pradānena naro durgaṃ na sevate
c tasmād annaṃ pradātavyam anyāyaparivarjitam
a yated brāhmaṇapūrvaṃ hi bhoktum annaṃ gṛhī sadā
c avandhyaṃ divasaṃ kuryād annadānena mānavaḥ
a bhojayitvā daśaśataṃ naro vedavidāṃ nṛpa
c nyāyaviddharmaviduṣām itihāsavidāṃ tathā
a na yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ saṃsārāṃś ca na sevate
c sarvakāmasamāyuktaḥ pretya cāpy aśnute phalam
a evaṃ sukhasamāyukto ramate vigatajvaraḥ
c rūpavān kīrtimāṃś caiva dhanavāṃś copapadyate
a etat te sarvam ākhyātam annadānaphalaṃ mahat
c mūlam etad dhi dharmāṇāṃ pradānasya ca bhārata
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ahiṃsā vaidikaṃ karma dhyānam indriyasaṃyamaḥ
c tapo 'tha guruśuśrūṣā kiṃ śreyaḥ puruṣaṃ prati
 bṛhaspatir uvāca
a sarvāṇy etāni dharmasya pṛthag dvārāṇi sarvaśaḥ
c śṛṇu saṃkīrtyamānāni ṣaḍ eva bharatarṣabha
a hanta niḥśreyasaṃ jantor ahaṃ vakṣyāmy anuttamam
c ahiṃsāpāśrayaṃ dharmaṃ yaḥ sādhayati vai naraḥ
a trīn doṣān sarvabhūteṣu nidhāya puruṣaḥ sadā
c kāmakrodhau ca saṃyamya tataḥ siddhim avāpnute
a ahiṃsakāni bhūtāni daṇḍena vinihanti yaḥ
c ātmanaḥ sukham anvicchan na sa pretya sukhī bhavet
a ātmopamaś ca bhūteṣu yo vai bhavati pūruṣaḥ
c nyastadaṇḍo jitakrodhaḥ sa pretya sukham edhate
a sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya sarvabhūtāni paśyataḥ
c devāpi mārge muhyanti apadasya padaiṣiṇaḥ
a na tat parasya saṃdadyāt pratikūlaṃ yad ātmanaḥ
c eṣa saṃkṣepato dharmaḥ kāmād anyaḥ pravartate
a pratyākhyāne ca dāne ca sukhaduḥkhe priyāpriye
c ātmaupamyena puruṣaḥ samādhim adhigacchati
a yathā paraḥ prakramate 'pareṣu
tathāparaḥ prakramate parasmin
c eṣaiva te 'stūpamā jīvaloke
yathā dharmo naipuṇenopadiṣṭaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a ity uktvā taṃ suragurur dharmarājaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
c divam ācakrame dhīmān paśyatām eva nas tadā
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā śaratalpe pitāmaham
c punar eva mahātejāḥ papraccha vadatāṃ varam
a ṛṣayo brāhmaṇā devāḥ praśaṃsanti mahāmate
c ahiṃsālakṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ vedaprāmāṇyadarśanāt
a karmaṇā manujaḥ kurvan hiṃsāṃ pārthivasattama
c vācā ca manasā caiva kathaṃ duḥkhāt pramucyate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a caturvidheyaṃ nirdiṣṭā ahiṃsā brahmavādibhiḥ
c eṣaikato 'pi vibhraṣṭā na bhavaty arisūdana
a yathā sarvaś catuṣpādas tribhiḥ pādair na tiṣṭhati
c tathaiveyaṃ mahīpāla procyate kāraṇais tribhiḥ
a yathā nāgapade 'nyāni padāni padagāminām
c sarvāṇy evāpidhīyante padajātāni kauñjare
e evaṃ lokeṣv ahiṃsā tu nirdiṣṭā dharmataḥ parā
a karmaṇā lipyate jantur vācā ca manasaiva ca
a pūrvaṃ tu manasā tyaktvā tathā vācātha karmaṇā
b na bhakṣayeta yo māṃsaṃ trividhaṃ sa vimucyate
c trikāraṇaṃ tu nirdiṣṭaṃ śrūyate brahmavādibhiḥ
a manovāci tathāsvāde doṣā hy eṣu pratiṣṭhitāḥ
b hiṃsāṃ tu nopayuñjīta tathā hiṃsā caturvidhā
b kāye manasi vākye ca doṣā hy ete prakīrtitāḥ
c na bhakṣayanty ato māṃsaṃ tapoyuktā manīṣiṇaḥ
a doṣāṃs tu bhakṣaṇe rājan māṃsasyeha nibodha me
c putramāṃsopamaṃ jānan khādate yo vicetanaḥ
d māṃsaṃ mohasamāviṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ so 'dhamaḥ smṛtaḥ
a mātāpitṛsamāyoge putratvaṃ jāyate yathā
b hiṃsāṃ kṛtvāvaśaḥ pāpo bhūyiṣṭhaṃ jāyate tathā
c rasaṃ ca prati jihvāyāḥ prajñānaṃ jāyate tathā
e tathā śāstreṣu niyataṃ rāgo hy āsvāditād bhavet
a asaṃskṛtāḥ saṃskṛtāś ca lavaṇālavaṇās tathā
c prajñāyante yathā bhāvās tathā cittaṃ nirudhyate
a bherīśaṅkhamṛdaṅgādyāṃs tantrīśabdāṃś ca puṣkalān
c niṣeviṣyanti vai mandā māṃsabhakṣāḥ kathaṃ narāḥ
d pareṣāṃ dhanadhānyānāṃ hiṃsakāḥ stāvakās tathā
d praśaṃsakāś ca māṃsasya nityaṃ svarge bahiṣkṛtāḥ
a acintitam anuddiṣṭam asaṃkalpitam eva ca
c rasaṃ gṛddhyābhibhūtā vai praśaṃsanti phalārthinaḥ
e praśaṃsā hy eva māṃsasya doṣakarmaphalānvitā
f bhasma viṣṭhā kṛmir vāpi niṣṭhā yasyedṛśī dhruvā
f sa kāyaḥ parapīḍābhiḥ kathaṃ dhāryo vipaścitā
a jīvitaṃ hi parityajya bahavaḥ sādhavo janāḥ
c svamāṃsaiḥ paramāṃsāni paripālya divaṃ gatāḥ
a evam eṣā mahārāja caturbhiḥ kāraṇair vṛtā
c ahiṃsā tava nirdiṣṭā sarvadharmārthasaṃhitā
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ahiṃsā paramo dharma ity uktaṃ bahuśas tvayā
c śrāddheṣu ca bhavān āha pitṝn āmiṣakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
a māṃsair bahuvidhaiḥ proktas tvayā śrāddhavidhiḥ purā
c ahatvā ca kuto māṃsam evam etad virudhyate
a jāto naḥ saṃśayo dharme māṃsasya parivarjane
c doṣo bhakṣayataḥ kaḥ syāt kaś cābhakṣayato guṇaḥ
a hatvā bhakṣayato vāpi pareṇopahṛtasya vā
c hanyād vā yaḥ parasyārthe krītvā vā bhakṣayen naraḥ
a etad icchāmi tattvena kathyamānaṃ tvayānagha
c niścayena cikīrṣāmi dharmam etaṃ sanātanam
a katham āyur avāpnoti kathaṃ bhavati sattvavān
c katham avyaṅgatām eti lakṣaṇyo jāyate katham
 bhīṣma uvāca
a māṃsasya bhakṣaṇe rājan yo 'dharmaḥ kurupuṃgava
c taṃ me śṛṇu yathātattvaṃ yaś cāsya vidhir uttamaḥ
a rūpam avyaṅgatām āyur buddhiṃ sattvaṃ balaṃ smṛtim
c prāptukāmair narair hiṃsā varjitā vai kṛtātmabhiḥ
a ṛṣīṇām atra saṃvādo bahuśaḥ kurupuṃgava
c babhūva teṣāṃ tu mataṃ yat tac chṛṇu yudhiṣṭhira
a yo yajetāśvamedhena māsi māsi yatavrataḥ
c varjayen madhu māṃsaṃ ca samam etad yudhiṣṭhira
a saptarṣayo vālakhilyās tathaiva ca marīcipāḥ
c amāṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ rājan praśaṃsanti manīṣiṇaḥ
a na bhakṣayati yo māṃsaṃ na hanyān na ca ghātayet
c taṃ mitraṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvo 'bravīt
a adhṛṣyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ viśvāsyaḥ sarvajantuṣu
c sādhūnāṃ saṃmato nityaṃ bhaven māṃsasya varjanāt
a svamāṃsaṃ paramāṃsena yo vardhayitum icchati
c nāradaḥ prāha dharmātmā niyataṃ so 'vasīdati
d aviśvāsyo 'vasīdet sa iti hovāca nāradaḥ
a dadāti yajate cāpi tapasvī ca bhavaty api
c madhumāṃsanivṛttyeti prāhaivaṃ sa bṛhaspatiḥ
a māsi māsy aśvamedhena yo yajeta śataṃ samāḥ
c na khādati ca yo māṃsaṃ samam etan mataṃ mama
a sadā yajati satreṇa sadā dānaṃ prayacchati
c sadā tapasvī bhavati madhumāṃsasya varjanāt
a sarve vedā na tat kuryuḥ sarvayajñāś ca bhārata
c yo bhakṣayitvā māṃsāni paścād api nivartate
d bhakṣayitvā nimitte 'pi duṣkaraṃ kurute tapaḥ
a duṣkaraṃ hi rasajñena māṃsasya parivarjanam
c cartuṃ vratam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvaprāṇyabhayapradam
a sarvabhūteṣu yo vidvān dadāty abhayadakṣiṇām
c dātā bhavati loke sa prāṇānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
a evaṃ vai paramaṃ dharmaṃ praśaṃsanti manīṣiṇaḥ
c prāṇā yathātmano 'bhīṣṭā bhūtānām api te tathā
a ātmaupamyena gantavyaṃ buddhimadbhir mahātmabhiḥ
b vikīrṇakaṇṭakenāpi tṛṇapraspandane bhayam
c mṛtyuto bhayam astīti viduṣāṃ bhūtim icchatām
a kiṃ punar hanyamānānāṃ tarasā jīvitārthinām
c arogāṇām apāpānāṃ pāpair māṃsopajīvibhiḥ
a tasmād viddhi mahārāja māṃsasya parivarjanam
c dharmasyāyatanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ svargasya ca sukhasya ca
d mṛtyuto bhayam astīti śaṅkāyāṃ duḥkham uttaram
d dharmasyāyatanaṃ tasmān māṃsasya parivarjanam
a ahiṃsā paramo dharmas tathāhiṃsā paraṃ tapaḥ
c ahiṃsā paramaṃ satyaṃ tato dharmaḥ pravartate
a na hi māṃsaṃ tṛṇāt kāṣṭhād upalād vāpi jāyate
c hatvā jantuṃ tato māṃsaṃ tasmād doṣo 'sya bhakṣaṇe
a svāhāsvadhāmṛtabhujo devāḥ satyārjavapriyāḥ
c kravyādān rākṣasān viddhi jihmānṛtaparāyaṇān
d rākṣasendrabhayān muktāḥ sarvabhūtaparāyaṇāḥ
a kāntāreṣv atha ghoreṣu durgeṣu gahaneṣu ca
c rātrāv ahani saṃdhyāsu catvareṣu sabhāsu ca
d udyateṣu ca śastreṣu mṛgavyālabhayeṣu ca
e amāṃsabhakṣaṇe rājan bhayam ante na gacchati
f śaraṇyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ viśvāsyaḥ sarvajantuṣu
f anudvegakaro loke na cāpy udvijate sadā
a yadi cet khādako na syān na tadā ghātako bhavet
c ghātakaḥ khādakārthāya taṃ ghātayati vai naraḥ
a abhakṣyam etad iti vā iti hiṃsā nivartate
c khādakārtham ato hiṃsā mṛgādīnāṃ pravartate
a yasmād grasati caivāyur hiṃsakānāṃ mahādyute
c tasmād vivarjayen māṃsaṃ ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
a trātāraṃ nādhigacchanti raudrāḥ prāṇivihiṃsakāḥ
c udvejanīyā bhūtānāṃ yathā vyālamṛgās tathā
a lobhād vā buddhimohād vā balavīryārtham eva ca
c saṃsargād vātha pāpānām adharmarucitā nṛṇām
a svamāṃsaṃ paramāṃsena yo vardhayitum icchati
c udvignavāse vasati yatratatrābhijāyate
a dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargyaṃ svastyayanaṃ mahat
c māṃsasyābhakṣaṇaṃ prāhur niyatāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
a idaṃ tu khalu kaunteya śrutam āsīt purā mayā
c mārkaṇḍeyasya vadato ye doṣā māṃsabhakṣaṇe
d bhīṣmaḥ
d mārkaṇḍeyena yac coktaṃ śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira mahābāho ye doṣā māṃsabhakṣaṇe
a yo hi khādati māṃsāni prāṇināṃ jīvitārthinām
c hatānāṃ vā mṛtānāṃ vā yathā hantā tathaiva saḥ
a dhanena krāyako hanti khādakaś copabhogataḥ
c ghātako vadhabandhābhyām ity eṣa trividho vadhaḥ
a akhādann anumodaṃś ca bhāvadoṣeṇa mānavaḥ
c yo 'numanyeta hantavyaṃ so 'pi doṣeṇa lipyate
a adhṛṣyaḥ sarvabhūtānām āyuṣmān nīrujaḥ sukhī
c bhavaty abhakṣayan māṃsaṃ dayāvān prāṇinām iha
a hiraṇyadānair godānair bhūmidānaiś ca sarvaśaḥ
c māṃsasyābhakṣaṇe dharmo viśiṣṭaḥ syād iti śrutiḥ
a aprokṣitaṃ vṛthāmāṃsaṃ vidhihīnaṃ na bhakṣayet
c bhakṣayan nirayaṃ yāti naro nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
a prokṣitābhyukṣitaṃ māṃsaṃ tathā brāhmaṇakāmyayā
c alpadoṣam iha jñeyaṃ viparīte tu lipyate
a khādakasya kṛte jantuṃ yo hanyāt puruṣādhamaḥ
c mahādoṣakaras tatra khādako na tu ghātakaḥ
a ijyāyajñaśrutikṛtair yo mārgair abudho janaḥ
c hanyāj jantuṃ māṃsagṛddhrī sa vai narakabhāṅ naraḥ
a bhakṣayitvā tu yo māṃsaṃ paścād api nivartate
c tasyāpi sumahān dharmo yaḥ pāpād vinivartate
a āhartā cānumantā ca viśastā krayavikrayī
c saṃskartā copabhoktā ca ghātakāḥ sarva eva te
a idam anyat tu vakṣyāmi pramāṇaṃ vidhinirmitam
c purāṇam ṛṣibhir juṣṭaṃ vedeṣu pariniścitam
a pravṛttilakṣaṇe dharme phalārthibhir abhidrute
c yathoktaṃ rājaśārdūla na tu tan mokṣakāṅkṣiṇām
a havir yat saṃskṛtaṃ mantraiḥ prokṣitābhyukṣitaṃ śuci
c vedoktena pramāṇena pitṝṇāṃ prakriyāsu ca
e ato 'nyathā vṛthāmāṃsam abhakṣyaṃ manur abravīt
a asvargyam ayaśasyaṃ ca rakṣovad bharatarṣabha
c vidhinā hi narāḥ pūrvaṃ māṃsaṃ rājann abhakṣayan
d vidhināpy avaidikeneti dāntānām iha niścayaḥ
a ya icchet puruṣo 'tyantam ātmānaṃ nirupadravam
c sa varjayeta māṃsāni prāṇinām iha sarvaśaḥ
a śrūyate hi purākalpe nṛṇāṃ vrīhimayaḥ paśuḥ
c yenāyajanta yajvānaḥ puṇyalokaparāyaṇāḥ
a ṛṣibhiḥ saṃśayaṃ pṛṣṭo vasuś cedipatiḥ purā
c abhakṣyam iti māṃsaṃ sa prāha bhakṣyam iti prabho
a ākāśān medinīṃ prāptas tataḥ sa pṛthivīpatiḥ
c etad eva punaś coktvā viveśa dharaṇītalam
a prajānāṃ hitakāmena tv agastyena mahātmanā
c āraṇyāḥ sarvadaivatyāḥ prokṣitās tapasā mṛgāḥ
d kṛto hi manaso yajñas tena devāś ca tarpitāḥ
a kriyā hy evaṃ na hīyante pitṛdaivatasaṃśritāḥ
c prīyante pitaraś caiva nyāyato māṃsatarpitāḥ
a idaṃ tu śṛṇu rājendra kīrtyamānaṃ mayānagha
c abhakṣaṇe sarvasukhaṃ māṃsasya manujādhipa
a yas tu varṣaśataṃ pūrṇaṃ tapas tapyet sudāruṇam
c yaś caikaṃ varjayen māṃsaṃ samam etan mataṃ mama
a kaumude tu viśeṣeṇa śuklapakṣe narādhipa
c varjayet sarvamāṃsāni dharmo hy atra vidhīyate
a caturo vārṣikān māsān yo māṃsaṃ parivarjayet
c catvāri bhadrāṇy āpnoti kīrtim āyur yaśo balam
a atha vā māsam apy ekaṃ sarvamāṃsāny abhakṣayan
c atītya sarvaduḥkhāni sukhī jīven nirāmayaḥ
a ye varjayanti māṃsāni māsaśaḥ pakṣaśo 'pi vā
c teṣāṃ hiṃsānivṛttānāṃ brahmaloko vidhīyate
a māṃsaṃ tu kaumudaṃ pakṣaṃ varjitaṃ pārtha rājabhiḥ
c sarvabhūtātmabhūtais tair vijñātārthaparāvaraiḥ
a nābhāgenāmbarīṣeṇa gayena ca mahātmanā
c āyuṣā cānaraṇyena dilīparaghupūrubhiḥ
a kārtavīryāniruddhābhyāṃ nahuṣeṇa yayātinā
c nṛgeṇa viṣvagaśvena tathaiva śaśabindunā
e yuvanāśvena ca tathā śibinauśīnareṇa ca
f mucukundena māndhātrā hariścandreṇa cābhibho
f satyaṃ vadata māsatyaṃ satyaṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
f hariścandraś carati vai divi satyena candravat
a śyenacitreṇa rājendra somakena vṛkeṇa ca
c raivatena rantidevena vasunā sṛñjayena ca
d etaiś cānyaiś ca rājendra kṛpeṇa bharatena ca
a duḥṣantena karūṣeṇa rāmālarkanalais tathā
b duḥṣantena ca rājendra kuśena ca lavena ca
b virūpākṣeṇa kurūṣeṇa nṛgālarkanarais tathā
c virūpāśvena niminā janakena ca dhīmatā
a silena pṛthunā caiva vīrasenena caiva ha
c ikṣvākuṇā śaṃbhunā ca śvetena sagareṇa ca
d ajena dhundhunā caiva tathaiva ca subāhunā
d haryaśvena ca rājendra kṣupeṇa bharatena ca
a etaiś cānyaiś ca rājendra purā māṃsaṃ na bhakṣitam
c śāradaṃ kaumudaṃ māsaṃ tatas te svargam āpnuvan
a brahmaloke ca tiṣṭhanti jvalamānāḥ śriyānvitāḥ
c upāsyamānā gandharvaiḥ strīsahasrasamanvitāḥ
a tad etad uttamaṃ dharmam ahiṃsālakṣaṇaṃ śubham
c ye caranti mahātmāno nākapṛṣṭhe vasanti te
a madhu māṃsaṃ ca ye nityaṃ varjayantīha dhārmikāḥ
c janmaprabhṛti madyaṃ ca sarve te munayaḥ smṛtāḥ
e viśiṣṭatāṃ jñātiṣu ca labhante nātra saṃśayaḥ
f imaṃ dharmam amāṃsādaṃ yaś carec chrāvayeta vā
f api cet sudurācāro na jātu nirayaṃ vrajet
f paṭhed vā ya idaṃ rājañ śṛṇuyād vāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
f amāṃsabhakṣaṇavidhiṃ pavitram ṛṣipūjitam
f vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyaḥ sarvakāmair mahīyate
f ahiṃsro dānaśīlaś ca madhumāṃsavivarjitaḥ
a āpannaś cāpado mucyed baddho mucyeta bandhanāt
c mucyet tathāturo rogād duḥkhān mucyeta duḥkhitaḥ
a tiryagyoniṃ na gaccheta rūpavāṃś ca bhaven naraḥ
c buddhimān vai kuruśreṣṭha prāpnuyāc ca mahad yaśaḥ
a etat te kathitaṃ rājan māṃsasya parivarjane
c pravṛttau ca nivṛttau ca vidhānam ṛṣinirmitam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ime vai mānavā loke bhṛśaṃ māṃsasya gṛddhinaḥ
c visṛjya bhakṣān vividhān yathā rakṣogaṇās tathā
a nāpūpān vividhākārāñ śākāni vividhāni ca
c ṣāḍavān rasayogāṃś ca tathecchanti yathāmiṣam
a tatra me buddhir atraiva visarge parimuhyate
c na manye rasataḥ kiṃ cin māṃsato 'stīha kiṃ cana
a tad icchāmi guṇāñ śrotuṃ māṃsasyābhakṣaṇe 'pi vā
c bhakṣaṇe caiva ye doṣās tāṃś caiva puruṣarṣabha
a sarvaṃ tattvena dharmajña yathāvad iha dharmataḥ
c kiṃ vā bhakṣyam abhakṣyaṃ vā sarvam etad vadasva me
d yathaitad yādṛśaṃ caitad guṇā ye cāsya varjane
d doṣā bhakṣayato ye ca tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi bhārata
c na māṃsāt param atrānyad rasato vidyate bhuvi
a kṣatakṣīṇābhitaptānāṃ grāmyadharmaratāś ca ye
c adhvanā karśitānāṃ ca na māṃsād vidyate param
a sadyo vardhayati prāṇān puṣṭim agryāṃ dadāti ca
b nāśo bhakṣaṇadoṣasya dānam eva satāṃ matam
b kṣudhitānāṃ dvijānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ caiva jīvanam
b dattvā bhavati pūtātmā śraddhayā lobhavarjitaḥ
b śikṣayanti na yācante darśayantaḥ svamūrtibhiḥ
b avastheyam adānasya mā bhūd evaṃ bhavān iti
b dānādyaiḥ suśucir māṃsaṃ punar naiva sa bhakṣayet
c na bhakṣo 'bhyadhikaḥ kaś cin māṃsād asti paraṃtapa
a vivarjane tu bahavo guṇāḥ kauravanandana
c ye bhavanti manuṣyāṇāṃ tān me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
a svamāṃsaṃ paramāṃsair yo vivardhayitum icchati
c nāsti kṣudrataras tasmān na nṛśaṃsataro naraḥ
a na hi prāṇāt priyataraṃ loke kiṃ cana vidyate
c tasmād dayāṃ naraḥ kuryād yathātmani tathā pare
a śukrāc ca tāta saṃbhūtir māṃsasyeha na saṃśayaḥ
c bhakṣaṇe tu mahān doṣo vadhena saha kalpate
a ahiṃsālakṣaṇo dharma iti vedavido viduḥ
c yad ahiṃsraṃ bhavet karma tat kuryād ātmavān naraḥ
a pitṛdaivatayajñeṣu prokṣitaṃ havir ucyate
c vidhinā vedadṛṣṭena tad bhuktveha na duṣyati
a yajñārthe paśavaḥ sṛṣṭā ity api śrūyate śrutiḥ
c ato 'nyathā pravṛttānāṃ rākṣaso vidhir ucyate
a kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu yo dṛṣṭo vidhis tam api me śṛṇu
c vīryeṇopārjitaṃ māṃsaṃ yathā khādan na duṣyati
a āraṇyāḥ sarvadaivatyāḥ prokṣitāḥ sarvaśo mṛgāḥ
c agastyena purā rājan mṛgayā yena pūjyate
d rakṣaṇārthāya bhūtānāṃ hiṃsrān hanyān mṛgān punaḥ
a nātmānam aparityajya mṛgayā nāma vidyate
c samatām upasaṃgamya rūpaṃ hanyān na vā nṛpa
a ato rājarṣayaḥ sarve mṛgayāṃ yānti bhārata
c lipyante na hi doṣeṇa na caitat pātakaṃ viduḥ
a na hi tatparamaṃ kiṃ cid iha loke paratra ca
c yat sarveṣv iha lokeṣu dayā kauravanandana
a na bhayaṃ vidyate jātu narasyeha dayāvataḥ
c dayāvatām ime lokāḥ pare cāpi tapasvinām
a abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo yo dadāti dayāparaḥ
c abhayaṃ tasya bhūtāni dadatīty anuśuśrumaḥ
a kṣataṃ ca skhalitaṃ caiva patitaṃ kliṣṭam āhatam
c sarvabhūtāni rakṣanti sameṣu viṣameṣu ca
a nainaṃ vyālamṛgā ghnanti na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
c mucyante bhayakāleṣu mokṣayanti ca ye parān
a prāṇadānāt paraṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
c na hy ātmanaḥ priyataraḥ kaś cid astīti niścitam
a aniṣṭaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ maraṇaṃ nāma bhārata
c mṛtyukāle hi bhūtānāṃ sadyo jāyati vepathuḥ
a jātijanmajarāduḥkhe nityaṃ saṃsārasāgare
c jantavaḥ parivartante maraṇād udvijanti ca
a garbhavāseṣu pacyante kṣārāmlakaṭukai rasaiḥ
c mūtraśleṣmapurīṣāṇāṃ sparśaiś ca bhṛśadāruṇaiḥ
a jātāś cāpy avaśās tatra bhidyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
c pāṭyamānāś ca dṛśyante vivaśā māṃsagṛddhinaḥ
a kumbhīpāke ca pacyante tāṃ tāṃ yonim upāgatāḥ
c ākramya māryamāṇāś ca bhrāmyante vai punaḥ punaḥ
a nātmano 'sti priyataraḥ pṛthivyām anusṛtya ha
c tasmāt prāṇiṣu sarveṣu dayāvān ātmavān bhavet
a sarvamāṃsāni yo rājan yāvajjīvaṃ na bhakṣayet
c svarge sa vipulaṃ sthānaṃ prāpnuyān nātra saṃśayaḥ
a ye bhakṣayanti māṃsāni bhūtānāṃ jīvitaiṣiṇām
c bhakṣyante te 'pi tair bhūtair iti me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
a māṃ sa bhakṣayate yasmād bhakṣayiṣye tam apy aham
c etan māṃsasya māṃsatvam ato budhyasva bhārata
a ghātako vadhyate nityaṃ tathā vadhyeta bandhakaḥ
c ākroṣṭākruśyate rājan dveṣṭā dveṣyatvam āpnute
a yena yena śarīreṇa yad yat karma karoti yaḥ
c tena tena śarīreṇa tat tat phalam upāśnute
a ahiṃsā paramo dharmas tathāhiṃsā paro damaḥ
c ahiṃsā paramaṃ dānam ahiṃsā paramaṃ tapaḥ
a ahiṃsā paramo yajñas tathāhiṃsā paraṃ balam
c ahiṃsā paramaṃ mitram ahiṃsā paramaṃ sukham
e ahiṃsā paramaṃ satyam ahiṃsā paramaṃ śrutam
a sarvayajñeṣu vā dānaṃ sarvatīrtheṣu cāplutam
c sarvadānaphalaṃ vāpi naitat tulyam ahiṃsayā
a ahiṃsrasya tapo 'kṣayyam ahiṃsro yajate sadā
c ahiṃsraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yathā mātā yathā pitā
d agastyena purā rājan māṃsabhakṣaṃ tu jāṅgale
a etat phalam ahiṃsāyā bhūyaś ca kurupuṃgava
c na hi śakyā guṇā vaktum iha varṣaśatair api
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a akāmāś ca sakāmāś ca hatā ye 'smin mahāhave
c kāṃ yoniṃ pratipannās te tan me brūhi pitāmaha
a duḥkhaṃ prāṇaparityāgaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ mahāmṛdhe
c jānāmi tattvaṃ dharmajña prāṇatyāgaṃ suduṣkaram
a samṛddhe vāsamṛddhe vā śubhe vā yadi vāśubhe
c kāraṇaṃ tatra me brūhi sarvajño hy asi me mataḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a samṛddhe vāsamṛddhe vā śubhe vā yadi vāśubhe
c saṃsāre 'smin samājātāḥ prāṇinaḥ pṛthivīpate
a niratā yena bhāvena tatra me śṛṇu kāraṇam
c samyak cāyam anupraśnas tvayoktaś ca yudhiṣṭhira
a atra te vartayiṣyāmi purāvṛttam idaṃ nṛpa
c dvaipāyanasya saṃvādaṃ kīṭasya ca yudhiṣṭhira
a brahmabhūtaś caran vipraḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ purā
c dadarśa kīṭaṃ dhāvantaṃ śīghraṃ śakaṭavartmani
a gatijñaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ rutajñaś ca śarīriṇām
c sarvajñaḥ sarvato dṛṣṭvā kīṭaṃ vacanam abravīt
a kīṭa saṃtrastarūpo 'si tvaritaś caiva lakṣyase
c kva dhāvasi tad ācakṣva kutas te bhayam āgatam
 kīṭa uvāca
a śakaṭasyāsya mahato ghoṣaṃ śrutvā bhayaṃ mama
c āgataṃ vai mahābuddhe svana eṣa hi dāruṇaḥ
e śrūyate na sa māṃ hanyād iti tasmād apākrame
a śvasatāṃ ca śṛṇomy evaṃ goputrāṇāṃ pracodyatām
c vahatāṃ sumahābhāraṃ saṃnikarṣe svanaṃ prabho
e nṛṇāṃ ca saṃvāhayatāṃ śrūyate vividhaḥ svanaḥ
a soḍhum asmadvidhenaiṣa na śakyaḥ kīṭayoninā
c tasmād apakramāmy eṣa bhayād asmāt sudāruṇāt
a duḥkhaṃ hi mṛtyur bhūtānāṃ jīvitaṃ ca sudurlabham
c ato bhītaḥ palāyāmi gaccheyaṃ nāsukhaṃ sukhāt
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktaḥ sa tu taṃ prāha kutaḥ kīṭa sukhaṃ tava
c maraṇaṃ te sukhaṃ manye tiryagyonau hi vartase
a śabdaṃ sparśaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ bhogāṃś coccāvacān bahūn
c nābhijānāsi kīṭa tvaṃ śreyo maraṇam eva te
 kīṭa uvāca
a sarvatra nirato jīva itīhāpi sukhaṃ mama
c cetayāmi mahāprājña tasmād icchāmi jīvitum
a ihāpi viṣayaḥ sarvo yathādehaṃ pravartitaḥ
c mānuṣās tiryagāś caiva pṛthagbhogā viśeṣataḥ
a aham āsaṃ manuṣyo vai śūdro bahudhanaḥ purā
c abrahmaṇyo nṛśaṃsaś ca kadaryo vṛddhijīvanaḥ
a vāktīkṣṇo nikṛtiprajño moṣṭā viśvasya sarvaśaḥ
c mithaḥkṛto 'panidhanaḥ parasvaharaṇe rataḥ
a bhṛtyātithijanaś cāpi gṛhe paryuṣito mayā
c mātsaryāt svādukāmena nṛśaṃsena bubhūṣatā
a devārthaṃ pitṛyajñārtham annaṃ śraddhākṛtaṃ mayā
c na dattam arthakāmena deyam annaṃ punāti ha
a guptaṃ śaraṇam āśritya bhayeṣu śaraṇāgatāḥ
c akasmān no bhayāt tyaktā na ca trātābhayaiṣiṇaḥ
d tyaktvākasmān niśāyāṃ ca na dattam abhayaṃ mayā
a dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ priyān dārān yānaṃ vāsas tathādbhutam
c śriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā manuṣyāṇām asūyāmi nirarthakam
a īrṣyuḥ parasukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā ātatāyy abubhūṣakaḥ
c trivargahantā cānyeṣām ātmakāmānuvartakaḥ
a nṛśaṃsaguṇabhūyiṣṭhaṃ purā karma kṛtaṃ mayā
b tenaiṣā kṛmitā prāptā bhayasya jananī sadā
c smṛtvā tad anutapye 'haṃ tyaktvā priyam ivātmajam
a śubhānām api jānāmi kṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalam
c mātā ca pūjitā vṛddhā brāhmaṇaś cārcito mayā
a sakṛj jātiguṇopetaḥ saṃgatyā gṛham āgataḥ
c atithiḥ pūjito brahmaṃs tena māṃ nājahāt smṛtiḥ
a karmaṇā tena caivāhaṃ sukhāśām iha lakṣaye
c tac chrotum aham icchāmi tvattaḥ śreyas tapodhana
 vyāsa uvāca
a śubhena karmaṇā yad vai tiryagyonau na muhyase
c mamaiva kīṭa tat karma yena tvaṃ na pramuhyase
a ahaṃ hi darśanād eva tārayāmi tapobalāt
c tapobalād dhi balavad balam anyan na vidyate
a jānāmi pāpaiḥ svakṛtair gataṃ tvāṃ kīṭa kīṭatām
c avāpsyasi paraṃ dharmaṃ dharmastho yadi manyase
a karma bhūmikṛtaṃ devā bhuñjate tiryagāś ca ye
c dharmād api manuṣyeṣu kāmo 'rthaś ca yathā guṇaiḥ
a vāgbuddhipāṇipādaiś cāpy upetasya vipaścitaḥ
c kiṃ hīyate manuṣyasya mandasyāpi hi jīvataḥ
a jīvan hi kurute pūjāṃ viprāgryaḥ śaśisūryayoḥ
c bruvann api kathāṃ puṇyāṃ tatra kīṭa tvam eṣyasi
a guṇabhūtāni bhūtāni tatra tvam upabhokṣyase
c tatra te 'haṃ vineṣyāmi brahmatvaṃ yatra cecchasi
a sa tatheti pratiśrutya kīṭo vartmany atiṣṭhata
b śakaṭavrajaś ca sumahān āgataś ca yadṛcchayā
b cakrākrameṇa bhinnaś ca kīṭaḥ prāṇān mumoca ha
b saṃbhūtaḥ kṣatriyakule prasādād amitaujasaḥ
c tam ṛṣiṃ draṣṭum agamat sarvāsv anyāsu yoniṣu
d dadarśa ca mahārāja saṃprāptaṃ rājaputratām
a śvāvidgodhāvarāhāṇāṃ tathaiva mṛgapakṣiṇām
c śvapākavaiśyaśūdrāṇāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca yoniṣu
d etāsv eva krameṇaiva yoniṣv āsa svakarmaṇā
a sa kīṭety evam ābhāṣya ṛṣiṇā satyavādinā
c pratismṛtyātha jagrāha pādau mūrdhnā kṛtāñjaliḥ
d paryāyeṇa tataḥ prāpya kṣātraṃ sthānam anuttamam
 kīṭa uvāca
a idaṃ tad atulaṃ sthānam īpsitaṃ daśabhir guṇaiḥ
c yad ahaṃ prāpya kīṭatvam āgato rājaputratām
a vahanti mām atibalāḥ kuñjarā hemamālinaḥ
c syandaneṣu ca kāmbojā yuktāḥ paramavājinaḥ
a uṣṭrāśvatarayuktāni yānāni ca vahanti mām
c sabāndhavaḥ sahāmātyaś cāśnāmi piśitaudanam
a gṛheṣu sunivāseṣu sukheṣu śayaneṣu ca
c parārdhyeṣu mahābhāga svapāmīha supūjitaḥ
a sarveṣv apararātreṣu sūtamāgadhabandinaḥ
c stuvanti māṃ yathā devaṃ mahendraṃ priyavādinaḥ
a prasādāt satyasaṃdhasya bhavato 'mitatejasaḥ
c yad ahaṃ kīṭatāṃ prāpya saṃprāpto rājaputratām
a namas te 'stu mahāprājña kiṃ karomi praśādhi mām
c tvattapobalanirdiṣṭam idaṃ hy adhigataṃ mayā
 vyāsa uvāca
a arcito 'haṃ tvayā rājan vāgbhir adya yadṛcchayā
c adya te kīṭatāṃ prāpya smṛtir jātājugupsitā
a na tu nāśo 'sti pāpasya yat tvayopacitaṃ purā
c śūdreṇārthapradhānena nṛśaṃsenātatāyinā
a mama te darśanaṃ prāptaṃ tac caiva sukṛtaṃ purā
c tiryagyonau sma jātena mama cāpy arcanāt tathā
a itas tvaṃ rājaputratvād brāhmaṇyaṃ samavāpsyasi
c gobrāhmaṇakṛte prāṇān hutvātmīyān raṇājire
a rājaputrasukhaṃ prāpya ṛtūṃś caivāptadakṣiṇān
c atha modiṣyase svarge brahmabhūto 'vyayaḥ sukhī
a tiryagyonyāḥ śūdratām abhyupaiti
śūdro vaiśyatvaṃ kṣatriyatvaṃ ca vaiśyaḥ
c vṛttaślāghī kṣatriyo brāhmaṇatvaṃ
svargaṃ puṇyaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ sādhuvṛttaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a kṣatradharmam anuprāptaḥ smarann eva sa vīryavān
c tyaktvā sa kīṭatāṃ rājaṃś cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ
a tasya dharmārthaviduṣo dṛṣṭvā tad vipulaṃ tapaḥ
c ājagāma dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tadā
 vyāsa uvāca
a kṣātraṃ caiva vrataṃ kīṭa bhūtānāṃ paripālanam
c kṣātraṃ caiva vrataṃ dhyāyaṃs tato vipratvam eṣyasi
a pāhi sarvāḥ prajāḥ samyak śubhāśubhavid ātmavān
c śubhaiḥ saṃvibhajan kāmair aśubhānāṃ ca pāvanaiḥ
a ātmavān bhava suprītaḥ svadharmacaraṇe rataḥ
c kṣātrīṃ tanuṃ samutsṛjya tato vipratvam eṣyasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a so 'thāraṇyam abhipretya punar eva yudhiṣṭhira
c maharṣer vacanaṃ śrutvā prajā dharmeṇa pālya ca
a acireṇaiva kālena kīṭaḥ pārthivasattama
c prajāpālanadharmeṇa pretya vipratvam āgataḥ
a tatas taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā punar eva mahāyaśāḥ
c ājagāma mahāprājñaḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tadā
 vyāsa uvāca
a bho bho viprarṣabha śrīman mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ kathaṃ cana
b pālanāc ca viśiṣṭānāṃ suyuddhamaraṇena ca
b śiṣṭasaṃsevanāc caiva sa gatiṃ paramāṃ gataḥ
b tataḥ sa pararāṣṭreṇa rājānaṃ pīḍitāḥ prajāḥ
b hṛte ca taddhane tāta yuddhāya samupāgataḥ
b hatvā taṃ nihato yuddhe tasmād vipratvam āgataḥ
b ājagāma tataḥ prājñaḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tadā
b pārāśaryaṃ mahāprājñam upayāntaṃ dayāparam
b nityaṃ prasannavadanaṃ nabhaḥsnigdhāmbudaprabham
b ajñānatimirādityaṃ nityaṃ vyāsaṃ namāmy aham
b ity uktvā patitaṃ padbhyāṃ prītyā prāha mahāmuniḥ
b brāhmaṇān pūjayasveha japasatyaparāyaṇaḥ
b kramād brahma prāpsyasi tvaṃ viṣṇudhyānena nirmalam
c śubhakṛc chubhayonīṣu pāpakṛt pāpayoniṣu
e upapadyati dharmajña yathādharmaṃ yathāgamam
a tasmān mṛtyubhayāt kīṭa mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ kathaṃ cana
c dharmalopād bhayaṃ te syāt tasmād dharmaṃ carottamam
 kīṭa uvāca
a sukhāt sukhataraṃ prāpto bhagavaṃs tvatkṛte hy aham
b ity uktvā samanujñātas tathā cakre dvijottamaḥ
c dharmamūlāṃ śriyaṃ prāpya pāpmā naṣṭa ihādya me
 bhīṣma uvāca
a bhagavadvacanāt kīṭo brāhmaṇyaṃ prāpya durlabham
c akarot pṛthivīṃ rājan yajñayūpaśatāṅkitām
e tataḥ sālokyam agamad brahmaṇo brahmavittamaḥ
a avāpa ca paraṃ kīṭaḥ pārtha brahma sanātanam
c svakarmaphalanirvṛttaṃ vyāsasya vacanāt tadā
d śrutvaitad rājaśārdūla satkarmaparamo bhava
a te 'pi yasmāt svabhāvena hatāḥ kṣatriyapuṃgavāḥ
c saṃprāptās te gatiṃ puṇyāṃ tasmān mā śoca putraka
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a vidyā tapaś ca dānaṃ ca kim eteṣāṃ viśiṣyate
c pṛcchāmi tvā satāṃ śreṣṭha tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c maitreyasya ca saṃvādaṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanasya ca
a kṛṣṇadvaipāyano rājann ajñātacaritaṃ caran
c vārāṇasyām upātiṣṭhan maitreyaṃ svairiṇīkule
a tam upasthitam āsīnaṃ jñātvā sa munisattamam
c arcitvā bhojayām āsa maitreyo 'śanam uttamam
a tad annam uttamaṃ bhuktvā guṇavat sārvakāmikam
c pratiṣṭhamāno 'smayata prītaḥ kṛṣṇo mahāmanāḥ
a tam utsmayantaṃ saṃprekṣya maitreyaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt
c kāraṇaṃ brūhi dharmātman yo 'smayiṣṭhāḥ kutaś ca te
e tapasvino dhṛtimataḥ pramodaḥ samupāgataḥ
a etat pṛcchāmi te vidvann abhivādya praṇamya ca
c ātmanaś ca tapobhāgyaṃ mahābhāgyaṃ tathaiva ca
d tapobhāgyān mahābhāga sukhabhāgyāt tathaiva ca
a pṛthag ācaratas tāta pṛthag ātmani cātmanoḥ
c alpāntaram ahaṃ manye viśiṣṭam api vā tvayā
 vyāsa uvāca
a aticchedātivādābhyāṃ smayo 'yaṃ samupāgataḥ
c asatyaṃ vedavacanaṃ kasmād vedo 'nṛtaṃ vadet

e idānīṃ caiva naḥ kṛtyaṃ purastāc ca paraṃ smṛtam

a yānīmāny uttamānīha vedoktāni praśaṃsasi

a dānakṛdbhiḥ kṛtaḥ panthā yena yānti manīṣiṇaḥ
c te hi prāṇasya dātāras teṣu dharmaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
a yathā vedāḥ svadhītāś ca yathā cendriyasaṃyamaḥ
c sarvatyāgo yathā ceha tathā dānam anuttamam

a sukhād eva paraṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhād anyat paraṃ sukham
c dṛśyate hi mahāprājña niyataṃ vai svabhāvataḥ
a trividhānīha vṛttāni narasyāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
c puṇyam anyat pāpam anyan na puṇyaṃ na ca pāpakam
a na vṛttaṃ manyate 'nyasya manyate 'nyasya pāpakam

d yajñadānatapaḥśīlā narā vai puṇyakarmiṇaḥ
d ye 'bhidruhyanti bhūtāni te vai pāpakṛto janāḥ
d dravyāṇy ādadate caiva duḥkhaṃ yānti patanti ca
d tato 'nyat karma yat kiṃ cin na puṇyaṃ na ca pātakam
d nityaṃ cākṛpaṇo bhuṅkte svajanair dehi yācitaḥ
d bhāgyakṣayeṇa kṣīyante nopabhogena saṃcayāḥ
a ramasvaidhasva modasva dehi caiva yajasva ca

d yas tārayati vai vidvān pitṝn devān samādṛtān
a yad eva dadataḥ puṇyaṃ tad eva pratigṛhṇataḥ
c na hy ekacakraṃ varteta ity evam ṛṣayo viduḥ
a yatra vai brāhmaṇāḥ santi śrutavṛttopasaṃhitāḥ

a tair hi sadbhiḥ kṛtaḥ panthāś cetayāno na muhyate

 bhīṣma uvāca
a evam uktaḥ sa bhagavān maitreyaṃ pratyabhāṣata

 bhīṣma uvāca

c mahat prārthayase nūnaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
a tapaḥpraṇihitātmānaṃ manye tvāraṇyakāṅkṣiṇam
c bandhuvargo na gṛhṇāti tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
d iṣṭabhāryasya te nūnaṃ prātiveśyo mahādhanaḥ
d yuvā sulalitaḥ kāmī tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
d sudurvinītaḥ putro vā jāmātā vā pramārjakaḥ
d dārā vā pratikūlās te tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
d bhrātaro 'tīva viṣamāḥ pitā vā kṣutkṣato mṛtaḥ
d mātā jyeṣṭho gurur vāpi tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
d brāhmaṇo vā hato gaur vā brahmasvaṃ vā hṛtaṃ purā
d devasvaṃ vādhikaṃ kāle tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
d hṛtadāro 'tha vṛddho vā loke dviṣṭo 'tha vā naraiḥ
d avijñātena vā vṛddhas tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
d vārdhakyārthaṃ dhanaṃ dṛṣṭvā svā śrīr vāpi parair hṛtā
d vṛttir vā durjanāpekṣā tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
d saṃpatkāle na te dharmaḥ kṣīṇas tāta suhṛdbruvaiḥ
d asaṃnyāsam atas tatra tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
a nūnam arthavatāṃ madhye tava vākyam anuttamam
c na bhāti kāle 'bhihitaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
a dṛḍhapūrvaśrutaṃ mūrkhaṃ kupitaṃ hṛdayapriyam
c anunetuṃ na śaknoṣi tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
a nūnam āsaṃjayitvā te kṛtye kasmiṃś cid īpsite
c kaś cid arthayate 'tyarthaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
d parokṣavādibhir mithyā doṣas te saṃpradarśitaḥ
a nūnaṃ tvā svaguṇāpekṣaṃ pūjayānaṃ suhṛd dhruvam
c mayārtha iti jānāti tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
a antargatam abhiprāyaṃ na nūnaṃ lajjayecchasi
c vivaktuṃ prāptiśaithilyāt tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
a nānābuddhirucīṃl loke manuṣyān nūnam icchasi
c grahītuṃ svaguṇaiḥ sarvāṃs tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
a avidvān bhīrur alpārtho vidyāvikramadānajam
b alam arthayase hīnāṃs tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
c yaśaḥ prārthayase nūnaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
a cirābhilaṣitaṃ kiṃ cit phalam aprāptam eva te
c kṛtam anyair apahṛtaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
a nūnam ātmakṛtaṃ doṣam apaśyan kiṃ cid ātmani
c akāraṇe 'bhiśasto 'si tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
a suhṛdām apramattānām apramokṣyārthahānijam
c duḥkham arthaguṇair hīnaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
a sādhūn gṛhasthān dṛṣṭvā ca tathāsādhūn vanecarān
c muktāṃś cāvasathe saktāṃs tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
a dharmyam arthaṃ ca kāle ca deśe cābhihitaṃ vacaḥ
c na pratiṣṭhati te nūnaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
a dattān akuśalair arthān manīṣī saṃjijīviṣuḥ
c prāpya vartayase nūnaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
a pāpān vivardhato dṛṣṭvā kalyāṇāṃś cāvasīdataḥ
c dhruvaṃ mṛgayase yogyaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
a parasparaviruddhānāṃ priyaṃ nūnaṃ cikīrṣasi
c suhṛdām avirodhena tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
a śrotriyāṃś ca vikarmasthān prājñāṃś cāpy ajitendriyān
c manye 'nudhyāyasi janāṃs tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
a evaṃ saṃpūjitaṃ rakṣo vipraṃ taṃ pratyapūjayat
c sakhāyam akaroc cainaṃ saṃyojyārthair mumoca ha
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d janma mānuṣyakaṃ prāpya karmakṣetraṃ sudurlabham
d śreyorthinā daridreṇa kiṃ kartavyaṃ pitāmaha
d dānānām uttamaṃ yac ca deyaṃ yac ca yathā yathā

d evaṃ pṛṣṭo narendreṇa pāṇḍavena yaśasvinā
d bhīṣmaḥ
d dharmāṇāṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ bhīṣmaḥ provāca pārthivam
d śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājan dharmaguhyāni bhārata

d devaguhyam idaṃ rājan yamenākliṣṭakarmaṇā

d yena yaḥ prīyate devaḥ prīyante pitaras tathā
d ṛṣayaḥ pramathāḥ śrīś ca citragupto diśāṃ gajāḥ

d mahādānaphalaṃ caiva sarvayajñaphalaṃ tathā
d yaś caitad evaṃ jānīyāj jñātvā vā kurute 'nagha
d sa doṣo doṣavāṃś ceha tair guṇaiḥ saha yujyate
d daśasūnāsamaṃ cakraṃ daśacakrasamo dhvajaḥ
d daśadhvajasamā veśyā daśaveśyāsamo nṛpaḥ

d trivargasahitaṃ śāstraṃ pavitraṃ puṇyalakṣaṇam
d dharmavyākaraṇaṃ puṇyaṃ rahasyaśravaṇaṃ mahat
d śrotavyaṃ dharmasaṃyuktaṃ vihitaṃ tridaśaiḥ svayam
d pitṝṇāṃ yatra guhyāni procyante śrāddhakarmaṇi
d devatānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ rahasyaṃ kathyate 'khilam
d ṛṣidharmaḥ smṛto yatra sarahasyo mahāphalaḥ
d mahāyajñaphalaṃ caiva sarvadānaphalaṃ tathā
d ye paṭhanti sadā martyā yeṣāṃ caivopatiṣṭhati
d śrutvā ca phalam ācaṣṭe svayaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
d gavāṃ phalaṃ tīrthaphalaṃ yajñānāṃ caiva yat phalam
d etat phalam avāpnoti yo naro 'tithipūjakaḥ
d śrotāraḥ śraddadhānāś ca yeṣāṃ śuddhaṃ ca mānasam
d teṣāṃ vyaktaṃ jitā lokāḥ śraddadhānena sādhunā
d mucyate kilbiṣāc caiva na sa pāpena lipyate
d dharmaṃ ca labhate nityaṃ pretyalokagato naraḥ
d kasya cit tv atha kālasya devadūto yadṛcchayā
d sthito hy antarhito bhūtvā paryabhāṣata vāsavam
d yau tau kāmaguṇopetāv aśvinau bhiṣajāṃ varau
d ājñayāhaṃ tayoḥ prāptaḥ sanarān pitṛdevatān
d kasmād dhi maithunaṃ śrāddhe dātur bhoktuś ca varjitam
d kimarthaṃ ca trayaḥ piṇḍāḥ pravibhaktāḥ pṛthak pṛthak
d prathamaḥ kasya dātavyo madhyamaḥ kva ca gacchati
d uttaraś ca smṛtaḥ kasya etad icchāmi veditum
d śraddadhānena dūtena bhāṣitaṃ dharmasaṃhitam
d pitaraḥ
d pūrvasthās tridaśāḥ sarve pitaraḥ pūjya khecaram
d svāgataṃ te 'stu bhadraṃ te śrūyatāṃ khecarottama
d gūḍhārthaḥ paramaḥ praśno bhavatā samudīritaḥ
d śrāddhaṃ dattvā ca bhuktvā ca puruṣo yaḥ striyaṃ vrajet
d pitaras tasya taṃ māsaṃ tasmin retasi śerate
d pravibhāgaṃ tu piṇḍānāṃ pravakṣyāmy anupūrvaśaḥ
d piṇḍo hy adhastād gacchaṃs tu apa āviśya bhāvayet
d piṇḍaṃ tu madhyamaṃ tatra patnī tv ekā samaśnute
d piṇḍas tṛtīyo yas teṣāṃ taṃ dadyāj jātavedasi
d eṣa śrāddhavidhiḥ prokto yathā dharmo na lupyate
d pitaras tasya tuṣyanti prahṛṣṭamanasaḥ sadā
d devadūtaḥ
d prajā vivardhate cāsya akṣayaṃ copatiṣṭhati
d ānupūrvyeṇa piṇḍānāṃ pravibhāgaḥ pṛthak pṛthak
d pitṝṇāṃ triṣu sarveṣāṃ niruktaṃ kathitaṃ tvayā
d ekaḥ samuddhṛtaḥ piṇḍo hy adhastāt kasya gacchati
d kaṃ vā prīṇayate devaṃ kathaṃ tārayate pitṝn
d madhyamaṃ tu tadā patnī bhuṅkte 'nujñātam eva hi
d kimarthaṃ pitaras tasya kavyam eva ca bhuñjate
d atra yas tv antimaḥ piṇḍo gacchate jātavedasam
d bhavate kā gatis tasya kaṃ vā samanugacchati
d etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ piṇḍeṣu triṣu yā gatiḥ
d pitaraḥ
d phalaṃ vṛttiṃ ca mārgaṃ ca yaś cainaṃ pratipadyate
d sumahān eṣa praśno vai yas tvayā samudīritaḥ
d rahasyam adbhutaṃ cāpi pṛṣṭāḥ sma gaganecara
d etad eva praśaṃsanti devāś ca munayas tathā
d te 'py evaṃ nābhijānanti pitṛkāryaviniścayam
d varjayitvā mahātmānaṃ cirajīvinam uttamam
d pitṛbhaktas tu yo vipro varalabdho mahāyaśāḥ
d trayāṇām api piṇḍānāṃ śrutvā bhagavato gatim
d devadūtena yaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ śrāddhasya vidhiniścayaḥ
d gatis trayāṇāṃ piṇḍānāṃ śṛṇuṣvāvahito mama
d apo gacchati yo hy atra śaśinaṃ hy eṣa prīṇayet
d śaśī prīṇayate devān pitṝṃś caiva mahāmate
d bhuṅkte tu patnī yaṃ caiṣām anujñātā tu madhyamam
d putrakāmāya putraṃ tu prayacchanti pitāmahāḥ
d havyavāhe tu yaḥ piṇḍo dīyate tan nibodha me
d pitaras tena tṛpyanti prītāḥ kāmān diśanti ca
d etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ triṣu piṇḍeṣu yā gatiḥ
d ṛtvig yo yajamānasya pitṛtvam anugacchati

d śucinā tu sadā śrāddhaṃ bhoktavyaṃ khecarottama
d ye mayā kathitā doṣās te tathā syur na cānyathā
d tasmāt snātaḥ śuciḥ kṣāntaḥ śrāddhaṃ bhuñjīta vai dvijaḥ
d prajā vivardhate cāsya yaś caivaṃ saṃprayacchati
d tato vidyutprabho nāma ṛṣir āha mahātapāḥ

d tiryagyonigatān sattvān martyā hiṃsanti mohitāḥ

d kilbiṣaṃ subahu prāptāḥ kiṃ svid eṣāṃ pratikriyā

d śakraḥ
d pitaraś ca mahābhāgāḥ pūjayanti sma taṃ munim

d tato vidyutprabho vākyam abhyabhāṣata vāsavam

d śrūyatāṃ cāparaṃ guhyaṃ rahasyam ṛṣicintitam

d rudreṇa saha deveśa tan nibodha śacīpate

d bṛhaspatiḥ
d sarahasyāś ca ye doṣās tān yathāvad udīraya
d pratimehanti ye sūryam anilaṃ dviṣate ca ye
d havyavāhe pradīpte ca samidhaṃ ye na juhvati
d bālavatsāṃ ca ye dhenuṃ duhanti kṣīrakāraṇāt
d teṣāṃ doṣān pravakṣyāmi tān nibodha śacīpate
d bhānumān anilaś caiva havyavāhaś ca vāsava
d lokānāṃ mātaraś caiva gāvaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā

d sarve bhavantaḥ śṛṇvantu ekaikaṃ dharmaniścayam

d striyaḥ sarvāś ca durvṛttāḥ pratimehanti yā ravim
d aniladveṣiṇaḥ śakra garbhasthā cyavate prajā
d havyavāhasya dīptasya samidhaṃ ye na juhvati

d kṣīraṃ tu bālavatsānāṃ ye pibantīha mānavāḥ

d prajākṣayeṇa yujyante kulavaṃśakṣayeṇa ca

d bhūtikāmena martyena satyam etad bravīmi te

d pitaraḥ
d etad icchāmahe śrotuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ

d śrūyatāṃ yena tuṣyāmo martyānāṃ sādhukarmaṇām

d pitaraḥ
d nīlaṣaṇḍasya lāṅgūlaṃ toyam abhyuddhared yadi

d tamorūpaṃ na tasyāsti dīpakaṃ yaḥ prayacchati
d amāvāsyāṃ tu ye martyāḥ prayacchanti tilodakam

d bhīṣmaḥ
d vidhiḥ pātraṃ phalaṃ caiva yathāvad anukīrtitam
d kena te ca bhavet prītiḥ kathaṃ tuṣṭiṃ tu gacchasi
d iti pṛṣṭaḥ surendreṇa provāca harir avyayaḥ
d brāhmaṇānāṃ parīvādo mama vidveṣaṇaṃ mahat
d brāhmaṇaiḥ pūjitair nityaṃ pūjito 'haṃ na saṃśayaḥ
d nityābhivādyā viprendrā bhuktvā pādau tathātmanaḥ
d teṣāṃ tuṣyāmi martyānāṃ yaś cakre ca baliṃ haret
d vāmanaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā varāhaṃ ca jalotthitam
d uddhṛtāṃ dharaṇīṃ caiva mūrdhnā dhārayate tu yaḥ
d na teṣām aśubhaṃ kiṃ cit kalmaṣaṃ copapadyate
d aśvatthaṃ rocanāṃ gāṃ ca pūjayed yo naraḥ sadā
d pūjitaṃ ca jagat tena sadevāsuramānuṣam
d tena rūpeṇa teṣāṃ ca pūjāṃ gṛhṇāmi tattvataḥ
d pūjā mamaiṣā nāsty anyā yāval lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
d anyathā hi vṛthā martyāḥ pūjayanty alpabuddhayaḥ
d indraḥ
d nāhaṃ tat pratigṛhṇāmi na sā tuṣṭikarī mama
d cakraṃ pādau varāhaṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ cāpi vāmanam
d uddhṛtāṃ dharaṇīṃ caiva kimarthaṃ tvaṃ praśaṃsasi
d bhavān sṛjati bhūtāni bhavān saṃharati prajāḥ
d bhīṣmaḥ
d prakṛtiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ samartyānāṃ sanātanī
d saṃprahasya tato viṣṇur idaṃ vacanam abravīt
d cakreṇa nihatā daityāḥ padbhyāṃ krāntā vasuṃdharā
d vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthāya uddhṛtā ca vasuṃdharā
d vāmanaṃ rūpam āsthāya jito rājā mayā baliḥ
d parituṣṭo bhavāmy evaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ mahātmanām
d tan māṃ ye pūjayiṣyanti nāsti teṣāṃ parābhavaḥ
d api vā brāhmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā brahmacāriṇam āgatam
d brāhmaṇāyāhutiṃ dattvā amṛtaṃ tasya bhojanam
d aindrīṃ saṃdhyām upāsitvā ādityābhimukhaḥ sthitaḥ
d sarvatīrtheṣu sa snāto mucyate sarvakilbiṣaiḥ
d etad vaḥ kathitaṃ guhyam akhilena tapodhanāḥ
d baladevaḥ
d saṃśayaṃ pṛcchamānānāṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmy aham
d śrūyatāṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ sukhāvaham
d ajānanto yad abudhāḥ kliśyante bhūtapīḍitāḥ
d kalya utthāya yo martyaḥ spṛśed gāṃ vai ghṛtaṃ dadhi
d sarṣapaṃ ca priyaṅguṃ ca kalmaṣāt pratimucyate
d bhūtāni caiva sarvāṇi agrataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'pi vā
d ucchiṣṭaṃ vāpi cchidreṣu varjayanti tapodhanāḥ
d devāḥ
d pragṛhyaudumbaraṃ pātraṃ toyapūrṇam udaṅmukhaḥ
d upavāsaṃ tu gṛhṇīyād yad vā saṃkalpayed vratam
d devatās tasya tuṣyanti kāmikaṃ cāpi sidhyati
d anyathā hi vṛthā martyāḥ kurvate svalpabuddhayaḥ
d upavāse balau cāpi tāmrapātraṃ viśiṣyate
d balir bhikṣā tathārghyaṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ ca tilodakam
d tāmrapātreṇa dātavyam anyathālpaphalaṃ bhavet
d guhyam etat samuddiṣṭaṃ yathā tuṣyanti devatāḥ
d dharmaḥ
d rājapauruṣike vipre ghāṇṭike paricārake
d gorakṣake vāṇijake tathā kārukuśīlave
d mitradruhy anadhīyāne yaś ca syād vṛṣalīpatiḥ
d eteṣu daivaṃ pitryaṃ vā na deyaṃ syāt kathaṃ cana
d piṇḍadās tasya hīyante na ca prīṇāti vai pitṝn
d atithir yasya bhagnāśo gṛhāt pratinivartate
d pitaras tasya devāś ca agnayaś ca tathaiva hi
d nirāśāḥ pratigacchanti atither apratigrahāt
d strīghnair goghnaiḥ kṛtaghnaiś ca brahmaghnair gurutalpagaiḥ
d agniḥ
d tulyadoṣo bhavaty ebhir yasyātithir anarcitaḥ
d pādam udyamya yo martyaḥ spṛśed gāś ca sudurmatiḥ
d brāhmaṇaṃ vā mahābhāgaṃ dīpyamānaṃ tathānalam
d tasya doṣān pravakṣyāmi tac chṛṇudhvaṃ samāhitāḥ
d divaṃ spṛśaty aśabdo 'sya trasyanti pitaraś ca vai
d vaimanasyaṃ ca devānāṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati puṣkalam
d pāvakaś ca mahātejā havyaṃ na pratigṛhṇati
d ājanmanāṃ śataṃ caiva narake pacyate tu saḥ
d niṣkṛtiṃ ca na tasyāpi anumanyanti karhi cit
d tasmād gāvo na pādena spraṣṭavyā vai kadā cana
d brāhmaṇaś ca mahātejā dīpyamānas tathānalaḥ
d śraddadhānena martyena ātmano hitam icchatā
d viśvāmitraḥ
d ete doṣā mayā proktās triṣu yaḥ pādam utsṛjet
d śrūyatāṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ rahasyaṃ dharmasaṃhitam
d paramānnena yo dadyāt pitṝṇām aupahārikam
d gajacchāyāyāṃ pūrvasyāṃ kutupe dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ
d yadā bhādrapade māsi bhavate bahule maghā
d śrūyatāṃ tasya dānasya yādṛśo guṇavistaraḥ
d kṛtaṃ tena mahac chrāddhaṃ varṣāṇīha trayodaśa
d gāvaḥ
d bahule samaṅge hy akutobhaye ca
d kṣeme ca saṃkhyeva hi bhūyasī ca
d yathā purā brahmapure savatsā
d śatakrator vajradharasya yajñe
d bhūyaś ca yā viṣṇupade sthitā yā
d vibhāvasoś cāpi pathe sthitā yā
d devāś ca sarve saha nāradena
d prakurvate sarvasaheti nāma
d mantreṇaitenābhivandeta yo vai
d vimucyate pāpakṛtena karmaṇā
d lokān avāpnoti puraṃdarasya
d gavāṃ phalaṃ candramaso dyutiṃ ca
d etaṃ hi mantraṃ tridaśābhijuṣṭaṃ
d paṭheta yaḥ parvasu goṣṭhamadhye
d na tasya pāpaṃ na bhayaṃ na śokaḥ
d bhīṣmaḥ
d sahasranetrasya ca yāti lokam
d atha sapta mahābhāgā ṛṣayo lokaviśrutāḥ
d vasiṣṭhapramukhāḥ sarve brahmāṇaṃ padmasaṃbhavam
d pradakṣiṇam abhikramya sarve prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥ
d uvāca vacanaṃ teṣāṃ vasiṣṭho brahmavittamaḥ
d sarvaprāṇihitaṃ praśnaṃ brahmakṣetre viśeṣataḥ
d dravyahīnāḥ kathaṃ martyā daridrāḥ sādhuvṛttayaḥ
d prāpnuvantīha yajñasya phalaṃ keneha karmaṇā
d etac chrutvā vacas teṣāṃ brahmā vacanam abravīt
d aho praśno mahābhāgā gūḍhārthaḥ paramaḥ śubhaḥ
d sūkṣmaḥ śreyāṃś ca martyānāṃ bhavadbhiḥ samudāhṛtaḥ
d śrūyatāṃ sarvam ākhyāsye nikhilena tapodhanāḥ
d yathā yajñaphalaṃ martyo labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ
d pauṣamāsasya śukle vai yadā yujyeta rohiṇī
d tena nakṣatrayogena ākāśaśayano bhavet
d ekavastraḥ śuciḥ snātaḥ śraddadhānaḥ samāhitaḥ
d somasya raśmayaḥ pītvā mahāyajñaphalaṃ labhet
d etad vaḥ paramaṃ guhyaṃ kathitaṃ dvijasattamāḥ
d vibhāvasuḥ
d yan māṃ bhavantaḥ pṛcchanti sūkṣmatattvārthadarśinaḥ
d salilasyāñjaliṃ pūrṇam akṣatāś ca ghṛtottarāḥ
d somasyottiṣṭhamānasya taj jalaṃ cākṣatāṃś ca tān
d sthito hy abhimukho martyaḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ baliṃ haret
d agnikāryaṃ kṛtaṃ tena hutāś cāsyāgnayas trayaḥ
d vanaspatiṃ ca yo hanyād amāvāsyām abuddhimān
d api hy ekena patreṇa lipyate brahmahatyayā
d dantakāṣṭhaṃ tu yaḥ khāded amāvāsyām abuddhimān
d hiṃsitaś candramās tena pitaraś codvijanti ca
d havyaṃ na tasya devāś ca pratigṛhṇanti parvasu
d śrīḥ
d kupyante pitaraś cāsya kule vaṃśo 'sya hīyate
d prakīrṇaṃ bhājanaṃ yatra pānabhāṇḍam athāsanam
d yoṣitaś caiva hanyante kaśmalopahate gṛhe
d devatāḥ pitaraś caiva utsave parvaṇīṣu vā
d nirāśāḥ pratigacchanti kaśmalopahatād gṛhāt
d aṅgirāḥ
d yas tu saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇaṃ dadyād dīpaṃ karañjake
d gārgyaḥ
d suvarcalāmūlahastaḥ prajā tasya vivardhate
d ātithyaṃ satataṃ kuryād dīpaṃ dadyāt pratiśraye
d varjayāno divāsvapnaṃ na ca māṃsāni bhakṣayet
d gobrāhmaṇaṃ na hiṃsyāc ca puṣkarāṇi ca kīrtayet
d eṣa śreṣṭhatamo dharmaḥ sarahasyo mahāphalaḥ
d api kratuśatair iṣṭvā kṣayaṃ gacchati tad dhaviḥ
d na tu kṣīyanti te dharmāḥ śraddadhānaiḥ prayojitāḥ
d idaṃ ca paramaṃ guhyaṃ sarahasyaṃ nibodhata
d śrāddhakalpe ca daive ca tairthike parvaṇīṣu ca
d rajasvalā ca yā nārī śvitrikāputrikā ca yā
d etābhiś cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭaṃ havir nāśnanti devatāḥ
d pitaraś ca na tuṣyanti varṣāṇy asya trayodaśa
d śuklavāsāḥ śucir bhūtvā brāhmaṇān svasti vācayet
d dhaumyaḥ
d kīrtayed bhārataṃ caiva tathā syād akṣayaṃ haviḥ
d bhinnabhāṇḍaṃ ca khaṭvāṃ ca kukkuṭaṃ śunakaṃ tathā
d apraśastāni sarvāṇi yaś ca vṛkṣo gṛheruhaḥ
d bhinnabhāṇḍe kaliṃ prāhuḥ khaṭvāyāṃ tu dhanakṣayaḥ
d kukkuṭe śunake caiva havir nāśnanti devatāḥ
d vṛkṣamūle dhruvaṃ sattvaṃ tasmād vṛkṣaṃ na ropayet
d jamadagniḥ
d yo yajed aśvamedhena vājapeyaśatena ha
d avākśirā vā lambeta satraṃ vā sphītam āharet
d na cāsya hṛdayaṃ śuddhaṃ narakaṃ sa dhruvaṃ vrajet
d tulyaṃ yajñaś ca satyaṃ ca hṛdayasya ca śuddhatā
d śuddhena manasā dattvā saktuprasthaṃ dvijātaye
d vāyuḥ
d brahmalokam anuprāptaḥ paryāptaṃ tannidarśanam
d kiṃ cid dharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi mānuṣāṇāṃ sukhāvaham
d sarahasyāś ca ye doṣās tāñ śṛṇudhvaṃ samāhitāḥ
d agnikāryaṃ ca kartavyaṃ paramānnena bhojanam
d dīpakaś cāpi kartavyaḥ pitṝṇāṃ satilodakaḥ
d etena vidhinā martyaḥ śraddadhānaḥ samāhitaḥ
d caturo vārṣikān māsān yo dadāti tilodakam
d bhojanaṃ ca yathāśaktyā brāhmaṇe vedapārage
d paśubandhaśatasyeha phalaṃ prāpnoti puṣkalam
d idaṃ caivāparaṃ guhyam apraśastaṃ nibodhata
d agnes tu vṛṣalo netā havir mūḍhāś ca yoṣitaḥ
d manyate dharma eveti sa cādharmeṇa lipyate
d agnayas tasya kupyanti śūdrayoniṃ sa gacchati
d pitaraś ca na tuṣyanti saha devair viśeṣataḥ
d prāyaścittaṃ tu yat tatra bruvatas tan nibodha me
d yat kṛtvā tu naraḥ samyak sukhī bhavati vijvaraḥ
d gavāṃ mūtrapurīṣeṇa payasā ca ghṛtena ca
d agnikāryaṃ tryahaṃ kuryān nirāhāraḥ samāhitaḥ
d tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe pratigṛhṇanti devatāḥ
d hṛṣyanti pitaraś cāsya śrāddhakāla upasthite
d eṣa hy adharmo dharmaś ca rahasyaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ
d lomaśaḥ
d martyānāṃ svargakāmānāṃ pretya svargasukhāvahaḥ
d paradāreṣu ye saktā akṛtvā dārasaṃgraham
d nirāśāḥ pitaras teṣāṃ śrāddhakāle bhavanti vai
d paradāraratir yaḥ syād yaś ca vandhyām upāsate
d brahmasvaṃ harate yaś ca samadoṣā bhavanti te
d asaṃbhāṣyā bhavanty ete pitṝṇāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
d devatāḥ pitaraś caiṣāṃ nābhinandanti tad dhaviḥ
d tasmāt parasya vai dārāṃs tyajed vandhyāṃ ca yoṣitam
d brahmasvaṃ hi na hartavyam ātmano hitam icchatā
d śrūyatāṃ cāparaṃ guhyaṃ rahasyaṃ dharmasaṃhitam
d śraddadhānena kartavyaṃ gurūṇāṃ vacanaṃ sadā
d dvādaśyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca māsi māsi ghṛtākṣatam
d brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayaccheta tasya puṇyaṃ nibodhata
d somaś ca vardhate tena samudraś ca mahodadhiḥ
d aśvamedhacaturbhāgaṃ phalaṃ sṛjati vāsavaḥ
d dānenaitena tejasvī vīryavāṃś ca bhaven naraḥ
d prītaś ca bhagavān soma iṣṭān kāmān prayacchati
d śrūyatāṃ cāparo dharmaḥ sarahasyo mahāphalaḥ
d imaṃ kaliyugaṃ prāpya manuṣyāṇāṃ sukhāvahaḥ
d kalyam utthāya yo martyaḥ snātaḥ śuklena vāsasā
d tilapātraṃ prayaccheta brāhmaṇebhyaḥ samāhitaḥ
d tilodakaṃ ca yo dadyāt pitṝṇāṃ madhunā saha
d dīpakaṃ kṛsaraṃ caiva śrūyatāṃ tasya tat phalam
d tilapātre phalaṃ prāha bhagavān pākaśāsanaḥ
d gopradānaṃ ca yaḥ kuryād bhūmidānaṃ ca śāśvatam
d agniṣṭomaṃ ca yo yajñaṃ yajeta bahudakṣiṇam
d tilapātraṃ sahaitena samaṃ manyanti devatāḥ
d tilodakaṃ sadā śrāddhe manyante pitaro 'kṣayam
d dīpe ca kṛsare caiva tuṣyante 'sya pitāmahāḥ
d svarge ca pitṛloke ca pitṛdevābhipūjitam
d evam etan mayoddiṣṭam ṛṣidṛṣṭaṃ purātanam
d bhīṣmaḥ
d tatas tv ṛṣigaṇāḥ sarve pitaraś ca sadevatāḥ
d arundhatīṃ tapovṛddhām apṛcchanta samāhitāḥ
d samānaśīlāṃ vīryeṇa vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ
d tvatto dharmarahasyāni śrotum icchāmahe vayam
d arundhatī
d yat te guhyatamaṃ bhadre tat prabhāṣitum arhasi
d tapovṛddhir mayā prāptā bhavatāṃ smaraṇena vai
d bhavatāṃ ca prasādena dharmān vakṣyāmi śāśvatān
d saguhyān sarahasyāṃś ca tāñ śṛṇudhvam aśeṣataḥ
d śraddadhāne prayoktavyā yasya śuddhaṃ tathā manaḥ
d aśraddadhāno mānī ca brahmahā gurutalpagaḥ
d asaṃbhāṣyā hi catvāro naiṣāṃ dharmaṃ prakāśayet
d ahany ahani yo dadyāt kapilāṃ dvādaśīḥ samāḥ
d māsi māsi ca satreṇa yo yajeta sadā naraḥ
d gavāṃ śatasahasraṃ ca yo dadyāj jyeṣṭhapuṣkare
d na tad dharmaphalaṃ tulyam atithir yasya tuṣyati
d śrūyatāṃ cāparo dharmo manuṣyāṇāṃ sukhāvahaḥ
d śraddadhānena kartavyaḥ sarahasyo mahāphalaḥ
d kalyam utthāya gomadhye gṛhya darbhān sahodakān
d niṣiñceta gavāṃ śṛṅge mastakena ca taj jalam
d pratīccheta nirāhāras tasya dharmaphalaṃ śṛṇu
d śrūyante yāni tīrthāni triṣu lokeṣu kāni cit
d siddhacāraṇajuṣṭāni sevitāni maharṣibhiḥ
d abhiṣekaḥ samas teṣāṃ gavāṃ śṛṅgodakasya ca
d sādhu sādhv iti coddiṣṭaṃ daivataiḥ pitṛbhis tathā
d pitāmahaḥ
d bhūtaiś caiva susaṃhṛṣṭaiḥ pūjitā sāpy arundhatī
d aho dharmo mahābhāge sarahasya udāhṛtaḥ
d yamaḥ
d varaṃ dadāmi te dhanye tapas te vardhatāṃ sadā
d ramaṇīyā kathā divyā yuṣmatto yā mayā śrutā
d śrūyatāṃ citraguptasya bhāṣitaṃ mama ca priyam
d rahasyaṃ dharmasaṃyuktaṃ śakyaṃ śrotuṃ maharṣibhiḥ
d śraddadhānena martyena ātmano hitam icchatā
d na hi puṇyaṃ tathā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ kiṃ cid vinaśyati
d parvakāle ca yat kiṃ cid ādityaṃ cādhitiṣṭhati
d pretalokaṃ gate martye tat tat sarvaṃ vibhāvasuḥ
d pratijānāti puṇyātmā tac ca tatropayujyate
d kiṃ cid dharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi citraguptamataṃ śubham
d pānīyaṃ caiva dīpaṃ ca dātavyaṃ satataṃ tathā
d upānahau ca cchatraṃ ca kapilā ca yathātatham
d puṣkare kapilā deyā brāhmaṇe vedapārage
d agnihotraṃ ca yatnena sarvaśaḥ pratipālayet
d ayaṃ caivāparo dharmaś citraguptena bhāṣitaḥ
d phalam asya pṛthaktvena śrotum arhanti sattamāḥ
d pralayaṃ sarvabhūtaiś ca gantavyaṃ kālaparyayāt
d tatra durgam anuprāptāḥ kṣuttṛṣṇāparipīḍitāḥ
d dahyamānā vipacyante na tatrāsti palāyanam
d andhakāraṃ tamo ghoraṃ praviśanty alpabuddhayaḥ
d tatra dharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi yena durgāṇi saṃtaret
d alpavyayaṃ mahārthaṃ ca pretya caiva sukhodayam
d pānīyasya guṇā divyāḥ pretaloke viśeṣataḥ
d tatra puṇyodakā nāma nadī teṣāṃ vidhīyate
d akṣayaṃ salilaṃ tatra śītalaṃ hy amṛtopamam
d sa tatra toyaṃ pibati pānīyaṃ yaḥ prayacchati
d pradīpasya pradānena śrūyatāṃ guṇavistaraḥ
d tamondhakāraṃ niyataṃ dīpado na prapaśyati
d prabhāṃ cāsya prayacchanti somabhāskarapāvakāḥ
d devatāś cāsya manyante vimalāḥ sarvatodiśaḥ
d dyotate ca yathādityaḥ pretalokagato naraḥ
d tasmād dīpaḥ pradātavyaḥ pānīyaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
d kapilāṃ ye prayacchanti brāhmaṇe vedapārage
d puṣkare ca viśeṣeṇa śrūyatāṃ tasya yat phalam
d gośataṃ savṛṣaṃ tena dattaṃ bhavati śāśvatam
d pāpaṃ karma ca yat kiṃ cid brahmahatyāsamaṃ bhavet
d śodhayet kapilā hy ekā pradattaṃ gośataṃ yathā
d tasmāt tu kapilā deyā kaumudyāṃ jyeṣṭhapuṣkare
d na teṣāṃ viṣamaṃ kiṃ cin na duḥkhaṃ na ca kaṇṭakāḥ
d upānahau ca yo dadyāt pātrabhūte dvijottame
d chatradāne sukhāṃ chāyāṃ labhate paralokagaḥ
d na hi dattasya dānasya nāśo 'stīha kadā cana
d citraguptamataṃ śrutvā hṛṣṭaromā vibhāvasuḥ
d uvāca devatāḥ sarvāḥ pitṝṃś caiva mahādyutiḥ
d śrutaṃ hi citraguptasya dharmaguhyaṃ mahātmanaḥ
d śraddadhānāś ca ye martyā brāhmaṇeṣu mahātmasu
d dānam etat prayacchanti na teṣāṃ vidyate bhayam
d dharmadoṣās tv ime pañca yeṣāṃ nāstīha niṣkṛtiḥ
d asaṃbhāṣyā anācārā varjanīyā narādhamāḥ
d brahmahā caiva goghnaś ca paradārarataś ca yaḥ
d aśraddadhānaś ca naraḥ striyaṃ yaś copajīvati
d pretalokagatā hy ete narake pāpakarmiṇaḥ
d pacyante vai yathā mīnāḥ pūyaśoṇitabhojanāḥ
d asaṃbhāṣyāḥ pitṝṇāṃ ca devānāṃ caiva pañca te
d bhīṣmaḥ
d snātakānāṃ ca viprāṇāṃ ye cānye ca tapodhanāḥ
d tataḥ sarve mahābhāgā devāś ca pitaraś ca ha
d ṛṣayaś ca mahābhāgāḥ pramathān vākyam abruvan
d bhavanto vai mahābhāgā aparokṣaniśācarāḥ
d ucchiṣṭān aśucīn kṣudrān kathaṃ hiṃsatha mānavān
d ke ca smṛtāḥ pratīghātā yena martyān na hiṃsatha
d rakṣoghnāni ca kāni syur yair gṛheṣu praṇaśyatha
d pramathāḥ
d śrotum icchāma yuṣmākaṃ sarvam etan niśācarāḥ
d maithunena sadocchiṣṭāḥ kṛte caivādharottare
d mohān māṃsāni khādetha vṛkṣamūle ca yaḥ svapet
d āmiṣaṃ śīrṣato yasya pādato yaś ca saṃviśet
d tata ucchiṣṭakāḥ sarve bahucchidrāś ca mānavāḥ
d udake cāpy amedhyāni śleṣmāṇaṃ ca pramuñcati
d ete bhakṣyāś ca vadhyāś ca mānuṣā nātra saṃśayaḥ
d evaṃśīlasamācārān dharṣayāmo hi mānavān
d śrūyatāṃ ca pratīghātān yair na śaknuma hiṃsitum
d gorocanāsamālambho vacāhastaś ca yo bhavet
d ghṛtākṣataṃ ca yo dadyān mastake tatparāyaṇaḥ
d ye ca māṃsaṃ na khādanti tān na śaknuma hiṃsitum
d yasya cāgnir gṛhe nityaṃ divā rātrau ca dīpyate
d tarakṣoś carma daṃṣṭrāś ca tathaiva girikacchapaḥ
d ājyadhūmo biḍālaś ca cchāgaḥ kṛṣṇo 'tha piṅgalaḥ
d yeṣām etāni tiṣṭhanti gṛheṣu gṛhamedhinām
d tāny adhṛṣyāṇy agārāṇi piśitāśaiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ
d lokān asmadvidhā ye ca vicaranti yathāsukham
d tasmād etāni geheṣu rakṣoghnāni viśāṃ pate
d bhīṣmaḥ
d etad vaḥ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yatra vaḥ saṃśayo mahān
d tataḥ padmapratīkāśaḥ padmodbhūtaḥ pitāmahaḥ
d uvāca vacanaṃ devān vāsavaṃ ca śacīpatim
d ayaṃ mahābalo nāgo rasātalacaro balī
d tejasvī reṇuko nāma mahāsattvaparākramaḥ
d atitejasvinaḥ sarve mahāvīryā mahāgajāḥ
d dhārayanti mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ saśailavanakānanām
d bhavadbhiḥ samanujñāto reṇukas tān mahāgajān
d dharmaguhyāni sarvāṇi gatvā pṛcchatu tatra vai
d pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā te devā reṇukaṃ tadā
d reṇukaḥ
d preṣayām āsur avyagrā yatra te dharaṇīdharāḥ
d anujñāto 'smi devaiś ca pitṛbhiś ca mahābalāḥ
d dharmaguhyāni yuṣmākaṃ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
d diggajāḥ
d kathayadhvaṃ mahābhāgā yad vas tattvaṃ manīṣitam
d kārttike māsi cāśleṣā bahulasyāṣṭamī śivā
d tena nakṣatrayogena yo dadāti guḍaudanam
d imaṃ mantraṃ japañ śrāddhe yatāhāro hy akopanaḥ
d baladevaprabhṛtayo ye nāgā balavattarāḥ
d anantā hy akṣayā nityaṃ bhoginaḥ sumahābalāḥ
d teṣāṃ kulodbhavā ye ca mahābhūtā bhujaṃgamāḥ
d te me baliṃ prayacchantu balatejobhivṛddhaye
d yadā nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān ujjahāra vasuṃdharām
d tad balaṃ tasya devasya dharām uddharatas tathā
d evam uktvā baliṃ tatra valmīke tu nivedayet
d gajendrakusumākīrṇaṃ nīlavastrānulepanam
d nirvapet taṃ tu valmīke astaṃ yāte divākare
d evaṃ tuṣṭās tataḥ sarve adhastād bhārapīḍitā
d śramaṃ taṃ nāvabudhyāmo dhārayanto vasuṃdharām
d evaṃ manyāmahe dharmaṃ bhārārtā nirapekṣiṇaḥ
d brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdro vā yady upoṣitaḥ
d evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ bahuphalaṃ labhet
d valmīke balim ādāya tan no bahuphalaṃ matam
d ye ca nāgā mahāvīryās triṣu lokeṣu kṛtsnaśaḥ
d kṛtātithyā bhaveyus te śataṃ varṣāṇi tattvataḥ
d diggajānāṃ ca tac chrutvā devatāḥ pitaras tathā
d maheśvaraḥ
d ṛṣayaś ca mahābhāgāḥ pūjayanti sma reṇukam
d sāram uddhṛtya yuṣmābhiḥ sādhu dharma udāhṛtaḥ
d dharmaguhyam idaṃ mattaḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ sarva eva ha
d yeṣāṃ dharmāśritā buddhiḥ śraddhadhānāś ca ye narāḥ
d teṣāṃ syād upadeṣṭavyaḥ sarahasyo mahāphalaḥ
d nirudvignas tu yo dadyān māsam ekaṃ gavāhnikam
d ekabhaktaṃ tathāśnīyāc chrūyatāṃ tasya yat phalam
d imā gāvo mahābhāgāḥ pavitraṃ paramaṃ smṛtāḥ
d trīn lokān dhārayanti sma sadevāsuramānuṣān
d tāsu caiva mahāpuṇyaṃ śuśrūṣā ca mahāphalam
d ahany ahani dharmeṇa yujyate vā gavāhnike
d mayā hy etā hy anujñātāḥ pūrvam āsan kṛte yuge
d tato 'ham anunīto vai brahmaṇā padmayoninā
d tasmād vrajasthānagatas tiṣṭhaty upari me vṛṣaḥ
d rame 'haṃ saha gobhiś ca tasmāt pūjyāḥ sadaiva tāḥ
d mahāprabhāvā varadā varān dadyur upāsitāḥ
d tā gāvo 'syānumanyante sarvakarmasu yat phalam
d skandaḥ
d tasya tatra caturbhāgo yo dadāti gavāhnikam
d mamāpy anumato dharmas taṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ samāhitāḥ
d nīlaṣaṇḍasya śṛṅgābhyāṃ gṛhītvā mṛttikāṃ tu yaḥ
d abhiṣekaṃ tryahaṃ kuryāt tasya dharmaṃ nibodhata
d śodhayed aśubhaṃ sarvam ādhipatyaṃ paratra ca
d yāvac ca jāyate martyas tāvac chūro bhaviṣyati
d idaṃ cāpy aparaṃ guhyaṃ sarahasyaṃ nibodhata
d pragṛhyaudumbaraṃ pātraṃ pakvānnaṃ madhunā saha
d somasyottiṣṭhamānasya paurṇamāsyāṃ baliṃ haret
d tasya dharmaphalaṃ nityaṃ śraddadhānā nibodhata
d sādhyā rudrās tathādityā viśvedevās tathāśvinau
d maruto vasavaś caiva pratigṛhṇanti taṃ balim
d somaś ca vardhate tena samudraś ca mahodadhiḥ
d viṣṇuḥ
d eṣa dharmo mayoddiṣṭaḥ sarahasyaḥ sukhāvahaḥ
d dharmaguhyāni sarvāṇi devatānāṃ mahātmanām
d ṛṣīṇāṃ caiva guhyāni yaḥ paṭhed āhnikaṃ sadā
d śṛṇuyād vānasūyur yaḥ śraddadhānaḥ samāhitaḥ
d nāsya vighnaḥ prabhavati bhayaṃ cāsya na vidyate
d ye ca dharmāḥ śubhāḥ puṇyāḥ sarahasyā udāhṛtāḥ
d teṣāṃ dharmaphalaṃ tasya yaḥ paṭheta jitendriyaḥ
d nāsya pāpaṃ prabhavati na ca pāpena lipyate
d paṭhed vā śrāvayed vāpi śrutvā vā labhate phalam
d bhuñjate pitaro devā havyaṃ kavyam athākṣayam
d śrāvayaṃś cāpi viprendrān parvasu prayato naraḥ
d ṛṣīṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ caiva nityadā
d bhavaty abhimataḥ śrīmān dharmeṣu prayataḥ sadā
d kṛtvāpi pāpakaṃ karma mahāpātakavarjitam
d bhīṣmaḥ
d rahasyadharmaṃ śrutvemaṃ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
d etad dharmarahasyaṃ vai devatānāṃ narādhipa
d vyāsoddiṣṭaṃ mayā proktaṃ sarvadevanamaskṛtam
d pṛthivī ratnasaṃpūrṇā jñānaṃ cedam anuttamam
d idam eva tataḥ śrāvyam iti manyeta dharmavit
d nāśraddadhānāya na nāstikāya
d na naṣṭadharmāya na nirguṇāya
d na hetuduṣṭāya gurudviṣe vā
d nānātmabhūtāya nivedyam etat
dA yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
dA ke bhojyā brāhmaṇasyeha ke bhojyāḥ kṣatriyasya ha
dA bhīṣmaḥ
dA tathā vaiśyasya ke bhojyāḥ ke ca śūdrasya bhārata
dA brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇasyeha bhojyā ye caiva kṣatriyāḥ
dA vaiśyāś cāpi tathā bhojyāḥ śūdrāś ca parivarjitāḥ
dA brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā bhojyā vai kṣatriyasya ha
dA varjanīyās tu vai śūdrāḥ sarvabhakṣyā vikarmiṇaḥ
dA vaiśyās tu bhojyā viprāṇāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
dA nityāgnayo viviktāś ca cāturmāsyaratāś ca ye
dA śūdrāṇām atha yo bhuṅkte sa bhuṅkte pṛthivīmalam
dA malaṃ nṛṇāṃ sa pibati malaṃ bhuṅkte janasya ca
dA śūdrāṇāṃ yas tathā bhuṅkte sa bhuṅkte pṛthivīmalam
dA pṛthivīmalam aśnanti ye dvijāḥ śūdrabhojinaḥ
dA śūdrasya karmaniṣṭhāyāṃ vikarmastho 'pi pacyate
dA brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyo vikarmasthaś ca pacyate
dA svādhyāyaniratā viprās tathā svastyayane nṛṇām
dA rakṣaṇe kṣatriyaṃ prāhur vaiśyaṃ puṣṭyartham eva ca
dA karoti karma yad vaiśyas tad gatvā hy upajīvati
dA kṛṣigorakṣyavāṇijyam akutsā vaiśyakarmaṇi
dA śūdrakarma tu yaḥ kuryād avahāya svakarma ca
dA sa vijñeyo yathā śūdro na ca bhojyaḥ kadā cana
dA cikitsakaḥ kāṇḍapṛṣṭhaḥ purādhyakṣaḥ purohitaḥ
dA sāṃvatsaro vṛthādhyāyī sarve te śūdrasaṃmitāḥ
dA śūdrakarmasv athaiteṣu yo bhuṅkte nirapatrapaḥ
dA abhojyabhojanaṃ bhuktvā bhayaṃ prāpnoti dāruṇam
dA kulaṃ vīryaṃ ca tejaś ca tiryagyonitvam eva ca
dA sa prayāti yathā śvā vai niṣkriyo dharmavarjitaḥ
dA bhuṅkte cikitsakasyānnaṃ tad annaṃ ca purīṣavat
dA puṃścalyannaṃ ca mūtraṃ syāt kārukānnaṃ ca śoṇitam
dA vidyopajīvino 'nnaṃ ca yo bhuṅkte sādhusaṃmataḥ
dA tad apy annaṃ yathā śaudraṃ tat sādhuḥ parivarjayet
dA vacanīyasya yo bhuṅkte tam āhuḥ śoṇitaṃ hradam
dA piśunaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuṅkte brahmahatyāsamaṃ viduḥ
dA asatkṛtam avajñātaṃ na bhoktavyaṃ kadā cana
dA vyādhiṃ kulakṣayaṃ caiva kṣipraṃ prāpnoti brāhmaṇaḥ
dA nagarīrakṣiṇo bhuṅkte śvapacapravaṇo bhavet
dA goghne ca brāhmaṇaghne ca surāpe gurutalpage
dA bhuktvānnaṃ jāyate vipro rakṣasāṃ kulavardhanaḥ
dA nyāsāpahāriṇo bhuktvā kṛtaghne klībavartini
dA jāyate śabarāvāse madhyadeśabahiṣkṛte
dA abhojyāś caiva bhojyāś ca mayā proktā yathāvidhi
dA kim anyad adya kaunteya mattas tvaṃ śrotum icchasi
dA yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
dA uktās tu bhavatā bhojyās tathābhojyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
dA atra me praśnasaṃdehas tan me vada pitāmaha
dA brāhmaṇānāṃ viśeṣeṇa havyakavyapratigrahe
dA bhīṣmaḥ
dA nānāvidheṣu bhojyeṣu prāyaścittāni śaṃsa me
dA hanta vakṣyāmi te rājan brāhmaṇānāṃ mahātmanām
dA pratigraheṣu bhojye ca mucyate yena pāpmanaḥ
dA ghṛtapratigrahe caiva sāvitrī samidāhutiḥ
dA tilapratigrahe caiva samam etad yudhiṣṭhira
dA māṃsapratigrahe caiva madhuno lavaṇasya ca
dA ādityodayanaṃ sthitvā pūto bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ
dA kāñcanaṃ pratigṛhyātha japamāno guruśrutim
dA kṛṣṇāyasaṃ ca trivṛtaṃ dhārayan mucyate dvijaḥ
dA evaṃ pratigṛhīte 'tha dhane vastre tathā striyām
dA evam eva naraśreṣṭha suvarṇasya pratigrahe
dA annapratigrahe caiva pāyasekṣurase tathā
dA ikṣutailapavitrāṇāṃ trisaṃdhye 'psu nimajjanam
dA vrīhau puṣpe phale caiva jale piṣṭamaye tathā
dA yāvake dadhidugdhe ca sāvitrīṃ śataśo 'nvitām
dA upānahau ca vastraṃ ca pratigṛhyaurdhvadehikam
dA japec chataṃ samāyuktas tena mucyeta pāpmanā
dA kṣetrapratigrahe caiva grahasūtakayos tathā
dA trīṇi rātrāṇy upoṣitvā tena pāpmā vimucyate
dA kṛṣṇapakṣe tu yaḥ śrāddhaṃ pitṝṇām aśnute dvijaḥ
dA annam etad ahorātrāt pūto bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ
dA na ca saṃdhyām upāsīta na ca japyaṃ pravartayet
dA na saṃkiret tad annaṃ ca tathā pūyeta brāhmaṇaḥ
dA ityartham aparāhṇe tu pitṝṇāṃ śrāddham ucyate
dA yathoktānāṃ yad aśnīyur brāhmaṇāḥ pūrvaketitāḥ
dA mṛtakasya tṛtīyāhe brāhmaṇo yo 'nnam aśnute
dA sa trivelaṃ samunmajya dvādaśāhena śudhyati
dA dvādaśāhe vyatīte tu kṛtaśauco viśeṣataḥ
dA brāhmaṇebhyo havir dattvā mucyate tena pāpmanā
dA mṛtasya daśarātreṇa prāyaścittāni dāpayet
dA sāvitrīṃ raivatīm iṣṭiṃ kūṣmāṇḍam aghamarṣaṇam
dA mṛtakasya trirātre yaḥ samuddiṣṭe samaśnute
dA sapta triṣavaṇaṃ snātvā pūto bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ
dA siddhim āpnoti vipulām āpadaṃ caiva nāpnuyāt
dA yas tu śūdraiḥ sahāśnīyād brāhmaṇo 'py ekabhojane
dA aśaucaṃ vidhivat tasya śaucamātraṃ vidhīyate
dA yas tu vaiśyaiḥ sahāśnīyād brāhmaṇo 'py ekabhojane
dA sa vai trirātraṃ dīkṣitvā mucyate tena karmaṇā
dA kṣatriyaiḥ saha yo 'śnīyād brāhmaṇo 'py ekabhojane
dA āplutaḥ saha vāsobhis tena mucyeta pāpmanā
dA śūdrasya tu kulaṃ hanti vaiśyasya paśubāndhavān
dA kṣatriyasya śriyaṃ hanti brāhmaṇasya suvarcasam
dA prāyaścittaṃ ca śāntiṃ ca juhuyāt tena mucyate
dA sāvitrīṃ raivatīm iṣṭiṃ kūṣmāṇḍam aghamarṣaṇam
dA athocchiṣṭam athānyonyaṃ saṃprāśen nātra saṃśayaḥ
dA rocanā virajā rātrir maṅgalālambhanāni ca

dB dānena vartatety āha tapasā caiva bhārata
dB tad etan me manoduḥkhaṃ vyapoha tvaṃ pitāmaha
dB kiṃ svit pṛthivyāṃ hy etan me bhavāñ śaṃsitum arhati
dB bhīṣmaḥ
dB śṛṇu yair dharmaniratais tapasā bhāvitātmabhiḥ
dB lokā hy asaṃśayaṃ prāptā dānapuṇyaratair nṛpaiḥ
dB satkṛtaś ca tathātreyaḥ śiṣyebhyo brahma nirguṇam
dB upadiśya sadā rājan gato lokān anuttamān
dB śibir auśīnaraḥ prāṇān priyasya tanayasya ca
dB brāhmaṇārtham upākṛtya nākapṛṣṭham ito gataḥ
dB pratardanaḥ kāśipatiḥ pradāya tanayaṃ svakam
dB brāhmaṇāyātulāṃ kīrtim iha cāmutra cāśnute
dB rantidevaś ca sāṃkṛtyo vasiṣṭhāya mahātmane
dB arghyaṃ pradāya vidhival lebhe lokān anuttamān
dB divyaṃ śataśalākaṃ ca yajñārthaṃ kāñcanaṃ śubham
dB chatraṃ devāvṛdho dattvā brāhmaṇāyāsthito divam
dB bhagavān ambarīṣaś ca brāhmaṇāyāmitaujase
dB pradāya sakalaṃ rāṣṭraṃ suralokam avāptavān
dB sāvitraḥ kuṇḍalaṃ divyaṃ yānaṃ ca janamejayaḥ
dB brāhmaṇāya ca gā dattvā gato lokān anuttamān
dB vṛṣādarbhiś ca rājarṣī ratnāni vividhāni ca
dB ramyāṃś cāvasathān dattvā dvijebhyo divam āgamat
dB nimī rāṣṭraṃ ca vaidarbhiḥ kanyāṃ dattvā mahātmane
dB agastyāya gataḥ svargaṃ saputrapaśubāndhavaḥ
dB jāmadagnyaś ca viprāya bhūmiṃ dattvā mahāyaśāḥ
dB rāmo 'kṣayāṃs tathā lokāñ jagāma manaso 'dhikān
dB avarṣati ca parjanye sarvabhūtāni devarāṭ
dB vasiṣṭho jīvayām āsa yena yāto 'kṣayāṃ gatim
dB rāmo dāśarathiś caiva hutvā yajñeṣu vai vasu
dB sa gato hy akṣayān lokān yasya loke mahad yaśaḥ
dB kakṣasenaś ca rājarṣir vasiṣṭhāya mahātmane
dB nyāsaṃ yathāvat saṃnyasya jagāma sumahāyaśāḥ
dB karaṃdhamasya pautras tu marutto ''vikṣitaḥ sutaḥ
dB kanyām aṅgirase dattvā divam āśu jagāma saḥ
dB brahmadattaś ca pāñcālyo rājā dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
dB nidhiṃ śaṅkham anujñāpya jagāma paramāṃ gatim
dB rājā mitrasahaś caiva vasiṣṭhāya mahātmane
dB madayantīṃ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ dattvā ca tridivaṃ gataḥ
dB manoḥ putraś ca sudyumno likhitāya mahātmane
dB daṇḍam uddhṛtya dharmeṇa gato lokān anuttamān
dB sahasracityo rājarṣiḥ prāṇān iṣṭān mahāyaśāḥ
dB brāhmaṇārthe parityajya gato lokān anuttamān
dB sarvakāmaiś ca saṃpūrṇaṃ dattvā veśma hiraṇmayam
dB maudgalyāya gataḥ svargaṃ śatadyumno mahīpatiḥ
dB bhakṣyabhojyasya ca kṛtān rāśayaḥ parvatopamān
dB śāṇḍilyāya purā dattvā samanyur divam āsthitaḥ
dB nāmnā ca dyutimān nāma śālvarājo mahādyutiḥ
dB dattvā rājyam ṛcīkāya gato lokān anuttamān
dB madirāśvaś ca rājarṣir dattvā kanyāṃ sumadhyamām
dB hiraṇyahastāya gato lokān devair adhiṣṭhitān
dB lomapādaś ca rājarṣiḥ śāntāṃ dattvā sutāṃ prabhuḥ
dB ṛṣyaśṛṅgāya vipulaiḥ sarvaiḥ kāmair ayujyata
dB kautsāya dattvā kanyāṃ tu haṃsīṃ nāma yaśasvinīm
dB gato 'kṣayān ato lokān rājarṣiś ca bhagīrathaḥ
dB dattvā śatasahasraṃ tu gavāṃ rājā bhagīrathaḥ
dB savatsānāṃ kohalāya gato lokān anuttamān
dB ete cānye ca bahavo dānena tapasā ca ha
dB yudhiṣṭhira gatāḥ svargaṃ nivartante punaḥ punaḥ
dB teṣāṃ pratiṣṭhitā kīrtir yāvat sthāsyati medinī
dB gṛhasthair dānatapasā yair lokā vai vinirjitāḥ
dB śiṣṭānāṃ caritaṃ hy etat kīrtitaṃ me yudhiṣṭhira

dB śvaḥ prabhāte hi vakṣyāmi saṃdhyā hi samupasthitā
dB śrutaṃ me bhavatas tāta satyavrataparākrama
dB dānadharmeṇa mahatā ye prāptās tridivaṃ nṛpāḥ
dB imāṃs tu śrotum icchāmi dharmān dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
dB dānaṃ katividhaṃ deyaṃ kiṃ tasya ca phalaṃ labhet
dB kathaṃ kebhyaś ca dharmyaṃ ca dānaṃ dātavyam iṣyate
dB bhīṣmaḥ
dB kaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ katividhaṃ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
dB śṛṇu tattvena kaunteya dānaṃ prati mamānagha
dB yathā dānaṃ pradātavyaṃ sarvavarṇeṣu bhārata
dB dharmād arthād bhayāt kāmāt kāruṇyād iti bhārata
dB dānaṃ pañcavidhaṃ jñeyaṃ kāraṇair yair nibodha tat
dB iha kīrtim avāpnoti pretya cānuttamaṃ sukham
dB iti dānaṃ pradātavyaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo 'nasūyatā
dB dadāti vā dāsyati vā mahyaṃ dattam anena vā
dB ity arthibhyo niśamyaivaṃ sarvaṃ dātavyam arthine
dB nāsyāhaṃ na madīyo 'yaṃ pāpaṃ kuryād vimānitaḥ
dB iti dadyād bhayād eva dṛḍhaṃ mūḍhāya paṇḍitaḥ
dB priyo me 'yaṃ priyo 'syāham iti saṃprekṣya buddhimān
dB vayasyāyaivam akliṣṭaṃ dānaṃ dadyād atandritaḥ
dB dīnaś ca yācate cāyam alpenāpi hi tuṣyati
dB iti dadyād daridrāya kāruṇyād iti sarvathā
dB iti pañcavidhaṃ dānaṃ puṇyakīrtivivardhanam
dB yathāśaktyā pradātavyam evam āha prajāpatiḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a pitāmaha mahāprājña sarvaśāstraviśārada
c āgamair bahubhiḥ sphīto bhavān naḥ prathitaḥ kule
a tvatto dharmārthasaṃyuktam āyatyāṃ ca sukhodayam
c āścaryabhūtaṃ lokasya śrotum icchāmy ariṃdama
a ayaṃ ca kālaḥ saṃprāpto durlabhajñātibāndhavaḥ
c śāstā ca na hi naḥ kaś cit tvām ṛte bharatarṣabha
a yadi te 'ham anugrāhyo bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito 'nagha
c vaktum arhasi naḥ praśnaṃ yat tvāṃ pṛcchāmi pārthiva
a ayaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān sarvapārthivasaṃmataḥ
c bhavantaṃ bahumānena praśrayeṇa ca sevate
a asya caiva samakṣaṃ tvaṃ pārthivānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
c bhrātṝṇāṃ ca priyārthaṃ me snehād bhāṣitum arhasi
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā snehād āgatasaṃbhramaḥ
c bhīṣmo bhāgīrathīputra idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a hanta te kathayiṣyāmi kathām atimanoramām
c asya viṣṇoḥ purā rājan prabhāvo 'yaṃ mayā śrutaḥ
a yaś ca govṛṣabhāṅkasya prabhāvas taṃ ca me śṛṇu
c rudrāṇyāḥ saṃśayo yaś ca daṃpatyos taṃ ca me śṛṇu
a vrataṃ cacāra dharmātmā kṛṣṇo dvādaśavārṣikam
c dīkṣitaṃ cāgatau draṣṭum ubhau nāradaparvatau
a kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaś caiva dhaumyaś ca japatāṃ varaḥ
c devalaḥ kāśyapaś caiva hastikāśyapa eva ca
a apare ṛṣayaḥ santo dīkṣādamasamanvitāḥ
c śiṣyair anugatāḥ sarve devakalpais tapodhanaiḥ
a teṣām atithisatkāram arcanīyaṃ kulocitam
c devakītanayaḥ prīto devakalpam akalpayat
a hariteṣu suvarṇeṣu barhiṣkeṣu naveṣu ca
c upopaviviśuḥ prītā viṣṭareṣu maharṣayaḥ
a kathāś cakrus tatas te tu madhurā dharmasaṃhitāḥ
c rājarṣīṇāṃ surāṇāṃ ca ye vasanti tapodhanāḥ
a tato nārāyaṇaṃ tejo vratacaryendhanotthitam
c vaktrān niḥsṛtya kṛṣṇasya vahnir adbhutakarmaṇaḥ
a so 'gnir dadāha taṃ śailaṃ sadrumaṃ salatākṣupam
c sapakṣimṛgasaṃghātaṃ saśvāpadasarīsṛpam
a mṛgaiś ca vividhākārair hāhābhūtam acetanam
c śikharaṃ tasya śailasya mathitaṃ dīptadarśanam
a sa tu vahnir mahājvālo dagdhvā sarvam aśeṣataḥ
c viṣṇoḥ samīpam āgamya pādau śiṣyavad aspṛśat
a tato viṣṇur vanaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirdagdham arikarśanaḥ
c saumyair dṛṣṭinipātais tat punaḥ prakṛtim ānayat
a tathaiva sa girir bhūyaḥ prapuṣpitalatādrumaḥ
c sapakṣigaṇasaṃghuṣṭaḥ saśvāpadasarīsṛpaḥ
a tad adbhutam acintyaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā munigaṇas tadā
c vismito hṛṣṭalomā ca babhūvāsrāvilekṣaṇaḥ
a tato nārāyaṇo dṛṣṭvā tān ṛṣīn vismayānvitān
c praśritaṃ madhuraṃ snigdhaṃ papraccha vadatāṃ varaḥ
a kim asya ṛṣipūgasya tyaktasaṅgasya nityaśaḥ
c nirmamasyāgamavato vismayaḥ samupāgataḥ
a etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ sarvaṃ yāthātathyam aninditāḥ
c ṛṣayo vaktum arhanti niścitārthaṃ tapodhanāḥ
 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
a bhavān visṛjate lokān bhavān saṃharate punaḥ
c bhavāñ śītaṃ bhavān uṣṇaṃ bhavān eva pravarṣati
a pṛthivyāṃ yāni bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
c teṣāṃ pitā tvaṃ mātā ca prabhuḥ prabhava eva ca
a etan no vismayakaraṃ praśaṃsa madhusūdana
c tvam evārhasi kalyāṇa vaktuṃ vahner vinirgamam
a tato vigatasaṃtrāsā vayam apy arikarśana
c yac chrutaṃ yac ca dṛṣṭaṃ nas tat pravakṣyāmahe hare
 vāsudeva uvāca
a etat tad vaiṣṇavaṃ tejo mama vaktrād viniḥsṛtam
c kṛṣṇavartmā yugāntābho yenāyaṃ mathito giriḥ
a ṛṣayaś cārtim āpannā jitakrodhā jitendriyāḥ
c bhavanto vyathitāś cāsan devakalpās tapodhanāḥ
a vratacaryāparītasya tapasvivratasevayā
c mama vahniḥ samudbhūto na vai vyathitum arhatha
a vrataṃ cartum ihāyātas tv ahaṃ girim imaṃ śubham
c putraṃ cātmasamaṃ vīrye tapasā sraṣṭum āgataḥ
a tato mamātmā yo dehe so 'gnir bhūtvā viniḥsṛtaḥ
c gataś ca varadaṃ draṣṭuṃ sarvalokapitāmaham
a tena cātmānuśiṣṭo me putratve munisattamāḥ
c tejaso 'rdhena putras te bhaviteti vṛṣadhvajaḥ
a so 'yaṃ vahnir upāgamya pādamūle mamāntikam
c śiṣyavat paricaryātha śāntaḥ prakṛtim āgataḥ
a etad asya rahasyaṃ vaḥ padmanābhasya dhīmataḥ
c mayā premṇā samākhyātaṃ na bhīḥ kāryā tapodhanāḥ
a sarvatra gatir avyagrā bhavatāṃ dīrghadarśanāḥ
c tapasvivratasaṃdīptā jñānavijñānaśobhitāḥ
a yac chrutaṃ yac ca vo dṛṣṭaṃ divi vā yadi vā bhuvi
c āścaryaṃ paramaṃ kiṃ cit tad bhavanto bruvantu me
a tasyāmṛtanikāśasya vāṅmadhor asti me spṛhā
c bhavadbhiḥ kathitasyeha tapovananivāsibhiḥ
a yady apy aham adṛṣṭaṃ vā divyam adbhutadarśanam
c divi vā bhuvi vā kiṃ cit paśyāmy amaladarśanāḥ
a prakṛtiḥ sā mama parā na kva cit pratihanyate
c na cātmagatam aiśvaryam āścaryaṃ pratibhāti me
a śraddheyaḥ kathito hy arthaḥ sajjanaśravaṇaṃ gataḥ
c ciraṃ tiṣṭhati medinyāṃ śaile lekhyam ivārpitam
a tad ahaṃ sajjanamukhān niḥsṛtaṃ tatsamāgame
c kathayiṣyāmy aharahar buddhidīpakaraṃ nṛṇām
a tato munigaṇāḥ sarve praśritāḥ kṛṣṇasaṃnidhau
c netraiḥ padmadalaprakhyair apaśyanta janārdanam
a vardhayantas tathaivānye pūjayantas tathāpare
c vāgbhir ṛgbhūṣitārthābhiḥ stuvanto madhusūdanam
a tato munigaṇāḥ sarve nāradaṃ devadarśanam
c tadā niyojayām āsur vacane vākyakovidam
a yad āścaryam acintyaṃ ca girau himavati prabho
c anubhūtaṃ munigaṇais tīrthayātrāparāyaṇaiḥ
a tad bhavān ṛṣisaṃghasya hitārthaṃ sarvacoditaḥ
c yathādṛṣṭaṃ hṛṣīkeśe sarvam ākhyātum arhati
a evam uktaḥ sa munibhir nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
c kathayām āsa devarṣiḥ pūrvavṛttāṃ kathāṃ śubhām
 bhīṣma uvāca
