a tato nārāyaṇasuhṛn nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
c śaṃkarasyomayā sārdhaṃ saṃvādaṃ pratyabhāṣata
a tapaś cacāra dharmātmā vṛṣabhāṅkaḥ sureśvaraḥ
c puṇye girau himavati siddhacāraṇasevite
a nānauṣadhiyute ramye nānāpuṣpasamākule
c apsarogaṇasaṃkīrṇe bhūtasaṃghaniṣevite
a tatra devo mudā yukto bhūtasaṃghaśatair vṛtaḥ
c nānārūpair virūpaiś ca divyair adbhutadarśanaiḥ
a siṃhavyāghragajaprakhyaiḥ sarvajātisamanvitaiḥ
c kroṣṭukadvīpivadanair ṛkṣarṣabhamukhais tathā
a ulūkavadanair bhīmaiḥ śyenabhāsamukhais tathā
c nānāvarṇamṛgaprakhyaiḥ sarvajātisamanvayaiḥ
e kiṃnarair devagandharvair yakṣabhūtagaṇais tathā
a divyapuṣpasamākīrṇaṃ divyamālāvibhūṣitam
c divyacandanasaṃyuktaṃ divyadhūpena dhūpitam
e tat sado vṛṣabhāṅkasya divyavāditranāditam
a mṛdaṅgapaṇavodghuṣṭaṃ śaṅkhabherīnināditam
c nṛtyadbhir bhūtasaṃghaiś ca barhiṇaiś ca samantataḥ
a pranṛttāpsarasaṃ divyaṃ divyastrīgaṇasevitam
c dṛṣṭikāntam anirdeśyaṃ divyam adbhutadarśanam
a sa giris tapasā tasya bhūteśasya vyarocata
a svādhyāyaparamair viprair brahmaghoṣair vināditaḥ
c ṣaṭpadair upagītaiś ca mādhavāpratimo giriḥ
a taṃ mahotsavasaṃkāśaṃ bhīmarūpadharaṃ punaḥ
c dṛṣṭvā munigaṇasyāsīt parā prītir janārdana
a munayaś ca mahābhāgāḥ siddhāś caivordhvaretasaḥ
c maruto vasavaḥ sādhyā viśvedevāḥ sanātanāḥ
a yakṣā nāgāḥ piśācāś ca lokapālā hutāśanāḥ
c bhāvāś ca sarve nyagbhūtās tatraivāsan samāgatāḥ
a ṛtavaḥ sarvapuṣpaiś ca vyakiranta mahādbhutaiḥ
c oṣadhyo jvalamānāś ca dyotayanti sma tad vanam
a vihagāś ca mudā yuktāḥ prānṛtyan vyanadaṃś ca ha
c giripṛṣṭheṣu ramyeṣu vyāharanto janapriyāḥ
a tatra devo giritaṭe divyadhātuvibhūṣite
c paryaṅka iva vibhrājann upaviṣṭo mahāmanāḥ
a vyāghracarmāmbaradharaḥ siṃhacarmottaracchadaḥ
c vyālayajñopavītī ca lohitāṅgadabhūṣaṇaḥ
a hariśmaśrur jaṭī bhīmo bhayakartā suradviṣām
c abhayaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ bhaktānāṃ vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ
a dṛṣṭvā tam ṛṣayaḥ sarve śirobhir avanīṃ gatāḥ
c vimuktāḥ sarvapāpebhyaḥ kṣāntā vigatakalmaṣāḥ
a tasya bhūtapateḥ sthānaṃ bhīmarūpadharaṃ babhau
c apradhṛṣyataraṃ caiva mahoragasamākulam
a kṣaṇenaivābhavat sarvam adbhutaṃ madhusūdana
c tat sado vṛṣabhāṅkasya bhīmarūpadharaṃ babhau
a tam abhyayāc chailasutā bhūtastrīgaṇasaṃvṛtā
c haratulyāmbaradharā samānavratacāriṇī
a bibhratī kalaśaṃ raukmaṃ sarvatīrthajalodbhavam
b bibhratī paramaṃ rūpaṃ sarvabhūtamanoharam
c girisravābhiḥ puṇyābhiḥ sarvato 'nugatā śubhā
a puṣpavṛṣṭyābhivarṣantī gandhair bahuvidhais tathā
c sevantī himavatpārśvaṃ harapārśvam upāgamat
a tataḥ smayantī pāṇibhyāṃ narmārthaṃ cārudarśanā
c haranetre śubhe devī sahasā sā samāvṛṇot
a saṃvṛtābhyāṃ tu netrābhyāṃ tamobhūtam acetanam
c nirhomaṃ nirvaṣaṭkāraṃ tat sadaḥ sahasābhavat
a janaś ca vimanāḥ sarvo bhayatrāsasamanvitaḥ
c nimīlite bhūtapatau naṣṭasūrya ivābhavat
a tato vitimiro lokaḥ kṣaṇena samapadyata
c jvālā ca mahatī dīptā lalāṭāt tasya niḥsṛtā
a tṛtīyaṃ cāsya saṃbhūtaṃ netram ādityasaṃnibham
c yugāntasadṛśaṃ dīptaṃ yenāsau mathito giriḥ
a tato girisutā dṛṣṭvā dīptāgnisadṛśekṣaṇam
c haraṃ praṇamya śirasā dadarśāyatalocanā
a dahyamāne vane tasmin saśālasaraladrume
c sacandanavane ramye divyauṣadhividīpite
a mṛgayūthair drutair bhītair harapārśvam upāgataiḥ
c śaraṇaṃ cāpy avindadbhis tat sadaḥ saṃkulaṃ babhau
a tato nabhaḥspṛśajvālo vidyullolārcir ujjvalaḥ
c dvādaśādityasadṛśo yugāntāgnir ivāparaḥ
a kṣaṇena tena dagdhaḥ sa himavān abhavan nagaḥ
c sadhātuśikharābhogo dīnadagdhavanauṣadhiḥ
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā mathitaṃ śailaṃ śailarājasutā tataḥ
c bhagavantaṃ prapannā sā sāñjalipragrahā sthitā
a umāṃ śarvas tadā dṛṣṭvā strībhāvāgatamārdavām
c pitur dainyam anicchantīṃ prītyāpaśyat tato girim
a tato 'bhavat punaḥ sarvaḥ prakṛtisthaḥ sudarśanaḥ
c prahṛṣṭavihagaś caiva prapuṣpitavanadrumaḥ
a prakṛtisthaṃ giriṃ dṛṣṭvā prītā devī maheśvaram
c uvāca sarvabhūtānāṃ patiṃ patim aninditā
a bhagavan sarvabhūteśa śūlapāṇe mahāvrata
c saṃśayo me mahāñ jātas taṃ me vyākhyātum arhasi
a kimarthaṃ te lalāṭe vai tṛtīyaṃ netram utthitam
c kimarthaṃ ca girir dagdhaḥ sapakṣigaṇakānanaḥ
a kimarthaṃ ca punar deva prakṛtisthaḥ kṣaṇāt kṛtaḥ
c tathaiva drumasaṃchannaḥ kṛto 'yaṃ te maheśvara
 maheśvara uvāca
a netre me saṃvṛte devi tvayā bālyād anindite
c naṣṭālokas tato lokaḥ kṣaṇena samapadyata
a naṣṭāditye tathā loke tamobhūte nagātmaje
c tṛtīyaṃ locanaṃ dīptaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ te rakṣatā prajāḥ
a tasya cākṣṇo mahat tejo yenāyaṃ mathito giriḥ
c tvatpriyārthaṃ ca me devi prakṛtisthaḥ kṣaṇāt kṛtaḥ
 umovāca
a bhagavan kena te vaktraṃ candravat priyadarśanam
c pūrvaṃ tathaiva śrīkāntam uttaraṃ paścimaṃ tathā
a dakṣiṇaṃ ca mukhaṃ raudraṃ kenordhvaṃ kapilā jaṭāḥ
c kena kaṇṭhaś ca te nīlo barhibarhanibhaḥ kṛtaḥ
a haste caitat pinākaṃ te satataṃ kena tiṣṭhati
c jaṭilo brahmacārī ca kimartham asi nityadā
a etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ sarvaṃ vada bhūtapate 'nagha
c sadharmacāriṇī cāhaṃ bhaktā ceti vṛṣadhvaja
a evam uktaḥ sa bhagavāñ śailaputryā pinākadhṛk
c tasyā vṛttyā ca buddhyā ca prītimān abhavat prabhuḥ
a tatas tām abravīd devaḥ subhage śrūyatām iti
c hetubhir yair mamaitāni rūpāṇi rucirānane
 maheśvara uvāca
a tilottamā nāma purā brahmaṇā yoṣid uttamā
c tilaṃ tilaṃ samuddhṛtya ratnānāṃ nirmitā śubhā
a sābhyagacchata māṃ devi rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi
c pradakṣiṇaṃ lobhayantī māṃ śubhe rucirānanā
a yato yataḥ sā sudatī mām upādhāvad antike
c tatas tato mukhaṃ cāru mama devi vinirgatam
a tāṃ didṛkṣur ahaṃ yogāc caturmūrtitvam āgataḥ
c caturmukhaś ca saṃvṛtto darśayan yogam ātmanaḥ
a pūrveṇa vadanenāham indratvam anuśāsmi ha
c uttareṇa tvayā sārdhaṃ ramāmy aham anindite
a paścimaṃ me mukhaṃ saumyaṃ sarvaprāṇisukhāvaham
c dakṣiṇaṃ bhīmasaṃkāśaṃ raudraṃ saṃharati prajāḥ
a jaṭilo brahmacārī ca lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā
c devakāryārthasiddhyarthaṃ pinākaṃ me kare sthitam
a indreṇa ca purā vajraṃ kṣiptaṃ śrīkāṅkṣiṇā mama
c dagdhvā kaṇṭhaṃ tu tad yātaṃ tena śrīkaṇṭhatā mama
 umovāca
a vāhaneṣu prabhūteṣu śrīmatsv anyeṣu satsu te
c kathaṃ govṛṣabho deva vāhanatvam upāgataḥ
 maheśvara uvāca
a surabhīṃ sasṛje brahmāmṛtadhenuṃ payomucam
c sā sṛṣṭā bahudhā jātā kṣaramāṇā payo 'mṛtam
a tasyā vatsamukhotsṛṣṭaḥ pheno madgātram āgataḥ
c tato dagdhā mayā gāvo nānāvarṇatvam āgatāḥ
a tato 'haṃ lokaguruṇā śamaṃ nīto 'rthavedinā
c vṛṣaṃ cemaṃ dhvajārthaṃ me dadau vāhanam eva ca
 umovāca
a nivāsā bahurūpās te viśvarūpaguṇānvitāḥ
c tāṃś ca saṃtyajya bhagavañ śmaśāne ramase katham
a keśāsthikalile bhīme kapālaghaṭasaṃkule
c gṛdhragomāyukalile citāgniśatasaṃkule
a aśucau māṃsakalile vasāśoṇitakardame
c vinikīrṇāmiṣacaye śivānādavinādite
 maheśvara uvāca
a medhyānveṣī mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ vicarāmi niśāsv aham
c na ca medhyataraṃ kiṃ cic chmaśānād iha vidyate
a tena me sarvavāsānāṃ śmaśāne ramate manaḥ
c nyagrodhaśākhāsaṃchanne nirbhuktasragvibhūṣite
a tatra caiva ramante me bhūtasaṃghāḥ śubhānane
c na ca bhūtagaṇair devi vināhaṃ vastum utsahe
a eṣa vāso hi me medhyaḥ svargīyaś ca mato hi me
c puṇyaḥ paramakaś caiva medhyakāmair upāsyate
 umovāca
a bhagavan sarvabhūteśa sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ vara
c pinākapāṇe varada saṃśayo me mahān ayam
a ayaṃ munigaṇaḥ sarvas tapas tapa iti prabho
c taponveṣakaro loke bhramate vividhākṛtiḥ
a asya caivarṣisaṃghasya mama ca priyakāmyayā
c etaṃ mameha saṃdehaṃ vaktum arhasy ariṃdama
a dharmaḥ kiṃlakṣaṇaḥ proktaḥ kathaṃ vācarituṃ naraiḥ
c śakyo dharmam avindadbhir dharmajña vada me prabho
 nārada uvāca
a tato munigaṇaḥ sarvas tāṃ devīṃ pratyapūjayat
c vāgbhir ṛgbhūṣitārthābhiḥ stavaiś cārthavidāṃ vara
 maheśvara uvāca
a ahiṃsā satyavacanaṃ sarvabhūtānukampanam
c śamo dānaṃ yathāśakti gārhasthyo dharma uttamaḥ
a paradāreṣv asaṃkalpo nyāsastrīparirakṣaṇam
c adattādānaviramo madhumāṃsasya varjanam
a eṣa pañcavidho dharmo bahuśākhaḥ sukhodayaḥ
c dehibhir dharmaparamaiḥ kartavyo dharmasaṃcayaḥ
 umovāca
a bhagavan saṃśayaṃ pṛṣṭas taṃ me vyākhyātum arhasi
c cāturvarṇyasya yo dharmaḥ sve sve varṇe guṇāvahaḥ
a brāhmaṇe kīdṛśo dharmaḥ kṣatriye kīdṛśo bhavet
c vaiśye kiṃlakṣaṇo dharmaḥ śūdre kiṃlakṣaṇo bhavet
 maheśvara uvāca
a nyāyatas te mahābhāge saṃśayaḥ samudīritaḥ
c bhūmidevā mahābhāgāḥ sadā loke dvijātayaḥ
a upavāsaḥ sadā dharmo brāhmaṇasya na saṃśayaḥ
c sa hi dharmārtham utpanno brahmabhūyāya kalpate
a tasya dharmakriyā devi vratacaryā ca nyāyataḥ
c tathopanayanaṃ caiva dvijāyaivopapadyate
a gurudaivatapūjārthaṃ svādhyāyābhyasanātmakaḥ
c dehibhir dharmaparamaiś cartavyo dharmasaṃbhavaḥ
 umovāca
a bhagavan saṃśayo me 'tra taṃ me vyākhyātum arhasi
c cāturvarṇyasya dharmaṃ hi naipuṇyena prakīrtaya
 maheśvara uvāca
a rahasyaśravaṇaṃ dharmo vedavrataniṣevaṇam
c vratacaryāparo dharmo gurupādaprasādanam
a bhaikṣacaryāparo dharmo dharmo nityopavāsitā
c nityasvādhyāyitā dharmo brahmacaryāśramas tathā
a guruṇā tv abhyanujñātaḥ samāvarteta vai dvijaḥ
c vindetānantaraṃ bhāryām anurūpāṃ yathāvidhi
a śūdrānnavarjanaṃ dharmas tathā satpathasevanam
c dharmo nityopavāsitvaṃ brahmacaryaṃ tathaiva ca
a āhitāgnir adhīyāno juhvānaḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ
c vighasāśī yatāhāro gṛhasthaḥ satyavāk śuciḥ
a atithivratatā dharmo dharmas tretāgnidhāraṇam
c iṣṭīś ca paśubandhāṃś ca vidhipūrvaṃ samācaret
a yajñaś ca paramo dharmas tathāhiṃsā ca dehiṣu
c apūrvabhojanaṃ dharmo vighasāśitvam eva ca
a bhukte parijane paścād bhojanaṃ dharma ucyate
c brāhmaṇasya gṛhasthasya śrotriyasya viśeṣataḥ
a daṃpatyoḥ samaśīlatvaṃ dharmaś ca gṛhamedhinām
c gṛhyāṇāṃ caiva devānāṃ nityaṃ puṣpabalikriyā
a nityopalepanaṃ dharmas tathā nityopavāsitā
c susaṃmṛṣṭopalipte ca sājyadhūmodgame gṛhe
a eṣa dvijajane dharmo gārhasthyo lokadhāraṇaḥ
c dvijātīnāṃ satāṃ nityaṃ sadaivaiṣa pravartate
a yas tu kṣatragato devi tvayā dharma udīritaḥ
c tam ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi taṃ me śṛṇu samāhitā
a kṣatriyasya smṛto dharmaḥ prajāpālanam āditaḥ
c nirdiṣṭaphalabhoktā hi rājā dharmeṇa yujyate
a prajāḥ pālayate yo hi dharmeṇa manujādhipaḥ
c tasya dharmārjitā lokāḥ prajāpālanasaṃcitāḥ
a tatra rājñaḥ paro dharmo damaḥ svādhyāya eva ca
c agnihotraparispando dānādhyayanam eva ca
a yajñopavītadhāraṇaṃ yajño dharmakriyās tathā
c bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇaṃ dharmaḥ kṛte karmaṇy amoghatā
a samyag daṇḍe sthitir dharmo dharmo vedakratukriyāḥ
c vyavahārasthitir dharmaḥ satyavākyaratis tathā
a ārtahastaprado rājā pretya ceha mahīyate
c gobrāhmaṇārthe vikrāntaḥ saṃgrāme nidhanaṃ gataḥ
e aśvamedhajitāṃl lokān prāpnoti tridivālaye
a vaiśyasya satataṃ dharmaḥ pāśupālyaṃ kṛṣis tathā
c agnihotraparispando dānādhyayanam eva ca
a vāṇijyaṃ satpathasthānam ātithyaṃ praśamo damaḥ
c viprāṇāṃ svāgataṃ tyāgo vaiśyadharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
a tilān gandhān rasāṃś caiva na vikrīṇīta vai kva cit
c vaṇikpatham upāsīno vaiśyaḥ satpatham āśritaḥ
a sarvātithyaṃ trivargasya yathāśakti yathārhataḥ
c śūdradharmaḥ paro nityaṃ śuśrūṣā ca dvijātiṣu
a sa śūdraḥ saṃśitatapāḥ satyasaṃdho jitendriyaḥ
c śuśrūṣann atithiṃ prāptaṃ tapaḥ saṃcinute mahat
a tyaktahiṃsaḥ śubhācāro devatādvijapūjakaḥ
c śūdro dharmaphalair iṣṭaiḥ saṃprayujyeta buddhimān
a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ cāturvarṇyasya śobhane
c ekaikasyeha subhage kim anyac chrotum icchasi
 umovāca
a uktās tvayā pṛthagdharmāś cāturvarṇyahitāḥ śubhāḥ
c sarvavyāpī tu yo dharmo bhagavaṃs taṃ bravīhi me
 maheśvara uvāca
a brāhmaṇā lokasāreṇa sṛṣṭā dhātrā guṇārthinā
c lokāṃs tārayituṃ kṛtsnān martyeṣu kṣitidevatāḥ
a teṣām imaṃ pravakṣyāmi dharmakarmaphalodayam
c brāhmaṇeṣu hi yo dharmaḥ sa dharmaḥ paramo mataḥ
a ime tu lokadharmārthaṃ trayaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
c pṛthivyāḥ sarjane nityaṃ sṛṣṭās tān api me śṛṇu
a vedoktaḥ paramo dharmaḥ smṛtiśāstragato 'paraḥ
c śiṣṭācīrṇaḥ paraḥ proktas trayo dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ
a traividyo brāhmaṇo vidvān na cādhyayanajīvanaḥ
c trikarmā triparikrānto maitra eṣa smṛto dvijaḥ
a ṣaḍ imāni tu karmāṇi provāca bhuvaneśvaraḥ
c vṛttyarthaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ vai śṛṇu tāni samāhitā
a yajanaṃ yājanaṃ caiva tathā dānapratigrahau
c adhyāpanam adhītaṃ ca ṣaṭkarmā dharmabhāg dvijaḥ
a nityasvādhyāyatā dharmo dharmo yajñaḥ sanātanaḥ
c dānaṃ praśasyate cāsya yathāśakti yathāvidhi
a ayaṃ tu paramo dharmaḥ pravṛttaḥ satsu nityaśaḥ
c gṛhasthatā viśuddhānāṃ dharmasya nicayo mahān
a pañcayajñaviśuddhātmā satyavāg anasūyakaḥ
c dātā brāhmaṇasatkartā susaṃmṛṣṭaniveśanaḥ
a amānī ca sadājihmaḥ snigdhavāṇīpradas tathā
c atithyabhyāgataratiḥ śeṣānnakṛtabhojanaḥ
a pādyam arghyaṃ yathānyāyam āsanaṃ śayanaṃ tathā
c dīpaṃ pratiśrayaṃ cāpi yo dadāti sa dhārmikaḥ
a prātar utthāya cācamya bhojanenopamantrya ca
c satkṛtyānuvrajed yaś ca tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
a sarvātithyaṃ trivargasya yathāśakti divāniśam
c śūdradharmaḥ samākhyātas trivarṇaparicāraṇam
a pravṛttilakṣaṇo dharmo gṛhastheṣu vidhīyate
c tam ahaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi sarvabhūtahitaṃ śubham
a dātavyam asakṛc chaktyā yaṣṭavyam asakṛt tathā
c puṣṭikarmavidhānaṃ ca kartavyaṃ bhūtim icchatā
a dharmeṇārthaḥ samāhāryo dharmalabdhaṃ tridhā dhanam
c kartavyaṃ dharmaparamaṃ mānavena prayatnataḥ
a ekenāṃśena dharmārthaś cartavyo bhūtim icchatā
c ekenāṃśena kāmārtha ekam aṃśaṃ vivardhayet
a nivṛttilakṣaṇas tv anyo dharmo mokṣa iti smṛtaḥ
c tasya vṛttiṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu me devi tattvataḥ
a sarvabhūtadayā dharmo na caikagrāmavāsitā
c āśāpāśavimokṣaś ca śasyate mokṣakāṅkṣiṇām
a na kuṇḍyāṃ nodake saṅgo na vāsasi na cāsane
c na tridaṇḍe na śayane nāgnau na śaraṇālaye
a adhyātmagatacitto yas tanmanās tatparāyaṇaḥ
c yukto yogaṃ prati sadā pratisaṃkhyānam eva ca
a vṛkṣamūlaśayo nityaṃ śūnyāgāraniveśanaḥ
c nadīpulinaśāyī ca nadītīraratiś ca yaḥ
a vimuktaḥ sarvasaṅgeṣu snehabandheṣu ca dvijaḥ
c ātmany evātmano bhāvaṃ samāsajyāṭati dvijaḥ
a sthāṇubhūto nirāhāro mokṣadṛṣṭena karmaṇā
c parivrajati yo yuktas tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
a na caikatra cirāsakto na caikagrāmagocaraḥ
c yukto hy aṭati nirmukto na caikapulineśayaḥ
a eṣa mokṣavidāṃ dharmo vedoktaḥ satpathaḥ satām
c yo mārgam anuyātīmaṃ padaṃ tasya na vidyate
a caturvidhā bhikṣavas te kuṭīcarakṛtodakaḥ
c haṃsaḥ paramahaṃsaś ca yo yaḥ paścāt sa uttamaḥ
a ataḥ parataraṃ nāsti nādharaṃ na tiro 'grataḥ
c aduḥkham asukhaṃ saumyam ajarāmaram avyayam
 umovāca
a gārhasthyo mokṣadharmaś ca sajjanācaritas tvayā
c bhāṣito martyalokasya mārgaḥ śreyaskaro mahān
a ṛṣidharmaṃ tu dharmajña śrotum icchāmy anuttamam
c spṛhā bhavati me nityaṃ tapovananivāsiṣu
a ājyadhūmodbhavo gandho ruṇaddhīva tapovanam
c taṃ dṛṣṭvā me manaḥ prītaṃ maheśvara sadā bhavet
a etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ deva munidharmakṛtaṃ vibho
c sarvadharmārthatattvajña devadeva vadasva me
e nikhilena mayā pṛṣṭaṃ mahādeva yathātatham
 maheśvara uvāca
a hanta te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi munidharmam anuttamam
c yaṃ kṛtvā munayo yānti siddhiṃ svatapasā śubhe
a phenapānām ṛṣīṇāṃ yo dharmo dharmavidāṃ sadā
c taṃ me śṛṇu mahābhāge dharmajñe dharmam āditaḥ
a uñchanti satataṃ tasmin brāhmaṃ phenotkaraṃ śubham
c amṛtaṃ brahmaṇā pītaṃ madhuraṃ prasṛtaṃ divi
a eṣa teṣāṃ viśuddhānāṃ phenapānāṃ tapodhane
c dharmacaryākṛto mārgo vālakhilyagaṇe śṛṇu
a vālakhilyās tapaḥsiddhā munayaḥ sūryamaṇḍale
c uñcham uñchanti dharmajñāḥ śākunīṃ vṛttim āsthitāḥ
a mṛganirmokavasanāś cīravalkalavāsasaḥ
c nirdvaṃdvāḥ satpathaṃ prāptā vālakhilyās tapodhanāḥ
a aṅguṣṭhaparvamātrās te sveṣv aṅgeṣu vyavasthitāḥ
c tapaścaraṇam īhante teṣāṃ dharmaphalaṃ mahat
a te suraiḥ samatāṃ yānti surakāryārthasiddhaye
c dyotayanto diśaḥ sarvās tapasā dagdhakilbiṣāḥ
a ye tv anye śuddhamanaso dayādharmaparāyaṇāḥ
c santaś cakracarāḥ puṇyāḥ somalokacarāś ca ye
a pitṛlokasamīpasthās ta uñchanti yathāvidhi
c saṃprakṣālāśmakuṭṭāś ca dantolūkhalinas tathā
a somapānāṃ ca devānām ūṣmapāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
c uñchanti ye samīpasthāḥ svabhāvaniyatendriyāḥ
a teṣām agnipariṣyandaḥ pitṛdevārcanaṃ tathā
c yajñānāṃ cāpi pañcānāṃ yajanaṃ dharma ucyate
a eṣa cakracarair devi devalokacarair dvijaiḥ
c ṛṣidharmaḥ sadā cīrṇo yo 'nyas tam api me śṛṇu
a sarveṣv evarṣidharmeṣu jeya ātmā jitendriyaḥ
c kāmakrodhau tataḥ paścāj jetavyāv iti me matiḥ
a agnihotraparispando dharmarātrisamāsanam
c somayajñābhyanujñānaṃ pañcamī yajñadakṣiṇā
a nityaṃ yajñakriyā dharmaḥ pitṛdevārcane ratiḥ
c sarvātithyaṃ ca kartavyam annenoñchārjitena vai
a nivṛttir upabhogasya gorasānāṃ ca vai ratiḥ
c sthaṇḍile śayanaṃ yogaḥ śākaparṇaniṣevaṇam
a phalamūlāśanaṃ vāyur āpaḥ śaivalabhakṣaṇam
c ṛṣīṇāṃ niyamā hy ete yair jayanty ajitāṃ gatim
a vidhūme nyastamusale vyaṅgāre bhuktavaj jane
c atītapātrasaṃcāre kāle vigatabhaikṣake
a atithiṃ kāṅkṣamāṇo vai śeṣānnakṛtabhojanaḥ
c satyadharmaratiḥ kṣānto munidharmeṇa yujyate
a na stambhī na ca mānī yo na pramatto na vismitaḥ
c mitrāmitrasamo maitro yaḥ sa dharmavid uttamaḥ
 umovāca
a deśeṣu ramaṇīyeṣu girīṇāṃ nirjhareṣu ca
c sravantīnāṃ ca kuñjeṣu parvatopavaneṣu ca
a deśeṣu ca vicitreṣu phalavatsu samāhitāḥ
c mūlavatsu ca deśeṣu vasanti niyatavratāḥ
a teṣām api vidhiṃ puṇyaṃ śrotum icchāmi śaṃkara
c vānaprastheṣu deveśa svaśarīropajīviṣu
d vānaprasthoñchavṛttīnāṃ tapovistṛtacetasām
 maheśvara uvāca
a vānaprastheṣu yo dharmas taṃ me śṛṇu samāhitā
c śrutvā caikamanā devi dharmabuddhiparā bhava
a saṃsiddhair niyataiḥ sadbhir vanavāsam upāgataiḥ
c vānaprasthair idaṃ karma kartavyaṃ śṛṇu yādṛśam
a trikālam abhiṣekārthaḥ pitṛdevārcanaṃ kriyā
c agnihotraparispanda iṣṭihomavidhis tathā
a nīvāragrahaṇaṃ caiva phalamūlaniṣevaṇam
c iṅgudair aṇḍatailānāṃ snehārthaṃ ca niṣevaṇam
a yogacaryākṛtaiḥ siddhaiḥ kāmakrodhavivarjanam
c vīraśayyām upāsadbhir vīrasthānopasevibhiḥ
a yuktair yogavahaiḥ sadbhir grīṣme pañcatapais tathā
c maṇḍūkayoganiyatair yathānyāyaniṣevibhiḥ
a vīrāsanagatair nityaṃ sthaṇḍile śayanais tathā
c śītayogo 'gniyogaś ca cartavyo dharmabuddhibhiḥ
a abbhakṣair vāyubhakṣaiś ca śaivālottarabhojanaiḥ
c aśmakuṭṭais tathā dāntaiḥ saṃprakṣālais tathāparaiḥ
a cīravalkalasaṃvītair mṛgacarmanivāsibhiḥ
c kāryā yātrā yathākālaṃ yathādharmaṃ yathāvidhi
a vananityair vanacarair vanapair vanagocaraiḥ
c vanaṃ gurum ivāsādya vastavyaṃ vanajīvibhiḥ
a teṣāṃ homakriyā dharmaḥ pañcayajñaniṣevaṇam
c nāgapañcamayajñasya vedoktasyānupālanam
a aṣṭamīyajñaparatā cāturmāsyaniṣevaṇam
c paurṇamāsyāṃ tu yo yajño nityayajñas tathaiva ca
a vimuktā dārasaṃyogair vimuktāḥ sarvasaṃkaraiḥ
c vimuktāḥ sarvapāpaiś ca caranti munayo vane
a srugbhāṇḍaparamā nityaṃ tretāgniśaraṇāḥ sadā
c santaḥ satpathanityā ye te yānti paramāṃ gatim
a brahmalokaṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ somalokaṃ ca śāśvatam
c gacchanti munayaḥ siddhā ṛṣidharmavyapāśrayāt
a eṣa dharmo mayā devi vānaprasthāśritaḥ śubhaḥ
c vistareṇārthasaṃpanno yathāsthūlam udāhṛtaḥ
 umovāca
a bhagavan devadeveśa sarvabhūtanamaskṛta
c yo dharmo munisaṃghasya siddhivādeṣu taṃ vada
a siddhivādeṣu saṃsiddhās tathā vananivāsinaḥ
c svairiṇo dārasaṃyuktās teṣāṃ dharmaḥ kathaṃ smṛtaḥ
 maheśvara uvāca
a svairiṇas tāpasā devi sarve dāravihāriṇaḥ
c teṣāṃ mauṇḍyaṃ kaṣāyaś ca vāsarātriś ca kāraṇam
a trikālam abhiṣekaś ca hotraṃ tv ṛṣikṛtaṃ mahat
c samādhiḥ satpathasthānaṃ yathoditaniṣevaṇam
a ye ca te pūrvakathitā dharmā vananivāsinām
c yadi sevanti dharmāṃs tān āpnuvanti tapaḥphalam
a ye ca daṃpatidharmāṇaḥ svadāraniyatendriyāḥ
c caranti vidhidṛṣṭaṃ tad ṛtukālābhigāminaḥ
a teṣām ṛṣikṛto dharmo dharmiṇām upapadyate
c na kāmakārāt kāmo 'nyaḥ saṃsevyo dharmadarśibhiḥ
a sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ samyag dadāty abhayadakṣiṇām
c hiṃsāroṣavimuktātmā sa vai dharmeṇa yujyate
a sarvabhūtānukampī yaḥ sarvabhūtārjavavrataḥ
c sarvabhūtātmabhūtaś ca sa vai dharmeṇa yujyate
a sarvavedeṣu vā snānaṃ sarvabhūteṣu cārjavam
c ubhe ete same syātām ārjavaṃ vā viśiṣyate
a ārjavaṃ dharma ity āhur adharmo jihma ucyate
c ārjaveneha saṃyukto naro dharmeṇa yujyate
a ārjavo bhuvane nityaṃ vasaty amarasaṃnidhau
c tasmād ārjavanityaḥ syād ya icched dharmam ātmanaḥ
a kṣānto dānto jitakrodho dharmabhūto 'vihiṃsakaḥ
c dharme ratamanā nityaṃ naro dharmeṇa yujyate
a vyapetatandro dharmātmā śakyā satpatham āśritaḥ
c cāritraparamo buddho brahmabhūyāya kalpate
 umovāca
a āśramābhiratā deva tāpasā ye tapodhanāḥ
c dīptimantaḥ kayā caiva caryayātha bhavanti te
a rājāno rājaputrāś ca nirdhanā vā mahādhanāḥ
c karmaṇā kena bhagavan prāpnuvanti mahāphalam
a nityaṃ sthānam upāgamya divyacandanarūṣitāḥ
c kena vā karmaṇā deva bhavanti vanagocarāḥ
a etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ deva tapaścaryāgataṃ śubham
c śaṃsa sarvam aśeṣeṇa tryakṣa tripuranāśana
 maheśvara uvāca
a upavāsavratair dāntā ahiṃsrāḥ satyavādinaḥ
c saṃsiddhāḥ pretya gandharvaiḥ saha modanty anāmayāḥ
a maṇḍūkayogaśayano yathāsthānaṃ yathāvidhi
c dīkṣāṃ carati dharmātmā sa nāgaiḥ saha modate
a śaṣpaṃ mṛgamukhotsṛṣṭaṃ yo mṛgaiḥ saha sevate
c dīkṣito vai mudā yuktaḥ sa gacchaty amarāvatīm
a śaivālaṃ śīrṇaparṇaṃ vā tad vrato yo niṣevate
c śītayogavaho nityaṃ sa gacchet paramāṃ gatim
a vāyubhakṣo 'mbubhakṣo vā phalamūlāśano 'pi vā
c yakṣeṣv aiśvaryam ādhāya modate 'psarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
a agniyogavaho grīṣme vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
c cīrtvā dvādaśa varṣāṇi rājā bhavati pārthivaḥ
a āhāraniyamaṃ kṛtvā munir dvādaśavārṣikam
c maruṃ saṃsādhya yatnena rājā bhavati pārthivaḥ
a sthaṇḍile śuddham ākāśaṃ parigṛhya samantataḥ
c praviśya ca mudā yukto dīkṣāṃ dvādaśavārṣikīm
a sthaṇḍilasya phalāny āhur yānāni śayanāni ca
c gṛhāṇi ca mahārhāṇi candraśubhrāṇi bhāmini
a ātmānam upajīvan yo niyato niyatāśanaḥ
c dehaṃ vānaśane tyaktvā sa svargaṃ samupāśnute
a ātmānam upajīvan yo dīkṣāṃ dvādaśavārṣikīm
c tyaktvā mahārṇave dehaṃ vāruṇaṃ lokam aśnute
a ātmānam upajīvan yo dīkṣāṃ dvādaśavārṣikīm
c aśmanā caraṇau bhittvā guhyakeṣu sa modate
a sādhayitvātmanātmānaṃ nirdvaṃdvo niṣparigrahaḥ
c cīrtvā dvādaśa varṣāṇi dīkṣām ekāṃ manogatām
e svargalokam avāpnoti devaiś ca saha modate
a ātmānam upajīvan yo dīkṣāṃ dvādaśavārṣikīm
c hutvāgnau deham utsṛjya vahniloke mahīyate
a yas tu devi yathānyāyaṃ dīkṣito niyato dvijaḥ
c ātmany ātmānam ādhāya nirdvaṃdvo niṣparigrahaḥ
a cīrtvā dvādaśa varṣāṇi dīkṣām ekāṃ manogatām
c araṇīsahitaṃ skandhe baddhvā gacchaty anāvṛtaḥ
a vīrādhvānamanā nityaṃ vīrāsanaratas tathā
c vīrasthāyī ca satataṃ sa vīragatim āpnuyāt
a sa śakralokago nityaṃ sarvakāmapuraskṛtaḥ
c divyapuṣpasamākīrṇo divyacandanabhūṣitaḥ
e sukhaṃ vasati dharmātmā divi devagaṇaiḥ saha
a vīralokagato vīro vīrayogavahaḥ sadā
c sattvasthaḥ sarvam utsṛjya dīkṣito niyataḥ śuciḥ
e vīrādhvānaṃ prapadyed yas tasya lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
a kāmagena vimānena sa vai carati cchandataḥ
c śakralokagataḥ śrīmān modate ca nirāmayaḥ
 umovāca
a bhagavan bhaganetraghna pūṣṇo daśanapātana
c dakṣakratuhara tryakṣa saṃśayo me mahān ayam
a cāturvarṇyaṃ bhagavatā pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃbhuvā
c kena karmavipākena vaiśyo gacchati śūdratām
a vaiśyo vā kṣatriyaḥ kena dvijo vā kṣatriyo bhavet
c pratilomaḥ kathaṃ deva śakyo dharmo niṣevitum
a kena vā karmaṇā vipraḥ śūdrayonau prajāyate
c kṣatriyaḥ śūdratām eti kena vā karmaṇā vibho
a etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ deva vada bhūtapate 'nagha
c trayo varṇāḥ prakṛtyeha kathaṃ brāhmaṇyam āpnuyuḥ
 maheśvara uvāca
a brāhmaṇyaṃ devi duṣprāpaṃ nisargād brāhmaṇaḥ śubhe
c kṣatriyo vaiśyaśūdrau vā nisargād iti me matiḥ
a karmaṇā duṣkṛteneha sthānād bhraśyati vai dvijaḥ
c jyeṣṭhaṃ varṇam anuprāpya tasmād rakṣeta vai dvijaḥ
a sthito brāhmaṇadharmeṇa brāhmaṇyam upajīvati
c kṣatriyo vātha vaiśyo vā brahmabhūyāya gacchati
a yas tu vipratvam utsṛjya kṣātraṃ dharmaṃ niṣevate
c brāhmaṇyāt sa paribhraṣṭaḥ kṣatrayonau prajāyate
a vaiśyakarma ca yo vipro lobhamohavyapāśrayaḥ
c brāhmaṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ prāpya karoty alpamatiḥ sadā
a sa dvijo vaiśyatām eti vaiśyo vā śūdratām iyāt
c svadharmāt pracyuto vipras tataḥ śūdratvam āpnute
a tatrāsau nirayaṃ prāpto varṇabhraṣṭo bahiṣkṛtaḥ
c brahmalokaparibhraṣṭaḥ śūdraḥ samupajāyate
a kṣatriyo vā mahābhāge vaiśyo vā dharmacāriṇi
c svāni karmāṇy apāhāya śūdrakarmāṇi sevate
a svasthānāt sa paribhraṣṭo varṇasaṃkaratāṃ gataḥ
c brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdratvaṃ yāti tādṛśaḥ
a yas tu śuddhaḥ svadharmeṇa jñānavijñānavāñ śuciḥ
c dharmajño dharmanirataḥ sa dharmaphalam aśnute
a idaṃ caivāparaṃ devi brahmaṇā samudīritam
c adhyātmaṃ naiṣṭhikaṃ sadbhir dharmakāmair niṣevyate
a ugrānnaṃ garhitaṃ devi gaṇānnaṃ śrāddhasūtakam
c ghuṣṭānnaṃ naiva bhoktavyaṃ śūdrānnaṃ naiva karhi cit
a śūdrānnaṃ garhitaṃ devi devadevair mahātmabhiḥ
c pitāmahamukhotsṛṣṭaṃ pramāṇam iti me matiḥ
a śūdrānnenāvaśeṣeṇa jaṭhare yo mriyeta vai
c āhitāgnis tathā yajvā sa śūdragatibhāg bhavet
a tena śūdrānnaśeṣeṇa brahmasthānād apākṛtaḥ
c brāhmaṇaḥ śūdratām eti nāsti tatra vicāraṇā
a yasyānnenāvaśeṣeṇa jaṭhare yo mriyeta vai
c tāṃ tāṃ yoniṃ vrajed vipro yasyānnam upajīvati
a brāhmaṇatvaṃ śubhaṃ prāpya durlabhaṃ yo 'vamanyate
c abhojyānnāni cāśnāti sa dvijatvāt pateta vai
a surāpo brahmahā kṣudraś cauro bhagnavrato 'śuciḥ
c svādhyāyavarjitaḥ pāpo lubdho naikṛtikaḥ śaṭhaḥ
a avratī vṛṣalībhartā kuṇḍāśī somavikrayī
c nihīnasevī vipro hi patati brahmayonitaḥ
a gurutalpī gurudveṣī gurukutsāratiś ca yaḥ
c brahmadviṭ cāpi patati brāhmaṇo brahmayonitaḥ
a ebhis tu karmabhir devi śubhair ācaritais tathā
c śūdro brāhmaṇatāṃ gacched vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyatāṃ vrajet
a śūdrakarmāṇi sarvāṇi yathānyāyaṃ yathāvidhi
c śuśrūṣāṃ paricaryāṃ ca jyeṣṭhe varṇe prayatnataḥ
e kuryād avimanāḥ śūdraḥ satataṃ satpathe sthitaḥ
a daivatadvijasatkartā sarvātithyakṛtavrataḥ
c ṛtukālābhigāmī ca niyato niyatāśanaḥ
a caukṣaś caukṣajanānveṣī śeṣānnakṛtabhojanaḥ
c vṛthāmāṃsāny abhuñjānaḥ śūdro vaiśyatvam ṛcchati
a ṛtavāg anahaṃvādī nirdvaṃdvaḥ śamakovidaḥ
c yajate nityayajñaiś ca svādhyāyaparamaḥ śuciḥ
a dānto brāhmaṇasatkartā sarvavarṇabubhūṣakaḥ
c gṛhasthavratam ātiṣṭhan dvikālakṛtabhojanaḥ
a śeṣāśī vijitāhāro niṣkāmo nirahaṃvadaḥ
c agnihotram upāsaṃś ca juhvānaś ca yathāvidhi
a sarvātithyam upātiṣṭhañ śeṣānnakṛtabhojanaḥ
c tretāgnimantravihito vaiśyo bhavati vai yadi
e sa vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyakule śucau mahati jāyate
a sa vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyo jāto janmaprabhṛti saṃskṛtaḥ
c upanīto vrataparo dvijo bhavati satkṛtaḥ
a dadāti yajate yajñaiḥ saṃskṛtair āptadakṣiṇaiḥ
c adhīte svargam anvicchaṃs tretāgniśaraṇaḥ sadā
a ārtahastaprado nityaṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālayan
c satyaḥ satyāni kurute nityaṃ yaḥ sukhadarśanaḥ
a dharmadaṇḍo na nirdaṇḍo dharmakāryānuśāsakaḥ
c yantritaḥ kāryakaraṇe ṣaḍbhāgakṛtalakṣaṇaḥ
a grāmyadharmān na seveta svacchandenārthakovidaḥ
c ṛtukāle tu dharmātmā patnīṃ seveta nityadā
a sarvopavāsī niyataḥ svādhyāyaparamaḥ śuciḥ
c barhiṣkāntarite nityaṃ śayāno 'gnigṛhe sadā
a sarvātithyaṃ trivargasya kurvāṇaḥ sumanāḥ sadā
c śūdrāṇāṃ cānnakāmānāṃ nityaṃ siddham iti bruvan
a svārthād vā yadi vā kāmān na kiṃ cid upalakṣayet
c pitṛdevātithikṛte sādhanaṃ kurute ca yaḥ
a svaveśmani yathānyāyam upāste bhaikṣam eva ca
c trikālam agnihotraṃ ca juhvāno vai yathāvidhi
a gobrāhmaṇahitārthāya raṇe cābhimukho hataḥ
c tretāgnimantrapūtaṃ vā samāviśya dvijo bhavet
a jñānavijñānasaṃpannaḥ saṃskṛto vedapāragaḥ
c vipro bhavati dharmātmā kṣatriyaḥ svena karmaṇā
a etaiḥ karmaphalair devi nyūnajātikulodbhavaḥ
c śūdro 'py āgamasaṃpanno dvijo bhavati saṃskṛtaḥ
a brāhmaṇo vāpy asadvṛttaḥ sarvasaṃkarabhojanaḥ
c brāhmaṇyaṃ puṇyam utsṛjya śūdro bhavati tādṛśaḥ
a karmabhiḥ śucibhir devi śuddhātmā vijitendriyaḥ
c śūdro 'pi dvijavat sevya iti brahmābravīt svayam
a svabhāvakarma ca śubhaṃ yatra śūdre 'pi tiṣṭhati
c viśuddhaḥ sa dvijātir vai vijñeya iti me matiḥ
a na yonir nāpi saṃskāro na śrutaṃ na ca saṃnatiḥ
c kāraṇāni dvijatvasya vṛttam eva tu kāraṇam
a sarvo 'yaṃ brāhmaṇo loke vṛttena tu vidhīyate
c vṛtte sthitaś ca suśroṇi brāhmaṇatvaṃ nigacchati
a brāhmaḥ svabhāvaḥ kalyāṇi samaḥ sarvatra me matiḥ
c nirguṇaṃ nirmalaṃ brahma yatra tiṣṭhati sa dvijaḥ
a ete yoniphalā devi sthānabhāganidarśakāḥ
c svayaṃ ca varadenoktā brahmaṇā sṛjatā prajāḥ
a brāhmaṇo hi mahat kṣetraṃ loke carati pādavat
c yat tatra bījaṃ vapati sā kṛṣiḥ pāralaukikī
a mitāśinā sadā bhāvyaṃ satpathālambinā sadā
c brāhmamārgam atikramya vartitavyaṃ bubhūṣatā
a saṃhitādhyāyinā bhāvyaṃ gṛhe vai gṛhamedhinā
c nityaṃ svādhyāyayuktena dānādhyayanajīvinā
a evaṃbhūto hi yo vipraḥ satataṃ satpathe sthitaḥ
c āhitāgnir adhīyāno brahmabhūyāya kalpate
a brāhmaṇyam eva saṃprāpya rakṣitavyaṃ yatātmabhiḥ
c yonipratigrahādānaiḥ karmabhiś ca śucismite
a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathā śūdro bhaved dvijaḥ
c brāhmaṇo vā cyuto dharmād yathā śūdratvam āpnute
 umovāca
a bhagavan sarvabhūteśa surāsuranamaskṛta
c dharmādharme nṛṇāṃ deva brūhi me saṃśayaṃ vibho
a karmaṇā manasā vācā trividhaṃ hi naraḥ sadā
c badhyate bandhanaiḥ pāśair mucyate 'py atha vā punaḥ
a kena śīlena vā deva karmaṇā kīdṛśena vā
c samācārair guṇair vākyaiḥ svargaṃ yāntīha mānavāḥ
 maheśvara uvāca
a devi dharmārthatattvajñe satyanitye dame rate
c sarvaprāṇihitaḥ praśnaḥ śrūyatāṃ buddhivardhanaḥ
a satyadharmaratāḥ santaḥ sarvalipsāvivarjitāḥ
c nādharmeṇa na dharmeṇa badhyante chinnasaṃśayāḥ
a pralayotpattitattvajñāḥ sarvajñāḥ samadarśinaḥ
c vītarāgā vimucyante puruṣāḥ sarvabandhanaiḥ
a karmaṇā manasā vācā ye na hiṃsanti kiṃ cana
c ye na sajjanti kasmiṃś cid badhyante te na karmabhiḥ
a prāṇātipātād viratāḥ śīlavanto dayānvitāḥ
c tulyadveṣyapriyā dāntā mucyante karmabandhanaiḥ
a sarvabhūtadayāvanto viśvāsyāḥ sarvajantuṣu
c tyaktahiṃsāsamācārās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a parasve nirmamā nityaṃ paradāravivarjakāḥ
c dharmalabdhārthabhoktāras te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a mātṛvat svasṛvac caiva nityaṃ duhitṛvac ca ye
c paradāreṣu vartante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a stainyān nivṛttāḥ satataṃ saṃtuṣṭāḥ svadhanena ca
c svabhāgyāny upajīvanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a svadāraniratā ye ca ṛtukālābhigāminaḥ
c agrāmyasukhabhogāś ca te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a paradāreṣu ye nityaṃ cāritrāvṛtalocanāḥ
c yatendriyāḥ śīlaparās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a eṣa devakṛto mārgaḥ sevitavyaḥ sadā naraiḥ
c akaṣāyakṛtaś caiva mārgaḥ sevyaḥ sadā budhaiḥ
a dānadharmatapoyuktaḥ śīlaśaucadayātmakaḥ
c vṛttyarthaṃ dharmahetor vā sevitavyaḥ sadā naraiḥ
e svargavāsam abhīpsadbhir na sevyas tv ata uttaraḥ
 umovāca
a vācātha badhyate yena mucyate 'py atha vā punaḥ
c tāni karmāṇi me deva vada bhūtapate 'nagha
 maheśvara uvāca
a ātmahetoḥ parārthe vā narmahāsyāśrayāt tathā
c ye mṛṣā na vadantīha te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a vṛttyarthaṃ dharmahetor vā kāmakārāt tathaiva ca
c anṛtaṃ ye na bhāṣante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a ślakṣṇāṃ vāṇīṃ nirābādhāṃ madhurāṃ pāpavarjitām
c svāgatenābhibhāṣante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a kaṭukāṃ ye na bhāṣante paruṣāṃ niṣṭhurāṃ giram
c apaiśunyaratāḥ santas te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a piśunāṃ ye na bhāṣante mitrabhedakarīṃ giram
c ṛtāṃ maitrīṃ prabhāṣante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a varjayanti sadā sūcyaṃ paradrohaṃ ca mānavāḥ
c sarvabhūtasamā dāntās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a śaṭhapralāpād viratā viruddhaparivarjakāḥ
c saumyapralāpino nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a na kopād vyāharante ye vācaṃ hṛdayadāraṇīm
c sāntvaṃ vadanti kruddhāpi te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a eṣa vāṇīkṛto devi dharmaḥ sevyaḥ sadā naraiḥ
c śubhaḥ satyaguṇo nityaṃ varjanīyā mṛṣā budhaiḥ
 umovāca
a manasā badhyate yena karmaṇā puruṣaḥ sadā
c tan me brūhi mahābhāga devadeva pinākadhṛk
 maheśvara uvāca
a mānaseneha dharmeṇa saṃyuktāḥ puruṣāḥ sadā
c svargaṃ gacchanti kalyāṇi tan me kīrtayataḥ śṛṇu
a duṣpraṇītena manasā duṣpraṇītatarākṛtiḥ
c badhyate mānavo yena śṛṇu cānyac chubhānane
a araṇye vijane nyastaṃ parasvaṃ vīkṣya ye narāḥ
c manasāpi na hiṃsanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a grāme gṛhe vā yad dravyaṃ pārakyaṃ vijane sthitam
c nābhinandanti vai nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a tathaiva paradārān ye kāmavṛttān rahogatān
c manasāpi na hiṃsanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a śatruṃ mitraṃ ca ye nityaṃ tulyena manasā narāḥ
c bhajanti maitrāḥ saṃgamya te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a śrutavanto dayāvantaḥ śucayaḥ satyasaṃgarāḥ
c svair arthaiḥ parisaṃtuṣṭās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a avairā ye tv anāyāsā maitracittaparāḥ sadā
c sarvabhūtadayāvantas te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a śraddhāvanto dayāvantaś cokṣāś cokṣajanapriyāḥ
c dharmādharmavido nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a śubhānām aśubhānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ phalasaṃcaye
c vipākajñāś ca ye devi te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a nyāyopetā guṇopetā devadvijaparāḥ sadā
c samatāṃ samanuprāptās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
a śubhaiḥ karmaphalair devi mayaite parikīrtitāḥ
c svargamārgopagā bhūyaḥ kim anyac chrotum icchasi
 umovāca
a mahān me saṃśayaḥ kaś cin martyān prati maheśvara
c tasmāt taṃ naipuṇenādya mamākhyātuṃ tvam arhasi
a kenāyur labhate dīrghaṃ karmaṇā puruṣaḥ prabho
c tapasā vāpi deveśa kenāyur labhate mahat
a kṣīṇāyuḥ kena bhavati karmaṇā bhuvi mānavaḥ
c vipākaṃ karmaṇāṃ deva vaktum arhasy anindita
a apare ca mahābhogā mandabhogās tathāpare
c akulīnās tathā cānye kulīnāś ca tathāpare
a durdarśāḥ ke cid ābhānti narāḥ kāṣṭhamayā iva
c priyadarśās tathā cānye darśanād eva mānavāḥ
a duṣprajñāḥ ke cid ābhānti ke cid ābhānti paṇḍitāḥ
c mahāprajñās tathaivānye jñānavijñānadarśinaḥ
a alpābādhās tathā ke cin mahābādhās tathāpare
c dṛśyante puruṣā deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
 maheśvara uvāca
a hanta te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi devi karmaphalodayam
c martyaloke narāḥ sarve yena svaṃ bhuñjate phalam
a prāṇātipātī yo raudro daṇḍahastodyatas tathā
c nityam udyatadaṇḍaś ca hanti bhūtagaṇān naraḥ
a nirdayaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ nityam udvegakārakaḥ
c api kīṭapipīlānām aśaraṇyaḥ sunirghṛṇaḥ
a evaṃbhūto naro devi nirayaṃ pratipadyate
c viparītas tu dharmātmā rūpavān abhijāyate
a nirayaṃ yāti hiṃsātmā yāti svargam ahiṃsakaḥ
c yātanāṃ niraye raudrāṃ sa kṛcchrāṃ labhate naraḥ
a atha cen nirayāt tasmāt samuttarati karhi cit
c mānuṣyaṃ labhate cāpi hīnāyus tatra jāyate
a pāpena karmaṇā devi baddho hiṃsāratir naraḥ
c apriyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ hīnāyur upajāyate
a yas tu śuklābhijātīyaḥ prāṇighātavivarjakaḥ
c nikṣiptadaṇḍo nirdaṇḍo na hinasti kadā cana
a na ghātayati no hanti ghnantaṃ naivānumodate
c sarvabhūteṣu sasneho yathātmani tathāpare
a īdṛśaḥ puruṣotkarṣo devi devatvam aśnute
c upapannān sukhān bhogān upāśnāti mudā yutaḥ
a atha cen mānuṣe loke kadā cid upapadyate
c tatra dīrghāyur utpannaḥ sa naraḥ sukham edhate
a evaṃ dīrghāyuṣāṃ mārgaḥ suvṛttānāṃ sukarmaṇām
c prāṇihiṃsāvimokṣeṇa brahmaṇā samudīritaḥ
 umovāca
a kiṃśīlāḥ kiṃsamācārāḥ puruṣāḥ kaiś ca karmabhiḥ
c svargaṃ samabhipadyante saṃpradānena kena vā
 maheśvara uvāca
a dātā brāhmaṇasatkartā dīnāndhakṛpaṇādiṣu
c bhakṣyabhojyānnapānānāṃ vāsasāṃ ca pradāyakaḥ
a pratiśrayān sabhāḥ kūpān prapāḥ puṣkariṇīs tathā
c naityakāni ca sarvāṇi kim icchakam atīva ca
a āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ dhanaṃ ratnaṃ gṛhāṃs tathā
c sasyajātāni sarvāṇi gāḥ kṣetrāṇy atha yoṣitaḥ
a supratītamanā nityaṃ yaḥ prayacchati mānavaḥ
c evaṃbhūto mṛto devi devaloke 'bhijāyate
a tatroṣya suciraṃ kālaṃ bhuktvā bhogān anuttamān
c sahāpsarobhir mudito ramitvā nandanādiṣu
a tasmāt svargāc cyuto lokān mānuṣeṣūpajāyate
c mahābhoge kule devi dhanadhānyasamācite
a tatra kāmaguṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ samupeto mudā yutaḥ
c mahābhogo mahākośo dhanī bhavati mānavaḥ
a ete devi mahābhogāḥ prāṇino dānaśīlinaḥ
c brahmaṇā vai purā proktāḥ sarvasya priyadarśanāḥ
a apare mānavā devi pradānakṛpaṇā dvijaiḥ
c yācitā na prayacchanti vidyamāne 'py abuddhayaḥ
a dīnāndhakṛpaṇān dṛṣṭvā bhikṣukān atithīn api
c yācyamānā nivartante jihvālobhasamanvitāḥ
a na dhanāni na vāsāṃsi na bhogān na ca kāñcanam
c na gāvo nānnavikṛtiṃ prayacchanti kadā cana
a apravṛttās tu ye lubdhā nāstikā dānavarjitāḥ
c evaṃbhūtā narā devi nirayaṃ yānty abuddhayaḥ
a te cen manuṣyatāṃ yānti yadā kālasya paryayāt
c dhanarikte kule janma labhante svalpabuddhayaḥ
a kṣutpipāsāparītāś ca sarvabhogabahiṣkṛtāḥ
c nirāśāḥ sarvabhogebhyo jīvanty adhamajīvikām
a alpabhogakule jātā alpabhogaratā narāḥ
c anena karmaṇā devi bhavanty adhanino narāḥ
a apare stambhino nityaṃ māninaḥ pāpato ratāḥ
c āsanārhasya ye pīṭhaṃ na prayacchanty acetasaḥ
a mārgārhasya ca ye mārgaṃ na yacchanty alpabuddhayaḥ
c pādyārhasya ca ye pādyaṃ na dadaty alpabuddhayaḥ
a arghārhān na ca satkārair arcayanti yathāvidhi
c arghyam ācamanīyaṃ vā na yacchanty alpabuddhayaḥ
a guruṃ cābhigataṃ premṇā guruvan na bubhūṣate
c abhimānapravṛttena lobhena samavasthitāḥ
a saṃmānyāṃś cāvamanyante vṛddhān paribhavanti ca
c evaṃvidhā narā devi sarve nirayagāminaḥ
a te vai yadi narās tasmān nirayād uttaranti vai
c varṣapūgais tato janma labhante kutsite kule
a śvapākapulkasādīnāṃ kutsitānām acetasām
c kuleṣu teṣu jāyante guruvṛddhāpacāyinaḥ
a na stambhī na ca mānī yo devatādvijapūjakaḥ
c lokapūjyo namaskartā praśrito madhuraṃ vadan
a sarvavarṇapriyakaraḥ sarvabhūtahitaḥ sadā
c adveṣī sumukhaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ snigdhavāṇīpradaḥ sadā
a svāgatenaiva sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām avihiṃsakaḥ
c yathārhasatkriyāpūrvam arcayann upatiṣṭhati
a mārgārhāya dadan mārgaṃ guruṃ guruvad arcayan
c atithipragraharatas tathābhyāgatapūjakaḥ
a evaṃbhūto naro devi svargatiṃ pratipadyate
c tato mānuṣatāṃ prāpya viśiṣṭakulajo bhavet
a tatrāsau vipulair bhogaiḥ sarvaratnasamāyutaḥ
c yathārhadātā cārheṣu dharmacaryāparo bhavet
a saṃmataḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvalokanamaskṛtaḥ
c svakarmaphalam āpnoti svayam eva naraḥ sadā
a udāttakulajātīya udāttābhijanaḥ sadā
c eṣa dharmo mayā prokto vidhātrā svayam īritaḥ
a yas tu raudrasamācāraḥ sarvasattvabhayaṃkaraḥ
c hastābhyāṃ yadi vā padbhyāṃ rajjvā daṇḍena vā punaḥ
a loṣṭaiḥ stambhair upāyair vā jantūn bādhati śobhane
c hiṃsārthaṃ nikṛtiprajñaḥ prodvejayati caiva ha
a upakrāmati jantūṃś ca udvegajananaḥ sadā
c evaṃśīlasamācāro nirayaṃ pratipadyate
a sa cen mānuṣatāṃ gacched yadi kālasya paryayāt
c bahvābādhaparikliṣṭe so 'dhame jāyate kule
a lokadveṣyo 'dhamaḥ puṃsāṃ svayaṃ karmakṛtaiḥ phalaiḥ
c eṣa devi manuṣyeṣu boddhavyo jñātibandhuṣu
a aparaḥ sarvabhūtāni dayāvān anupaśyati
c maitradṛṣṭiḥ pitṛsamo nirvairo niyatendriyaḥ
a nodvejayati bhūtāni na vihiṃsayate tathā
c hastapādaiḥ suniyatair viśvāsyaḥ sarvajantuṣu
a na rajjvā na ca daṇḍena na loṣṭair nāyudhena ca
c udvejayati bhūtāni ślakṣṇakarmā dayāparaḥ
a evaṃśīlasamācāraḥ svarge samupajāyate
c tatrāsau bhavane divye mudā vasati devavat
a sa cet karmakṣayān martyo manuṣyeṣūpajāyate
c alpābādho nirītīkaḥ sa jātaḥ sukham edhate
a sukhabhāgī nirāyāso nirudvegaḥ sadā naraḥ
c eṣa devi satāṃ mārgo bādhā yatra na vidyate
 umovāca
a ime manuṣyā dṛśyante ūhāpohaviśāradāḥ
c jñānavijñānasaṃpannāḥ prajñāvanto 'rthakovidāḥ
e duṣprajñāś cāpare deva jñānavijñānavarjitāḥ
a kena karmavipākena prajñāvān puruṣo bhavet
c alpaprajño virūpākṣa kathaṃ bhavati mānavaḥ
e etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ chinddhi sarvadharmavidāṃ vara
a jātyandhāś cāpare deva rogārtāś cāpare tathā
c narāḥ klībāś ca dṛśyante kāraṇaṃ brūhi tatra vai
 maheśvara uvāca
a brāhmaṇān vedaviduṣaḥ siddhān dharmavidas tathā
c paripṛcchanty aharahaḥ kuśalākuśalaṃ tathā
a varjayanty aśubhaṃ karma sevamānāḥ śubhaṃ tathā
c labhante svargatiṃ nityam iha loke sukhaṃ tathā
a sa cen mānuṣatāṃ yāti medhāvī tatra jāyate
c śrutaṃ prajñānugaṃ cāsya kalyāṇam upajāyate
a paradāreṣu ye mūḍhāś cakṣur duṣṭaṃ prayuñjate
c tena duṣṭasvabhāvena jātyandhās te bhavanti ha
a manasā tu praduṣṭena nagnāṃ paśyanti ye striyam
c rogārtās te bhavantīha narā duṣkṛtakarmiṇaḥ
a ye tu mūḍhā durācārā viyonau maithune ratāḥ
c puruṣeṣu suduṣprajñāḥ klībatvam upayānti te
a paśūṃś ca ye bandhayanti ye caiva gurutalpagāḥ
c prakīrṇamaithunā ye ca klībā jāyanti te narāḥ
 umovāca
a sāvadyaṃ kiṃ nu vai karma niravadyaṃ tathaiva ca
c śreyaḥ kurvann avāpnoti mānavo devasattama
 maheśvara uvāca
a śreyāṃsaṃ mārgam ātiṣṭhan sadā yaḥ pṛcchate dvijān
c dharmānveṣī guṇākāṅkṣī sa svargaṃ samupāśnute
a yadi mānuṣatāṃ devi kadā cit sa nigacchati
c medhāvī dhāraṇāyuktaḥ prājñas tatrābhijāyate
a eṣa devi satāṃ dharmo mantavyo bhūtikārakaḥ
c nṛṇāṃ hitārthāya tava mayā vai samudāhṛtaḥ
 umovāca
a apare svalpavijñānā dharmavidveṣiṇo narāḥ
c brāhmaṇān vedaviduṣo necchanti parisarpitum
a vratavanto narāḥ ke cic chraddhādamaparāyaṇāḥ
c avratā bhraṣṭaniyamās tathānye rākṣasopamāḥ
a yajvānaś ca tathaivānye nirhomāś ca tathāpare
c kena karmavipākena bhavantīha vadasva me
 maheśvara uvāca
a āgamāl lokadharmāṇāṃ maryādāḥ pūrvanirmitāḥ
c prāmāṇyenānuvartante dṛśyante hi dṛḍhavratāḥ
a adharmaṃ dharmam ity āhur ye ca mohavaśaṃ gatāḥ
c avratā naṣṭamaryādās te proktā brahmarākṣasāḥ
a te cet kālakṛtodyogāt saṃbhavantīha mānuṣāḥ
c nirhomā nirvaṣaṭkārās te bhavanti narādhamāḥ
a eṣa devi mayā sarvaḥ saṃśayacchedanāya te
c kuśalākuśalo nṝṇāṃ vyākhyāto dharmasāgaraḥ
 nārada uvāca
 evam uktvā mahādevaḥ śrotukāmaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ
 anukūlāṃ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ pārśvasthāṃ samabhāṣata
 maheśvara uvāca
a parāvarajñe dharmajñe tapovananivāsini
c sādhvi subhru sukeśānte himavatparvatātmaje
a dakṣe śamadamopete nirmame dharmacāriṇi
c pṛcchāmi tvāṃ varārohe pṛṣṭā vada mamepsitam
a sāvitrī brahmaṇaḥ sādhvī kauśikasya śacī satī
c mārtaṇḍajasya dhūmorṇā ṛddhir vaiśravaṇasya ca
a varuṇasya tato gaurī sūryasya ca suvarcalā
c rohiṇī śaśinaḥ sādhvī svāhā caiva vibhāvasoḥ
a aditiḥ kaśyapasyātha sarvās tāḥ patidevatāḥ
c pṛṣṭāś copāsitāś caiva tās tvayā devi nityaśaḥ
a tena tvāṃ paripṛcchāmi dharmajñe dharmavādini
c strīdharmaṃ śrotum icchāmi tvayodāhṛtam āditaḥ
a sahadharmacarī me tvaṃ samaśīlā samavratā
c samānasāravīryā ca tapas tīvraṃ kṛtaṃ ca te
e tvayā hy ukto viśeṣeṇa pramāṇatvam upaiṣyati
e guṇavān sa bhaviṣyati
e loke caiva tathā devi
a striyaś caiva viśeṣeṇa strījanasya gatiḥ sadā
c gaur gāṃ gacchati suśroṇi lokeṣv eṣā sthitiḥ sadā
a mama cārdhaṃ śarīrasya mama cārdhād viniḥsṛtā
c surakāryakarī ca tvaṃ lokasaṃtānakāriṇī
a tava sarvaḥ suviditaḥ strīdharmaḥ śāśvataḥ śubhe
c tasmād aśeṣato brūhi strīdharmaṃ vistareṇa me
 umovāca
a bhagavan sarvabhūteśa bhūtabhavyabhavodbhava
c tvatprabhāvād iyaṃ deva vāk caiva pratibhāti me
a imās tu nadyo deveśa sarvatīrthodakair yutāḥ
c upasparśanahetos tvā samīpasthā upāsate
a etābhiḥ saha saṃmantrya pravakṣyāmy anupūrvaśaḥ
c prabhavan yo 'nahaṃvādī sa vai puruṣa ucyate
a strī ca bhūteśa satataṃ striyam evānudhāvati
c mayā saṃmānitāś caiva bhaviṣyanti saridvarāḥ
a eṣā sarasvatī puṇyā nadīnām uttamā nadī
c prathamā sarvasaritāṃ nadī sāgaragāminī
a vipāśā ca vitastā ca candrabhāgā irāvatī
c śatadrur devikā sindhuḥ kauśikī gomatī tathā
a tathā devanadī ceyaṃ sarvatīrthābhisaṃvṛtā
c gaganād gāṃ gatā devī gaṅgā sarvasaridvarā
a ity uktvā devadevasya patnī dharmabhṛtāṃ varā
c smitapūrvam ivābhāṣya sarvās tāḥ saritas tadā
a apṛcchad devamahiṣī strīdharmaṃ dharmavatsalā
c strīdharmakuśalās tā vai gaṅgādyāḥ saritāṃ varāḥ
a ayaṃ bhagavatā dattaḥ praśnaḥ strīdharmasaṃśritaḥ
c taṃ tu saṃmantrya yuṣmābhir vaktum icchāmi śaṃkare
a na caikasādhyaṃ paśyāmi vijñānaṃ bhuvi kasya cit
c divi vā sāgaragamās tena vo mānayāmy aham
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evaṃ sarvāḥ saricchreṣṭhāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ puṇyatamāḥ śivāḥ
c tato devanadī gaṅgā niyuktā pratipūjya tām
a bahvībhir buddhibhiḥ sphītā strīdharmajñā śucismitā
c śailarājasutāṃ devīṃ puṇyā pāpāpahāṃ śivām
a buddhyā vinayasaṃpannā sarvajñānaviśāradā
c sasmitaṃ bahubuddhyāḍhyā gaṅgā vacanam abravīt
a dhanyāḥ smo 'nugṛhītāḥ smo devi dharmaparāyaṇā
c yā tvaṃ sarvajaganmānyā nadīr mānayase 'naghe
a prabhavan pṛcchate yo hi saṃmānayati vā punaḥ
c nūnaṃ janam aduṣṭātmā paṇḍitākhyāṃ sa gacchati
a jñānavijñānasaṃpannān ūhāpohaviśāradān
c pravaktṝn pṛcchate yo 'nyān sa vai nā padam arcchati
a anyathā bahubuddhyāḍhyo vākyaṃ vadati saṃsadi
c anyathaiva hy ahaṃmānī durbalaṃ vadate vacaḥ
a divyajñāne divi śreṣṭhe divyapuṇye sadotthite
c tvam evārhasi no devi strīdharmam anuśāsitum
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tataḥ sārādhitā devī gaṅgayā bahubhir guṇaiḥ
c prāha sarvam aśeṣeṇa strīdharmaṃ surasundarī
a strīdharmo māṃ prati yathā pratibhāti yathāvidhi
c tam ahaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi tathaiva prathito bhavet
a strīdharmaḥ pūrva evāyaṃ vivāhe bandhubhiḥ kṛtaḥ
c sahadharmacarī bhartur bhavaty agnisamīpataḥ
a susvabhāvā suvacanā suvṛttā sukhadarśanā
c ananyacittā sumukhī bhartuḥ sā dharmacāriṇī
d daṃpatyor eṣa vai dharmaḥ sahadharmakṛtaḥ śubhaḥ
a sā bhaved dharmaparamā sā bhaved dharmabhāginī
c devavat satataṃ sādhvī yā bhartāraṃ prapaśyati
a śuśrūṣāṃ paricāraṃ ca devavad yā karoti ca
c nānyabhāvā hy avimanāḥ suvratā sukhadarśanā
a putravaktram ivābhīkṣṇaṃ bhartur vadanam īkṣate
c yā sādhvī niyatācārā sā bhaved dharmacāriṇī
a śrutvā daṃpatidharmaṃ vai sahadharmakṛtaṃ śubham
c ananyacittā sumukhī bhartuḥ sā dharmacāriṇī
a paruṣāṇy api coktā yā dṛṣṭā vā krūracakṣuṣā
c suprasannamukhī bhartur yā nārī sā pativratā
a na candrasūryau na taruṃ puṃnāmno yā nirīkṣate
c bhartṛvarjaṃ varārohā sā bhaved dharmacāriṇī
a daridraṃ vyādhitaṃ dīnam adhvanā parikarśitam
c patiṃ putram ivopāste sā nārī dharmabhāginī
a yā nārī prayatā dakṣā yā nārī putriṇī bhavet
c patipriyā patiprāṇā sā nārī dharmabhāginī
a śuśrūṣāṃ paricaryāṃ ca karoty avimanāḥ sadā
c supratītā vinītā ca sā nārī dharmabhāginī
a na kāmeṣu na bhogeṣu naiśvarye na sukhe tathā
c spṛhā yasyā yathā patyau sā nārī dharmabhāginī
a kalyotthānaratā nityaṃ guruśuśrūṣaṇe ratā
c susaṃmṛṣṭakṣayā caiva gośakṛtkṛtalepanā
a agnikāryaparā nityaṃ sadā puṣpabalipradā
c devatātithibhṛtyānāṃ nirupya patinā saha
a śeṣānnam upabhuñjānā yathānyāyaṃ yathāvidhi
c tuṣṭapuṣṭajanā nityaṃ nārī dharmeṇa yujyate
a śvaśrūśvaśurayoḥ pādau toṣayantī guṇānvitā
c mātāpitṛparā nityaṃ yā nārī sā tapodhanā
a brāhmaṇān durbalānāthān dīnāndhakṛpaṇāṃs tathā
c bibharty annena yā nārī sā pativratabhāginī
a vrataṃ carati yā nityaṃ duścaraṃ laghusattvayā
c paticittā patihitā sā pativratabhāginī
a puṇyam etat tapaś caiva svargaś caiṣa sanātanaḥ
c yā nārī bhartṛparamā bhaved bhartṛvratā śivā
a patir hi devo nārīṇāṃ patir bandhuḥ patir gatiḥ
c patyā samā gatir nāsti daivataṃ vā yathā patiḥ
a patiprasādaḥ svargo vā tulyo nāryā na vā bhavet
c ahaṃ svargaṃ na hīccheyaṃ tvayy aprīte maheśvara
a yady akāryam adharmaṃ vā yadi vā prāṇanāśanam
c patir brūyād daridro vā vyādhito vā kathaṃ cana
a āpanno ripusaṃstho vā brahmaśāpārdito 'pi vā
c āpaddharmān anuprekṣya tat kāryam aviśaṅkayā
a eṣa deva mayā proktaḥ strīdharmo vacanāt tava
c yā tv evaṃbhāvinī nārī sā bhaved dharmabhāginī
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktaḥ sa tu deveśaḥ pratipūjya gireḥ sutām
c lokān visarjayām āsa sarvair anucaraiḥ saha
a tato yayur bhūtagaṇāḥ saritaś ca yathāgatam
c gandharvāpsarasaś caiva praṇamya śirasā bhavam
d vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
d anuśāsya śubhair vākyair bhīṣmas tv āha mahāmatim
d janamejayaḥ
d prītyā punaḥ sa śuśrūṣur vacanaṃ yad yudhiṣṭhire
d pitāmaho me viprarṣe bhīṣmaṃ kālavaśaṃ gatam
d kim apṛcchat tadā rājā sarvasāmāsikaṃ hitam
d ubhayor lokayor yuktaṃ puruṣārtham anuttamam
d vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
d tan me vada mahāprājña śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
d bhūya eva mahārāja śṛṇu dharmasamuccayam
d yad apṛcchat tadā rājā kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d śaratalpagataṃ bhīṣmaṃ sarvapārthivasaṃnidhau
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d ajātaśatruḥ prītātmā punar evābhyabhāṣata
d pitāmaha mahāprājña sarvaśāstraviśārada
d śrūyatāṃ me hi vacanam arthitvāt prabravīmy aham
d parāvarajño bhūtānāṃ dayāvān sarvajantuṣu
d āgamair bahubhiḥ sphīto bhavān naḥ paramaḥ kule
d tvādṛśo durlabho loke sāṃprataṃ jñānadarśanaḥ
d bhavatā guruṇā caiva dhanyā bata vayaṃ prabho
d ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāpto durlabho jñātibāndhavaiḥ
d śāstā nu nāsti naḥ kaś cit tvad ṛte puruṣarṣabha
d tasmād dharmārthasaṃyuktam āyatyāṃ ca hitodayam
d āścaryaṃ paramaṃ vākyaṃ śrotum icchāmi bhārata
d ayaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān sarvapārthivasaṃnidhau
d bhavantaṃ bahumānāc ca praṇayāc copasevate
d asyaiva tu samakṣaṃ naḥ pārthivānāṃ tathaiva ca
d itivṛttaṃ purāṇaṃ ca śrotṝṇāṃ paramaṃ hitam
d yadi te 'ham anugrāhyo bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito 'nagha
d vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
d matpriyārthaṃ tu kauravya snehād bhāṣitum arhasi
d tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā snehād āgataviklavaḥ
d prapibann iva taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmo vacanam abravīt
d śṛṇu rājan purā vṛttam itihāsaṃ purātanam
d etāvad uktvā gāṅgeyaḥ praṇamya śirasā harim
d dharmarājaṃ samīkṣyedaṃ punar vaktuṃ samārabhat
d ayaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān putrārthaṃ vratakāṅkṣayā
d dīkṣito 'bhūn mahābāhuḥ purā dvādaśavārṣikam
d dīkṣitaṃ keśavaṃ draṣṭum abhijagmur maharṣayaḥ
d sevituṃ ca mahātmānaḥ prīyamāṇā janārdanam
d nāradaḥ parvataś caiva kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tathā
d devalaḥ kāśyapaś caiva hastikāśyapa eva ca
d jamadagniś ca rājendra dhaumyo vālmīkir eva ca
d apare 'pi tapaḥsiddhāḥ satyavrataparāyaṇāḥ
d śiṣyair anugatāḥ sarve brahmavidbhir akalmaṣaiḥ
d keśavas tān abhigatān prītyā saṃpratigṛhya ca
d teṣām atithisatkāraṃ pūjanārthaṃ kulocitam
d devakītanayo hṛṣṭo devatulyam akalpayat
d upaviṣṭeṣu sarveṣu viṣṭareṣu tadānagha
d viśvasteṣu hi tuṣṭeṣu keśavārcanayā punaḥ
d parasparaṃ kathā divyāḥ prāvartanta manoramāḥ
d viṣṇor nārāyaṇasyaiva prasādāt kathayāmi tāḥ
d tasyaiva vratacaryāyāṃ munibhir vismitaḥ purā
d yaś ca govṛṣabhāṅkasya prabhāvo 'bhūn mahātmanaḥ
d yatra devī mahādevam apṛcchat saṃśayān purā
d kathayām āsa śarvas tān devyāḥ priyacikīrṣayā
d umāpatyoś ca saṃvādaṃ śṛṇu tāta manoramam
d varṇāśramāṇāṃ dharmaś ca tatra tāta samāhitaḥ
d ṛṣidharmaś ca nikhilo rājadharmaś ca puṣkalaḥ
d gṛhasthadharmaś ca śubhaḥ karmapākaphalāni ca
d devaguhyaṃ ca vividhaṃ dānadharmavidhis tadā
d vidhānam atra saṃproktaṃ yamasya niyamasya ca
d yamalokavidhānaṃ ca svargalokavidhis tathā
d prāṇamokṣavidhiś caiva tīrthacaryā ca puṣkalā
d mokṣadharmavidhānaṃ ca sāṃkhyayogasamanvitam
d strīdharmaś ca svayaṃ devyā devadevāya bhāṣitaḥ
d evamādi śubhaṃ sarvaṃ tatra tāta samāhitam
d rudrāṇyāḥ saṃśayapraśno yatra tāta pravartate
d dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ dharmyaṃ ca paramaṃ hitam
d puṣṭiyogam idaṃ divyaṃ kathyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu
d itihāsam imaṃ divyaṃ pavitraṃ paramaṃ śubham
d sāyaṃ prātaḥ sadā samyak śrotavyaṃ ca bubhūṣatā
d tato nārāyaṇo devaḥ saṃkliṣṭo vratacaryayā
d vahnir viniḥsṛto vaktrāt kṛṣṇasyādbhutadarśanaḥ
d agninā tena mahatā niḥsṛtena mukhād vibhoḥ
d paśyatām eva sarveṣāṃ dagdha eva nagottamaḥ
d mṛgapakṣisamākīrṇaḥ śvāpadair abhisaṃkulaḥ
d vṛkṣagulmalatākīrṇo mathito dīnadarśanaḥ
d punaḥ sa dṛṣṭamātreṇa hariṇā saumyacetasā
d sa babhūva giriḥ kṣipraṃ praphulladrumakānanaḥ
d siddhacāraṇasaṃghaiś ca prasannair upaśobhitaḥ
d mattavāraṇasaṃyukto nānāpakṣigaṇair yutaḥ
d tad adbhutam acintyaṃ ca sarveṣām abhavad bhṛśam
d taṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭaromāṇaḥ sarve munigaṇās tadā
d vismitāḥ paramāyastāḥ sādhvasākulalocanāḥ
d na kiṃ cid abruvaṃs tatra śubhaṃ vā yadi vetarat
d tato nārāyaṇo devo munisaṃghe suvismite
d tān samīkṣyaiva madhuraṃ babhāṣe puṣkarekṣaṇaḥ
d kimarthaṃ munisaṃghasya vismayo 'yam anuttamaḥ
d etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ sarve yāthātathyam aninditāḥ
d ṛṣayo vaktum arhanti niścayenārthakovidāḥ
d keśavasya vacaḥ śrutvā tuṣṭuvur munipuṃgavāḥ
d bhavān sṛjati vai lokān bhavān saṃharati prajāḥ
d bhavāñ śītaṃ bhavān uṣṇaṃ bhavān satyaṃ bhavān kratuḥ
d bhavān ādir bhavān anto bhavato 'nyan na vidyate
d sthāvaraṃ jaṃgamaṃ sarvaṃ tvam eva puruṣottama
d tvattaḥ sarvam idaṃ tāta lokacakraṃ pravartate
d tvam evārhasi tad vaktuṃ mukhād agnivinirgamam
d etan no vismayakaraṃ babhūva madhusūdana
d tato 'dhigatasaṃtrāsā bhavāma puruṣottama
d bhagavān
d yad icchet tatra vaktavyaṃ kuto 'smākaṃ niyogataḥ
d nityaṃ hitārthaṃ lokānāṃ bhavadbhiḥ kriyate tapaḥ
d tasmāl lokahitaṃ guhyaṃ śrūyatāṃ kathayāmi vaḥ
d asuraḥ sāṃprataṃ kaś cid ahito lokanāśanaḥ
d māyāstrakuśalaś caiva baladarpasamanvitaḥ
d babhūva sa mayā vadhyo lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā
d putreṇa me vadho dṛṣṭas tasya vai munipuṃgavāḥ
d tadarthaṃ putram evāhaṃ sisṛkṣur vanam āgataḥ
d ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ putram ahaṃ janayituṃ vrataiḥ
d evaṃ vrataparītasya tapastīvratayā mama
d athātmā mama dehasthaḥ so 'gnir bhūtvā viniḥsṛtaḥ
d viniḥsṛtya gato draṣṭuṃ kṣaṇena ca pitāmaham
d brahmaṇā manmatho 'naṅgaḥ putratve me prakalpitaḥ
d anujñātaś ca tenaiva punar āyān mamāntikam
d etan me vaiṣṇavaṃ tejo mama vaktrād viniḥsṛtam
d tattejasā nirmathitaḥ purato 'yaṃ giriḥ sthitaḥ
d dṛṣṭvā nāśaṃ gires tasya saumyabhāvatayā mama
d punaḥ sa dṛṣṭamātreṇa girir āsīd yathāpuram
d etad guhyaṃ mayā tathyaṃ kathitaṃ vaḥ samāsataḥ
d bhavanto vyathitā yena vismitāś ca tapodhanāḥ
d bhagavān
d ṛṣīṇām evam uktvā tu tān punaḥ pratyabhāṣata
d bhavatāṃ darśanād eva prītir abhyadhikā mama
d bhavantas tu tapaḥsiddhā bhavanto devadarśanāḥ
d sarvatra gatimantaś ca jñānavijñānabhāvitāḥ
d gatāgatajñā lokānāṃ sarve nirdhūtakalmaṣāḥ
d tasmād bhavadbhir yat kiṃ cid dṛṣṭaṃ vāpy atha vā śrutam
d āścaryabhūtaṃ lokeṣu tad bhavanto bruvantu me
d yuṣmābhiḥ kathitaṃ yat syāt tapasā bhāvitātmabhiḥ
d tat syād amṛtasaṃkāśaṃ vāṅmadhuśravaṇe spṛhā
d rāgadveṣaviyuktānāṃ satataṃ satyavādinām
d śraddheyaṃ śravaṇīyaṃ ca vacanaṃ hi satāṃ bhavet
d tatsaṃyogaṃ hi tan me 'stu na vṛthā kartum arhatha
d bhavatāṃ darśanaṃ tasmāt saphalaṃ tu bhaven mama
d tad ahaṃ sajjanamukhān niḥsṛtaṃ janasaṃsadi
d kathayiṣyāmy aharaho buddhidīpakaraṃ nṛṇām
d tad anye vardhayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti vāpare
d vākśalyavigatāś cānye praśaṃsanti purātanam
d bhīṣmaḥ
d evaṃ bruvati govinde śravaṇārthaṃ maharṣayaḥ
d vāgbhiḥ sāñjalimālābhir idam ūcur janārdanam
d ayuktam asmān evaṃ tvaṃ vācā varada bhāṣitum
d tvacchāsanamukhāḥ sarve tvadadhīnapariśramāḥ
d evaṃ pūjayituṃ cāsmān na caivārhasi keśava
d tad vastv anyan na paśyāmo yal loke te na vidyate
d divi vā bhuvi vā kiṃ cit tat sarvaṃ hi tvayā tatam
d na vidmahe vayaṃ deva kathyamānaṃ tavāntike
d evam ukto hṛṣīkeśaḥ sasmitaṃ cedam abravīt
d ahaṃ mānuṣayonisthaḥ sāṃprataṃ munipuṃgavāḥ
d tasmān mānuṣavad vīryaṃ mama jānīta suvratāḥ
d bhīṣmaḥ
d bhavadbhiḥ kathyamānaṃ ca apūrvam iva tad bhavet
d evaṃ saṃcoditāḥ sarve keśavena mahātmanā
d ṛṣayaś cānuvartante vāsudevasya śāsanam
d tatas tv ṛṣigaṇāḥ sarve nāradaṃ devadarśanam
d amanyanta budhā buddhyā samarthaṃ tannibodhane
d ṛṣir ugratapāś cāyaṃ keśavasya priyo 'dhikam
d purāṇajñaś ca vāgmī ca kāraṇais taṃ ca menire
d sarve tadarhaṇaṃ kṛtvā nāradaṃ vākyam abruvan
d bhavatā tīrthayātrārthaṃ caratā himavadgirau
d dṛṣṭaṃ vai yat tad āścaryaṃ śrotṝṇāṃ paramaṃ priyam
d tattvaṃ tvam aviśeṣeṇa hitārthaṃ sarvam āditaḥ
d bhīṣmaḥ
d priyārthaṃ keśavasyāsya sa bhavān vaktum arhati
d tadā saṃcoditaḥ sarvair ṛṣibhir nāradas tathā
d praṇamya śirasā viṣṇuṃ sarvalokahite ratam
d samudvīkṣya hṛṣīkeśaṃ vaktum evopacakrame
d tato nārāyaṇasuhṛn nārado vadatāṃ varaḥ
d nāradaḥ
d śaṃkarasyomayā sārdhaṃ saṃvādam anvabhāṣata
d bhagavaṃs tīrthayātrārthaṃ tathaiva caratā mayā
d divyam adbhutasaṃkāśaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ haimavataṃ vanam
d nānāvṛkṣalatāyuktaṃ nānāpakṣigaṇair yutam
d nānāratnasamākīrṇaṃ nānābhāvasamanvitam
d divyacandanasaṃyuktaṃ divyadhūpena dhūpitam
d divyapuṣpasamākīrṇaṃ divyagandhena mūrchitam
d siddhacāraṇasaṃvāsaṃ bhūtasaṃghair niṣevitam
d variṣṭhāpsarasākīrṇaṃ nānāgandharvasaṃkulam
d mṛdaṅgamurajodghuṣṭaṃ śaṅkhavīṇābhināditam
d nṛtyadbhir bhūtasaṃghaiś ca sarvatas tv abhiśobhitam
d nānārūpair virūpaiś ca bhīmarūpair bhayānakaiḥ
d vyāghrasiṃhoragamukhair biḍālavadanais tathā
d kharoṣṭradvīpivadanair gajavaktrais tathaiva ca
d ulūkaśyenavadanaiḥ kākagṛdhramukhais tathā
d evaṃ bahuvidhākārair bhūtasaṃghair bhṛśākulam
d nānadyamānaṃ bahudhā harapāriṣadair bhṛśam
d ghorarūpaṃ sudurdarśaṃ rakṣogaṇaśatair vṛtam
d samājaṃ tadvane dṛṣṭaṃ mayā bhūtapateḥ purā
d pranṛttāpsarasaṃ divyaṃ devagandharvanāditam
d ṣaṭpadair upagītaṃ ca prathame māsi mādhave
d utkrośatkrauñcakuraraiḥ sārasair jīvajīvakaiḥ
d mattābhiḥ parapuṣṭābhiḥ kūjantībhiḥ samākulam
d uttamotsavasaṃkāśaṃ bhīmarūpataraṃ tataḥ
d draṣṭuṃ bhavati sarvasya dharmabhāgijanasya ca
d ye cordhvaretasaḥ siddhās tatra tatra samāgatāḥ
d mārtāṇḍaraśmisaṃcārā viśvedevagaṇās tathā
d tathā nāgās tathādityā lokapālā hutāśanāḥ
d vātāś ca sarve vāyanti divyapuṣpasamākulāḥ
d kirantaḥ sarvapuṣpāṇi kiranto 'dbhutadarśanāḥ
d oṣadhyaḥ prajvalantyaś ca dyotayantyo diśo daśa
d vihagāś ca mudā yuktā nṛtyanti ca nadanti ca
d giraḥ sumadhurās tatra divyā divyajanapriyāḥ
d tatra devo giritaṭe hemadhātuvibhūṣite
d paryaṅka iva babhrāja upaviṣṭo mahādyutiḥ
d vyāghracarmaparīdhāno gajacarmottaracchadaḥ
d vyālayajñopavītaś ca lohitāntravibhūṣitaḥ
d hariśmaśrujaṭo bhīmo bhayakartā suradviṣām
d bhayaghnaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ bhaktānām abhayaṃkaraḥ
d kiṃnarair devagandharvaiḥ stūyamānaḥ samantataḥ
d ṛṣibhiś cāpsarobhiś ca sarvataś cāpi śobhitaḥ
d tatra bhūtapateḥ sthānaṃ devadānavasaṃkulam
d sarvatejomayaṃ bhūmnā lokapālaniṣevitam
d mahoragasamākīrṇaṃ sarveṣāṃ lomaharṣaṇam
d bhīmarūpam anirdeśyam apradhṛṣyatamaṃ vibho
d tatra bhūtapatiṃ devam āsīnaṃ śikharottame
d ṛṣayo bhūtasaṃghāś ca praṇamya śirasā haram
d gīrbhiḥ paramaśuddhābhis tuṣṭuvuś ca maheśvaram
d vimuktāś caiva pāpebhyo babhūvur vigatajvarāḥ
d ṛṣayo vālakhilyāś ca tathā viprarṣayaś ca ye
d ayonijā yonijāś ca tapaḥsiddhā maharṣayaḥ
d tatrasthaṃ devadeveśaṃ bhagavantam upāsate
d tatas tasmin kṣaṇe devī bhūtastrīgaṇasevitā
d haratulyāmbaradharā samānavratacāriṇī
d kāñcanaṃ kalaśaṃ gṛhya sarvatīrthāmbupūritam
d puṣpavṛṣṭyābhivarṣantī divyagandhasamāyutā
d saridvarābhiḥ sarvābhiḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nugatā varā
d sevituṃ bhagavatpārśvam ājagāma śucismitā
d āgamya tu gireḥ putrī devadevasya cāntikam
d manaḥpriyaṃ cikīrṣantī krīḍārthaṃ śaṃkarāntike
d manoharābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ haranetre pidhāya tu
d avekṣya hṛṣṭā svagaṇān smayantī pṛṣṭhataḥ sthitā
d devyā cāndhīkṛte deve kaśmalaṃ samapadyata
d nimīlite bhūtapatau naṣṭacandrārkatārakam
d niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkāraṃ tamasā cābhisaṃvṛtam
d viṣaṇṇaṃ bhayasaṃtrastaṃ jagad āsīd bhayākulam
d hāhākāras tv ṛṣīṇāṃ ca lokānām abhavat tadā
d tamobhibhūte saṃbhrānte loke jīvitaśaṅkite
d tṛtīyaṃ cāsya saṃbhūtaṃ lalāṭe netram āyatam
d dvādaśādityasaṃkāśaṃ lokān bhāsāv abhāsayat
d tatra netrāgninā tena yugāntāgninibhena vai
d adahyata giriḥ sarvo himavān agrataḥ sthitaḥ
d dahyamāne girau tasmin mṛgapakṣisamākule
d savidyādharagandharve divyauṣadhasamāyute
d tato girisutā cāpi vismayotphullalocanā
d babhūva ca jagat sarvaṃ tathā vismayasaṃyutam
d paśyatām eva sarveṣāṃ devadānavarakṣasām
d netrajenāgninā tena dagdha eva nagottamaḥ
d taṃ dṛṣṭvā mathitaṃ śailaṃ śailaputrī saviklavā
d pituḥ śamanam icchantī papāta bhuvi pādayoḥ
d tad dṛṣṭvā devadeveśo devyā duḥkham anuttamam
d haimavatyāḥ priyārthaṃ ca giriṃ punar avaikṣata
d dṛṣṭamātro bhagavatā saumyayuktena cetasā
d kṣaṇena himavāñ śailaḥ prakṛtistho 'bhavat punaḥ
d hṛṣṭapuṣṭavihaṃgaś ca praphulladrumakānanaḥ
d siddhacāraṇasaṃghaiś ca prītiyuktaiḥ samākulaḥ
d pitaraṃ prakṛtisthaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā haimavatī bhṛśam
d abhavat prītisaṃyuktā muditā ca pinākinam
d devī vismayasaṃyuktā praṣṭukāmā maheśvaram
d hitārthaṃ sarvalokānāṃ prajānāṃ hitakāmyayā
d devadevaṃ mahādevī babhāṣedaṃ vaco 'rthavat
d bhagavan devadeveśa śūlapāṇe mahādyute
d vismayo me mahāñ jātas tasmin netrāgnisaṃplute
d kimarthaṃ devadeveśa lalāṭe 'smin prakāśate
d atisūryāgnisaṃkāśaṃ tṛtīyaṃ netram āyatam
d netrāgninā tu mahatā nirdagdho himavān asau
d punaḥ sa dṛṣṭamātras tu prakṛtisthaḥ pitā mama
d eṣa me saṃśayo deva hṛdi saṃprati vartate
d devadeva namas tubhyaṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d nāradaḥ
d evam uktas tayā devyā prīyamāṇo 'bravīd bhavaḥ
d sthāne saṃśayituṃ devi dharmajñe priyabhāṣiṇi
d tvad ṛte māṃ hi vai praṣṭuṃ na śakyaṃ kena cit priye
d prakāśaṃ yadi vā guhyaṃ tvatpriyārthaṃ bravīmy aham
d śṛṇu tat sarvam akhilam asyāṃ saṃsadi bhāmini
d sarveṣām eva lokānāṃ kūṭasthaṃ viddhi māṃ priye
d madadhīnās trayo lokā yathā viṣṇau tathā mayi
d sraṣṭā viṣṇur ahaṃ goptā iti tad viddhi bhāmini
d tasmād yadā māṃ spṛśati śubhaṃ vā yadi vetarat
d tathaivedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ tat tad bhavati śobhane
d etad guhyam ajānantyā tvayā bālyād anindite
d netre me pihite devi krīḍanārthaṃ dṛḍhavrate
d tvatkṛte naṣṭacandrārkaṃ jagad āsīd bhṛśākulam
d naṣṭāditye tamobhūte loke girisute priye
d tṛtīyaṃ locanaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ lokān saṃrakṣituṃ mayā
d asyaiva tejasākṣṇo me mathito 'yaṃ giriḥ śubhe
d vṛkṣagulmalatākīrṇo vyālādhyuṣitakaṃdaraḥ
d tvatpriyārthaṃ kṛto devi prakṛtisthaḥ punar mayā
d nāradaḥ
d kathitaṃ saṃśayasthānaṃ nirviśaṅkā bhava priye
d kṣaṇajñā devadevasya śrotukāmā priyaṃ hitam
d umā devī mahādevam apṛcchat punar eva tu
d bhagavan devadeveśa sarvadevanamaskṛta
d caturmukho vai bhagavān abhavat kena hetunā
d bhagavan kena vai vaktram aindram adbhutadarśanam
d uttaraṃ cāpi bhagavan paścimaṃ śubhadarśanam
d dakṣiṇaṃ ca mukhaṃ raudraṃ kenordhvaṃ jaṭilāvṛtam
d yathādiśaṃ mahādeva śrotum icchāmi kāraṇam
d maheśvaraḥ
d eṣa me saṃśayo deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi yat tvaṃ pṛcchasi bhāmini
d purāsurau mahāghorau lokodvegakarau bhṛśam
d sundopasundanāmānāv āsatur bahugarvitau
d aśastravadhyau balinau parasparahitaiṣiṇau
d tayor eva vināśāya nirmitā viśvakarmaṇā
d mṛgapakṣigaṇānāṃ ca sthāvarāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
d sarvataḥ sāram uddhṛtya tilaśo lokapūjitā
d tilottameti vikhyātā apsarāḥ sā babhūva ha
d devakāryaṃ kariṣyantī hāvabhāvasamanvitā
d sā tu paryantam āgamya rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi
d mayā bahumatā ceyaṃ devakāryaṃ kariṣyati
d iti matvā tadā cāhaṃ kurvantīṃ māṃ pradakṣiṇam
d tathaiva tāṃ didṛkṣuś ca caturvaktro 'bhavaṃ priye
d aindraṃ mukham idaṃ pūrvaṃ tapaścaryāparaṃ sadā
d dakṣiṇaṃ me mukhaṃ divyaṃ raudraṃ saṃharati prajāḥ
d lokakāryaparaṃ nityaṃ paścimaṃ me mukhaṃ priye
d vedān adhīte satatam adbhutaṃ cottaraṃ mukham
d umā
d etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
d bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi śūlapāṇe varaprada
d maheśvaraḥ
d kimarthaṃ nīlatā kaṇṭhe bhāti barhanibhā tava
d hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
d purā yugāntare yatnād amṛtārthaṃ surāsuraiḥ
d balavadbhir vimathitaś cirakālaṃ mahodadhiḥ
d rajjunā nāgarājena mathyamāne mahodadhau
d viṣaṃ tatra samudbhūtaṃ sarvalokavināśanam
d tad dṛṣṭvā vibudhāḥ sarve tadā vimanaso 'bhavan
d grastaṃ hi tan mayā devi lokānāṃ hitakāraṇāt
d tatkṛtā nīlatā cāsīt kaṇṭhe barhinibhā śubhe
d tadāprabhṛti caivāhaṃ nīlakaṇṭha iti smṛtaḥ
d umā
d etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
d nīlakaṇṭha namas te 'stu sarvalokasukhāvaha
d bahūnām āyudhānāṃ tvaṃ pinākaṃ dhartum icchasi
d maheśvaraḥ
d kimarthaṃ devadeveśa tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d śastrāgamaṃ te vakṣyāmi śṛṇu dharmyaṃ śucismite
d yugāntare mahādevi kaṇvo nāma mahāmuniḥ
d sa hi divyāṃ tapaścaryāṃ kartum evopacakrame
d tathā tasya tapo ghoraṃ carataḥ kālaparyayāt
d valmīkaṃ punar udbhūtaṃ tasyaiva śirasi priye
d veṇur valmīkasaṃyogān mūrdhni tasya babhūva ha
d dharamāṇaś ca tat sarvaṃ tapaścaryām athākarot
d tasmai brahmā varaṃ dātuṃ jagāma tapasārcitaḥ
d dattvā tasmai varaṃ devo veṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā tv acintayat
d lokakāryaṃ samuddiśya veṇunānena bhāmini
d cintayitvā tam ādāya kārmukārthe nyayojayat
d viṣṇor mama ca sāmarthyaṃ jñātvā lokapitāmahaḥ
d dhanuṣī dve tadā prādād viṣṇave ca mamaiva ca
d pinākaṃ nāma me cāpaṃ śārṅgaṃ nāma harer dhanuḥ
d tṛtīyam avaśeṣeṇa gāṇḍīvam abhavad dhanuḥ
d tac ca somāya nirdiśya brahmalokaṃ gataḥ punaḥ
d umā
d etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ śastrāgamam anindite
d bhagavan sarvabhūteśa pinākaparaśupriya
d vāhaneṣu tathānyeṣu satsu bhūtapate tava
d ayaṃ tu vṛṣabhaḥ kasmād vāhanatvam upāgamat
d maheśvaraḥ
d eṣa me saṃśayo deva taṃ me śaṃsitum arhasi
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi vāhanaṃ sa yathābhavat
d ādisarge purā gāvaḥ śvetavarṇāḥ śucismite
d balasaṃhananopetā darpayuktāś caranti tāḥ
d ahaṃ tu tapa ātiṣṭhe tasmin kāle śubhānane
d ekapādaś cordhvabāhur lokārthaṃ himavadgirau
d gāvo me pārśvam āviśya darpotsiktāḥ samantataḥ
d sthānabhraṃśaṃ tu me devi cakrire bahuśas tathā
d apacāreṇa caitāsāṃ manaḥkṣobho 'bhavan mama
d tasmād dagdhā mayā gāvo roṣāviṣṭena cetasā
d tasmiṃs tu vyasane ghore vartamāne paśūn prati
d anena vṛṣabheṇāhaṃ śamitaḥ saṃprasādanaiḥ
d tadāprabhṛti śāntāś ca varṇabhedatvam āgatāḥ
d śveto 'yaṃ vṛṣabho devi pūrvasaṃskārasaṃyutaḥ
d vāhanatve dhvajatve me tadāprabhṛti yojitaḥ
d tasmān me gopatitvaṃ ca devair gobhiś ca kalpitam
d umā
d prasannaś cābhavaṃ devi tadā gopatitāṃ gataḥ
d bhagavan sarvabhūteśa śūlapāṇe vṛṣadhvaja
d āvāseṣu vicitreṣu ramyeṣu ca śubheṣu ca
d satsu cānyeṣu deśeṣu śmaśāne ramase katham
d keśāsthikalile bhīme kapālaśatasaṃkule
d sṛgālagṛdhrasaṃpūrṇe śavadhūmasamākule
d citāgniviṣame ghore gahane ca bhayānake
d evaṃ kalevarakṣetre durdarśe ramase katham
d maheśvaraḥ
d eṣa me saṃśayo deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
d āvāsārthaṃ purā devi śuddhānveṣī śucismite
d nādhyagacchaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ deśaṃ śucitamaṃ śubhe
d eṣa me 'bhiniveśo 'bhūt tasmin kāle prajāḥ prati
d ākulaṃ sumahad ghoraṃ prādurāsīt samantataḥ
d saṃbhūtā bhūtasṛṣṭiś ca ghorā lokabhayāvahā
d nānāvarṇavirūpāś ca tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
d piśācarakṣovadanāḥ prāṇināṃ prāṇahāriṇaḥ
d yatas tataś caranti sma nighnantaḥ prāṇino bhṛśam
d evaṃ loke kṣayaṃ yāte prāṇihīne pitāmahaḥ
d cintayaṃs tatpratīkāraṃ māṃ ca śaktaṃ hi nigrahe
d evaṃ jñātvā tadā brahmā tasmin karmaṇy ayojayat
d tac ca prāṇidayārthaṃ tu mayāpy anumataṃ priye
d tasmāt saṃrakṣitā devi bhūtebhyaḥ prāṇino bhayāt
d asmāc chmaśānān medhyaṃ tu nāsti kiṃ cid anindite
d niḥsaṃpātaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tasmāc chucitamaṃ smṛtam
d bhūtasṛṣṭiṃ tu tāṃ cāhaṃ śmaśāne saṃnyaveśayam
d tatrasthaḥ sarvalokānāṃ vinihanmi priye bhayam
d na ca bhūtagaṇenāhaṃ vinā vasitum utsahe
d tasmān me saṃnivāsāya śmaśāne rocate manaḥ
d medhyakāmair dvijair nityaṃ medhyam ity abhidhīyate
d ācaradbhir vrataṃ raudraṃ mokṣakāmaiś ca sevyate
d sthānaṃ me tatra vihitaṃ vīrasthānam iti priye
d kapālaśatasaṃpūrṇaṃ bhīmarūpaṃ bhayānakam
d madhyāhne saṃdhyayos tatra nakṣatre rudradaivate
d āyuṣkāmair aśuddhair vā na gantavyam iti sthitiḥ
d mad anyena na śakyaṃ hi nihantuṃ bhūtajaṃ bhayam
d tatrastho 'haṃ prajāḥ sarvāḥ pālayāmi dine dine
d manniyogād bhūtasaṃghā na ca ghnantīha kiṃ cana
d tasmāl lokahitārthāya śmaśāne ramayāmy aham
d umā
d etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
d bhagavan devadeveśa trinetra vṛṣabhadhvaja
d piṅgalaṃ vikṛtaṃ bhāti rūpaṃ te subhayānakam
d bhasmadigdhaṃ virūpākṣaṃ tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraṃ jaṭākulam
d vyāghroragatvaksaṃvītaṃ kapilaśmaśrusaṃtatam
d raudraṃ bhayānakaṃ ghoraṃ śūlapaṭṭasasaṃyutam
d maheśvaraḥ
d kimartham īdṛśaṃ rūpaṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d tad ahaṃ kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvaṃ samāhitā
d dvividho laukiko bhāvaḥ śītam uṣṇam iti priye
d tayor vigrathitaṃ sarvaṃ saumyāgneyam idaṃ jagat
d saumyatvaṃ satataṃ viṣṇau mayy āgneyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
d anena vapuṣā nityaṃ sarvalokān bibharmy aham
d raudrākṛti virūpākṣaṃ śūlapaṭṭasasaṃyutam
d āgneyam iti me rūpaṃ devi lokahite ratam
d yady ahaṃ viparītaḥ syām etat tyaktvā śubhānane
d tadaiva sarvalokānāṃ viparītaṃ pravartate
d tasmān mayedaṃ dhriyate rūpaṃ lokahitaiṣiṇā
d umā
d iti te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
d bhagavan devadeveśa śūlapāṇe vṛṣadhvaja
d kimarthaṃ candrarekhā te śirobhāge virocate
d maheśvaraḥ
d śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kalyāṇi kāraṇam
d purāhaṃ kāraṇād devi kopayuktaḥ śucismite
d dakṣayajñavadhārthāya bhūtasaṃghasamāvṛtaḥ
d tasmin kratuvadhe ghore yajñabhāganimittataḥ
d devā vibhraṃśitās te vai yeṣāṃ bhāgaḥ kratau kṛtaḥ
d somas tatra mayā devi kupitena bhṛśārditaḥ
d paśyaṃś cānaparādhī san pādāṅguṣṭhena pīḍitaḥ
d tathā vinikṛtenāhaṃ sāmapūrvaṃ prasāditaḥ
d tan me cintayataś cāsīt paścāttāpaḥ punaḥ priye
d tadāprabhṛti somaṃ hi śirasā dhārayāmy aham
d evaṃ me pāpahānis tu bhaved iti matir mama
d tadāprabhṛti vai somo mūrdhni saṃdṛśyate sadā
d nāradaḥ
d evaṃ bruvati deveśe vismitāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
d vāgbhiḥ sāñjalimālābhir abhituṣṭuvur īśvaram
d namaḥ śaṃkara deveśa namaḥ sarvajagadguro
d namo devādidevāya namaḥ śaśikalādhara
d namo ghoratarād ghora namo rudra bhayaṃkara
d namaḥ śāntatarāc chānta namaś candrasya pālaka
d namaḥ somāya devāya namas tubhyaṃ caturmukha
d namo bhūtapate śaṃbho jahnukanyāmbuśekhara
d namas triśūlahastāya pannagābharaṇāya ca
d namo 'stu viṣamākṣāya dakṣayajñapradāhaka
d namo 'stu bahunetrāya lokarakṣaṇatatpara
d aho devasya māhātmyaṃ mahādevasya vai kṛpā
d evaṃ dharmaparatvaṃ ca devadevasya cārhati
d evaṃ bruvatsu muniṣu vaco devy abravīd dharam
d prītyarthaṃ ca munīnāṃ sā kṣaṇajñā paramaṃ hitam
d bhagavan devadeveśa sarvalokanamaskṛta
d asya vai ṛṣisaṃghasya mama ca priyakāmyayā
d varṇāśramagataṃ dharmaṃ vaktum arhasy aśeṣataḥ
d na tṛptir asti deveśa śravaṇīyaṃ hi te vacaḥ
d sadharmacāriṇī ceyaṃ bhaktā ceyam iti prabho
d vaktum arhasi deveśa lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā
d maheśvaraḥ
d yāthātathyena tat sarvaṃ vaktum arhasi śaṃkara
d hanta te kathayiṣyāmi yat te devi manaḥpriyam
d śṛṇu tat sarvam akhilaṃ dharmaṃ varṇāśramāśritam
d brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ceti caturvidhāḥ
d brahmaṇā vihitāḥ pūrvaṃ lokatantram abhīpsatā
d karmāṇi ca tadarhāṇi śāstreṣu vihitāni vai
d yadi cedekavarṇaṃ syāj jagat sarvaṃ vinaśyati
d sahaiva devair varṇāni catvāri vihitāny uta
d mukhato brāhmaṇāḥ sṛṣṭās tasmāt te vāgviśāradāḥ
d bāhubhyāṃ kṣatriyāḥ sṛṣṭās tasmād bāhubalānvitāḥ
d udarād udgatā vaiśyās tasmād vārtopajīvinaḥ
d śūdrāś ca pādataḥ sṛṣṭās tasmāt te paricārakāḥ
d teṣāṃ dharmāṃś ca karmāṇi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
d viprāḥ kṛtā bhūmidevā lokānāṃ dhāraṇe kṛtāḥ
d te kaiś cin nāvamantavyā brāhmaṇā hitam icchubhiḥ
d yadi te brāhmaṇā na syur dānayogavahāḥ sadā
d ubhayor lokayor devi sthitir na syāt samāsataḥ
d lokeṣu durlabhaṃ kiṃ tu brāhmaṇatvam iti smṛtam
d abudho vā daridro vā pūjanīyaḥ sadaiva saḥ
d brāhmaṇaṃ yo 'vamanyeta nindayet krośayec ca vā
d prahareta hared vāpi dhanaṃ teṣāṃ narādhamaḥ
d kārayed dhīnakarmāṇi kāmalobhavimohanāt
d sa ca mām avamanyeta māṃ krośati ca nindati
d mām eva praharen mūḍho maddhanasyāpahārakaḥ
d mamaiva prekṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā nandate mūḍhacetanaḥ
d svādhyāyo yajanaṃ dānaṃ tasya dharma iti sthitiḥ
d karmāṇy adhyāpanaṃ caiva yājanaṃ ca pratigrahaḥ
d satyaṃ śāntis tapaḥ śaucaṃ tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
d vikrayo rasadhānyānāṃ brāhmaṇasya vigarhitaḥ
d anāpadi ca śūdrānnaṃ vṛṣalīsaṃgrahas tathā
d tapa eva sadā dharmo brāhmaṇasya na saṃśayaḥ
d sa tu dharmārtham utpannaḥ pūrvaṃ dhātrā tapobalāt
d tasyopanayanaṃ dharmo nityaṃ codakadhāraṇam
d rahasyaśravaṇaṃ dharmo vedavrataniṣevaṇam
d agnikāryaṃ paro dharmo nityaṃ yajñopavītitā
d śūdrānnavarjanaṃ dharmo dharmaḥ satpathasevanam
d dharmo nityopavāsitvaṃ brahmacaryaṃ paraṃ tathā
d amṛtāśyaṃ paraṃ dharmo gṛhapuṣpabalis tathā
d gṛhasaṃmārjanaṃ dharma ālepanavidhis tathā
d atithivratatā dharmo dharmas tretāgnidhāraṇam
d iṣṭayaḥ paśubandhāś ca vidhipūrvaṃ paraṃ tapaḥ
d daṃpatyoḥ samaśīlatvaṃ dharmo vai gṛhamedhinām
d eṣa dvijanmano dharmo gārhasthye dharmadhāraṇam
d yas tu kṣatragato dharmas tvayā devi pracoditaḥ
d tam ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
d kṣatriyās tu tathā devi prajānāṃ pālane smṛtāḥ
d yadi na kṣatriyo loke jagat syād adharottaram
d rakṣaṇāt kṣatriyair eva jagad bhavati śāśvatam
d tasyāpy adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ yajanaṃ dharmataḥ smṛtam
d bhītānāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ caiva pāpānām anuśāsanam
d satāṃ saṃpoṣaṇaṃ caiva karaṣaḍbhāgajīvanam
d utsāhaḥ śastrajīvitvaṃ tasya dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ
d bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇaṃ dharmaḥ kṛte karmaṇy amoghatā
d samyag raṇadhṛto dharmo dharmaḥ paurahitakriyā
d vyavahārasthitir nityaṃ guṇam etan mahīpateḥ
d ārtahastaprado rājā dharmaṃ prāpnoty anuttamam
d evaṃ te vihitāḥ pūrvair dharmāḥ karmavidhānataḥ
d tathaiva devi vaiśyāś ca lokayātrāhitāḥ smṛtāḥ
d anye tān upajīvanti pratyakṣaphaladā hi te
d yadi na syus tathā vaiśyā na bhaveyus tathā pare
d teṣām adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ yajanaṃ dharma iṣyate
d vaiśyasya satataṃ dharmaḥ pāśupālyaṃ kṛṣis tathā
d agnihotraparispandās trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ
d vāṇijyaṃ satpathe sthānam ātitheyaṃ sadā bhavet
d viprāṇāṃ svāgataṃ nyāyo vaiśyadharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
d tilagandharasāś caiva na vikreyāḥ kathaṃ cana
d vaṇikpatham upāsadbhir vaiśyair vaiśyapathi sthitaiḥ
d sarvātithyaṃ trivargasya yathāśakti divāniśam
d evaṃ te vihitā devi lokayātrā svayaṃbhuvā
d tathaiva śūdrā vihitāḥ sarvadharmaprasādhakāḥ
d śūdrāś ca yadi te na syuḥ karmakartā na vidyate
d trayaḥ pūrve śūdramūlās tasmāt karmakarāḥ smṛtāḥ
d brāhmaṇādiṣu śuśrūṣā dāsadharma iti smṛtaḥ
d vārtā ca kārukarmāṇi śilpaṃ nāṭyaṃ tathaiva ca
d ahiṃsakaḥ śubhācāro daivatadvijavandakaḥ
d śūdro dharmaphalair iṣṭaiḥ svadharmeṇopayujyate
d evamādi tathānyac ca śūdrakarma iti smṛtam
d te 'py evaṃ vihitā loke karmayogāḥ śubhānane
d evaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ puṇyalokāḥ paratra ca
d vihitāś ca tathā dṛṣṭā yathāvad dharmacāriṇām
d eṣa varṇāśrayo dharmaḥ karma caiva tadarpaṇam
d umā
d kathitaṃ śrotukāmāyāḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
d bhagavan devadeveśa namas te vṛṣabhadhvaja
d maheśvaraḥ
d śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ deva dharmam āśramiṇāṃ vibho
d athāśramagataṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇu devi samāhitā
d āśramāṇāṃ tu yo dharmaḥ kriyate brahmavādibhiḥ
d gṛhasthaḥ pravaras teṣāṃ gārhasthyavratam āśritaḥ
d pañcayajñakriyā śaucaṃ dāratuṣṭir atandritā
d ṛtukālābhigamanaṃ dānayajñatapāṃsi ca
d avipravāsas tasyeṣṭaṃ svādhyāyaś cāgnipūjanam
d atithīnām ābhimukhyaṃ śaktyā ceṣṭanimantraṇam
d anugrahaś ca sarveṣāṃ manovākkāyakarmabhiḥ
d evamādi śubhaṃ cānyat kuryāt tadvṛttavān gṛhī
d evaṃ saṃcaratas tasya puṇyalokā na saṃśayaḥ
d tathaiva vānaprasthasya dharmāḥ proktāḥ sanātanāḥ
d gṛhavāsaṃ samutsṛjya niścityaikamanāḥ śubhaiḥ
d vanyair eva sadāhārair vartayed iti ca sthitiḥ
d bhūmiśayyā jaṭāḥ śmaśrucarmavalkaladhāraṇam
d devatātithisatkāro mahākṛcchrābhipūjanam
d agnihotraṃ triṣavaṇaṃ nityaṃ tasya vidhīyate
d brahmacaryaṃ kṣamā śaucaṃ tasya dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ
d evaṃ sa vigate prāṇe devaloke mahīyate
d yatidharmās tathā devi saṅgāṃs tyaktvā yatas tataḥ
d ākiṃcanyam anārambhaḥ sarvataḥ śaucam ārjavam
d sarvatra bhaikṣacaryā ca sarvatraiva vivāsanam
d sadā dhyānaparatvaṃ ca doṣaśuddhiḥ kṣamā dayā
d tattvānugatabuddhitvaṃ tasya dharmavidhir bhavet
d brahmacārī ca yo devi janmaprabhṛti dīkṣitaḥ
d brahmacaryaparo bhūtvā saṃśrayed gurum ātmanaḥ
d sarvakāleṣu sarvatra gurupūjāṃ samācaret
d bhaikṣacaryāgnikāryaṃ ca sadā jalaniṣevaṇam
d svādhyāyaḥ satataṃ devi tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
d tasya ceṣṭā tu gurvartham āprāṇāntam iti sthitiḥ
d guror abhāve tatputre guruvad vṛttim ācaret
d evaṃ so 'py amalāṃl lokān brāhmaṇaḥ pratipadyate
d eṣa te kathito devi dharmaś cāśramavāsinām
d cāturvarṇyāśrame yukto loka ity eva vidyate
d umā
d kathitaṃ te samāsena kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
d bhagavan devadeveśa tripurāntaka śaṃkara
d ayaṃ tv ṛṣigaṇo deva tapas tepa iti prabho
d tapasā karśitā nityaṃ taporjanaparāyaṇāḥ
d asya kiṃlakṣaṇo dharmaḥ kīdṛśaś cāgamas tathā
d etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tan me vada varaprada
d nāradaḥ
d evaṃ vadantyāṃ rudrāṇyām ṛṣayaḥ sādhu sādhv iti
d abruvan hṛṣṭamanasaḥ sarve tadgatamānasāḥ
d śṛṇvantīm ṛṣidharmāṃs tu ṛṣayaś cābhyapūjayan
d tvatprasādād vayaṃ devi śroṣyāmaḥ paramaṃ hitam
d dhanyāḥ khalu vayaṃ sarve pādamūlaṃ tavāśritāḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d iti sarve tadā devīṃ vācā samabhipūjayan
d nyāyatas tvaṃ mahābhāge śrotukāmā manasvini
d hanta te kathayiṣyāmi munidharmaṃ śucismite
d vānaprasthaṃ samāśritya kriyate bahudhā naraiḥ
d bahuśākho bahuvidha ṛṣidharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
d prāyaśaḥ svargabhogārtham ṛṣibhiḥ kriyate tapaḥ
d tathā saṃcaratāṃ teṣāṃ devi dharmavidhiṃ śṛṇu
d bhūtvā pūrvaṃ gṛhasthas tu putrānṛṇyam avāpya ca
d kalatrakāryaṃ saṃsthāpya kāraṇāt saṃtyajed gṛham
d avasthāpya mano dhṛtyā vyavasāyapuraḥsaraḥ
d nirdvaṃdvo vā sadāro vā vanavāsāya saṃvrajet
d deśāḥ paramapuṇyā ye nadīvanasamanvitāḥ
d ābādhamuktāḥ prāyeṇa tīrthāyatanasaṃyutāḥ
d tatra gatvā vidhiṃ jñātvā dīkṣāṃ kuryād yathākramam
d dīkṣitvaikamanā bhūtvā paricaryāṃ samācaret
d kālyotthānaṃ ca śaucaṃ ca sarvadevapraṇāmanam
d śakṛdālepanaṃ kāye tyaktadoṣāpramāditā
d sāyaṃ prātaś cābhiṣekam agnihotraṃ yathāvidhi
d kāyaśaucaṃ ca kāryaṃ ca jaṭāvalkaladhāraṇam
d satataṃ vanacaryā ca samitkusumakāraṇāt
d nīvāragrahaṇaṃ kāle śākamūlopacāyanam
d sadāyatanaśaucaṃ ca tasya dharmāya ceṣyate
d atithīnām ābhimukhyaṃ tatparatvaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
d pādyāsanābhyāṃ saṃpūjā tathāhāranimantraṇam
d agrāmyapacanaṃ kāle pitṛdevārcanaṃ tathā
d paścād atithisatkāras tasya dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ
d śiṣṭair dharmāsane caiva dharmārthasahitāḥ kathāḥ
d pratiśrayavibhāgaś ca bhūmiśayyā śilāsu vā
d vratopavāsayogaś ca kṣamā cendriyanigrahaḥ
d divā rātrau yathāyogaṃ śaucaṃ dharmārthacintanā
d evaṃ dharmāḥ purā dṛṣṭāḥ sāmānyā vanavāsinām
d evaṃ vai yatamānasya kāladharmo yadā bhavet
d tadaiva so 'bhijāyeta svargalokaṃ śucismite
d tatra saṃvihitā bhogāḥ svargastrībhir anindite
d paribhraṣṭo yadā svargād viśiṣṭas tu bhaven nṛpa
d evaṃ dharmaḥ sadā devi sarveṣāṃ vanavāsinām
d umā
d etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
d bhagavan devadeveśa ṛṣīṇāṃ caritaṃ śubham
d maheśvaraḥ
d viśeṣadharmān icchāmi śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
d vananityair vanaratair vānaprasthair maharṣibhiḥ
d vanaṃ gurum ivālambya vastavyam iti niścayaḥ
d vīraśayyām upāsadbhir vīrasthānopasevibhiḥ
d vratopavāsair bahubhir grīṣme pañcatapais tathā
d pañcayajñaparair nityaṃ paurṇamāsyaparāyaṇaiḥ
d maṇḍūkaśāyair hemante śaivālāṅkurabhojanaiḥ
d cīravalkalasaṃvītair mṛgājinadharais tathā
d cāturmāsyaparaiḥ kaiś cid devadharmaparāyaṇaiḥ
d evaṃvidhair vanagatais tapyate sumahat tapaḥ
d evaṃ kṛtvā śubhaṃ karma paścād yāti triviṣṭapam
d tatrāpi sumahat kālaṃ sa vihṛtya yathāsukham
d jāyate mānuṣe loke dānabhogasamanvitaḥ
d umā
d tapoviśeṣasaṃyuktāḥ kathitās te śucismite
d bhagavan sarvabhūteśa teṣu ye dārasaṃyutāḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d kīdṛśaṃ caritaṃ teṣāṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d ya ekapatnīdharmāṇaś caranti vipulaṃ tapaḥ
d vindhyapādeṣu ye ke cid ye ca naimiṣavāsinaḥ
d puṣkareṣu ca ye cānye nadīvanasamāśritāḥ
d sarve te vidhidṛṣṭena caranti vipulaṃ tapaḥ
d hiṃsādrohavimuktāś ca sarvabhūtānukampinaḥ
d śāntā dāntā jitakrodhāḥ sarvātithyaparāyaṇāḥ
d prāṇiṣv ātmopamā nityam ṛtukālābhigāminaḥ
d svadārasahitā devi caranti vratam uttamam
d vasanti sukham avyagrāḥ putradārasamanvitāḥ
d teṣāṃ paricchadārambhāḥ kṛtyopakaraṇāni ca
d gṛhasthavad vidhīyante yathāyogaṃ pramāṇataḥ
d poṣaṇārthaṃ ca dārāṇām agnikāryārtham eva ca
d gāvaś ca karṣaṇaṃ caiva sarvam etad vidhīyate
d evaṃ vanagatair devi kartavyaṃ dārasaṃyutaiḥ
d te svadāraiḥ samāyānti puṇyāṃl lokān dṛḍhavratāḥ
d patibhiḥ saha ye dārāś caranti vipulaṃ tapaḥ
d avyagrabhāvād aikātmyāt te ca gacchanti vai divam
d etat te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
d umā
d bhagavan devadeveśa teṣāṃ karmaphalaṃ vibho
d maheśvaraḥ
d śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ deva prasādāt te varaprada
d vānaprasthagataṃ sarvaṃ phalapākaṃ śṛṇu priye
d agniyogaṃ vrajan grīṣme naro dvādaśavārṣikam
d rudraloke hi jāyeta vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
d udavāsavrataṃ kurvan varṣakāle dṛḍhavrataḥ
d somaloke 'bhijāyeta naro dvādaśavārṣikam
d kāṣṭhavan maunam āsthāya naro dvādaśavārṣikam
d marutāṃ lokam āsthāya tatra bhogaiś ca yujyate
d kaṇṭaśarkarasaṃyukte sthaṇḍile saṃviśen muniḥ
d yakṣaloke 'bhijāyeta sahasrāṇi caturdaśa
d varṣāṇāṃ bhogasaṃyukto naro dvādaśavārṣikam
d vīrāsanagato yas tu kaṇṭakāphalakāśritaḥ
d gandharveṣv abhijāyeta naro dvādaśavārṣikam
d vīrasthāyī cordhvabāhur naro dvādaśavārṣikam
d devaloke 'bhijāyeta divyabhogasamanvitaḥ
d pādāṅguṣṭhena yas tiṣṭhed ūrdhvabāhur jitendriyaḥ
d indraloke 'bhijāyeta sahasrāṇi caturdaśa
d āhāraniyamaṃ kṛtvā munir dvādaśavārṣikam
d nāgaloke 'bhijāyeta saṃvatsaragaṇān bahūn
d evaṃ dṛḍhavratā devi vānaprasthāś ca karmabhiḥ
d sthāneṣu teṣu tiṣṭhanti tadvad bhogasamanvitāḥ
d tebhyo bhraṣṭāḥ punar devi jāyante nṛṣu bhoginaḥ
d varṇottamakuleṣv eva dhanadhānyasamanvitāḥ
d etat te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
d umā
d eṣāṃ yāyāvarāṇāṃ tu dharmam icchāmi mānada
d maheśvaraḥ
d kṛpayā parayāviṣṭas taṃ me brūhi maheśvara
d dharmaṃ yāyāvarāṇāṃ tu śṛṇu bhāmini tatparā
d vratopavāsaśuddhāṅgās tīrthasnānaparāyaṇāḥ
d dhṛtimantaḥ kṣamāyuktāḥ satyavrataparāyaṇāḥ
d pakṣamāsopavāsaiś ca karśitā dharmadarśinaḥ
d varṣaśītātapair eva kurvantaḥ paramaṃ tapaḥ
d kālayogena gacchanti śakralokaṃ śucismite
d tatra te bhogasaṃyuktā divyagandhasamanvitāḥ
d divyabhūṣaṇasaṃyuktā vimānavaram āsthitāḥ
d vicaranti yathākāmaṃ divyastrīgaṇasaṃyutāḥ
d umā
d etat te kathitaṃ devi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
d maheśvaraḥ
d teṣāṃ cakracarāṇāṃ tu dharmam icchāmi vai prabho
d hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu śākaṭikaṃ śubhe
d saṃvahanto dhuraṃ dāraiḥ śākaṭānāṃ tu sarvadā
d prārthayante yathā grāmyāḥ śakaṭair bhaikṣacaryayā
d taporjanaparādhīnās tapasā kṣīṇakalmaṣāḥ
d paryaṭanto diśaḥ sarvāḥ kāmakrodhavivarjitāḥ
d svavaśād eva te mṛtyum abhikāṅkṣanti nityaśaḥ
d indraloke tathā teṣāṃ nirmitā bhogasaṃcayāḥ
d amaraiḥ saha te yānti devavad bhogasaṃyutāḥ
d varāpsarobhiḥ saṃyuktāś cirakālam anindite
d tenaiva kālayogena tridivaṃ yānti śobhane
d tatra pramuditā bhogair vicaranti yathāsukham
d umā
d etat te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
d maheśvaraḥ
d vaikhānasānāṃ vai dharmaṃ śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ prabho
d teṣu vaikhānasā nāma vānaprasthāḥ śubhekṣaṇe
d tīvreṇa tapasā yuktā dīptimantaḥ svatejasā
d satyavrataparādhīnās teṣāṃ niṣkalmaṣaṃ tapaḥ
d aśmakuṭṭās tathānye ca dantolūkhalinas tathā
d śīrṇaparṇāśinaś cānye uñchayanti tathāpare
d kapotavratinaś cānye kāpotīṃ vṛttim āsthitāḥ
d paśupracāraniratāḥ phenapāś ca tathāpare
d mṛgavan mṛgacaryāyāṃ saṃcaranti tathāpare
d abbhakṣā vāyubhakṣāś ca nirāhārās tathaiva ca
d saṃcaranti tapo ghoraṃ vyādhimṛtyuvivarjitāḥ
d svavaśād eva te mṛtyum abhikāṅkṣanti nityaśaḥ
d indraloke tathā teṣāṃ nirmitā bhogasaṃcayāḥ
d amaraiḥ saha te yānti devavad bhogasaṃyutāḥ
d varāpsarobhiḥ saṃyuktāś cirakālam anindite
d umā
d etat te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
d maheśvaraḥ
d bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi vālakhilyāṃs tapodhanān
d dharmacaryāṃ tathā devi vālakhilyagatāṃ śṛṇu
d mṛganirmokavasanā nirdvaṃdvās te tapodhanāḥ
d aṅguṣṭhamātrāḥ suśroṇi sveṣv evāṅgeṣu saṃyutāḥ
d te mṛtyuviṣayātītās tapaḥsiddhās tapobalāḥ
d jitāhārā jitakrodhāḥ sarvabhogeṣu niḥspṛhāḥ
d tapaścaraṇam icchanto lokārthaṃ paramodyatāḥ
d udyantaṃ satataṃ sūryaṃ stuvanto vividhaiḥ stavaiḥ
d bhāskarasyaiva kiraṇaiḥ saha saṃyānti nityadā
d dyotayante diśaḥ sarvā dharmajñāḥ satyavādinaḥ
d teṣv eva nirmalaṃ satyaṃ lokārthaṃ tu pratiṣṭhitam
d loko 'yaṃ dhāryate devi teṣām eva tapobalāt
d mahātmanāṃ tu tapasā satyena ca śucismite
d kṣamayā ca mahābhāge bhūtānāṃ saṃsthitiṃ viduḥ
d prajārtham api lokārthaṃ mahadbhiḥ kriyate tapaḥ
d tapasā prāpyate sarvaṃ tapasā prāpyate phalam
d duṣprāpam api yal loke tapasā prāpyate hi tat
d pañcabhūtasthitiś caiva lokasṛṣṭivivardhanam
d etat sarvaṃ samāsena tapoyogād vinirmitam
d tasmād ayaṃ ṛṣigaṇas tapas tepa iti priye
d dharmānveṣī tapaḥ kartuṃ yatate satataṃ priye
d amaratvaṃ vaśitvaṃ ca tapasā prārthayet sadā
