d etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ śṛṇvantyās te śrutaṃ priye
d priyārtham ṛṣisaṃghasya lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā
d nāradaḥ
d iti bruvantaṃ deveśam ṛṣayaś cāpi tuṣṭuvuḥ
d umā
d bhūyaḥ paramakaṃ yatnaṃ tadāprabhṛti cakrire
d uktas tvayā trivargasya dharmaḥ paramakaḥ śubhaḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d sarvavyāpī tu yo dharmo bhagavaṃs tad bravīhi me
d brāhmaṇā lokasaṃsāre sṛṣṭā dhātrā guṇārthinā
d lokāṃs tārayituṃ yuktā martyeṣu kṣitidevatāḥ
d teṣu tāvat pravakṣyāmi dharmaṃ śubhaphalodayam
d brāhmaṇeṣv abhayo dharmaḥ paramaḥ śubhalakṣaṇaḥ
d ime hi dharmā lokārthaṃ pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
d pṛthivyāṃ sajjanair nityaṃ kīrtyamānaṃ nibodha me
d svadāraniratir dharmo nityaṃ japyaṃ tathaiva ca
d sarvātithyaṃ trivargasya yathāśakti divāniśam
d śūdro dharmaparo nityaṃ śuśrūṣābhimanā bhavet
d traividyo brāhmaṇo vṛddho na cādhyayanajīvakaḥ
d trivargaṃ tu vyatikrāntas tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
d ṣaṭ karmāṇi ca proktāni sṛṣṭāni brahmaṇā purā
d dharmiṣṭhāni variṣṭhāni yāni tāni śṛṇūttame
d yajanaṃ yājanaṃ caiva dānaṃ pātre pratigrahaḥ
d adhyāpanam adhyayanaṃ ṣaṭkarmā dharmabhāg ṛjuḥ
d nityasvādhyāyato dharmo nityayajñaḥ sanātanaḥ
d dānaṃ praśasyate nityaṃ brāhmaṇeṣu trikarmasu
d ayaṃ paramako dharmaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ satsu vidyate
d garbhasthāne viśuddhānāṃ dharmasya niyamo mahān
d pañcayajñaviśuddhātmā kratunityo 'nasūyakaḥ
d dānto brāhmaṇasatkartā susaṃmṛṣṭaniveśanaḥ
d cakṣurdo manado jihvāsnigdhavarṇapradaḥ sadā
d atithyabhyāgatarataḥ śeṣānnakṛtabhojanaḥ
d pādyam arghyaṃ yathānyāyam āsanaṃ śayanaṃ tathā
d dīpaṃ pratiśrayaṃ caiva yo dadāti sa dhārmikaḥ
d prātar utthāya vai paścād bhojanena nimantrayet
d satkṛtyānuvrajed yaś ca tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
d pravṛttilakṣaṇo dharmo gṛhastheṣu vidhīyate
d tad ahaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi trivargeṣu ca yad yathā
d ekenāṃśena dharmo 'rthaḥ kartavyo hitam icchatā
d ekenāṃśena kāmārtham ekam aṃśaṃ vivardhayet
d nivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ puṇyo dharmo mokṣe vidhīyate
d tasya vṛttiṃ pravakṣyāmi tāṃ śṛṇuṣva samāhitā
d sarvabhūtadayā dharmo nivṛttiparamaḥ sadā
d bubhukṣitaṃ pipāsārtam atithiṃ śrāntam āgatam
d arcayanti varārohe teṣām api phalaṃ mahat
d pātram ity eva dātavyaṃ sarvasmai dharmakāṅkṣibhiḥ
d āgamiṣyati yat pātraṃ tat pātraṃ tārayiṣyati
d kāle saṃprāptam atithiṃ bhoktukāmam upasthitam
d cittaṃ saṃbhāvayet tatra vyāso 'yaṃ samupasthitaḥ
d tasya pūjāṃ yathāśakti saumyacittaḥ prayojayet
d cittamūlo bhaved dharmo dharmamūlaṃ bhaved yaśaḥ
d tasmāt saumyena cittena dātavyaṃ devi sarvadā
d saumyacittas tu yo dadyāt tad dhi dānam anuttamam
d yathāmbubindubhiḥ sūkṣmaiḥ patadbhir medinītale
d kedārāś ca taṭākāni sarāṃsi saritas tathā
d toyapūrṇāni dṛśyante apratarkyāṇi śobhane
d alpam alpam api hy etad dīyamānaṃ vivardhate
d pīḍayāpi ca bhṛtyānāṃ dānam eva viśiṣyate
d putradārā dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ na mṛtān anugacchati
d śreyo dānaṃ ca bhogaś ca dhanaṃ prāpya yaśasvini
d dānena hi mahābhāgā bhavanti manujādhipāḥ
d nāsti bhūmisamaṃ dānaṃ nāsti dānasamo nidhiḥ
d nāsti satyāt paro dharmo nānṛtāt pātakaṃ param
d āśrame yas tu tapyeta tapomūlaphalāśanaḥ
d ādityābhimukho bhūtvā jaṭāvalkalasaṃvṛtaḥ
d maṇḍūkaśāyī hemante grīṣme pañcatapā bhavet
d samyak tapaś carantīha śraddadhānā vanāśrame
d gṛhāśramasya te devi kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm
d umā
d gṛhāśramasya yā caryā vratāni niyamāś ca ye
d yathā ca devatāḥ pūjyāḥ satataṃ gṛhamedhinā
d yad yac ca parihartavyaṃ gṛhiṇā tithiparvasu
d maheśvaraḥ
d tat sarvaṃ śrotum icchāmi kathyamānaṃ tvayā prabho
d gṛhāśramasya yan mūlaṃ phalaṃ dharmo 'yam uttamaḥ
d pādaiś caturbhiḥ satataṃ dharmo yatra pratiṣṭhitaḥ
d sārabhūtaṃ varārohe dadhno ghṛtam ivoddhṛtam
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrūyatāṃ dharmacāriṇi
d śuśrūṣate yaḥ pitaraḥ mātaraṃ ca gṛhāśrame
d bhartāraṃ caiva yā nārī agnihotraṃ ca ye dvijāḥ
d teṣu teṣu ca prīṇanti devā indrapurogamāḥ
d umā
d pitaraḥ pitṛlokasthāḥ svadharmeṇa sa rajyate
d mātāpitṛviyuktānāṃ kā caryā gṛhamedhinām
d vidhavānāṃ ca nārīṇāṃ bhavān etad bravītu me
d maheśvaraḥ
d devatātithiśuśrūṣā guruvṛddhābhivādanam
d ahiṃsā sarvabhūtānām alobhaḥ satyasaṃdhatā
d brahmacaryaṃ śaraṇyatvaṃ śaucaṃ pūrvābhibhāṣaṇam
d kṛtajñatvam apaiśunyaṃ satataṃ dharmaśīlatā
d dine dvir abhiṣekaṃ ca pitṛdaivatapūjanam
d gavāhnikapradānaṃ ca saṃvibhāgo 'tithiṣv api
d dīpaṃ pratiśrayaṃ caiva dadyāt pādyāsanaṃ tathā
d pañcame 'hani ṣaṣṭhe vā dvādaśe vāpy athāṣṭame
d caturdaśe pañcadaśe brahmacārī sadā bhavet
d śmaśrukarma śirobhyaṅgam añjanaṃ dantadhāvanam
d naiteṣv ahaḥsu kurvīta teṣv alakṣmīḥ pratiṣṭhitā
d vratopavāsaniyamas tapo dānaṃ ca śaktitaḥ
d bharaṇaṃ bhṛtyavargasya dīnānām anukampanam
d paradāranivṛttiś ca svadāreṣu ratiḥ sadā
d śarīram ekaṃ daṃpatyor vidhātrā pūrvanirmitam
d tasmāt svadāranirato brahmacārī vidhīyate
d śīlavṛttavinītasya nigṛhītendriyasya ca
d ārjave vartamānasya sarvabhūtahitaiṣiṇaḥ
d priyātitheś ca kṣāntasya dharmārjitadhanasya ca
d gṛhāśramapadasthasya kim anyaiḥ kṛtyam āśramaiḥ
d yathā mātaram āśritya sarve jīvanti jantavaḥ
d tathā gṛhāśramaṃ prāpya sarve jīvanti cāśramāḥ
d rājānaḥ sarvapāṣaṇḍāḥ sarve raṅgopajīvinaḥ
d vyālagrāhāś ca dambhāś ca corā rājabhaṭās tathā
d savidyāḥ sarvaśilpajñāḥ sarve caiva cikitsakāḥ
d dūrādhvānaṃ prapannāś ca kṣīṇapathyodanā narāḥ
d ete cānye ca bahavas tarkayanti gṛhāśramam
d mārjārā mūṣikāḥ śvānaḥ sūkarāś ca śukās tathā
d kapotakākacaṭakāḥ sarīsṛpaniṣeviṇaḥ
d araṇyavāsinaś cānye saṃghā ye mṛgapakṣiṇām
d evaṃ bahuvidhā devi loke 'smin sacarācarāḥ
d gṛhe kṣetre bile caiva śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
d gṛhasthena kṛtaṃ karma sarvais tair upabhujyate
d upayuktaṃ ca yat teṣāṃ matimān nānuśocati
d dharma ity eva saṃkalpya yat tu tasya phalaṃ śṛṇu
d sarvayatnapraṇītasya hayamedhasya yat phalam
d varṣe sa dvādaśe devi phalenaitena yujyate
d āśāpāśavimokṣaś ca viddhi dharmam anuttamam
d vṛkṣamūlacaro nityaṃ śūnyāgāraniveśanam
d nadīpulinaśāyī ca nadītīram anuvrajan
d vimuktaḥ sarvasaṅgebhyaḥ snehabandhena vai dvijaḥ
d ātmany evātmano bhāvaṃ samāyojyeha te vane
d ātmabhūto yatāhāro mokṣadṛṣṭena karmaṇā
d pavitranityo yuktaś ca tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
d naikatra ramate sakto na caikagrāmagocaraḥ
d yukto 'py aṭati yo 'yukto na caikapulineśayaḥ
d umā
d eṣa mokṣavidāṃ dharmo vedoktaḥ satpathe sthitaḥ
d devadeva namas tubhyaṃ triyakṣa vṛṣabhadhvaja
d śrutaṃ me bhagavan sarvaṃ tvatprasādān maheśvara
d saṃgṛhītaṃ mayā tac ca tava vākyam anuttamam
d idānīm asti saṃdeho mānuṣeṣv eva kaś cana
d tulyapāṇiśiraḥkāyo rājāyam iti dṛśyate
d kena karmavipākena sarvaprādhānyam arhati
d sa cāpi daṇḍayan martyān bhartsayan vidhamann api
d pretyabhāve kathaṃ lokāṃl labhate puṇyakarmaṇām
d maheśvaraḥ
d rājavṛttam ahaṃ tasmāc chrotum icchāmi mānada
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi rājadharmaṃ śubhānane
d rājāyattaṃ hi tat sarvaṃ lokavṛttaṃ śubhāśubham
d mahatas tapaso devi phalaṃ rājyam iti smṛtam
d tapodānamayaṃ rājyaṃ paraṃ sthānaṃ vidhīyate
d tasmād rājñaḥ sadā martyāḥ praṇamanti yatas tataḥ
d nyāyatas tvaṃ mahābhāge śrotukāmāsi bhāmini
d tasmāt tasyaiva caritaṃ jagatpathyaṃ śṛṇu priye
d arājake purā tv āsīt prajānāṃ saṃkulaṃ mahat
d tad dṛṣṭvā saṃkulaṃ brahmā manuṃ rājye nyaveśayat
d tadāprabhṛti saṃdṛṣṭaṃ rājñāṃ vṛttaṃ śubhāśubham
d tan me śṛṇu varārohe tasya pathyaṃ jagaddhitam
d yathā pretya labhet svargaṃ yathā vīryaṃ yaśas tathā
d pitryaṃ vā bhūtapūrvaṃ vā svayam utpādya vā punaḥ
d rājadharmam anuṣṭhāya vidhivad bhoktum arhati
d ātmānam eva prathamaṃ vinayair upapādayet
d anu bhṛtyān prajāḥ paścād ity eṣa vinayakramaḥ
d svāminaṃ copamāṃ kṛtvā prajās tadvṛttakāṅkṣayā
d svayaṃ vinayasaṃpannā bhavantīha śubhekṣaṇe
d tasmāt pūrvataraṃ rājā ātmānaṃ vinaye nayet
d yo vinītaḥ svayaṃ rājā vinayaty eva vai prajāḥ
d apahāsyo bhavet tādṛk svadoṣasyānavekṣaṇāt
d vidyābhyāsair vṛddhayogair ātmānaṃ vinayaṃ nayet
d vidyā dharmārthaphalinī tadvido vṛddhasaṃjñitāḥ
d indriyāṇāṃ jayo devi ata ūrdhvam udāhṛtam
d ajaye sumahān doṣo rājānaṃ vinipātayet
d pañcaiva svavaśān kṛtvā tadarthān pañca śoṣayet
d ṣaḍ utsṛjya yathāyogaṃ jñānena vinayena ca
d śāstracakṣur nayaparo bhūtvā bhṛtyān samāharet
d vṛttaśrutakulopetān upadhābhiḥ parīkṣitān
d amātyān upadhātītān sāpasarpāñ jitendriyān
d yojayeta yathāyogaṃ yathārhaṃ sveṣu karmasu
d amātyā buddhisaṃpannā rāṣṭraṃ bahujanapriyam
d durādharṣaṃ puraśreṣṭhaṃ kośaḥ kṛcchrasahaḥ smṛtaḥ
d anuraktaṃ balaṃ sāram advaidhaṃ mitram eva ca
d etāḥ prakṛtayaḥ ṣaṭ ca svāmī ca nayatattvavit
d prajānāṃ rakṣaṇārthāya sarvam etad vinirmitam
d ābhiḥ karaṇabhūtābhiḥ kuryāl lokahitaṃ nṛpaḥ
d ātmarakṣā nṛpendrasya prajārakṣārtham iṣyate
d tasmāt satatam ātmānaṃ saṃrakṣed apramādavān
d bhojanācchādanāt snānād bahir niṣkramaṇād api
d nityaṃ strīgaṇasaṃyogād rakṣed ātmānam ātmavān
d svebhyaś caiva parebhyaś ca śastrād api viṣād api
d satataṃ putradārebhyo rakṣed ātmānam ātmavān
d sarvebhya eva sthānebhyo rakṣed ātmānam ātmavān
d prajānāṃ rakṣaṇārthāya prajāhitakaro bhavet
d prajākāryaṃ tu tatkāryaṃ prajāsaukhyaṃ tu tatsukham
d prajāpriyaṃ priyaṃ tasya svahitaṃ hi prajāhitam
d prajārthaṃ tasya sarvasvam ātmārthaṃ na vidhīyate
d prakṛtīnāṃ vivādārthaṃ rāgadveṣau vyudasya ca
d ubhayoḥ pakṣayor vādaṃ śrutvā caiva yathātatham
d tam arthaṃ vimṛśed buddhyā svayam ā tattvadarśanāt
d tadvidbhir bahubhir vṛddhaiḥ sahāsīno narottamaiḥ
d kartāram aparādhaṃ ca deśakālau nayānayau
d jñātvā samyag yathāśāstraṃ tato daṇḍaṃ nayen nṛṣu
d evaṃ kurvaṃl labhed dharmaṃ pakṣapātavivarjanāt
d pratyakṣāptopadeśābhyām anumānena vā punaḥ
d boddhavyaṃ satataṃ rājñā deśavṛttaṃ śubhāśubham
d cāraiḥ karmapravṛttyā ca tad vijñāya vicārayan
d aśubhaṃ nirharet sadyo joṣayec chubham ātmanaḥ
d garhyān vigarhayed eva pūjyān saṃpūjayet tathā
d daṇḍyāṃś ca daṇḍayed devi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
d pañcāpekṣaṃ sadā mantraṃ kuryād buddhiyutair naraiḥ
d kulavṛttaśrutopetair nityaṃ mantraparo bhavet
d kāmarāgeṇa vai mūrkhair naiva mantramanā bhavet
d rājā rāṣṭrahitāpekṣaḥ satyadharmāṇi kārayet
d sarvodyogaṃ svayaṃ kuryād durgādiṣu sadā nṛpaḥ
d deśavṛddhikarān bhṛtyān apramādena kārayet
d deśakṣayakarān sarvān saṃpriyān api varjayet
d ahany ahani saṃpaśyed anujīvigaṇaṃ svayam
d sumukhaḥ supriyo bhūtvā samyag vṛttaṃ samādiśet
d adharmyaṃ paruṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ vākyaṃ vaktuṃ na cārhati
d nare nare guṇān doṣān samyag veditum arhati
d sveṅgitaṃ vṛṇuyād dhairyān na kuryāt kṣudrasaṃvidam
d pareṅgitajño lokajño bhūtvā saṃsargam ācaret
d svataś ca parataś caiva parasparabhayād api
d amānuṣabhayebhyaś ca svāḥ prajāḥ pālayen nṛpaḥ
d lubdhāḥ kaṭhorāś cādhyakṣā mānavā dasyuvṛttayaḥ
d nigrāhyā eva te rājñā saṃgṛhītā yatas tataḥ
d kumārān vinayair eva janmaprabhṛti yojayet
d teṣām ātmaguṇopetaṃ yauvarājye niyojayet
d prakṛtīnāṃ yathā na syād rājyabhraṃśodbhavaṃ bhayam
d etat saṃcintayan nityaṃ tadvidhānaṃ tathārhati
d arājakaṃ kṣaṇam api rāṣṭraṃ na syād dhi śobhane
d ātmano 'nuvidhānāya yauvarājyaṃ sadeṣyate
d kulajānāṃ ca vaidyānāṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ tapasvinām
d anyeṣāṃ vṛttayuktānāṃ viśeṣaṃ kartum arhati
d ātmārthaṃ rājyatantrārthaṃ kośasaṃcayam ārabhet
d durgād rāṣṭrāt samudrāc ca vaṇigbhyaḥ puruṣātyayāt
d parātmaguṇasārābhyāṃ bhṛtyapoṣaṇam ācaret
d vāhanānāṃ vidhāyāgre poṣaṇaṃ yaudhakarmasu
d sādaraḥ satataṃ bhūtvā apekṣāvratam ācaret
d caturdhā vibhajet kośaṃ dharmabhṛtyātmakāraṇāt
d āpadarthaṃ ca nītijño deśakālavaśena tu
d anāthān vyādhitān vṛddhān svadeśe poṣayen nṛpaḥ
d saṃdhiṃ ca vigrahaṃ caiva tadviśeṣāṃs tathāparān
d yathāvat saṃvimṛśyaiva buddhipūrvaṃ samācaret
d sarveṣāṃ sa priyo bhūtvā maṇḍalaṃ satataṃ caret
d śubheṣv api ca kāryeṣu na caiko 'ntaḥ samācaret
d svataś ca parataś caiva vyasanāni vimṛśya tu
d pareṇa dhārmikān nyāyān nātīyād dveṣalobhataḥ
d rakṣyatvaṃ vai prajādharmaḥ kṣatradharmas tu rakṣaṇam
d kunṛpaiḥ pīḍitās tasmāt prajāḥ sarvatra pālayet
d yātrākālam avekṣyaiva paścāt kopaḥ phalodayam
d tadyuktāś cāpadaś caiva prāg yānād iti cintayet
d vyasanebhyo balaṃ rakṣen nayato vyayato 'pi vā
d prāyaśo varjayed yuddhaṃ prāṇarakṣaṇakāraṇāt
d kāraṇād eva yoddhavyaṃ nātmanaḥ paradoṣataḥ
d suyuddhe prāṇamokṣaś ca tasya dharmāya iṣyate
d abhiyukto balavatā kuryād āpadvidhiṃ nṛpaḥ
d anunīya tathā sarvān prajānāṃ hitakāraṇāt
d anyaprakṛtiyuktānāṃ rājñāṃ vṛttavicāriṇām
d anyāṃś cāpatprapannānāṃ na tān saṃyoktum arhati
d śubhāśubhaṃ yadā devi vṛttaṃ tūbhayataḥ smṛtam
d ātmaiva tac chubhaṃ kuryād aśubhaṃ yojayet parān
d evam uddeśataḥ proktam alepatvaṃ yathā bhavet
d etad evaṃ samāsena rājadharmaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
d evaṃ saṃvartamānas tu daṇḍayan bhartsayan prajāḥ
d na kilbiṣam avāpnoti padmapatram ivāmbhasā
d evaṃ saṃvartamānasya kāladharmo yadā bhavet
d svargaloke tadā rājā tridaśaiḥ saha toṣyate
d dvividhaṃ rājavṛttaṃ ca nyāyabhāgyasamanvitam
d evaṃ nyāyānugaṃ vṛttaṃ kathitaṃ te śubhekṣaṇe
d rājyaṃ nyāyānugaṃ nāma buddhiśāstrānugaṃ bhavet
d dharmyaṃ pathyaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca svargyaṃ caiva tathā bhavet
d daivapakṣye sati nṛpe rājyaṃ nyāyānugaṃ bhavet
d kriyante yatra karmāṇi śāstrayuktiṃ vimṛśya vai
d kartā dveṣaviyuktaś ca tatra nyāyānugaṃ bhavet
d rājyaṃ bhogānugaṃ nāma ayathāvat pradṛśyate
d tat tu śāstravinirmuktaṃ satāṃ kopakaraṃ bhavet
d adharmyam ayaśasyaṃ ca durantaṃ ca bhaved dhruvam
d yatra svacchandataḥ sarvaṃ kriyate karma rājabhiḥ
d yatra bhāgyavaśād bhṛtyā labhante na viśeṣataḥ
d yatra daṇḍyā na daṇḍyante pūjyante vā narādhamāḥ
d yatra santo vihanyante tatra bhāgyānugaṃ bhavet
d śubhāśubhaṃ yadā yatra viparītaṃ pradṛśyate
d rājñi vāsurapakṣe tu tatra bhāgyānugaṃ bhavet
d bhāgyānuge tu rājāno vartamānā yathātathā
d prāpyākīrtim anarthaṃ ca ihaloke śubhekṣaṇe
d paratra sumahāghoraṃ tamaḥ prāpya duratyayam
d tiṣṭhanti narake devi pralayāntād iti sthitiḥ
d mokṣaṇaṃ duṣkṛtīnāṃ tu vidyate kālaparyayāt
d nāsty eva mokṣaṇaṃ devi rājñāṃ duṣkṛtakāriṇām
d etat sarvaṃ samāsena rājavṛttaṃ śubhāśubham
d umā
d kathitaṃ te mahābhāge bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
d devadeva mahādeva sarvadevanamaskṛta
d maheśvaraḥ
d yāni dharmarahasyāni śrotum icchāmi tāny aham
d rahasyaṃ śrūyatāṃ devi mānuṣāṇāṃ sukhāvaham
d napuṃsakeṣu vandhyāsu viyonau pṛthivītale
d utsargo retasas teṣu na kāryo dharmakāṅkṣibhiḥ
d eteṣu bījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ na virohati vai priye
d yatra vā tatra vā bījaṃ dharmārthī notsṛjet punaḥ
d naro bījavināśena lipyate bhrūṇahatyayā
d ahiṃsā paramo dharmaḥ ahiṃsā paramaṃ sukham
d ahiṃsā dharmaśāstreṣu sarveṣu paramaṃ padam
d devatātithiśuśrūṣā satataṃ dharmaśīlatā
d vedādhyayanayajñāś ca tapo dānaṃ damas tathā
d ācāryaguruśuśrūṣā tīrthābhigamanaṃ tathā
d ahiṃsāyā varārohe kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm
d umā
d etat te paramaṃ guhyam ākhyātaṃ paramārcitam
d yadi dharmas tv ahiṃsāyāṃ kimartham amarottama
d yajñeṣu paśubandheṣu hanyante paśavo dvijaiḥ
d kathaṃ ca bhagavan bhūyo hiṃsamānā narādhipāḥ
d svargaṃ sudurgamaṃ yānti sadā sma ripusūdana
d yasyaiva gosahasrāṇi viṃśatiḥ sādhikāni tu
d ahany ahani hanyante dvijānāṃ māṃsakāraṇāt
d samāṃsaṃ tu sa dattvānnaṃ rantidevo narādhipaḥ
d kathaṃ svargam anuprāptaḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
d kiṃ nu dharmaṃ na śṛṇvanti na śraddadhati vā śrutam
d mṛgayāyai vinirgatya mṛgān ghnanti narādhipāḥ
d etat sarvaṃ viśeṣeṇa vistareṇa vṛṣadhvaja
d maheśvaraḥ
d śrotum icchāmi bhagavaṃs tattvam etan mamocyatām
d bahumānyam idaṃ devi nāsti kaś cid ahiṃsakaḥ
d śrūyatāṃ kāraṇaṃ cātra yathānekavidhaṃ bhavet
d dṛśyate cāpi loke 'smin na kaś cid avihiṃsakaḥ
d dharaṇīsaṃśritāñ jīvān susūkṣmāṃś caiva madhyamān
d saṃcaraṃś caraṇābhyāṃ ca hanti jīvān anekaśaḥ
d ajñānāj jñānato vāpi ye jīvāḥ śayanāsane
d upāviśañ śayānaś ca hanti jīvān anekaśaḥ
d śirovastreṣu ye jīvā narāṇāṃ svedasaṃbhavāḥ
d tāṃś ca hiṃsanti satataṃ daṃśāṃś ca maśakān api
d jale jīvās tathākāśe pṛthivī jīvamālinī
d evaṃ jīvākule loke ko 'sau syād yas tv ahiṃsakaḥ
d sthūlamadhyamasūkṣmaiś ca svedavātamahīruhaiḥ
d dṛśyarūpair adṛśyaiś ca nānārūpaiś ca bhāmini
d jīvais tatam idaṃ sarvam ākāśaṃ pṛthivī tathā
d anyonyaṃ te ca hiṃsanti durbalān balavattarāḥ
d matsyā matsyān grasantīha khagāṃś caiva khagās tathā
d sarīsṛpaiś ca jīvanti kapotādyā vihaṃgamāḥ
d bhūcarāḥ khecarāś cānye kravyādā māṃsagṛddhinaḥ
d samṛddhāḥ paramāṃsais tu bhakṣeran ye 'pi cāparaiḥ
d sattvaiḥ sattvāni jīvanti śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
d apīḍayitvā naivānyaṃ jīvā jīvanti sundari
d sthūlakāyasya sattvasya kharasya mahiṣasya vā
d jīvasyaikasya māṃsena payasā rudhireṇa vā
d tṛpyante bahavo jīvāḥ kravyādā māṃsabhojinaḥ
d eko jīvasahasrāṇi sadā khādati mānavaḥ
d annādyalpopabhogena dhānyasaṃjñāni yāni tu
d māṃsadhānyaiḥ sabījaiś ca bhojanaṃ parivarjayet
d trirātraṃ pañcarātraṃ vā saptarātram athāpi vā
d dhānyāni yo na hiṃsetāhiṃsakaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
d nāśnāti yāvato jīvāṃs tāvat puṇyena yujyate
d āhārasya viyogena śarīraṃ paritapyate
d tapyamāne śarīre tu śarīraṃ cendriyāṇy api
d vaśe tiṣṭhanti suśroṇi nṛpāṇām iva kiṃkarāḥ
d niruṇaddhīndriyāṇy eva sa sukhī sa vicakṣaṇaḥ
d indriyāṇāṃ nirodhena dānena ca damena ca
d naraḥ sarvam avāpnoti manasā yad yad icchati
d etan mūlam ahiṃsāyā upavāsaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
d āhāraṃ kurute yas tu bhūmim ākramate ca yaḥ
d sarve te hiṃsakā devi yathā dharmeṣu dṛśyate
d yathehāhiṃsako devi tattvajño jñāyate naraḥ
d tathā te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi śrūyatāṃ dharmacāriṇi
d phalāni jīrṇaparṇāni bhasma vā yo 'pi bhakṣayet
d ālekhyam iva niśceṣṭaṃ taṃ manye 'ham ahiṃsakam
d ārambhā hiṃsayā yuktā dhūmenāgnir ivāvṛtāḥ
d tasmād yas tu nirāhāras taṃ manye 'ham ahiṃsakam
d yas tu sarvaṃ samutsṛjya dīkṣito niyataḥ śuciḥ
d kṛtvā maṇḍalamaryādāṃ saṃkalpaṃ kurute naraḥ
d yāvajjīvam anāśitvā kālākāṅkṣī dṛḍhavrataḥ
d dhyānena tapasā yuktas taṃ manye 'ham ahiṃsakam
d anyathā hi na paśyāmi naro yaḥ syād ahiṃsakaḥ
d bahu cintyam idaṃ devi nāsti kaś cid ahiṃsakaḥ
d yato yato mahābhāge hiṃsā syān mahatī tataḥ
d nivṛttau madhumāṃsābhyāṃ hiṃsā tv alpatarā bhavet
d nivṛttiḥ paramo dharmo nivṛttiḥ paramaṃ sukham
d manasā vinivṛttānāṃ dharmasya nicayo mahān
d manaḥpūrvaṃgamā dharmā adharmāś ca na saṃśayaḥ
d manasā badhyate cāpi mucyate cāpi mānavaḥ
d nigṛhīte bhavet svargo visṛṣṭe narako dhruvaḥ
d ghātakaḥ śastram udyamya manasā cintayed yadi
d āyuḥkṣayaṃ gate 'dyaiṣāṃ mṛte tu praharāmy aham
d iti yo ghātako hanyān na sa pāpena lipyate
d vidhinā nihataḥ pūrvaṃ nimittaṃ sa tu ghātakaḥ
d vidhir hi balavān devi dustyajaṃ vai purākṛtam
d jīvāḥ purākṛtenaiva tiryagyonisarīsṛpāḥ
d nānāyoniṣu jāyante svakarmapariveṣṭitāḥ
d nānāvidhavicitrāṅgā nānāvīryaparākramāḥ
d nānābhūmipradeśeṣu nānāhārāś ca jantavaḥ
d jāyamānasya jīvasya mṛtyuḥ pūrvaṃ prajāyate
d sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ yathā pūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ tathā
d prāpnuvanti narā mṛtyuṃ yadā yatra ca yena ca
d nātikrāntuṃ hi śakyaṃ syān nideśaḥ pūrvakarmaṇaḥ
d apramattaḥ pramatteṣu vidhir jāgarti jantuṣu
d na hi tasya priyaḥ kaś cin na dveṣyo na ca madhyamaḥ
d samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu kālaḥ kālaṃ nirīkṣate
d gatāyuṣo hy ākṣipati jīvaṃ sarvasya dehinaḥ
d yathā yena ca martavyaṃ tathā yujyeta mṛtyunā
d avaśo nīyate tatra martavyaṃ yatra yena tu
d araṇye svagṛhe vāpi rātrau vāhani vā tathā
d yathā yena hi martavyaṃ nānyathā mriyate hi saḥ
d dṛśyate na ca loke 'smin bhūto bhavyo 'pi vā punaḥ
d vijñānair vikramair vāpi nānāmantrauṣadhair api
d yo hi vañcayituṃ śakto vidhes tu niyatāṃ gatim
d maheśvaraḥ
d eṣa te 'bhihito devi jīvahiṃsāvidhikramaḥ
d śrūyatāṃ kāraṇaṃ devi yathā hi duratikramaḥ
d vidhiḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu martavye samupasthite
d āyuḥkṣayeṇopahatāḥ samāgamya varānane
d kīṭāḥ pataṃgā bahavaḥ sthūlāḥ sūkṣmāś ca madhyamāḥ
d prajvalatsu pradīpeṣu svayam eva patanti te
d bahūnāṃ mṛgayūthānāṃ nānāvananiṣeviṇām
d yas tu kālahatas teṣāṃ sa vai kālena vadhyate
d sūnārthaṃ devi baddhānāṃ kṣīṇāyur yo nibadhyate
d avaśo ghātakasyātha hastaṃ tad ahar eti saḥ
d yathā pakṣigaṇāḥ kṣipraṃ vistīrṇākāśagāminaḥ
d kṣīṇāyuṣo nibadhyante śaktā api palāyitum
d yathā vāricarā mīnā bahavo bahujātayaḥ
d jālaṃ samadhirohanti svayam eva vidher vaśāt
d śalyakasya ca jihvāgraṃ svayam āruhya śobhane
d āyuḥkṣayeṇopahatā nipadyante sarīsṛpāḥ
d kṛṣatāṃ karṣakāṇāṃ ca nāsti buddhir vihiṃsane
d athaiṣāṃ lāṅgalāgrādyair hanyante jantavo 'kṣayāḥ
d pādāgreṇaiva caikena yāṃ hiṃsāṃ kurute naraḥ
d mātaṃgo 'pi na tāṃ kuryāt krūro janmaśatair api
d mriyante yair hi martavyaṃ na tān hanti kṛṣīvalaḥ
d kṛṣāmīti matis tasya nāsti cintā vihiṃsane
d tasmāj jīvasahasrāṇi hatvāpi na sa lipyate
d vidhinā vihitaḥ pūrvaṃ paścāt prāṇī vipadyate
d evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu vidhir hi duratikramaḥ
d gatāyuṣā na śakyaṃ hi muhūrtam api jīvitum
d jīvitavye na martavyaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
d śubhāśubhaṃ karmaphalaṃ na śakyam ativartitum
d tathā tābhiś ca martavyaṃ bhoktavyāś caiva tās tathā
d rantidevasya gāvo vai vidher hi vaśam āgatāḥ
d svayam āyānti gāvo vai hanyante yatra sundari
d gavāṃ vai hanyamānānāṃ rudhiraprabhavā nadī
d carmaṇvatīti vikhyātā khuraśṛṅgāsthidurgamā
d rudhiraṃ tāṃ nadīṃ prāpya toyaṃ bhavati śobhane
d medhyaṃ puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ ca gandhavarṇarasair yutam
d tatrābhiṣekaṃ kurvanti kṛtajapyāḥ kṛtāhnikāḥ
d dvijā devagaṇāś cāpi lokapālā maheśvarāḥ
d tasya rājñaḥ sadā satre svayam āgamya sundari
d vidhinā pūrvadṛṣṭena tanmāṃsam upakalpitam
d mantravat pratigṛhṇanti yathānyāyaṃ yathāvidhi
d samāṃsaṃ ca sadā hy annaṃ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
d bhuñjānānāṃ dvijātīnām astam eti divākaraḥ
d gāvo yās tatra hanyante rājñas tasya kratūttame
d paṭhyamāneṣu mantreṣu yathānyāyaṃ yathāvidhi
d tāś ca svargaṃ gatā gāvo rantidevaś ca pārthivaḥ
d sadā satravidhānena siddhiṃ prāpto nareśvaraḥ
d atha yas tu sahāyārtham uktaḥ syāt pārthivair naraḥ
d bhogānāṃ saṃvibhāgena vastrābharaṇabhūṣaṇaiḥ
d sahabhojanasaṃbandhaiḥ satkārair vividhair api
d sahāyakāle saṃprāpte saṃgrāme śastram uddharet
d vyūḍhānīke yathā śastraṃ senayor ubhayor api
d hastyaśvarathasaṃpūrṇe padātibalasaṃkule
d cāmaracchatraśabale dhvajacarmāyudhojjvale
d śaktitomarakuntāsiśūlapaṭṭasadhāribhiḥ
d kūṭamudgaracāpeṣubhusuṇḍhījuṣṭamuṣṭibhiḥ
d bhindipālagadācakraprāsakarpaṇadhāribhiḥ
d nānāpraharaṇair yodhaiḥ senayor ubhayor api
d yuddhaśauṇḍaiḥ pragarjadbhir vṛṣeṣu vṛṣabhair iva
d śaṅkhaduṃdubhinādena nānātūryaraveṇa ca
d hayaheṣitaśabdena kuñjarāṇāṃ ca bṛṃhitaiḥ
d yodhānāṃ siṃhanādaiś ca ghaṇṭānāṃ śiñjitasvanaiḥ
d diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva samantād badhirīkṛtāḥ
d grīṣmānteṣu vigarjadbhir nabhasīva balāhakaiḥ
d rathanemikhuroddhūtair aruṇai raṇareṇubhiḥ
d kapilābhir ivākāśe chādyamāne samantataḥ
d pravṛtte śastrasaṃpāte yodhānāṃ tatra senayoḥ
d teṣāṃ prahārakṣatajaṃ raktacandanasaprabham
d te sravantaḥ svagātrebhyas tarante raṇamūrdhani
d palāśāśokapuṣpāṇāṃ jaṃgamā iva rāśayaḥ
d raṇe samabhivartanta udyatāyudhapāṇayaḥ
d śobhamānā raṇe śūrā āhvayantaḥ parasparam
d hanyamāneṣv abhighnatsu śūreṣu raṇasaṃkaṭe
d pṛṣṭhaṃ dattvātha ye tatra nāyakasya narādhamāḥ
d anāhatā nivartante nāyake vāpy abhīpsati
d te duṣkṛtaṃ prapadyante nāyakasyākhilaṃ narāḥ
d yac cāsti sukṛtaṃ teṣāṃ yujyate tena nāyakaḥ
d ahiṃsā paramo dharma iti ye 'pi narā viduḥ
d saṃgrāmeṣu na yudhyante bhṛtāś caivānurūpataḥ
d narakaṃ yānti te ghoraṃ bhartṛpiṇḍāpahāriṇaḥ
d yas tu prāṇān parityajya praviśed udyatāyudhaḥ
d saṃgrāmam agnipratimaṃ pataṃgā iva nirbhayam
d sattvam āviśate tatra jñātvā yodhasya niścayam
d āviṣṭaś caiva sattvena nirghṛṇo jāyate naraḥ
d prahārair nandayed devi sattvenādhiṣṭhito hi saḥ
d prahāravyathitaś caiva na vaiklavyam upaiti saḥ
d yas tu svaṃ nāyakaṃ rakṣann atighore raṇāṅgaṇe
d tāpayann arisainyāni siṃho mṛgagaṇān iva
d āditya iva madhyāhne durnirīkṣyo raṇājire
d nirdayo yas tu saṃgrāme praharaty udyatāyudhaḥ
d yajate sa tu pūtātmā saṃgrāmeṇa mahākratum
d varma kṛṣṇājinaṃ tasya daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ dhanuḥ smṛtam
d ratho vedī dhvajo yūpaḥ kuśāś ca ratharaśmayaḥ
d māno darpas tv ahaṃkāras trayas tretāgnayaḥ smṛtāḥ
d pratodaś ca sruvas tasya upādhyāyo 'sya sārathiḥ
d srug bhāṇḍaṃ cāpi yat kiṃ cid yajñopakaraṇāni ca
d āyudhāny asya tat sarvaṃ samidhaḥ sāyakāḥ smṛtāḥ
d svedasrāvaś ca gātrebhyaḥ kṣaudraṃ tasya yaśasvinaḥ
d puroḍāśā nṛśīrṣāṇi rudhiraṃ cāhutiḥ smṛtam
d tūṇaś caiva carur jñeyo vasor dhārā vasā smṛtā
d kravyādā bhūtasaṃghāś ca tasmin yajñe dvijātayaḥ
d teṣāṃ bhakṣānnapānāni hatā nṛgajavājinaḥ
d bhuñjate te yathākāmaṃ yathā yajñe kim icchake
d nihatānāṃ tu yodhānāṃ vastrābharaṇabhūṣaṇam
d hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca yad vai yajñasya dakṣiṇā
d yas tatra hanyate devi gajaskandhagato naraḥ
d brahmalokam avāpnoti raṇeṣv abhimukho hataḥ
d rathamadhyagato vāpi hayapṛṣṭhagato 'pi vā
d hanyate yas tu saṃgrāme śakraloke mahīyate
d svarge hantā pūjyate tair hatas tatraiva pūjyate
d dvāv etau sukham edhete hantā yaś caiva hanyate
d tasmāt saṃgrāmam āsādya prahartavyam abhītavat
d nirbhayo yas tu saṃgrāme prahared udyatāyudhaḥ
d rājño vallabhatām eti kulaṃ bhāvayate svakam
d yathā nadīsahasrāṇi praviṣṭāni mahodadhim
d tathā sarve na saṃdeho dharmo dharmabhṛtāṃ vare
d praviṣṭā rājadharmeṇa ācāryavinayas tathā
d vedoktāś caiva ye dharmāḥ pāṣaṇḍeṣu ca kīrtitāḥ
d tathaiva mānavā dharmā dharmāś cānye tathāpare
d deśajātikulānāṃ ca grāmadharmās tathaiva ca
d ye dharmāḥ pārvatīyeṣu ye dharmāḥ pattanādiṣu
d teṣāṃ pūrvapravṛttānāṃ kartavyaṃ parirakṣaṇam
d dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakṣati rakṣitaḥ
d tasmād dharmo na hantavyaḥ pārthivena viśeṣataḥ
d prajāḥ pālayate yatra dharmeṇa vasudhādhipaḥ
d ṣaṭkarmaniratā viprāḥ pūjyante pitṛdevatāḥ
d naiva tasminn anāvṛṣṭir na rogā nāpy upadravāḥ
d dharmaśīlāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ svadharmanirate nṛpe
d eṣṭavyaḥ satataṃ devi yuktācāro narādhipaḥ
d chidrajñaś caiva śatrūṇām apramattaḥ pratāpavān
d śūdrāḥ pṛthivyāṃ bahavo rājñāṃ bahuvināśakāḥ
d tasmāt pramādaṃ suśroṇi na kuryāt paṇḍito nṛpaḥ
d teṣu mitreṣu tyakteṣu tathā martyeṣu hastiṣu
d visrambho nopagantavyaḥ snānapāneṣu nityaśaḥ
d rājño vallabhatām eti kulaṃ bhāvayate svakam
d yas tu rāṣṭrahitārthāya gobrāhmaṇakṛte tathā
d bandigrāhāya mitrārthe prāṇāṃs tyajati dustyajān
d sarvakāmadughāṃ dhenuṃ dharaṇīṃ lokadhāriṇīm
d samudrāntāṃ varārohe saśailavanakānanām
d dadyād devi dvijātibhyo vasupūrṇāṃ vasuṃdharām
d na tatsamaṃ varārohe prāṇatyāgī viśiṣyate
d sahasram api yajñānāṃ yajate yadi carddhimān
d yajñais tasya kim āścaryaṃ prāṇatyāgaḥ suduṣkaraḥ
d tasmāt sarveṣu yajñeṣu śastrayajño viśiṣyate
d maheśvaraḥ
d evaṃ saṃgrāmayajñās te yathātattvam udāhṛtāḥ
d mṛgayātrāṃ tu vakṣyāmi śṛṇu tāṃ dharmacāriṇi
d mṛgān hatvā mahīpālo yathā pāpair na lipyate
d nirmānuṣām imāṃ sarve mṛgā icchanti medinīm
d bhakṣayanti ca sasyāni śāsitavyā nṛpeṇa te
d duṣṭānāṃ śāsanaṃ dharmaḥ śiṣṭānāṃ paripālanam
d kartavyaṃ bhūmipālena nityaṃ kāryeṣu cārjavam
d svargaṃ mṛgāś ca gacchanti svayaṃ nṛpatinā hatāḥ
d yathā gāvo hy agopālās tathā rāṣṭram anāyakam
d tasmād aṃśās tu devānāṃ gandharvoragarakṣasām
d rājye niyuktā rāṣṭreṣu prajāpālanakāraṇāt
d aśiṣṭaśāsane caiva śiṣṭānāṃ paripālane
d teṣāṃ caryāṃ pravakṣyāmi śrūyatām anupūrvaśaḥ
d yathā pracaratāṃ teṣāṃ pārthivānāṃ yaśasvini
d rāṣṭraṃ dharmo dhanaṃ caiva yaśaḥ kīrtiś ca vardhate
d nṛpāṇāṃ pūrvam evāyaṃ dharmo dharmabhṛtāṃ vare
d sabhāprapātaṭākāni devatāyatanāni ca
d brāhmaṇāvasathāś caiva kartavyā nṛpasattamaiḥ
d brāhmaṇā nāvamantavyā bhasmacchannā ivāgnayaḥ
d kulam utsādayeyus te krodhāviṣṭā dvijātayaḥ
d dhmāyamāno yathā hy agnir nirdahet sarvam indhanam
d tathā krodhāgninā viprā daheyuḥ pṛthivīm imām
d na hi vipreṣu kruddheṣu rājyaṃ bhuñjanti bhūmipāḥ
d paribhūya dvijān mohād vātāpinahuṣādayaḥ
d sabandhumitrā naṣṭās te dagdhā brāhmaṇamanyubhiḥ
d śarīraṃ cāpi śakrasya kṛtaṃ bhaganirantaram
d tato devagaṇāḥ sarve indrasyārthe mahāmatim
d prasādaṃ kārayām āsuḥ praṇāmastutivandanaiḥ
d tena prītena suśroṇi gautamena mahātmanā
d tac charīraṃ tu śakrasya sahasrabhagacihnitam
d kṛtaṃ netrasahasreṇa kṣaṇenaiva nirantaram
d chittvā meṣasya vṛṣaṇau gautamenābhimantritau
d indrasya vṛṣaṇau bhūtvā kṣipraṃ vai śleṣam āgatau
d evaṃ vipreṣu kruddheṣu devarājaḥ śatakratuḥ
d aśaktaḥ śāsituṃ rājyaṃ kiṃ punar mānuṣo bhuvi
d krodhāviṣṭo dahed vipraḥ śuṣkendhanam ivānalaḥ
d bhasmīkṛtya jagat sarvaṃ sṛjed anyaj jagat punaḥ
d adevān api devān sa kuryād devān adevatāḥ
d tasmān notpādayen manyuṃ manyupraharaṇā dvijāḥ
d mahatsv apy aparādheṣu śāsanaṃ nārhati dvijaḥ
d na ca śastranipātāni na ca prāṇair viyojanam
d dṛśyate triṣu lokeṣu brāhmaṇānām anindite
d krodhāś ca vipulā ghorāḥ prasādāś cāpy anuttamāḥ
d tasmān notpādayet krodhaṃ nityaṃ pūjyā dvijātayaḥ
d dṛśyate na sa loke 'smin bhūto vātha bhaviṣyati
d kruddheṣu yo vai vipreṣu rājyaṃ bhuṅkte narādhipaḥ
d na caivopahased viprān na caivopālabhec ca tān
d kālam āsādya kupyec ca kāle kuryād anugraham
d saṃprahāsaś ca bhṛtyeṣu na kartavyo narādhipaiḥ
d laghutvaṃ caiva prāpnoti ājñā cāsya nivartate
d bhṛtyānāṃ saṃprahāsena pārthivaḥ paribhūyate
d ayācyāni ca yācanti avaktavyaṃ bruvanti ca
d pūrvam apy ucitair lābhaiḥ paritoṣaṃ na yānti te
d tasmād bhṛtyeṣu nṛpatiḥ saṃprahāsaṃ vivarjayet
d na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste ca na viśvaset
d sagotreṣu viśeṣeṇa sarvopāyair na viśvaset
d viśvāsād bhayam utpannaṃ hanyād vṛkṣam ivāśaniḥ
d pramādād dhanyate rājā lobhena ca vaśīkṛtaḥ
d tasmāt pramādaṃ lobhaṃ ca na kuryān na ca viśvaset
d bhayārtānāṃ paritrātā dīnānugrahakārakaḥ
d tasmāt kṛtyaviśeṣajño nityaṃ rāṣṭrahite rataḥ
d satyasaṃdhaḥ sthito rājye prajāpālanatatparaḥ
d alubdho nyāyavādī ca ṣaḍbhāgaṃ copajīvati
d kāryākāryaviśeṣajñaḥ sarvaṃ dharmeṇa paśyati
d svarāṣṭreṣu dayāṃ kuryād akāryaṃ na pravartate
d ye caivainaṃ praśaṃsanti ye ca nindanti mānavāḥ
d śatruṃ ca mitravat paśyed aparādhavivarjitam
d aparādhānurūpeṇa duṣṭaṃ daṇḍena śāsayet
d dharmaḥ pravartate tatra yatra daṇḍarucir nṛpaḥ
d nādharmo vidyate tatra yatra rājā kṣamānvitaḥ
d aśiṣṭaśāsanaṃ dharmaḥ śiṣṭānāṃ paripālanam
d vadhyāṃś ca ghātayed yas tu avadhyān parirakṣati
d avadhyā brāhmaṇā gāvo dūtaś caiva pitā tathā
d vidyāṃ grāhayate yaś ca ye ca pūrvopakāriṇaḥ
d striyaś caiva na hantavyā yaś ca sarvātithir naraḥ
d dharaṇīṃ gāṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca siddhānnaṃ ca tilān ghṛtam
d dadan nityaṃ dvijātibhyo mucyate rājakilbiṣāt
d evaṃ carati yo nityaṃ rājā rāṣṭrahite rataḥ
d tasya rāṣṭraṃ dhanaṃ dharmo yaśaḥ kīrtiś ca vardhate
d na ca pāpair na cānarthair yujyate sa narādhipaḥ
d ṣaḍbhāgam upayuñjan yaḥ prajā rājā na rakṣati
d svacakraparacakrābhyāṃ dhanair vā vikrameṇa vā
d nirudyogo nṛpo yaś ca pararāṣṭranighātane
d svarāṣṭraṃ niṣpratāpasya paracakreṇa hanyate
d yat pāpaṃ paracakrasya paracakrābhighātane
d tat pāpaṃ sakalaṃ rājā hatarāṣṭraḥ prapadyate
d mātulaṃ bhāgineyaṃ vā mātaraṃ śvaśuraṃ gurum
d pitaraṃ varjayitvaikaṃ hanyād ghātakam āgatam
d svasya rāṣṭrasya rakṣārthaṃ yudhyamānas tu yo hataḥ
d saṃgrāme paracakreṇa śrūyatāṃ tasya yā gatiḥ
d vimāne tu varārohe apsarogaṇasevite
d śakralokam ito yāti saṃgrāme nihato nṛpaḥ
d yāvanto lomakūpāḥ syus tasya gātreṣu sundari
d tāvad varṣasahasrāṇi śakraloke mahīyate
d yadi vai mānuṣe loke kadā cid upapadyate
d rājā vā rājamātro vā bhūyo bhavati vīryavān
d tasmād yatno 'nukartavyaḥ svarāṣṭraparipālane
d vyavahāraś ca cāraś ca satataṃ satyasaṃdhatā
d apramādaḥ pramodaś ca vyavasāye 'py acaṇḍatā
d bharaṇaṃ caiva bhṛtyānāṃ vāhanānāṃ ca poṣaṇam
d yodhānāṃ caiva satkāraḥ kṛte karmaṇy amoghatā
d maheśvaraḥ
d śreya eva narendrāṇām iha caiva paratra ca
d paśavaḥ paśubandheṣu ye hanyante 'dhvareṣu ca
d yūpe nibaddhā mantraiś ca yathānyāyaṃ yathāvidhi
d mantrāhutivipūtās te svargaṃ yānti yaśasvini
d tarpitā yajñabhāgeṣu teṣāṃ māṃsair varānane
d agnayas tridaśāś caiva lokapālāḥ saheśvarāḥ
d teṣu tuṣṭeṣu jāyeta tasya yajñasya yat phalam
d tena saṃyujyate devi yajamāno na saṃśayaḥ
d sapatnīkaḥ saputraḥ sa sa pitṛbhrātṛbhiḥ saha
d ye tatra dīkṣitā devi sarve svargaṃ prayānti te
d umā
d etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
d bhagavan sarvabhūteśa śūlapāṇe mahādyute
d śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ vṛttaṃ sarveṣāṃ gṛhamedhinām
d kīdṛśaṃ caritaṃ teṣāṃ trivargasahitaṃ prabho
d pratyāyatiḥ kathaṃ teṣāṃ jīvanārtham udāhṛtam
d vartamānāḥ kathaṃ sarve prāpnuvanty uttamāṃ gatim
d maheśvaraḥ
d etat sarvaṃ samāsena vaktum arhasi mānada
d nyāyatas tvaṃ mahābhāge śrotukāmāsi bhāmini
d prāyaśo lokasadvṛttam iṣyate gṛhavāsinām
d teṣāṃ saṃrakṣaṇārthāya rājānaḥ saṃsmṛtā bhuvi
d sarveṣām atha martyānāṃ vṛttiṃ sāmānyataḥ śṛṇu
d vidyā vārttā ca sevā ca kārutvaṃ nāṭyatā tathā
d ity ete jīvanārthāya martyānāṃ vihitāḥ priye
d api janmaphalaṃ tāvan mānuṣāṇāṃ viśeṣataḥ
d vihitaṃ tat svavṛttena tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
d karmakṣetraṃ hi mānuṣyaṃ bhogaduḥkhayutāḥ pare
d sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ tasmān mānuṣye vṛttam iṣyate
d vidyāyogas tu sarveṣāṃ pūrvam eva vidhīyate
d kāryākāryaṃ vijānāti vidyayā devi nānyathā
d vidyayā sphīyate jñānaṃ jñānāt tattvavidarśanam
d dṛṣṭatattvo vinītātmā sarvārthasya ca bhājanam
d śakyaṃ vidyāvinītena loke saṃjīvanaṃ sukham
d ātmānaṃ vidyayā tasmāt pūrvaṃ kṛtvā tu bhājanam
d vaśyendriyo jitakrodho bhūtvātmānaṃ tu bhāvayet
d bhāvayitvā tathātmānaṃ pūjanīyaḥ satām api
d kulānuvṛttaṃ vṛttaṃ vā pūrvam eva samāśrayet
d iṣyate gṛhavāsāya dārakarma yathāpuram
d yadi ced vidyayā caiva vṛttiṃ kāṅkṣed athātmanaḥ
d rājavidyāṃ tu vāde 'pi lokavidyām athāpi vā
d tīrthataś cāpi gṛhṇīyāc chuśrūṣādiguṇair yutaḥ
d granthataś cārthataś caiva dṛḍhīkuryāt prayatnataḥ
d evaṃ vidyāphalaṃ devi prāpnuyān nānyathā naraḥ
d nyāyād vidyāphalaṃ cecched adharmaṃ tatra varjayet
d yadi ced vārttayā vṛttiṃ kāṅkṣeta vidhipūrvakam
d kṣetre jalopapanne ca tad yogyāṃ kṛṣim ācaret
d vāṇijyaṃ vā yathākālaṃ kuryāt taddeśayogataḥ
d mūlyam arthaṃ prayāsaṃ ca vicāryaiva phalodayau
d paśusaṃjīvakaś caiva deśe gāḥ poṣayed dhruvam
d bahuprakārā bahavaḥ paśavas tasya sādhakāḥ
d yaḥ kaś cit sevayā vṛttiṃ kāṅkṣeta matimān naraḥ
d yatātmā śravaṇīyānāṃ bhaved vai saṃprayojakaḥ
d buddhyā vā karmayogād vā yodhanād vā samāśrayet
d mārgatas tu samāśritya tadā tatsaṃpriyo bhavet
d yathā yathā sa tuṣyeta tathā saṃtoṣayeta tam
d anujīviguṇopetaḥ kuryād ātmārtham āśritaḥ
d vipriyaṃ nācaret tasya eṣā sevā samāsataḥ
d viprayogāt purā tena gatim anyāṃ na lakṣayet
d kārukarma ca nāṭyaṃ ca prāyaśo nīcayoniṣu
d tayor api yathāyogaṃ nyāyataḥ karmavetanam
d ājīvebhyo 'pi sarvebhyaś cārjavād vetanaṃ haret
d anārjavād āharatas tat tu pāpāya kalpate
d sarveṣāṃ pūrvam ārambhāṃś cintayen nayapūrvakam
d ātmaśaktim upāyāṃś ca deśakālau ca śaktitaḥ
d kāraṇāni pravāsaṃ ca prakṣepaṃ ca phalodayam
d evamādīni saṃcintya dṛṣṭvā daivānukūlatām
d ataḥparaṃ samārambhed yatrātmahitam āhitam
d vṛttim evaṃ samāsādya tāṃ sadā paripālayet
d daivamānuṣavighnebhyo na punar bhraśyate yathā
d pālayan vardhayan bhuñjaṃs tāṃ prāpya na vināśayet
d kṣīyate girisaṃkāśam aśnato hy anapekṣayā
d ājīvebhyo dhanaṃ prāpya caturdhā vibhajed budhaḥ
d dharmāyārthāya kāmāya āpatpraśamanāya ca
d caturṣv api vibhāgeṣu vidhānaṃ śṛṇu śobhane
d yajñārthaṃ cānnadānārthaṃ dīnānugrahakāraṇāt
d devabrāhmaṇapūjārthaṃ pitṛpūjārtham eva ca
d kulārthaṃ saṃnivāsārthaṃ kriyānityaiś ca dhārmikaiḥ
d evamādiṣu cānyeṣu dharmārthaṃ saṃtyajed dhanam
d dharmakārye dhanaṃ dadyād anavekṣya phalodayam
d aiśvaryasthānalābhārthaṃ rājavāllabhyakāraṇāt
d vārttāyāṃ ca samārambhe bhṛtyamitraparigrahe
d āvāhe ca vivāhe ca putrāṇāṃ vṛttikāraṇāt
d arthodayasamāvāptāv anarthasya vighātane
d evamādiṣu cānyeṣu arthārthaṃ vibhajed dhanam
d anubandhaṃ phalaṃ hetuṃ dṛṣṭvā vittaṃ parityajet
d anarthaṃ bādhate hy artho arthaṃ caiva phalāny uta
d nādhanāḥ prāpnuvanty arthān narā yatnaśatair api
d tasmād dhanaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ dātavyaṃ ca vidhānataḥ
d śarīrapoṣaṇārthāya āhārasya viśeṣaṇe
d naṭagāndharvasaṃyoge kāmayātrāvihārayoḥ
d manaḥpriyāṇāṃ saṃyoge prītidāne tathaiva ca
d evamādiṣu cānyeṣu kāmārthaṃ visṛjed dhanam
d vicārya guṇadoṣau tu mātrayā tatra saṃtyajet
d caturthaṃ saṃnidadhyāc ca āpadarthaṃ śucismite
d rājyabhraṃśavināśārthaṃ durbhikṣārthaṃ ca śobhane
d mahāvyādhivimokṣārthaṃ vārddhakasyaiva kāraṇāt
d śatrūṇāṃ pratikārāya sāhasaiś cāpy amarṣaṇāt
d prasthāne cānyadeśārtham āpadāṃ vipramokṣaṇe
d evamādi samuddiśya saṃnidadhyāt svakaṃ dhanam
d sukham arthavatāṃ loke kṛcchrāṇāṃ vipramokṣaṇam
d yasya nāsti dhanaṃ kiṃ cit tasya lokadvayaṃ na ca
d aśanād indriyāṇīva sarvam arthāt pravartate
d nidhānaṃ mātrayā kuryād anyathā vilayaṃ vrajet
d evaṃ devi manuṣyāṇāṃ loke tv ājīvanaṃ prati
d evaṃ yuktasya lokasya laukyaṃ vṛttaṃ punaḥ śṛṇu
d dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargīyaṃ paramaṃ vacaḥ
d trivarge ca yathā yuktaṃ sarveṣāṃ saṃvidhīyate
d tathā saṃvartamānās tu lokayor hitam āpnuyuḥ
d kālyotthānaṃ ca śaucaṃ ca devabrāhmaṇabhaktatā
d gurūṇām eva śuśrūṣā brāhmaṇeṣv abhivādanam
d pratyutthānaṃ ca vṛddhānāṃ devasthānapraṇāmanam
d ābhimukhyaṃ puraskṛtya atithīnāṃ ca bhojanam
d vṛddhopadeśakaraṇaṃ śravaṇaṃ hitapathyayoḥ
d poṣaṇaṃ bhṛtyavargasya sāntvadānaparigrahaiḥ
d nyāyataḥ karmakaraṇam anyāyāhitavarjanam
d samyag vṛttaṃ svadāreṣu doṣāṇāṃ pratiṣedhanam
d putrāṇāṃ vinayaṃ kuryāt tattatkārye niyojayet
d varjanaṃ cāśubhārthānāṃ śubhānāṃ joṣaṇaṃ tathā
d kulocitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yathāvat paripālanam
d varjanaṃ kalahādīnāṃ bhaktyā saṃśamanaṃ tathā
d satāṃ vyasanasaṃyoge svaśaktyābhyavapattitā
d dīnānāṃ saṃgrahaṃ caiva nānṛśaṃsyavyapekṣayā
d abaddhānṛtaghorāṇāṃ vacanānāṃ vivarjanam
d kulasaṃdhāraṇaṃ caiva pauruṣeṇaiva sarvaśaḥ
d evamādi śubhaṃ sarvaṃ tasya vṛttam iti smṛtam
d vṛddhasevī bhaven nityaṃ hitārthaṃ jñānakāṅkṣayā
d parārthaṃ nāhared dravyam anāmantrya tu sarvadā
d na yāceta parān dhīraḥ svabāhubalam āśrayet
d svaśarīraṃ sadā rakṣed āhārācārayor api
d hitaṃ pathyaṃ sadāhāraṃ jīrṇaṃ bhuñjīta mātrayā
d devatātithisatkāraṃ kṛtvā sarvaṃ yathāvidhi
d śeṣaṃ bhuñjec chucir bhūtvā na ca bhāṣeta vipriyam
d pratiśrayaṃ ca pānīyaṃ baliṃ bhikṣāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
d gṛhasthaḥ pravahed dadyād gāś ca vatsāṃś ca poṣayet
d bahir niṣkramaṇaṃ caiva kuryāt kāraṇato divā
d madhyāhne vārdharātre vā gamanaṃ naiva rocayet
d viṣamān nāvagāheta svaśaktyā samam ācaret
d yathāyavyayatā loke gṛhasthānāṃ prapūjitā
d ayaśaskaram arthaghnaṃ karma yat parapīḍanam
d bhayād vā yadi vā lobhān na kurvīta kadā cana
d buddhipūrvaṃ samālokya dūrato guṇadoṣataḥ
d ārabheta tadā karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vetarat
d ātmā sākṣī bhaven nityam ātmanas tu śubhāśubhe
d umā
d manasā karmaṇā vācā na ca kāṅkṣeta pātakam
d bhagavan bhaganetraghna kālasūdana śaṃkara
d ime tu varṇāś catvāro vihitāḥ svit svabhāvataḥ
d utāho kriyayā varṇāḥ saṃbhavanti maheśvara
d maheśvaraḥ
d eṣa me saṃśayapraśnas taṃ me chettuṃ tvam arhasi
d svabhāvād eva vidyante catvāro brāhmaṇādayaḥ
d ekajātyāḥ suduṣprāpam anyavarṇatvam āgatam
d tac ca karma viśeṣeṇa punarjanmani jāyate
d tasmāt te saṃpravakṣyāmi tat sarvaṃ karma pākataḥ
d brāhmaṇas tu naro bhūtvā svajātim anupālayet
d dṛḍhaṃ brāhmaṇakarmāṇi vedoktāni samācaret
d satyārjavaparo bhūtvā dānayajñaparas tathā
d tasyāṃ jātyāṃ samudito jātidharmān na hāpayet
d evaṃ saṃvartamānas tu kāladharmaṃ gataḥ punaḥ
d svarloke cābhijāyeta svargabhogāya bhāmini
d tatkṣaye brāhmaṇo bhūtvā tathaiva nṛṣu jāyate
d evaṃ svakarmaṇā martyaḥ svajātiṃ labhate punaḥ
d aparas tu tathā kaś cid brahmayonisamudbhavaḥ
d avamatyaiva tāṃ jātim ajñānatamasāvṛtaḥ
d anyathā vartamānas tu jātikarmāṇi varjayet
d śūdravad vicarel loke śūdrakarmābhilāṣayā
d śūdraiḥ saha caran nityaṃ śaucamaṅgalavarjitaḥ
d sa cāpi kāladharmastho yamalokeṣu daṇḍitaḥ
d yadi jāyeta martyeṣu śūdra evābhijāyate
d śūdra eva bhaved devi brāhmaṇo 'pi svakarmaṇā
d tathaiva śūdras tv aparaḥ śūdrakarmāṇi varjayan
d satyārjavaparo bhūtvā dānadharmaparas tathā
d mantrabrāhmaṇasatkartā manasā brāhmaṇapriyaḥ
d evaṃyuktasamācāraḥ śūdro 'pi maraṇaṃ gataḥ
d svargaloke 'bhijāyeta tatkṣaye nṛṣu jāyate
d brāhmaṇānāṃ kule mukhye vedasvādhyāyasaṃyute
d evam eva sadā loke śūdro brāhmaṇyam āpnuyāt
d evaṃ kṣatriyavaiśyāś ca jātidharmeṇa saṃyutāḥ
d svakarmaṇaiva jāyante viśiṣṭeṣv adhameṣu ca
d evaṃ jātiviparyāsaḥ pretyabhāve bhaven nṛṇām
d anyathā tu na śakyante lokasaṃsthitikāraṇāt
d tasmāj jātiṃ viśiṣṭāṃ tu kathaṃ cit prāpya paṇḍitaḥ
d sarvathā tāṃ tato rakṣen na punar bhraśyate yathā
d umā
d iti te kathitaṃ devi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
d janmaprabhṛti kaiḥ śuddho labhej janmaphalaṃ naraḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d śobhanāśobhanaṃ sarvam adhikāravaśāt svayam
d karma kurvan na lipyeta ārjavena samācaran
d ātmaiva tac chubhaṃ kuryād aśubhe naiva yojayet
d śaṭheṣu śaṭhavat kuryād āryeṣv ṛjuvad ācaret
d āpatsu nāvasīdec ca ghorān saṃkrāmayet parān
d sāmnaiva sarvakāryāṇi kartuṃ pūrvaṃ samārabhet
d anarthādharmaśokāṃs tu yathā na prāpnuyāt svayam
d prayateta tathā kartum etad vṛttaṃ samāsataḥ
d etad vṛttaṃ samāsādya gṛham āśritya mānavāḥ
d nirābādhā nirudvegāḥ prāpnuvanty uttamāṃ gatim
d etaj janmaphalaṃ nityaṃ sarveṣāṃ gṛhavāsinām
d evaṃ gṛhagatair nityaṃ vartitavyam iti sthitiḥ
d etat sarvaṃ mayā proktaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
d umā
d surāsurapate deva varada prītivardhana
d mānuṣeṣv eva ye ke cid āḍhyāḥ kleśavivarjitāḥ
d bhuñjānā vividhān bhogān dṛśyante nirupadravāḥ
d apare kleśasaṃyuktā daridrā bhogavarjitāḥ
d kimarthaṃ mānuṣe loke na samatvena kalpitāḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d etac chrotuṃ mahādeva kautūhalam atīva me
d nyāyatas tvaṃ mahābhāge śrotukāmāsi bhāmini
d śṛṇu tat sarvam akhilaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ hitaṃ vacaḥ
d ādisarge purā brahmā samatvenāsṛjat prajāḥ
d nityaṃ na bhavato hy asya rāgadveṣau prajāpateḥ
d tadā tasmāt samāḥ sarve babhūvuḥ sarvato narāḥ
d evaṃ saṃvartamāne tu yuge kālaviparyayāt
d ke cit prapedire tatra viṣamaṃ buddhimohitāḥ
d teṣāṃ hāniṃ tato dṛṣṭvā tulyānām eva bhāmini
d brahmāṇaṃ te samājagmus tatkāraṇanivedakāḥ
d kartuṃ nārhasi deveśa pakṣapātaṃ tvam īdṛśam
d putrabhāve same deva kimarthaṃ no bhavet kaliḥ
d ity evaṃ tair upālabdho brahmā vacanam abravīt
d yūyaṃ mā kārṣṭa me roṣaṃ svakṛtaṃ smarata prajāḥ
d yuṣmābhir eva yuṣmākaṃ grathitaṃ hi śubhāśubham
d yādṛśaṃ kurute karma tādṛśaṃ phalam aśnute
d svakṛtasya phalaṃ bhuṅkte nānyas tad bhoktum arhati
d evaṃ saṃbodhitās tena lokakartrā svayaṃbhuvā
d punar nivṛtya karmāṇi śubhāny eva prapedire
d evaṃ vijñātatattvās te dānadharmaparāyaṇāḥ
d śubhāni vidhivat kṛtvā kāladharmagatāḥ punaḥ
d tāni dānaphalāny eva bhuñjate sukhabhoginaḥ
d svakṛtaṃ tu naras tasmāt svayam eva prapadyate
d apare dharmakāryebhyo nivṛttās tu śubhekṣaṇe
d kadaryā niranukrośāḥ prāyeṇātmaparāyaṇāḥ
d tādṛśā maraṇaṃ prāptāḥ punarjanmani śobhane
d umā
d daridrāḥ kleśasaṃyuktā bhavanty eva na saṃśayaḥ
d mānuṣeṣv eva ye ke cid dhanadhānyasamanvitāḥ
d bhogahīnāḥ pradṛśyante sarvabhogeṣu satsv api
d maheśvaraḥ
d na bhuñjate kimarthaṃ te tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d paraiḥ saṃcoditā dharmaṃ kurvate na svakāmataḥ
d svayaṃ śraddhāṃ bahiṣkṛtya kurvanti ca rudanti ca
d tādṛśā maraṇaṃ prāptāḥ punarjanmani śobhane
d phalāni tāni saṃprāpya bhuñjate na kadā cana
d umā
d rakṣanto vardhayantaś ca āsate nidhipālavat
d ke cid dhanaviyuktāś ca bhogayuktā maheśvara
d maheśvaraḥ
d mānuṣāḥ saṃpradṛśyante tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d ānṛśaṃsyaparā ye tu dharmakāmāś ca durgatāḥ
d paropakāraṃ kurvanti dīnānugrahakāraṇāt
d pratidadyuḥ paradhanaṃ naṣṭaṃ vānyair hṛtaṃ dhanam
d nityaṃ ye dātumanaso narā vitteṣv asatsv api
d kāladharmavaśaṃ prāptāḥ punarjanmani te narāḥ
d ete dhanaviyuktāś ca bhogayuktā bhavanty uta
d dharmadānopadeśaṃ vā kartavyam iti niścayaḥ
d umā
d iti te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
d bhagavan devadeveśa triyakṣa vṛṣabhadhvaja
d mānuṣās trividhā deva dṛśyante satataṃ vibho
d āsīnā eva bhuñjante sthānaiśvaryaparigrahaiḥ
d apare yatnapūrvaṃ tu labhante bhogasaṃgraham
d apare yatamānās tu labhante na tu kiṃ cana
d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d nyāyatas tvaṃ mahābhāge śrotukāmāsi bhāmini
d ye loke mānuṣā devi dānadharmaparāyaṇāḥ
d pātrāṇi vidhivaj jñātvā dūrato hy anumānataḥ
d abhigamya svayaṃ tatra grāhayanti prasādya ca
d dānāni ceṅgitair eva tair avijñātam eva vā
d punarjanmani deveśi tādṛśāḥ śobhanā narāḥ
d ayatnatas tu tāny eva phalāni prāpnuvanty uta
d āsīnā eva bhuñjante bhogān sukṛtabhoginaḥ
d apare ye ca dānāni dadaty eva prayācitāḥ
d yathā yathā te dīnatvāt punar dāsyanti yācitāḥ
d tāvat kālaṃ tathā devi punarjanmani te narāḥ
d yatnataḥ śramasaṃyuktāḥ punas tāny āpnuvanty uta
d yācitā api ye ke cin na dadaty eva kiṃ cana
d abhyasūyāparā martyā lobhopahatacetasaḥ
d te punarjanmani śubhe yatante bahudhā narāḥ
d na prāpnuvanti manujā mārgantas te 'pi kiṃ cana
d nānuptaṃ rohate sasyaṃ tadvad dānaphalaṃ viduḥ
d yad yad dadāti puruṣas tat tat prāpnoti kevalam
d iti te kathitaṃ devi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
d umā
d bhagavan bhaganetraghna ke cid vārddhakasaṃyutāḥ
d abhogayogyakāle tu bhogāṃś caiva dhanāni ca
d labhante sthavirā bhūtvā bhogaiśvaryaṃ yatas tataḥ
d yena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d maheśvaraḥ
d hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu tat tvaṃ samāhitā
d dharmakāryaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ vismṛtya dhanasaṃyutāḥ
d prāṇāntakāle saṃprāpte vyādhibhiś ca nipīḍitāḥ
d ārabhante punar dharmaṃ dātuṃ dānāni vā narāḥ
d te punarjanmani śubhe bhūtvā duḥkhapariplutāḥ
d atītayauvane kāle sthaviratvam upāgatāḥ
d labhante pūrvadattānāṃ phalāni śubhalakṣaṇe
d evaṃ karmaphalaṃ devi kālayogād bhavaty uta
d umā
d bhogayuktā mahādeva ke cid vyādhipariplutāḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d asamarthāś ca tān bhoktuṃ bhavanti kim u kāraṇam
d vyādhiyogaparikliṣṭā ye nirāśāḥ svajīvite
d ārabhante tadā kartuṃ dānāni śubhalakṣaṇe
d te punarjanmani śubhe prāpya tāni phalāny uta
d umā
d asamarthāś ca tān bhoktuṃ vyādhitās te bhavanty uta
d bhagavan devadeveśa mānuṣeṣv eva ke cana
d rūpayuktāḥ pradṛśyante śubhāṅgā priyadarśanāḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu tat tvaṃ samāhitā
d ye purā manujā devi lajjāyuktāḥ priyaṃvadāḥ
d śaktāḥ sumadhurā nityaṃ bhūtvā caiva svabhāvataḥ
d amāṃsabhojinaś caiva sadā prāṇidayāyutāḥ
d pratikarmapradā vāpi vastradā dharmakāraṇāt
d bhūmiśuddhikarā vāpi kāraṇād agnipūjakāḥ
d evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani te narāḥ
d umā
d rūpeṇa spṛhaṇīyās tu bhavanty eva na saṃśayaḥ
d virūpāś ca pradṛśyante mānuṣeṣv eva ke cana
d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kalyāṇi kāraṇam
d rūpayogāt purā martyā darpāhaṃkārasaṃyutāḥ
d virūpahāsakāś caiva stutinindādibhir bhṛśam
d paropatāpinaś caiva māṃsādāś ca tathaiva ca
d abhyasūyāparāś caiva aśuddhāś ca tathaiva ca
d evaṃyuktasamācārā yamaloke sudaṇḍitāḥ
d kathaṃ cit prāpya mānuṣyaṃ tatra te rūpavarjitāḥ
d virūpāḥ saṃbhavanty eva nāsti tatra vicāraṇā
d umā
d bhagavan devadeveśa ke cit saubhāgyasaṃyutāḥ
d rūpabhogavihīnāś ca dṛśyante pramadāpriyāḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d maheśvaraḥ
d ye purā manujā devi saumyaśīlāḥ priyaṃvadāḥ
d svadārair eva saṃtuṣṭā dāreṣu samavṛttayaḥ
d dākṣiṇyenaiva vartante pramadāsv apriyāsv api
d na tu pratyādiśanty eva strīdoṣān guhyasaṃśritān
d annapānīyadāḥ kāle nṛṇāṃ svādupradāś ca ye
d svadāravartinaś caiva dhṛtimanto niratyayāḥ
d evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhane
d mānuṣās te bhavanty eva satataṃ subhagā bhṛśam
d arthād ṛte 'pi te devi bhavanti pramadāpriyāḥ
d umā
d durbhagāḥ saṃpradṛśyante āḍhyā bhogayutā api
d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu sarvaṃ samāhitā
d ye purā manujā devi svadāreṣv anapekṣayā
d yatheṣṭavṛttayaś caiva nirlajjā vītasaṃbhramāḥ
d pareṣāṃ vipriyakarā vāṅmanaḥkāyakarmabhiḥ
d nirāśrayā nirannādyāḥ strīṇāṃ hṛdayakopanāḥ
d evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani te narāḥ
d durbhagāḥ saṃbhavanty eva strīṇāṃ hṛdayavipriyāḥ
d umā
d nāsti teṣāṃ ratisukhaṃ svadāreṣv api kiṃ cana
d bhagavan devadeveśa mānuṣeṣv eva ke cana
d jñānavijñānasaṃpannā buddhimanto vicakṣaṇāḥ
d durgatās tu pradṛśyante yatamānā yathāvidhi
d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kalyāṇi kāraṇam
d ye purā manujā devi śrutavanto 'pi kevalam
d nirāśrayā nirannādyā bhṛśam ātmaparāyaṇāḥ
d te punarjanmani śubhe jñānabuddhiyutā api
d niṣkiṃcanā bhavanty eva anuptaṃ na hi rohati
d umā
d mūrkhā loke pradṛśyante dṛḍhaṃ mūḍhā vicetasaḥ
d jñānavijñānarahitāḥ samṛddhāś ca samantataḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d maheśvaraḥ
d ye purā manujā devi bāliśā api sarvataḥ
d samācaranti dānāni dīnānugrahakāraṇāt
d abuddhipūrvaṃ vadatāṃ dadaty eva yatas tataḥ
d te punarjanmani śubhe prāpnuvanty eva tat tathā
d paṇḍito 'paṇḍito vāpi bhuṅkte dānaphalaṃ naraḥ
d umā
d buddhyānapekṣitaṃ dānaṃ sarvathā tat phalaty uta
d bhagavan devadeveśa mānuṣeṣv eva ke cana
d medhāvinaḥ śrutidharā bhavanti viśadākṣarāḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d ye purā manujā devi guruśuśrūṣakā bhṛśam

d vidhinaiva parāṃś caiva grāhayanti na cānyathā
d aślāghamānā jñānena praśāntā yatavācakāḥ
d vidyāsthānāni ye loke sthāpayanti ca yatnataḥ
d tādṛśā maraṇaṃ prāptāḥ punarjanmani śobhane
d umā
d medhāvinaḥ śrutidharā bhavanti viśadākṣarāḥ
d apare mānuṣā deva yatnato 'pi yatas tataḥ

d ye purā manujā devi jñānadarpasamanvitāḥ

d tapanti ye parān nityaṃ jñānādhikyena darpitāḥ

d mānuṣyaṃ suciraṃ prāpya tatra bodhavivarjitāḥ

d putrair dārair guṇayutair dāsīdāsaparicchadaiḥ

d dhanadhānyena saṃpannāḥ prāsādair yānavāhanaiḥ
d sarvopabhogasaṃyuktā nānācitrair manoharaiḥ
d jñātibhiḥ saha modante avighnaṃ tu dine dine

d satyasaṃdhāḥ kṣamāśīlā lobhamohavivarjitāḥ
d dātāraḥ pātrato dānaṃ vratair niyamasaṃyutāḥ
d svaduḥkham iva saṃsmṛtya paraduḥkhaṃ mahātmanaḥ

d evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhane

d rūpaṃ dravyaṃ balaṃ cāyur bhogaiśvaryaṃ kulaṃ śrutam

d nāstikāś caiva dhūrtāś ca mūrkhāś cātmaparāyaṇāḥ
d paropatāpino devi prāyaśaḥ prāṇinirdayāḥ
d evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhane
d kathaṃ cit prāpya mānuṣyaṃ tatra te duḥkhapīḍitāḥ
d sarvataḥ saṃbhavanty eva pūrvam ātmapramādataḥ
d yathā te pūrvakathitaṃ tathā te saṃbhavanty uta

d hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu kalyāṇi kāraṇam

d daṇḍitā yamadaṇḍena nirayasthāś ciraṃ priye

d svabhāvato vā jātā vā andhā eva bhavanti te
d akṣirogayutā vāpi nāsti tatra vicāraṇā

d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā

d abhakṣyāhāradāś caiva viśvastānāṃ viṣapradāḥ
d abhakṣyabhakṣyadāś caiva śaucamaṅgalavarjitāḥ
d evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhane

d tais tair bahuvidhākārair vyādhibhir duḥkhapīḍitāḥ
d umā

d evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhane
d śoṣavyādhiyutās tatra narā dhamanisaṃtatāḥ
d umā
d bhavanty eva narā devi pāpakarmopabhoginaḥ

d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d ye purā manujā devi pareṣāṃ rūpanāśakāḥ
d āghātavadhabandhaiś ca vṛthādaṇḍena mohitāḥ
d iṣṭanāśakarā ye tu apathyāhāradā narāḥ
d cikitsakā vā duṣṭāś ca lobhamohasamanvitāḥ

d ke cit tvagdoṣasaṃyuktā vraṇakuṣṭhaiś ca saṃyutāḥ

d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kalyāṇi kāraṇam

d svavaśāḥ kopanaparā guruvidveṣiṇas tathā

d evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhane
d yadi vai mānuṣaṃ janma labheraṃs te tathāvidhāḥ
d tatra te bahubhir ghorais tapyante vyādhibhiḥ priye
d ke cic chlīpadasaṃyuktāḥ ke cit kāsasamanvitāḥ

d pādarogaiś ca vividhair vraṇakuṣṭhabhagaṃdaraiḥ
d āḍhyā vā durgatā vāpi dṛśyante vyādhipīḍitāḥ
d evam ātmakṛtaṃ karma bhuñjate tatra tatra vai
d gūhituṃ na ca śakyaṃ vai kena cit svakṛtaṃ phalam
d umā

d apare mānuṣā deva dṛśyante kuṇibāhavaḥ
d maheśvaraḥ

d ativṛddhir na kartavyā daridrebhyaś ca dharmataḥ
d ye śvabhiḥ krīḍamānāś ca trāsayanti vane mṛgān
d prāṇihiṃsāṃ tathā devi kurvanti ca yatas tataḥ

d umā

d maheśvaraḥ
d ye purā manujā devi dhanadhānyasamanvitāḥ

d dadaty eva ca ye mūrkhāḥ ślāghayāvajñayāpi vā
d evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhane

d umā

d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi

d ye purā manujā bhūtvā ghorakarmaratās tathā
d paśupuṃstvopaghātena jīvanti ca ramanti ca
d puṃstvopaghātinaś caiva narāṇāṃ kopakāraṇāt
d ye dhūrtāḥ strīṣu gacchanti ayathāvad yatheṣṭataḥ
d kāmavighnakarā ye tu dveṣapaiśunyakāraṇāt
d evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhane
d daṇḍitā yamadaṇḍena nirayasthāś ciraṃ priye
d yadi cen mānuṣaṃ janma labheraṃs te tathāvidhāḥ
d klībā varṣavarāś caiva paṇḍakāś ca bhavanti te

d strīṇām api tathā devi yathā puṃsāṃ tu karmajam
d umā
d iti te kathitaṃ devi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
d bhagavan devadeveśa śūlapāṇe vṛṣadhvaja
d puṃścalya iti yāḥ strīṣu nīcavṛttaratāḥ smṛtāḥ
d maheśvaraḥ

d yāḥ purā pramadā devi buddhimohasamanvitāḥ
d kāmarāgasamāyuktāḥ patīn apacaranti vai
d pratikūlaparā yās tu patīn prati yathā tathā
d śaucaṃ lajjāṃ tu vismṛtya yatheṣṭaparicārakāḥ
d evaṃyuktasamācārā yamaloke sudaṇḍitāḥ
d yadi cen mānuṣaṃ janma labheraṃs tās tathāvidhāḥ
d bahusādhāraṇā evaṃ puṃścalyaś ca bhavanti tāḥ
d pauṃścalyaṃ yat tu tad vṛttaṃ strīṇāṃ kaṣṭatamaṃ smṛtam
d tataḥprabhṛti tā devi patanty eva na saṃśayaḥ
d umā
d śocanti cet tu tad vṛttaṃ manasā hitam āpnuyuḥ
d bhagavan devadeveśa pramadā vidhavā bhṛśam
d dṛśyante mānuṣe loke sarvakalyāṇavarjitāḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d yā purā pramadā devi buddhimohasamanvitāḥ
d kuṭumbaṃ tatra vai patyur nāśayanti vṛthā tathā
d viṣadāś cāgnidāś caiva patīn prati sunirdayāḥ
d anyāsāṃ hi patīn yānti svapatidveṣakāraṇāt
d evaṃyuktasamācārā yamaloke sudaṇḍitāḥ
d nirayasthāś ciraṃ kālaṃ kathaṃ cit prāpya mānuṣam
d umā
d tatra tā bhogarahitā vidhavās tu bhavanti vai
d bhagavan pramadās tv anyāḥ patau jñātiṣu satsv api
d liṅginyaḥ saṃpradṛśyante pāṣaṇḍaṃ dharmam āśritāḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d yāḥ purā bhāvadoṣeṇa lobhamohasamanvitāḥ
d paradravyaparā lobhāt pareṣāṃ dravyahārakāḥ
d abhyasūyāparā yās tu sapatnīnāṃ pradūṣakāḥ
d īrṣyāparāḥ kopanāś ca bandhūnāṃ viphalāḥ sadā
d evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani tāḥ priye
d apalakṣaṇasaṃpannāḥ pāṣaṇḍaṃ dharmam āśritāḥ
d umā
d striyaḥ pravrājaśīlāś ca bhavanty eva na saṃśayaḥ
d bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cit kāruvṛttiṃ samāśritāḥ
d pradṛśyante manuṣyeṣu nīcakarmaratā janāḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d ye purā manujā devi stabdhā mānayutā bhṛśam
d darpāhaṃkārasaṃyuktāḥ kevalātmaparāyaṇāḥ
d tādṛśā manujā devi punarjanmani śobhane
d kāravo naṭagandharvāḥ saṃbhavanti yathā tathā
d nāpitā bandinaś caiva tathā vaitālikāḥ priye
d evaṃbhūtās tv adhovṛttiṃ jīvanty āśritya mānavāḥ
d paraprasādanakarās te paraiḥ kṛtavetanāḥ
d umā
d parāvamānasya phalaṃ bhuñjate paurvadehikam
d bhagavan devadeveśa mānuṣeṣv eva ke cana
d dāsabhūtāḥ pradṛśyante sarvakarmakarā bhṛśam
d āghātabhartsanasahāḥ pīḍyamānāś ca sarvaśaḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kalyāṇi kāraṇam
d ye purā manujā devi pareṣāṃ vittahārakāḥ
d ṛṇavṛddhikaraṃ kuryān nyāsadattaṃ tathaiva ca
d nikṣepakāraṇād dattaṃ pareṣāṃ dravyahāriṇaḥ
d pramādād vismṛtaṃ naṣṭaṃ pareṣāṃ dhanahārakāḥ
d vadhabandhaparikleśair dāsatve kurvate 'parān
d tādṛśā maraṇaṃ prāptā daṇḍitā yamaśāsanaiḥ
d kathaṃ cit prāpya mānuṣyaṃ tatra te devi sarvathā
d dāsabhūtā bhavanty eva janmaprabhṛti mānavāḥ
d teṣāṃ karmāṇi kurvanti yeṣāṃ te dhanahārakāḥ
d ā samāpteḥ svapāpasya kurvantīti viniścayaḥ
d paśubhūtās tathā cānye bhavanti dhanahārakāḥ
d tat tathā kṣīyate karma teṣāṃ pūrvāparādhajam
d ato 'nyathā na tac chakyaṃ karma hātuṃ surāsuraiḥ
d kiṃ tu mokṣavidhis teṣāṃ sarvathā tatprasādanam
d ayathāvan mokṣakāmaḥ punarjanmani ceṣyate
d mokṣakāmī yathānyāyaṃ kurvan karmāṇi sarvaśaḥ
d bhartuḥ prasādam ākāṅkṣed āghātān sarvadā sahan
d prītipūrvaṃ tu yo bhartrā mukto muktaḥ svapāpataḥ
d tathābhūtān karmakarān sadā saṃpoṣayet patiḥ
d yathārhaṃ kārayet karma daṇḍaṃ kāraṇataḥ kṣipet
d vṛddhān bālāṃs tathā kṣīṇān pālayan dharmam āpnuyāt
d umā
d iti te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
d bhagavan mānuṣeṣv eva mānuṣāḥ samadarśanāḥ
d caṇḍālā iva dṛśyante sparśamātreṇa dūṣakāḥ
d nīcakarmakarā deva sarveṣāṃ malahārakāḥ
d durgatāḥ kleśabhūyiṣṭhā virūpā duṣṭacetasaḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi tvam ekāgramanāḥ śṛṇu
d ye purā manujā ghorā atimānayutā bhṛśam
d ātmasaṃbhāvanāyuktāḥ stabdhā darpasamanvitāḥ
d praṇāmaṃ na tu kurvanti gurūṇām api pāpakāḥ
d ye svadharmārpaṇaṃ kāryam atimānān na kurvate
d parān saṃnāmayanty eva ājñayātmani ye balāt
d ṛddhiyogāt parān nityam avamanyanti mānavān
d pānapāḥ sarvabhakṣāś ca paruṣāḥ kaṭukā narāḥ
d evaṃyuktasamācārā daṇḍitā yamaśāsanaiḥ
d kathaṃ cit prāpya mānuṣyaṃ caṇḍālāḥ saṃbhavanti te
d nīcakarmaratāś caiva sarveṣāṃ malahārakāḥ
d pareṣāṃ vandanaparās te bhavanty avamānitāḥ
d virūpāḥ pāpayonisthāḥ sparśanād api varjitāḥ
d kuvṛttim upajīvanti bhūtvā te rajakādayaḥ
d purātimānadoṣāt tu bhuñjate svakṛtaṃ phalam
d tān apy avasthākṛpaṇāṃś caṇḍālān api buddhimān
d na ca ninden nātikupyed bhuñjate svakṛtaṃ phalam
d umā
d caṇḍālā api tāṃ jātiṃ śocantaḥ śuddhim āpnuyuḥ
d bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cid āśāpāśaśatair vṛtāḥ
d pareṣāṃ dvāri tiṣṭhanti pratiṣiddhāḥ praveśane
d draṣṭuṃ jñāpayituṃ caiva na labhante ca yatnataḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d ye purā manujā devi aiśvaryasthānasaṃyutāḥ
d saṃvidaṃ tu na kurvanti parair aiśvaryamohitāḥ
d dvārāṇi na dadaty eva dveṣalobhādibhir vṛtāḥ
d avasthāmohasaṃyuktāḥ svārthamātraparāyaṇāḥ
d lubdhā bhogayutā vāpi sarveṣāṃ niṣphalā bhṛśam
d api śaktā na kuryur ye parānugrahakāraṇāt
d nirdayāś caiva nirdvārā bhogaiśvaryagatiṃ prati
d evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhane
d yadi cen mānuṣaṃ janma labheraṃs te tathāvidhāḥ
d durgatā duravasthāś ca karmavyākṣepasaṃyutāḥ
d abhidhāvanti te sarve tam artham abhivedinaḥ
d rājñāṃ vā rājamātrāṇāṃ dvāri tiṣṭhanti vāritāḥ
d karma vijñāpituṃ bhadre na labhante kathaṃ cana
d umā
d praveṣṭum api te dvāri bahis tiṣṭhanti kāṅkṣayā
d bhagavan mānuṣe loke mānuṣeṣu bahuṣv api
d sahasā naṣṭasarvasvā bhraṣṭakośaparigrahāḥ
d dṛśyante mānuṣāḥ ke cid rājacorodakādibhiḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d ye purā manujā devi āsuraṃ bhāvam āśritāḥ
d pareṣāṃ vṛttināśaṃ tu kurvate dveṣalobhataḥ
d utkocanaparāś caiva piśunāś ca tathāvidhāḥ
d paradravyaharā ghorāś cauryād vānyena karmaṇā
d nirdayā niranukrośāḥ pareṣāṃ vṛttināśakāḥ
d nāstikānṛtabhūyiṣṭhāḥ paradravyāpahāriṇaḥ
d evaṃyuktasamācārā daṇḍitā yamaśāsanaiḥ
d nirayasthāś ciraṃ kālaṃ tatra duḥkhasamanvitāḥ
d yadi cen mānuṣaṃ janma labheraṃs te tathāvidhāḥ
d tatrasthāḥ prāpnuvanty eva sahasā dravyanāśanam
d kaṣṭaṃ ca prāpnuvanty eva kāraṇākāraṇād api
d umā
d nāśaṃ vināśaṃ dravyāṇām upaghātāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
d bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cid bāndhavaiḥ sahasā pṛthak
d kāraṇākāraṇād eva sahasā prāṇanāśanam
d śastreṇa vānyathā vāpi prāpnuvanti vadhaṃ narāḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d ye purā manujā devi ghorakarmaratā narāḥ
d āsurāḥ prāyaśo mūrkhāḥ prāṇihiṃsāpriyā bhṛśam
d nirdayāḥ prāṇihiṃsāyāṃ tathā prāṇavighātakāḥ
d viśvastaghātakāś caiva tathā suptavighātakāḥ
d prāyaśo 'nṛtabhūyiṣṭhā nāstikā māṃsabhojinaḥ
d evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ prāṇidharmagatāḥ punaḥ
d daṇḍitā yamadaṇḍena nirayasthāś ciraṃ priye
d tiryagyoniṃ punaḥ prāpya tatra duḥkhaparikṣayāt
d yadi cen mānuṣaṃ janma labheraṃs te tathāvidhāḥ
d tatra te prāpnuvanty eva vadhabandhān yathā tathā
d āḍhyā vā durgatā vāpi bhuñjate svakṛtaṃ phalam
d suptā mattāś ca viśvastās tathā te prāpnuvanty uta
d prāṇābādhakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ bāndhavaiḥ sahasā pṛthak
d umā
d putradāravināśaṃ vā śastreṇānyena vā vadham
d bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cid rājabhir nītikovidaiḥ
d daṇḍyante mānuṣe loke mānuṣāḥ satataṃ bhuvi
d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d ye purā manujā devi manujāṃś cetarāṃś ca vā
d kliṣṭaghātena nighnanti prāṇān prāṇiṣu nirdayāḥ
d asurā ghorakarmāṇaḥ krūradaṇḍavadhapriyāḥ
d ye daṇḍayanty adaṇḍyāṃs tu rājānaḥ kopamohitāḥ
d hiṃsāvihārāḥ puruṣā māṃsādā nāstikāḥ śubhe
d ke cit strīpuruṣaghnāś ca gurughnāś ca tathā priye
d evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ prāṇidharmagatāḥ punaḥ
d daṇḍitā yamadaṇḍena nirayasthāś ciraṃ priye
d pūrvadehakṛtaṃ karma bhuñjate tad iha prajāḥ
d ihaiva yat kṛtaṃ karma tat paratra phalaty uta
d eṣā vyavasthitir devi mānuṣeṣv eva dṛśyate
d na ṛṣīṇāṃ na devānām amaratvāt tapobalāt
d tair ekena śarīreṇa bhujyate karmaṇaḥ phalam
d umā
d na tathā mānuṣāṇāṃ syād antardhāya bhaved dhi tam
d kimarthaṃ mānuṣā loke daṇḍyante pṛthivīśvaraiḥ
d kṛtāparādham uddiśya hantā hartāyam ity uta
d putrārthī putrakāmeṣṭyā ihaiva labhate sutān
d tenaiva hi śarīreṇa bhuñjānāḥ karmaṇāṃ phalam
d dṛśyante mānuṣe loke tad bhavān anumanyate
d maheśvaraḥ
d etan me saṃśayasthānaṃ tat tvaṃ śaṃsitum arhasi
d sthāne saṃśayitaṃ devi tat tvaṃ śṛṇu samāhitā
d karma karmaphalaṃ ceti yugapad bhuvi neṣyate
d yat tvayābhihitaṃ devi hantā hartāyam ity api
d teṣāṃ tatpūrvakaṃ karma daṇḍyate yatra rājabhiḥ
d daihikaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ teṣāṃ hetur bhavati śāsane
d aparādhāpadeśena rājā daṇḍayati prajāḥ
d ihaloke vyavasthārthaṃ rājabhir daṇḍanaṃ smṛtam
d udvejanārthaṃ śeṣāṇām aparādhaṃ tam uddiśan
d purākṛtaphalaṃ daṇḍo daṇḍyamānasya tad dhruvam
d umā
d prāg eva ca mayā proktaṃ tatra niḥsaṃśayā bhava
d bhagavan bhuvi martyānāṃ daṇḍitānāṃ nareśvaraiḥ
d daṇḍenaiva tu teneha pāpanāśo bhaven na vā
d maheśvaraḥ
d etan mayā saṃśayitaṃ tad bhavāṃś chettum arhati
d sthāne saṃśayitaṃ devi śṛṇu tat tvaṃ samāhitā
d ye nṛpair daṇḍitā bhūmāv aparādhāpadeśataḥ
d yamaloke na daṇḍyante tatra te yamadaṇḍanaiḥ
d adaṇḍitā vā ye mithyā martyā vā daṇḍitā bhuvi
d tān yamo daṇḍayaty eva sa hi veda kṛtākṛtam
d nātikramed yamaṃ kaś cit karma kṛtveha mānuṣaḥ
d rājā yamaś ca kurvāte daṇḍamātraṃ tu śobhane
d ubhābhyāṃ yamarājabhyāṃ daṇḍito 'daṇḍito 'pi vā
d paścāt karmaphalaṃ bhuṅkte narake mānuṣeṣu vā
d nāsti karmaphalacchettā kaś cil lokatraye 'pi ca
d umā
d iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ nirviśaṅkā bhava priye
d kimarthaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtvā mānuṣā bhuvi nityaśaḥ
d punas tatkarmanāśāya prāyaścittāni kurvate
d sarvapāpaharaṃ ceti hayamedhaṃ vadanti ca
d prāyaścittāni cānyāni pāpanāśāya kurvate
d maheśvaraḥ
d tasmān me saṃśayo jātas tvaṃ taṃ chettum ihārhasi
d sthāne saṃśayitaṃ devi śṛṇu tat tvaṃ samāhitā
d saṃśayo hi mahān eṣa pūrveṣāṃ ca manīṣiṇām
d dvidhā tu kriyate pāpaṃ sadbhiś cāsadbhir eva ca
d abhisaṃdhāya vā nityam anyathā vā yadṛcchayā
d kevalaṃ cābhisaṃdhāya saṃrambhāc ca karoti yat
d karmaṇas tasya nāśas tu na kathaṃ cana vidyate
d abhisaṃdhikṛtasyeha naiva nāśo 'sti karmaṇaḥ
d aśvamedhasahasrair vā prāyaścittaśatair api
d anyathā yat kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ pramādād vā yadṛcchayā
d prāyaścittāśvamedhābhyāṃ śodhanāt tu praṇaśyati
d lokasaṃvyavahārārthaṃ prāyaścittādir iṣyate
d viddhy evaṃ pāpake kārye nirviśaṅkā bhava priye
d umā
d iti te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
d bhagavan devadeveśa mānuṣāś cetarā api
d mriyante bahudhā loke kāraṇākāraṇād api
d maheśvaraḥ
d kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d ye purā manujā devi kāraṇākāraṇād api
d yathāsubhir viyojyante prāṇinaḥ prāṇinirdayaiḥ
d tathaiva te prāpnuvanti yathaivātmakṛtaṃ phalam
d viṣadas tu viṣeṇaiva śastraiḥ śastreṇa ghātakaḥ
d evam eva yathā loke mānuṣā ghnanti mānuṣān
d kāraṇair eva te tena tathā svaprāṇanāśanam
d prāpnuvanti punar devi nāsti tatra vicāraṇā
d iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ pāpakarmaphalaṃ priye
d bhūyas tava samāsena kathayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
d satyapramāṇakaraṇaṃ nityam avyabhicāri ca
d yaiḥ purā manujair devi yasmin kāle yathā kṛtam
d yenaiva kāraṇenāpi karma yat tu śubhāśubham
d tasmin kāle tathā devi tenaiva karaṇena te
d prāpnuvanti narāḥ pretya niḥsaṃdehaṃ śubhāśubham
d iti satyaṃ vijānīhi lokatantravidhiṃ prati
d karma kṛtvā naro bhoktā sa nāsti divi vā bhuvi
d na śakyaṃ karma cābhoktuṃ sadevāsuramānuṣaiḥ
d karmaṇā grathito loka ādiprabhṛti vartate
d etad uddeśataḥ proktaṃ karmapākaphalaṃ priye
d yad anyac ca mayā noktaṃ yasmiṃs te karmasaṃgrahe
d buddhitarkeṇa tat sarvaṃ tathā veditum arhasi
d umā
d kathitaṃ śrotukāmāyāḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
d bhagavan sarvalokeśa lokapālanamaskṛta
d prasādāt te mahādeva śrutā me karmaṇāṃ gatiḥ
d saṃgṛhītaṃ ca tat sarvaṃ tattvato 'mṛtasaṃnibham
d karmaṇā grathitaṃ sarvam iti vedmi śubhāśubham
d govatsavac ca jananīṃ nimnaṃ salilavat tathā
d kartāraṃ svakṛtaṃ karma nityaṃ tam anudhāvati
d kṛtasya karmaṇaś ceha na nāśo 'stīti niścayaḥ
d aśubhasya śubhasyāpi tad apy avagataṃ mayā
d bhūya eva mahādeva varada prītivardhana
d karmaṇāṃ gatim āśritya saṃśayān moktum arhasi
d maheśvaraḥ
d yat te vivakṣitaṃ devi guhyam apy asitekṣaṇe
d umā
d tat sarvaṃ nirviśaṅkā tvaṃ pṛccha māṃ śubhalakṣaṇe
d evaṃ vyavasthite loke karmaṇā vṛṣabhadhvaja
d kṛtvā tat puruṣaḥ karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vetarat
d karmaṇaḥ svakṛtasyeha kadā bhuṅkte phalaṃ punaḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d iha vā pretya vā deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d sthāne saṃśayitaṃ devi tad dhi guhyatamaṃ śṛṇu
d tvatpriyārthaṃ pravakṣyāmi devaguhyaṃ śubhānane
d pūrvadehakṛtaṃ karma bhuñjate tad iha prajāḥ
d ihaiva yat kṛtaṃ puṃsāṃ tat paratra phaliṣyati
d eṣā vyavasthitir devi mānuṣeṣv eva dṛśyate
d devānām asurāṇāṃ ca amaratvāt tapobalāt
d ekenaiva śarīreṇa bhujyate karmaṇāṃ phalam
d umā
d mānuṣair na tathā devi antaraṃ tv etad iṣyate
d bhagavan bhaganetraghna mānuṣāṇāṃ viceṣṭitam
d sarvam ātmakṛtaṃ ceti śrutaṃ me bhagavanmatam
d loke grahakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ matvā karma śubhāśubham
d sadaiva grahanakṣatraṃ prāyaśaḥ paryupāsate
d maheśvaraḥ
d etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ deva tadgataṃ chettum arhasi
d sthāne saṃśayitaṃ devi śṛṇu tattvaviniścayam
d nakṣatrāṇi grahāś caiva śubhāśubhanivedakāḥ
d mānavānāṃ mahābhāge na tu karmakarāḥ svayam
d prajānāṃ tu hitārthāya śubhāśubhavidhiṃ prati
d anāgatam atikrāntaṃ jyotiścakreṇa bodhyate
d kiṃ tu tatra śubhaṃ karma sugrahais tan nivedyate
d duṣkṛtasyāśubhair eva samavāyo bhaved iti
d tasmād dhi grahavaiṣamye vaiṣamyaṃ kurute janaḥ
d grahasāmye śubhaṃ kuryāj jātyāṃ jātyāṃ purākṛtam
d kevalaṃ grahanakṣatraṃ na karoti śubhāśubham
d sarvam ātmakṛtaṃ karma lokavādo grahā iti
d pṛthag grahāḥ pṛthak kartā kartrā svaṃ bhujyate phalam
d umā
d iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ viśaṅkāṃ jahi śobhane
d bhagavan vividhaṃ karma kṛtvā jantuḥ śubhāśubham
d kiṃ tayoḥ pūrvakataraṃ bhuṅkte janmāntare punaḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d eṣa me saṃśayo deva taṃ me chettum ihārhasi
d sthāne saṃśayitaṃ devi tat te vakṣyāmi tattvataḥ
d aśubhaṃ pūrvam ity āhur apare śubham ity api
d mithyā tad ubhayaṃ proktaṃ kevalaṃ tad bravīmi te
d mānuṣe tu pade karma yugapad bhujyate sadā
d yathākṛtaṃ yathāyogam ubhayaṃ bhujyate kramāt
d bhuñjānāś caiva dṛśyante kramaśo bhuvi mānavāḥ
d ṛddhiṃ hāniṃ sukhaṃ duḥkham abhayaṃ bhayam eva ca
d duḥkhāny anubhavanty āḍhyā daridrāś ca sukhāni ca
d yaugapadyāc ca bhuñjānā dṛśyante lokasākṣikam
d narake svargaloke ca na tathā saṃsthitiḥ priye
d nityaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi narake svarge nityaṃ sukhaṃ tathā
d śubhāśubhānām ādhikyāt karmaṇā tatra sevyate
d nirantaraṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ svarge ca narake bhavet
d tatrāpi sumahat kṛtvā pūrvam alpaṃ punaḥ śubhe
d umā
d etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
d bhagavan prāṇino loke mriyante kena hetunā
d jātā jātā na tiṣṭhanti tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d maheśvaraḥ
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvaṃ samāhitā
d ātmakarmakṣayād dehaṃ yathā muñcanti tac chṛṇu
d śarīrātmasamāhāro jantur ity abhidhīyate
d tatrātmānaṃ nityam āhur anityaṃ kṣetram ucyate
d tat tu kālavaśāl loke jīrṇaṃ bhavati śobhane
d kālaś chinatti cāyūṃṣi dinamāsartuhāyanaiḥ
d kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālenākulitaṃ jagat
d kālaṃ nātikrameran hi sadevāsuramānavāḥ
d yathākāśe na tiṣṭheta dravyaṃ kiṃ cid acetanam
d tathā dhāvati kālo 'yaṃ kṣaṇaṃ kiṃ cin na tiṣṭhati
d evaṃ kālena saṃkrāntaṃ śarīraṃ jarjarīkṛtam
d akarmayogyaṃ saṃśīrṇaṃ tyaktvā dehī tato vrajet
d nityasyānityasaṃtyāgāl loke tan maraṇaṃ viduḥ
d na ca nityasya jīvasya vināśo vidyate śubhe
d sa punar jāyate 'nyatra śarīraṃ navam āviśan
d umā
d evaṃ lokagatir nityam ādiprabhṛti vartate
d bhagavan prāṇināṃ bālā dṛśyante maraṇaṃ gatāḥ
d ativṛddhāś ca jīvanto dṛśyante cirajīvinaḥ
d kevalaṃ kālamaraṇaṃ na pramāṇaṃ maheśvara
d maheśvaraḥ
d tasmān me saṃśayaṃ brūhi prāṇināṃ jīvakāraṇam
d śṛṇu tatkāraṇaṃ devi nirṇayas tv eka eva saḥ
d jīrṇatvamātraṃ kurute kālo dehaṃ na pātayet
d jīrṇe karmaṇi saṃghātaḥ svayam eva viśīryate
d pūrvakarmapramāṇena jīvitaṃ mṛtyur eva vā
d yāvat pūrvakṛtaṃ karma tāvaj jīvati mānavaḥ
d tadvat kālavaśād bālā mriyante bhogasaṃkṣayāt
d jīvanti ciravṛddhāś ca tathā karmapramāṇataḥ
d umā
d iti te kathitaṃ devi nirviśaṅkā bhava priye
d bhagavan kena vṛttena bhavanti cirajīvinaḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d alpāyuṣo narāḥ kena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d śṛṇu tat sarvam akhilaṃ guhyaṃ pathyataraṃ nṛṇām
d ye narā vṛttasaṃpannā bhavanti cirajīvinaḥ
d ahiṃsā satyavacanam akrodhaḥ kṣāntir ārjavam
d gurūṇāṃ nityaśuśrūṣā vṛddhānām api pūjanam
d śaucaṃ cākāryasaṃtyāgaḥ sadā pathyasya bhojanam
d evamādi śubhaṃ vṛttaṃ narāṇāṃ dīrghajīvinām
d tapasā brahmacaryeṇa rasāyananiṣevaṇāt
d udagrasattvā balino bhavanti cirajīvinaḥ
d svarge vā mānuṣe vāpi ciraṃ tiṣṭhanti dhārmikāḥ
d apare pāpakarmāṇaḥ prāyaśo 'nṛtavādinaḥ
d hiṃsāpriyā gurudviṣṭā niṣkriyāḥ śaucavarjitāḥ
d nāstikā ghorakarmāṇaḥ satataṃ māṃsapānapāḥ
d pāpācārā gurudveṣāḥ kopanāḥ kalahapriyāḥ
d evam evāśubhācārās tiṣṭhanti niraye ciram
d tiryagyonau tathātyantam alpaṃ tiṣṭhanti mānuṣe
d tasmād alpāyuṣo martyās tādṛśāḥ saṃbhavanti te
d agamyadeśagamanād apathyānāṃ ca bhojanāt
d āyuḥkṣayo bhaven nṝṇām āyuḥkṣayakarā hi te
d bhavanty alpāyuṣas tais tair anyathā cirajīvinaḥ
d umā
d etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
d bhagavan devadeveśa śrutaṃ me paramaṃ hitam
d ātmano jātisaṃbandhaṃ brūhi strīpuruṣāntare
d strīprāṇaḥ puruṣaprāṇa ekaḥ sa pṛthag eva vā
d maheśvaraḥ
d eṣa me saṃśayo deva taṃ me chettuṃ tvam arhasi
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu sarvaṃ samāhitā
d puṃstvaṃ strītvam iti prāṇe sthitir nāsti śubhekṣaṇe
d nirvikārī sadaivātmā strītvaṃ puṃstvaṃ na cātmani
d karmaprakāreṇa tathā jātyāṃ jātyāṃ prajāyate
d akartā cāvikārī ca nityaś ca puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
d strīśarīrakṛtaṃ karma strībhāvenopabhujyate
d puruṣeṇa kṛtaṃ karma puruṣeṇaiva bhujyate
d evaṃ prasajyate loke bhāvaikatvena bhūyaśaḥ
d śarīraṃ karmanānātvād dṛśyate viparītavat
d kṛtvā tu pauruṣaṃ karma strī pumān api jāyate
d umā
d strībhāvayuk pumān kṛtvā karmaṇā pramadā bhavet
d bhagavan sarvalokeśa karmātmā na karoti cet
d maheśvaraḥ
d ko 'nyaḥ karmakaras tatra dehe tad vaktum arhasi
d śṛṇu bhāmini kartāram ātmā hi na ca karmakṛt
d prakṛtyā guṇayuktena kriyate karma nityaśaḥ
d śarīraṃ prāṇināṃ loke yathā pittakaphānilaiḥ
d vyāptam eva tribhir doṣais tathā vyāptaṃ guṇais tribhiḥ
d sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇās tv ete śarīriṇaḥ
d prakāśātmakam eteṣāṃ sattvaṃ satatam iṣyate
d rajo duḥkhātmakaṃ tatra tamo mohātmakaṃ smṛtam
d tribhir etair guṇaiḥ sarvaṃ loke karma pravartate
d satyaṃ prāṇidayā śaucaṃ śreyaḥ prītiḥ kṣamā damaḥ
d evamādi tathānyac ca karma sāttvikam iṣyate
d dākṣyaṃ karmaparatvaṃ ca lobho bhogavidhiṃ prati
d kalatrasaṅgo mādhuryaṃ nityam aiśvaryalubdhatā
d rajasaś codbhavaṃ caitat karma nānāvidhaṃ sadā
d anṛtaṃ caiva pāruṣyaṃ śrutividveṣatā bhṛśam
d hiṃsāparatvaṃ nāstikyaṃ nidrālasyabhayāni ca
d tamasaś codbhavaṃ caitat karma pāpayutaṃ sadā
d tasmād guṇamayaḥ sarvaḥ kāryārambhaḥ śubhāśubhaḥ
d tasmād ātmānam avyagraṃ viddhy akartāram avyayam
d sāttvikāḥ puṇyalokeṣu rājasā mānuṣe pade
d umā
d tiryagyonau ca narake tiṣṭheyus tāmasā narāḥ
d kimartham ātmā bhedyaḥ sandehe śastreṇa vā hate
d maheśvaraḥ
d svayaṃ praṇaśyate dehī tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kalyāṇi kāraṇam
d etan naiyāyikaiś cāpi muhyate sūkṣmabuddhibhiḥ
d karmakṣaye tu saṃprāpte prāṇināṃ dehadhāriṇām
d upadravo bhaved dehe yena kenāpi hetunā
d tannimittaṃ śarīrī tu śarīraṃ prāptasaṃkṣayam
d apayāti parityajya tataḥ karmavaśena saḥ
d dehakṣate 'pi naivātmā vedanābhir na cālyate
d tiṣṭhet karmaphalaṃ yāvad vrajet karmakṣaye punaḥ
d ādiprabhṛti loke 'sminn evam ātmagatiḥ sadā
d umā
d etat te kathitaṃ devi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
d bhagavan devadeveśa karmaṇaiva śubhāśubham
d yathāyogaṃ phalaṃ jantuḥ prāpnotīti viniścayaḥ
d pareṣāṃ vipriyaṃ kurvan yathā saṃprāpnuyāc chubham
d maheśvaraḥ
d yady etad asti ced deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d tad apy asti mahābhāge abhisaṃdhiphalaṃ nṛṇām
d hitārthaṃ duḥkham anyeṣāṃ kṛtvāśubham avāpnuyāt
d daṇḍayan bhartsayan rājā prajāḥ puṇyam avāpnuyāt
d guruḥ saṃtarjayañ śiṣyān bhartā bhṛtyajanaṃ svakam
d unmārgapratipannāṃś ca śāstā dharmaphalaṃ labhet
d cikitsakaś ca duḥkhāni janayan hitam āpnuyāt
d yajñārthaṃ paśuhiṃsāṃ ca kurvann api na hiṃsakaḥ
d evam anye sumanaso hiṃsakāḥ svargam āpnuyuḥ
d ekasmin nihate 'bhadre bahavaḥ sukham āpnuyuḥ
d tasmin hate bhaved dharmaḥ kuta eva tu pāpakam
d abhisaṃdher ajihmatvāc chuddhe dharmasya gauravāt
d umā
d etat kṛtvā tu pāpiṣṭhān doṣān na prāpnuyāt kva cit
d bhagavan sarvamartyānāṃ jñānī bhavati sattamaḥ
d kim avekṣya tad utpannaṃ jñānaṃ tasya phalaṃ ca yat
d nāradaḥ
d kṛtrimaṃ tat svabhāvaṃ vā tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d maheśvaraḥ
d etac chrutvā mahādevo jagau jñānasya saṃbhavam
d sthāvaraṃ jaṃgamaṃ ceti jagad dvividham ucyate
d catasro jātayas tatra prajānāṃ kramaśo yathā
d teṣām udbhedajā vṛkṣā latā vallyaś ca vīrudhaḥ
d daṃśayūkādayaś cānye svedajāḥ kṛmijātayaḥ
d pakṣiṇaś chidrakarṇāś ca prāṇinas tv aṇḍajāḥ smṛtāḥ
d mṛgavyālamanuṣyāṃś ca viddhi teṣāṃ jarāyujān
d evaṃ caturvidhāṃ jātim ātmā saṃśritya tiṣṭhati
d sparśenaikendriyeṇātmā tiṣṭhaty udbhedajeṣu vai
d śarīrasparśarūpābhyāṃ kledajeṣv api tiṣṭhati
d pañcabhiś cendriyadvārair jīvanty aṇḍajarāyujāḥ
d tathā bhūmyambusaṃyogād bhavanty udbhedajāḥ priye
d śītoṣṇayos tu saṃyogāj jāyante kledajāḥ priye
d aṇḍajāś cāpi saṃyogāj jāyante kṣetrabījayoḥ
d śuklaśoṇitasaṃyogāt saṃbhavanti jarāyujāḥ
d jarāyujānāṃ sarveṣāṃ mānuṣaṃ padam uttamam
d sakalair indriyair martyāḥ saṃyuktā jalpinas tathā
d bhayaṃ ratiś ca cittaṃ tad vidyate mṛgapakṣiṣu
d dharmādharmau ca vijñānaṃ naiva pakṣimṛgādiṣu
d buddhiḥ sattvaṃ dhṛtir lajjā jñānaṃ vijñānam eva ca
d ūhāpohau ca martyeṣu guṇā nānāvidhāḥ smṛtāḥ
d mānuṣaṃ hi padaṃ tasmād viśiṣṭam iha lakṣyate
d mahatā dharmakāryeṇa prāpyate janma mānuṣam
d ataḥ paraṃ tamotpattiṃ śṛṇu devi samāhitā
d dvividhaṃ hi tamo loke śārvaraṃ dehajaṃ tathā
d jyotirbhiś cāgninā loke nāśaṃ gacchati śārvaram
d dehajaṃ tu tamo ghoraṃ taiḥ samastair na śāmyati
d tamasas tasya nāśārthaṃ nopāyam adhijagmivān
d tapaś cakāra vipulaṃ lokakartā pitāmahaḥ
d caturas tu samudbhūtā vedāḥ sāṅgāḥ sahottarāḥ
d tāṃl labdhvā mumude brahmā lokānāṃ hitakāraṇāt
d dehajaṃ tat tamo ghoram abhūt tenaiva nāśitam
d kāryākāryam idaṃ ceti vācyāvācyam idaṃ tv iti
d yadi cen na bhavel loke śrutaṃ cāritradeśikam
d paśubhir nirviśeṣaṃ tu ceṣṭante mānuṣās tv iti
d yajñādīnāṃ samārambhaḥ śrutenaiva vidhīyate
d yajñasya phalayogena devalokaḥ samṛdhyate
d prītiyuktāḥ punar devā mānuṣāṇāṃ phalanty uta
d evaṃ nityaṃ pravardhete rodasī ca parasparam
d lokasaṃdhāraṇaṃ tasmāc chrutam ity avadhāraya
d jñānād viśiṣṭaṃ jantūnāṃ nāsti lokatraye 'pi ca
d sahajaṃ tat pradhānaṃ syād aparaṃ kṛtrimaṃ śrutam
d ubhayaṃ yatra saṃpannaṃ bhavet tatra tu śobhanam
d saṃpragṛhya śrutaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtakṛtyā bhavanty uta
d uparīva ca martyānāṃ devavat saṃprakāśate
d kāmaṃ krodhaṃ bhayaṃ darpam ajñānaṃ caiva buddhijam
d tac chrutaṃ nudati kṣipraṃ yathā vāyur balāhakān
d alpamātraṃ kṛto dharmo bhavej jñānavatāṃ mahān
d mahān api kṛto dharmo hy ajñānān niṣphalo bhavet
d parāvarajño bhūtānāṃ jñānavāṃs tattvavid bhavet
d umā
d evaṃ śrutaphalaṃ sarvaṃ kathitaṃ te śubhekṣaṇe
d bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cij jātismaraṇasaṃyutāḥ
d kimarthaṃ te 'bhijāyante jānantaḥ paurvadehikam
d maheśvaraḥ
d etan me tattvato deva mānuṣeṣu vadasva bhoḥ
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi kāraṇaṃ śṛṇu śobhane
d ye mṛtāḥ sahasā martyā jāyante sahasā punaḥ
d teṣāṃ paurāṇiko 'bhyāsaḥ kaṃ cit kālaṃ sa tiṣṭhati
d tasmāj jātismarā loke jāyante bodhasaṃyutāḥ
d teṣāṃ vivardhatāṃ saṃjñā svapnavat sā praṇaśyati
d umā
d paralokasya cāstitve mūḍhānāṃ kāraṇaṃ ca tat
d bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cin mṛtā bhūtvā hi saṃprati
d nivartamānā dṛśyante deheṣv eva punar narāḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi kāraṇaṃ śṛṇu śobhane
d prāṇair viyojyamānānāṃ bahutvāt prāṇināṃ kṣaye
d tathaiva nāmasāmānyād yamadūtā nṛṇāṃ bhuvi
d vahanti te kva cin mohād anyāṃs ta iti yāmikāḥ
d nirvikāraṃ hi tat sarvaṃ yamo veda kṛtākṛtam
d tasmāt saṃyaminīṃ prāpya yamenaite vimokṣitāḥ
d punar eva nivartante śeṣaṃ bhoktuṃ svakarmaṇaḥ
d umā
d svakarmaṇy asamāpte tu na mriyante hi mānavāḥ
d bhagavan suptamātrāṇāṃ martyānāṃ svapnadarśanam
d maheśvaraḥ
d kiṃ tat svabhāvam anyad vā tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d suptānāṃ tu punaś ceṣṭā svapna ity abhidhīyate
d anāgatam atikrāntaṃ paśyate saṃcaran manaḥ
d nimittaṃ ca bhavet tasmāt prāṇināṃ svapnadarśanam
d umā
d evaṃ te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
d bhagavan sarvabhūteśa loke karmakriyāpathe
d daivāt pravartate sarvam iti ke cid vyavasthitāḥ
d apare ceṣṭayā ceti dṛṣṭvā pratyakṣataḥ kriyām
d pakṣabhede dvidhā cāsmin saṃśayasthaṃ mano mama
d tattvaṃ vada mahādeva śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
d maheśvaraḥ
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tat tvaṃ samāhitā
d na daivaṃ kurute karma loke devi śubhāśubham
d lakṣyate dvividhaṃ karma mānuṣāṇāṃ śubhānane
d purākṛtaṃ tayor ekam aihikaṃ ca paraṃ tathā
d adṛṣṭaṃ paurvikaṃ karma tad daivam iti lakṣyate
d aihikaṃ dṛṣṭakaraṇaṃ tan mānuṣam iti smṛtam
d mānuṣaṃ ca kriyāmātraṃ daivāt saṃbhavate phalam
d evaṃ tad ubhayaṃ sarvaṃ mānuṣaṃ vidyate nṛṣu
d laukikaṃ tat pravakṣyāmi daivamānuṣanirmitam
d kṛṣau tu dṛśyate karma karṣaṇaṃ vapanaṃ tathā
d ropaṇaṃ caiva lavanaṃ yac cānyat pauruṣaṃ smṛtam
d kāle vṛṣṭiḥ suvāpaś ca prarohaḥ paktir eva ca
d evamādi tu yac cānyat tad daivatam iti smṛtam
d pravāpaḥ pauruṣaṃ karma siddhir daivam iti smṛtam
d daivād asiddhiś ca bhaved duṣkṛtaṃ cāsti pauruṣe
d suyatnāl labhate kīrtiṃ duryatnād ayaśas tathā
d umā
d evaṃ lokagatir devi ādiprabhṛti vartate
d bhagavan sarvabhūteśa surāsuranamaskṛta
d katham ātmā sadā garbhaṃ saṃviśet karmakāraṇāt
d maheśvaraḥ
d tan me vada mahādeva tad dhi guhyaṃ paraṃ mama
d śṛṇu bhāmini tad guhyaṃ guhyānāṃ paramaṃ priye
d devaguhyād api param ātmaguhyam iti smṛtam
d devāsurās tan na vidur ātmano hi gatāgatam
d adṛśyo hi sa devānāṃ śaighryāt saukṣmyān nirāśrayāt
d atimātrātimāyānām ātmamāyā sadeṣyate
d so 'yaṃ caturvidhāṃ jātiṃ saṃviśaty ātmamāyayā
d maithunaṃ śoṇitaṃ bījaṃ daivaṃ cāpy atra kāraṇam
d bījaśoṇitasaṃyogo yadā saṃbhavate śubhe
d tadātmā viśate garbham evam aṇḍajarāyuje
d śītoṣṇayos tu saṃyoge kledajeṣv avatiṣṭhati
d bījabhūmijalānāṃ tu yogād udbhedajeṣu ca
d evaṃ saṃyogakāle tu ātmā garbhatvam eyivān
d kalalāj jāyate piṇḍaṃ piṇḍāt peśyarbudaṃ bhavet
d vyaktibhāvaṃ gate caiva karma tv āśrayate kramāt
d evaṃ strīpuruṣasaṃyogaṃ pauruṣaṃ viddhi bhāmini
d apatyalābho yac cānyat tad daivam iti saṃsmṛtam
d evaṃ vivardhamānena karmātmā saha vartate
d evam ātmagatiṃ viddhi yan māṃ pṛcchasi suvrate
d pañcabhūtasthitiś caiva jyotiṣām ayanaṃ tathā
d abuddhigamyaṃ yan martyair hetubhir vā na vidyate
d tādṛśaṃ kāraṇaṃ daivaṃ śubhaṃ vā yadi vetarat
d yādṛśaṃ cātmanā śakyaṃ tat pauruṣam iti smṛtam
d kevalaṃ phalaniṣpattir ekena na tu śakyate
d pauruṣeṇa ca daivena yugapad grathitaṃ priye
d tayoḥ samāhitaṃ karma śītoṣṇaṃ yugapat tathā
d pauruṣaṃ tu tayoḥ pūrvam ārabdhavyaṃ vijānatā
d ātmanā naiva śakyaṃ hi na tathā kīrtim āpnuyāt
d khananān mathanāl loke jalāgniprāpaṇaṃ yathā
d tathā puruṣakāre tu daivasaṃpat samāhitā
d narasyākurvataḥ karma daivasaṃpan na labhyate
d tasmāt sarvasamārambho daivamānuṣanirmitaḥ
d asurā rākṣasāś caiva manyante lokanāyakāḥ
d na paśyante ca te pāpāḥ kevalaṃ māṃsabhakṣakāḥ
d pracchāditaṃ hi tat sarvaṃ guhyakāmā hi devatāḥ
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi devaguhyaṃ purātanam
d ādikāle prajāḥ sarvāḥ kṛtvā karma śubhāśubham
d bhuñjate paśyamānās te vṛttāntaṃ lokayor dvayoḥ
d yathaivātmakṛtaṃ vidyur deśāntaragatā narāḥ
d vidyus tathaivāntakāle svakṛtaṃ paurvadehikam
d evaṃ vyavasthite loke sarve dharmaparābhavan
d acireṇaiva kālena svargaḥ saṃpūritas tadā
d devānām api saṃbādhaṃ dṛṣṭvā brahmāpy acintayat
d saṃcarante kathaṃ devā mānuṣāḥ praviśanti hi
d ity evam anucintyaiṣa mānuṣān samamohayat
d tadāprabhṛti te martyā na vidus te purātanam
d kāmakrodhau ca tatkāle mānuṣeṣu nyapātayat
d tābhyām abhihatā martyāḥ svargalokaṃ na lebhire
d purākṛtasyāvijñānāt kāmakrodhābhipīḍanāt
d naitad astīti manvānā vikārāṃś cakrire punaḥ
d akāryādīn mahādoṣān ārabhantātmakāraṇāt
d vismṛtya dharmakāryāṇi paralokabhayaṃ tathā
d evaṃ vyavasthite loke kaśmalaṃ samapadyata
d lokānāṃ caiva vedānāṃ kṣayāyaiva tadā priye
d narakāḥ pūritāś cāsan prāṇibhiḥ pāpakāribhiḥ
d punar eva tu tad dṛṣṭvā lokakartā pitāmahaḥ
d acintayat tam evārthaṃ lokānāṃ hitakāraṇāt
d samatvena kathaṃ loko varteteti muhur muhuḥ
d cintayitvā tadā brahmā jñānena tapasā priye
d umā
d akaroj jñānadṛśyaṃ tu paralokaṃ na cakṣuṣā
d bhagavan mṛtamātras tu yo 'yaṃ jāta iti smṛtaḥ
d tathaiva dṛśyate jātas tatrātmā tu kathaṃ bhavet
d garbhādāv eva saṃviṣṭa ātmeti bhagavanmatam
d eṣa me saṃśayo deva tan me chettuṃ tvam arhasi
d maheśvaraḥ
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tat tvaṃ samāhitā
d anyo garbhagato bhūtvā tatraiva nidhanaṃ gataḥ
d punar anyac charīraṃ tadāviśya bhuvi jāyate
d tat kva cin naiva sarvatra daivayogaṃ tu tad bhavet
d sūtikāyā hitārthaṃ ca mohanārthaṃ ca dehinām
d yamakarmavidhānaṃ tad ity evaṃ viddhi śobhane
d kaukṣamātraṃ tu narakaṃ bhuktvā ke cit prayānti hi
d māyā sā yāmikā nāma yaj janmamaraṇāntare
d iti te kathitaṃ devi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
d umā
d bhagavan sarvabhūteśa lokanātha vṛṣadhvaja
d nāsty ātmā karmabhokteti mṛto jantur na jāyate
d svabhāvāj jāyate sarvaṃ yathā vṛkṣaphalaṃ tathā
d yathormayaḥ saṃbhavanti tathaiva jagadākṛtiḥ
d tapodānādi yat karma tatrātmā dṛśyate vṛthā
d nāsti paunarbhavaṃ janma iti ke cid vyavasthitāḥ
d parokṣavacanaṃ śrutvā na pratyakṣasya darśanāt
d tat sarvaṃ nāsti vāstīti saṃśayasthās tathāpare
d pakṣabhedāntare cāsmiṃs tattvaṃ me vaktum arhasi
d nāradaḥ
d uktaṃ bhagavatā yat tu tat tu lokasya saṃsthitiḥ
d praśnam etaṃ tu pṛcchantyāṃ rudrāṇyāṃ pariṣat tadā
d maheśvaraḥ
d kautūhalayutā śrotuṃ samāhitamanābhavat
d naitad asti mahābhāge yad vadantīha nāstikāḥ
d etad evābhiśastānāṃ śrutividveṣiṇāṃ matam
d sarvam arthaṃ śrutaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yat prāg uktaṃ mayā tava
d tadāprabhṛti martyānāṃ śrutam āśritya paṇḍitāḥ
