d kāmān saṃchindya parighān dhṛtyā vai paramāsinā
d abhiyānty eva te svargaṃ paśyantaḥ karmaṇāṃ phalam
d evaṃ śraddhāphalaṃ loke parataḥ sumahat phalam
d buddhiḥ śraddhā ca śuśrūṣā kāraṇāni hitaiṣiṇām
d tasmāt svargābhigantāraḥ kati cit tv abhavan narāḥ
d anye karaṇahīnatvān nāstikyaṃ bhāvam āśritāḥ
d śrutavidveṣiṇo mūrkhā nāstikā dṛḍhaniścayāḥ
d niṣkriyāś ca nirannādyāḥ patanty evādhamāṃ gatim
d nāstīti vai punarjanma kavayo 'py atra mohitāḥ
d nādhigacchanti tan nityaṃ hetuvādaśatair api
d eṣā brahmakṛtā māyā durvijñeyā surāsuraiḥ
d kiṃ punar mānuṣair loke jñātukāmaiḥ svakarmabhiḥ
d kevalaṃ śraddhayā devi śrutimātraniviṣṭayā
d tad astīty eva mantavyaṃ tathā hi tam avāpnuyāt
d vedaguhyeṣu cānyeṣu hetur devi nirarthakaḥ
d badhirāndhavad evātra vartitavyaṃ hitaiṣiṇā
d etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ devaguhyaṃ prajāhitam
d tvatprītyartham idaṃ guhyam avācyam api bhāṣitam
d umā
d bhagavan sarvabhūteśa tripurārdana śaṃkara
d kīdṛśā yamadaṇḍās te kīdṛśāḥ paricārakāḥ
d kathaṃ mṛtās te gacchanti prāṇino yamasādanam
d kīdṛśaṃ bhavanaṃ tasya kathaṃ daṇḍayati prajāḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d etat sarvaṃ mahādeva śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ prabho
d śṛṇu kalyāṇi tat sarvaṃ yat tad devi manaḥpriyam
d dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śubhe yamasya sadanaṃ mahat
d vicitraṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ca nānābhāvasamanvitam
d pitṛbhiḥ pretasaṃghaiś ca yamadūtaiś ca saṃtatam
d prāṇisaṃghaiḥ subahubhiḥ karmavaśyais tu pūritam
d tatrāste daṇḍayan nityaṃ yamo lokahite rataḥ
d māyayā satataṃ vetti prāṇināṃ yac chubhāśubham
d māyayā saṃharaṃs tatra prāṇisaṃghān yatas tataḥ
d tasya māyāmayāḥ pāśā na vedyante surāsuraiḥ
d ko hi mānuṣamātras tu vettā tac caritaṃ mahat
d evaṃ hi śāsatas tasya yamasya paricārakāḥ
d gṛhītvā saṃnayanty eva prāṇinaḥ kṣīṇakarmiṇaḥ
d yena kenāpadeśena apadeśas tadudbhavaḥ
d karmaṇā prāṇino loka uttamādhamamadhyamāḥ
d yathārhaṃ tān samādāya nayanti yamasādanam
d dhārmikān uttamān viddhi svargīyās te yathāmarāḥ
d nṛṣu janma labhante ye karmaṇā madhyamāḥ smṛtāḥ
d tiryaṅnarakagantāro hy adhamās te narādhamāḥ
d panthānas trividhā dṛṣṭā sarveṣāṃ gatijīvinām
d ramaṇīyaṃ nirābādhaṃ durdarśam iti nāmataḥ
d ramaṇīyaṃ tu sanmārgaṃ patākādhvajasaṃkulam
d dhūpitaṃ siktasaṃmṛṣṭaṃ puṣpamālābhisaṃkulam
d manoharaṃ sukhasparśaṃ gacchatām eva tad bhavet
d nirābādhaṃ yathā loke supraśastaṃ tathā bhavet
d tṛtīyaṃ tat tu durdarśaṃ durgandhi tamasāvṛtam
d paruṣaṃ śarkarākīrṇaṃ śvadaṃṣṭrābahulaṃ bhṛśam
d kṛmikīṭasamākīrṇaṃ gacchatām atidurgamam
d mārgair ebhis tribhir nityam uttamādhamamadhyamān
d saṃnayanti yathā kāle tan me śṛṇu śucismite
d uttamān antakāle tu yamadūtāḥ susaṃyatāḥ
d umā
d nayanti sukham ādāya ramaṇīyapathena vai
d bhagavaṃs tatra cātmānaṃ tyaktadehaṃ nirāśrayam
d maheśvaraḥ
d adṛśyaṃ katham ādāya saṃnayanti yamāntikam
d śṛṇu bhāmini tat sarvaṃ trividhaṃ dehadhāraṇam
d karmavaśyaṃ bhogavaśyaṃ duḥkhavaśyam iti priye
d mānuṣaṃ karmavaśyaṃ syāt svargīyaṃ bhogasādhanam
d tṛtīyaṃ yātanāvaśyaṃ śarīraṃ māyayā kṛtam
d yamaloke na cānyatra dṛśyate yātanāyutam
d śarīrair yātanāvaśyair jīvam āmucya bhāmini
d nayanti yāmikās tatra prāṇino māyayā mṛtān
d madhyamān atha veṣeṇa madhyamena pathā tathā
d caṇḍālaveṣās tv adhamān gṛhītvā bhartsya tarjanaiḥ
d ākarṣantas tathā pāśair durdarśena nayanti tān
d trividhān evam ādāya nayanti yamasādanam
d dharmāsanagataṃ dakṣaṃ bhrājamānaṃ svatejasā
d lokapālaṃ sabhādhyakṣaṃ tathaiva pariṣadgatam
d darśayanti mahābhāge yāmikās tān nivedya te
d pūjayan daṇḍayan kāṃś cit teṣāṃ śṛṇvañ śubhāśubham
d vyāpṛto bahusāhasrais tatrāste satataṃ yamaḥ
d gatānāṃ tu yamas teṣām uttamān abhipūjayā
d abhisaṃgamya vidhivat pṛṣṭvā svāgatakauśalam
d prastutya satkathāṃ teṣāṃ lokaṃ saṃdiśate yamaḥ
d yamenaivam anujñātā yānti paścān triviṣṭapam
d madhyamānāṃ yamas teṣāṃ śrutvā karma yathātatham
d jāyantāṃ mānuṣeṣv eva iti saṃdiśate ca tān
d adhamān pāpasaṃyuktān yamo nāvekṣate ''gatān
d yamasya puruṣā ghorāś caṇḍālasamadarśanāḥ
d yātanā yāpayanty etāṃl lokapālasya śāsanāt
d chindantaś ca nudantaś ca prakarṣante yatas tataḥ
d krośataḥ pātayanty etān mitho garteṣv avāṅmukhān
d saṃghātinyaḥ śilāś caiṣāṃ patanti śirasi priye
d ayomukhāḥ kākabalā bhakṣayanti sudāruṇāḥ
d asipatravane ghore cārayanti tathāparān
d tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrās tathā śvānaḥ kāṃś cit tatra daśanti vai
d tatra vaitaraṇī nāma nadī grāhasamākulā
d duṣpraveśā ca ghorā ca mūtraśoṇitavāhinī
d tasyāṃ saṃmajjayanty etāṃs tṛṣitān pāyayanti tān
d āropayanti vai kāṃś cit tatra kaṇṭakaśalmalīm
d yantracakreṣu tilavat pīḍyante tatra ke cana
d aṅgāreṣu ca dahyante tathā duṣkṛtakāriṇaḥ
d kumbhīpākeṣu pacyante bharjyante saghṛteṣu vai
d pāṭyante taruvac chastraiḥ pīḍyante locanādiṣu
d bhidyante 'thāṅgaśaḥ śūlais tudyante sūkṣmasūcibhiḥ
d evaṃ tvayā kṛto doṣas tadarthaṃ daṇḍanaṃ tv idam
d vācaivaṃ ghoṣayanti sma daṇḍyamānān samantataḥ
d evaṃ te yātanāḥ prāpya śarīrair yātanāvaśaiḥ
d prasahantaś ca tad duḥkhaṃ smarantaḥ svāparādhajam
d krośantaś ca rudantaś ca na mucyante kathaṃ cana
d smarantas tatra tapyante pāpam ātmakṛtaṃ phalam
d evaṃ bahuvidhā daṇḍā bhujyante pāpakāribhiḥ
d yātanāś ca tathā bhuktvā pacyante narake punaḥ
d apare yātanā bhuktvā mucyante tatra kilbiṣāt
d pāpadoṣakṣayakarā yātanā saṃsmṛtā nṛṇām
d umā
d bahutaptaṃ yathā lohaṃ nirmalaṃ tat tathā bhavet
d bhagavaṃs te kathaṃ tatra daṇḍyante narakeṣu vai
d maheśvaraḥ
d kati te nirayā ghorāḥ kīdṛśās te maheśvara
d śṛṇu bhāmini tat sarvaṃ pañcaite narakāhvayāḥ
d bhūmer adhastād vihitā ghorā duṣkṛtakarmaṇām
d prathamaṃ rauravaṃ nāma śatayojanam āyatam
d tāvat pramāṇaṃ vistīrṇaṃ tāmasaṃ pāpapīḍitam
d bhṛśaṃ durgandhi paruṣaṃ kṛmibhir dāruṇair yutam
d atighoram anirdeśyaṃ pratikūlaṃ yatas tataḥ
d te ciraṃ tatra tiṣṭhanti na tatra śayanāsane
d kṛmibhir bhakṣyamāṇāś ca visragandhasamāyutāḥ
d evaṃpramāṇam udvignā yānti tiṣṭhanti tatra te
d yātanābhyo daśaguṇaṃ narake duḥkham iṣyate
d tatra cātyantikaṃ duḥkham iti viddhi śubhekṣaṇe
d krośantaś ca rudantaś ca vedanās tatra bhuñjate
d bhramanti duḥkhamokṣārthaṃ trātā kaś cin na vidyate
d duḥkhasyāntaramātraṃ tu dvāraṃ vā na ca labhyate
d mahārauravasaṃjñaṃ tu dvitīyaṃ narakaṃ priye
d tasmād dviguṇitaṃ viddhi māne duḥkhe ca rauravāt
d tṛtīyaṃ narakaṃ tatra kaṇṭakāvanasaṃjñitam
d tato dviguṇitaṃ taṃ ca pūrvābhyāṃ duḥkhamānayoḥ
d mahāpātakasaṃyuktā ghorās tasmin viśanti hi
d agnikuṇḍam iti khyātaṃ caturthaṃ narakaṃ priye
d etad dviguṇitaṃ tasmād yathāniṣṭasukhaṃ tathā
d tatra duḥkhaṃ hi sumahad amānuṣam iti smṛtam
d bhuñjate tatra tatraiva duḥkhaṃ duṣkṛtakāriṇaḥ
d pañcakaṣṭam iti khyātaṃ pañcamaṃ narakaṃ priye
d tatra duḥkham anirdeśyaṃ mahāghoraṃ yathātatham
d pañcendriyair asahyatvāt pañcakaṣṭam iti smṛtam
d bhuñjate tatra tatraiva duḥkhaṃ duṣkṛtakāriṇaḥ
d amānuṣārhaṃ tad duḥkhaṃ mahābhūtais tu bhujyate
d atighoraṃ ciraṃ kṛtvā mahābhūtāni yānti tam
d pañcakaṣṭena hi samaṃ nāsti duḥkhaṃ tathāvidham
d duḥkhasyāntam iti prāhuḥ pañcakaṣṭaṃ sadā priye
d evaṃ te teṣu tiṣṭhanti prāṇino duḥkhabhāginaḥ
d anye ca narakāḥ santi avīcipramukhāḥ priye
d krośantaś ca rudantaś ca vedanārtā bhṛśāturāḥ
d ke cid bhramanti veṣṭante ke cid dhāvanti cāturāḥ
d ādhāvante nivāryante śūlahastair yatas tataḥ
d rujārditās tṛṣāyuktāḥ prāṇinaḥ pāpakāriṇaḥ
d krośantaś ca nadantaś ca na mucyante kathaṃ cana
d kṛmibhir bhakṣyamāṇāś ca vedanārtās tṛṣānvitāḥ
d saṃsmarantaḥ svakaṃ karma kṛtam ātmāparādhajam
d śocantas tatra tiṣṭhanti yāvat pāpakṣayaṃ priye
d evaṃ bhuktvā tu narakaṃ mucyante pāpasaṃkṣayāt
d umā
d bhagavan katikālaṃ te tiṣṭhante narakeṣu vai
d maheśvaraḥ
d etad veditum icchāmi tan me brūhi maheśvara
d śataṃ sahasraṃ varṣāṇām ādiṃ kṛtvā hi jantavaḥ
d umā
d tiṣṭhanti narakāvāsāḥ pralayāntam iti sthitiḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d bhagavaṃs teṣu te kutra tiṣṭhantīti vada prabho
d raurave śatasāhasraṃ varṣāṇām iti saṃsthitiḥ
d mānuṣaghnāḥ kṛtaghnāś ca tathaivānṛtavādinaḥ
d jāracorāś ca nārī ca sarvataś cāpacāriṇī
d utkocakāś ca piśunā varṇasaṃbhedakārakāḥ
d tādṛśāḥ paripacyante raurave narake narāḥ
d deśaghnāś caiva rājaghnāḥ pitṛmātṛvighātinaḥ
d rājā cānyāyataḥ śāstā sākṣitve 'nṛtavādinaḥ
d bahughnāś ca kulaghnāś ca bhrūṇaghnā gurughātinaḥ
d viśvastaghātakāś caivam ātmaghnāḥ kopakāraṇāt
d patighnyaḥ pramadā mohād yajñavighnakarāś ca ye
d dvitīye dviguṇaṃ kālaṃ pacyante tādṛśāḥ narāḥ
d mahāpātakayuktās tu tṛtīye duḥkham āpnuyuḥ
d etāvan mānuṣasahaṃ param anyeṣu lakṣyate
d yakṣā vidyādharāś caiva kādraveyāś ca kiṃnarāḥ
d gandharvā bhūtasaṃghāś ca teṣāṃ pāpayutā bhṛśam
d caturthe paripacyante yāvad yugaviparyayaḥ
d sahantas tādṛśaṃ ghoraṃ pañcakaṣṭe ca yādṛśam
d tādṛgvidhasya duḥkhasya ayogyān viddhi mānuṣān
d evaṃ te narakān bhuktvā tatra kṣapitakalmaṣāḥ
d narakebhyo vimuktāś ca jāyante kṛmijātiṣu
d udbhedajeṣu vā ke cit tatrāpi kṣīṇakalmaṣāḥ
d punar eva prajāyante mṛgapakṣiṣu śobhane
d umā
d mṛgapakṣiṣu tad bhuktvā labhante mānuṣaṃ padam
d nānājātiṣu kenaiva jāyante pāpakāriṇaḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi yat tvam icchasi bhāmini
d sarvathātmā karmavaśān nānājātiṣu dṛśyate
d yaś ca māṃsapriyo nityaṃ kaṅkagṛdhrān sa saṃspṛśet
d surāpaḥ satataṃ martyaḥ sūkaratvaṃ vrajed dhruvam
d abhakṣyabhakṣaṇo martyaḥ kākajātiṣu saṃspṛśet
d parodvegakaro nityaṃ vyālajātiṣu jāyate
d ātmaghno yo naraḥ kopāt pretajātiṣu tiṣṭhati
d paiśunyāt parivādāc ca kukkuṭatvaṃ samaśnuyāt
d nāstikaś caiva yo mūrkho mṛgajātiṃ sa gacchati
d hiṃsāvihāras tu naraḥ kṛmikīṭeṣu jāyate
d atra mānayuto nityaṃ pretya gardabhatāṃ vrajet
d asatyaṃ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ yo vaden matsyatāṃ vrajet
d agamyāgamanāc caiva paradārābhimarśanāt
d mūṣikatvaṃ vrajen martyo nāsti tatra vicāraṇā
d kṛtaghno mitraghātī ca sṛgālavṛkajātiṣu
d gurughnaḥ pitṛghātī ca sthāvareṣv avatiṣṭhati
d vācikaiḥ pakṣimṛgatāṃ mānasair anyajātitām
d śarīrajaiḥ karmadoṣair yāti sthāvaratāṃ naraḥ
d evamādy aśubhaṃ kṛtvā narā nirayam āśritāḥ
d tāṃs tān bhāvān prapadyante svakṛtasyaiva kāraṇāt
d evaṃ jātiṣu nirdagdhāḥ prāṇinaḥ pāpakāriṇaḥ
d kathaṃ cit punar utpadya labhante mānuṣaṃ padam
d bahukṛtvo 'tisaṃtaptaṃ lohaṃ śucitamaṃ yathā
d bahuduḥkhābhisaṃtaptas tathātmā śudhyate malāt
d umā
d tasmāt sudurlabhaṃ ceti viddhi janma sumānuṣam
d bhagavan devadeveśa śūlapāṇe vṛṣadhvaja
d śrutaṃ me paramaṃ guhyaṃ prasādāt te varaprada
d śrotuṃ bhūyo 'ham icchāmi prajānāṃ hitakāraṇāt
d śubhāśubham iti proktaṃ karma sarvaṃ samāsataḥ
d tan me vistaraśo brūhi śubhāśubhavidhiṃ prati
d aśubhaṃ kīdṛśaṃ karma prāṇino 'dho nipātayet
d śubhaṃ karma kathaṃ deva prajānām ūrdhvato nayet
d etan me vada deveśa śrotukāmāsmi kīrtaya
d maheśvaraḥ
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi tat sarvaṃ śṛṇu śobhane
d sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ceti dvividhaḥ karmavistaraḥ
d tayor yad duṣkṛtaṃ karma tac ca saṃjāyate tridhā
d manasā karmaṇā vācā buddhimohasamudbhavam
d manaḥpūrvaṃ tu vākkarma vartate vāṅmayaṃ tataḥ
d jāyate vai kriyāyogam evaṃ ceṣṭākramaṃ priye
d abhidroho 'bhyasūyā ca parārthe cakṣuṣā spṛhā
d śubhāśubhānāṃ martyānāṃ vartanaṃ viparītataḥ
d dharmakārye yad aśraddhā pāpakarmaṇi harṣaṇam
d evamādy aśubhaṃ karma manasā pāpam ucyate
d anṛtaṃ yac ca paruṣam abaddhavacanaṃ kaṭu
d asatyaṃ parivādaś ca pāpam etat tu vāṅmayam
d agamyāgamanaṃ caiva paradāraniṣevaṇam
d vadhabandhaparikleśaiḥ paraprāṇopatāpanam
d cauryaṃ pareṣāṃ dravyāṇāṃ haraṇaṃ nāśanaṃ tathā
d abhakṣyabhakṣaṇaṃ caiva vyasaneṣv abhiṣaṅgatā
d darpāt stambhābhimānāc ca pareṣām upatāpanam
d akāryāṇāṃ ca karaṇam aśaucaṃ pānam eva ca
d dauḥśīlyaṃ kṣudrasaṃparkaḥ sāhāyyaṃ pāpakarmaṇi
d adharmyam ayaśasyaṃ ca kāryaṃ tasya niṣevaṇam
d evamādy aśubhaṃ cānyac charīraṃ pāpam ucyate
d mānasād vāṅmayaṃ pāpaṃ viśiṣṭam iti vakṣyate
d vāṅmayād api vai pāpaṃ śārīraṃ gaṇyate bahu
d evaṃ pāpayutaṃ karma pātayet trividhaṃ naram
d paropatāpajananam atyantaṃ pāpakaṃ smṛtam
d dvividhaṃ tat kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kartāraṃ narakaṃ nayet
d pātakaṃ tv api yat karma karaṇād buddhipūrvakam
d sāpadeśam avaśyaṃ tu kartavyam iti yat kṛtam
d kathaṃ cit tat kṛtam api kartā tena na lipyate
d umā
d avaśyabhāvadeśena pratihanyeta kāraṇam
d bhagavan pāpakaṃ karma yathā kṛtvā na lipyate
d maheśvaraḥ
d anṛtaṃ dharmayuktaṃ ca tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d yo naro 'naparādhī sann ātmaprāṇasya rakṣaṇāt
d śatrum udyataśastraṃ vā pūrvaṃ tena hato 'pi vā
d pratigatya naro hiṃsyān na sa pāpena lipyate
d corāṭavikasaṃtrastās tatpratīkāraceṣṭayā
d tān pratighnan naro hiṃsyān na sa pāpena lipyate
d vṛttighnaṃ tu naro hiṃsyān na sa pāpena lipyate
d grāmārthaṃ bhartṛpiṇḍārthaṃ dīnānugrahakāraṇāt
d vadhabandhaparikleśān kurvan pāpāt pramucyate
d durbhikṣe cātmavṛttyartham ekāyanagatas tathā
d akāryaṃ vāpy abhakṣyaṃ vā kṛtvā pāpair na lipyate
d vyādhito rogamokṣārtham abhakṣyeṇa na lipyate
d anṛtaṃ dharmayuktaṃ ca dākṣiṇyāt strīṣu bhāṣitam
d ātmaprāṇabhayād uktaṃ mokṣārthaṃ cāpy adhārmikāt
d vivāhakaraṇe caiva laukikenānṛtaṃ bruvan
d saṃstambhanārthaṃ trastānām anṛtena na lipyate
d vidhir eṣa gṛhasthānāṃ prāyeṇaivopadiśyate
d avācyaṃ vāpy akāryaṃ vā deśakālavaśena tu
d buddhipūrvaṃ naraḥ kurvaṃs tat prayojanamātrayā
d kiṃ cid vā lipyate pāpair atha vā na ca lipyate
d umā
d evaṃ devi vijānīhi nāsti tatra vicāraṇā
d bhagavan pānadoṣāṃś ca peyāpeyatvakāraṇam
d maheśvaraḥ
d etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tan me vada maheśvara
d hanta te kathayiṣyāmi pānotpattiṃ śucismite
d purā sarve 'bhavan martyā buddhimanto nayānugāḥ
d śucayaḥ subhagācārāḥ sarve sumanasaḥ priye
d evaṃbhūte tadā loke preṣyatvaṃ na parasparam
d preṣyābhāvān manuṣyāṇāṃ karmārambho nanāśa ha
d ubhayor lokayor nāśaṃ dṛṣṭvā karmakṣayāt prabhuḥ
d yajñakarma kathaṃ loke varteteti pitāmahaḥ
d ājñāpayat surān devi mohayasveti mānuṣān
d tamasaḥ sāram uddhṛtya pānaṃ buddhipraṇāśanam
d nyapātayan manuṣyeṣu pāpadoṣāvahaṃ priye
d tadāprabhṛti tat pītvā mumuhur mānuṣā bhuvi
d kāryākāryam ajānanto vācyāvācyaṃ guṇāguṇam
d ke cid dhasanti tat pītvā prarudanti tathā pare
d nṛtyanti muditāḥ ke cid gāyanti ca śubhāśubham
d kalahaṃ kurvate 'bhīkṣṇaṃ praharanti parasparam
d ke cid dhāvanti sahasā praskhalanti patanti ca
d ayuktaṃ bahu bhāṣante yatrakvacana śerate
d nagnā vikṣipya gātrāṇi naṣṭasaṃjñā mṛtā iva
d evaṃ bahuvidhān pāpān kurvanti hṛtacetasaḥ
d ye pibanti mahāmohaṃ pānaṃ pāpayutā narāḥ
d dhṛtiṃ lajjāṃ ca buddhiṃ ca pānaṃ pītaṃ praṇāśayet
d tasmān narāḥ saṃbhavanti nirlajjā nirapatrapāḥ
d buddhisattvaiḥ parikṣīṇās tejohīnā malānvitāḥ
d pītvā pītvā tṛṣāyuktāḥ pānapāḥ saṃbhavanti ca
d pānakāmāḥ pānakathāḥ pānakālābhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ
d pānārthaṃ karmavaśyās te saṃbhavanti narādhamāḥ
d pānakāmās tṛṣāyogād buddhisattvaparikṣayāt
d pānapānāṃ preṣyakarāḥ pānapās tv abhavan bhṛśam
d tadāprabhṛti vai loke nīcaiḥ pānavaśair naraiḥ
d kārayanti ca karmāṇi buddhimantas tv apānapāḥ
d kārutvam atha dāsatvaṃ preṣyatām etya pānapāḥ
d sarvakarmakarāś cāsan paśuvad rajjubandhitāḥ
d pānapās tu madāndhatvāt tadā buddhipraṇāśanāt
d kāryākāryasya cājñānād yatheṣṭakaraṇāt svayam
d viduṣām avidheyatvāt pāpam evābhipadyate
d paribhūto bhavel loke madyapo mitrabhedakaḥ
d sarvakālam aśuddhaś ca sarvabhakṣas tathābhavat
d viśiṣṭair jñātibhir dveṣyaḥ satataṃ kalibhāvanaḥ
d kaṭukaṃ paruṣaṃ ghoraṃ vākyaṃ vadati sarvataḥ
d gurūn ativaden mattaḥ paradārān pradharṣayet
d saṃvidaṃ kurute śauṇḍair na śṛṇoti hitaṃ kva cit
d evaṃ bahuvidhā doṣāḥ pānape santi śobhane
d kevalaṃ narakaṃ yānti nāsti tatra vicāraṇā
d tasmāt tad varjitaṃ sadbhiḥ pānam ātmahitaiṣibhiḥ
d yadi pānaṃ na varjeran santaś cāritrakāraṇāt
d bhaved evaṃ jagat sarvaṃ nirmaryādaṃ ca niṣkriyam
d tasmād buddher hi rakṣārthaṃ sadbhiḥ pānaṃ vivarjitam
d iti te duṣkṛtaṃ sarvaṃ trividhaṃ kathitaṃ priye
d maheśvaraḥ
d vidhānaṃ sukṛtasyāpi bhūyaḥ śṛṇu śucismite
d procyate tat tridhā devi sukṛta ca samāsataḥ
d yad auparamikaṃ caiva sukṛtaṃ nirupadravam
d tathaiva sopakaraṇaṃ tāvatā sukṛtaṃ viduḥ
d nivṛttiḥ pāpakarmabhyas tad auparamikaṃ priye
d manovākkāyajā doṣāḥ śṛṇu me varjanāc chubham
d traividhyadoṣoparame yas tu doṣavyapekṣayā
d sa tu prāpnoti sakalaṃ sarvaduṣkṛtavarjanāt
d vratavad varjayed doṣān yugapat pṛthag eva vā
d tathā dharmam avāpnoti doṣatyāgo hi duṣkaraḥ
d doṣasākalyasaṃtyāgān munir bhavati mānavaḥ
d saukaryaṃ paradharmasya kāryārambhād ṛte 'pi ca
d ātmanā sthāpanāmātrāl labhyate sukṛtaṃ param
d aho nṛśaṃsāḥ pacyante mānuṣāḥ svalpabuddhayaḥ
d ye tādṛśaṃ na budhyante ātmādhīnaṃ ca nirvyayam
d duṣkṛtatyāgamātreṇa padam ūrdhvaṃ hi labhyate
d pāpabhīrutvamātreṇa doṣāṇāṃ parivarjanāt
d suśobhanaṃ bhaved devi kim u dharmavyapekṣayā
d ity auparamikaṃ devi sukṛtaṃ kathitaṃ tava
d śrutāc ca vṛddhasaṃyogād indriyāṇāṃ ca nigrahāt
d saṃtoṣāc ca dhṛteś caiva śakyate doṣavarjanam
d tad eva yama ity āhur doṣasaṃyamanaṃ priye
d yamadharmeṇa dharmo 'sti nānyaḥ śubhataraḥ śubhe
d yamadharmeṇa yatayaḥ prāpnuvanty uttamāṃ gatim
d īśvarāṇāṃ prabhavatāṃ daridrāṇāṃ ca vai nṛṇām
d saphalo doṣasaṃtyāgo dānād api śubhād api
d tapo dānaṃ mahādevi doṣam alpaṃ vinirdahet
d sukṛtaṃ yāmikaṃ proktaṃ pathyaṃ nirupasādhanam
d sukhābhisaṃdhir lokānāṃ satyaṃ śaucam athārjavam
d vratopavāsaḥ prītiś ca brahmacaryaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ
d evamādi śubhaṃ karma sukṛtaṃ niyamāśritam
d śṛṇu teṣāṃ viśeṣāṃś ca kīrtayiṣyāmi bhāmini
d satyaṃ svargasya sopānaṃ pārāvārasya naur iva
d nāsti satyāt paraṃ dānaṃ nāsti satyāt paraṃ tapaḥ
d yathā śrutaṃ yathā dṛṣṭam ātmanā yad yathā kṛtam
d tathā tasyāvikāreṇa vacanaṃ satyalakṣaṇam
d yac chalenābhisaṃyuktaṃ satyarūpaṃ mṛṣaiva tat
d nityam eva pravaktavyaṃ pārāvaryaṃ vijānatā
d dīrghāyuś ca bhavet satyāt kulasaṃtānapālakaḥ
d lokasaṃsthitipālaś ca bhavet satyena mānavaḥ
d umā
d maheśvaraḥ
d kathaṃ saṃdhārayan martyo vrataṃ śubham avāpnuyāt
d pūrvam uktaṃ tu yat pāpaṃ manovākkāyakarmabhiḥ
d vratavat tasya saṃtyāgas tad auparamikaṃ vratam
d tena dharmam avāpnoti vratavat paripālayan
d maṅgalaṃ śubhakarmāṇi vratenaiva samācaret
d naro dharmam avāpnoti śubhasaṃjoṣaṇaṃ vratam
d yad yad ātmapriyaṃ nityaṃ manovākkāyakarmabhiḥ
d vratavat tasya saṃtyāgas tapovratam iti sthitam
d tyājyaṃ vā yadi vā joṣyam avratena vṛthā caran
d tathā phalaṃ na labhate tasmād dharmaṃ vratāc caret
d śuddhakāyo naro bhūtvā snātvā tīrthe yathāvidhi
d pañca bhūtāni candrārkau saṃdhye dharmaṃ yamaṃ pitṝn
d ātmanaivaṃ tathātmānaṃ nivedya vratavac caret
d vratamā maraṇād vāpi kālacchedena vā caret
d śākādiṣu vrataṃ kuryāt tathā puṣpaphalādiṣu
d brahmacaryaṃ vrataṃ kuryād upavāsaṃ tathā vratam
d evam anyeṣu bahuṣu vrataṃ kāryaṃ hitaiṣiṇā
d vratabhaṅgo yathā na syād rakṣitavyaṃ tathā budhaiḥ
d vratabhaṅgo mahat pāpam iti viddhi śubhekṣaṇe
d auṣadhārthaṃ yad ajñānād gurūṇāṃ vacanād api
d anugrahārthaṃ bandhūnāṃ vratabhaṅgo na duṣyate
d vratāpavargakāleṣu devabrāhmaṇapūjanam
d umā
d nareṇa tu yathāśakti kāryaṃ siddhiṃ tathāpnuyāt
d maheśvaraḥ
d kathaṃ śaucavidhis tatra tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d bāhyam ābhyantaraṃ ceti dvividhaṃ śaucam iṣyate
d mānasaṃ sukṛtaṃ yat tac chaucam ābhyantaraṃ smṛtam
d sadāhāraviśuddhiś ca kāyaprakṣālanaṃ ca yat
d bāhyaṃ śaucaṃ bhaved etat tathaivācamanādi ca
d mṛc caiva śuddhadeśasthā gośakṛnmūtram eva ca
d dravyāṇi gandhayuktāni yāni puṣṭikarāṇi ca
d etaiḥ saṃmārjayet kāyam ambhasā ca punaḥ punaḥ
d akṣobhyaṃ yat prakīrṇaṃ ca nityasrotaś ca yaj jalam
d prāyaśas tādṛśe majjed anyathā cāpi varjayet
d trir ācamanakaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ niṣphenair nirmalair jalaiḥ
d tathā viṇmūtrayoḥ śuddhir adbhir bahumṛdā bhavet
d tadaiva jalasaṃśuddhir yat saṃśuddhaṃ tu saṃspṛśet
d śakṛtā bhūmiśuddhiḥ syāl lohānāṃ bhasmanā smṛtā
d takṣaṇaṃ gharṣaṇaṃ caiva dāravāṇāṃ viśodhanam
d dahanaṃ mṛnmayānāṃ ca martyānāṃ kṛcchradhāraṇam
d śeṣāṇāṃ devi sarveṣām ātapena jalena ca
d brāhmaṇānāṃ ca vākyena sadā saṃśodhanaṃ bhavet
d aduṣṭam adbhir nirṇiktaṃ yac ca vācā praśasyate
d evam āpadi saṃśuddhir evaṃ śaucaṃ vidhīyate
d umā
d maheśvaraḥ
d āhāraśuddhis tu kathaṃ tan me vada mahāprabho
d amāṃsamadyam akledyam aparyuṣitam eva ca
d atikaṭvamlalavaṇair hīnaṃ ca śubhagandhi ca
d kṛmikīṭamalair hīnaṃ saṃbhṛtaṃ śuddhabhājane
d evaṃvidhaṃ sadāhāraṃ devabrāhmaṇasatkṛtam
d śuddham ity eva vijñeyam anyathā tv aśubhaṃ bhavet
d grāmyād āraṇyakaiḥ siddhaṃ śuddham ity avadhāraya
d atimātragṛhītāt tu alpadattaṃ bhavec chuci
d yajñaśeṣaṃ haviḥśeṣaṃ pitṛśeṣaṃ ca nirmalam
d umā
d iti te kathitaṃ devi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
d bhakṣayanty apare māṃsaṃ varjayanty apare bhuvi
d maheśvaraḥ
d tan me vada mahādeva bhakṣyābhakṣyasya kāraṇam
d māṃsasya bhakṣaṇe doṣo yaś cāsyābhakṣaṇe guṇaḥ
d tad ahaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi tan nibodha yathātatham
d iṣṭaṃ dattam adhītaṃ ca kratavaś ca sadakṣiṇāḥ
d amāṃsabhakṣaṇasyaite kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm
d ātmārthaṃ yaḥ paraprāṇān hiṃsyāt svāduphalepsayā
d vyālagṛdhrasṛgālaiś ca rākṣasaiś ca samas tu saḥ
d yo vṛthānityamāṃsāśī sa pumān adhamo bhavet
d tataḥ kaṣṭataraṃ nāsti svayam āhṛtya bhakṣaṇāt
d svamāṃsaṃ paramāṃsena yo vardhayitum icchati
d udvignavāsaṃ labhate yatra yatropajāyate
d saṃchedanaṃ svamāṃsasya yathā saṃjanayed rujam
d tathaiva paramāṃse 'pi veditavyaṃ vijānatā
d yas tu sarvāṇi māṃsāni yāvajjīvaṃ na bhakṣayet
d sa svarge vipulaṃ sthānaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ
d yas tu varṣaśataṃ pūrṇaṃ tapyate paramaṃ tapaḥ
d yaś cāpi varjayen māṃsaṃ samam etan na vā samam
d na hi prāṇaiḥ priyatamaṃ loke kiṃ cana vidyate
d tasmāt prāṇidayā kāryā yathātmani tathā pare
d sarve yajñā na tat kuryuḥ sarve vedāś ca bhāmini
d yan māṃsarasam āsvādya punar māṃsāni varjayet
d dharmyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargyaṃ svastyayanaṃ mahat
d ity evaṃ munayaḥ prāhur māṃsasyābhakṣaṇe guṇān
d evaṃ bahuguṇaṃ devi nṛṇāṃ māṃsavivarjanam
d na śaknuyād yadā jīvaṃs tyaktuṃ māṃsaṃ kathaṃ cana
d tripuṇyamāsamātraṃ vā varjanīyaṃ viśeṣataḥ
d na śaknuyād api tathā kaumudīmāsam eva ca
d janmanakṣatratithiṣu sadā parvasu rātriṣu
d varjanīyaṃ tathā māṃsaṃ paratra hitam icchatā
d aśaktaḥ kāraṇān martyo bhoktum icched vidhiṃ śṛṇu
d anena vidhinā khādan kalmaṣeṇa na lipyate
d sūnāyāṃ ca gataprāṇaṃ krītvā nyāyena bhāmini
d brāhmaṇātithipūjārthaṃ bhoktavyaṃ hitam icchatā
d bhaiṣajyakāraṇād vyādhau khādan pāpair na lipyate
d pitṛśeṣaṃ tathaivāśnan māṃsaṃ nāśubham ṛcchati
d umā
d maheśvaraḥ
d gurupūjā kathaṃ deva kriyate dharmakāṅkṣibhiḥ
d gurupūjāṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvat tava śobhane
d kṛtajñānāṃ paro dharma iti vedānuśāsanam
d tasmāt svaguravaḥ pūjyās te hi pūrvopakāriṇaḥ
d gurūṇāṃ ca garīyāṃsas trayo lokeṣu pūjitāḥ
d upādhyāyaḥ pitā mātā saṃpūjyās te viśeṣataḥ
d ye pitṛbhrātaro jyeṣṭhā ye ca tasyānujās tathā
d pituḥ pitā ca sarve te pūjanīyā yathā pitā
d mātur yā bhaginī jyeṣṭhā mātur yā ca yavīyasī
d mātāmahī ca dhātrī ca sarvās tā mātaraḥ smṛtāḥ
d upādhyāyasya yaḥ putro yaś ca tasya bhaved guruḥ
d ṛtvig guruḥ pitā ceti guravaḥ parikīrtitāḥ
d jyeṣṭho bhrātā narendraś ca mātulaḥ śvaśuras tathā
d bhayatrātā ca bhartā ca guravas te prakīrtitāḥ
d ity eṣa kathitaḥ svargyo gurūṇāṃ sarvasaṃgrahaḥ
d anuvṛttiṃ ca pūjāṃ ca teṣām api nibodha me
d avadhyau mātṛpitarau upādhyāyas tathaiva ca
d kathaṃ cin nāvamantavyā nareṇa hitam icchatā
d yena prīṇāti ca pitā tena prītaḥ prajāpatiḥ
d yena prīṇāti cen mātā prītāḥ syur devamātaraḥ
d yena prīṇāty upādhyāyo brahmā tenābhipūjitaḥ
d aprīteṣu punas teṣu naro narakam eti hi
d gurūṇāṃ vairanirbandho na kartavyaḥ kathaṃ cana
d narakaṃ sa guruprītyā manasāpi na gacchati
d na brūyād vipriyaṃ teṣām aniṣṭe na pravartayet
d vigṛhya na vadet teṣāṃ samīpe spardhayā kva cit
d yad yad icchanti te kartum asvatantras tad ācaret
d vedānuśāsanasamaṃ guruśāsanam iṣyate
d kalahāṃś ca vivādāṃś ca gurubhiḥ saha varjayet
d kaitavaṃ parihāsāṃś ca manyukāmāśrayāḥ kathāḥ
d gurūṇāṃ yo 'nahaṃvādī karoty ājñām atandritaḥ
d na tasmāt sarvamartyeṣu vidyate puṇyakṛttamaḥ
d asūyām apavādāṃś ca gurūṇāṃ parivarjayet
d teṣāṃ priyahitānveṣī bhūtvā paricaret sadā
d na tad yajñaphalaṃ kuryāt tapo vācaritaṃ mahat
d yat kuryāt puruṣasyeha gurupūjā sadā kṛtā
d anuvṛtter vinā dharmo nāsti sarvāśrameṣv api
d tasmāt samādṛtaḥ kāle guruvṛttiṃ samācaret
d svam arthaṃ svaśarīraṃ ca gurvarthaṃ saṃtyajed budhaḥ
d vivādaṃ dhanahetor vā mohād vā tair na rocayet
d brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca dānāni vividhāni ca
d gurubhiḥ pratiṣiddhasya sarvam etad apārthakam
d upādhyāyaṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca
d ye 'bhidruhyur manasā karmaṇā vā
d teṣāṃ pāpaṃ bhrūṇahatyāviśiṣṭaṃ
d tebhyo nānyaḥ pāpakṛd asti loke
d umā
d maheśvaraḥ
d upavāsavidhiṃ tatra tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d śarīramalakārśyārtham indriyocchoṣaṇāya ca
d ekabhuktopavāsais tu dhārayante vrataṃ narāḥ
d labhante vipulaṃ dharmaṃ tathāhāraparikṣayāt
d bahūnām uparodhaṃ tu na kuryād ātmakāraṇāt
d jīvopaghātaṃ ca tathā dhānyaṃ saṃjīvyam iṣyate
d tasmāt puṇyaṃ labhen martyaḥ svayam āhārakarśanāt
d tad gṛhasthair yathāśakti kartavyam iti niścayaḥ
d upavāsārdite kāya āpadarthaṃ payo jalam
d umā
d bhuñjan na vrataghātī syād brāhmaṇān anumānya ca
d brahmacaryaṃ kathaṃ deva rakṣitavyaṃ vijānatā
d maheśvaraḥ
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
d brahmacaryaṃ paraṃ śaucaṃ brahmacaryaṃ paraṃ tapaḥ
d kevalaṃ brahmacaryeṇa prāpyate paramaṃ padam
d saṃkalpād darśanāc caiva tad yuktavacanād api
d saṃsparśād atha saṃyogāt pañcadhā rakṣitaṃ param
d vratavad dhāritaṃ caiva brahmacaryam akalmaṣam
d nityasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ tasya naiṣṭhikānāṃ vidhīyate
d tad iṣyate gṛhasthānāṃ kālam uddiśya kāraṇam
d janmanakṣatrayogeṣu puṇyavāseṣu parvasu
d devatādharmakāryeṣu brahmacaryavrataṃ caret
d brahmacaryavrataphalaṃ labhed dāravratī sadā
d śaucam āyus tathārogyaṃ labhyate brahmacāribhiḥ
d umā
d tīrthacaryā kathaṃ deva kriyate dharmakāṅkṣibhiḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d kāni tīrthāni lokeśa tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d hanta te kathayiṣyāmi tīrthasnānavidhiṃ priye
d pāvanārthaṃ ca śaucārthaṃ brahmaṇā nirmitāḥ purā
d yās tu loke mahānadyas tāḥ sarvās tīrthasaṃjñitāḥ
d tāsāṃ prāk srotasaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ saṃgamaś ca parasparam
d tāsāṃ sāgarasaṃyogo variṣṭhaś ceti vidyate
d tāsām ubhayataḥ kūlaṃ yatra tatra maharṣibhiḥ
d devair vā sevitaṃ devi tat tīrthaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam
d samudraś ca mahātīrthaṃ pāvanaṃ paramaṃ śubham
d tasya kūlagatās tīrthā mahadbhiś ca samāplutāḥ
d srotasāṃ parvatānāṃ ca joṣitānāṃ maharṣibhiḥ
d api kūpataṭākaṃ vā munibhiḥ sevitaṃ priye
d tat tu tīrtham iti jñeyaṃ prabhāvāt tu tapasvinām
d tadāprabhṛti tīrthatvaṃ lebhe lokahitāya vai
d evaṃ tīrthodbhavaṃ viddhi tasya snānavidhiṃ śṛṇu
d tanmanā vratabhūyiṣṭho gatvā tīrthābhikāṅkṣayā
d upavāsatrayaṃ kuryād ekaṃ vā niyamānvitaḥ
d puṇyamāsayute kāle paurṇamāsyāṃ yathāvidhi
d bahir eva śucir bhūtvā tat tīrthaṃ tanmanāviśet
d trir āplutya jalābhyāśe dattvā brāhmaṇadakṣiṇām
d abhyarcya devāyatanaṃ tataḥ prāyād yathāgatam
d etad vidhānaṃ sarveṣāṃ tīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ prati priye
d samīpatīrthasnānāt tu dūratīrthaṃ supūjitam
d ādiprabhṛti śuddhasya tīrthasnānaṃ śubhaṃ bhavet
d taporthaṃ pāpanāśārthaṃ śaucārthaṃ tīrthagāhanam
d evaṃ puṇyeṣu māseṣu tīrthasnānaṃ śubhaṃ bhavet
d maheśvaraḥ
d etan naiyamikaṃ sarvaṃ sukṛtaṃ kathitaṃ tava
d dānāni devapūjāṃ ca pitṛpūjāṃ tathaiva ca
d anyāni dharmakāryāṇi sukṛtaṃ sopasādhanam
d tat sarvaṃ śṛṇu kalyāṇi prajānāṃ hitakāmyayā
d cetanācetanair yuktaṃ yal loke vidyate dhanam
d umā
d etad artham avāpnoti naraḥ pretya śubhekṣaṇe
d lokasiddhaṃ tu yad dravyaṃ sarvasādhāraṇaṃ bhavet
d tad dadat sarvasāmānyaṃ kathaṃ dharmaṃ labhen naraḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d evaṃ sādhāraṇe dravye kasya svatvaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
d loke bhūtamayaṃ dravyaṃ sarvasādhāraṇaṃ tathā
d yathaiva tad dadan martyo bhavet puṇyaṃ hi tac chṛṇu
d dātā pratigrahītā ca deyaṃ sopakramaṃ tathā
d deśakālau ca yat tv etad dānaṃ ṣaḍguṇam ucyate
d teṣāṃ saṃpadviśeṣāṃś ca kīrtyamānān nibodha me
d ādiprabhṛti yaḥ śuddho manovākkāyakarmabhiḥ
d satyavādī jitakrodhas tv alubdho nānasūyakaḥ
d śraddhāvān āstikaś caiva evaṃ dātā praśasyate
d śuddho dānto jitakrodhas tathoditakulodbhavaḥ
d śrutacāritrasaṃpannas tathā bahukalatravān
d pañcayajñaparo nityaṃ nirvikāraśarīravān
d etān pātraguṇān viddhi tādṛk pātraṃ praśasyate
d pitṛdevāgnikāryeṣu tasya dattaṃ mahat phalam
d yad yad arhati yo loke pātraṃ tasya bhavec ca saḥ
d mucyetāpadam āpanno yena pātraṃ sa tasya tu
d annasya kṣudhitaḥ pātraṃ tṛṣitas tu jalasya vai
d evaṃ pātreṣu nānātvam iṣyate puruṣaṃ prati
d jāraś coraś ca ṣaṇḍaś ca hiṃsraḥ samayabhedakaḥ
d lokavighnakarāś cānye varjitāḥ sarvaśaḥ priye
d paropaghātād yad dravyaṃ cauryād vā labhyate nṛbhiḥ
d nindayā labhyate yac ca dhūrtabhāvena vā tathā
d adharmād atha mohād vā bahūnām uparodhanāt
d labhyate yad dhanaṃ devi tad anyad vā hṛtaṃ bhavet
d tādṛśena kṛtaṃ dharmaṃ niṣphalaṃ viddhi bhāmini
d tasmān nyāyāgatenaiva dātavyaṃ śubham icchatā
d yad yad ātmapriyaṃ nityaṃ tat tad deyam iti sthitiḥ
d upakramam imaṃ viddhi dātṝṇāṃ paramaṃ hitam
d pātrabhūtaṃ tu dūrastham abhigamya prasādya ca
d dātā dānaṃ tathā dadyād yathā tuṣyeta tena saḥ
d eṣa dānavidhiḥ śreṣṭhaḥ samāhūya tu madhyamaḥ
d pūrvaṃ ca pātratāṃ jñātvā samāhūya nivedya ca
d śaucārcanasamāyuktaṃ dātavyaṃ śraddhayā priye
d yācitṝṇāṃ tu paramam ābhimukhyapuraskṛtam
d saṃmānapūrvaṃ saṃgṛhya dātavyaṃ deśakālayoḥ
d apātrebhyo 'pi cānyebhyo dātavyaṃ bhūtim icchatā
d pātrāṇi saṃparīkṣyaiva dātā vai dānamātrayoḥ
d atiśaktyā paraṃ dānaṃ yathāśakti tu madhyamam
d tṛtīyaṃ cāparaṃ dānaṃ nānurūpam ivātmanaḥ
d yathāsaṃbhāvitaṃ pūrvaṃ dātavyaṃ tat tathaiva ca
d puṇyakṣetreṣu yad dattaṃ puṇyakāleṣu vā tathā
d umā
d tac chobhanataraṃ viddhi gauravād deśakālayoḥ
d yaś ca puṇyatamo deśas tathā kālaś ca śaṃsa me
d maheśvaraḥ
d kurukṣetraṃ mahānadyo yac ca devarṣisevitam
d girir varaś ca tīrthāni deśabhāgena pūjitāḥ
d grahītur īpsito yaś ca tatra dattaṃ mahat phalam
d śaradvasantakālaś ca puṇyamāsas tathaiva ca
d śuklapakṣaś ca pakṣāṇāṃ paurṇamāsī ca parvasu
d pitṛdaivatanakṣatraṃ nirmalā divasās tathā
d tac chobhanataraṃ viddhi candrasūryagrahaṃ tathā
d pratigrahītur yaḥ kālo manasā kīrtitaḥ śubhe
d evamādiṣu kāleṣu dattaṃ dānaṃ mahad bhavet
d dātā deyaṃ ca pātraṃ ca upakramayutā kriyā
d deśaḥ kālaś ca ity eṣāṃ saṃpacchuddhiḥ prakīrtitā
d yatraiva yugapat saṃpat tatra śuddhir mahad bhavet
d atyalpam api yad dānam ebhiḥ ṣaḍbhir guṇair yutam
d bhūtvānantaṃ nayet svargaṃ dātāraṃ doṣavarjitam
d sumahad vāpi yad dānaṃ guṇair ebhir vinākṛtam
d umā
d atyalpaphalaniryogam aphalaṃ vā bhaved dhi tat
d evaṃ guṇayutaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ tv aphalatāṃ vrajet
d maheśvaraḥ
d tad asti cen mahādeva tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d tad apy asti mahābhāge narāṇāṃ bhavadoṣataḥ
d kṛtvā tu dharmaṃ vidhivat paścāttāpaṃ karoti cet
d ślāghayā vā yadi brūyād vṛthā saṃsadi yat kṛtam
d prakalpayec ca manasā tatphalaṃ pretyabhāvataḥ
d dharmakāryaṃ kṛtaṃ yac ca satataṃ phalakāṅkṣayā
d evaṃ kṛtaṃ vā dattaṃ vā paratra viphalaṃ bhavet
d ete doṣā vivarjyāś ca dātṛbhiḥ puṇyakāṅkṣibhiḥ
d sanātanam idaṃ vṛttaṃ sadbhir ācaritaṃ tathā
d anugrahaḥ pareṣāṃ tu gṛhasthānām ṛṇaṃ hi tat
d ity evaṃ mana āveśya dātavyaṃ satataṃ budhaiḥ
d evam eva kṛtaṃ nityaṃ sukṛtaṃ tad bhaven mahat
d umā
d sarvasādhāraṇaṃ dravyam evaṃ dattvā mahat phalam
d bhagavan kāni deyāni dharmam uddiśya mānavaiḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d tāny ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d ajasraṃ dharmakāryaṃ ca tathā naimittikaṃ priye
d annaṃ pratiśrayo dīpaḥ pānīyaṃ tṛṇam indhanam
d sneho gandhaś ca bhaiṣajyaṃ tilāś ca lavaṇaṃ tathā
d evamādi tathānyac ca dānam ājasram ucyate
d ajasradānāt satatam ājasram iti niścitam
d sāmānyaṃ sarvavarṇānāṃ dānaṃ śṛṇu samāhitā
d annaṃ prāṇā manuṣyāṇām annadaḥ prāṇado bhavet
d tasmād annaṃ viśeṣeṇa dātum icchanti mānavāḥ
d brāhmaṇāyābhirūpāya yo dadyād annam īpsitam
d nidadhāti nidhiṃ śreṣṭhaṃ so 'nantaṃ pāralaukikam
d śrāntam adhvapariśrāntam atithiṃ gṛham āgatam
d arcayīta prayatnena sa hi yajño varaḥ smṛtaḥ
d kṛtvā tu pāpakaṃ karma yo dadyād annam arthinām
d brāhmaṇānāṃ viśeṣeṇa so 'pahanti svakaṃ tamaḥ
d pitaras tasya nandanti suvṛṣṭyā karṣakā iva
d putro vā yasya pautro vā śrotriyān bhojayiṣyati
d api caṇḍālaśūdrāṇām annadānān na garhyate
d tasmāt sarvaprayatnena dadyād annam amatsaraḥ
d kalatraṃ pīḍayitvāpi poṣayed atithīn sadā
d janmāpi mānuṣe loke tadarthaṃ hi vidhīyate
d annadānāc ca ye lokās tān pravakṣyāmy anindite
d bhavanāni prakāśante divi teṣāṃ mahātmanām
d anekaśatabhaumāni sāntarjalavanāni ca
d vaiḍūryārciḥprakāśāni rukmarūpyanibhāni ca
d nānāsaṃsthānarūpāṇi nānāratnamayāni ca
d candramaṇḍalaśubhrāṇi kiṅkiṇījālavanti ca
d taruṇādityavarṇāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
d yatheṣṭabhakṣyabhojyāni śayanāsanavanti ca
d sarvakāmaphalāś cātra vṛkṣā bhavanasaṃsthitāḥ
d vāpyo bahvyaś ca kūpāś ca dīrghikāś ca sahasraśaḥ
d arujāni viśokāni nityāni vividhāni ca
d bhavanāni viviktāni prāṇadānāṃ triviṣṭape
d vivasvataś ca somasya brahmaṇaś ca prajāpateḥ
d viśanti lokāṃs te nityaṃ jagaty annodakapradāḥ
d tatra te suciraṃ kālaṃ vihṛtyāpsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
d jāyante mānuṣe loke sarvakalyāṇasaṃyutāḥ
d balasaṃhananopetā nīrogāś cirajīvinaḥ
d kulīnā matimantaś ca bhavanty annapradā narāḥ
d tasmād annaṃ viśeṣeṇa dātavyaṃ bhūtim icchatā
d sarvakālaṃ ca sarvasya sarvatra ca sadaiva ca
d suvarṇadānaṃ paramaṃ svargyaṃ svastyayanaṃ mahat
d tasmāt tad varṇayiṣyāmi yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ
d api pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ krūraṃ dattaṃ rukmaṃ praṇāśayet
d suvarṇaṃ ye prayacchanti śrotriyebhyaḥ sucetasaḥ
d devatās te tarpayanti samastā iti vaidikam
d agnir hi devatāḥ sarvāḥ suvarṇaṃ cāgnir ucyate
d tasmāt suvarṇadānena dattāḥ syuḥ sarvadevatāḥ
d agnyabhāve tu kurvanti vahnisthāneṣu kāñcanam
d tasmāt suvarṇadātāraḥ sarvān kāmān avāpnuyuḥ
d ādityasya hutāśasya lokān nānāvidhāñ śubhān
d kāñcanaṃ saṃpradāyāśu praviśanti na saṃśayaḥ
d alaṃkārakṛtaṃ cāpi kevalāt praviśiṣyate
d sauvarṇair brāhmaṇān kāle tair alaṃkṛtya bhojayet
d etat paramakaṃ dānaṃ dattvāsau varṇam adbhutam
d dyutiṃ medhāṃ vapuḥ kīrtiṃ punar jāte labhed dhruvam
d tasmāt svaśaktyā dātavyaṃ kāñcanaṃ bhuvi mānavaiḥ
d na hy etasmāt paraṃ lokeṣv anyat pāvanam ucyate
d ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi gavāṃ dānam anindite
d na hi gobhyaḥ paraṃ dānaṃ vidyate jagati priye
d lokān sisṛkṣuṇā pūrvaṃ gāvaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
d vṛttyarthaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tasmāt tā mātaraḥ smṛtāḥ
d lokajyeṣṭhā lokavṛttyāṃ pravṛttā
d mayy āyattāḥ somaviṣyandabhūtāḥ
d saumyāḥ puṇyāḥ kāmadāḥ prāṇadāś ca
d tasmāt pūjyāḥ puṇyakāmair manuṣyaiḥ
d dhenuṃ hi dattvā nibhṛtām arogāṃ
d kalyāṇavatsāṃ ca payasvinīṃ ca
d yāvanti lomāni bhavanti tasyās
d tāvat samāḥ svargaphalāni bhuṅkte
d prayacchate yaḥ kapilāṃ sacelāṃ
d kāṃsyopadohāṃ kanakāgraśṛṅgīm
d putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś ca kulaṃ ca sarvam
d āsaptamaṃ tārayate paratra
d antarjātāḥ krītakā dyūtalabdhāḥ
d prāṇakrītāḥ sodakāś caujasā vā
d kṛcchrotsṛṣṭāḥ poṣaṇārthāgatāś ca
d dvārair etais tāḥ pralabdhāḥ pradadyāt
d kṛśāya bahuputrāya śrotriyāyāhitāgnaye
d pradāya nīrujāṃ dhenuṃ lokān prāpnoty anuttamān
d nṛśaṃsasya kṛtaghnasya lubdhasyānṛtavādinaḥ
d havyakavyavyapetasya na dadyād gāḥ kathaṃ cana
d samānavatsāṃ yo dadyād dhenuṃ vipre payasvinīm
d suvastrāṃ vastrasaṃdānāṃ somaloke mahīyate
d samānavatsāṃ yo dhenuṃ kṛṣṇāṃ dadyāt payasvinīm
d suvṛttāṃ vastrasaṃdānāṃ lokān prāpnoty apāṃ pateḥ
d samānavatsāṃ yo dhenuṃ dadyād gaurīṃ payasvinīm
d suvṛttāṃ vastrasaṃdānām agniloke mahīyate
d hiraṇyavarṇāṃ piṅgākṣīṃ savatsāṃ kāṃsyadohanām
d pradāya vastrasaṃdānāṃ yāti kauberasadma saḥ
d vāyureṇusavarṇāṃ tu savatsāṃ kāṃsyadohanām
d pradāya vastrasaṃdānāṃ vāyuloke mahīyate
d yuvānaṃ balinaṃ śyāmaṃ śatena saha yūthapam
d gavendraṃ brāhmaṇendrāya bhūriśṛṅgam alaṃkṛtam
d ṛṣabhaṃ ye prayacchanti śrotriyāṇāṃ mahātmanām
d aiśvaryam abhijāyante jāyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
d gavāṃ mūtrapurīṣāṇi nodvijeta kadā cana
d na cāsāṃ māṃsam aśnīyād goṣu bhaktaḥ sadā bhavet
d grāsamuṣṭiṃ paragave dadyāt saṃvatsaraṃ śuciḥ
d akṛtvā svayam āhāraṃ vrataṃ tat sārvakāmikam
d gavām ubhayataḥkāle nityaṃ svastyayanaṃ vadet
d na cāsāṃ cintayet pāpam iti dharmavido viduḥ
d gāvaḥ pavitraṃ paramaṃ goṣu lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
d kathaṃ cin nāvamantavyā gāvo lokasya mātaraḥ
d tasmād eva gavāṃ dānaṃ viśiṣṭam iti kathyate
d goṣu pūjā ca bhaktiś ca narasyāyuṣyam āvahet
d ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi bhūmidānaṃ mahāphalam
d bhūmidānasamaṃ dānaṃ na kilāstīti niścayaḥ
d gṛhayuk kṣetrayug vāpi bhūmibhāgaḥ pradīyate
d sukhabhogyaṃ nirākrośaṃ vāstupūrvaṃ prakalpya ca
d grahītāram alaṃkṛtya vastrapuṣpānulepanaiḥ
d sabhṛtyaṃ saparīvāraṃ bhojayitvā yatheṣṭataḥ
d yo dadyād dakṣiṇākāle trir adbhir gṛhyatām iti
d evaṃ bhūmyāṃ pradattāyāṃ śraddhayā vītamatsaraiḥ
d yāvat tiṣṭhati sā bhūmis tāvat tasya phalaṃ viduḥ
d bhūmidaḥ svargam āruhya ramate śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
d acalā hy akṣayā bhūmiḥ sarvān kāmān dudhukṣati
d yad yac ca kurute pāpaṃ puruṣo vṛttikarśitaḥ
d api gokarṇamātreṇa bhūmidānena mucyate
d suvarṇarajataṃ vastraṃ maṇimuktāvasūni ca
d sarvam etan mahāprājñe bhūmidāne pratiṣṭhitam
d bhartur niḥśreyase yuktās tyaktātmāno raṇe hatāḥ
d brahmalokāya saṃsiddhā nātikrāmanti bhūmidam
d halakṛṣṭāṃ mahīṃ dadyād yaḥ sabījaphalānvitām
d sakūpaśaraṇāṃ vāpi sā bhavet sarvakāmadā
d niṣpannasasyāṃ pṛthivīṃ yo dadāti dvijanmanām
d vimuktaḥ kaluṣaiḥ sarvaiḥ śakralokaṃ sa gacchati
d yathā janitrī kṣīreṇa svaputram abhivardhayet
d evaṃ sarvaphalair bhūmir dātāram abhivardhayet
d brāhmaṇaṃ vṛttasaṃpannam āhitāgniṃ śucivratam
d grāhayitvā nijāṃ bhūmiṃ na yāti yamasādanam
d yathā candramaso vṛddhir ahany ahani dṛśyate
d tathā bhūmikṛtaṃ dānaṃ sasye sasye vivardhate
d yathā bījāni rohanti prakīrṇāni mahītale
d tathā kāmāḥ prarohanti bhūmidānaguṇārjitāḥ
d pitaraḥ pitṛlokasthā devatāś ca divi sthitāḥ
d saṃtarpayanti bhogais taṃ yo dadāti vasuṃdharām
d dīrghāyuṣṭvam arogatvaṃ sphītāṃ ca śriyam uttamām
d paratra labhate martyaḥ saṃpradāya vasuṃdharām
d etat sarvaṃ mayoddiṣṭaṃ bhūmidānasya yat phalam
d śraddadhānair narair nityaṃ śrāvyam etat sanātanam
d ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi kanyādānaṃ yathāvidhi
d kanyā deyā tathā devi pareṣām ātmano 'pi vā
d kanyāṃ śuddhavratācārāṃ kularūpasamanvitām
d yasmai ditsati pātrāya tenāpi bhṛśakāmitām
d prathamaṃ tat samākalpya bandhubhiḥ kṛtaniścayam
d kārayitvā gṛhaṃ pūrvaṃ dāsīdāsaparicchadaiḥ
d gṛhopakaraṇaṃ caiva śuddhadhānyena saṃyutam
d dārārthine tadarhāya kanyāṃ tāṃ samalaṃkṛtām
d savivāhaṃ yathānyāyaṃ prayacched agnisākṣikam
d vṛttyāyatiṃ tathā kṛtvā sadgṛhe tau niveśayet
d evaṃ kṛtvā vadhūdānaṃ tasya dānasya gauravāt
d pretyabhāve mahīyeta svargaloke yathāsukham
d punarjātau ca saubhāgyaṃ kulavṛddhiṃ tathāpnuyāt
d vidyādānaṃ tathā devi pātrabhūtāya vai dadat
d pretyabhāve labhen martyo medhāṃ vṛddhiṃ dhṛtiṃ smṛtim
d anurūpāya śiṣyāya svāṃ vidyāṃ yaḥ prayacchati
d yathoktam asya dānasya phalam ānantyam ucyate
d dāpanaṃ tv atha vidyānāṃ daridrebhyo 'rthavetanaiḥ
d svayaṃdattena tulyaṃ syād iti viddhi śubhānane
d evaṃ te kathitāny eva mahādānāni bhāmini
d tvatpriyārthaṃ mahādevi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
d umā
d bhagavan devadeveśa kathaṃ deyaṃ tilānvitam
d maheśvaraḥ
d tasya tasya phalaṃ brūhi dattasya ca kṛtasya ca
d tilakalpavidhiṃ devi tvaṃ me śṛṇu samāhitā
d samṛddhair asamṛddhair vā tilā deyā viśeṣataḥ
d tilāḥ pavitrāḥ pāpaghnāḥ supuṇyā iti saṃsmṛtāḥ
d nyāyatas tu tilāñ śuddhān saṃbhṛtyātha svaśaktitaḥ
d tilarāśiṃ punaḥ kuryāt parvatābhaṃ saratnakam
d mahāntaṃ yadi vā stokaṃ nānādravyasamāyutam
d suvarṇarajatābhyāṃ ca maṇimuktāpravālakaiḥ
d alaṃkṛtya yathāyogaṃ sapatākaṃ savedikam
d sabhūṣaṇaṃ savastraṃ ca śayanāsanasaṃyutam
d prāyaśaḥ kaumudīmāse paurṇamāsyāṃ viśeṣataḥ
d bhojayitvā ca vidhivad brāhmaṇān arhato bahūn
d svayaṃ kṛtvopavāsaṃ ca vṛttaśaucasamanvitaḥ
d dadyāt pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tilarāśiṃ sadakṣiṇam
d ekasya vā bahūnāṃ vā dātavyaṃ bhūtim icchatā
d tasya dānaphalaṃ devi agniṣṭomena saṃmitam
d kevalaṃ vā tilair eva bhūmau kṛtvā gavākṛtim
d saratnakaṃ savastraṃ ca puṃsā godānakāṅkṣiṇā
d tad arhāya pradātavyaṃ tasya godānavat phalam
d śarāvāṃs tilasaṃpūrṇān sahiraṇyān sacampakān
d jalair dadad brāhmaṇāya sa puṇyaphalabhāg bhavet
d evaṃ tilamayaṃ deyaṃ nareṇa hitam icchatā
d nānādānaphalaṃ bhūyaḥ śṛṇu devi samāhitā
d balam āyuṣyam ārogyam annadānāl labhen naraḥ
d pānīyadas tu saubhāgyaṃ rasajñānaṃ labhen naraḥ
d vastradānād vapuḥśobhām alaṃkāraṃ labhen naraḥ
d dīpado buddhivaimalyaṃ dyutiṃ śobhāṃ labhet punaḥ
d rājapīḍāvimokṣaṃ tac chatrado labhate phalam
d dāsīdāsapradānāt tu bhavet karmāntabhāṅ naraḥ
d dāsīdāsaṃ ca vividhaṃ labhet pretya guṇānvitam
d yānāni vāhanaṃ caiva tadarhāya dadan naraḥ
d pādarogaparikleśān muktaś cotsāhavān bhavet
d vicitraṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ca labhate yānavāhanam
d pratiśrayapradānāc ca tadarhāya tad icchate
d varṣakāle tu rātrau ca labhet pakṣabalaṃ śubham
d setukūpataṭākānāṃ kartā tu labhate naraḥ
d dīrghāyuṣṭvaṃ ca saubhāgyaṃ tathā pretyāyatīṃ śubhām
d vṛkṣapaṅktikaro yas tu cchāyāpuṣpaphalapradaḥ
d pretyabhāve labhet puṇyam abhigamyo bhaven naraḥ
d yas tu saṃkramakṛl loke nadīṣu jalatāriṇām
d labhet puṇyaphalaṃ pretya vyasanebhyo vimokṣaṇam
d mārgakṛt satataṃ martyo bhavet saṃtānavān punaḥ
d kāyadoṣavimuktas tu tīrthakṛt satataṃ bhavet
d auṣadhānāṃ pradātā ca satataṃ kṛpayānvitaḥ
d bhaved vyādhivihīnaś ca dīrghāyuś ca viśeṣataḥ
d anāthān poṣayed yas tu kṛpaṇāndhakapaṅgukān
d sa tu puṇyaphalaṃ pretya labhate kṛcchramokṣaṇam
d devagoṣṭhān sabhāḥ śālā bhikṣūṇāṃ ca pratiśrayam
d yaḥ kuryāl labhate nityaṃ naraḥ pretya phalaṃ śubham
d prāsādavāsaṃ vividhaṃ pakṣaśobhāṃ labhen naraḥ
d vividhaṃ vividhākāraṃ bhakṣyabhojyaguṇānvitam
d ramyaṃ sadaiva govāṭaṃ yaḥ kuryāl labhate naraḥ
d pretyabhāve śubhāṃ jātiṃ vyādhimokṣaṃ tathaiva ca
d umā
d evaṃ nānāvidhaṃ dravyaṃ dātā kartā labhet phalam
d kṛtaṃ dattaṃ yathā yāvat tasya yal labhate phalam
d maheśvaraḥ
d etan me vada deveśa tatra kautūhalaṃ mahat
d pretyabhāve śṛṇu phalaṃ dattasya ca kṛtasya ca
d dānaṃ vā ṣaḍguṇayutaṃ tadarhāya yathāvidhi
d yathāvibhavato dānaṃ dātavyam iti mānavaiḥ
d buddhim āyuṣyam ārogyaṃ kulaṃ bhāgyaṃ tathāgamam
d rūpeṇa saptadhā bhūtvā mānuṣyaṃ phalati dhruvam
d idaṃ dattam idaṃ me syād ity evaṃ phalakāṅkṣayā
d yad dattaṃ tat tad eva syān na tu kiṃ cana labhyate
d dhruvaṃ devy uttame dāne madhyame tv adhame phalam
d umā
d bhagavan devadeveśa viśiṣṭaṃ yajñam ucyate
d maheśvaraḥ
d laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ caiva tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d devatānāṃ ca saṃpūjā yajñeṣv eva samāhitā
d yajñā vedeṣv adhīnāś ca vedā brāhmaṇasaṃyutāḥ
d idaṃ tu sakalaṃ dravyaṃ divi vā bhuvi vā priye
d yajñārthaṃ viddhi tat sṛṣṭaṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā
d evaṃ vijñāya tatkartā sadāraḥ satataṃ dvijaḥ
d pretyabhāve labhel lokān brahmakarmasamādhinā
d brāhmaṇeṣv api tad brahma nityaṃ devi samāhitam
d tasmād viprair yathāśāstraṃ vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
d yajñakarma kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ devatā abhitarpayet
d brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāś caiva yajñārhāḥ prāyaśaḥ smṛtāḥ
d agniṣṭomādibhir yajñair vedeṣu parikalpitaiḥ
d suśuddhair yajamānaiś ca ṛtvigbhiś ca yathāvidhi
d śuddhair dravyopakaraṇair yaṣṭavyam iti niścayaḥ
d tathā kṛteṣu yajñeṣu devānāṃ toṣaṇaṃ bhavet
d tuṣṭeṣu devasaṃgheṣu yajvā yajñaphalaṃ labhet
d devāḥ saṃtoṣitā yajñair lokān saṃvardhayanty uta
d ubhayor lokayor bhūtir devi yajñaiḥ pradṛśyate
d tasmād yajvā divaṃ gatvā amaraiḥ saha modate
d nāsti yajñasamaṃ dānaṃ nāsti yajñasamo nidhiḥ
d sarvadharmasamuddeśo devi yajñe samāhitaḥ
d eṣā yajñakṛtā pūjā laukikīm aparāṃ śṛṇu
d devasatkāram uddiśya kriyante laukikotsavāḥ
d devagoṣṭhān hi saṃskṛtya cotsavaṃ yaḥ karoti vai
d yāgān devopahārāṃś ca śucir bhūtvā yathāvidhi
d devān saṃtoṣayitvā sa devi dharmam avāpnuyāt
d gandhamālyaiś ca vividhaiḥ paramānnena dhūpanaiḥ
d bahubhiḥ stutibhiś caiva stuvantaḥ prayatā narāḥ
d nṛttair vādyaiś ca gāndharvair anyair dṛṣṭivilobhanaiḥ
d devasatkāram uddiśya kurvate ye narā bhuvi
d teṣāṃ bhaktikṛtenaiva satkāreṇābhipūjitāḥ
d tathaiva toṣaṃ saṃyānti devi devās triviṣṭape
d mānuṣair aparair vāpi śucibhis tatparāyaṇaiḥ
d brahmacaryaparair etat kṛtaṃ dharmaphalaṃ bhavet
d kevalaiḥ stutibhir devi gandhamālyasamāyutaiḥ
d prayataiḥ śuddhagātrais tu śuddhadeśe supūjitāḥ
d saṃtoṣaṃ yānti vai devā bhaktaiḥ saṃpūjitās tathā
d umā
d devān saṃtoṣayitvaiva devi dharmam avāpnuyāt
d triviṣṭapasthā vai devā bhūmau mānuṣaceṣṭitam
d maheśvaraḥ
d kathaṃ jñāsyanti vividhaṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi yathā tair vidyate priye
d prāṇināṃ tu śarīreṣu antarātmā vyavasthitaḥ
d ātmānaṃ paramaṃ devam iti viddhi śubhekṣaṇe
d ātmā manovyavasthānāt sarvaṃ vetti śubhāśubham
d ātmaiva devās tad vidyur avyagramanasaḥ kṛtam
d satāṃ manovyavasthānāc chubhaṃ bhavati vai nṛṇām
d tasmād devābhisaṃpūjā pitṛpūjā tathaiva ca
d yajñāś ca dharmakāryāṇi gurupūjāś ca śobhane
d śuddhagātrair vṛttayuktais tanmayais tatparāyaṇaiḥ
d evaṃ vyavasthitair nityaṃ kartavyam iti niścayaḥ
d evaṃ kṛtvā śubhākāṅkṣī paratreha ca modate
d anyathā mana āveśya kṛtaṃ na phalati priye
d umā
d ṛte 'pi tu mano devi aśubhaṃ phalati dhruvam
d pitṛmedhaḥ kathaṃ deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d sarveṣāṃ pitaraḥ pūjyāḥ sarvasaṃpatpradāyinaḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d pitṛmedhaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvat tanmanāḥ śṛṇu
d deśakālau vidhānaṃ ca tatkriyāyāḥ śubhāśubham
d lokeṣu pitaraḥ pūjyā devatānāṃ ca devatāḥ
d śucayo nirmalāḥ puṇyā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritāḥ
d yathā vṛṣṭiṃ pratīkṣante bhūmiṣṭhāḥ sarvajantavaḥ
d pitaraś ca tathā loke pitṛmedhaṃ śubhekṣaṇe
d tasya deśāḥ kurukṣetraṃ gayā gaṅgā sarasvatī
d prabhāsaṃ puṣkaraṃ ceti teṣu dattaṃ mahāphalam
d tīrthāni saritaḥ puṇyā viviktāni vanāni ca
d nadīnāṃ pulinānīti deśāḥ śrāddhasya pūjitāḥ
d maghāprauṣṭhapadau māsau śrāddhakarmaṇi pūjitau
d pakṣayoḥ kṛṣṇapakṣaś ca pūrvapakṣāt praśasyate
d amāvāsyāṃ trayodaśyāṃ navamyāṃ pratipatsu ca
d tithiṣv etāsu tuṣyanti datteneha pitāmahāḥ
d pūrvāhṇe śuklapakṣe vā rātrau janmadineṣu vā
d yugmeṣv ahaḥsu ca śrāddhaṃ na ca kurvīta paṇḍitaḥ
d eṣa kālo mayā proktaḥ pitṛmedhasya pūjitaḥ
d yasmin vā brāhmaṇaṃ pātraṃ paśyet kālaḥ sa ca smṛtaḥ
d apāṅkteyā dvijā varjyā grāhyās te paṅktipāvanāḥ
d pūjayed yadi pāpiṣṭhāñ śrāddheṣu narakaṃ vrajet
d vṛttaśrutakulopetān sakalatrān guṇānvitān
d tadarhāñ śrotriyān viddhi brāhmaṇān ayujaḥ śubhe
d etān nimantrayed vidvān pūrvedyuḥ prātar eva vā
d tatra śrāddhakriyāṃ paścād ārabheta yathāvidhi
d trīṇi śrāddhe pavitrāṇi dauhitraḥ kutapas tilāḥ
d trīṇi cātra praśaṃsanti śaucam akrodham atvarām
d kutapasya ca lomāni kuśā darbhās tilā madhu
d nīlaśākaṃ gajacchāyā pavitraṃ śrāddhakarmasu
d tilān avakiret tatra nānāvarṇān samantataḥ
d aśuddhaṃ pitṛyajñeṣu tilaiḥ śudhyati śobhane
d nīlakāṣāyavastraṃ ca bhinnakarṇaṃ navavraṇam
d hīnāṅgam aśuciṃ vāpi varjayet tatra dūrataḥ
d kukkuṭāṃś ca varāhāṃś ca nagnaṃ klībaṃ rajasvalām
d āyasaṃ trapu sīsaṃ ca śrāddhakarmaṇi varjayet
d māṃsaiḥ prīṇanti pitaro mudgamāṣayavair iha
d śaśarauravamāṃsena ṣaṇmāsaṃ tṛptir iṣyate
d saṃvatsaraṃ ca gavyena haviṣā pāyasena ca
d vārdhrāṇasasya māṃsena tṛptir dvādaśavārṣikī
d ānantyāya bhaved dattaṃ khaḍgamāṃsaṃ pitṛkṣaye
d pāyasaṃ satilaṃ kṣaudraṃ khaḍgamāṃsena saṃmitam
d mahāśaphariṇo matsyāś chāgo vā sarvalohitaḥ
d kālaśākakam ity eva tadānantyaṃ prakīrtitam
d sāpūpaṃ sāmiṣaṃ snigdham āhāram upakalpayet
d upakalpya tadāhāraṃ brāhmaṇān arcayet tataḥ
d śmaśrukarmaśiraḥsnātān samāropyāsanaṃ kramāt
d sugandhamālyābharaṇaiḥ sragbhir etān vibhūṣayet
d alaṃkṛtopaviṣṭāṃs tān piṇḍāvāpaṃ nivedayet
d tataḥ prastīrya darbhāṇāṃ prastaraṃ dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ
d tatsamīpe 'gnibhiddhvā ca svadhāṃ ca juhuyāt tataḥ
d samīpe tv agnīṣomābhyāṃ pitṛbhyo juhuyāt tathā
d tato darbheṣu piṇḍāṃs trīn nivaped dakṣiṇāmukham
d apasavyam apāṅguṣṭhaṃ nāmadheyapuraskṛtam
d etena vidhinā dattaṃ pitṝṇām akṣayaṃ bhavet
d tato viprān yathākāmaṃ pūjayen niyataḥ śuciḥ
d sadakṣiṇaṃ sasaṃbhāraṃ yathā tuṣyanti te dvijāḥ
d yatra tat kriyate karma paitṛke brāhmaṇān prati
d tat sarvam akhilaṃ kuryād vaiśvadevasya pūrvakam
d aśrūn na pātayet tatra na jalpen na japen mithaḥ
d niyamya vācaṃ dehaṃ ca śrāddhakarma samārabhet
d tato nirvapaṇe vṛtte tān piṇḍāṃs tadantaram
d brāhmaṇo 'gnirajo gaur vā bhakṣayed apsu vā kṣipet
d patnīṃ vā madhyamaṃ piṇḍaṃ putrakāmo hi prāśayet
d ādhatta pitaro garbhaṃ kumāraṃ puṣkarasrajam
d tṛptān utthāpya tān viprān annaśeṣaṃ nivedayet
d taccheṣaṃ bahubhiḥ paścāt sabhṛtyo bhakṣayen naraḥ
d eṣa proktaḥ samāsena pitṛyajñaḥ sanātanaḥ
d pitaras tena tuṣyanti kartā ca phalam āpnuyāt
d ahany ahani vā kuryān māse māse 'tha vā punaḥ
d saṃvatsarasya dviḥ kuryāc catur vāpi ca śaktitaḥ
d dīrghāyuś ca bhavet svasthaḥ pitṛmedhena mānavaḥ
d saputro bahubhṛtyaś ca prabhūtadhanadhānyavān
d śrāddhadaḥ svargam āpnoti nirmalaṃ vividhādbhutam
d apsarogaṇasaṃghuṣṭaṃ virajaskam anantakam
d śrāddhāni puṣṭikāmā ye prakurvanti ca paṇḍitāḥ
d teṣāṃ puṣṭiṃ prajāś caiva dāsyanti pitaraḥ sadā
d dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargyaṃ śatruvināśanam
d umā
d kulasaṃdhāraṇaṃ ceti śrāddham āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
d bhagavan devadeveśa mṛtās te bhuvi jantavaḥ
d nānājātiṣu jāyante śīghraṃ karmavaśāt punaḥ
d pitaras tv iti te tatra kathaṃ tiṣṭhanti devavat
d pitṝṇāṃ katamo deśaḥ piṇḍān aśnanti te katham
d anne datte mṛtānāṃ tu katham āpyāyanaṃ bhavet
d nāradaḥ
d evaṃ mayā saṃśayitaṃ bhagavañ chettum arhasi
d etad viruddhaṃ rudrāṇyāṃ pṛcchantyāṃ pariṣad bhṛśam
d maheśvaraḥ
d babhūva sarvā muditā śrotuṃ paramakaṃ hi tat
d sthāne saṃśayitaṃ devi śṛṇu kalyāṇi tattvataḥ
d guhyānāṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ khilānāṃ paramaṃ khilam
d yathā devagaṇā devi tathā pitṛgaṇāḥ priye
d dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śubhe sarve pitṛgaṇāḥ sthitāḥ
d pretān uddiśya yā pūjā kriyate mānuṣair iha
d tena tuṣyanti pitaro na pretāḥ pitaraḥ smṛtāḥ
d uttarasyāṃ yathā devā ramante yajñakarmabhiḥ
d dakṣiṇasyāṃ tathā te ca tuṣyanti vividhair makhaiḥ
d dvividhaṃ kriyate karma havyakavyasamāśritam
d tayor havyakriyā devān kavyam āpyāyayet pitṝn
d prasavyaṃ maṅgalair dravyair havyakarma vidhīyate
d apasavyam amaṅgalyaiḥ kavyaṃ cāpi vidhīyate
d sadevāsuragandharvāḥ pitṝn abhyarcayanti ca
d āpyāyitāś ca te śrāddhaiḥ punar āpyāyayanti tān
d aniṣṭvā ca pitṝn pūrvaṃ yaḥ kriyāṃ prakaroti cet
d rakṣāṃsi ca piśācāś ca phalaṃ bhokṣyanti tasya tat
d havyakavyakriyā tasmāt kartavyā bhuvi mānavaiḥ
d karmakṣetraṃ hi mānuṣyaṃ tad anyatra na vidyate
d kavyena saṃtatir dṛṣṭā havye bhūtiḥ pṛthagvidhā
d umā
d iti te kathitaṃ devi devaguhyaṃ sanātanam
d evaṃ kṛtasya dharmasya śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ prabho
d maheśvaraḥ
d pramāṇaṃ phalamānānāṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d pramāṇakalpanāṃ devi dānasya śṛṇu bhāmini
d yatsāras tu naro loke tad dānaṃ cottamaṃ smṛtam
d sarvadānavidhiṃ prāhus tad eva bhuvi śobhane
d prasthaṃ sāraṃ daridrasya śataṃ koṭidhanasya ca
d prasthasāras tu tat prasthaṃ dadan mahad avāpnuyāt
d koṭisāras tu tāṃ koṭiṃ dadan mahad avāpnuyāt
d ubhayaṃ tan mahat tac ca phalenaiva samaṃ smṛtam
d dharmārthakāmabhogeṣu śakyabhāvaṃ tu madhyamam
d svadravyād atihīnaṃ tu tad dānam adhamaṃ smṛtam
d śṛṇu dattasya vai devi pañcadhā phalakalpanam
d ānantyaṃ ca mahac caiva samaṃ hīnaṃ ca pātakam
d teṣāṃ viśeṣān vakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
d dustyajasya ca vai dānaṃ pātra ānantyam ucyate
d dānaṃ ṣaḍguṇayuktaṃ tu mahad ity abhidhīyate
d yathāśraddhaṃ tu vai dānaṃ yathārhaṃ samam ucyate
d guṇatas tu tathā hīnaṃ dānaṃ hīnam iti smṛtam
d dānaṃ pātakam ity āhuḥ ṣaḍguṇānāṃ viparyaye
d devaloke mahat kālam ānantyasya phalaṃ viduḥ
d mahatas tu tathā dānaṃ svargaloke tu pūjyate
d samasya tu tathā dānaṃ mānuṣaṃ bhogam āvahet
d dānaṃ niṣphalam ity āhur vihīnaṃ kriyayā śubhe
d atha vā mlecchadeśeṣu tatra tatphalatāṃ vrajet
d umā
d narakaṃ pretya tiryakṣu gacched aśubhadānataḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d aśubhasyāpi dānasya śubhaṃ syāc ca phalaṃ katham
d manasā tattvataḥ śuddham anṛśaṃsapuraḥsaram
d prītyā tu sarvadānāni dattvā phalam avāpnuyāt
d rahasyaṃ sarvadānānām etad viddhi śubhekṣaṇe
d anyāni sarvakāryāṇi śṛṇu sadbhiḥ kṛtāni ca
d ārāmaṃ devagoṣṭhāni saṃkramāḥ kūpa eva ca
d govāṭaṃ ca taṭākaṃ ca sabhāḥ śālāś ca sarvaśaḥ
d bhikṣukāvasathāś caiva pānīyaṃ gotṛṇāni ca
d vyādhitānāṃ ca bhaiṣajyam anāthānāṃ ca bhojanam
d anāthaśavasaṃskāras tīrthamārgaviśodhanam
d vyasanābhyavapattiś ca sarveṣāṃ ca svaśaktitaḥ
d etat sarvaṃ samāsena dharmakāryam iti smṛtam
d tat kartavyaṃ manuṣyeṇa svaśaktyā śraddhayā śubhe
d pretyabhāve labhet puṇyaṃ nāsti tatra vicāraṇā
d rūpaṃ saubhāgyam ārogyaṃ balaṃ saukhyaṃ labhen naraḥ
d umā
d svarge vā mānuṣe vāpi tais tair āpyāyate hi saḥ
d bhagavaṃl lokapāleśa dharmas tu katibhedakaḥ
d dṛśyate caritaḥ sadbhis tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d maheśvaraḥ
d śṛṇu devi samuddeśān nānātvaṃ dharmasaṃkaṭe
d dharmā bahuvidhā loke śrutā vedamukhodbhavāḥ
d smṛtidharmaś ca bahudhā sadbhir ācāra iṣyate
d deśadharmāś ca dṛśyante kuladharmās tathaiva ca
d jātidharmāś ca vai dharmā gaṇadharmāś ca śobhane
d śarīrakālavaiṣamyād āpaddharmaś ca dṛśyate
d etad dharmasya nānātvaṃ kriyate lokavāsibhiḥ
d kāraṇāt tatra tatraiva phalaṃ dharmasya ceṣyate
d tatkāraṇasamāyoge labhet kurvan phalaṃ naraḥ
d anyathā na labhet puṇyam atadarhaḥ samādiśan
d evaṃ dharmasya nānātvaṃ phalaṃ kurvaṃl labhen naraḥ
d śrautaḥ smārtas tu dharmāṇāṃ prākṛto dharma ucyate
d umā
d iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
d bhagavan sarvabhūteśa tripurārdana śaṃkara
d śrutaṃ pāpakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ yamaloke varaprada
d śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ deva nṛṇāṃ sukṛtakarmaṇām
d kathaṃ te bhuñjate lokān svargaloke maheśvara
d kathitāḥ kīdṛśā lokā nṛṇāṃ sukṛtakāriṇām
d maheśvaraḥ
d etan me vada deveśa śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
d śṛṇu kalyāṇi tat sarvaṃ yat tvam icchasi bhāmini
d vividhāḥ puṇyalokās te karmākarmaṇyatāṃ gatāḥ
d meruṃ hi kanakātmānaṃ paritaḥ sarvatodiśam
d bhadrāśvaḥ ketumālaś ca uttarāḥ kuravas tathā
d jambūvanādayaḥ svargā ity ete karmavarjitāḥ
d teṣu bhogāḥ svayaṃbhūtāḥ pradṛśyante yatas tataḥ
d yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ tu ekaikaṃ mānamātrayā
d nityapuṣpaphalopetās tatra vṛkṣāḥ samantataḥ
d āsaktavastrābharaṇāḥ sarve kanakasaṃnibhāḥ
d dvirephāś cāṇḍajās tatra pravālamaṇisaṃnibhāḥ
d vicitrāś ca manojñāś ca kūjitaiḥ śobhayanti tān
d kuśeśayavanaiś channā nalinyaś ca manoramāḥ
d tatra vānty anilā nityaṃ divyagandhāḥ sukhāvahāḥ
d sarve cāmlānamālyāś ca virajombarasaṃvṛtāḥ
d evaṃ bahuvidhā devi divi bhogāḥ sukhāvahāḥ
d striyaś ca puruṣāś caiva sarve sukṛtakāriṇaḥ
d ramante tatra cānyonyaṃ kāmarāgasamanvitāḥ
d divyabhūṣaṇasaṃyuktā divyagandhasamanvitāḥ
d manoramā mahābhāgāḥ sarve lalitakuṇḍalāḥ
d evaṃ tatragatā martyāḥ pramadāḥ priyadarśanāḥ
d nānābhāvasamāyuktā yauvanasthāḥ sadaiva tu
d kamanīyāḥ kāmayutāḥ kāmajñā lalitās tathā
d manonukūlā madhurā bhoginām upakalpitāḥ
d pramadāś codbhavanty eva svargaloke yathā tathā
d evaṃvidhāḥ striyaś cātra puruṣāś ca parasparam
d ramante cendriyaiḥ svasthaiḥ śarīrair bhogasaṃskṛtaiḥ
d kāmaharṣau guṇāv āstāṃ nānye krodhādayaḥ priye
d kṣut pipāsā na cāsty atra gātrakleśāś ca śobhane
d sarvato ramaṇīyaś ca sarvartukusumānvitam
d yāvat puṇyaphalaṃ tāvad ramante tatra saṃgatāḥ
d nirantaraṃ bhogayutā ramante svargavāsinaḥ
d tatra bhogān yathāyogaṃ bhuktvā puṇyakṣayāt punaḥ
d naśyanti jāyamānās te śarīraiḥ sahasā priye
d svargalokāt paribhraṣṭā jāyante mānuṣe punaḥ
d pūrvapuṇyāvaśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭāḥ saṃbhavanti te
d eṣā svargagatiḥ proktā pṛcchantyās tava bhāmini
d ata ūrdhvaṃ padāny aṣṭau karmaṇyāni śṛṇu priye
d bhogayuktāni puṇyāni ucchritāni parasparam
d vidyādharāḥ kiṃpuruṣā yakṣagandharvakiṃnarāḥ
d apsaro dānavā devā yathākramam udāhṛtāḥ
d teṣu sthāneṣu jāyante prāṇinaḥ puṇyakarmiṇaḥ
d teṣām api ca ye lokāḥ svargalokopamāḥ smṛtāḥ
d svargavat tatra te bhogān bhuñjate ca ramanti ca
d rūpasattvabalopetāḥ sarve dīrghāyuṣas tathā
d teṣāṃ sarvakriyārambho mānuṣeṣv eva dṛśyate
d atimānuṣam āścaryam astramāyābalātkṛtam
d jarāprasūtimaraṇaṃ teṣu sthāneṣu dṛśyate
d guṇadoṣāś ca santy atra ākāśagamanaṃ tathā
d antardhānaṃ balaṃ sarvam āyuś ca cirajīvanam
d tapoviśeṣāj jāyante teṣāṃ karmāṇi bhāmini
d devalokapravṛttis tu teṣām eva vidhīyate
d na tathā devaloko hi tadviśiṣṭāḥ surāḥ smṛtāḥ
d tatra bhogam anirdeśyam amṛtatvaṃ ca vidyate
d vimānagamanaṃ nityam apsarogaṇasevitam
d evam anyac ca tat karma daivatebhyo viśiṣyate
d pratyakṣaṃ tava tat sarvaṃ devalokapravartanam
d tasmān na varṇaye devi viditaṃ hi tvayā śubhe
d umā
d tat sarvaṃ sukṛtenaiva prāpyate cottamaṃ padam
d mānuṣeṣv eva jīvatsu gatir vijñāyate na vā
d ayaṃ śubhagatir jīvann asau tv aśubhabhāg iti
d maheśvaraḥ
d etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
d tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi jīvatāṃ vidyate yathā
d dvividhāḥ prāṇino loke daivāsurasamāśritāḥ
d manasā karmaṇā vācā pratikūlā bhavanti ye
d tādṛśān āsurān viddhi martyās te narakālayāḥ
d rāgadveṣayutā ye tu nirlajjā nirapatrapāḥ
d darpāhaṃkārasaṃyuktā narā narakagāminaḥ
d nāstikāś ca śaṭhā ghorāḥ pareṣām upatāpinaḥ
d yatheṣṭavṛttayaś caiva narā narakagāminaḥ
d duṣpratītamanā yas tu calacitto nirākṛtiḥ
d śiśnodararatir mūḍho nirayaṃ yāti so 'dhamaḥ
d māṃsapānapriyā nityaṃ kaṭhorā nīcavṛttayaḥ
d tādṛśān āsurān viddhi sarve te narakālayāḥ
d hiṃsāvihārā ye nityaṃ nirdayāḥ prāṇināśane
d svadharmavimukhāś caiva parasveṣv abhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ
d yuddhamātsaryasaṃyuktā grāmyabhogaparāyaṇāḥ
d tādṛśān āsurān viddhi narān narakagāminaḥ
d darpotsekasamāyuktā mūrkhās tattvabahiṣkṛtāḥ
d śrutividveṣiṇo nityaṃ te narā narakālayāḥ
d nityaṃ vadanti ye mohād anṛtaṃ kaṭukaṃ vacaḥ
d kṛtaghnāḥ piśunā ghorā bhavanti narakālayāḥ
d hiṃsrāś corāś ca dhūrtāś ca paradārābhimarśinaḥ
d nīcakarmakarā ye ca śaucamaṅgalavarjitāḥ
d śrutividveṣiṇaḥ pāpā lokacāritradūṣakāḥ
d evaṃyuktasamācārā jīvanto narakālayāḥ
d lokodvegakarāś cānye paśavaś ca sarīsṛpāḥ
d vṛkṣāḥ kaṇṭakino rūkṣās tādṛśān viddhi cāsurān
d aparān devapakṣāṃs tu śṛṇu devi samāhitā
d manovākkarmabhir nityam anukūlā bhavanti ye
d tādṛśān amarān viddhi te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
d śaucārjavaparādhīnāḥ parārthaṃ na haranti ye
d ye samāḥ sarvabhūteṣu te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
d bhayād vā vṛttihetor vā anṛtaṃ na bruvanti ye
d satyaṃ vadanti satataṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
d dhārmikāḥ śaucasaṃpannāḥ śuklā madhurabhāṣiṇaḥ
d nākāryaṃ manasecchanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
d daridrā api ye ke cid yācitāḥ prītipūrvakam
d dadaty eva ca yat kiṃ cit te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
d āstikā maṅgalaparāḥ satataṃ vṛddhasevinaḥ
d puṇyakarmaparā nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
d svaduḥkham iva manyante pareṣāṃ duḥkhavedanām
d śaktyā cābhyavapadyante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
d vratino dānaśīlāś ca sukhaśīlāś ca mānavāḥ
d ṛjavo mṛdavo nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
d guruśuśrūṣaṇaparā devabrāhmaṇapūjakāḥ
d kṛtajñāḥ kṛtavidyāś ca te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
d jitendriyā jitakrodhā jitamānamadaspṛhāḥ
d lobhamātsaryahīnā ye te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
d nirmamā nirahaṃkārāḥ svānukrośāḥ svabandhuṣu
d dīnānukampino nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
d aihikena tu vṛttena pāratram anumīyate
d evaṃvidhā narā loke jīvantaḥ svargagāminaḥ
d yad anyac ca śubhaṃ loke prajānugrahakāri ca
d paśavaś caiva vṛkṣāś ca prajānāṃ hitakāriṇaḥ
d tādṛśān devapakṣasthān iti viddhi śubhānane
d śubhāśubhamayaṃ loke sarvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
d umā
d daivaṃ śubham iti prāhur āsuraṃ hy aśubhaṃ priye
d bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cit kāladharmam upasthitāḥ
d prāṇamokṣaṃ kathaṃ kṛtvā paratra hitam āpnuyuḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
d dvividhaṃ maraṇaṃ loke svabhāvād yatnatas tathā
d tayoḥ svabhāvaṃ nopāyaṃ yatnajaṃ kāraṇodbhavam
d etayor ubhayor devi vidhānaṃ śṛṇu śobhane
d kalyākalyaśarīrasya yatnajaṃ dvividhaṃ smṛtam
d yatnajaṃ nāma maraṇam ātmatyāgo mumūrṣayā
d tatrākalyaśarīrasya jarā vyādhiś ca kāraṇam
d mahāprasthānagamanaṃ tathā prāyopaveśanam
d jalāvagāhanaṃ caiva agnicityāpraveśanam
d evaṃ caturvidhaḥ prokta ātmatyāgo mumūrṣatām
d eteṣāṃ kramayogena vidhānaṃ śṛṇu śobhane
d svadharmayuktaṃ gārhasthyaṃ ciram ūḍhvā vidhānataḥ
d tatrānṛṇyaṃ ca saṃprāpya vṛddho vā vyādhito 'pi vā
d darśayitvā svadaurbalyaṃ sarvān evānumānya ca
d saṃvidhāya svabandhūṃś ca karmaṇāṃ bharaṇaṃ tathā
d dānāni vidhivat kṛtvā dharmakāryārtham ātmanaḥ
d anujñāpya janaṃ sarvaṃ vācā madhurayā bruvan
d ahataṃ vastram ācchādya baddhvā tat kuśarajjunā
d upaspṛśya pratijñāya vyavasāyapuraḥsaram
d parityajya tato grāmaṃ paścāt kuryād yathepsitam
d mahāprasthānam icchec cet pratiṣṭhetottarāṃ diśam
d bhūtvā tāvan nirāhāro yāvat prāṇavimokṣaṇam
d ceṣṭāhānau śayitvāpi tanmanāḥ prāṇam utsṛjet
d evaṃ puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān amalān pratipadyate
d prāyopaveśanaṃ cecchet tenaiva vidhinā naraḥ
d deśe puṇyatame śreṣṭhe nirāhāras tu saṃviśet
d āprāṇāntaṃ śucir bhūtvā kurvan dānaṃ svaśaktitaḥ
d hariṃ smaraṃs tyajet prāṇān eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
d evaṃ kalevaraṃ tyaktvā svargaloke mahīyate
d agnipraveśanaṃ cecchet tenaiva vidhinā śubhe
d kṛtvā kāṣṭhamayaṃ cityaṃ puṇyakṣetre nadīṣu vā
d daivatebhyo namaskṛtya kṛtvā cāgniṃ pradakṣiṇam
d bhūtvā śucir vyavasitaḥ praviśed agnisaṃstaram
d so 'pi lokān yathānyāyaṃ prāpnuyāt puṇyakarmaṇām
d jalāvagāhanaṃ cecchet tenaiva vidhinā śubhe
d khyāte puṇyatame tīrthe nimajjet svakṛtaṃ smaran
d so 'pi puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān nisargāt pratipadyate
d tataḥ kalyaśarīrasya saṃtyāgaṃ śṛṇu tattvataḥ
d rakṣārthaṃ kṣatriyasyeṣṭaḥ prajāpālanakāraṇāt
d yodhānāṃ bhartṛpiṇḍārthaṃ gurvarthaṃ brahmacāriṇām
d gobrāhmaṇārthaṃ grāmārthaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca vidhīyate
d svarāṣṭrarakṣaṇārthaṃ vā kunṛpaiḥ pīḍitāḥ prajāḥ
d moktukāmas tyajet prāṇān yuddhamārge yathāvidhi
d susaṃnaddho vyavasitaḥ saṃpraviśyāparāṅmukhaḥ
d evaṃ rājā mṛtaḥ sadyaḥ svargaloke mahīyate
d tādṛśī sugatir nāsti kṣatriyasya viśeṣataḥ
d bhṛtyo vā bhartṛpiṇḍārthaṃ bhartṛkarmaṇy upasthite
d kurvaṃs tatra tu sāhāyyam ātmaprāṇānapekṣayā
d svāmyarthaṃ saṃtyajet prāṇān puṇyāṃl lokān sa gacchati
d spṛhaṇīyaḥ suragaṇais tatra nāsti vicāraṇā
d evaṃ gobrāhmaṇārthaṃ vā dīnārthaṃ vā tyajet tanum
d so 'pi puṇyam avāpnoti ānṛśaṃsyavyapekṣayā
d ity ete jīvitatyāge mārgās te samudāhṛtāḥ
d kāmāt krodhād bhayān mohād yadi cet saṃtyajet tanum
d so 'nantaṃ narakaṃ yāti ātmahantṛtvakāraṇāt
d svabhāvamaraṇaṃ nāma na tu cātmecchayā bhavet
d tathā mṛtānāṃ yat kāryaṃ tan me śṛṇu yathāvidhi
d tatrāpi bodhasaṃtyāgān mūḍhatyāgo viśiṣyate
d bhūmau saṃveśayed dehaṃ narasya vinaśiṣyataḥ
d nirjīvaṃ vṛṇuyāt sadyo vāsasā tu kalevaram
d mālyagandhair alaṃkṛtya suvarṇena ca bhāmini
d śmaśāne dakṣiṇe deśe citāgnau pradahen mṛtam
d atha vā nikṣiped bhūmau śarīraṃ jīvavarjitam
d divā ca śuklapakṣaś ca uttarāyaṇam eva ca
d mumūrṣūṇāṃ praśastāni viparītaṃ tu garhitam
d audakaṃ cāṣṭakāśrāddhaṃ bahubhir bahuśaḥ kṛtam
d āpyāyanaṃ mṛtānāṃ tat paraloke bhavec chubham
d etat sarvaṃ mayā proktaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya ca
d umā
d devadeva namas te 'stu kālasūdana śaṃkara
d lokeṣu vividhā dharmās tvatprasādān mayā śrutāḥ
d viśiṣṭaṃ sarvadharmebhyaḥ śāśvataṃ dhruvam avyayam
d śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ dharmaṃ tatra muhyati me manaḥ
d ke cin mokṣaṃ praśaṃsanti ke cid yajñaphalaṃ dvijāḥ
d vānaprasthaṃ punaḥ ke cid gārhasthyaṃ ke cid āśramam
d rājadharmāśrayaṃ ke cit ke cit svādhyāyam eva ca
d brahmacaryāśramaṃ ke cit ke cid vāksaṃyamāśrayam
d mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ke cit sevamānā divaṃ gatāḥ
d ahiṃsayāparaḥ svarge satyena ca mahīyate
d āhave 'bhimukhāḥ ke cin nihatās tridivaṃ gatāḥ
d ke cid uñchavrate siddhāḥ svargamārgaṃ samāśritāḥ
d ārjavenāpare yuktā hatāś cānārjavair janaiḥ
d ṛjavo nākapṛṣṭhe tu śuddhātmānaḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
d evaṃ bahuvidhair loke dharmadvāraiḥ susaṃvṛtaiḥ
d mamāpi matir āviddhā meghalekheva vāyunā
d etasmin saṃśayasthāne saṃśayacchedakāri yat
d nāradaḥ
d vacanaṃ brūhi deveśa niścayajñānasaṃjñitam
d evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃ devyā mahādevaḥ pinākadhṛk
d provāca madhuraṃ vākyaṃ sūkṣmam adhyātmasaṃjñitam
d maheśvaraḥ
d nyāyatas tvaṃ mahābhāge śrotukāmāsi niścayam
d etad eva viśiṣṭaṃ te yat tvaṃ pṛcchasi māṃ priye
d sarvatra vihito dharmaḥ svargalokaphalāśritaḥ
d bahudvārasya dharmasya nehāsti viphalā kriyā
d yasmin yasmiṃś ca viṣaye yo yo yāti viniścayam
d taṃ tam evābhijānāti nānyaṃ dharmaṃ śucismite
d śṛṇu devi samāsena mokṣajñānam anuttamam
d etad dhi sarvadharmāṇāṃ viśiṣṭaṃ guhyam avyayam
d nāsti mokṣāt paraṃ devi mokṣa eva parā gatiḥ
d sukham ātyantikaṃ śreṣṭham anivarti ca tad viduḥ
d nātra devi jarāmṛtyū śoko vā duḥkham eva vā
d anuttamam acintyaṃ ca tad devi paramaṃ sukham
d jñānānām uttamaṃ jñānaṃ mokṣajñānaṃ vidur budhāḥ
d ṛṣibhir devasaṃghaiś ca procyate paramaṃ padam
d nityam akṣaram akṣobhyam ajaraṃ śāśvataṃ śivam
d uśanti tat padaṃ prājñāḥ spṛhaṇīyaṃ surāsuraiḥ
d duḥkhādi ca durantaṃ ca saṃkṣayaṃ ca virodhi ca
d mithaḥ satatakāryaṃ ca trivargaṃ sukham ucyate
d tasmān mokṣaḥ pradhānas tu trivargāc ca viśeṣataḥ
d mokṣasya tasya mārgo 'yaṃ śrūyatāṃ śubhalakṣaṇe
d brahmādisthāvarāntaś ca saṃsāro 'yaṃ pravartate
d śokavyādhijarādoṣair maraṇena ca saṃyutaḥ
d yathā jyotirgaṇā vyomni nivartante punaḥ punaḥ
d saṃsāre prāṇinaḥ sarve nivartante tathā punaḥ
d tatra saṃsāracakrasya mokṣo jñānena dṛśyate
d adhyātmatattvavijñānaṃ jñānam ity abhidhīyate
d jñānasya grahaṇopāyam ācāraṃ jñāninas tathā
d yathāvat saṃpravakṣyāmi tattvam ekamanāḥ śṛṇu
d brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vāpi bhūtvā pūrvaṃ gṛhe sthitaḥ
d ānṛṇyaṃ sarvataḥ prāpya tatas tān saṃtyajed gṛhān
d tataḥ saṃtyajya gārhasthyaṃ niścito vanam āśrayet
d vane gurusamājñāto dīkṣeta vidhipūrvakam
d dīkṣāṃ prāpya yathānyāyaṃ svavṛttaṃ paripālayet
d gṛhṇīyād apy upādhyāyān mokṣajñānam atandritaḥ
d dvividhaś ca punar mokṣaḥ sāṃkhyo yoga iti smṛtaḥ
d pañcaviṃśativijñānaṃ sāṃkhyam ity abhidhīyate
d aiśvaryaṃ devasāyujyaṃ yogaśāstrasya nirṇaye
d tayor anyataraṃ jñānaṃ śṛṇuyāc chiṣyatāṃ gataḥ
d nāmuṇḍo nāpy akāṣāyī nāpy asaṃvatsaroṣitaḥ
d sāṃkhyayogau na ca śrāvyau guruṇā snehapūrvakam
d samaḥ śītoṣṇaharṣādīn viṣaheta sadā muniḥ
d adhṛṣyaḥ kṣutpipāsābhyāṃ bhavej jñānasamādhinā
d na kurvītānyam ārambham anivedya svakaṃ gurum
d chāyābhūto 'parityāgī nityam eva bhaved gurau
d indriyāṇīndriyārthebhya ucitebhyo nivartayet
d tyajet saṃkalpajān granthīn sadā dhyānaparo bhavet
d kuṇḍikāṃ carma saṃśikyaṃ chatraṃ yaṣṭim upānahau
d cailam ity eva naiteṣu sthāpayet svāmyam ātmanaḥ
d guroḥ pūrvaṃ samuttiṣṭhej jaghanyaṃ tasya saṃviśet
d nānanujñāpya bhartāram āvaśyakam api vrajet
d dvir ahnaḥ snānaśāṭena saṃdhyayor abhiṣecanam
d ekakālāśanaṃ cāsya vihitaṃ yatibhiḥ purā
d bhaikṣaṃ sarvatra gṛhṇīyāc cintayet satataṃ niśi
d kāraṇe cāpi saṃprāpte na kupyeta kadā cana
d brahmacaryaṃ vane vāsaḥ śaucam indriyasaṃyamaḥ
d dayā ca sarvabhūteṣu tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
d vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyo laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ
d ātmayuktaḥ parāṃ buddhiṃ labhate pāpanāśinīm
d yadā bhāvaṃ na kurute sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam
d karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā
d anīrṣyur anahaṃkāro vimuktaḥ sarvabandhanaiḥ
d brāhmaṃ padam avāpnoti yat prāpya na nivartate
d ubhe satyānṛte tyaktvā śokānandau bhayābhaye
d priyāpriye parityajya brahmabhūyāya kalpate
d nirmamo nirahaṃkāro nirdvaṃdvo vītamatsaraḥ
d vītaśokabhayābādhaḥ padaṃ prāpnoty anuttamam
d tulyanindāstutir maunī samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ
d samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca nirvāṇam adhigacchati
d evaṃyuktasamācāras tatparo 'dhyātmacintakaḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d jñānābhyāsena tenaiva prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim
d anudvignamater jantor asmin saṃsāramaṇḍale
d śokavyādhijarāduḥkhe nirvāṇaṃ nopapadyate
d tasmād udvegajananaṃ manovasthāpanaṃ tathā
d jñānaṃ te saṃpravakṣyāmi tanmūlam amṛtaṃ hi vai
d śokasthānasahasrāṇi bhayasthānaśatāni ca
d divase divase mūḍham āviśanti na paṇḍitam
d naṣṭe dhane vā dāre vā putre pitari vā mṛte
d aho duḥkham iti dhyāyañ śokasya padam āvrajet
d dravyeṣu samatīteṣu ye guṇās tān na cintayet
d tān anādriyamāṇasya śokabandhaḥ praṇaśyati
d saṃprayogād aniṣṭasya viprayogāt priyasya ca
d mānuṣā mānasair duḥkhaiḥ saṃyujyante 'lpabuddhayaḥ
d mṛtaṃ vā yadi vā naṣṭaṃ yo 'tītam anuśocati
d saṃtāpena ca yujyeta tac cāsya na nivartate
d utpanne tv iha mānuṣye garbhaprabhṛti mānavam
d vividhāny upavartante duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca
d tayor ekataro mārgo yady enam abhisaṃnamet
d sukhaṃ prāpya na saṃhṛṣyed duḥkhaṃ prāpya na saṃjvaret
d doṣadarśī bhavet tatra yatra snehaḥ pravartate
d aniṣṭenānvitaṃ paśyed yathā kṣipraṃ virajyate
d yathā kāṣṭhaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ ca sameyātāṃ mahodadhau
d sametya ca vyapeyātāṃ tadvaj jñātisamāgamaḥ
d adarśanād āpatitāḥ punaś cādarśanaṃ gatāḥ
d snehas tatra na kartavyo viprayogo hi tair dhruvam
d kuṭumbaṃ putradāraṃ ca śarīraṃ dhanasaṃcayaḥ
d pārakyam adhruvaṃ sarvaṃ kiṃ svaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛte
d putradārakuṭumbeṣu saktāḥ sīdanti jantavaḥ
d saraḥpaṅkārṇave magnā jīrṇā iva mahāgajāḥ
d mātāpitṛsahasrāṇi putradāraśatāni ca
d asaṃkhyeyāny atītāni tathaivānāgatāni ca
d na teṣāṃ ca mayā kāryaṃ na kāryaṃ mama tair api
d atītam anatītaṃ tad iti paśyan na muhyati
d duḥkhopaghāte śārīre mānase vā samutthite
d yasmin na śakyate kartuṃ yatnāt tan nānucintayet
d yannimittaṃ bhavec chokas trāso vā duḥkham eva vā
d āyāso vā yatomūlas tad ekāṅgam api tyajet
d anityaṃ yauvanaṃ rūpaṃ jīvitaṃ ratnasaṃcayaḥ
d aiśvaryaṃ svasthatā ceti na muhyet tatra paṇḍitaḥ
d sukham ekāntato nāsti śakrasyāpi triviṣṭape
d tatrāpi sumahad duḥkhaṃ sukham alpataraṃ bhavet
d na nityaṃ labhate duḥkhaṃ na nityaṃ labhate sukham
d sukhasyānantaraṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasyānantaraṃ sukham
d kṣayāntā nicayāḥ sarve patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ
d saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ ca jīvitam
d ucchrayān vinipātāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā pratyakṣataḥ svayam
d anityam asukhaṃ ceti vyavasyet sarvam eva ca
d arthānām ārjane duḥkham ārjitānāṃ ca rakṣaṇe
d nāśe duḥkhaṃ vyaye duḥkhaṃ dhig arthaṃ duḥkhabhājanam
d arthavantaṃ naraṃ nityaṃ pañca nighnanti śatravaḥ
d rājataskaradāyādā bhūtāni kṣaya eva ca
d artha eva hy anarthasya mūlam ity avadhāraya
d na hy anarthāḥ prabādhante naram arthavivarjitam
d arthaprāptir mahad duḥkham ākiṃcanyaṃ paraṃ sukham
d upadraveṣu cārthānāṃ duḥkhaṃ hi niyataṃ bhavet
d dhanalābhena tṛṣṇāyā na tṛptir upalabhyate
d labdhvā bhūyo vivardheta samidbhir iva pāvakaḥ
d jitvāpi pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ catuḥsāgaramekhalām
d sāgarāṇāṃ punaḥ pāraṃ jetum icchaty asaṃśayam
d alaṃ parigraheṇeha doṣavān hi parigrahaḥ
d kośakāraḥ kṛmir devi badhyate hi parigrahāt
d ya ekāṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnām ekacchatrāṃ praśāsti ca
d ekasminn eva rāṣṭre tu sa cāpi nivasen nṛpaḥ
d tasmin rāṣṭre 'pi nagaram ekam evādhitiṣṭhati
d nagare 'pi gṛhaṃ caikaṃ bhavet tasya niveśanam
d eka eva pratiṣṭhā syād āvāsaṃ tadgṛhe 'pi ca
d āvāse śayanaṃ caikaṃ niśi yatra pralīyate
d śayanasyārdham evāsya striyās tv ardhaṃ vidhīyate
d tad anena prasaṅgena svalpenaiva hi yujyate
d sarvaṃ mameti saṃmūḍho janaḥ paśyati bāliśaḥ
d evaṃ sarvopabhogeṣu svalpam asya prayojanam
d taṇḍulaprasthamātreṇa yātrā syāt sarvadehinām
d tato bhūyastaro bhāgo duḥkhāya patanāya ca
d nāsti tṛṣṇāsamaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāsti tyāgasamaṃ sukham
d sarvān kāmān parityajya brahmabhūyāya kalpate
d yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥ
d yo 'sau prāṇāntiko rogas tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ tyajataḥ sukham
d na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati
d haviṣā kṛṣṇavartmeva bhūya evābhivardhate
d alābheneha kāmānāṃ kāmāṃs tyajati paṇḍitaḥ
d āyāsavikaṭas tīvraḥ kāmāgnis tarṣaṇāraṇiḥ
d indriyārtheṣu saṃmohāt pacaty akuśalaṃ janam
d yat pṛthivyāṃ vrīhiyavaṃ hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥ
d nālam ekasya paryāptam iti paśyan na muhyati
d yac ca kāmasukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham
d tṛṣṇākṣayasukhasyaite nārhataḥ ṣoḍaśīṃ kalām
d indriyāṇīndriyārtheṣu naiva dhīro niyojayet
d manaḥṣaṣṭhāni saṃyamya nityam ātmani yojayet
d indriyāṇāṃ visargeṇa doṣam ṛcchaty asaṃśayam
d saṃniyamya tu tāny eva tataḥ siddhim avāpnuyāt
d ṣaṇṇām ātmani yuktānām aiśvaryaṃ yo 'dhigacchati
d na sa pāpair na cānarthaiḥ saṃyujyeta vicakṣaṇaḥ
d apramattaḥ sadā rakṣed indriyāṇi vicakṣaṇaḥ
d arakṣiteṣu teṣv āśu naro narakam eti hi
d hṛdi kāmamayaś citro mohasaṃcayasaṃbhavaḥ
d ajñānarūḍhamūlas tu vidhitsāpariṣecanaḥ
d roṣalobhamahāskandhaḥ purāduṣkṛtasāravān
d āyāsaviṭapas tīvraḥ śokapuṣpo bhayāṅkuraḥ
d nānāsaṃkalpapatrāḍhyaḥ pramādaparivardhitaḥ
d mahatībhiḥ pipāsābhiḥ samantāt parivardhitaḥ
d saṃrohaty akṛtaprajñaḥ pādapaḥ kāmasaṃbhavaḥ
d naiva rohati tattvajñe rūḍho vā chidyate punaḥ
d kṛcchropāyeṣv anityeṣu niḥsāreṣu caleṣu ca
d duḥkhādiṣu duranteṣu kāmabhogeṣu kā ratiḥ
d yena saṃvatsaro dṛṣṭaḥ sakṛt kāmaś ca sevitaḥ
d tena sarvam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ punarāvartakaṃ jagat
d bhogā bhuktā manuṣyeṇa svapnā iva bhavanti te
d svapnopabhogatulyeṣu kāmabhogeṣu kā ratiḥ
d indriyeṣu ca jīryatsu chidyamāne tathāyuṣi
d purastāc ca sthite mṛtyau kiṃ sukhaṃ paśyataḥ śubhe
d vyādhibhiḥ pīḍyamānasya nityaṃ śārīramānasaiḥ
d narasyākṛtakṛtyasya kiṃ sukhaṃ bhavati priye
d saṃcinvānakam evārthaṃ kāmānām avitṛptakam
d vyāghraḥ paśum ivāraṇye mṛtyur ādāya gacchati
d janmamṛtyujarāduḥkhaiḥ satataṃ samabhidrutaḥ
d umā
d saṃsāre pacyamānas tu pāpān nodvijate janaḥ
d kenopāyena martyānāṃ nivartete jarāntakau
d yady asti bhagavan mahyam etad ācakṣva māciram
d tapasā vā sumahatā karmaṇā vā śrutena vā
d maheśvaraḥ
d rasāyanaprayogair vā kenātyeti jarāntakau
d naitad asti mahābhāge jarāmṛtyunivartanam
d sarvalokeṣu jānīhi mokṣād anyatra bhāmini
d na dhanena na rājyena nogreṇa tapasāpi vā
d maraṇaṃ nātivartante vinā muktyā śarīriṇaḥ
d aśvamedhasahasreṇa vājapeyaśatena ca
d na taranti jarāmṛtyū nirvāṇādhigamād vinā
d aiśvaryaṃ dhanadhānyaṃ ca vidyā lābhas tapas tathā
d rasāyanaprayogaś ca na taranti jarāntakau
d dānayajñatapaḥśīlā rasāyanavido 'pi vā
d svādhyāyaniratā vāpi na taranti jarāntakau
d devadānavagandharvakiṃnaroragarākṣasān
d svavaśe kurute kālo na kālasyāsty agocaraḥ
d na hy ahāni nivartante na māsā na punaḥ kṣapāḥ
d so 'yaṃ prapadyate 'dhvānam ajasraṃ dhruvam avyayam
d sravanti na nivartante srotāṃsi saritām iva
d āyur ādāya martyānām ahorātrāṇi saṃtatam
d jīvitaṃ sarvabhūtānām akṣayaḥ kṣapayann asau
d ādityo hy astam abhyeti punaḥ punar udeti ca
d yasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyām āyur alpataraṃ bhavet
d gādhodake matsya iva kiṃ nu tasya kumāratā
d maraṇaṃ hi śarīrasya niyataṃ dhruvam eva ca
d tiṣṭhann eva kṣaṇaṃ sarvaḥ kālasyaiti vaśaṃ punaḥ
d na mriyeran na jīryeran yadi syuḥ sarvadehinaḥ
d na cāniṣṭaṃ pravarteta śoko vā prāṇināṃ kva cit
d apramattaḥ pramatteṣu kālo bhūteṣu tiṣṭhati
d apramattasya kālasya kṣayaṃ prāpto na mucyate
d śvaḥ kāryam adya kurvīta pūrvāhṇe cāparāhṇikam
d ko hi tad veda yatrāsau mṛtyunā nābhivīkṣitaḥ
d varṣāsv idaṃ kariṣyāmi idaṃ grīṣmavasantayoḥ
d iti bālaś cintayati antarāyaṃ na budhyate
d idaṃ me syād idaṃ me syād ity evaṃmanaso narāḥ
d anavāpteṣu kāmeṣu hriyante maraṇaṃ prati
d kālapāśena baddhānām ahany ahani jīryatām
d kā śraddhā prāṇināṃ mārge viṣame bhramatāṃ sadā
d yuvaiva dharmaśīlaḥ syād animittaṃ hi jīvitam
d phalānām iva pakvānāṃ sadā hi patanād bhayam
d martyasya kim u tair dāraiḥ putrair bhogaiḥ priyair api
d ekāhnā sarvam utsṛjya mṛtyor hi vaśam eyivān
d jāyamānāṃś ca saṃprekṣya mriyamāṇāṃs tathaiva ca
d na saṃvego 'sti cet puṃsaḥ kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamo hi saḥ
d vināśino hy adhruvajīvitasya
d kiṃ bandhubhir mitraparigrahaiś ca
d vihāya yad gacchati sarvam eva
d kṣaṇena gatvā na nivartate ca
d evaṃ cintayato nityaṃ sarvārthānām anityatām
d udvego jāyate nityaṃ nirvāṇasya puraḥsaraḥ
d tenodvegena cāpy asya vimarśo jāyate punaḥ
d vimarśenātha vairāgyaṃ sarvatrāsyopajāyate
d vairāgyeṇa parāṃ śāntiṃ labhante mānavāḥ śubhe
d mokṣasyopaniṣad devi vairāgyam iti kīrtitam
d etat te kathitaṃ devi vairāgyotpādanaṃ vacaḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d etat sarvaṃ hi saṃcintya mucyante hi mumukṣavaḥ
d sāṃkhyajñānaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvat te śucismite
d yaj jñātvā na punar martyaḥ saṃsāreṣu pravartate
d jñānenaiva vimuktās te sāṃkhyāḥ saṃnyāsakovidāḥ
d śārīraṃ tu tapo ghoraṃ sāṃkhyāḥ prāhur nirarthakam
d pañcaviṃśatikaṃ jñānaṃ teṣāṃ jñānam iti smṛtam
d mūlaprakṛtir avyaktam avyaktāj jāyate mahān
d mahato 'bhūd ahaṃkāras tasmāt tanmātrapañcakam
d indriyāṇi daśaikaṃ ca tanmātrebhyo bhavanty uta
d tebhyo bhūtāni pañca syur iti kṣetrasamuccayaḥ
d asya kṣetrasya saṃkṣepaś caturviṃśatir iṣyate
d pañcaviṃśatir ity āhuḥ puruṣeṇeha saṃkhyayā
d sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇāḥ prakṛtisaṃbhavāḥ
d taiḥ sṛjaty akhilaṃ lokaṃ prakṛtiḥ svātmajair guṇaiḥ
d icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃghātaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ
d vikārāḥ prakṛteś caite veditavyā manīṣibhiḥ
d lakṣaṇaṃ cāpi sarveṣāṃ vikalpaṃ cāditaḥ pṛthak
d vistareṇa pravakṣyāmi tasya vyākhyām imāṃ śṛṇu
d nityam ekam aṇu vyāpi kriyāhīnam ahetukam
d agrāhyam indriyaiḥ sarvair etad avyaktalakṣaṇam
d avyaktaṃ prakṛtir mūlaṃ pradhānaṃ yonir avyayam
d avyaktasyaiva nāmāni śabdaiḥ paryāyavācakaiḥ
d tat sūkṣmatvād anirdeśyaṃ tat sad ity abhidhīyate
d tanmūlaṃ ca jagat sarvaṃ tanmūlā sṛṣṭir iṣyate
d sattvādayaḥ prakṛtijā guṇās tān prabravīmy aham
d sukhaṃ tuṣṭiḥ prakāśaś ca trayas te sāttvikā guṇāḥ
d rāgadveṣau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ stambhaś ca rajaso guṇāḥ
d aprakāśo bhayaṃ mohas tandrī ca tamaso guṇāḥ
d śraddhā praharṣo vijñānam asaṃmoho dayā dhṛtiḥ
d sattve pravṛddhe vardhante viparīte viparyayaḥ
d kāmaḥ krodho manastāpo droho lobhas tathā tṛṣā
d pravṛddhe parivardhante rajasy etāni nityaśaḥ
d viṣādaḥ saṃśayo mohas tandrī nidrā bhayaṃ tathā
d tamasy etāni vardhante pravṛddhe hetvahetubhiḥ
d evam anyonyam etāni vardhante ca punaḥ punaḥ
d hīyante ca tathā nityam abhibhūtāni bhūribhiḥ
d tatra yat prītisaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet
d vartate sāttviko bhāva ity upekṣeta tat tathā
d yadā saṃtāpasaṃyuktaṃ cittakṣobhakaraṃ bhavet
d vartate raja ity evaṃ tadā tad abhicintayet
d yadā saṃmohasaṃyuktaṃ yad viṣādakaraṃ bhavet
d apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ tamas tad upadhārayet
d samāsāt sāttviko dharmaḥ samāsād rājasaṃ dhanam
d samāsāt tāmasaḥ kāmas trivarge triguṇakramāt
d brahmādidevasṛṣṭir yā sāttvikīti prakīrtyate
d rājasī mānuṣī sṛṣṭis tiryagyonis tu tāmasī
d ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ
d jaghanyaguṇavṛttisthā adho gacchanti tāmasāḥ
d devamānuṣatiryakṣu yad bhūtaṃ sacarācaram
d ādiprabhṛti saṃyuktaṃ vyāptam ebhis tribhir guṇaiḥ
d ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi mahadādīni liṅgataḥ
d vijñānaṃ ca vivekaś ca mahato lakṣaṇaṃ bhavet
d mahān buddhir matiḥ prajñā nāmāni mahato viduḥ
d mahadādikriyāyoge mahattvaṃ copajāyate
d abhimānaḥ punas tatra mahato vaikṛtād bhavet
d ahaṃkāraḥ sa vijñeyo lakṣaṇena samāsataḥ
d ahaṃkāreṇa bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prabhavāpyayau
d ahaṃkāranivṛttir hi nirvāṇāyopapadyate
d khaṃ vāyur agniḥ salilaṃ pṛthivī ceti pañcamī
d mahābhūtāni bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prabhavāpyayau
d śabdaḥ śrotraṃ tathā khāni trayam ākāśasaṃbhavam
d sparśas tvak prāṇināṃ ceṣṭā pavanasya guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
d rūpaṃ pāko 'kṣiṇī jyotiś catvāras tejaso guṇāḥ
d rasaḥ snehas tathā jihvā śaityaṃ ca jalajā guṇāḥ
d gandho ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca pṛthivyās te guṇās trayaḥ
d iti sarvaguṇā devi vyākhyātāḥ pāñcabhautikāḥ
d guṇān pūrvasya pūrvasya prāpnuvanty uttarāṇi tu
d tasmān naikaguṇāś ceha dṛśyante bhūtasṛṣṭayaḥ
d upalabhyāpsu ye gandhaṃ ke cid brūyur anaipuṇāḥ
d apāṃ gandhaguṇaṃ prājñā necchanti kamalekṣaṇe
d tad gandhatvam apāṃ nāsti pṛthivyā eva tadguṇaḥ
d bhūmer gandho rase sneho jyotiś cakṣuṣi saṃsthitam
d prāṇāpānāśrayo vāyuḥ kheṣv ākāśaḥ śarīriṇām
d keśāsthinakhadantatvakpāṇipādaśirāṃsi ca
d pṛṣṭhodarakaṭigrīvāḥ sarvaṃ bhūmyātmakaṃ smṛtam
d yat kiṃ cid api kāye 'smin dhātudoṣamalāśritam
d tat sarvaṃ bhautikaṃ viddhi dehe naivāsty abhautikam
d buddhīndriyāṇi karṇas tvag akṣi jihvātha nāsikā
d karmendriyāṇi vāk pāṇiḥ pādo meḍhraṃ gudaṃ tathā
d śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥ
d buddhīndriyārthāñ jānīyād bhūtebhyas tv abhiniḥsṛtān
d vākyaṃ kriyā gatiḥ prītir utsargaś ceti pañcadhā
d karmendriyārthāñ jānīyāt te ca bhūtodbhavā matāḥ
d indriyāṇāṃ tu sarveṣām īśvaraṃ mana ucyate
d prārthanālakṣaṇaṃ tac ca indriyaṃ tu manaḥ smṛtam
d niyuṅkte ca sadā tāni bhūtātmā manasā saha
d niyame ca visarge ca manasaḥ kāraṇaṃ prabhuḥ
d indriyāṇīndriyārthāś ca svabhāvaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ
d bhūtābhūtavikāraś ca śarīram iti saṃjñitam
d śarīrāc ca paro dehī śarīraṃ ca vyapāśritaḥ
d śarīriṇaḥ śarīrasya yo 'ntaraṃ vetti vai muniḥ
d arasasparśagandhaṃ ca rūpaśabdavivarjitam
d aśarīraṃ śarīreṣu didṛkṣeta nirindriyam
d avyaktaṃ sarvadeheṣu martyeṣv amaram āśritam
d yaḥ paśyet paramātmānaṃ bandhanaiḥ sa vimucyate
d naivāyaṃ cakṣuṣā grāhyo nāparair indriyair api
d manasaiṣa pradīpena mahān ātmā pradṛśyate
d sa hi sarveṣu bhūteṣu sthāvareṣu careṣu ca
d vasaty eko mahāvīryo nānābhāvasamanvitaḥ
d naiva cordhvaṃ na tiryak ca nādhastān na kutaś cana
d indriyair iha buddhyā vā na dṛśyeta kadā cana
d navadvāraṃ puraṃ gatvā haṃso 'sau nīyate vaśam
d īśvaraḥ sarvabhūteṣu sthāvarasya carasya ca
d tam evāhur aṇubhyo 'ṇuṃ taṃ mahadbhyo mahattaram
d bahudhā sarvabhūtāni vyāpya tiṣṭhati śāśvataḥ
d kṣetrajñam ekataḥ kṛtvā sarvaṃ kṣetram athaikataḥ
d evaṃ saṃvimṛśej jñānī saṃyataḥ satataṃ hṛdā
d puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān
d akartālepako nityo madhyasthaḥ sarvakarmaṇām
d kāryakāraṇakartṛtve hetuḥ prakṛtir ucyate
d puruṣaḥ sukhaduḥkhānāṃ bhoktṛtve hetur ucyate
d ajaro 'yam acintyo 'yam avyakto 'yaṃ sanātanaḥ
d dehe tejomayo dehī tiṣṭhatīty apare viduḥ
d jñānam ūṣmā ca vāyuś ca śarīre jīvasaṃjñitaḥ
d ity eke niścitā buddhyā tatra ye buddhicintakāḥ
d apare sarvalokāṃś ca vyāpya tiṣṭhantam īśvaram
d bruvate ke cid atraiva tile tailavad āsthitam
d apare nāstikā mūḍhā hīnatvāt sūkṣmalakṣaṇaiḥ
d nāsty ātmeti viniścitya prāhus te nirayālayāḥ
d evaṃ nānāvidhānena vimṛśanti maheśvaram
d ūhavān brāhmaṇo loke nityam avyayam akṣaram
d asty ātmā sarvadeheṣu hetus tatra sudurgamaḥ
d ṛṣibhiś cāpi devaiś ca vyaktam eṣa tu dṛśyate
d dṛṣṭvātataṃ mahātmānaṃ punas tan na nivartate
d tasmāt taddarśanād eva vindate paramāṃ gatim
d iti te kathito devi sāṃkhyadharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d kapilādibhir ācāryaiḥ sevitaḥ paramarṣibhiḥ
d sāṃkhyajñānena yuktānāṃ tad etat kīrtitaṃ mayā
d yogadharmaṃ punaḥ kṛtsnaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi me śṛṇu
d sa ca yogo dvidhā bhinno brahmadevarṣisevitaḥ
d samānam ubhayatrāpi vṛttaṃ śāstrapracoditam
d sa cāṣṭaguṇam aiśvaryam adhikṛtya vidhīyate
d sāyujyaṃ sarvadevānāṃ yogadharmaḥ paraḥ smṛtaḥ
d jñānaṃ sarvasya yogasya mūlam ity avadhāraya
d vratopavāsaniyamais tais tais tat paribṛṃhayet
d aikātmyaṃ buddhimanasor indriyāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
d ātmany avyayini prājñe jñānam etat tu yoginām
d arcayed brāhmaṇān agnīn devatāyatanāni ca
d varjayed aśivāṃ vācaṃ bhavet sattvam upāśritaḥ
d dānam adhyayanaṃ śraddhā vratāni niyamās tathā
d samyag āhāraśuddhiś ca śaucam indriyanigrahaḥ
d etais tu vardhate tejaḥ pāpaṃ cāpy avadhūyate
d dhūtapāpmā ca tejasvī laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ
d niḥśoko nirmalo dāntaḥ paścād yogaṃ samācaret
d avadadhyān manaḥ pūrvaṃ matsyaghāta ivāmiṣam
