d ekānte vijane deśe sarvataḥ saṃvṛte śucau
d kalpayed āsanaṃ tatra svāstīrṇaṃ mṛdubhiḥ kuśaiḥ
d upaviśyāsane tasminn ṛjukāyaśirodharaḥ
d avyagraḥ sukham āsīnaḥ svāṅgāni na vikampayet
d saṃprekṣya nāsikāgraṃ svaṃ diśaś cānavalokayan
d bhruvor madhye manaḥ kṛtvā cintayitvā śarīriṇam
d yato yato niścarati manaś cañcalam asthiram
d tatas tato niyamyaitad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet
d manovasthāpanaṃ devi yogasyopaniṣad bhavet
d tasmāt sarvaprayatnena mano 'vasthāpayet sadā
d tvak śrotraṃ ca tato jihvāṃ ghrāṇaṃ cakṣuś ca saṃharet
d pañcendriyāṇi saṃdhāya manasi sthāpayed budhaḥ
d sarvaṃ cāpohya saṃkalpam ātmani sthāpayen manaḥ
d yadaitāny avatiṣṭhante manaḥṣaṣṭhāni cātmani
d prāṇāpānau tadā tasya yugapat tiṣṭhato vaśe
d prāṇe hi vaśam āpanne yogasiddhir dhruvā bhavet
d śarīraṃ cintayet sarvaṃ vipāṭya ca samīpataḥ
d antardehagatiṃ cāpi prāṇānāṃ paricintayet
d tato mūrdhānam agniṃ ca śārīraṃ paripālayan
d prāṇo mūrdhani cāgnau ca vartamāno viceṣṭate
d sa jantuḥ sarvabhūtātmā puruṣaḥ sa sanātanaḥ
d mano buddhir ahaṃkāro bhūtāni viṣayāṃś ca saḥ
d bastimūlaṃ gudaṃ caiva pāvakaṃ ca samāśritaḥ
d vahan mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ cāpy apānaḥ parivartate
d adhaḥpravṛttir deheṣu karmāpānasya tan matam
d udīrayan sarvadhātūn ata ūrdhvaṃ pravartate
d udāna iti taṃ vidyur adhyātmakuśalā janāḥ
d saṃdhau saṃdhau saṃniviṣṭaḥ sarvaceṣṭāpravartakaḥ
d śarīreṣu manuṣyāṇāṃ vyāna ity upadiśyate
d dhātuṣv agnau ca vitataḥ samāno 'gniḥ samīraṇaḥ
d sa eva sarvaceṣṭānām antakāle nivartakaḥ
d prāṇānāṃ saṃnipāteṣu saṃsargād yaḥ prajāyate
d ūṣmā so 'gnir iti jñeyaḥ so 'nnaṃ pacati dehinām
d apānaprāṇayor madhye prāṇāpānasamāhitaḥ
d samanvitaḥ samānena samyak pacati pāvakaḥ
d adhas tv agnir apānena prāṇena paripālyate
d pṛṣṭhatas tu samānena svāṃ svāṃ gatim upāśritaḥ
d śarīramadhye nābhiḥ syān nābhyām agniḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
d agnau prāṇāś ca saṃsaktāḥ prāṇeṣv ātmā vyavasthitaḥ
d pakvāśayas tv adho nābher ūrdhvam āmāśayaḥ smṛtaḥ
d nābhir madhye śarīrasya sarvaprāṇās tam āśritāḥ
d sthitāḥ prāṇādayaḥ sarve tiryag ūrdhvam adhaścarāḥ
d vahanty annarasān nāḍyo daśa prāṇapracoditāḥ
d yoginām eṣa mārgas tu pañcasv eteṣu tiṣṭhati
d jitaśramaḥ samāsīno mūrdhany ātmānam ādadhet
d mūrdhany ātmānam ādhāya bhruvor madhye manas tathā
d saṃnirudhya tataḥ prāṇān ātmānaṃ cintayet param
d prāṇe tv apānaṃ yuñjīta prāṇāṃś cāpānakarmaṇi
d prāṇāpānagatī ruddhvā prāṇāyāmaparo bhavet
d evam antaḥ prayuñjīta pañca prāṇān parasparam
d vijane saṃmitāhāro munis tūṣṇīṃ nirucchvasan
d aśrāntaś cintayed yogam utthāya ca punaḥ punaḥ
d tiṣṭhan gacchan svapan vāpi yuñjītaivam atandritaḥ
d evaṃ niyuñjatas tasya yogino yuktacetasaḥ
d prasīdati manaḥ kṣipraṃ prasanne dṛśyate paraḥ
d vidhūma iva dīpto 'gnir āditya iva raśmimān
d vaidyuto 'gnir ivākāśe dṛśyate puruṣo 'vyayaḥ
d dṛṣṭvā tad ātmāno jyotir aiśvaryāṣṭaguṇair yutam
d prāpnoti paramaṃ sthānaṃ spṛhaṇīyaṃ surair api
d imān yogasya doṣāṃś ca daśaiva paricakṣate
d doṣair vighno varārohe yogināṃ kavibhiḥ smṛtaḥ
d kāmaṃ krodhaṃ bhayaṃ svapnaṃ sneham atyaśanaṃ tathā
d vaicityaṃ vyādhim ālasyaṃ lobhaṃ ca daśamaṃ smṛtam
d etais teṣāṃ bhaved vighno daśabhir devakāritaiḥ
d tasmād etān apāsyādau yuñjīta capalaṃ manaḥ
d imān api guṇān aṣṭau yogasya paricakṣate
d guṇais tair aṣṭabhir dravyam aiśvaryam adhigamyate
d aṇimā mahimā caiva prāptiḥ prākāśyalāghave
d īśitvaṃ ca vaśitvaṃ ca yatrakāmāvasāyitā
d etān aṣṭau guṇān prāpya kathaṃ cid yogināṃ varāḥ
d īśāḥ sarvasya lokasya devān apy atiśerate
d yogo 'sti naivātyaśino na caikāntam anaśnataḥ
d na cātisvapnaśīlasya nātijāgaratas tathā
d yuktāhāravihārasya yuktaceṣṭasya karmasu
d yuktasvapnāvabodhasya yogo bhavati duḥkhahā
d anenaiva vidhānena sāyujye 'pi prakalpate
d sāyujyaṃ devasātkṛtya prayuñjītātmabhaktitaḥ
d ananyamanasā devi nityaṃ tadgatacetasā
d sāyujyaṃ prāpyate devair yatnena mahatā cirāt
d havibhir arcanair homaiḥ praṇāmair nityacintayā
d arcayitvā yathāśakti svakaṃ devaṃ viśanti te
d sāyujyānāṃ viśiṣṭe dve māmakaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tathā
d māṃ prāpya na nivartante viṣṇuṃ vā śubhalocane
d iti te kathito devi yogadharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
d umā
d na śakyaṃ praṣṭum apy anyair yogadharmas tvayā vinā
d triyakṣa tridaśaśreṣṭha tryambaka tridaśādhipa
d tripurāntaka kāmāṅgahara tripathagādhara
d dakṣayajñapramathana śūlapāṇe 'risūdana
d namas te lokapāleśa lokapāla varaprada
d naikaśākham aparyantam adhyātmajñānam uttamam
d apratarkyam anirdeśyaṃ sāṃkhyayogasamanvitam
d bhavatā parituṣṭena śṛṇvantyā mama bhāṣitam
d idānīṃ śrotum icchāmi sāyujyaṃ tvadgataṃ vibho
d kathaṃ paricaranty ete bhaktās tvāṃ parameṣṭhinam
d ācāraḥ kīdṛśas teṣāṃ kena tuṣṭo bhaved bhavān
d maheśvaraḥ
d varṇyamānaṃ tvayā sākṣāt prīṇayaty adhikaṃ hi mām
d hanta te kathayiṣyāmi mama sāyujyam adbhutam
d yena tena nivartante yuktāḥ paramayoginaḥ
d avyakto 'ham acintyo 'haṃ pūrvair api maharṣibhiḥ
d sāṃkhyayogau mayā sṛṣṭau sarvaṃ cāpi carācaram
d arcanīyo 'ham īśo 'ham avyayo 'haṃ sanātanaḥ
d ahaṃ prasanno bhaktānāṃ dadāmy amaratām api
d na māṃ viduḥ suragaṇā munayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
d tvatpriyārtham ahaṃ devi madvibhūtiṃ bravīmi te
d āśramebhyaś caturbhyo 'haṃ caturo brāhmaṇāñ śubhe
d madbhaktān nirmalān puṇyān samānīya tapasvinaḥ
d vyācakhye 'haṃ tadā devi yogaṃ pāśupataṃ mahat
d gṛhītaṃ tac ca taiḥ sarvaṃ mukhāc ca mama dakṣiṇāt
d śrutvā ca triṣu lokeṣu sthāpitaṃ cāpi taiḥ punaḥ
d idānīṃ ca tvayā pṛṣṭas tvatpriyārtham anindite
d tat sarvaṃ kathayiṣyāmi tat tvam ekamanāḥ śṛṇu
d ahaṃ paśupatir nāma madbhaktā ye ca mānavāḥ
d sarve pāśupatā jñeyā bhasmadigdhatanūruhāḥ
d rakṣārthaṃ maṅgalārthaṃ ca pavitrārthaṃ ca bhāmini
d liṅgārthaṃ caiva bhaktānāṃ bhasma dattaṃ mayā purā
d tena saṃdigdhasarvāṅgā bhasmanā brahmacāriṇaḥ
d jaṭilā muṇḍitā vāpi nānākṛtaśikhaṇḍinaḥ
d vikṛtāḥ piṅgalābhāś ca nagnā nānāprahāriṇaḥ
d bhaikṣaṃ carantaḥ sarvatra niḥspṛhā niṣparigrahāḥ
d kapālahastā madbhaktā manniveśitabuddhayaḥ
d caranto nikhilaṃ lokaṃ mama harṣavivardhanāḥ
d mama pāśupataṃ divyaṃ yogaśāstram anuttamam
d sūkṣmaṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu vimṛśantaś caranti te
d evaṃ nityābhiyuktānāṃ madbhaktānāṃ tapasvinām
d upāyaṃ cintayāmy āśu yena mām upayānti te
d sthāpitaṃ triṣu lokeṣu śivaliṅgaṃ mayā priye
d namaskāreṇa vā tasya mucyate sarvakilbiṣaiḥ
d iṣṭaṃ dattam adhītaṃ ca yajñāś ca sahadakṣiṇāḥ
d śivaliṅgapraṇāmasya kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm
d arcayā śivaliṅgasya parituṣyāmy ahaṃ priye
d śivaliṅgārcanāyāṃ tu vidhānam api me śṛṇu
d gokṣīranavanītābhyām arcayed yaḥ śivaṃ mama
d iṣṭasya hayamedhasya yat phalaṃ tasya tad bhavet
d ghṛtamaṇḍena yo nityam arcayed dhi śivaṃ mama
d sa phalaṃ prāpnuyān martyo brāhmaṇasyāgnihotriṇaḥ
d kevalenāpi toyena snāpayed yaḥ śivaṃ mama
d sa cāpi labhate puṇyaṃ matpriyaś ca bhaven naraḥ
d saghṛtaṃ gugguluṃ samyag dhūpayed yaḥ śivāntike
d gosavasya tu yajñasya yat phalaṃ tasya tad bhavet
d yas tu guggulupiṇḍena kevalenāpi dhūpayet
d tasya rukmapradānasya yat phalaṃ tasya tad bhavet
d yas tu nānāvidhaiḥ puṣpair mama liṅgaṃ samarcayet
d sa hi dhenusahasrasya dattasya phalam āpnuyāt
d yas tu deśāntaraṃ gatvā śivaliṅgaṃ samarcayet
d tasmāt sarvamanuṣyeṣu nāsti me priyakṛttamaḥ
d evaṃ nānāvidhair dravyaiḥ śivaliṅgaṃ samarcayet
d matprasādān manuṣyeṣu na punar jāyate naraḥ
d arcanābhir namaskārair upahāraiḥ stavair api
d bhakto mām arcayen nityaṃ śivaliṅgeṣv atandritaḥ
d palāśabilvapatrāṇi rājavṛkṣasrajas tathā
d arkapuṣpāṇi medhyāni matpriyāṇi viśeṣataḥ
d phalaṃ vā yadi vā śākaṃ puṣpaṃ vā yadi vā jalam
d dattaṃ saṃprīṇayed devi bhaktair madgatamānasaiḥ
d mamābhiparituṣṭasya nāsti loke sudurlabham
d tasmāt te satataṃ bhaktā mām evābhyarcayanty uta
d madbhaktā na vinaśyanti madbhaktā vītakalmaṣāḥ
d madbhaktāḥ sarvalokeṣu pūjanīyā viśeṣataḥ
d maddveṣiṇaś ca ye martyā madbhaktadveṣiṇas tathā
d yānti te narakaṃ kṣipram iṣṭvā kratuśatair api
d etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yogaṃ pāśupataṃ mama
d madbhaktair manujair devi śrāvyam etad dine dine
d śṛṇuyād yaḥ paṭhed vāpi mamaitaṃ dharmaniścayam
d nāradaḥ
d svargaṃ kīrtiṃ dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ labheta sa narottamaḥ
d evam uktvā mahādevaḥ śrotukāmaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ
d maheśvaraḥ
d anukūlāṃ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ pārśvasthāṃ samabhāṣata
d parāvarajñe dharmāṇāṃ tapovananivāsinām
d dīkṣādamaśamopete satataṃ vratacāriṇi
d pṛcchāmi tvā varārohe pṛṣṭā vada mamepsitam
d sāvitrī brahmaṇaḥ patnī kauśikasya śacī śubhā
d lakṣmīr viṣṇoḥ priyatamā dhṛtir bhāryā yamasya tu
d mārkaṇḍeyasya dhūmorṇā ṛddhir vaiśravaṇasya tu
d varuṇasya tathā gaurī savituś ca suvarcalā
d rohiṇī śaśino bhāryā svāhā vahner aninditā
d kaśyapasyāditiś caiva vasiṣṭhasyāpy arundhatī
d etāś cānyāś ca devyas tu sarvās tāḥ patidevatāḥ
d śrūyante lokavikhyātās tvayā caiva sahoṣitāḥ
d tābhiś ca pūjitā sā tvam anuvṛttyānubhāṣaṇaiḥ
d tasmāt tvāṃ paripṛcchāmi dharmajñe lokasaṃmate
d strīdharmaṃ śrotum icchāmi tvayaiva samudāhṛtam
d sadharmacāriṇī me tvaṃ samānavratacāriṇī
d samānasārā vīryeṇa mayaiva tvaṃ śubhānane
d mamaivārdhāc charīrasya nirmitāsi purā śubhe
d surakāryaṃ karoṣi tvaṃ lokasaṃdhāraṇī tathā
d ayaṃ hi strīgaṇas tvāṃ tu anuyāti na muñcati
d tvatprasādād dhitaṃ śrotuṃ strīvṛttaṃ śubhalakṣaṇe
d tvayā coktaṃ viśeṣeṇa gurubhūtaṃ hi tiṣṭhati
d striya eva sadā loke strīgaṇasya gatiḥ priye
d śaśvad gaur goṣu gaccheta nānyatra ramate manaḥ
d evaṃ lokagatir devi ādiprabhṛti vartate
d pramadoktaṃ tu yat kiṃ cit tat strīṣu bahu manyate
d na tathā manyate strīṣu puruṣoktam anindite
d tvayaiva vidito hy arthaḥ strīṇāṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
d tasmāt tvā paripṛcchāmi pṛṣṭā vada mamepsitam
d nāradaḥ
d evam uktā tadā devī mahādevena śobhanā
d sodvegā ca salajjā ca nāvadat tatra kiṃ cana
d punaḥ punas tadā devo devīṃ kim iti cābravīt
d bahuśaś coditā devī savrīḍā cedam abravīt
d umā
d bhagavan devadeveśa surāsuranamaskṛta
d maheśvaraḥ
d tvadantike mayā vaktuṃ strīṇāṃ dharmaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
d manniyogād avaśyaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ hi mama priye
d umā
d imā nadyo mahādeva sarvatīrthodakānvitāḥ
d upasparśanahetos tvāṃ na tyajanti samīpataḥ
d etābhiḥ saha saṃmantrya pravakṣyāmi tavepsitam
d ayuktaṃ satsu tajjñeṣu tān atikramya bhāṣitum
d nāradaḥ
d mayā saṃmānitāś caiva bhaviṣyanti saridvarāḥ
d iti matvā mahādevī nadīr devīḥ samāhvayat
d vipāśāṃ ca vitastāṃ ca candrabhāgāṃ sarasvatīm
d śatadruṃ devikāṃ sindhuṃ gomatīṃ kauśikīṃ tathā
d yamunāṃ narmadāṃ caiva kāverīm atha nimnagām
d tathā devanadīṃ gaṅgāṃ prāptāṃ tripathagāṃ śubhām
d sarvatīrthodakavahāṃ sarvapāpavināśanīm
d umā
d etā nadīḥ samāhūya samudvīkṣyedam abravīt
d he he puṇyāḥ saricchreṣṭhāḥ sarvapāpavinodakāḥ
d jñānavijñānasaṃpannāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ vacanaṃ mama
d ayaṃ bhagavatā praśna uktaḥ strīdharmam āśritaḥ
d na caikayā mayā sādhyas tasmād vas tv ānayāmy aham
d yuṣmābhis tad vicāryaiva vaktum icchāmi śobhanāḥ
d nāradaḥ
d tat kathaṃ devadevāya vācyaḥ strīdharma uttamaḥ
d iti pṛṣṭās tayā devyā devanadyaś cakampire
d tāsāṃ śreṣṭhatamā gaṅgā vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
d dhanyāś cānugṛhītāḥ sma anena vacanena te
d yā tvaṃ surāsurair mānyā nadīr mānayase 'naghe
d tavaivārhanti kalyāṇi evaṃ sāntvaprasādanam
d aśakyam api ye mūrkhāḥ svātmasaṃbhāvanāyutāḥ
d vākyaṃ vadanti saṃsatsu svayam eva yatheṣṭataḥ
d yaḥ śaktaś cānahaṃvādī sudurlabhatamo mataḥ
d tvaṃ hi śaktā satī devī vaktuṃ praśnam aśeṣataḥ
d vyāhartuṃ necchasi strītvāt saṃpūjayasi nas tathā
d tvaṃ hi devasamā devi ūhāpohaviśāradā
d divyajñānayutā devi divyajñānendhanedhitā
d tvam evārhasi tad vaktuṃ strīṇāṃ dharmaṃ śubhāśubham
d yācāmahe vayaṃ śrotum amṛtaṃ tvanmukhodgatam
d kuru devi priyaṃ devi vada strīdharmam uttamam
d nāradaḥ
d evaṃ prasāditā devī gaṅgayā lokapūjitā
d umā
d prāha sarvam aśeṣeṇa strīdharmaṃ surasundarī
d bhagavan devadeveśa sureśvara maheśvara
d tvatprasādāt suraśreṣṭha tavaiva priyakāmyayā
d nāradaḥ
d tam ahaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi yathāvac chrotum arhasi
d evaṃ bruvantyāṃ strīdharmaṃ devyāṃ devasya śāsanāt
d ṛṣigandharvayakṣāṇāṃ yoṣitaś cāpsarogaṇāḥ
d nāgabhūtastriyaś caiva nadyaś caiva samāgatāḥ
d śrotukāmāḥ paraṃ vākyaṃ sarvāḥ paryavatasthire
d umā devī mudā yuktā pūjyamānāṅganāgaṇaiḥ
d ānṛśaṃsyaparā devī satataṃ strīgaṇaṃ prati
d strīgaṇasya hitārthāya bhavapriyacikīrṣayā
d umā
d vaktuṃ vacanam ārebhe strīṇāṃ dharmāśritaṃ hitam
d bhagavan sarvadharmajña śrūyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama
d ṛtuprāptā suśuddhā yā kanyā sety abhidhīyate
d tāṃ tu kanyāṃ pitā mātā bhrātā mātula eva vā
d pitṛvyaś ceti pañcaite dātuṃ prabhavatāṃ gatāḥ
d vivāhāś ca tathā pañca tāsāṃ dharmārthakāraṇāt
d kāmataś ca mitho dānaṃ bhayāc ca prasabhāt tathā
d dattā yasya bhaved bhāryā eteṣāṃ yena kena cit
d dātāraḥ saṃvimṛśyaiva dātum arhanti nānyathā
d uttamānāṃ tu varṇānāṃ mantravatpāṇisaṃgrahaḥ
d vivāhakaraṇaṃ cāhuḥ śūdrāṇāṃ saṃprayogataḥ
d yadā dattā bhavet kanyā tasmai bhāryārthine svakaiḥ
d tadāprabhṛti sā nārī daśarātraṃ vivarjya ca
d manasā karmaṇā vācā hy anukūlā ca sā bhavet
d iti bhartṛvrataṃ kuryāt patim uddiśya śobhanā
d tadāprabhṛti sā nārī tat tat kuryāt patipriyam
d yad yad icchati vai bhartā dharmakāmārthakāraṇāt
d tadaivānupriyā bhūtvā tathaivopacaret patim
d pativratātvaṃ nārīṇām etad eva samāsataḥ
d tādṛśā sā bhaven nityaṃ yādṛśas tu bhavet patiḥ
d śubhāśubhasamācāre etad vṛttaṃ samāsataḥ
d daivataṃ satataṃ sādhvī bhartāraṃ yānupaśyati
d daivam eva bhavet tasyāḥ patir ity avagamyate
d etasmin kāraṇe deva paurāṇī śrūyate śrutiḥ
d kathayāmi prasādāt te śṛṇu deva samāhitaḥ
d kasya cit tv atha viprasya bhārye hi dve babhūvatuḥ
d tayor ekā dharmakāmā devān uddiśya bhaktitaḥ
d bhartāram avamatyaiva devatāsu samāhitā
d cakāra vipulaṃ dharmaṃ pūjanārcanayānvitam
d aparā dharmakāmā ca patim uddiśya śobhanā
d bhartāraṃ daivataṃ kṛtvā cakāra kila tatpriyam
d evaṃ saṃvartamāne tu yugapan maraṇe 'dhvani
d gate kila mahādeva tatraikā yā pativratā
d devapriyāyāṃ tiṣṭhantyāṃ puṇyalokaṃ jagāma sā
d devapriyā ca tiṣṭhantī vilalāpa suduḥkhitā
d tāṃ yamo lokapālas tu babhāṣe puṣkalaṃ vacaḥ
d mā śocīs tvaṃ nivartasva na lokāḥ santi te śubhe
d svadharmavimukhāsi tvaṃ tasmāl lokā na santi te
d daivataṃ hi patir nāryāḥ sthāpitaṃ sarvadaivataiḥ
d avamatya śubhe taṃ tvaṃ kathaṃ lokān gamiṣyasi
d mohena tvaṃ varārohe na jānīṣe svadaivatam
d patimatyā striyā kāryo dharmaḥ patyarpitas tv iti
d tasmāt tvaṃ hi nivartasva kuru patyāśritaṃ hitam
d tadā gantāsi lokāṃs tān yān gacchanti pativratāḥ
d nānyathā śakyate prāptuṃ patnīnāṃ loka uttamaḥ
d yamenaivaṃvidhaṃ coktvā nivṛtya punar eva sā
d babhūva patim ālambya patipriyaparāyaṇā
d evam etan mahādeva daivataṃ hi patiḥ striyaḥ
d umā
d tasmāt patiparā bhūtvā patiṃ paricared iti
d patimatyā divārātraṃ vṛttāntaḥ śrūyatāṃ śubhaḥ
d patyuḥ pūrvaṃ samutthāya prātaḥkarma samādiśet
d patyur bhāvaṃ viditvā tu paścāt saṃbodhayet patim
d tataḥ paurvāhṇikaṃ kāryaṃ svayaṃ kuryād yathāvidhi
d nivedya ca tathāhāraṃ yathā saṃpadyatām iti
d tathaiva kuryāt tat sarvaṃ yathā patyuḥ priyaṃ bhavet
d yathā patyus tathā bhartur gurūṇāṃ pratipadyate
d śuśrūṣāpoṣaṇavidhau patipriyacikīrṣayā
d bhartur niṣkramaṇe kāryaṃ saṃsmared apramādataḥ
d āgataṃ tu patiṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasā paricārakaiḥ
d svayaṃ kurvīta saṃprītyā kāyaśramaharaṃ param
d pādyāsanābhyāṃ śayanair vākyaiś ca hṛdayapriyaiḥ
d atithīnām āgamane prītiyuktā sadā bhavet
d karmaṇā vacanenāpi toṣayed atithīn sadā
d maṅgalyaṃ gṛhaśaucaṃ ca sarvopakaraṇāni ca
d sarvakālam avekṣeta kārayantī ca kurvatī
d dharmakārye tu saṃprāpte tadvad dharmaparā bhavet
d arthakārye punar bhartuḥ pramādālasyavarjitā
d sā yatnaṃ paramaṃ kuryāt tasya sāhāyyakāraṇāt
d yugaṃdharā bhavet sādhvī patyur dharmārthayoḥ sadā
d vihārakāle vai bhartur jñātvā bhāvaṃ hṛdi sthitam
d alaṃkṛtya yathāyogaṃ hāvabhāvasamanvitā
d vākyair madhurasaṃyuktaiḥ smayantī toṣayet patim
d yena yena yathā tuṣyet tathā sā toṣayet patim
d kaṭhorāṇi na vācyāni anyadā pramadāntare
d yasyāṃ kāmī bhaved bhartā tasyāḥ prītikarā bhavet
d apramādaṃ puraskṛtya manasā joṣayet patim
d anantaraṃ tathānyeṣāṃ bhojanāvekṣaṇaṃ caret
d dāsīdāsabalīvardāṃś caṇḍālāṃś ca śunas tathā
d anāthān kṛpaṇāṃś caiva bhikṣukāṃś ca tathaiva ca
d pūjayed balibhaikṣeṇa patyur dharmavivṛddhaye
d kupitaṃ vārthahīnaṃ vā śrāntaṃ vopacaret patim
d yathā sa tuṣṭaḥ svasthaś ca bhavet saṃtoṣayet patim
d tathā kuṭumbacintāyāṃ vivāde cārthasaṃśaye
d āhūtā ca sahāyārthaṃ tadā priyahitaṃ vadet
d apriyaṃ vā hitaṃ brūyāt tasya kāmārthakāṅkṣayā
d ekāntacaryākathanaṃ kalahaṃ varjayet paraiḥ
d bahir ālokanaṃ caiva mohaṃ vrīḍāṃ ca paiśunam
d bahvāśitvaṃ divāsvapnam evamādīni varjayet
d rahasy ekāsanaṃ sādhvī na kuryād ātmajair api
d yad yad dadyān nidhatsveti nyāsavat paripālayet
d vismṛtaṃ vā patidravyaṃ pratidadyāt svaśaucataḥ
d yat kiṃ cit patinā dattaṃ tal labdhvā sumukhī bhavet
d atiyācñām atīrṣyāṃ ca dūrataḥ parivarjayet
d bālavad vṛddhavan nāryāḥ sadaivāturavat patiḥ
d bhāryayā vratam ity eva bhartavyaḥ satataṃ vibho
d etat pativratāvṛttam uktaṃ deva samāsataḥ
d na ca bhoge na caiśvarye na dhane na sukhe tathā
d spṛhā yasyā yathā patyau sā nārīṇāṃ pativratā
d patir hi daivataṃ strīṇāṃ patir bandhuḥ patir gatiḥ
d nānyāṃ gatim ahaṃ paśye pramadānāṃ yathā patiḥ
d jātiṣv api ca vai strītvaṃ viśiṣṭam iti me matiḥ
d kāyakleśena mahatā puruṣaḥ prāpnuyāt phalam
d tat sarvaṃ labhate nārī sevantīndriyagocarān
d yathāsukhaṃ patimatī sarvaṃ patyanukūlataḥ
d īdṛśaṃ dharmasaukaryaṃ paśyadhvaṃ pramadāḥ prati
d etad vismṛtya vartante kustriyaḥ pāpamohitāḥ
d tapaścaryā ca dānaṃ ca patau tasyāḥ samarpitau
d rūpaṃ kulaṃ yaśaḥ svargaḥ sarvaṃ tasmin pratiṣṭhitam
d evaṃvṛttasamācārā svavṛttenaiva śobhanā
d patinā ca samaṃ gacchet puṇyalokān svakarmaṇā
d vṛddho virūpo bībhatsur dhanavān nirdhano 'pi vā
d evaṃbhūto 'pi bhartā vai strīṇāṃ bhūṣaṇam uttamam
d āḍhyaṃ vā rūpayuktaṃ vā virūpaṃ dhanavarjitam
d yā patiṃ toṣayet sādhvī sā nārīṇāṃ pativratā
d daridrāṃś ca virūpāṃś ca pramūḍhān kuṣṭhasaṃyutān
d evaṃvidhān patīn deva toṣayitvā pativratā
d upary upari tāṃl lokān patyaiva saha gacchati
d evaṃ pravartamānāyāḥ patiḥ pūrvaṃ mriyeta cet
d tadānumaraṇaṃ gacchet punar dharmaṃ careta vā
d umā
d etad evaṃ mayā proktaṃ strīṇāṃ dharmāśritaṃ hitam
d evam etan mayā proktaṃ striyas tu bahudhā smṛtāḥ
d devatānāgagandharvamanuṣyā iti naikadhā
d saumyaśīlāḥ śubhācārāḥ sarvās tāḥ saṃbhavanti hi
d athāśubhaṃ pravakṣyāmi strīṇāṃ vṛttaṃ maheśvara
d āsuryaś caiva paiśācyo rākṣasyaś ca bhavanti yāḥ
d tāsāṃ vṛttam aśeṣeṇa śrūyatāṃ lokakāraṇāt
d nyāyato vānyathā proktā bhāvadoṣasamanvitāḥ
d bhartṝn apacaranty eva rāgadveṣabalātkṛtāḥ
d svadharmavimukhā bhūtvā praduṣyanti yatas tataḥ
d pravṛddhaviṣayā nityaṃ pratikūlaṃ vadanti ca
d arthān vināśayanty eva na gṛhṇanti hitaṃ kva cit
d svabuddhiniratā bhūtvā jīvanti ca yathā tathā
d guṇavatyaḥ kva cid bhūtvā patidharmaparā iva
d punar bhavanti pāpiṣṭhā viṣamaṃ vṛttam āśritāḥ
d anavasthitamaryādā bahuveṣā vyayapriyāḥ
d asaṃtuṣṭāś ca lubdhāś ca īrṣyākrodhayutā bhṛśam
d bhogapriyā hitadveṣyāḥ kāmabhogaparāyaṇāḥ
d patīn paribhavanty eva pratikūlaparāyaṇāḥ
d prāyaśo 'nṛtabhūyiṣṭhā gurūṇāṃ pratilomakāḥ
d evaṃyuktasamācārā āsuraṃ bhāvam āśritāḥ
d aparāḥ pāpakāriṇyaḥ satataṃ kalahapriyāḥ
d paruṣā rūkṣavacanā nirghṛṇā nirapatrapāḥ
d niḥsnehāḥ kopanāś caiva bhartṛputrasvabandhuṣu
d ghorā māṃsapriyā nityaṃ hasanti ca rudanti ca
d patīn vyabhicaranty evam unmārgeṇa yathā tathā
d bandhubhir bhartsitā bhūtvā gṛhakāryāṇi kurvate
d atha vā bhartsitā deva nīcavṛttāḥ svabandhuṣu
d tathaivātmavadhaṃ ghoraṃ vyavasyeyur na saṃśayaḥ
d nirdayā niranukrośāḥ kuṭumbārthavilopanāḥ
d dharmārtharahitā ghorāḥ satataṃ kurvate kriyāḥ
d anarthanipuṇāḥ pāpāḥ paraprāṇeṣu nirdayāḥ
d evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ striyaḥ paiśācyam āśritāḥ
d aparā mohasaṃyuktā nirlajjā rodanapriyāḥ
d aśuddhā maladigdhāṅgāḥ pānamāṃsaratā bhṛśam
d vadanty anṛtavākyāni hasanti vilapanti ca
d duṣprasādā mahākrodhāḥ svapnaśīlā nirantaram
d tāmasyo naṣṭatattvārthā mandaśīlā mahodarāḥ
d bhuñjanti vividhaṃ siddhaṃ bhojanaṃ tīvrasaṃbhramāḥ
d guṇarūpavayoyuktaṃ patiṃ kāmukam uttamam
d hitvānyān eva gacchanti sarvathā bhṛśapāpikāḥ
d nirlajjā dharmasaṃdigdhāḥ pratikūlāḥ samantataḥ
d evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ striyo rākṣasyam āśritāḥ
d evaṃvidhānāṃ sarvāsāṃ na paratreha vā sukham
d etāsām eva kustrīṇāṃ mṛtānāṃ ca maheśvara
d asaṃśayaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ narake vāsa iṣyate
d narakād dhi vimuktānāṃ kathaṃ cit kālaparyayāt
d iṣyate janma mānuṣyaṃ kaṣṭaṃ tatrāpi bhuñjate
d tāsāṃ duṣkṛtasaṃyogād duḥkhaṃ janmāntareṣv api
d daridrāḥ kleśabhūyiṣṭhā virūpāḥ kutsitāḥ paraiḥ
d vidhavā durbhagā vāpi labhante duḥkham īdṛśam
d śatavarṣasahasrāntam ātmānaṃ vyabhicāriṇī
d nayej jāraṃ ca nirayaṃ patiṃ pāpena yojayet
d etad yadi tu vijñāya punaś ced dhitam ātmanaḥ
d kuryur bhartāram āśritya tathā dharmam avāpnuyuḥ
d abhisaṃyānti tā lokān puṇyān paramaśobhanān
d avamatya tu yāḥ pūrvaṃ patiṃ duṣṭena cetasā
d vartamānāś ca satataṃ bhartṝṇāṃ pratikūlatām
d bhartrānumaraṇaṃ kāle yāḥ kurvanti tathāvidhāḥ
d kāmāt krodhād bhayān mohād apahāsyā bhavanti tāḥ
d ādiprabhṛti kustrīṇāṃ tathānumaraṇaṃ vṛthā
d ādiprabhṛti yā sādhvī bhartuḥ priyaparāyaṇā
d ūrdhvaṃ gacchati sā tatra bhartrānumaraṇaṃ gatā
d evaṃ mṛtāyā vai lokān ahaṃ paśyāmi cakṣuṣā
d spṛhaṇīyān suragaṇair yān gacchanti pativratāḥ
d atha vā bhartari mṛte vaidhavyaṃ dharmam āśritā
d mṛtaṃ ca patim uddiśya kuryāc caivaṃvidhaṃ tapaḥ
d evaṃ gacchati sā nārī patīnāṃ lokam uttamam
d ramaṇīyam anirdeśyaṃ duṣprāpaṃ devamānuṣaiḥ
d prāpnuyāt tādṛśaṃ lokaṃ kevalaṃ yā pativratā
d iti te kathitaṃ deva strīṇāṃ dharmam anuttamam
d tavaiva priyakāminyā yan mayoktaṃ tavāgrataḥ
d nāradaḥ
d cāpalyān mama deveśa tad bhavān kṣantum arhati
d evaṃ vadantīṃ rudrāṇīṃ lajjābhāvasamanvitām
d toṣayām āsa deveśo vācā saṃpūjayan priyām
d ṛṣayo devagandharvāḥ sāsurāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥ
d daivatapramadāś cāpi devanadyaś ca saṃgatāḥ
d praṇamya śirasā devīṃ stutibhiś cāpi tuṣṭuvuḥ
d pūjayām āsur apare devadevaṃ mudā yutāḥ
d apare vismayān nocus tam artham abhicintya vai
d saṃprahṛṣṭamanāḥ śarvaḥ saṃvādaṃ cintayan muhuḥ
d tatra tasmin kṣaṇe devīṃ devo vacanam abravīt
d śṛṇu kalyāṇi madvākyaṃ yad idaṃ tu tvayā mayā
d kṛtaṃ saṃvādam abhavat tat trilokaṃ gamiṣyati
d puṇyaṃ pavitram ākhyānaṃ bhavitā tan na saṃśayaḥ
d ya idaṃ śrāvayed vidvān saṃvādaṃ tv āvayoḥ priye
d śucir bhūtvā narān yuktān sa yajñaphalam āpnuyāt
d ye tv enaṃ śṛṇuyur nityaṃ dharmyaṃ tadgatamānasāḥ
d śravaṇād eva teṣāṃ tu mahad dharmaphalaṃ bhavet
d kathayec chṛṇuyād vāpi yaḥ kaś cin nityam āhnikam
d sa bhaven matpriyo devi taṃ smarāmi dine dine
d ya imaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ saṃvādaṃ cāvayoḥ śubham
d kīrtim āyuṣyam ārogyaṃ paratreha sa vindati
d nāradaḥ
d śrutvā cemaṃ prayoktā tu kathaṃ sa na bhaven mahān
d ity uktvā sa mahādevas tatraivāntaradhīyata
d devīṃ devaṃ vayaṃ tatra nāpaśyāma prabhāvataḥ
d evaṃ purā mayāścaryaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ haimavate vane
d caratā tīrthayātrārthaṃ purā keśiniṣūdana
d bhīṣmaḥ
d tad adya kathitaṃ sarvaṃ tava keśava śṛṇvataḥ
d etāvad uktvā devarṣir nārado virarāma ha
d vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
d tad adya nikhilenaiva kathitaṃ te yudhiṣṭhira
d dharmarājas tu tac chrutvā bhrātṛbhir mudito 'bhavat
d tat sarvaṃ nikhilaṃ proktaṃ taveha janamejaya
d ṛṣayaḥ
d pinākin bhaganetraghna sarvalokanamaskṛta
d maheśvaraḥ
d māhātmyaṃ vāsudevasya śrotum icchāma śaṃkara
d pitāmahād api varaḥ śāśvataḥ puruṣo hariḥ
d kṛṣṇo jāmbūnadābhāso vyabhre sūrya ivoditaḥ
d daśabāhur mahātejā devatāriniṣūdanaḥ
d śrīvatsāṅko hṛṣīkeśaḥ sarvadaivatapūjitaḥ
d brahmā tasyodaraśayas tathāhaṃ ca śirobhavaḥ
d śiroruhebhyo jyotīṃṣi romabhyaś ca surāsurāḥ
d ṛṣayo dehasaṃbhūtās tasya lokāś ca śāśvatāḥ
d pitāmahagṛhaṃ sākṣāt sarvadevagṛhaṃ ca saḥ
d so 'syāḥ pṛthivyāḥ kṛtsnāyāḥ sraṣṭā tribhuvaneśvaraḥ
d saṃhartā caiva bhūtānāṃ sthāvarasya carasya ca
d sa devaripujit sākṣād devanāthaḥ paraṃtapaḥ
d sarvajñaḥ sarvasaṃśliṣṭaḥ sarvagaḥ sarvatomukhaḥ
d paramātmā hṛṣīkeśaḥ sarvavyāpī maheśvaraḥ
d na tasmāt paramaṃ bhūtaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kiṃ cana
d surakāryārtham utpanno mānuṣaṃ vapur āsthitaḥ
d na hi devagaṇāḥ śaktās trivikramavinākṛtāḥ
d bhuvane devakāryāṇi kartuṃ nāyakavarjitāḥ
d nāyakaḥ sarvadevānāṃ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtaḥ
d etasya devanāthasya devakāryaparasya ca
d brahmabhūtasya satataṃ brahmarṣiśaraṇasya ca
d brahmā vasati garbhasthaḥ śarīre sukhasaṃsthitaḥ
d sarvāḥ sukhasthitāś caiva śarīre tasya devatāḥ
d sa devaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ śrīgarbhaḥ śrīsahoṣitaḥ
d śārṅgacakrāyudhaḥ khaḍgī sarvanāgaripudhvajaḥ
d uttamena ca śaucena śīlena ca damena ca
d parākrameṇa vīryeṇa vapuṣā darśanena ca
d āroheṇa pramāṇena dhairyeṇārjavasaṃpadā
d ānṛśaṃsyena rūpeṇa balena ca samanvitaḥ
d astraiḥ samuditaḥ sarvair divyaiś cādbhutadarśanaiḥ
d yogamāyaḥ sahasrākṣo niravadyo mahāmanāḥ
d dhīro mitrajanaślāghī jñātibandhujanapriyaḥ
d kṣamāvān anahaṃvādī brahmaṇyo brahmanāyakaḥ
d bhayahartā bhayārtānāṃ mitrāṇāṃ nandivardhanaḥ
d śaraṇyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dīnānāṃ pālane rataḥ
d śrutavān arthasaṃpannaḥ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtaḥ
d samāśritānām upakṛc chatrūṇām api dharmavit
d matimān nītisaṃpanno brahmacārī jitendriyaḥ
d bhavārtham iha devānāṃ buddhyā paramayā yutaḥ
d prājāpatye śubhe mārge mānave dharmasaṃhite
d samutpatsyati govindo manor vaṃśe mahātmanaḥ
d aṅganāmā manoḥ putras tv antardhāmā tataḥ paraḥ
d antardhāmno havirdhāmā prajāpatir aninditaḥ
d prācīnabarhir bhavitā havirdhāmasuto mahān
d tasya pracetaḥpramukhā bhaviṣyanti daśātmajāḥ
d prācetasas tathā dakṣo bhaviteha prajāpatiḥ
d dākṣāyiṇyās tathādityo manur ādityatas tathā
d manoś ca vaṃśaja iḍā sudyumnaś ca bhaviṣyati
d budhāt purūravāś cāpi tasmād āyur bhaviṣyati
d nahuṣo bhavitā tasmād yayātis tasya cātmajaḥ
d yadus tasmān mahāsattvaḥ kroṣṭā tasmād bhaviṣyati
d kroṣṭuś caiva mahān putro vṛjinīvān bhaviṣyati
d vṛjinīvato hi bhavitā uṣadgur aparājitaḥ
d uṣadgor bhavitā putraḥ śūraś citrarathas tathā
d tasya tv avarajaḥ putraḥ śūro nāma bhaviṣyati
d teṣāṃ vikhyātavīryāṇāṃ cāritraguṇaśālinām
d yajvināṃ suviśuddhānāṃ vaṃśe brāhmaṇasaṃmate
d sa śūraḥ kṣatriyaśreṣṭho mahāvīryo mahāyaśāḥ
d svavaṃśavistarakaraṃ janayiṣyati mānadaḥ
d vasudeva iti khyātaṃ putram ānakaduṃdubhim
d tasya putraś caturbāhur vāsudevo bhaviṣyati
d dātā brāhmaṇasatkartā brahmabhūto dvijapriyaḥ
d rājñaḥ sarvāṃś ca ruddhān sa mokṣayiṣyati mānadaḥ
d jarāsaṃdhaṃ ca rājānaṃ nirjitya girigahvare
d sarvapārthivaratnāḍhyo bhaviṣyati sa vīryavān
d pṛthivyām apratihato vīryeṇa ca bhaviṣyati
d vikrameṇa ca saṃpannaḥ sarvapārthivapārthivaḥ
d śūraseneṣu saṃbhūto dvārakāyāṃ vasan prabhuḥ
d pālayiṣyati gāṃ devīṃ vijitya nayavat sadā
d taṃ bhavantaḥ samāsādya vāṅmālyair arhaṇair varaiḥ
d arcayantu yathānyāyaṃ brahmāṇam iva śāśvatam
d yo hi māṃ draṣṭum iccheta brahmāṇaṃ vā pitāmaham
d draṣṭavyas tena bhagavān vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān
d dṛṣṭe tasminn ahaṃ dṛṣṭo na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
d pitāmaho vā deveśa iti vitta tapodhanāḥ
d sa yasya puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ prītiyukto bhaviṣyati
d tasya devagaṇaḥ prīto brahmapūrvo bhaviṣyati
d yaś ca taṃ mānavo loke saṃśrayiṣyati keśavam
d tasya kīrtir jayaś caiva svargaś caiva bhaviṣyati
d dharmāṇāṃ deśikaḥ sākṣāt sa bhaviṣyati dharmabhāk
d dharmavidbhiḥ sa deveśo namaskāryaḥ sadodyataiḥ
d dharma eva paro hi syāt tasminn abhyarcite vibhau
d sa hi devo mahātejāḥ prajāhitacikīrṣayā
d dharmārthaṃ puruṣavyāghra ṛṣikoṭīḥ sasarja ha
d tāḥ sṛṣṭās tena vibhunā parvate gandhamādane
d sanatkumārapramukhās tiṣṭhanti tapasānvitāḥ
d tasmāt sa vāgmī dharmajño namasyo dvijapuṃgavāḥ
d vandito hi sa vandeta mānito mānayeta ca
d arcitaś cārcayen nityaṃ pūjitaḥ pratipūjayet
d dṛṣṭaḥ paśyed aharahaḥ saṃśritaḥ pratisaṃśrayet
d arcitaś cārcayen nityaṃ sa devo dvijasattamāḥ
d etat tasyānavadyasya viṣṇor vai paramaṃ vratam
d ādidevasya mahataḥ sajjanācaritaṃ sadā
d bhuvane 'bhyarcito nityaṃ devair api sanātanaḥ
d ubhayenānurūpeṇa yajante tam anuvratāḥ
d karmaṇā manasā vācā namasyaḥ sa dvijaiḥ sadā
d yatnavadbhir upasthāya draṣṭavyo devakīsutaḥ
d eṣa vo 'bhihito mārgo mayā vai munisattamāḥ
d taṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvaśo devā dṛṣṭāḥ syur munisattamāḥ
d mahāvarāhaṃ taṃ devaṃ sarvalokapitāmaham
d ahaṃ caiva namasyāmi nityam eva jagatpatim
d tatra vas tritayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
d samastā hi vayaṃ devās tasya dehe vasāmahe
d tasya caivāgrajo bhrātā sitābhranicayaprabhaḥ
d halī bala iti khyāto bhaviṣyati dharādharaḥ
d triśirās tasya devasya śātakaumbhamayo drumaḥ
d dhvajas tṛṇendro devasya bhaviṣyati rathāśritaḥ
d śiro nāgair mahābhogaiḥ parikīrṇaṃ mahātmanaḥ
d bhaviṣyati mahābāhoḥ sarvalokeśvarasya hi
d cintitāni sameṣyanti śastrāṇy astrāṇi caiva ha
d anantaś ca sa evokto bhagavān harir avyayaḥ
d samādiṣṭaḥ sa vibudhair darśayantam iti prabho
d suparṇo yasya vīryeṇa kaśyapasyātmajo balī
d antaṃ naivāśakad draṣṭuṃ devasya paramātmanaḥ
d sa ca śeṣe vicarate parayā vai mudā yutaḥ
d antar vasati bhogena parirabhya vasuṃdharām
d sa eṣa viṣṇuḥ so 'nanto bhagavān vasudhādharaḥ
d yo rāmaḥ sa hṛṣīkeśo yo 'cyutaḥ sa dharādharaḥ
d tāv ubhau puruṣavyāghrau divyau divyavapurdharau
d draṣṭavyau mānanīyau ca cakralāṅgaladhāriṇau
d eṣa yo 'nugrahaḥ prokto mayā puṇyas tapodhanāḥ
d nāradaḥ
d yaṃ bhavanto dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ pūjayeyuḥ prayatnataḥ
d atha vyomni mahāñ śabdaḥ savidyut stanayitnumān
d meghaiś ca gaganaṃ nīlaiḥ saṃruddham abhavad ghanaiḥ
d prāvṛṣīva ca parjanyo vavṛṣe nirmalaṃ payaḥ
d nabhaś caivābhavad ghoraṃ diśaś ca na cakāśire
d tato devagirau tasmin ramye puṇye sanātane
d na śarvaṃ bhūtasaṃghaṃ vā dadṛśur munayas tadā
d vyabhraṃ ca gaganaṃ sadyaḥ kṣaṇena samapadyata
d tīrthayātrāṃ tato viprā jagmuś cānye yathāgatam
d tad adbhutam acintyaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā te vismitābhavan
d śaṃkarasyomayā sārdhaṃ saṃvādaṃ tatkathāśrayam
d bhagavān puruṣavyāghro brahmabhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ
d yadartham anuśiṣṭāḥ smo giripṛṣṭhe mahātmanā
d dvitīyam adbhutam idaṃ tvattejaḥkṛtam adya vai
d dṛṣṭvātivismitāḥ kṛṣṇa sā ca naḥ smṛtir āgatā
d etat te devadevasya māhātmyaṃ kathitaṃ vibho
d kapardino girīśasya mahābāho janārdana
d ity uktaḥ sa tadā kṛṣṇas tapovananivāsibhiḥ
d mānayām āsa tān sarvān ṛṣīn devakinandanaḥ
d atharṣayaḥ saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ punas te kṛṣṇam abruvan
d punaḥ saṃdarśayasvāsmān sadaiva madhusūdana
d na hi naḥ sā ratiḥ svarge yā ca tvaddarśane vibho
d tādṛśaṃ ca mahābāho yathāha bhagavān bhavaḥ
d etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ rahasyam arikarśana
d tvam eva hy arthatattvajñaḥ pṛṣṭo 'smān pṛcchase sadā
d tad asmābhir idaṃ guhyaṃ tvatpriyārtham udāhṛtam
d na ca te 'viditaṃ kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
d janma caiva prasūtiś ca yac cānyat kāraṇaṃ bhuvi
d vayaṃ tu baṭucāpalyād aśaktā guhyadhāraṇe
d tataḥ sthite tvayi vibho laghutvāt pralapāmahe
d na hi kiṃ cit tad āścaryaṃ yan na vetti bhavān iha
d divi vā bhuvi vā deva sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tava
d sādhayāma vayaṃ deva vṛddhiṃ puṣṭim avāpnuhi
d putras te sadṛśas tāta viśiṣṭo vā bhaviṣyati
d bhīṣmaḥ
d mahāprabhāvasaṃyukto dīptikīrtikaraḥ prabho
d tataḥ praṇamya deveśaṃ yādavaṃ puruṣottamam
d pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya prajagmus te maharṣayaḥ
d so 'yaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān dīptyā paramayā yutaḥ
d vrataṃ yathāvat tac cīrtvā dvārakāṃ punar āgamat
d pūrṇe ca daśame māsi putro 'sya paramādbhutaḥ
d rukmiṇyāṃ saṃmato jajñe śūro vaṃśadharaḥ prabho
d sa kāmaḥ sarvajantūnāṃ sarvabhāgavato nṛpa
d surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca caraty antargataḥ sadā
d so 'yaṃ puruṣaśārdūlo meghavarṇaś caturbhujaḥ
d saṃśritaḥ pāṇḍavān premṇā bhavantaś cainam āśritāḥ
d kīrtir lakṣmīr dhṛtiś caiva svargamārgas tathaiva ca
d yatraiṣa saṃsthitas tatra devo viṣṇus trivikramaḥ
d sendrā devās trayastriṃśat sthitā nātra vicāraṇā
d ādidevo mahādevo bhūtānāṃ ca pratiśrayaḥ
d anādinidhano 'vyakto mahātmā madhusūdanaḥ
d svayaṃjāto mahātejāḥ surāṇām arthasiddhaye
d sudustarārthatattvasya vaktā kartā ca mādhavaḥ
d tava pārtha jayaḥ kṛtsnas tava kīrtis tathātulā
d taveyaṃ pṛthivī kṛtsnā nārāyaṇasamāśrayāt
d ayaṃ nāthas tavācintyo yasya nārāyaṇo hṛdi
d sa bhavān bhūmipādhvaryū raṇāgnau hutavān nṛpān
d kṛṣṇaḥ sruveṇa mahatā yugāntāgnisamena vai
d duryodhanas tu śocyo 'sau saputrabhrātṛbāndhavaḥ
d kṛtavān yo 'budhaḥ kopād dharigāṇḍīvavigraham
d daiteyā dānavendrāś ca mahākāyā mahābalāḥ
d cakrāgnau kṣayam āpannā dāvāgnau śalabhā iva
d pratiyoddhuṃ na śakyo hi mānuṣair eṣa saṃyuge
d nihīnaiḥ puruṣavyāghra sattvaśaktibalādibhiḥ
d jayo yo 'yaṃ yugāntābhaḥ savyasācī raṇāgragaḥ
d tejasā hatavān sarvaṃ suyodhanabalaṃ nṛpa
d yat tu vai vṛṣabhāṅkena munibhyaḥ samudāhṛtam
d purāṇaṃ himavatpṛṣṭhe tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
d yāvad asyodbhavas tuṣṭis tejo vīryaṃ parākramaḥ
d prabhāvaḥ sannatir janma kṛṣṇe tat tritayaṃ vibho
d na śakyam anyathā kartuṃ tad yadi syāt tathāpy aṇu
d yatra kṛṣṇo hi bhagavāṃs tatra tuṣṭir anuttamā
d vayaṃ hi bālamatayaḥ paranetrāḥ suviklavāḥ
d jñānapūrvaṃ prapannāḥ smo mṛtyoḥ panthānam uttamam
d bhavāṃś cāpy ārjavaparaḥ sarvaṃ kṛtvā pratiśrayam
d rājavṛttān na calate pratijñāpālane rataḥ
d apy evātmavadhaṃ loke rājaṃs tvaṃ bahu manyase
d na hi pratijñayā dattaṃ taṃ prahātum ariṃdama
d kālenāyaṃ janaḥ sarvo nihato raṇamūrdhani
d vayaṃ ca kālena hatāḥ kālo hi parameśvaraḥ
d na hi kālena kālajña spṛṣṭaḥ śocitum arhati
d kālo lohitaraktākṣaḥ kṛṣṇo daṇḍī sanātanaḥ
d tasmāt kuntīsuta jñātīn neha śocitum arhasi
d vyapetamanyur nityaṃ tvaṃ bhava kauravanandana
d mādhavasya ca māhātmyaṃ śrutaṃ yat kathitaṃ mayā
d tad eva tava paryāptaṃ sajjanasya nidarśanam
d vyāsasya vacanaṃ śrutvā nāradasya ca dhīmataḥ
d svayaṃ caiva mahārāja kṛṣṇasyārhattamasya vai
d prabhāvaś carṣipūgasya kathitaḥ sumahān mayā
d maheśvarasya saṃvādaḥ śailaputryāś ca bhārata
d dhārayiṣyati yaś cemaṃ mahāpuruṣasaṃbhavam
d śṛṇuyāt kathayed vā yaḥ sa vai śreyo labhet param
d bhavitāraś ca tasyātha sarve kāmā yathepsitāḥ
d pretya māheśvaraṃ lokaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ
d nāyaṃ śreyobhikāmena pratipattuṃ janārdane
d eṣa vai cākṣayo vipraiḥ smṛto rājañ janārdanaḥ
d maheśvaramukhotsṛṣṭā ye ca dharmaguṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
d te tvayā manasā dhāryāḥ kururāja divāniśam
d evaṃ te vartamānasya samyagdaṇḍadharasya ca
d prajāpālanadakṣasya svargaloko bhaviṣyati
d dharmeṇa hi sadā rājā prajā rakṣitum arhati
d yas tasya vipulo daṇḍaḥ samyag dharmaḥ sa kīrtyate
d sa eṣa kathito rājan mayā sajjanasaṃnidhau
d śaṃkarasyomayā sārdhaṃ saṃvādo dharmasaṃhitaḥ
d śrutvā vā śrotukāmo vāpy arcayed vṛṣabhadhvajam
d viśuddhena hi bhāvena ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
d eṣa tasyānavadyasya nāradasya mahātmanaḥ
d saṃdeśo devapūjārthaṃ taṃ tathā kuru pāṇḍava
d etad atyadbhutaṃ vṛttaṃ puṇyaṃ haimavate girau
d vāsudevasya kaunteya sthāṇoś caiva svabhāvajam
d daśa varṣasahasrāṇi badaryām eṣa sātvataḥ
d tapaś cacāra vipulaṃ saha gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
d triyugau puṇḍarīkākṣau vāsudevadhanaṃjayau
d viditau nāradād etau mama vyāsāc ca pārthiva
d bāla eva mahābāhuś cakāra kadanaṃ mahat
d kaṃsasya puṇḍarīkākṣo jñātitrāṇārthakāraṇāt
d karmaṇām asya kaunteya nāntaṃ saṃkhyātum utsahe
d śāśvatasya purāṇasya puruṣasya yudhiṣṭhira
d dhruvaṃ śreyaḥ paraṃ tāta bhaviṣyati tavottamam
d yasya te puruṣavyāghraḥ sahāyo 'yaṃ janārdanaḥ
d duryodhanaṃ tu śocāmi pretyaloke 'tidurmatim
d yatkṛte pṛthivī sarvā vinaṣṭā sahayadvipā
d duryodhanāparādhena karṇasya śakunes tathā
d vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
d duḥśāsanacaturthānāṃ kuravo nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
d evaṃ prabhāṣamāṇe tu gāṅgeye puruṣarṣabhe
d tūṣṇīṃ babhūva kauravyo madhye teṣāṃ mahātmanām
d tac chrutvā vismayaṃ jagmur dhṛtarāṣṭrādayo nṛpāḥ
d saṃpūjya manasā kṛṣṇaṃ sarve prāñjalayo 'bhavan
d ṛṣayaś cāpi te sarve nāradapramukhās tathā
d pratigṛhyābhyanandanta tad vākyaṃ pratipūjya ca
d ity etad akhilaṃ sarvaṃ pāṇḍavo bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
d śrutavān sumahac citraṃ puṇyaṃ bhīṣmānuśāsanam
d yudhiṣṭhiras tu gāṅgeyaṃ viśrāntaṃ bhūridakṣiṇam
d punar eva mahābuddhiḥ paryapṛcchan mahīpatiḥ
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d ka upāyo varaprāptau sarveṣāṃ pāpakarmaṇām
d bhīṣmaḥ
d jñānasya ca parasyeha tan me brūhi pitāmaha
d upāyo 'yaṃ varaprāptau paramaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
d nārāyaṇasya tu dhyānam arcanaṃ yajanaṃ stutiḥ
d śravaṇaṃ tatkathānāṃ ca vidvatsaṃrakṣaṇaṃ tathā
d vidvacchuśrūṣaṇaprītir upadeśānupālanam
d saṃdhyānena japenāśu mucyate prākṛto 'pi ca
d japaś caturvidhaḥ prokto vaidikas tāntriko 'pi ca
d paurāṇiko 'tha vidvadbhiḥ kathitaḥ smārta eva ca
d dvijaśuśrūṣayā jñānaṃ vidvatsaṃrakṣaṇena vā
d nāsādhyaṃ jñānināṃ kiṃ cit tasmād rakṣyā dvijās tvayā
d suvratā bandhuhīnaikā vane pūrvaṃ yamena tu
d āsīd āśvāsitā vidvatsaṃrakṣaṇaphalāt kila
d viprasya maraṇe hetus tatpatnī pitṛśokadā
d vaiśyā tvam abhilāṣeyaṃ viprakanyeti sāṃpratam
d ity uktāśvāsitāpṛcchat kenaivaṃ pāpasaṃyutā
d yamaḥ
d jātā viprakule samyak śreyaś cāpi bravīhi me
d anyajanmani vidvāṃsaṃ prahārair abhipīḍitam
d coraśaṅkāvimokṣeṇa mokṣayitvā sujanmikā
d ity uktāṣṭākṣaradhyānajapādiśreyasā tu sā
d yamenānugṛhītābhūt puṇyalokanivāsinī
d tan nityaṃ viduṣāṃ rakṣātatparo bhava bhūpate
d teṣāṃ saṃrakṣaṇāt tuṣṭaḥ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a śrutvā dharmān aśeṣeṇa pāvanāni ca sarvaśaḥ
c yudhiṣṭhiraḥ śāṃtanavaṃ punar evābhyabhāṣata
a kim ekaṃ daivataṃ loke kiṃ vāpy ekaṃ parāyaṇam
c stuvantaḥ kaṃ kam arcantaḥ prāpnuyur mānavāḥ śubham
a ko dharmaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ bhavataḥ paramo mataḥ
c kiṃ japan mucyate jantur janmasaṃsārabandhanāt
 bhīṣma uvāca
a jagatprabhuṃ devadevam anantaṃ puruṣottamam
c stuvan nāmasahasreṇa puruṣaḥ satatotthitaḥ
a tam eva cārcayan nityaṃ bhaktyā puruṣam avyayam
c dhyāyan stuvan namasyaṃś ca yajamānas tam eva ca
a anādinidhanaṃ viṣṇuṃ sarvalokamaheśvaram
c lokādhyakṣaṃ stuvan nityaṃ sarvaduḥkhātigo bhavet
a brahmaṇyaṃ sarvadharmajñaṃ lokānāṃ kīrtivardhanam
c lokanāthaṃ mahad bhūtaṃ sarvabhūtabhavodbhavam
a eṣa me sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmo 'dhikatamo mataḥ
c yad bhaktyā puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ stavair arcen naraḥ sadā
a paramaṃ yo mahat tejaḥ paramaṃ yo mahat tapaḥ
c paramaṃ yo mahad brahma paramaṃ yaḥ parāyaṇam
a pavitrāṇāṃ pavitraṃ yo maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam
c daivataṃ devatānāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ yo 'vyayaḥ pitā
a yataḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni bhavanty ādiyugāgame
c yasmiṃś ca pralayaṃ yānti punar eva yugakṣaye
a tasya lokapradhānasya jagannāthasya bhūpate
c viṣṇor nāmasahasraṃ me śṛṇu pāpabhayāpaham
a yāni nāmāni gauṇāni vikhyātāni mahātmanaḥ
c ṛṣibhiḥ parigītāni tāni vakṣyāmi bhūtaye
 viṣṇor nāmasahasrasya vedavyāso mahān ṛṣiḥ
 chando 'nuṣṭup tathā devo bhagavān viśvarūpadhṛk
 ṛṣir nāmnāṃ sahasrasya vedavyāso mahāmuniḥ
 chando 'nuṣṭup tathā devo bhagavān devakīsutaḥ
 amṛtāṃśūdbhavo bījaṃ śaktir devakīnandanaḥ
 trisāmā hṛdayaṃ tasya śāntyarthe viniyujyate
 viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuṃ mahāviṣṇuṃ prabhaviṣṇuṃ maheśvaram
 anekarūpadaityāntaṃ namāmi puruṣottamam
a viśvaṃ viṣṇur vaṣaṭkāro bhūtabhavyabhavatprabhuḥ
c bhūtakṛd bhūtabhṛd bhāvo bhūtātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ
a pūtātmā paramātmā ca muktānāṃ paramā gatiḥ
c avyayaḥ puruṣaḥ sākṣī kṣetrajño 'kṣara eva ca
a yogo yogavidāṃ netā pradhānapuruṣeśvaraḥ
c nārasiṃhavapuḥ śrīmān keśavaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
a sarvaḥ śarvaḥ śivaḥ sthāṇur bhūtādir nidhir avyayaḥ
c saṃbhavo bhāvano bhartā prabhavaḥ prabhur īśvaraḥ
a svayaṃbhūḥ śaṃbhur ādityaḥ puṣkarākṣo mahāsvanaḥ
c anādinidhano dhātā vidhātā dhātur uttamaḥ
a aprameyo hṛṣīkeśaḥ padmanābho 'maraprabhuḥ
c viśvakarmā manus tvaṣṭā sthaviṣṭhaḥ sthaviro dhruvaḥ
a agrāhyaḥ śāśvataḥ kṛṣṇo lohitākṣaḥ pratardanaḥ
c prabhūtas trikakubdhāma pavitraṃ maṅgalaṃ param
a īśānaḥ prāṇadaḥ prāṇo jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ prajāpatiḥ
c hiraṇyagarbho bhūgarbho mādhavo madhusūdanaḥ
a īśvaro vikramī dhanvī medhāvī vikramaḥ kramaḥ
c anuttamo durādharṣaḥ kṛtajñaḥ kṛtir ātmavān
a sureśaḥ śaraṇaṃ śarma viśvaretāḥ prajābhavaḥ
c ahaḥ saṃvatsaro vyālaḥ pratyayaḥ sarvadarśanaḥ
a ajaḥ sarveśvaraḥ siddhaḥ siddhiḥ sarvādir acyutaḥ
c vṛṣākapir ameyātmā sarvayogaviniḥsṛtaḥ
a vasur vasumanāḥ satyaḥ samātmā saṃmitaḥ samaḥ
c amoghaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣo vṛṣakarmā vṛṣākṛtiḥ
a rudro bahuśirā babhrur viśvayoniḥ śuciśravāḥ
c amṛtaḥ śāśvataḥ sthāṇur varāroho mahātapāḥ
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d pitāmaha mahāprājña sarvaśāstraviśārada
d kiṃ japyaṃ japato nityaṃ bhaved dharmaphalaṃ mahat
d prasthāne vā praveśe vā pravṛtte vāpi karmaṇi
d daive vā śrāddhakāle vā kiṃ japyaṃ karmasādhanam
d śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ rakṣā śatrughnaṃ bhayanāśanam
d bhīṣmaḥ
d japyaṃ yad brahmasamitaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati
d vyāsaproktam imaṃ mantraṃ śṛṇuṣvaikamanā nṛpa
d sāvitryā vihitaṃ divyaṃ sadyaḥ pāpavimocanam
d śṛṇu mantravidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ procyamānaṃ mayānagha
d yaṃ śrutvā pāṇḍavaśreṣṭha sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
d rātrāv ahani dharmajña yena pāpair na lipyate
d tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣvaikamanā nṛpa
d āyuṣmān bhavate caiva yaṃ śrutvā pārthivātmaja
d puruṣas tu susiddhārthaḥ pretya ceha ca modate
d sevitaṃ satataṃ rājan purā rājarṣisattamaiḥ
d kṣatradharmaparair nityaṃ satyavrataparāyaṇaiḥ
d idam āhnikam avyagraṃ kurvadbhir niyataiḥ sadā
d nṛpair bharataśārdūla prāpyate śrīr anuttamā
d namo vasiṣṭhāya mahāvratāya
d parāśaraṃ vedanidhiṃ praṇamya
d namo 'stv anantāya mahoragāya
d namo 'stu siddhebhya ihākṣayebhyaḥ
d namo 'stv ṛṣibhyaḥ paramaṃ pareṣāṃ
d deveṣu devaṃ varadaṃ varāṇām
d sahasraśīrṣāya namaḥ śivāya
d sahasranāmāya janārdanāya
d ajaikapād ahirbudhnyaḥ pinākī cāparājitaḥ
d ṛtaś ca pitṛrūpaś ca tryambakaś ca maheśvaraḥ
d vṛṣākapiś ca śaṃbhuś ca havano 'theśvaras tathā
d ekādaśaite prathitā rudrās tribhuvaneśvarāḥ
d śatam etat samākhyātaṃ śatarudre mahātmanām
d aṃśo bhagaś ca mitraś ca varuṇaś ca jaleśvaraḥ
d tathā dhātāryamā caiva jayanto bhāskaras tathā
d tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathaivendro dvādaśo viṣṇur ucyate
d ity ete dvādaśādityāḥ kāśyapeyā iti śrutiḥ
d dharo dhruvaś ca somaś ca sāvitro 'thānilo 'nalaḥ
d pratyūṣaś ca prabhāsaś ca vasavo 'ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ
d nāsatyaś cāpi dasraś ca smṛtau dvāv aśvināv api
d mārtaṇḍasyātmajāv etau saṃjñānāsāvinirgatau
d ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi lokānāṃ karmasākṣiṇaḥ
d api yajñasya vettāro dattasya sukṛtasya ca
d adṛśyāḥ sarvabhūteṣu paśyanti tridaśeśvarāḥ
d śubhāśubhāni karmāṇi mṛtyuḥ kālaś ca sarvaśaḥ
d viśvedevāḥ pitṛgaṇā mūrtimantas tapodhanāḥ
d munayaś caiva siddhāś ca tapomokṣaparāyaṇāḥ
d śucismitāḥ kīrtayatāṃ prayacchanti śubhaṃ nṛṇām
d prajāpatikṛtān etāṃl lokān divyena tejasā
d vasanti sarvalokeṣu prayatāḥ sarvakarmasu
d prāṇānām īśvarān etān kīrtayan prayato naraḥ
d dharmārthakāmair vipulair yujyate sa hi nityaśaḥ
d lokāṃś ca labhate puṇyān viśveśvarakṛtāñ śubhān
d ete devās trayastriṃśat sarvabhūtagaṇeśvarāḥ
d nandīśvaro mahākāyo grāmaṇīr vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ
d īśvarāḥ sarvalokānāṃ gaṇeśvaravināyakāḥ
d saumyā raudragaṇāś caiva yogabhūtagaṇās tathā
d jyotīṃṣi sarito vyoma suparṇaḥ patageśvaraḥ
d pṛthivyāṃ tapasā siddhāḥ sthāvarāś ca carāś ca ha
d himavān girayaś caiva catvāraś ca mahārṇavāḥ
d bhavasyānucarāḥ sarve haratulyaparākramāḥ
d viṣṇur devo 'tha jiṣṇuś ca skandaś cāmbikayā saha
d kīrtayan prayataḥ sarvān sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
d ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi mānavān ṛṣisattamān
d yavakrītaś ca raibhyaś ca arvāvasuparāvasū
d auśijaś caiva kakṣīvān balaś cāṅgirasaḥ sutaḥ
d ṛṣir medhātitheḥ putraḥ kaṇvo barhiṣadas tathā
d brahmatejomayāḥ sarve kīrtitā lokabhāvanāḥ
d labhante hi śubhaṃ sarve rudrānalavasuprabhāḥ
d bhuvi kṛtvā śubhaṃ karma modante divi daivataiḥ
d mahendraguravaḥ sapta prācīṃ vai diśam āśritāḥ
d prayataḥ kīrtayann etāñ śakraloke mahīyate
d unmucuḥ pramucuś caiva svastyātreyaś ca vīryavān
d dṛḍhavyaś cordhvabāhuś ca tṛṇasomāṅgirās tathā
d mitrāvaruṇayoḥ putras tathāgastyaḥ pratāpavān
d dharmarājartvijaḥ sapta dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritāḥ
d dṛḍheyuś ca ṛteyuś ca parivyādhaś ca kīrtimān
d ekataś ca dvitaś caiva tritaś cādityasaṃnibhāḥ
d atreḥ putraś ca dharmātmā ṛṣiḥ sārasvatas tathā
d varuṇasyartvijaḥ sapta paścimāṃ diśam āśritāḥ
d atrir vasiṣṭho bhagavān kaśyapaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
d gautamaś ca bharadvājo viśvāmitro 'tha kauśikaḥ
d ṛcīkatanayaś cogro jamadagniḥ pratāpavān
d dhaneśvarasya guravaḥ saptaite uttarāṃ śritāḥ
d apare munayaḥ sapta dikṣu sarvāsu dhiṣṭhitāḥ
d kīrtisvastikarā nṝṇāṃ kīrtitā lokabhāvanāḥ
d dharmaḥ kāmaś ca kālaś ca vasur vāsukir eva ca
d anantaḥ kapilaś caiva saptaite dharaṇīdharāḥ
d rāmo vyāsas tathā drauṇir aśvatthāmā ca lomaśaḥ
d ity ete munayo divyā ekaikaḥ saptasaptadhā
d śāntisvastikarā loke diśāṃ pālāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
d yasyāṃ yasyāṃ diśi hy ete tanmukhaḥ śaraṇaṃ vrajet
d sraṣṭāraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ kīrtitā lokapāvanāḥ
d saṃvarto merusāvarṇo mārkaṇḍeyaś ca dhārmikaḥ
d sāṃkhyayogau nāradaś ca durvāsāś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
d atyantatapaso dāntās triṣu lokeṣu viśrutāḥ
d apare rudrasaṃkāśāḥ kīrtitā brahmalaukikāḥ
d aputro labhate putraṃ daridro labhate dhanam
d tathā dharmārthakāmeṣu siddhiṃ ca labhate naraḥ
d pṛthuṃ vainyaṃ nṛpavaraṃ pṛthvī yasyābhavat sutā
d prajāpatiṃ sārvabhaumaṃ kīrtayed vasudhādhipam
d ādityavaṃśaprabhavaṃ mahendrasamavikramam
d purūravasamailaṃ ca triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
d budhasya dayitaṃ putraṃ kīrtayed vasudhādhipam
d trilokaviśrutaṃ vīraṃ bharataṃ ca prakīrtayet
d gavāmayena yajñena yeneṣṭaṃ vai kṛte yuge
d rantidevaṃ mahādevaṃ kīrtayet paramadyutim
d viśvajit tapasopetaṃ lakṣaṇyaṃ kāmalakṣaṇam
d tathā śvetaṃ ca rājarṣiṃ kīrtayet paramadyutim
d sthāṇuḥ prasādito yena yasyārthe hy andhako hataḥ
d mahādevaprasādena yena gaṅgāvatāritā
d bhagīrathaṃ durādharṣaṃ kīrtayet paramadyutim
d sagarasyātmajā yena plāvitās tāritās tathā
d hutāśanasamān etān mahārūpān mahaujasaḥ
d ugrakopān mahāsattvān kīrtayet kīrtivardhanān
d devān ṛṣigaṇāṃś caiva nṛpāṃś ca jagatīśvarān
d sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ ca paramaṃ havyaṃ kavyaṃ tathaiva ca
d kīrtitaṃ paramaṃ brahma sarvaśrutiparāyaṇam
d maṅgalyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ pavitraṃ bahukīrtitam
d vyādhipraśamanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ sarvakarmaṇām
d prayataḥ kīrtayec caitān kalyaṃ sāyaṃ ca bhārata
d ete vai yānti varṣanti bhānti vānti sṛjanti ca
d ete vināyakāḥ śreṣṭhā dakṣāḥ kṣāntā jitendriyāḥ
d narāṇām aśubhaṃ sarve vyapohanti prakīrtitāḥ
d sākṣibhūtā mahātmānaḥ pāpasya sukṛtasya ca
d etān vai kalyam utthāya kīrtayañ śubham aśnute
d nāgnicorabhayaṃ tatra na mārgapratirodhanam
d etān kīrtayatāṃ nityaṃ duḥsvapno naśyate nṛṇām
d mucyate sarvapāpebhyaḥ svastimāṃś ca gṛhān vrajet
d dīkṣākāleṣu sarveṣu yaḥ paṭhen niyato dvijaḥ
d nyāyavān ātmanirataḥ kṣānto dānto 'nasūyakaḥ
d rogārto vābhiyukto vā paṭhan pāpāt pramucyate
d vāstumadhye tu paṭhataḥ kulasvastyayanaṃ bhavet
d kṣetramadhye tu paṭhataḥ sarvaṃ sasyaṃ prarohati
d gacchataḥ kṣemam adhvānaṃ grāmāntaragataḥ paṭhan
d ātmanaś ca sutānāṃ ca dārāṇāṃ ca dhanasya ca
d bījānām oṣadhīnāṃ ca rakṣām etāṃ prayojayet
d etān saṃgrāmakāle tu paṭhataḥ kṣatriyasya tu
d vrajanti ripavo nāśaṃ kṣemaṃ ca vinivartate
d etān daive ca pitrye ca paṭhataḥ puruṣasya hi
d bhuñjate pitaro havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca tridivaukasaḥ
d na vyādhiśvāpadabhayaṃ na dvipān na hi taskarāt
d kaśmalaṃ laghutāṃ yāti pāpmanā ca pramucyate
d yānapātre ca yāne ca pravāse rājaveśmani
d parāṃ siddhim avāpnoti sāvitrīṃ hy uttamāṃ paṭhan
d na ca rājabhayaṃ teṣāṃ na piśācān na rākṣasāt
d nāgnyambupavanavyālād bhayaṃ tasyopajāyate
d caturṇām api varṇānām āśramasya viśeṣataḥ
d karoti satataṃ śāntiṃ sāvitrīm uttamāṃ paṭhan
d nāgnir dahati kāṣṭhāni sāvitrī yatra paṭhyate
d na tatra bālo mriyate na ca tiṣṭhanti pannagāḥ
d na teṣāṃ vidyate duḥkhaṃ gacchanti paramāṃ gatim
d ye śṛṇvanti mahad brahma sāvitrīguṇakīrtanam
d gavāṃ madhye tu paṭhato gāvo 'sya bahuvatsalāḥ
d prasthāne vā praveśe vā sarvāvasthāgataḥ paṭhet
d japatāṃ juhvatāṃ caiva nityaṃ ca prayatātmanām
d ṛṣīṇāṃ paramaṃ japyaṃ guhyam etan narādhipa
d yāthātathyena saṃgamya itihāsaṃ purātanam
d parāśaramataṃ divyaṃ śakrāya kathitaṃ purā
d tad etat te samākhyātaṃ tathyaṃ brahma sanātanam
d hṛdayaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śrutir eṣā purātanī
d somādityānvayāḥ sarve rāghavāḥ kuravas tathā
d paṭhanti śucayo nityaṃ sāvitrīṃ prāṇināṃ gatim
d abhyāśe nityaṃ devānāṃ saptarṣīṇāṃ dhruvasya ca
d mokṣaṇaṃ sarvakṛcchrāṇāṃ mocayaty aśubhāt sadā
d vṛddhaiḥ kāśyapagautamaprabhṛtibhir bhṛgvaṅgirotryādibhiḥ
d śukrāgastyabṛhaspatiprabhṛtibhir brahmarṣibhiḥ sevitam
d bhāradvājamataṃ ṛcīkatanayaiḥ prāptaṃ vasiṣṭhāt punaḥ
d sāvitrīm adhigamya śakravasubhiḥ kṛtsnā jitā dānavāḥ
d yo gośataṃ kanakaśṛṅgamayaṃ dadāti
d viprāya vedaviduṣe ca bahuśrutāya
d divyāṃ ca bhāratakathāṃ kathayec ca nityaṃ
d tulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati tasya ca tasya caiva
d dharmo vivardhati bhṛgoḥ parikīrtanena
d vīryaṃ vivardhati vasiṣṭhanamonatena

d vivakṣur asi yac cānyat tat te vakṣyāmi bhārata

c paṭhed ya icchet puruṣaḥ śreyaḥ prāptuṃ sukhāni ca
d etat stotraṃ bhagavatā vyāsena parikīrtitam
d yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyād vāpi śreyaḥ prāpnoty anuttamam
a viśveśvaram ajaṃ devaṃ jagataḥ prabhavāpyayam
c bhajanti ye puṣkarākṣaṃ na te yānti parābhavam
d arjuna uvāca
d padmapatraviśālākṣa padmanābha surottama
d śrībhagavān uvāca
d bhaktānām anuraktānāṃ trātā bhava janārdana
d yo māṃ nāmasahasreṇa stotum icchati pāṇḍava
d so 'ham ekena ślokena stuta eva na saṃśayaḥ

d phullāravindāyatapatranetra

d rudra uvāca
d rāma rāmeti rāmeti rame rāme manorame
