 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ke pūjyāḥ ke namaskāryāḥ kathaṃ varteta keṣu ca
c kimācāraḥ kīdṛśeṣu pitāmaha na riṣyate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a brāhmaṇānāṃ paribhavaḥ sādayed api devatāḥ
c brāhmaṇānāṃ namaskartā yudhiṣṭhira na riṣyate
a te pūjyās te namaskāryā vartethās teṣu putravat
c te hi lokān imān sarvān dhārayanti manīṣiṇaḥ
a brāhmaṇāḥ sarvalokānāṃ mahānto dharmasetavaḥ
c dhanatyāgābhirāmāś ca vāksaṃyamaratāś ca ye
a ramaṇīyāś ca bhūtānāṃ nidhānaṃ ca dhṛtavratāḥ
c praṇetāraś ca lokānāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ ca yaśasvinaḥ
a tapo yeṣāṃ dhanaṃ nityaṃ vāk caiva vipulaṃ balam
b mahātmanāṃ jñānavidāṃ tapa eva dhanaṃ param
c prabhavaś cāpi dharmāṇāṃ dharmajñāḥ sūkṣmadarśinaḥ
a dharmakāmāḥ sthitā dharme sukṛtair dharmasetavaḥ
c yān upāśritya jīvanti prajāḥ sarvāś caturvidhāḥ
a panthānaḥ sarvanetāro yajñavāhāḥ sanātanāḥ
c pitṛpaitāmahīṃ gurvīm udvahanti dhuraṃ sadā
a dhuri ye nāvasīdanti viṣame sadgavā iva
c pitṛdevātithimukhā havyakavyāgrabhojinaḥ
a bhojanād eva ye lokāṃs trāyante mahato bhayāt
c dīpāḥ sarvasya lokasya cakṣuś cakṣuṣmatām api
a sarvaśilpādinidhayo nipuṇāḥ sūkṣmadarśinaḥ
c gatijñāḥ sarvabhūtānām adhyātmagaticintakāḥ
a ādimadhyāvasānānāṃ jñātāraś chinnasaṃśayāḥ
c parāvaraviśeṣajñā gantāraḥ paramāṃ gatim
a vimuktā dhutapāpmāno nirdvaṃdvā niṣparigrahāḥ
c mānārhā mānitā nityaṃ jñānavidbhir mahātmabhiḥ
a candane malapaṅke ca bhojane 'bhojane samāḥ
c samaṃ yeṣāṃ dukūlaṃ ca śāṇakṣaumājināni ca
a tiṣṭheyur apy abhuñjānā bahūni divasāny api
c śoṣayeyuś ca gātrāṇi svādhyāyaiḥ saṃyatendriyāḥ
a adaivaṃ daivataṃ kuryur daivataṃ cāpy adaivatam
c lokān anyān sṛjeyuś ca lokapālāṃś ca kopitāḥ
a apeyaḥ sāgaro yeṣām abhiśāpān mahātmanām
c yeṣāṃ kopāgnir adyāpi daṇḍake nopaśāmyati
a devānām api ye devāḥ kāraṇaṃ kāraṇasya ca
c pramāṇasya pramāṇaṃ ca kas tān abhibhaved budhaḥ
a yeṣāṃ vṛddhaś ca bālaś ca sarvaḥ saṃmānam arhati
b teṣāṃ vṛddhāś ca bālāś ca sarve sanmārgadarśinaḥ
c tapovidyāviśeṣāt tu mānayanti parasparam
a avidvān brāhmaṇo devaḥ pātraṃ vai pāvanaṃ mahat
c vidvān bhūyastaro devaḥ pūrṇasāgarasaṃnibhaḥ
a avidvāṃś caiva vidvāṃś ca brāhmaṇo daivataṃ mahat
c praṇītaś cāpraṇītaś ca yathāgnir daivataṃ mahat
a śmaśāne hy api tejasvī pāvako naiva duṣyati
c havir yajñeṣu ca vahan bhūya evābhiśobhate
a evaṃ yady apy aniṣṭeṣu vartate sarvakarmasu
c sarvathā brāhmaṇo mānyo daivataṃ viddhi tat param
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kāṃ tu brāhmaṇapūjāyāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭvā janādhipa
c kaṃ vā karmodayaṃ matvā tān arcasi mahāmate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c pavanasya ca saṃvādam arjunasya ca bhārata
a sahasrabhujabhṛc chrīmān kārtavīryo 'bhavat prabhuḥ
c asya lokasya sarvasya māhiṣmatyāṃ mahābalaḥ
a sa tu ratnākaravatīṃ sadvīpāṃ sāgarāmbarām
c śaśāsa sarvāṃ pṛthivīṃ haihayaḥ satyavikramaḥ
a svavittaṃ tena dattaṃ tu dattātreyāya kāraṇe
c kṣatradharmaṃ puraskṛtya vinayaṃ śrutam eva ca
a ārādhayām āsa ca taṃ kṛtavīryātmajo munim
c nyamantrayata saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sa dvijaś ca varais tribhiḥ
a sa varaiś chanditas tena nṛpo vacanam abravīt
c sahasrabāhur bhūyāṃ vai camūmadhye gṛhe 'nyathā
a mama bāhusahasraṃ tu paśyantāṃ sainikā raṇe
c vikrameṇa mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ jayeyaṃ vipulavrata
e tāṃ ca dharmeṇa saṃprāpya pālayeyam atandritaḥ
a caturthaṃ tu varaṃ yāce tvām ahaṃ dvijasattama
c taṃ mamānugrahakṛte dātum arhasy anindita
e anuśāsantu māṃ santo mithyāvṛttaṃ tadāśrayam
a ity uktaḥ sa dvijaḥ prāha tathāstv iti narādhipam
c evaṃ samabhavaṃs tasya varās te dīptatejasaḥ
a tataḥ sa ratham āsthāya jvalanārkasamadyutiḥ
c abravīd vīryasaṃmohāt ko nv asti sadṛśo mayā
e vīryadhairyayaśaḥśaucair vikrameṇaujasāpi vā
a tadvākyānte cāntarikṣe vāg uvācāśarīriṇī
c na tvaṃ mūḍha vijānīṣe brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyād varam
e sahito brāhmaṇeneha kṣatriyo rakṣati prajāḥ
 arjuna uvāca
a kuryāṃ bhūtāni tuṣṭo 'haṃ kruddho nāśaṃ tathā naye
c karmaṇā manasā vācā na matto 'sti varo dvijaḥ
a pūrvo brahmottaro vādo dvitīyaḥ kṣatriyottaraḥ
c tvayoktau yau tu tau hetū viśeṣas tv atra dṛśyate
a brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśritāḥ kṣatraṃ na kṣatraṃ brāhmaṇāśritam
c śritān brahmopadhā viprāḥ khādanti kṣatriyān bhuvi
a kṣatriyeṣv āśrito dharmaḥ prajānāṃ paripālanam
c kṣatrād vṛttir brāhmaṇānāṃ taiḥ kathaṃ brāhmaṇo varaḥ
a sarvabhūtapradhānāṃs tān bhaikṣavṛttīn ahaṃ sadā
c ātmasaṃbhāvitān viprān sthāpayāmy ātmano vaśe
a kathitaṃ hy anayā satyaṃ gāyatryā kanyayā divi
c vijeṣyāmy avaśān sarvān brāhmaṇāṃś carmavāsasaḥ
a na ca māṃ cyāvayed rāṣṭrāt triṣu lokeṣu kaś cana
c devo vā mānuṣo vāpi tasmāj jyeṣṭho dvijād aham
a adya brahmottaraṃ lokaṃ kariṣye kṣatriyottaram
c na hi me saṃyuge kaś cit soḍhum utsahate balam
a arjunasya vacaḥ śrutvā vitrastābhūn niśācarī
c athainam antarikṣasthas tato vāyur abhāṣata
a tyajainaṃ kaluṣaṃ bhāvaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo namaskuru
c eteṣāṃ kurvataḥ pāpaṃ rāṣṭrakṣobho hi te bhavet
a atha vā tvāṃ mahīpāla śamayiṣyanti vai dvijāḥ
c nirasiṣyanti vā rāṣṭrād dhatotsāhaṃ mahābalāḥ
a taṃ rājā kas tvam ity āha tatas taṃ prāha mārutaḥ
c vāyur vai devadūto 'smi hitaṃ tvāṃ prabravīmy aham
 arjuna uvāca
a aho tvayādya vipreṣu bhaktirāgaḥ pradarśitaḥ
c yādṛśaṃ pṛthivī bhūtaṃ tādṛśaṃ brūhi vai dvijam
a vāyor vā sadṛśaṃ kiṃ cid brūhi tvaṃ brāhmaṇottamam
c apāṃ vai sadṛśaṃ brūhi sūryasya nabhaso 'pi vā
 vāyur uvāca
a śṛṇu mūḍha guṇān kāṃś cid brāhmaṇānāṃ mahātmanām
c ye tvayā kīrtitā rājaṃs tebhyo 'tha brāhmaṇo varaḥ
a tyaktvā mahītvaṃ bhūmis tu spardhayāṅganṛpasya ha
c nāśaṃ jagāma tāṃ vipro vyaṣṭambhayata kaśyapaḥ
a akṣayā brāhmaṇā rājan divi ceha ca nityadā
c apibat tejasā hy āpaḥ svayam evāṅgirāḥ purā
a sa tāḥ piban kṣīram iva nātṛpyata mahātapāḥ
c apūrayan mahaughena mahīṃ sarvāṃ ca pārthiva
a tasminn ahaṃ ca kruddhe vai jagat tyaktvā tato gataḥ
c vyatiṣṭham agnihotre ca ciram aṅgiraso bhayāt
a abhiśaptaś ca bhagavān gautamena puraṃdaraḥ
c ahalyāṃ kāmayāno vai dharmārthaṃ ca na hiṃsitaḥ
a tathā samudro nṛpate pūrṇo mṛṣṭena vāriṇā
c brāhmaṇair abhiśaptaḥ saṃl lavaṇodaḥ kṛto vibho
a suvarṇavarṇo nirdhūmaḥ saṃhatordhvaśikhaḥ kaviḥ
c kruddhenāṅgirasā śapto guṇair etair vivarjitaḥ
a marutaś cūrṇitān paśya ye 'hasanta mahodadhim
c suvarṇadhāriṇā nityam avaśaptā dvijātinā
a samo na tvaṃ dvijātibhyaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ viddhi narādhipa
c garbhasthān brāhmaṇān samyaṅ namasyati kila prabhuḥ
a daṇḍakānāṃ mahad rājyaṃ brāhmaṇena vināśitam
c tālajaṅghaṃ mahat kṣatram aurveṇaikena nāśitam
a tvayā ca vipulaṃ rājyaṃ balaṃ dharmaḥ śrutaṃ tathā
c dattātreyaprasādena prāptaṃ paramadurlabham
a agniṃ tvaṃ yajase nityaṃ kasmād arjuna brāhmaṇam
c sa hi sarvasya lokasya havyavāṭ kiṃ na vetsi tam
a atha vā brāhmaṇaśreṣṭham anu bhūtānupālakam
c kartāraṃ jīvalokasya kasmāj jānan vimuhyase
a tathā prajāpatir brahmā avyaktaḥ prabhavāpyayaḥ
c yenedaṃ nikhilaṃ viśvaṃ janitaṃ sthāvaraṃ caram
a aṇḍajātaṃ tu brahmāṇaṃ ke cid icchanty apaṇḍitāḥ
c aṇḍād bhinnād babhuḥ śailā diśo 'mbhaḥ pṛthivī divam
a draṣṭavyaṃ naitad evaṃ hi kathaṃ jyāyastamo hi saḥ
c smṛtam ākāśam aṇḍaṃ tu tasmāj jātaḥ pitāmahaḥ
a tiṣṭhet katham iti brūhi na kiṃ cid dhi tadā bhavet
c ahaṃkāra iti proktaḥ sarvatejogataḥ prabhuḥ
a nāsty aṇḍam asti tu brahmā sa rājaṃl lokabhāvanaḥ
c ity uktaḥ sa tadā tūṣṇīm abhūd vāyus tam abravīt
 vāyur uvāca
a imāṃ bhūmiṃ brāhmaṇebhyo ditsur vai dakṣiṇāṃ purā
c aṅgo nāma nṛpo rājaṃs tataś cintāṃ mahī yayau
a dhāraṇīṃ sarvabhūtānām ayaṃ prāpya varo nṛpaḥ
c katham icchati māṃ dātuṃ dvijebhyo brahmaṇaḥ sutām
a sāhaṃ tyaktvā gamiṣyāmi bhūmitvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ padam
c ayaṃ sarāṣṭro nṛpatir mā bhūd iti tato 'gamat
a tatas tāṃ kaśyapo dṛṣṭvā vrajantīṃ pṛthivīṃ tadā
c praviveśa mahīṃ sadyo muktvātmānaṃ samāhitaḥ
a ruddhā sā sarvato jajñe tṛṇauṣadhisamanvitā
c dharmottarā naṣṭabhayā bhūmir āsīt tato nṛpa
a evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi divyāni vipulavrataḥ
c triṃśataṃ kaśyapo rājan bhūmir āsīd atandritaḥ
a athāgamya mahārāja namaskṛtya ca kaśyapam
c pṛthivī kāśyapī jajñe sutā tasya mahātmanaḥ
a eṣa rājann īdṛśo vai brāhmaṇaḥ kaśyapo 'bhavat
c anyaṃ prabrūhi vāpi tvaṃ kaśyapāt kṣatriyaṃ varam
a tūṣṇīṃ babhūva nṛpatiḥ pavanas tv abravīt punaḥ
c śṛṇu rājann utathyasya jātasyāṅgirase kule
a bhadrā somasya duhitā rūpeṇa paramā matā
c tasyās tulyaṃ patiṃ soma utathyaṃ samapaśyata
a sā ca tīvraṃ tapas tepe mahābhāgā yaśasvinī
c utathyaṃ tu mahābhāgaṃ tatkṛte 'varayat tadā
d utathyārthe tu cārvaṅgī paraṃ niyamam āsthitā
a tata āhūya sotathyaṃ dadāv atra yaśasvinīm
c bhāryārthe sa ca jagrāha vidhivad bhūridakṣiṇa
a tāṃ tv akāmayata śrīmān varuṇaḥ pūrvam eva ha
c sa cāgamya vanaprasthaṃ yamunāyāṃ jahāra tām
a jaleśvaras tu hṛtvā tām anayat svapuraṃ prati
c paramādbhutasaṃkāśaṃ ṣaṭsahasraśatahradam
a na hi ramyataraṃ kiṃ cit tasmād anyat purottamam
c prāsādair apsarobhiś ca divyaiḥ kāmaiś ca śobhitam
e tatra devas tayā sārdhaṃ reme rājañ jaleśvaraḥ
a athākhyātam utathyāya tataḥ patnyavamardanam
a tac chrutvā nāradāt sarvam utathyo nāradaṃ tadā
c provāca gaccha brūhi tvaṃ varuṇaṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
e madvākyān muñca me bhāryāṃ kasmād vā hṛtavān asi
a lokapālo 'si lokānāṃ na lokasya vilopakaḥ
c somena dattā bhāryā me tvayā cāpahṛtādya vai
a ity ukto vacanāt tasya nāradena jaleśvaraḥ
c muñca bhāryām utathyasyety atha taṃ varuṇo 'bravīt
c kasmāt tvaṃ hatavān asi
c iti śrutvā vacas tasya
e mamaiṣā supriyā bhāryā nainām utsraṣṭum utsahe
a ity ukto varuṇenātha nāradaḥ prāpya taṃ munim
c utathyam abravīd vākyaṃ nātihṛṣṭamanā iva
a gale gṛhītvā kṣipto 'smi varuṇena mahāmune
c na prayacchati te bhāryāṃ yat te kāryaṃ kuruṣva tat
a nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā kruddhaḥ prājvalad aṅgirāḥ
c apibat tejasā vāri viṣṭabhya sumahātapāḥ
a pīyamāne ca sarvasmiṃs toye vai salileśvaraḥ
c suhṛdbhiḥ kṣipyamāṇo 'pi naivāmuñcata tāṃ tadā
a tataḥ kruddho 'bravīd bhūmim utathyo brāhmaṇottamaḥ
c darśayasva sthalaṃ bhadre ṣaṭsahasraśatahradam
a tatas tad iriṇaṃ jātaṃ samudraś cāpasarpitaḥ
c tasmād deśān nadīṃ caiva provācāsau dvijottamaḥ
a adṛśyā gaccha bhīru tvaṃ sarasvati maruṃ prati
c apuṇya eṣa bhavatu deśas tyaktas tvayā śubhe
a tasmin saṃcūrṇite deśe bhadrām ādāya vāripaḥ
c adadāc charaṇaṃ gatvā bhāryām āṅgirasāya vai
a pratigṛhya tu tāṃ bhāryām utathyaḥ sumanābhavat
c mumoca ca jagad duḥkhād varuṇaṃ caiva haihaya
a tataḥ sa labdhvā tāṃ bhāryāṃ varuṇaṃ prāha dharmavit
b aspṛśyo 'pānayogyaś ca kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati
c utathyaḥ sumahātejā yat tac chṛṇu narādhipa
d muktas tvam āyuḥśeṣeṇa mā bhair gaccha jaleśvara
d māvamaṃsthāḥ punar mohān mā tvāṃ ninyur yamakṣayam
a mayaiṣā tapasā prāptā krośatas te jalādhipa
c ity uktvā tām upādāya svam eva bhavanaṃ yayau
a eṣa rājann īdṛśo vai utathyo brāhmaṇarṣabhaḥ
c bravīmy ahaṃ brūhi vā tvam utathyāt kṣatriyaṃ varam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktaḥ sa tadā tūṣṇīm abhūd vāyus tato 'bravīt
c śṛṇu rājann agastyasya māhātmyaṃ brāhmaṇasya ha
a asurair nirjitā devā nirutsāhāś ca te kṛtāḥ
c yajñāś caiṣāṃ hṛtāḥ sarve pitṛbhyaś ca svadhā tathā
a karmejyā mānavānāṃ ca dānavair haihayarṣabha
c bhraṣṭaiśvaryās tato devāś ceruḥ pṛthvīm iti śrutiḥ
a tataḥ kadā cit te rājan dīptam ādityavarcasam
c dadṛśus tejasā yuktam agastyaṃ vipulavratam
a abhivādya ca taṃ devā dṛṣṭvā ca yaśasā vṛtam
c idam ūcur mahātmānaṃ vākyaṃ kāle janādhipa
a dānavair yudhi bhagnāḥ sma tathaiśvaryāc ca bhraṃśitāḥ
c tad asmān no bhayāt tīvrāt trāhi tvaṃ munipuṃgava
a ity uktaḥ sa tadā devair agastyaḥ kupito 'bhavat
c prajajvāla ca tejasvī kālāgnir iva saṃkṣaye
a tena dīptāṃśujālena nirdagdhā dānavās tadā
c antarikṣān mahārāja nyapatanta sahasraśaḥ
a dahyamānās tu te daityās tasyāgastyasya tejasā
c ubhau lokau parityajya yayuḥ kāṣṭhāṃ sma dakṣiṇām
a balis tu yajate yajñam aśvamedhaṃ mahīṃ gataḥ
c ye 'nye svasthā mahīsthāś ca te na dagdhā mahāsurāḥ
a tato lokāḥ punaḥ prāptāḥ suraiḥ śāntaṃ ca tad rajaḥ
c athainam abruvan devā bhūmiṣṭhān asurāñ jahi
a ity ukta āha devān sa na śaknomi mahīgatān
c dagdhuṃ tapo hi kṣīyen me dhakṣyāmīti ca pārthiva
a evaṃ dagdhā bhagavatā dānavāḥ svena tejasā
c agastyena tadā rājaṃs tapasā bhāvitātmanā
a īdṛśaś cāpy agastyo hi kathitas te mayānagha
c bravīmy ahaṃ brūhi vā tvam agastyāt kṣatriyaṃ varam
a ity uktaḥ sa tadā tūṣṇīm abhūd vāyus tato 'bravīt
c śṛṇu rājan vasiṣṭhasya mukhyaṃ karma yaśasvinaḥ
d vaikhānasavidhānena gaṅgātīraṃ samāśritāḥ
a ādityāḥ satram āsanta saro vai mānasaṃ prati
c vasiṣṭhaṃ manasā gatvā śrutvā tatrāsya gocaram
a yajamānāṃs tu tān dṛṣṭvā vyagrān dīkṣānukarśitān
c hantum icchanti śailābhāḥ khalino nāma dānavāḥ
a adūrāt tu tatas teṣāṃ brahmadattavaraṃ saraḥ
c hatā hatā vai te tatra jīvanty āplutya dānavāḥ
a te pragṛhya mahāghorān parvatān parighān drumān
c vikṣobhayantaḥ salilam utthitāḥ śatayojanam
a abhyadravanta devāṃs te sahasrāṇi daśaiva ha
c tatas tair arditā devāḥ śaraṇaṃ vāsavaṃ yayuḥ
a sa ca tair vyathitaḥ śakro vasiṣṭhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayau
c tato 'bhayaṃ dadau tebhyo vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
a tathā tān duḥkhitāñ jānann ānṛśaṃsyaparo muniḥ
c ayatnenādahat sarvān khalinaḥ svena tejasā
a kailāsaṃ prasthitāṃ cāpi nadīṃ gaṅgāṃ mahātapāḥ
c ānayat tat saro divyaṃ tayā bhinnaṃ ca tat saraḥ
a saro bhinnaṃ tayā nadyā sarayūḥ sā tato 'bhavat
c hatāś ca khalino yatra sa deśaḥ khalino 'bhavat
a evaṃ sendrā vasiṣṭhena rakṣitās tridivaukasaḥ
c brahmadattavarāś caiva hatā daityā mahātmanā
a etat karma vasiṣṭhasya kathitaṃ te mayānagha
c bravīmy ahaṃ brūhi vā tvaṃ vasiṣṭhāt kṣatriyaṃ varam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktas tv arjunas tūṣṇīm abhūd vāyus tam abravīt
c śṛṇu me haihayaśreṣṭha karmātreḥ sumahātmanaḥ
a ghore tamasy ayudhyanta sahitā devadānavāḥ
c avidhyata śarais tatra svarbhānuḥ somabhāskarau
a atha te tamasā grastā nihanyante sma dānavaiḥ
c devā nṛpatiśārdūla sahaiva balibhis tadā
a asurair vadhyamānās te kṣīṇaprāṇā divaukasaḥ
c apaśyanta tapasyantam atriṃ vipraṃ mahāvane
a athainam abruvan devāḥ śāntakrodhaṃ jitendriyam
c asurair iṣubhir viddhau candrādityāv imāv ubhau
a vayaṃ vadhyāmahe cāpi śatrubhis tamasāvṛte
c nādhigacchāma śāntiṃ ca bhayāt trāyasva naḥ prabho
a kathaṃ rakṣāmi bhavatas te 'bruvaṃś candramā bhava
c timiraghnaś ca savitā dasyuhā caiva no bhava
a evam uktas tadātris tu tamonud abhavac chaśī
c apaśyat saumyabhāvaṃ ca sūryasya pratidarśanam
a dṛṣṭvā nātiprabhaṃ somaṃ tathā sūryaṃ ca pārthiva
c prakāśam akarod atris tapasā svena saṃyuge
a jagad vitimiraṃ cāpi pradīptam akarot tadā
c vyajayac chatrusaṃghāṃś ca devānāṃ svena tejasā
a atriṇā dahyamānāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā devā mahāsurān
c parākramais te 'pi tadā vyatyaghnann atrirakṣitāḥ
a udbhāsitaś ca savitā devās trātā hatāsurāḥ
c atriṇā tv atha somatvaṃ kṛtam uttamatejasā
a advitīyena muninā japatā carmavāsasā
c phalabhakṣeṇa rājarṣe paśya karmātriṇā kṛtam
a tasyāpi vistareṇoktaṃ karmātreḥ sumahātmanaḥ
c bravīmy ahaṃ brūhi vā tvam atritaḥ kṣatriyaṃ varam
d evam atrer mahārāja kathitaṃ karma cādbhutam
a ity uktas tv arjunas tūṣṇīm abhūd vāyus tam abravīt
c śṛṇu rājan mahat karma cyavanasya mahātmanaḥ
a aśvinoḥ pratisaṃśrutya cyavanaḥ pākaśāsanam
c provāca sahitaṃ devaiḥ somapāv aśvinau kuru
d cyavanasya mahārāja śṛṇu māhātmyam uttamam
d iṣṭvā yajñaṃ mahābhāga cyavanaḥ sumahātapāḥ
d nāsatyau balinau rājaṃś cakre vai somapīthinau
 indra uvāca
a asmābhir varjitāv etau bhavetāṃ somapau katham
c devair na saṃmitāv etau tasmān maivaṃ vadasva naḥ
a aśvibhyāṃ saha necchāmaḥ pātuṃ somaṃ mahāvrata
b cyavana uvāca
b yad anyad vakṣyase vipra tat kariṣyāma te vacaḥ
b pibetām aśvinau somaṃ bhavadbhiḥ sahitāv imau
b ubhāv etāv api surau sūryaputrau sureśvara
b kriyatāṃ madvaco devā yathā vai samudāhṛtam
b indra uvāca
b etad vaḥ kurvatāṃ śreyo bhaven naitad akurvatām
b aśvibhyāṃ saha somaṃ vai na pāsyāmi dvijottama
c pibantv anye yathākāmaṃ nāhaṃ pātum ihotsahe
 cyavana uvāca
a na cet kariṣyasi vaco mayoktaṃ balasūdana
c mayā pramathitaḥ sadyaḥ somaṃ pāsyasi vai makhe
a tataḥ karma samārabdhaṃ hitāya sahasāśvinoḥ
c cyavanena tato mantrair abhibhūtāḥ surābhavan
a tat tu karma samārabdhaṃ dṛṣṭvendraḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
c udyamya vipulaṃ śailaṃ cyavanaṃ samupādravat
e tathā vajreṇa bhagavān amarṣākulalocanaḥ
a tam āpatantaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva cyavanas tapasānvitaḥ
c adbhiḥ siktvāstambhayat taṃ savajraṃ sahaparvatam
a athendrasya mahāghoraṃ so 'sṛjac chatrum eva ha
c madaṃ mantrāhutimayaṃ vyāditāsyaṃ mahāmuniḥ
a tasya dantasahasraṃ tu babhūva śatayojanam
c dviyojanaśatās tasya daṃṣṭrāḥ paramadāruṇāḥ
e hanus tasyābhavad bhūmāv ekaś cāsyāspṛśad divam
a jihvāmūle sthitās tasya sarve devāḥ savāsavāḥ
c timer āsyam anuprāptā yathā matsyā mahārṇave
a te saṃmantrya tato devā madasyāsyagatās tadā
c abruvan sahitāḥ śakraṃ praṇamāsmai dvijātaye
e aśvibhyāṃ saha somaṃ ca pibāmo vigatajvarāḥ
a tataḥ sa praṇataḥ śakraś cakāra cyavanasya tat
b tatheti śakras tasyātha praṇāmam akaron nṛpa
c cyavanaḥ kṛtavāṃs tau cāpy aśvinau somapīthinau
a tataḥ pratyāharat karma madaṃ ca vyabhajan muniḥ
c akṣeṣu mṛgayāyāṃ ca pāne strīṣu ca vīryavān
a etair doṣair naro rājan kṣayaṃ yāti na saṃśayaḥ
c tasmād etān naro nityaṃ dūrataḥ parivarjayet
a etat te cyavanasyāpi karma rājan prakīrtitam
c bravīmy ahaṃ brūhi vā tvaṃ cyavanāt kṣatriyaṃ varam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tūṣṇīm āsīd arjunas tu pavanas tv abravīt punaḥ
c śṛṇu me brāhmaṇeṣv eva mukhyaṃ karma janādhipa
a madasyāsyam anuprāptā yadā sendrā divaukasaḥ
c tadeyaṃ cyavaneneha hṛtā teṣāṃ vasuṃdharā
a ubhau lokau hṛtau matvā te devā duḥkhitābhavan
c śokārtāś ca mahātmānaṃ brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ
 devā ūcuḥ
a madāsyavyatiṣiktānām asmākaṃ lokapūjita
c cyavanena hṛtā bhūmiḥ kapaiś cāpi divaṃ prabho
 brahmovāca
a gacchadhvaṃ śaraṇaṃ viprān āśu sendrā divaukasaḥ
c prasādya tān ubhau lokāv avāpsyatha yathā purā
a te yayuḥ śaraṇaṃ viprāṃs ta ūcuḥ kāñ jayāmahe
c ity uktās te dvijān prāhur jayateha kapān iti
e bhūgatān hi vijetāro vayam ity eva pārthiva
a tataḥ karma samārabdhaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ kapanāśanam
c tac chrutvā preṣito dūto brāhmaṇebhyo dhanī kapaiḥ
a sa ca tān brāhmaṇān āha dhanī kapavaco yathā
c bhavadbhiḥ sadṛśāḥ sarve kapāḥ kim iha vartate
a sarve vedavidaḥ prājñāḥ sarve ca kratuyājinaḥ
c sarve satyavratāś caiva sarve tulyā maharṣibhiḥ
a śrīś caiva ramate teṣu dhārayanti śriyaṃ ca te
c vṛthā dārān na gacchanti vṛthāmāṃsaṃ na bhuñjate
a dīptam agniṃ juhvati ca gurūṇāṃ vacane sthitāḥ
c sarve ca niyatātmāno bālānāṃ saṃvibhāginaḥ
a upetya śakaṭair yānti na sevanti rajasvalām
b sugatiṃ caiva gacchanti tathaiva śubhakarmiṇaḥ
c abhuktavatsu nāśnanti divā caiva na śerate
c garbhiṇīvatsakādiṣu
c pūrvāhṇeṣu na dīvyanti
a etaiś cānyaiś ca bahubhir guṇair yuktān kathaṃ kapān
c vijeṣyatha nivartadhvaṃ nivṛttānāṃ śubhaṃ hi vaḥ
 brāhmaṇā ūcuḥ
a kapān vayaṃ vijeṣyāmo ye devās te vayaṃ smṛtāḥ
c tasmād vadhyāḥ kapāsmākaṃ dhanin yāhi yathāgatam
a dhanī gatvā kapān āha na vo viprāḥ priyaṃkarāḥ
c gṛhītvāstrāṇy atho viprān kapāḥ sarve samādravan
a samudagradhvajān dṛṣṭvā kapān sarve dvijātayaḥ
c vyasṛjañ jvalitān agnīn kapānāṃ prāṇanāśanān
a brahmasṛṣṭā havyabhujaḥ kapān bhuktvā sanātanāḥ
c nabhasīva yathābhrāṇi vyarājanta narādhipa
d hatvā vai dānavān devāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saṃyuge
d te nābhyajānan hi tadā brāhmaṇair nihatān kapān
d athāgamya mahātejā nārado 'kathayad vibho
d yathā hatā mahābhāgais tejasā brāhmaṇaiḥ kapāḥ
d nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā prītāḥ sarve divaukasaḥ
e praśaśaṃsur dvijāṃś caiva brahmāṇaṃ ca yaśasvinam
a teṣāṃ tejas tathā vīryaṃ devānāṃ vavṛdhe tataḥ
c avāpnuvaṃś cāmaratvaṃ triṣu lokeṣu pūjitam
a ity uktavacanaṃ vāyum arjunaḥ pratyabhāṣata
c pratipūjya mahābāho yat tac chṛṇu narādhipa
a jīvāmy ahaṃ brāhmaṇārthe sarvathā satataṃ prabho
c brahmaṇe brāhmaṇebhyaś ca praṇamāmi ca nityaśaḥ
a dattātreyaprasādāc ca mayā prāptam idaṃ yaśaḥ
c loke ca paramā kīrtir dharmaś ca carito mahān
a aho brāhmaṇakarmāṇi yathā māruta tattvataḥ
c tvayā proktāni kārtsnyena śrutāni prayatena ha
 vāyur uvāca
a brāhmaṇān kṣatradharmeṇa pālayasvendriyāṇi ca
c bhṛgubhyas te bhayaṃ ghoraṃ tat tu kālād bhaviṣyati
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a brāhmaṇān arcase rājan satataṃ saṃśitavratān
c kaṃ tu karmodayaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān arcasi narādhipa
a kāṃ vā brāhmaṇapūjāyāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāvrata
c tān arcasi mahābāho sarvam etad vadasva me
 bhīṣma uvāca
a eṣa te keśavaḥ sarvam ākhyāsyati mahāmatiḥ
c vyuṣṭiṃ brāhmaṇapūjāyāṃ dṛṣṭavyuṣṭir mahāvrataḥ
a balaṃ śrotre vāṅ manaś cakṣuṣī ca
jñānaṃ tathā na viśuddhaṃ mamādya
c dehanyāso nāticirān mato me
na cātitūrṇaṃ savitādya yāti
a uktā dharmā ye purāṇe mahānto
brāhmaṇānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ viśāṃ ca
c paurāṇaṃ ye daṇḍam upāsate ca
śeṣaṃ kṛṣṇād upaśikṣasva pārtha
a ahaṃ hy enaṃ vedmi tattvena kṛṣṇaṃ
yo 'yaṃ hi yac cāsya balaṃ purāṇam
c ameyātmā keśavaḥ kauravendra
so 'yaṃ dharmaṃ vakṣyati saṃśayeṣu
a kṛṣṇaḥ pṛthvīm asṛjat khaṃ divaṃ ca
varāho 'yaṃ bhīmabalaḥ purāṇaḥ
a kṛṣṇasya dehān medinī saṃbabhūva
a kṛtsnam etat sthāvaraṃ jaṃgamaṃ ca
b sa parvatān vyasṛjad vai diśaś ca
c asya cādho 'thāntarikṣaṃ divaṃ ca
diśaś catasraḥ pradiśaś catasraḥ
e sṛṣṭis tathaiveyam anuprasūtā
sa nirmame viśvam idaṃ purāṇam
a asya nābhyāṃ puṣkaraṃ saṃprasūtaṃ
yatrotpannaḥ svayam evāmitaujāḥ
c yenācchinnaṃ tat tamaḥ pārtha ghoraṃ
yat tat tiṣṭhaty arṇavaṃ tarjayānam
a kṛte yuge dharma āsīt samagras
tretākāle jñānam anuprapannaḥ
c balaṃ tv āsīd dvāpare pārtha kṛṣṇaḥ
kalāv adharmaḥ kṣitim ājagāma
a sa pūrvadevo nijaghāna daityān
sa pūrvadevaś ca babhūva samrāṭ
c sa bhūtānāṃ bhāvano bhūtabhavyaḥ
sa viśvasyāsya jagataś cāpi goptā
a yadā dharmo glāyati vai surāṇāṃ
tadā kṛṣṇo jāyate mānuṣeṣu
c dharme sthitvā sa tu vai bhāvitātmā
parāṃś ca lokān aparāṃś ca yāti
a tyājyāṃs tyaktvāthāsurāṇāṃ vadhāya
kāryākārye kāraṇaṃ caiva pārtha
c kṛtaṃ kariṣyat kriyate ca devo
muhuḥ somaṃ viddhi ca śakram etam
a sa viśvakarmā sa ca viśvarūpaḥ
sa viśvabhṛd viśvasṛg viśvajic ca
b śatakratuṃ jitya sa viśvakarmā
b sa viśvasṛk pārtha sa viśvarūpaḥ
b sa viśvabhug viśvadhṛg viśvajic ca
c sa śūlabhṛc choṇitabhṛt karālas
taṃ karmabhir viditaṃ vai stuvanti
a taṃ gandharvā apsarasaś ca nityam
upatiṣṭhante vibudhānāṃ śatāni
c taṃ rākṣasāś ca parisaṃvahante
rāyaspoṣaḥ sa vijigīṣur ekaḥ
a tam adhvare śaṃsitāraḥ stuvanti
rathaṃtare sāmagāś ca stuvanti
c taṃ brāhmaṇā brahmamantraiḥ stuvanti
tasmai havir adhvaryavaḥ kalpayanti
a sa paurāṇīṃ brahmaguhāṃ praviṣṭo
mahīsatraṃ bhāratāgre dadarśa
c sa caiva gām uddadhārāgryakarmā
vikṣobhya daityān uragān dānavāṃś ca
d taṃ ghoṣārthe gīrbhir indrāḥ stuvanti
d sa cāpīśo bhārataikaḥ paśūnām
a tasya bhakṣān vividhān vedayanti
tam evājau vāhanaṃ vedayanti
c tasyāntarikṣaṃ pṛthivī divaṃ ca
sarvaṃ vaśe tiṣṭhati śāśvatasya
a sa kumbharetāḥ sasṛje purāṇaṃ
yatrotpannam ṛṣim āhur vasiṣṭham
c sa mātariśvā vibhur aśvavājī
sa raśmimān savitā cādidevaḥ
a tenāsurā vijitāḥ sarva eva
tasya vikrāntair vijitānīha trīṇi
c sa devānāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ pitṝṇāṃ
tam evāhur yajñavidāṃ vitānam
a sa eva kālaṃ vibhajann udeti
tasyottaraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ cāyane dve
c tasyaivordhvaṃ tiryag adhaś caranti
gabhastayo medinīṃ tāpayantaḥ
a taṃ brāhmaṇā vedavido juṣanti
tasyādityo bhām upayujya bhāti
c sa māsi māsy adhvarakṛd vidhatte
tam adhvare vedavidaḥ paṭhanti
a sa ekayuk cakram idaṃ trinābhi
saptāśvayuktaṃ vahate vai tridhāmā
c mahātejāḥ sarvagaḥ sarvasiṃhaḥ
kṛṣṇo lokān dhārayate tathaikaḥ
c hiraṇmayaḥ saptagūḍhaḥ sasaṃvic
c caturbāhuḥ padmagaḥ padmanābhaḥ
e aśnann anaśnaṃś ca tathaiva dhīraḥ
kṛṣṇaṃ sadā pārtha kartāram ehi
a sa ekadā kakṣagato mahātmā
tṛpto vibhuḥ khāṇḍave dhūmaketuḥ
c sa rākṣasān uragāṃś cāvajitya
sarvatragaḥ sarvam agnau juhoti
a sa evāśvaḥ śvetam aśvaṃ prayacchat
sa evāśvān atha sarvāṃś cakāra
c trivandhuras tasya rathas tricakras
trivṛcchirāś caturasraś ca tasya
a sa vihāyo vyadadhāt pañcanābhiḥ
sa nirmame gāṃ divam antarikṣam
c evaṃ ramyān asṛjat parvatāṃś ca
hṛṣīkeśo 'mitadīptāgnitejāḥ
a sa laṅghayan vai sarito jighāṃsan
sa taṃ vajraṃ praharantaṃ nirāsa
c sa mahendraḥ stūyate vai mahādhvare
viprair eko ṛksahasraiḥ purāṇaiḥ
d tam ṛksahasraiḥ puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃ
d suparṇam ādau cayanaiḥ stuvanti
a durvāsā vai tena nānyena śakyo
gṛhe rājan vāsayituṃ mahaujāḥ
c tam evāhur ṛṣim ekaṃ purāṇaṃ
sa viśvakṛd vidadhāty ātmabhāvān
a vedāṃś ca yo vedayate 'dhidevo
vidhīṃś ca yaś cāśrayate purāṇān
c kāme vede laukike yat phalaṃ ca
viṣvaksene sarvam etat pratīhi
a jyotīṃṣi śuklāni ca sarvaloke
trayo lokā lokapālās trayaś ca
c trayo 'gnayo vyāhṛtayaś ca tisraḥ
sarve devā devakīputra eva
a saṃvatsaraḥ sa ṛtuḥ so 'rdhamāsaḥ
so 'horātraḥ sa kalā vai sa kāṣṭhāḥ
c mātrā muhūrtāś ca lavāḥ kṣaṇāś ca
viṣvaksene sarvam etat pratīhi
a candrādityau grahanakṣatratārāḥ
sarvāṇi darśāny atha paurṇamāsyaḥ
c nakṣatrayogā ṛtavaś ca pārtha
viṣvaksenāt sarvam etat prasūtam
a rudrādityā vasavo 'thāśvinau ca
sādhyā viśve marutāṃ ṣaḍ gaṇāś ca
c prajāpatir devamātāditiś ca
sarve kṛṣṇād ṛṣayaś caiva sapta
a vāyur bhūtvā vikṣipate ca viśvam
agnir bhūtvā dahate viśvarūpaḥ
c āpo bhūtvā majjayate ca sarvaṃ
brahmā bhūtvā sṛjate viśvasaṃghān
a vedyaṃ ca yad vedayate ca vedān
vidhiś ca yaś cāśrayate vidheyān
c dharme ca vede ca bale ca sarvaṃ
carācaraṃ keśavaṃ tvaṃ pratīhi
d vaśe sthitaṃ tasya samastayoneḥ
a jyotirbhūtaḥ paramo 'sau purastāt
prakāśayan prabhayā viśvarūpaḥ
c apaḥ sṛṣṭvā hy ātmabhūr ātmayoniḥ
purākarot sarvam evātha viśvam
a ṛtūn utpātān vividhāny adbhutāni
meghān vidyut sarvam airāvataṃ ca
b ṛtūn māsān vividhaṃ kāryajātaṃ
b vidyutsaṃghair āpatantaś ca meghāḥ
c sarvaṃ kṛṣṇāt sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca
viśvākhyātād viṣṇum enaṃ pratīhi
a viśvāvāsaṃ nirguṇaṃ vāsudevaṃ
saṃkarṣaṇaṃ jīvabhūtaṃ vadanti
c tataḥ pradyumnam aniruddhaṃ caturtham
ājñāpayaty ātmayonir mahātmā
a sa pañcadhā pañcajanopapannaṃ
saṃcodayan viśvam idaṃ sisṛkṣuḥ
c tataś cakārāvanimārutau ca
khaṃ jyotir āpaś ca tathaiva pārtha
a sa sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caivam etac
caturvidhaṃ lokam imaṃ ca kṛtvā
b sṛṣṭvā viśvaṃ viśvayonir mahātmā
b tatrātiṣṭhad viśvarūpo hi yogāt
c tato bhūmiṃ vyadadhāt pañcabījāṃ
dyauḥ pṛthivyāṃ dhāsyati bhūri vāri
e tena viśvaṃ kṛtam etad dhi rājan
sa jīvayaty ātmanaivātmayoniḥ
a tato devān asurān mānuṣāṃś ca
lokān ṛṣīṃś cātha pitṝn prajāś ca
c samāsena vividhān prāṇilokān
sarvān sadā bhūtapatiḥ sisṛkṣuḥ
a śubhāśubhaṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca
viṣvaksenāt sarvam etat pratīhi
c yad vartate yac ca bhaviṣyatīha
sarvam etat keśavaṃ tvaṃ pratīhi
a mṛtyuś caiva prāṇinām antakāle
sākṣāt kṛṣṇaḥ śāśvato dharmavāhaḥ
c bhūtaṃ ca yac ceha na vidma kiṃ cid
viṣvaksenāt sarvam etat pratīhi
a yat praśastaṃ ca lokeṣu puṇyaṃ yac ca śubhāśubham
c tat sarvaṃ keśavo 'cintyo viparītam ato bhavet
a etādṛśaḥ keśavo 'yaṃ svayaṃbhūr
nārāyaṇaḥ paramaś cāvyayaś ca
c madhyaṃ cāsya jagatas tasthuṣaś ca
sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ prabhavaś cāpyayaś ca
d tādṛśaḥ keśavo devo bhūyo nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ
d ādir antaś ca madhyaṃ ca deśataḥ kālato hariḥ
d jagatāṃ tasthuṣāṃ caiva bhūtānāṃ prabhavāpyayaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
 pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā rājaṃs te prapitāmahaḥ
 praṇamya puṇḍarīkākṣam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a brūhi brāhmaṇapūjāyāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ tvaṃ madhusūdana
c vettā tvam asya cārthasya veda tvāṃ hi pitāmahaḥ
 vāsudeva uvāca
a śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājan dvijānāṃ bharatarṣabha
c yathātattvena vadato guṇān me kurusattama
d dvāravatyāṃ samāsīnaṃ purā māṃ kurunandana
a pradyumnaḥ paripapraccha brāhmaṇaiḥ parikopitaḥ
c kiṃ phalaṃ brāhmaṇeṣv asti pūjāyāṃ madhusūdana
e īśvarasya satas tasya iha caiva paratra ca
a sadā dvijātīn saṃpūjya kiṃ phalaṃ tatra mānada
c etad brūhi pitaḥ sarvaṃ sumahān saṃśayo 'tra me
a ity uktavacanas tena pradyumnena tadā tv aham
c pratyabruvaṃ mahārāja yat tac chṛṇu samāhitaḥ
a vyuṣṭiṃ brāhmaṇapūjāyāṃ raukmiṇeya nibodha me
b trivarge cāpavarge ca yaśaḥśrīrogaśāntiṣu
b devatāpitṛpūjāsu saṃtoṣyā eva no dvijāḥ
c ete hi somarājāna īśvarāḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
a asmiṃl loke raukmiṇeya tathāmuṣmiṃś ca putraka
c brāhmaṇapramukhaṃ saukhyaṃ na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
a brāhmaṇapramukhaṃ vīryam āyuḥ kīrtir yaśo balam
c lokā lokeśvarāś caiva sarve brāhmaṇapūrvakāḥ
a tat kathaṃ nādriyeyaṃ vai īśvaro 'smīti putraka
c mā te manyur mahābāho bhavatv atra dvijān prati
a brāhmaṇo hi mahad bhūtam asmiṃl loke paratra ca
c bhasma kuryur jagad idaṃ kruddhāḥ pratyakṣadarśinaḥ
a anyān api sṛjeyuś ca lokāṃl lokeśvarāṃs tathā
c kathaṃ teṣu na varteya samyag jñānāt sutejasaḥ
a avasan madgṛhe tāta brāhmaṇo haripiṅgalaḥ
c cīravāsā bilvadaṇḍī dīrghaśmaśrunakhādimān
e dīrghebhyaś ca manuṣyebhyaḥ pramāṇād adhiko bhuvi
a sa sma saṃcarate lokān ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ
c imā gāthā gāyamānaś catvareṣu sabhāsu ca
a durvāsasaṃ vāsayet ko brāhmaṇaṃ satkṛtaṃ gṛhe
b roṣaṇaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ sūkṣme 'py apakṛte kṛte
c paribhāṣāṃ ca me śrutvā ko nu dadyāt pratiśrayam
e yo māṃ kaś cid vāsayeta na sa māṃ kopayed iha
a taṃ sma nādriyate kaś cit tato 'haṃ tam avāsayam
a sa sma bhuṅkte sahasrāṇāṃ bahūnām annam ekadā
c ekadā smālpakaṃ bhuṅkte na vaiti ca punar gṛhān
a akasmāc ca prahasati tathākasmāt praroditi
c na cāsya vayasā tulyaḥ pṛthivyām abhavat tadā
a so 'smadāvasathaṃ gatvā śayyāś cāstaraṇāni ca
c kanyāś cālaṃkṛtā dagdhvā tato vyapagataḥ svayam
d adahat sa mahātejās tataś cābhyapatat svayam
a atha mām abravīd bhūyaḥ sa muniḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
c kṛṣṇa pāyasam icchāmi bhoktum ity eva satvaraḥ
a sadaiva tu mayā tasya cittajñena gṛhe janaḥ
c sarvāṇy evānnapānāni bhakṣyāś coccāvacās tathā
e bhavantu satkṛtānīti pūrvam eva pracoditaḥ
a tato 'haṃ jvalamānaṃ vai pāyasaṃ pratyavedayam
c tad bhuktvaiva tu sa kṣipraṃ tato vacanam abravīt
e kṣipram aṅgāni limpasva pāyaseneti sa sma ha
a avimṛśyaiva ca tataḥ kṛtavān asmi tat tathā
c tenocchiṣṭena gātrāṇi śiraś caivābhyamṛkṣayam
a sa dadarśa tadābhyāśe mātaraṃ te śubhānanām
c tām api smayamānaḥ sa pāyasenābhyalepayat
a muniḥ pāyasadigdhāṅgīṃ rathe tūrṇam ayojayat
c tam āruhya rathaṃ caiva niryayau sa gṛhān mama
a agnivarṇo jvalan dhīmān sa dvijo rathadhuryavat
c pratodenātudad bālāṃ rukmiṇīṃ mama paśyataḥ
a na ca me stokam apy āsīd duḥkham īrṣyākṛtaṃ tadā
c tataḥ sa rājamārgeṇa mahatā niryayau bahiḥ
a tad dṛṣṭvā mahad āścaryaṃ dāśārhā jātamanyavaḥ
c tatrājalpan mithaḥ ke cit samābhāṣya parasparam
a brāhmaṇā eva jāyeran nānyo varṇaḥ kathaṃ cana
c ko hy enaṃ ratham āsthāya jīved anyaḥ pumān iha
a āśīviṣaviṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ tatas tīkṣṇataraṃ viṣam
c brahmāśīviṣadagdhasya nāsti kaś cic cikitsakaḥ
a tasmin vrajati durdharṣe prāskhalad rukmiṇī pathi
c tāṃ nāmarṣayata śrīmāṃs tatas tūrṇam acodayat
a tataḥ paramasaṃkruddho rathāt praskandya sa dvijaḥ
c padātir utpathenaiva prādhāvad dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ
a tam utpathena dhāvantam anvadhāvaṃ dvijottamam
c tathaiva pāyasādigdhaḥ prasīda bhagavann iti
a tato vilokya tejasvī brāhmaṇo mām uvāca ha
c jitaḥ krodhas tvayā kṛṣṇa prakṛtyaiva mahābhuja
a na te 'parādham iha vai dṛṣṭavān asmi suvrata
c prīto 'smi tava govinda vṛṇu kāmān yathepsitān
e prasannasya ca me tāta paśya vyuṣṭir yathāvidhā
a yāvad eva manuṣyāṇām anne bhāvo bhaviṣyati
c yathaivānne tathā teṣāṃ tvayi bhāvo bhaviṣyati
a yāvac ca puṇyā lokeṣu tvayi kīrtir bhaviṣyati
c triṣu lokeṣu tāvac ca vaiśiṣṭyaṃ pratipatsyase
e supriyaḥ sarvalokasya bhaviṣyasi janārdana
a yat te bhinnaṃ ca dagdhaṃ ca yac ca kiṃ cid vināśitam
c sarvaṃ tathaiva draṣṭāsi viśiṣṭaṃ vā janārdana
a yāvad etat praliptaṃ te gātreṣu madhusūdana
c ato mṛtyubhayaṃ nāsti yāvadicchā tavācyuta
a na tu pādatale lipte kasmāt te putrakādya vai
c naitan me priyam ity eva sa māṃ prīto 'bravīt tadā
e ity ukto 'haṃ śarīraṃ svam apaśyaṃ śrīsamāyutam
a rukmiṇīṃ cābravīt prītaḥ sarvastrīṇāṃ varaṃ yaśaḥ
c kīrtiṃ cānuttamāṃ loke samavāpsyasi śobhane
a na tvāṃ jarā vā rogo vā vaivarṇyaṃ cāpi bhāmini
c sprakṣyanti puṇyagandhā ca kṛṣṇam ārādhayiṣyasi
a ṣoḍaśānāṃ sahasrāṇāṃ vadhūnāṃ keśavasya ha
c variṣṭhā sahalokyā ca keśavasya bhaviṣyasi
a tava mātaram ity uktvā tato māṃ punar abravīt
c prasthitaḥ sumahātejā durvāsā vahnivaj jvalan
a eṣaiva te buddhir astu brāhmaṇān prati keśava
c ity uktvā sa tadā putra tatraivāntaradhīyata
a tasminn antarhite cāham upāṃśuvratam ādiśam
c yat kiṃ cid brāhmaṇo brūyāt sarvaṃ kuryām iti prabho
a etad vratam ahaṃ kṛtvā mātrā te saha putraka
c tataḥ paramahṛṣṭātmā prāviśaṃ gṛham eva ca
a praviṣṭamātraś ca gṛhe sarvaṃ paśyāmi tan navam
c yad bhinnaṃ yac ca vai dagdhaṃ tena vipreṇa putraka
a tato 'haṃ vismayaṃ prāptaḥ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā navaṃ dṛḍham
c apūjayaṃ ca manasā raukmiṇeya dvijaṃ tadā
a ity ahaṃ raukmiṇeyasya pṛcchato bharatarṣabha
c māhātmyaṃ dvijamukhyasya sarvam ākhyātavāṃs tadā
a tathā tvam api kaunteya brāhmaṇān satataṃ prabho
c pūjayasva mahābhāgān vāgbhir dānaiś ca nityadā
a evaṃ vyuṣṭim ahaṃ prāpto brāhmaṇānāṃ prasādajām
c yac ca mām āha bhīṣmo 'yaṃ tat satyaṃ bharatarṣabha
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a durvāsasaḥ prasādāt te yat tadā madhusūdana
c avāptam iha vijñānaṃ tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
a mahābhāgyaṃ ca yat tasya nāmāni ca mahātmanaḥ
c tattvato jñātum icchāmi sarvaṃ matimatāṃ vara
 vāsudeva uvāca
a hanta te kathayiṣyāmi namaskṛtvā kapardine
c yad avāptaṃ mahārāja śreyo yac cārjitaṃ yaśaḥ
a prayataḥ prātar utthāya yad adhīye viśāṃ pate
c prāñjaliḥ śatarudrīyaṃ tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
d śivaḥ sarvagato rudraḥ sraṣṭā yas taṃ śṛṇuṣva me
a prajāpatis tat sasṛje tapaso 'nte mahātapāḥ
c śaṃkaras tv asṛjat tāta prajāḥ sthāvarajaṅgamāḥ
a nāsti kiṃ cit paraṃ bhūtaṃ mahādevād viśāṃ pate
c iha triṣv api lokeṣu bhūtānāṃ prabhavo hi saḥ
a na caivotsahate sthātuṃ kaś cid agre mahātmanaḥ
c na hi bhūtaṃ samaṃ tena triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
a gandhenāpi hi saṃgrāme tasya kruddhasya śatravaḥ
c visaṃjñā hatabhūyiṣṭhā vepanti ca patanti ca
a ghoraṃ ca ninadaṃ tasya parjanyaninadopamam
c śrutvā vidīryed dhṛdayaṃ devānām api saṃyuge
a yāṃś ca ghoreṇa rūpeṇa paśyet kruddhaḥ pinākadhṛk
b tatkṣaṇād eva kuryāt sa bhasma vahniśikhā yathā
c na surā nāsurā loke na gandharvā na pannagāḥ
e kupite sukham edhante tasminn api guhāgatāḥ
a prajāpateś ca dakṣasya yajato vitate kratau
c vivyādha kupito yajñaṃ nirbhayas tu bhavas tadā
e dhanuṣā bāṇam utsṛjya saghoṣaṃ vinanāda ca
a te na śarma kutaḥ śāntiṃ viṣādaṃ lebhire surāḥ
c vidrute sahasā yajñe kupite ca maheśvare
a tena jyātalaghoṣeṇa sarve lokāḥ samākulāḥ
c babhūvur avaśāḥ pārtha viṣeduś ca surāsurāḥ
a āpaś cukṣubhire caiva cakampe ca vasuṃdharā
c vyadravan girayaś cāpi dyauḥ paphāla ca sarvaśaḥ
a andhena tamasā lokāḥ prāvṛtā na cakāśire
c pranaṣṭā jyotiṣāṃ bhāś ca saha sūryeṇa bhārata
a bhṛśaṃ bhītās tataḥ śāntiṃ cakruḥ svastyayanāni ca
c ṛṣayaḥ sarvabhūtānām ātmanaś ca hitaiṣiṇaḥ
a tataḥ so 'bhyadravad devān kruddho raudraparākramaḥ
c bhagasya nayane kruddhaḥ prahāreṇa vyaśātayat
a pūṣāṇaṃ cābhidudrāva pareṇa vapuṣānvitaḥ
c puroḍāśaṃ bhakṣayato daśanān vai vyaśātayat
a tataḥ praṇemur devās te vepamānāḥ sma śaṃkaram
c punaś ca saṃdadhe rudro dīptaṃ suniśitaṃ śaram
a rudrasya vikramaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītā devāḥ saharṣibhiḥ
c tataḥ prasādayām āsuḥ śarvaṃ te vibudhottamāḥ
a jepuś ca śatarudrīyaṃ devāḥ kṛtvāñjaliṃ tataḥ
c saṃstūyamānas tridaśaiḥ prasasāda maheśvaraḥ
a rudrasya bhāgaṃ yajñe ca viśiṣṭaṃ te tv akalpayan
c bhayena tridaśā rājañ śaraṇaṃ ca prapedire
a tena caivātikopena sa yajñaḥ saṃdhito 'bhavat
c yad yac cāpi hataṃ tatra tat tathaiva pradīyate
 yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
 tripurāṇi mahābāho jitavān sa maheśvaraḥ
 vāsudevaḥ
 ācakṣva me yathātattvaṃ sarvajña madhusūdana
 śṛṇu me gadatas tāta yathā dagdhaṃ puratrayam
a asurāṇāṃ purāṇy āsaṃs trīṇi vīryavatāṃ divi
c āyasaṃ rājataṃ caiva sauvarṇam aparaṃ tathā
a nāśakat tāni maghavā bhettuṃ sarvāyudhair api
c atha sarve 'marā rudraṃ jagmuḥ śaraṇamarditāḥ
a tata ūcur mahātmāno devāḥ sarve samāgatāḥ
c rudra raudrā bhaviṣyanti paśavaḥ sarvakarmasu
d rudraṃ taṃ raudrakarmāṇi sarvāstrakuśalaṃ prabhum
e jahi daityān saha purair lokāṃs trāyasva mānada
a sa tathoktas tathety uktvā viṣṇuṃ kṛtvā śarottamam
c śalyam agniṃ tathā kṛtvā puṅkhaṃ vaivasvataṃ yamam
e vedān kṛtvā dhanuḥ sarvāñ jyāṃ ca sāvitrim uttamām
a devān rathavaraṃ kṛtvā viniyujya ca sarvaśaḥ
c triparvaṇā triśalyena tena tāni bibheda saḥ
a śareṇādityavarṇena kālāgnisamatejasā
c te 'surāḥ sapurās tatra dagdhā rudreṇa bhārata
d hatāni petuḥ sahasā vipule sāgarāmbhasi
a taṃ caivāṅkagataṃ dṛṣṭvā bālaṃ pañcaśikhaṃ punaḥ
c umā jijñāsamānā vai ko 'yam ity abravīt tadā
a asūyataś ca śakrasya vajreṇa prahariṣyataḥ
c savajraṃ stambhayām āsa taṃ bāhuṃ parighopamam
a na saṃbubudhire cainaṃ devās taṃ bhuvaneśvaram
c saprajāpatayaḥ sarve tasmin mumuhur īśvare
a tato dhyātvātha bhagavān brahmā tam amitaujasam
c ayaṃ śreṣṭha iti jñātvā vavande tam umāpatim
a tataḥ prasādayām āsur umāṃ rudraṃ ca te surāḥ
c babhūva sa tadā bāhur balahantur yathā purā
a sa cāpi brāhmaṇo bhūtvā durvāsā nāma vīryavān
c dvāravatyāṃ mama gṛhe ciraṃ kālam upāvasat
a viprakārān prayuṅkte sma subahūn mama veśmani
c tān udāratayā cāham akṣamaṃ tasya duḥsaham
d sa vai rudraḥ sa ca śivaḥ so 'gniḥ śarvaḥ sa sarvajit
a sa devendraś ca vāyuś ca so 'śvinau sa ca vidyutaḥ
c sa candramāḥ sa ceśānaḥ sa sūryo varuṇaś ca saḥ
a sa kālaḥ so 'ntako mṛtyuḥ sa tamo rātryahāni ca
c māsārdhamāsā ṛtavaḥ saṃdhye saṃvatsaraś ca saḥ
a sa dhātā sa vidhātā ca viśvakarmā sa sarvavit
c nakṣatrāṇi diśaś caiva pradiśo 'tha grahās tathā
e viśvamūrtir ameyātmā bhagavān amitadyutiḥ
a ekadhā ca dvidhā caiva bahudhā ca sa eva ca
c śatadhā sahasradhā caiva tathā śatasahasradhā
a īdṛśaḥ sa mahādevo bhūyaś ca bhagavān ataḥ
c na hi śakyā guṇā vaktum api varṣaśatair api
 vāsudeva uvāca
a yudhiṣṭhira mahābāho mahābhāgyaṃ mahātmanaḥ
c rudrāya bahurūpāya bahunāmne nibodha me
a vadanty agniṃ mahādevaṃ tathā sthāṇuṃ maheśvaram
c ekākṣaṃ tryambakaṃ caiva viśvarūpaṃ śivaṃ tathā
a dve tanū tasya devasya vedajñā brāhmaṇā viduḥ
c ghorām anyāṃ śivām anyāṃ te tanū bahudhā punaḥ
a ugrā ghorā tanūr yāsya so 'gnir vidyut sa bhāskaraḥ
c śivā saumyā ca yā tasya dharmas tv āpo 'tha candramāḥ
a ātmano 'rdhaṃ tu tasyāgnir ucyate bharatarṣabha
c brahmacaryaṃ caraty eṣa śivā yāsya tanus tathā
a yāsya ghoratamā mūrtir jagat saṃharate tayā
c īśvaratvān mahattvāc ca maheśvara iti smṛtaḥ
a yan nirdahati yat tīkṣṇo yad ugro yat pratāpavān
c māṃsaśoṇitamajjādo yat tato rudra ucyate
a devānāṃ sumahān yac ca yac cāsya viṣayo mahān
c yac ca viśvaṃ mahat pāti mahādevas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
a samedhayati yan nityaṃ sarvārthān sarvakarmabhiḥ
c śivam icchan manuṣyāṇāṃ tasmād eṣa śivaḥ smṛtaḥ
a dahaty ūrdhvaṃ sthito yac ca prāṇotpattiḥ sthitiś ca yat
c sthiraliṅgaś ca yan nityaṃ tasmāt sthāṇur iti smṛtaḥ
a yad asya bahudhā rūpaṃ bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhavat tathā
c sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva bahurūpas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
a dhūmraṃ rūpaṃ ca yat tasya dhūrjaṭīty ata ucyate
c viśve devāś ca yat tasmin viśvarūpas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
a sahasrākṣo 'yutākṣo vā sarvatokṣimayo 'pi vā
c cakṣuṣaḥ prabhavas tejo nāsty anto 'thāsya cakṣuṣām
a sarvathā yat paśūn pāti taiś ca yad ramate punaḥ
c teṣām adhipatir yac ca tasmāt paśupatiḥ smṛtaḥ
a nityena brahmacaryeṇa liṅgam asya yadā sthitam
c mahayanty asya lokāś ca maheśvara iti smṛtaḥ
d arcayanti ca ye lokāḥ priyās tasya mahātmanaḥ
d bhaktānugrahaṇārthāya gūḍhaliṅgas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
a vigrahaṃ pūjayed yo vai liṅgaṃ vāpi mahātmanaḥ
c liṅgaṃ pūjayitā nityaṃ mahatīṃ śriyam aśnute
a ṛṣayaś cāpi devāś ca gandharvāpsarasas tathā
c liṅgam evārcayanti sma yat tad ūrdhvaṃ samāsthitam
a pūjyamāne tatas tasmin modate sa maheśvaraḥ
c sukhaṃ dadāti prītātmā bhaktānāṃ bhaktavatsalaḥ
c prahṛṣṭaś caiva śaṃkaraḥ
c sukhaṃ vittaṃ paraṃ loke
a eṣa eva śmaśāneṣu devo vasati nityaśaḥ
c yajante taṃ janās tatra vīrasthānaniṣeviṇam
a viṣamasthaḥ śarīreṣu sa mṛtyuḥ prāṇinām iha
c sa ca vāyuḥ śarīreṣu prāṇo 'pānaḥ śarīriṇām
a tasya ghorāṇi rūpāṇi dīptāni ca bahūni ca
c loke yāny asya pūjyante viprās tāni vidur budhāḥ
a nāmadheyāni vedeṣu bahūny asya yathārthataḥ
c nirucyante mahattvāc ca vibhutvāt karmabhis tathā
a vede cāsya vidur viprāḥ śatarudrīyam uttamam
c vyāsād anantaraṃ yac cāpy upasthānaṃ mahātmanaḥ
a pradātā sarvalokānāṃ viśvaṃ cāpy ucyate mahat
c jyeṣṭhabhūtaṃ vadanty enaṃ brāhmaṇā ṛṣayo 'pare
a prathamo hy eṣa devānāṃ mukhād agnir ajāyata
c grahair bahuvidhaiḥ prāṇān saṃruddhān utsṛjaty api
a sa mocayati puṇyātmā śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatān
c āyur ārogyam aiśvaryaṃ vittaṃ kāmāṃś ca puṣkalān
a sa dadāti manuṣyebhyaḥ sa evākṣipate punaḥ
c śakrādiṣu ca deveṣu tasya caiśvaryam ucyate
a sa evābhyadhiko nityaṃ trailokyasya śubhāśubhe
c aiśvaryāc caiva kāmānām īśvaraḥ punar ucyate
a maheśvaraś ca lokānāṃ mahatām īśvaraś ca saḥ
c bahubhir vividhai rūpair viśvaṃ vyāptam idaṃ jagat
e tasya devasya yad vaktraṃ samudre vaḍavāmukham
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a ity uktavati vākyaṃ tu kṛṣṇe devakinandane
c bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ bhūyaḥ paryapṛcchad yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a nirṇaye vā mahābuddhe sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ vara
c pratyakṣam āgamo veti kiṃ tayoḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavet
 bhīṣma uvāca
a nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ kaś cid iti me vartate matiḥ
c śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te prājña samyak tvam anupṛcchasi
a saṃśayaḥ sugamo rājan nirṇayas tv atra durgamaḥ
c dṛṣṭaṃ śrutam anantaṃ hi yatra saṃśayadarśanam
a pratyakṣaṃ kāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ hetukāḥ prājñamāninaḥ
c nāstīty evaṃ vyavasyanti satyaṃ saṃśayam eva ca
e tad ayuktaṃ vyavasyanti bālāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ
a atha cen manyase caikaṃ kāraṇaṃ kiṃ bhaved iti
c śakyaṃ dīrgheṇa kālena yuktenātandritena ca
e prāṇayātrām anekāṃ ca kalpayānena bhārata
a tatpareṇaiva nānyena śakyaṃ hy etat tu kāraṇam
c hetūnām antam āsādya vipulaṃ jñānam uttamam
d hetunāmantrite vāpi dharmaśāstreṇa cottamam
e jyotiḥ sarvasya lokasya vipulaṃ pratipadyate
a tattvenāgamanaṃ rājan hetvantagamanaṃ tathā
c agrāhyam anibaddhaṃ ca vācaḥ saṃparivarjanam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a pratyakṣaṃ lokataḥ siddhaṃ lokāś cāgamapūrvakāḥ
c śiṣṭācāro bahuvidho brūhi tan me pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a dharmasya hriyamāṇasya balavadbhir durātmabhiḥ
c saṃsthā yatnair api kṛtā kālena paribhidyate
a adharmā dharmarūpeṇa tṛṇaiḥ kūpā ivāvṛtāḥ
c tatas tair bhidyate vṛttaṃ śṛṇu caiva yudhiṣṭhira
a avṛttyā ye ca bhindanti śrutatyāgaparāyaṇāḥ
c dharmavidveṣiṇo mandā ity uktas teṣu saṃśayaḥ
a atṛpyantas tu sādhūnāṃ ya evāgamabuddhayaḥ
c param ity eva saṃtuṣṭās tān upāssva ca pṛccha ca
a kāmārthau pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā lobhamohānusāriṇau
c dharma ity eva saṃbuddhās tān upāssva ca pṛccha ca
a na teṣāṃ bhidyate vṛttaṃ yajñasvādhyāyakarmabhiḥ
b mūlācāras tu sādhūnāṃ yajñasvādhyāyavṛttataḥ
c ācāraḥ kāraṇaṃ caiva dharmaś caiva trayaṃ punaḥ
d ye dharmam abhyasūyante te dharmaṃ paryupāsate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a punar eveha me buddhiḥ saṃśaye parimuhyate
c apāre mārgamāṇasya paraṃ tīram apaśyataḥ
a vedāḥ pratyakṣam ācāraḥ pramāṇaṃ tat trayaṃ yadi
c pṛthaktvaṃ labhyate caiṣāṃ dharmaś caikas trayaṃ katham
 bhīṣma uvāca
a dharmasya hriyamāṇasya balavadbhir durātmabhiḥ
c yady evaṃ manyase rājaṃs tridhā dharmavicāraṇā
a eka eveti jānīhi tridhā tasya pradarśanam
c pṛthaktve caiva me buddhis trayāṇām api vai tathā
a ukto mārgas trayāṇāṃ ca tat tathaiva samācara
c jijñāsā tu na kartavyā dharmasya paritarkaṇāt
a sadaiva bharataśreṣṭha mā te bhūd atra saṃśayaḥ
c andho jaḍa ivāśaṅko yad bravīmi tad ācara
a ahiṃsā satyam akrodho dānam etac catuṣṭayam
c ajātaśatro sevasva dharma eṣa sanātanaḥ
a brāhmaṇeṣu ca vṛttir yā pitṛpaitāmahocitā
c tām anvehi mahābāho svargasyaite hi deśikāḥ
a pramāṇam apramāṇaṃ vai yaḥ kuryād abudho naraḥ
c na sa pramāṇatām arho vivādajanano hi saḥ
a brāhmaṇān eva sevasva satkṛtya bahumanya ca
c eteṣv eva tv ime lokāḥ kṛtsnā iti nibodha tān
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ye ca dharmam asūyanti ye cainaṃ paryupāsate
c bravītu bhagavān etat kva te gacchanti tādṛśāḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a rajasā tamasā caiva samavastīrṇacetasaḥ
c narakaṃ pratipadyante dharmavidveṣiṇo narāḥ
a ye tu dharmaṃ mahārāja satataṃ paryupāsate
c satyārjavaparāḥ santas te vai svargabhujo narāḥ
a dharma eva ratis teṣām ācāryopāsanād bhavet
c devalokaṃ prapadyante ye dharmaṃ paryupāsate
a manuṣyā yadi vā devāḥ śarīram upatāpya vai
c dharmiṇaḥ sukham edhante lobhadveṣavivarjitāḥ
a prathamaṃ brahmaṇaḥ putraṃ dharmam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
c dharmiṇaḥ paryupāsante phalaṃ pakvam ivāśayaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a asatāṃ kīdṛśaṃ rūpaṃ sādhavaḥ kiṃ ca kurvate
c bravītu me bhavān etat santo 'santaś ca kīdṛśāḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a durācārāś ca durdharṣā durmukhāś cāpy asādhavaḥ
c sādhavaḥ śīlasaṃpannāḥ śiṣṭācārasya lakṣaṇam
c satyārjavaparāyaṇāḥ
c eteṣāṃ dharmaśīlānāṃ
a rājamārge gavāṃ madhye goṣṭhamadhye ca dharmiṇaḥ
c nopasevanti rājendra sargaṃ mūtrapurīṣayoḥ
a pañcānām aśanaṃ dattvā śeṣam aśnanti sādhavaḥ
c na jalpanti ca bhuñjānā na nidrānty ārdrapāṇayaḥ
a citrabhānum anaḍvāhaṃ devaṃ goṣṭhaṃ catuṣpatham
c brāhmaṇaṃ dhārmikaṃ caityaṃ te kurvanti pradakṣiṇam
a vṛddhānāṃ bhārataptānāṃ strīṇāṃ bālāturasya ca
c brāhmaṇānāṃ gavāṃ rājñāṃ panthānaṃ dadate ca te
a atithīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ preṣyāṇāṃ svajanasya ca
b sāmānyaṃ bhojanaṃ kuryāt svayaṃ nāgryāśanaṃ vrajet
b na satyārjavadharmasya tulyam anyac ca vidyate
b bahulā nāma gaus tena gatim agryāṃ gatā kila
b muniśāpād dvijaḥ kaś cid vyāghratāṃ samupāgataḥ
b bahulāṃ bhakṣaṇarucim āsvādya śapathena tu
b vimucya pītavatsāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā smṛtvā purātanam
b jagāma lokān amalān sā svarāṣṭraṃ tathā punaḥ
b tasmāt satyārjavarato rājā rāṣṭraṃ samānavam
b tārayitvā sukhaṃ svargaṃ gantāsi bharatarṣabha
c tathā śaraṇakāmānāṃ goptā syāt svāgatapradaḥ
a sāyaṃ prātar manuṣyāṇām aśanaṃ devanirmitam
c nāntarā bhojanaṃ dṛṣṭam upavāsavidhir hi saḥ
a homakāle yathā vahniḥ kālam eva pratīkṣate
c ṛtukāle tathā nārī ṛtum eva pratīkṣate
e na cānyāṃ gacchate yas tu brahmacaryaṃ hi tat smṛtam
a amṛtaṃ brāhmaṇā gāva ity etat trayam ekataḥ
c tasmād gobrāhmaṇaṃ nityam arcayeta yathāvidhi
a yajuṣā saṃskṛtaṃ māṃsam upabhuñjan na duṣyati
c pṛṣṭhamāṃsaṃ vṛthāmāṃsaṃ putramāṃsaṃ ca tat samam
a svadeśe paradeśe vāpy atithiṃ nopavāsayet
c karma vai saphalaṃ kṛtvā gurūṇāṃ pratipādayet
a gurubhya āsanaṃ deyam abhivādyābhipūjya ca
c gurūn abhyarcya vardhante āyuṣā yaśasā śriyā
a vṛddhān nātivadej jātu na ca saṃpreṣayed api
c nāsīnaḥ syāt sthiteṣv evam āyur asya na riṣyate
a na nagnām īkṣate nārīṃ na vidvān puruṣān api
c maithunaṃ satataṃ guptam āhāraṃ ca samācaret
a tīrthānāṃ guravas tīrthaṃ śucīnāṃ hṛdayaṃ śuci
c darśanānāṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukham
a sāyaṃ prātaś ca vṛddhānāṃ śṛṇuyāt puṣkalā giraḥ
c śrutam āpnoti hi naraḥ satataṃ vṛddhasevayā
d dānāgāre gavāṃ caiva brāhmaṇānāṃ ca saṃnidhau
a svādhyāye bhojane caiva dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇim uddharet
c yacched vāṅmanasī nityam indriyāṇāṃ ca vibhramam
a saṃskṛtaṃ pāyasaṃ nityaṃ yavāgūṃ kṛsaraṃ haviḥ
c aṣṭakāḥ pitṛdaivatyā vṛddhānām abhipūjanam
a śmaśrukarmaṇi maṅgalyaṃ kṣutānām abhinandanam
c vyādhitānāṃ ca sarveṣām āyuṣaḥ pratinandanam
a na jātu tvam iti brūyād āpanno 'pi mahattaram
c tvaṃkāro vā vadho veti vidvatsu na viśiṣyate
e avarāṇāṃ samānānāṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ ca samācaret
a pāpam ācakṣate nityaṃ hṛdayaṃ pāpakarmiṇām
c jñānapūrvaṃ vinaśyanti gūhamānā mahājane
a jñānapūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ karma cchādayante hy asādhavaḥ
c na māṃ manuṣyāḥ paśyanti na māṃ paśyanti devatāḥ
e pāpenābhihataḥ pāpaḥ pāpam evābhijāyate
a yathā vārdhuṣiko vṛddhiṃ dehabhede pratīkṣate
c dharmeṇāpihitaṃ pāpaṃ dharmam evābhivardhayet
a yathā lavaṇam ambhobhir āplutaṃ pravilīyate
c prāyaścittahataṃ pāpaṃ tathā sadyaḥ praṇaśyati
a tasmāt pāpaṃ na gūheta gūhamānaṃ vivardhate
c kṛtvā tu sādhuṣv ākhyeyaṃ te tat praśamayanty uta
a āśayā saṃcitaṃ dravyaṃ yat kāle nopabhujyate
c anye caitat prapadyante viyoge tasya dehinaḥ
d tad dharmasādhanaṃ nityaṃ saṃkalpād dhanam ārjayet
a mānasaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dharmam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
c tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni dharmam eva samāsate
a eka eva cared dharmaṃ na dharmadhvajiko bhavet
c dharmavāṇijakā hy ete ye dharmam upabhuñjate
a arced devān adambhena sevetāmāyayā gurūn
c nidhiṃ nidadhyāt pāratryaṃ yātrārthaṃ dānaśabditam
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d mānasānīha tīrthāni praśaṃsanti maharṣayaḥ
d bhīṣmaḥ
d tāni me kuruśārdūla yathāvad vaktum arhasi
d śṛṇu tīrthāni gadato mānasānīha mānada
d yeṣu samyaṅ naraḥ snātvā prayāti paramāṃ gatim
d satyaṃ tīrthaṃ kṣamā tīrthaṃ satyam indriyanigrahaḥ
d sarvabhūtadayā tīrthaṃ tīrtham ārjavam eva ca
d dānaṃ tīrthaṃ damas tīrthaṃ saṃtoṣas tīrtham uttamam
d brahmacaryaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ ca priyavāditā
d jñānaṃ tīrthaṃ tapas tīrthaṃ dhṛtis tīrtham udāhṛtam
d tīrthānām api yat tīrthaṃ viśuddhir manasaḥ parā
d nodakaklinnagātro hi snāta ity abhidhīyate
d sa snāto yo damasnātaḥ suviśuddhamanomalaḥ
d yo lubdhaḥ piśunaḥ krūro dāmbhiko viṣayātmakaḥ
d sarvatīrtheṣv api snātaḥ pāpo malina eva saḥ
d na ca gacchanti te svargam aviśuddhamanomalāḥ
d viṣayeṣv api saṃrāgo mānaso mala ucyate
d teṣv eva ca virāgo 'sya nirmalatvam udāhṛtam
d cittam antargataṃ duṣṭaṃ tīrthasnānair na śudhyati
d śataśo 'pi jale dhautaṃ surābhāṇḍam ivāśuci
d nigṛhītendriyagrāmo yatraiva nivasen naraḥ
d tatra tasya kurukṣetraṃ naimiṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ gayā
d jñānahrade satyajale rāgadveṣamalāpahe
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d yaḥ snāto mānase tīrthe sa yāti paramāṃ gatim
d pāpasya kim adhiṣṭhānaṃ kā prasūtiś ca bhārata
d bhīṣmaḥ
d kiṃ cāsya kāraṇaṃ proktaṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha
d lobhaḥ pratiṣṭhā pāpasya prasūtir lobha eva ca
d atra te saṃśayo mā bhūl lobhaḥ pāpasya kāraṇam
d lobhāt krodhaḥ prabhavati lobhād drohaḥ pravartate
d lobhān mohaś ca māyā ca mānān mātsaryam eva ca
d nārthaiḥ pūrayituṃ śakyo lobho bahuvidhair api
d nityaṃ gambhīratoyābhir āpagābhir ivārṇavaḥ
d sarvabhūteṣv aviśvāsaḥ sarvabhūteṣv anirdayaḥ
d sarvabhūteṣv ajihmaś ca lobhād bhavati bhārata
d sumahānty api śāstrāṇi dhārayanto bahuśrutāḥ
d chettāraḥ saṃśayānāṃ ca lobhagrastāḥ pratyānty adhaḥ
d lobhakṣaye kṣayaṃ yānti sarvapāpāni dehinām
d lobhavṛddhau ca vardhante nṛpate nātra saṃśayaḥ
d tasmāt sarvaprayatnena tyaja lobhaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
d yadīcchasi mahārāja śāśvatīṃ gatim ātmanaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a nābhāgadheyaḥ prāpnoti dhanaṃ subalavān api
c bhāgadheyānvitas tv arthān kṛśo bālaś ca vindati
d tat kathaṃ labhate kena tan me tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
a nālābhakāle labhate prayatne 'pi kṛte sati
c lābhakāle 'prayatnena labhate vipulaṃ dhanam
e kṛtayatnāphalāś caiva dṛśyante śataśo narāḥ
f sadā prayatnaṃ kṛtvaiva dṛśyate hy adhano naraḥ
f ayatnenaidhamānāś ca dṛśyante bahavo janāḥ
a yadi yatno bhaven martyaḥ sa sarvaṃ phalam āpnuyāt
c nālabhyaṃ copalabhyeta nṛṇāṃ bharatasattama
a yadā prayatnaṃ kṛtavān dṛśyate hy aphalo naraḥ
c mārgan nayaśatair arthān amārgaṃś cāparaḥ sukhī
a akāryam asakṛt kṛtvā dṛśyante hy adhanā narāḥ
c dhanayuktās tv adharmasthā dṛśyante cāpare janāḥ
a adhītya nītiṃ yasmāc ca nītiyukto na dṛśyate
c anabhijñaś ca sācivyaṃ gamitaḥ kena hetunā
e vidyāyukto hy avidyaś ca dhanavān durgatas tathā
a yadi vidyām upāśritya naraḥ sukham avāpnuyāt
c na vidvān vidyayā hīnaṃ vṛttyartham upasaṃśrayet
a yathā pipāsāṃ jayati puruṣaḥ prāpya vai jalam
c dṛṣṭārtho vidyayāpy evam avidyāṃ prajahen naraḥ
a nāprāptakālo mriyate viddhaḥ śaraśatair api
c tṛṇāgreṇāpi saṃspṛṣṭaḥ prāptakālo na jīvati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a īhamānaḥ samārambhān yadi nāsādayed dhanam
c ugraṃ tapaḥ samārohen na hy anuptaṃ prarohati
a dānena bhogī bhavati medhāvī vṛddhasevayā
c ahiṃsayā ca dīrghāyur iti prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
a tasmād dadyān na yāceta pūjayed dhārmikān api
c svābhāṣī priyakṛc chuddhaḥ sarvasattvāvihiṃsakaḥ
a yadā pramāṇaprabhavaḥ svabhāvaś ca sukhāsukhe
c maśakīṭapipīlānāṃ sthiro bhava yudhiṣṭhira
 bhīṣma uvāca
a kāryate yac ca kriyate sac cāsac ca kṛtaṃ tataḥ
c tatrāśvasīta satkṛtvā asatkṛtvā na viśvaset
a kāla evātra kālena nigrahānugrahau dadat
c buddhim āviśya bhūtānāṃ dharmārtheṣu pravartate
a yadā tv asya bhaved buddhir dharmyā cārthapradarśinī
c tadāśvasīta dharmātmādṛḍhabuddhir na viśvaset
a etāvan mātram etad dhi bhūtānāṃ prājñalakṣaṇam
c kālayukto 'py ubhayavic cheṣam arthaṃ samācaret
a yathā hy upasthitaiśvaryāḥ pūjayante narā narān
c evam evātmanātmānaṃ pūjayantīha dhārmikāḥ
d bhāvaśuddhis tu tapasā devatānāṃ ca pūjayā
d sanātanena śuddhyā ca śrutadānajapair api
a na hy adharmatayā dharmaṃ dadyāt kālaḥ kathaṃ cana
c tasmād viśuddham ātmānaṃ jānīyād dharmacāriṇam
a spraṣṭum apy asamartho hi jvalantam iva pāvakam
c adharmaḥ satato dharmaṃ kālena parirakṣitam
a kāryāv etau hi kālena dharmo hi vijayāvahaḥ
c trayāṇām api lokānām ālokakaraṇo bhavet
a tatra kaś cin nayet prājño gṛhītvaiva kare naram
c uhyamānaḥ sa dharmeṇa dharme bahubhayacchale
c prāpnuyāt param acyutam
c viśvāsa eva kartavyo
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d pitāmaha mahābāho sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ vara
d satyārjavaguṇopetaṃ saumyaṃ dharmaṃ vadasva me
d bhavataḥ śrotum icchāmi satyavākyam anuttamam
d yat prāg bahulayā proktaṃ tan me tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
d bhīṣmaḥ
d saumya dharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi satyārjavasamanvitam
d kāmarūpasya vyāghrasya dhenvā saṃvādam uttamam
d māthure viṣaye ramye dhanadhānyasamanvite
d nānājanapadākīrṇe yajñavāṭavibhūṣite
d tatra sā nagarī ramyā yamunātīram āśritā
d ardhacandrapratīkāśā vidvajjanavibhūṣitā
d indrayaṣṭidhvajākīrṇā gopībhir upaśobhitā
d bahudvijasamākīrṇā nānāpaṇyopaśobhitā
d supramāṇā suramyā ca svātinakṣatranirmitā
d prākārāṭṭapratolībhir durjayā parikhādibhiḥ
d āmrātakakapitthaiś ca rājavṛkṣaiś ca śobhitā
d devatāyatanair divyaiḥ kadalīkhaṇḍamaṇḍitā
d haṃsamālāpratīkāśair dīpyate dhavalair gṛhaiḥ
d panasair bakulais tālaiḥ priyālair nāgakesaraiḥ
d karavīraiḥ karṇikāraiḥ pāṭalāśokacampakaiḥ
d mallikākundajātībhiḥ kubjāhlādakuraṇṭakaiḥ
d suvarṇaśvetayūthībhiḥ kiṃkirātotpalādibhiḥ
d puṃnāgavṛkṣabakulair udyānair upaśobhitā
d saṃpūrṇā dhanadhānyaiś ca godhanair upaśobhitā
d vedādhyayanaghoṣaiś ca pavitrīkṛtamaṅgalā
d vedīśṛṅgāṭakai ramyais trikacatvaraśobhitā
d rāvaṇasyeva ratnāḍhyā laṅkā caiva mahāpurī
d indraseno nṛpas tatra rājadharmasamanvitaḥ
d dharme cābhirato nityaṃ devatātithipūjakaḥ
d kṣatradharme rataḥ śrīmān prajāpatisamaḥ kṣitau
d tena sā nagarī ramyā rājasiṃhena pālitā
d nityotsavapramuditā śaṅkhavāditranāditā
d susaṃgītavidagdhaiś ca prekṣaṇīyaiḥ samākulā
d antarāpaṇavīthībhiḥ suvibhaktaiś catuṣpathaiḥ
d dīrghikākūpavāpībhis taḍāgair upaśobhitā
d sabhāprapāsamākīrṇā vivāhamakhasaṃkulā
d purī candravatī nāma dṛṣṭā te yadi vā śrutā
d tasyāṃ puryāṃ purā vṛttaṃ tattvaṃ śṛṇu yudhiṣṭhira
d kasya cid dvijamukhyasya kalyāṇī dhenur uttamā
d hṛṣṭapuṣṭā susaṃtuṣṭā bahulā nāma viśrutā
d godhanasya ca sā mukhyā haṃsavarṇā ghaṭasravā
d dīrghaghoṇā vibhaktāṅgī śreṣṭhalomatanutvacā
d vistīrṇajaghanā divyā pīnaśroṇipayodharā
d sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannā sarvāvayavasundarī
d nīlakaṇṭhā śubhagrīvā ghaṇṭālī madhurasvarā
d sā ca yūthasya sarvasya cacārāgre sunirbhayā
d grāmadhānyaṃ carec channaṃ gatvaikaiva yathāsukham
d sāndraṃ supuṣpitaṃ surabhi acchinnaṃ carate tṛṇam
d rohito nāma tatrānyaḥ parvato yamunātaṭe
d anekakandaradarīnirjharair upaśobhitaḥ
d tasya pūrvottare bhāge ghore tṛṇasamākule
d saṃkaṭe viṣame durge bhairave lomaharṣaṇe
d mṛgasiṃhasamākīrṇe bahuśvāpadasevite
d vallīvṛkṣādigahane śivāśataninādite
d durge 'smin vasate raudraḥ kāmarūpī bhayaṃkaraḥ
d dvīpī śoṇitamāṃsāśī mahādaṃṣṭro mahābalaḥ
d mahāparvatasaṃkāśo meghagarjitanisvanaḥ
d mahāguhādarīvaktras tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭro nakhāyudhaḥ
d nandī nāma sa dharmātmā sa ca gopahite rataḥ
d acchinnāgrais tṛṇair dīrghair godhanaṃ parirakṣati
d tasya yūthaparibhraṣṭā bahulā tṛṇatṛṣṇayā
d carantī vyāghrapurataḥ sā dhenuḥ samupasthitā
d abhidravaṃś ca tāṃ vyāghras tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
d tvam adya vihito bhakṣaḥ svayaṃ prāptāsi me vanam
d vyāghrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā niṣṭhuraṃ lomaharṣaṇam
d sutaṃ rūpānvitaṃ bālaṃ candrarūpasamaprabham
d vatsaṃ smarati sā dhenuḥ snehārtā gadgadasvarā
d dahyantī putraśokena bahulā putravatsalā
d rudantī karuṇaṃ sā tu nirāśā putradarśane
d dṛṣṭvā tu bahulāṃ vyāghraḥ krandamānāṃ suduḥkhitām
d uvāca vacanaṃ ghoraṃ bahule kiṃ prarudyate
d daivād yathopapannāsi bhakṣas tvaṃ me yadṛcchayā
d na rudantyā vā hasantyā vā tathā te jīvitaṃ bhavet
d vihitaṃ bhujyate loke svayaṃ prāptāsi dhenuke
d mṛtyus te vihito 'dyaiva vṛthā kim anuśocasi
d papraccha ca punar vyāghraḥ kimarthaṃ ruditaṃ tvayā
d kautukaṃ me 'dya saṃjātam aśeṣaṃ kathayasva naḥ
d vyāghrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bahulā vākyam abravīt
d kṣantum arhasi me nātha kāmarūpa namo 'stu te
d tvāṃ samālokya lokasya paritrāṇaṃ na vidyate
d jīvitārthaṃ na śocāmi prāptavyaṃ maraṇaṃ mayā
d jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyur dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca
d tasmād aparihārye 'rthe na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
d devair api sadā sarvair martavyam avaśair dhruvam
d tasmāt tan nāham evaikaṃ vyāghra śocāmi jīvitam
d kiṃ tu snehavaśād vyāghra duḥkhena ruditaṃ mayā
d asti me hṛdi saṃtāpas taṃ ca tvaṃ śrotum arhasi
d agre vayasi vartantī prasūtāhaṃ mṛgādhipa
d iṣṭaḥ prathamajātas tu sutaś ca mama bālakaḥ
d kṣīraṃ pibati me vatsas tṛṇaṃ nādyāpi jighrati
d sa ca gopakule baddhaḥ kṣudhito mām udīkṣate
d sutaṃ tam anuśocāmi kathaṃ jīviṣyate sutaḥ
d tasyecchāmi stanaṃ dātuṃ putrasnehavaśānugā
d pāyayitvā ca taṃ vatsam avalihya ca mūrdhani
d sakhīnām arpayitvā ca saṃdiśya ca hitāhitam
d punaḥ pratyāgamiṣyāmi yatheṣṭaṃ bhakṣayiṣyasi
d śīghrāham āgamiṣyāmi mahāvyāghra tavāntikam
d bahulāyā vacaḥ śrutvā mṛgendraḥ punar abravīt
d kiṃ te putreṇa kartavyaṃ maraṇaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi
d trasanti sarvabhūtāni māṃ nirīkṣya mriyanti ca
d tvaṃ punaḥ kṛpayāviṣṭā putra putreti bhāṣase
d na mantrā na tapo dānaṃ na mātā na pitā sutaḥ
d śaknuvanti paritrātum āgatāṃ matsamīpataḥ
d kathaṃ tad gokulaṃ gatvā gopījanasamākulam
d vṛṣabhair nāditaṃ ramyaṃ bālavatsavibhūṣitam
d bhūṣaṇaṃ devalokasya svargatulyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
d nityaṃ pramuditaṃ ramyaṃ sarvadaivatapūjitam
d pavitraṃ tat pavitrāṇāṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam
d yat tīrthaṃ sarvatīrthānāṃ ramyāṇāṃ ramyam uttamam
d samastaguṇasaṃkīrṇam īśvarāyatanaṃ mahat
d yat sthānaṃ sarvasiddhānāṃ bhūmisvargam anuttamam
d gargarīravaśabdena yatra lakṣmīr na hanyate
d yatra vatsāś ca huṃkāraṃ karuṇaṃ mātṛkāṅkṣayā
d yad gopaiḥ pālitaṃ śūrair bāhuyuddhaviśāradaiḥ
d pragītanṛtyasaṃlāpaṃ valgutāsphoṭanāditam
d itas tataḥ sthitair vatsair arghyamānaiḥ samantataḥ
d sarovad bhrājate goṣṭhaṃ śrīmadbhir iva paṅkajaiḥ
d tac chrīniketanaṃ ramyaṃ mātaraṃ bhrātaraṃ sutam
d dṛṣṭvā sakhījanaṃ bhūyaḥ kathaṃ pratyāgamiṣyasi
d pañca bhūtāni me bhadre pibantu rudhiraṃ tava
d bahulā
d na nirāśāni bhūtāni vāṅmātreṇa karomy aham
d prathamaṃ dṛṣṭavatsāhaṃ mṛgendra śṛṇu me vacaḥ
d dṛṣṭvā sakhījanaṃ bālaṃ gopāṃś ca paricārakān
d gopījanaṃ samāgamya jananīṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
d vyāghraḥ
d śapathair āgamiṣyāmi manyase yadi muñca mām
d śapathāḥ kīdṛśā bhadre ye tvayā parinoditāḥ
d bahulā
d pratyayaṃ caivam ākhyāhi bahule mama yatnataḥ
d yadi te nāsti viśvāso mamopari mṛgādhipa
d śapathair āgamiṣyāmi satyaṃ brūyāṃ na saṃśayaḥ
d mā dadasveti yo brūyād gurvagnibrāhmaṇeṣu ca
d tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
d madhumāṃse ca yat pāpaṃ lākṣāvikrayaṇe tathā
d tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
d yo vedavikrayī vipraś catvare paṭhate tu yaḥ
d asaṃtoṣī ca yo vipro nityaṃ bhavati yācakaḥ
d tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
d matsarī gotrabhāvena bhūtānāṃ guṇanāśakaḥ
d kaumāraṃ cāpi bhartāraṃ yā nārī nānumanyate
d paradravyopayogena yajñaṃ kurvanti ye dvijāḥ
d tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
d svapākaṃ ca parityajya parapākaratāś ca ye
d ye saktā gurudāreṣu svāmidāreṣu ye narāḥ
d brāhmaṇo vṛṣalīṃ gatvā na tu tīrthāni sevate
d tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
d brāhmaṇaḥ kṛtasaṃskāraḥ śūdraprekṣaṇakārakaḥ
d tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
d anṛtaṃ dhanasaṃbaddhe kūṭasākṣyaṃ vadanti ye
d yat pāpaṃ brahmahatyāyāṃ mātāpitṛvadhena ca
d tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
d yat pāpaṃ lubdhakānāṃ ca mlecchānāṃ garadāyinām
d tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
d pādena spṛśate gāś ca śirobhir na namanti ye
d tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
d goṣv avajñāṃ prakurvanti śapante tāḍayanti ca
d tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
d sakṛd dattvā tu yaḥ kanyāṃ dvitīyāya prayacchati
d tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
d kathāyāṃ kriyamāṇāyām antarāyaṃ karoti yaḥ
d tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
d gṛhe yasyāgato vipro nirāśaḥ pratigacchati
d tena pāpena lipyāmi yat te 'haṃ nāgame punaḥ
d dvibhāryaḥ puruṣo yas tu ekāṃ snehena paśyati
d tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
d ekākī mṛṣṭam aśnāti yaḥ kaś cit puruṣādhamaḥ
d tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
d yas trīn hale balīvardān viṣamaṃ vāhayeta yaḥ
d tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yadi nāyāṃ tavāntikam
d ity etaiḥ pātakair ghorair āgamiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ
d labdhvā sa pratyayaṃ vyāghraḥ punar vacanam abravīt
d saṃjātaḥ pratyayo 'smākaṃ śapathair bahule tava
d kadā cin manyase gatvā mūrkho 'sau vañcito mayā
d loke 'smin nāstikāḥ ke cin mūrkhāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ
d bhrāmayanti ca te buddhiṃ cakrārūḍha ivekṣaṇam
d atathyāny api tathyāni darśayanty api peśalāḥ
d same nimnonnatānīva citraṃ karmavido janāḥ
d prāyaḥ kṛtārtho loko 'yaṃ manyate nopakāriṇam
d vatsaḥ kṣīrakṣayaṃ dṛṣṭvā parityajati mātaram
d na taṃ paśyāmi loke 'smin kṛte pratikaroti yaḥ
d sarvasya hi kṛtārthasya matir anyā pravartate
d ṛṣidevāsuragaṇaiḥ śapathāḥ kāryasiddhaye
d kṛtāḥ parasparaṃ pūrvaṃ tan na manyāmahe katham
d satyenābhiśaped yas tu devāgnigurusaṃnidhau
d tasya vaivasvato rājā dharmasyārdhaṃ nikṛntati
d mā te buddhir bhaved evaṃ śapathair eva yantritā
d tenaivaṃ darśitaṃ pūrvaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ kuru sāṃpratam
d bahule gaccha paśya tvaṃ putrakaṃ putravatsale
d pāyayitvā ca taṃ vatsam avalihya ca mūrdhani
d mātaraṃ bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā sakhīḥ svajanabāndhavān
d bhīṣmaḥ
d satyam evāgrataḥ kṛtvā śīghram āgamanaṃ kuru
d evaṃ sā pratyayaṃ kṛtvā bahulā satyavādinī
d anujñātā mṛgendreṇa prayātā putravatsalā
d aśrupūrṇamukhī dīnā vepamānā suduḥkhitā
d kurarī niḥśvasantīva patitā śokasāgare
d kariṇīva hi nāgena gṛhītā salilāśaye
d aśaktātmaparitrāṇe vilapantī muhur muhuḥ
d sā tu gopakulaṃ gatvā bahulā hṛtavikramā
d śrutvātmavatsaṃ krośantaṃ paryadhāvata tanmukhī
d upāsarpata taṃ vatsaṃ bāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇā
d sa prāptāṃ mātaraṃ vatsaḥ śaṅkitaḥ paripṛcchati
d na te paśyāmi saumyatvaṃ durmanā iva lakṣyase
d bahulā
d udvignā cāpi te dṛṣṭir bhītabhītā ca dṛśyate
d piba putra stanaṃ mahyaṃ kāraṇaṃ yadi pṛcchasi
d āgatā ca tava snehāt kuru tṛptiṃ yathepsitām
d apaścimam idaṃ vatsa durlabhaṃ mātṛdarśanam
d ekāham atha māṃ pītvā pratyūṣe kasya pāsyasi
d mayā tu putra gantavyaṃ śapathair āgatā hy aham
d kāmarūpasya vyāghrasya dātavyaṃ jīvitaṃ mayā
d bahulāyā vacaḥ śrutvā vatso vacanam abravīt
d ahaṃ tatra gamiṣyāmi yatra tvaṃ gantum icchasi
d ślāghyaṃ mamāpi maraṇaṃ tvayā saha na saṃśayaḥ
d ekākināpi martavyaṃ mayāvaśyaṃ tvayā vinā
d yadi māṃ sahitaṃ mātar vane vyāghro haniṣyati
d yā gatir mātṛbhaktānāṃ dhruvaṃ sā me bhaviṣyati
d tasmād avaśyaṃ yāsyāmi tvayā saha na saṃśayaḥ
d atha mātaś ca tiṣṭha tvaṃ śapathāḥ santu te mama
d jananyā viprayuktasya jīvite kiṃ prayojanam
d anāthasya vane nityaṃ ko me nātho bhaviṣyati
d nāsti mātṛsamo bandhur bālānāṃ kṣīrapāyinām
d nāsti mātṛsamo nātho nāsti mātṛsamā gatiḥ
d nāsti mātṛsamaḥ sneho nāsti mātṛsamaṃ sukham
d nāsti mātṛsamo deva ihaloke paratra ca
d eṣa naḥ paramo dharmaḥ prajāpativinirmitaḥ
d ye tu tiṣṭhanti satputrās te yānti paramāṃ gatim
d mamaiva vihito mṛtyur na tvaṃ putra gamiṣyasi
d na cāyam anyajīvānāṃ mṛtyuḥ syād anyamṛtyunā
d apaścimam imaṃ putra mātuḥ saṃdeśam uttamam
d anutiṣṭhasva madvākyaṃ tatra śuśrūṣaṇaṃ param
d vane jale ca vicaran mā pramādaṃ kariṣyasi
d pramādāt sarvabhūtāni vinaśyanti na saṃśayaḥ
d na ca lobhena vartavyaṃ viṣamasthaṃ tṛṇaṃ kva cit
d lobhād vināśaḥ sarveṣām iha loke paratra ca
d samudram aṭavīṃ yuddhaṃ viśanto lobhamohitāḥ
d lobhād akāryam atyugraṃ vidvān api samācaret
d lobhāt pramādād viśrambhāt tribhir vai badhyate pumān
d tasmāl lobhaṃ na kurvīta na pramādaṃ na viśvaset
d ātmā ca satataṃ putra rakṣitavyaḥ prayatnataḥ
d sarpebhyaḥ śvāpadebhyaś ca mlecchacorādisaṃkaṭe
d tiraścāṃ pāpajātīnām ekatra vasatām api
d viparītāni cittāni na jñāyante ha putraka
d nadīnāṃ nakhināṃ caiva śṛṅgiṇāṃ śastrapāṇinām
d viśvāso naiva kartavyaḥ strīṇāṃ veśyājanasya ca
d na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste 'pi na viśvaset
d viśvāsād bhayam utpannaṃ mūlāny api nikṛntati
d na viśvaset svadehe 'pi calato jīvacetasaḥ
d tad vyaktimūḍham atyarthaṃ sadā suptaṃ vicārayet
d gandhaḥ sarvatra satatam āghrātavyaḥ prayatnataḥ
d gāvaḥ paśyanti gandhena vedaiḥ paśyanti brāhmaṇāḥ
d cāraiḥ paśyanti rājānaś cakṣurbhyām itare janāḥ
d naikas tiṣṭhed vane ghore dharmam ekaś ca cintayet
d na codvegas tvayā kāryaḥ sarvasya maraṇaṃ dhruvam
d yathā hi pathikaḥ kaś cic chāyām āśritya viśramet
d viśramya ca punar gacchet tadvad bhūtasamāgamaḥ
d yatrānityaṃ jagat sarvaṃ tatraikaḥ śocyate katham
d vatsāntaḥśokam utsṛjya madvākyam anupālaya
d śirasy āghrāya taṃ vatsam avalihya ca mūrdhani
d śokena mahatāviṣṭā bāṣpavyākulalocanā
d viniḥśvasantī mārgīva vyāghrāṇāṃ vaśam āgatā
d putrahīnā jagat sarvaṃ paśyanty andheva sābhavat
d mahāpaṅkavinirmagnā tiṣṭhanty evātra sīdati
d vilapya bahulā putram uvācedaṃ punar vacaḥ
d nāsti putrasamaḥ sneho nāsti putrasamaṃ sukham
d nāsti putrasamā prītir nāsti putrasamā gatiḥ
d aputrasya jagac chūnyam aputrasya gṛhaṃ kutaḥ
d putreṇa jayate lokān putreṇa narakaṃ jayet
d anṛtaṃ vadate lokaś candanaṃ kila śītalam
d putragātrapariṣvaṅgaś candanād api śītalaḥ
d digambaraṃ gatavrīḍaṃ jaṭilaṃ dhūlidhūsaram
d puṇyair vinā na paśyanti gaṅgādharam ivātmajam
d kiṃ candanena pīyūṣabindunā kiṃ kim indunā
d putragātrapariṣvaṅgapātraṃ gātraṃ bhaved yadi
d iti putraguṇān uktvā nirīkṣya ca muhur muhuḥ
d svamātaraṃ sakhīr gopān kramāt tān anupṛcchati
d yūthasyāgre carantīṃ mām āsasāda mṛgādhipaḥ
d muktāhaṃ tena śapathaiḥ kulaṃ dṛṣṭvāgamiṣyasi
d sāhaṃ bhavantaṃ saṃdraṣṭuṃ mātaraṃ svakulaṃ sutam
d āgatā satyavākyena punar yāsyāmi tatra ca
d mātaḥ kṣamasva tat sarvaṃ bālatve yat kṛtaṃ mayā
d nyāsas tavāyaṃ dauhitraḥ kim anyat prabravīmi te
d vipule campake dāme bhadre surabhi mālini
d vasudhāre śriye nande mahānande ghaṭasrave
d ajñānāj jñānato vāpi yad uktaṃ kva cid apriyam
d tat kṣamadhvaṃ mahābhāgāḥ paścād yac ca kṛtaṃ mayā
d sarvāḥ sarvaguṇopetāḥ sarvalokasya mātaraḥ
d sarvāḥ sarvapradā nityaṃ rakṣadhvaṃ mama bālakam
d anātham abalaṃ dīnaṃ sīdantaṃ mama putrakam
d mātṛśokābhisaṃtaptaṃ bhaginyaḥ pālayiṣyatha
d bhaginīnām ayaṃ putraḥ sāṃprataṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
d bālo 'balābhiḥ sarvābhiḥ poṣyaḥ pālyaś ca putravat
d carantaṃ viṣame sthāne gacchantaṃ paragokule
d akāryeṣu pravartantaṃ he sakhyo vārayiṣyatha
d paraputrātmaputreṣu yāsāṃ cittaṃ samaṃ bhavet
d tā dhanyās tāḥ kṛtārthāś ca tāḥ striyas tāś ca mātaraḥ
d modante devalokeṣu tā gāvas tāś ca yoṣitaḥ
d yāḥ pālayanty anāthāṃś ca paraputrān ātmaputravat
d tasmād anāthaṃ matputraṃ putravat pālayiṣyatha
d rakṣadhvaṃ ca mahābhāgā yāsyāmi satyasaṃśrayāt
d yataḥ sarvasya jātasya sthitaṃ maraṇam agrataḥ
d na cāsmadgamane manyuḥ sakhyaḥ kāryaḥ kathaṃ cana
d śrutvaitad bahulāvākyaṃ mātā sakhyaś ca vihvalāḥ
d viṣādaṃ paramaṃ jagmur idam ūcuḥ suvismitāḥ
d aho sumahad āścaryaṃ yad vyāghravadanaṃ mahat
d praveṣṭum udyatā bhīmaṃ bahulā satyavākyataḥ
d śapathaiḥ satyavākyena vañcayitvā yato bhayam
d nāśitavyaṃ prayatnena tat kathaṃ gamyate punaḥ
d bahule naiva gantavyaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ katamas tava
d yad bālaṃ svakulaṃ tyaktvā satyalobhena gamyate
d atra gāthāḥ purā gītā ṛṣibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ
d prāṇatyāge samutpanne śapathair nāsti pātakam
d uktvānṛtaṃ bhaved yatra prāṇināṃ prāṇarakṣaṇam
d anṛtaṃ tatra vai satyaṃ satyaṃ caivānṛtaṃ bhavet
d kāminīṣu vivāheṣu gavāṃ kārye tathaiva ca
d bahulā
d brāhmaṇābhyupapattau ca śapathair nāsti pātakam
d pareṣāṃ prāṇarakṣārthaṃ vadāmy evānṛtaṃ vacaḥ
d nātmārtham utsahe vaktuṃ svalpam apy anṛtaṃ kva cit
d ekaḥ saṃśliṣyate garbhe jāyetaiko mriyeta ca
d bhuṅkte caikaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ mātaḥ satyaṃ vadāmy aham
d satye pratiṣṭhito loko dharmaḥ satye pratiṣṭhitaḥ
d udadhiḥ satyavākyena maryādāṃ na vilaṅghati
d viṣṇave pṛthivīṃ dattvā baliḥ pātālam āśritaḥ
d chadmanā ca balir baddhaḥ satyavākyena tiṣṭhati
d pravardhamānaḥ śailendraḥ śatayojanam ucchritaḥ
d satyena saṃsthito vindhyo na pravṛddhaḥ sa sāṃpratam
d svargāpavarganarakāḥ sarve vāci pratiṣṭhitāḥ
d yas tāṃ lopayate vācam aśeṣaṃ tena lopitam
d yo 'nyathā santam ātmānam anyathā satsu bhāṣate
d kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ coreṇātmāpahāriṇā
d tasmān naivāham ātmānam asatyena ca lopaye
d yāsyāmi narakaṃ ghoraṃ vilopyātmānam ātmanā
d agādhe vipule śuddhe satyatīrthe kṣamāhrade
d snātvā pāpavinirmuktaḥ prayāti paramāṃ gatim
d aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam
d aśvamedhasahasrād dhi satyam eva viśiṣyate
d satyaṃ sādhu tapaḥ śrutaṃ ca paramaṃ kleśādibhir varjitaṃ
d svādhīnaṃ ca sudurlabhaṃ ca jagataḥ sādhāraṇaṃ bhūṣaṇam
d sādhūnāṃ nikaṣaṃ satāṃ kuladhanaṃ sarvāśramāṇāṃ balaṃ
d yan mleccho 'pi vidhāya gacchati divaṃ tat tyajya tiṣṭhet katham
d sakhyaḥ
d bahule tvaṃ namaskāryā sarvair api surāsuraiḥ
d mā tvaṃ paramasatyena prāṇāṃs tyajasi dustyajān
d brūmaḥ kim atra kalyāṇi yā tvaṃ dharmadhuraṃdharā
d tyāgenānena yat prāpyaṃ trailokye kaḥ samo 'sti te
d adhiyogaṃ ca paśyāmas tyāgād asmāt sutena te
d na hi kalyāṇacittānām āpadaḥ santi kutra cit
d dṛṣṭvā gopāñjanaṃ sarvaṃ parikramya ca gokulam
d bahulā prasthitā devān vṛkṣāṃś cāpṛcchya tān punaḥ
d kṣitiṃ ca jalam agniṃ ca vāyuṃ khārkaniśākaram
d daśadigdevatām adrīn nakṣatrāṇi grahāṃs tathā
d sarvān vijñāpayāmy adya praṇipatya muhur muhuḥ
d svaiḥ svaiḥ prabhāvai rakṣadhvam anāthaṃ mama vatsakam
d karuṇāhitacittānāṃ na syāt parajano yataḥ
d tasmāt karuṇayā bālam anāthaṃ pālayiṣyatha
d ye saṃśritā vane siddhāḥ sarvāś ca vanadevatāḥ
d vane carantaṃ me bālaṃ te rakṣantu sutaṃ mama
d campakāśokapuṃnāgasaralārjunakiṃśukāḥ
d śṛṇvantu pādapāḥ sarve saṃdeśaṃ mama viklavam
d bālam ekākinaṃ dīnaṃ carantaṃ viṣame vane
d rakṣadhvaṃ vatsakaṃ bālaṃ snehāt putram ivaurasam
d mātāpitṛvinirmuktam anāthaṃ dīnam āturam
d vicarantam imāṃ bhūmiṃ krandamānaṃ suduḥkhitam
d tasyehākrandamānasya matputrasya mahāvane
d mātṛśokābhibhūtasya kṣutpipāsāturasya ca
d nyastasyaikākinaḥ śūnyaṃ jagat sarvaṃ prapaśyataḥ
d caramāṇasya kartavyaṃ sānukrośasya rakṣaṇam
d evaṃ saṃdiśya bahulā putrasnehavaśaṃ gatā
d śokāgninātisaṃtaptā chinnāśā putradarśane
d viyuktā cakravākīva lateva patitā taroḥ
d andheva yaṣṭirahitā praskhalantī pade pade
d gatvā tu sā punas tatra yatrāsau piśitāśanaḥ
d āste visphūrjitamukhas tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭro bhayānakaḥ
d vyāghraṃ dṛṣṭvā tu sā dhenur idaṃ vacanam abravīt
d āgatāhaṃ mahābhāga satyadharmavyavasthayā
d kuru tṛptiṃ yathākāmaṃ mama māṃsena sāṃpratam
d tarpayasva svabhūtāni pañcāsya śoṇitena me
d vyāghraḥ
d svāgataṃ tava kalyāṇi bahule satyavādini
d na hi satyavatāṃ kiṃ cid aśubhaṃ vidyate kva cit
d tvayoktaṃ bahule pūrvaṃ satyāt pratyāgatā punaḥ
d tena naḥ kautukaṃ jātaṃ prāptāgacchet kathaṃ punaḥ
d anyathā māṃ samāsādya jīvantī yāsyase katham
d tac ca naḥ kautukaṃ pūrṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ satyaṃ gavāṃ mayā
d tasmād anena satyena vimuktāsi mayādhunā
d satye pratiṣṭhitā lokā dharmaḥ satye pratiṣṭhitaḥ
d satye pratiṣṭhitaṃ jñānaṃ sarvaṃ satye pratiṣṭhitam
d satyena devās tuṣyanti satyena pitaras tathā
d satyena ṛṣayaḥ siddhāḥ sarvaṃ satye pratiṣṭhitam
d dhanyā gāvaḥ kṣitir dhanyā dhanyā tvam api dhenuke
d dhanyaḥ sa rājā yatra tvaṃ vasase satyavādini
d dhanyaḥ sarāṣṭraḥ satṛṇaḥ prāṇivṛkṣasamanvitaḥ
d cacāra bahulā yatra diṣṭyā pāpavināśinī
d te dhanyās te kṛtārthāś ca tair eva sukṛtaṃ kṛtam
d taiḥ prāptaṃ janmanaḥ sāraṃ ye pibanti gavāṃ payaḥ
d mṛgendraḥ pratyayaṃ gatvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ
d pratyādeśo 'yam asmākaṃ sarvair devaiḥ pradarśitaḥ
d tat kariṣyāmy ahaṃ karma yena mokṣyāmi kilbiṣāt
d mayā jīvasahasrāṇi bhakṣitāni hatāni ca
d gatiṃ kāṃ nu gamiṣyāmi dṛṣṭvā gosatyam īdṛśam
d ahaṃ pāpī durācāro nṛśaṃso jīvaghātakaḥ
d kāṃl lokān hi gamiṣyāmi kṛtvā karma sudāruṇam
d gamiṣye puṇyatīrthāni kariṣye kāyaśodhanam
d patiṣye girim āsādya viśe vāpi hutāśanam
d bahule yan mayā kāryaṃ tapaḥ pāpaviśuddhaye
d bahulā
d tad ādeśaya saṃkṣepān na kālo vistarasya me
d tapaḥ kṛte praśaṃsanti tretāyāṃ yajñakarma ca
d dvāpare dhyānayogaṃ ca dānam ekaṃ kalau yuge
d sarveṣām eva dānānām idam evaikam uttamam
d abhayaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ nāsti dānam ataḥ param
d carācarāṇāṃ bhūtānām abhayaṃ yaḥ prayacchati
d sa sarvabhayanirmuktaḥ paraṃ brahmādhigacchati
d nāsty ahiṃsāparaṃ dānaṃ nāsty ahiṃsāparo damaḥ
d yathā hastipadenānyat padaṃ sarvaṃ pralīyate
d sarve dharmās tathā vyāghra vidhīyante hy ahiṃsayā
d yogavṛkṣasya yā chāyā tāpatrayavināśinī
d dharmajñānasupuṣpasya svargamokṣaphalasya ca
d duḥkhatrayārkasaṃtaptaś chāyāṃ yogataroḥ śritaḥ
d na badhyate punar duḥkhaiḥ prāpya nirvāṇam uttamam
d ity evaṃ paramaṃ śreyaḥ kīrtitaṃ te samāsataḥ
d vyāghraḥ
d jñātaṃ caitat tvayā sarvaṃ kevalaṃ māṃ hi pṛcchasi
d ahaṃ devaiḥ purā sarvair vyāghrarūpeṇa pātitaḥ
d tatra prāṇivadhe ghore aśeṣaṃ mama vismṛtam
d tvatsaṃparkopadeśena saṃjātaṃ smaraṇaṃ punaḥ
d muktaśāpaś ca saṃjātaḥ prasādāt tava dhenuke
d bahule gaccha tuṣṭo 'smi putreṇa sahitā bhava
d tvaṃ cāpy anena satyena gamiṣyasi parāṃ gatim
d tato yogaṃ samāśritya vyāghras tadgatamānasaḥ
d prāṇāyāmaiḥ svakaṃ dehaṃ parityajya divaṃ gataḥ
d sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā yogaiśvaryasamanvitaḥ
d vimāne haṃsasaṃyukte mahatā apsarogaṇaiḥ
d vimānasaṃsthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ
d bahulā hṛṣṭatuṣṭāṅgī gokulaṃ punar āgatā
d āgatya ca yathāvṛttaṃ vyāghrasaṃvādam uttamam
d sakhībhyaḥ kathayām āsa putrasya ca viśeṣataḥ
d bahulā putrasaṃyuktā suprītā sunirākulā
d godhanair vṛṣabhair vatsair gopagopījanair vṛtā
d vicacārāṭavīṃ sarvām aśeṣabhayavarjitā
d yatheṣṭaceṣṭam abhavad gokulaṃ tatprabhāvataḥ
d sarāṣṭrabhṛtyarājānaṃ sāntaḥpuraparicchadam
d sarvān gopāṃś ca tān dṛṣṭvā gopīgomaṇḍalāni ca
d iti saṃgṛhya tān sarvān bahulā prasthitā divam
d mahāvimānaiḥ śrīmadbhir asaṃkhyaiḥ sarvatovṛtam
d prāpya svargaṃ kramād ūrdhvam aśeṣaiḥ sahitā punaḥ
d upary upari lokānāṃ gatvā golokam āsthitā
d tatra saṃbhogasaṃkīrṇe asaṃkhyātaiḥ purottamaiḥ
d bhīṣmaḥ
d krīḍate sahitā sarvair yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam
d ity etat satyavākyasya māhābhāgyam udāhṛtam
d yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyād vāpi svargalokaṃ sa gacchati
d bahulāvyāghrasaṃvādaṃ yaḥ paṭhet satataṃ dvijaḥ
d śṛṇuyād ekacittaś ca sa vyāghrair nābhibhūyate
d viyuktā yā sutair nārī naro vāpi paṭhet sadā
d so 'pi pāpair vinirmuktaḥ putrair bhavati saṃgataḥ
d yaḥ paṭhet prātar utthāya caturdaśyaṣṭamīṣu ca
d satāṃ puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān gacchate nātra saṃśayaḥ
d gavāṃ goṣṭhe ca paṭhatāṃ govṛddhir nātra saṃśayaḥ
d kṣetramadhye ca paṭhatāṃ sasyavṛddhiḥ prajāyate
d gṛhamadhye ca paṭhatāṃ bālānāṃ śāntivardhanam
d bhaved grahābhibhūtānāṃ rakṣām etāṃ ca yaḥ paṭhet
d durgeṣu paṭhatāṃ nityam aṭavyāyataneṣu ca
d divā vā yadi vā rātrau na bhayaṃ vidyate kva cit
d duḥsvapnāriṣṭadurmitraṃ śrutvedaṃ saṃpraṇaśyati
d vandhyāyāś ca bhavet putraḥ saṃmataś ca patir bhavet
d kumārī ca sadā śṛṇvan vīraṃ patim avāpnuyāt
d nārī vā puruṣo vāpi durbhagaḥ subhago bhavet
d gavāṃ parvasu bhaktyā ca māhātmyaṃ purataḥ paṭhet
d sa govṛddhim avāpnoti golokaṃ caiva gacchati
d śūdro 'haṃ nādhikāro me cāturāśramyasevane
d iti vijñānam apare nātmany upadadhaty uta
d viśeṣeṇa ca vakṣyāmi cāturvarṇyasya liṅgataḥ
d pañcabhūtaśarīrāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ sadṛśātmanām
d lokadharme ca dharme ca viśeṣakaraṇaṃ kṛtam
d yatraikatvaṃ punar yānti prāṇinas tatra vistaraḥ
d adhruvo hi kathaṃ lokaḥ smṛto dharmaḥ kathaṃ dhruvaḥ
d yatra kālo dhruvas tāta tatra dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
d sarveṣāṃ tulyadehānāṃ sarveṣāṃ sadṛśātmanām
d kālo dharmeṇa saṃyuktaḥ śeṣa eva susaṃgrahaḥ
d evaṃ sati na doṣo 'sti bhūtānāṃ dharmasevane
d tiryagyonāv api satāṃ loka eva mato guruḥ
d pālaya tvaṃ prajāḥ sarvāḥ śāntātmā cānuśāsitaḥ
d dvaipāyanas tv ayaṃ cakṣuḥ kṛṣṇas te 'stu parāyaṇam
d ity uktvopāsanārthāya virarāma mahāmatiḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
 śaratalpagataṃ bhīṣmaṃ pāṇḍavo 'tha kurūdvahaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhiro hitaprepsur apṛcchat kalmaṣāpaham
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kiṃ śreyaḥ puruṣasyeha kiṃ kurvan sukham edhate
c vipāpmā ca bhavet kena kiṃ vā kalmaṣanāśanam
d tasmai śuśrūṣamāṇāya bhūyaḥ śāṃtanavas tadā
d devavaṃśaṃ yathānyāyam ācaṣṭa puruṣarṣabha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ayaṃ daivatavaṃśo vai ṛṣivaṃśasamanvitaḥ
c dvisaṃdhyaṃ paṭhitaḥ putra kalmaṣāpaharaḥ paraḥ
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d sarvaśāntikaraṃ japyaṃ dāridryāturaduḥkhinām
d tuṣṭipuṣṭipradaṃ nityaṃ pitāmaha vadasva me
d bhīṣmaḥ
d ayaṃ śasto mahājapyo devarājarṣisaṃyutaḥ
d sevan naro na duḥkhena bhayena ca vimuhyati
d yad ahnā kurute pāpam indriyaiḥ puruṣaś caran
d buddhipūrvam abuddhir vā rātrau yaś cāpi saṃdhyayoḥ
d mucyate sarvapāpebhyaḥ kīrtayan vai śuciḥ sadā
d nāndho na badhiraḥ kāle kurute svastimān sadā
d tiryagyoniṃ na gacchec ca narakaṃ saṃkarāṇi ca
d na ca duḥkhabhayaṃ tasya maraṇe na sa muhyati
a devāsuragurur devaḥ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtaḥ
c acintyo 'thāpy anirdeśyaḥ sarvaprāṇo hy ayonijaḥ
a pitāmaho jagannāthaḥ sāvitrī brahmaṇaḥ satī
c vedabhūr atha kartā ca viṣṇur nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
d viṣṇor nābhisarojāto brahmā bhuvanapāvanaḥ
a umāpatir virūpākṣaḥ skandaḥ senāpatis tathā
c viśākho hutabhug vāyuś candrādityau prabhākarau
a śakraḥ śacīpatir devo yamo dhūmorṇayā saha
c varuṇaḥ saha gauryā ca saha ṛddhyā dhaneśvaraḥ
a saumyā gauḥ surabhir devī viśravāś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
c ṣaṭkālaḥ sāgaro gaṅgā sravantyo 'tha marudgaṇāḥ
a vālakhilyās tapaḥsiddhāḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tathā
c nāradaḥ parvataś caiva viśvāvasur hahāhuhūḥ
a tumbaruś citrasenaś ca devadūtaś ca viśrutaḥ
c devakanyā mahābhāgā divyāś cāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
a urvaśī menakā rambhā miśrakeśī alambuṣā
c viśvācī ca ghṛtācī ca pañcacūḍā tilottamā
a ādityā vasavo rudrāḥ sāśvinaḥ pitaro 'pi ca
c dharmaḥ satyaṃ tapo dīkṣā vyavasāyaḥ pitāmahaḥ
a śarvaryo divasāś caiva mārīcaḥ kaśyapas tathā
c śukro bṛhaspatir bhaumo budho rāhuḥ śanaiścaraḥ
a nakṣatrāṇy ṛtavaś caiva māsāḥ saṃdhyāḥ savatsarāḥ
c vainateyāḥ samudrāś ca kadrujāḥ pannagās tathā
d ananto nāgarājaś ca vāsukis takṣakas tathā
d mahāpadmaś ca vikhyātaḥ karkoṭakadhanaṃjayau
a śatadrūś ca vipāśā ca candrabhāgā sarasvatī
c sindhuś ca devikā caiva puṣkaraṃ tīrtham eva ca
a gaṅgā mahānadī caiva kapilā narmadā tathā
c kampunā ca viśalyā ca karatoyāmbuvāhinī
a sarayūr gaṇḍakī caiva lohityaś ca mahānadaḥ
c tāmrāruṇā vetravatī parṇāśā gautamī tathā
a godāvarī ca veṇṇā ca kṛṣṇaveṇā tathādrijā
c dṛṣadvatī ca kāverī vaṃkṣur mandākinī tathā
a prayāgaṃ ca prabhāsaṃ ca puṇyaṃ naimiṣam eva ca
c tac ca viśveśvarasthānaṃ yatra tad vimalaṃ saraḥ
a puṇyatīrthaiś ca kalilaṃ kurukṣetraṃ prakīrtitam
c sindhūttamaṃ tapodānaṃ jambūmārgam athāpi ca
a hiraṇvatī vitastā ca tathaivekṣumatī nadī
c vedasmṛtir vaidasinī malavāsāś ca nady api
a bhūmibhāgās tathā puṇyā gaṅgādvāram athāpi ca
c ṛṣikulyās tathā medhyā nadī citrapathā tathā
a kauśikī yamunā sītā tathā carmaṇvatī nadī
b carmaṇvatī nadī puṇyā kauśikī yamunā tathā
c nadī bhīmarathī caiva bāhudā ca mahānadī
e mahendravāṇī tridivā nīlikā ca sarasvatī
a nandā cāparanandā ca tathā tīrthaṃ mahāhradam
c gayātha phalgutīrthaṃ ca dharmāraṇyaṃ surair vṛtam
a tathā devanadī puṇyā saraś ca brahmanirmitam
c puṇyaṃ trilokavikhyātaṃ sarvapāpaharaṃ śivam
d etāḥ pāpaharāḥ sarvā devanadyaḥ prakīrtitāḥ
a himavān parvataś caiva divyauṣadhisamanvitaḥ
c vindhyo dhātuvicitrāṅgas tīrthavān auṣadhānvitaḥ
a merur mahendro malayaḥ śvetaś ca rajatācitaḥ
c śṛṅgavān mandaro nīlo niṣadho darduras tathā
a citrakūṭo 'ñjanābhaś ca parvato gandhamādanaḥ
c puṇyaḥ somagiriś caiva tathaivānye mahīdharāḥ
e diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva kṣitiḥ sarve mahīruhāḥ
a viśvedevā nabhaś caiva nakṣatrāṇi grahās tathā
c pāntu vaḥ satataṃ devāḥ kīrtitākīrtitā mayā
a kīrtayāno naro hy etān mucyate sarvakilbiṣaiḥ
c stuvaṃś ca pratinandaṃś ca mucyate sarvato bhayāt
e sarvasaṃkarapāpebhyo devatāstavanandakaḥ
a devatānantaraṃ viprāṃs tapaḥsiddhāṃs tapodhikān
c kīrtitān kīrtayiṣyāmi sarvapāpapramocanān
a yavakrīto 'tha raibhyaś ca kakṣīvān auśijas tathā
c bhṛgvaṅgirās tathā kaṇvo medhātithir atha prabhuḥ
e barhī ca guṇasaṃpannaḥ prācīṃ diśam upāśritāḥ
a bhadrāṃ diśaṃ mahābhāgā ulmucuḥ pramucus tathā
c mumucuś ca mahābhāgaḥ svastyātreyaś ca vīryavān
a mitrāvaruṇayoḥ putras tathāgastyaḥ pratāpavān
c dṛḍhāyuś cordhvabāhuś ca viśrutāv ṛṣisattamau
a paścimāṃ diśam āśritya ya edhante nibodha tān
c uṣadguḥ saha sodaryaiḥ parivyādhaś ca vīryavān
a ṛṣir dīrghatamāś caiva gautamaḥ kaśyapas tathā
c ekataś ca dvitaś caiva tritaś caiva maharṣayaḥ
e atreḥ putraś ca dharmātmā tathā sārasvataḥ prabhuḥ
a uttarāṃ diśam āśritya ya edhante nibodha tān
c atrir vasiṣṭhaḥ śaktiś ca pārāśaryaś ca vīryavān
a viśvāmitro bharadvājo jamadagnis tathaiva ca
c ṛcīkapautro rāmaś ca ṛṣir auddālakis tathā
a śvetaketuḥ kohalaś ca vipulo devalas tathā
c devaśarmā ca dhaumyaś ca hastikāśyapa eva ca
a lomaśo nāciketaś ca lomaharṣaṇa eva ca
c ṛṣir ugraśravāś caiva bhārgavaś cyavanas tathā
a eṣa vai samavāyas te ṛṣidevasamanvitaḥ
c ādyaḥ prakīrtito rājan sarvapāpapramocanaḥ
a nṛgo yayātir nahuṣo yaduḥ pūruś ca vīryavān
c dhundhumāro dilīpaś ca sagaraś ca pratāpavān
a kṛśāśvo yauvanāśvaś ca citrāśvaḥ satyavāṃs tathā
c duḥṣanto bharataś caiva cakravartī mahāyaśāḥ
a yavano janakaś caiva tathā dṛḍharatho nṛpaḥ
c raghur naravaraś caiva tathā daśaratho nṛpaḥ
d rājā rathaṃtaraś caiva bhārgavaś cyavanas tathā
a rāmo rākṣasahā vīraḥ śaśabindur bhagīrathaḥ
c hariścandro maruttaś ca jahnur jāhnavisevitā
a mahodayo hy alarkaś ca ailaś caiva narādhipaḥ
b udarkaś caiva māndhātā tathaivoḍo mahodayaḥ

c śibir auśīnaraś caiva gayaś caiva narādhipaḥ
d pṛthus tathoparicaraḥ kekayaś ca mahāyaśāḥ
a pratardano divodāsaḥ saudāsaḥ kosaleśvaraḥ

a havidhraś ca pṛṣadhraś ca pratīpaḥ śaṃtanus tathā

b havidhraś ca ajaś caiva rantidevaḥ purūravāḥ

a mā vighnaṃ mā ca me pāpaṃ mā ca me paripanthinaḥ
c dhruvo jayo me nityaṃ syāt paratra ca parā gatiḥ
d namas tebhyo namas tebhyo mā ca me paripanthinaḥ
d parāt paratarā caiva gatiḥ syād iti tat paṭhet
d avikārāya śuddhāya nityāya paramātmane
d sadaikarūparūpāya viṣṇave prabhaviṣṇave

 janamejaya uvāca
 śaratalpagate bhīṣme kauravāṇāṃ dhuraṃdhare

 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tataḥ kuntīsuto rājā paurajānapadaṃ janam

b dhyāyantaṃ paramātmānaṃ kṛṣṇadharmaṃ sanātanam

a abhivādyātha kaunteyaḥ pitāmaham ariṃdamam

c anujñātās tayā sarve nyavartanta janādhipāḥ
d sarve te dīnamanasaḥ śocamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
d hastyaśvarathayānaiś ca saṃprāptā hastināpuram

d śrutvā yān svasthatām āpa dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d bhīṣmād bhāgīrathīputrāt sarvasaṃdehahāriṇaḥ
d etat trayodaśaṃ parva dharmaniścayakārakam
d adhyāyānāṃ śataṃ cātra ṣaṭcatvāriṃśad eva tu
d nava ślokasahasrāṇi śatāny aṣṭau tathaiva ca
d vyāsenodāramatinā dṛṣṭo grantho mahātmanā
d ānuśāsanikaṃ parva śrutvā bhaktisamanvitaḥ
d mucyate sarvapāpebhyaḥ sarvadharmaphalaṃ labhet
d nārāyaṇaṃ pūjayitvā bhaktyā paramayā tataḥ
d bhīṣmoddeśena kartavyaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca tarpaṇam
d vyāsarūpī hariḥ sākṣāt paśyatām iti kīrtayet
d dadyād dhenuhiraṇyādi vācakāya viśeṣataḥ
d sarvakāmān avāpnoti dīrgham āyuś ca vindati
d dvaipāyanaprasādena nityam utsavavān bhavet
